product_description:
Rimmel芮谜哑光控油粉饼，具有哑光控油、细致毛孔的效果，打造自然无瑕疵的底妆持久达5小时。所含的精油，香料和无防腐剂使散粉更轻薄，给您打造更光滑明亮的效果。 自然透明的散粉帮助均匀肤色，完美定妆。
使用方法: 在底妆后上散粉至全脸，打造细腻柔滑的底妆效果。如需吸收更多油份再上一层散粉。

name: techniques 均匀肤色海绵两只装
product_description:
使用real technique均勻膚色海綿，幫您實現無瑕底妝！  . 
由Youtube知名美妝博主Sam and Nic Chapman設計, 這款三合一的美妝海綿擁有三個不同的平面，能夠使底妝的細節上的更精細完美。 圓形的設計能夠以點戳的方式有效進行大面積暈染，同時尖頭部位可以完美的遮蓋痘痘與小面積瑕疵，斜面的設計可以完美的貼合眼下與鼻子周圍，有效暈染開粉底與遮瑕產品，打造一款亮白立體的底妝。 
實現高清妝感，打造平滑均勻的妝效。 - KN

name: Techniques面部核心化妆套刷
product_description:
Real Techniques高科技化妝刷由專業化妝師薩曼莎•查普曼設計推出，幫你輕鬆打造專業級彩妝！ 
 Real Techniques面部核心化妝套刷包含4只必備面部化妝刷: detailer brush遮遐刷, pointed foundation brush合成毛扁平狀粉底刷，buffing brush粉底刷和contour brush修容刷。所有化妝刷都有專業刷套，並採用人性化可立式設計。

name: Skin Soothing 2-in-1 Make-Up Remover (200ml)
product_description: 使用 Garnier Skin Soothing 2-in-1 Make-Up Remover 轻轻去除污垢和杂质。 卸妆水含有睡莲提取物和维生素原 B5，可轻松洗去面部和眼部的防水​​彩妆，而不会造成过度干涩或不舒适的紧绷。 体验清爽纯净的肤色，整天如丝般柔滑。 还适用于敏感性肌肤。 E.N.

name: Drop and Glow Luminising Duo 7ml
product_description:
Highlight your best features with ALGENIST Drop and Glow Luminising Duo, a pair of lightweight serum highlighters infused with pink and gold pigments and ultra-fine, luminous pearls to lend your complexion a radiant glow.
Gliding effortlessly onto skin, the featherweight formulas diffuse light to create a soft focus, luminous effect whilst colour correcting and treating uneven skin tone with an AlgaCorrecting Complex. Wear them alone to highlight targeted areas such as the cheekbones and down the centre of the nose, or mix with your daily beauty products for an all-over glow. They also deliver anti-ageing and blurring properties with a dose of Alguronic Acid; a patented compound that helps reduce the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles. Expect naturally radiant-looking skin.
Contains 2 x Reveal Concentrated Luminizing Drops in 'Champagne' and 'Rosé' (7ml).

name: Techniques Miracle Complexion Sponge
product_description:
Achieve a flawless base with the Real Techniques Miracle Complexion Sponge.
Created by Youtube makeup artists Sam and Nic Chapman, the 3-in-1 makeup blender features three distinct surfaces that enable you to optimise and tailor your makeup application. 
The rounded sides effortlessly blend large areas of the face with a 'stippling' action, whilst the precision tip perfectly conceals blemishes and targets smaller areas. The flat edge can be used to professionally blend foundation and concealer in the contours around the eyes and nose for a bright, highlighted base.
Achieve high performance results with a professionally smooth, blended finish.

colour: Shade 1 - Cameo, Shade 2 - Porcelain, Shade 3 - Cream, Shade 4 - Beige, Shade 5 - Tan
product_description:
Zelens控龄粉底是一种轻量级粉底，含有珍珠精华，可消除明显的衰老迹象。 其特殊配方中混有活性成分，可提高胶原蛋白的产量，减少细纹和皱纹。
皮肤衰老领域的国际知名权威马尔科·兰兹博士配制的独家配方的作用是增加皮肤弹性，使皮肤更紧致。 透明质酸和紫苏提取物减少衰老迹象的出现，具有抗氧化保护作用，防止环境刺激。
这款奢华粉底能增加水分含量，且含有光致发光的钻石颗粒，实现中等覆盖，营造更年轻的肤色。 E.N. 
使用方法： 用粉底刷、海绵或指尖沾涂抹在最喜欢的妆前乳上。 根据需要确定涂抹的范围。

name: Manizer Sisters (Manizer Trio) Highlighters
product_description:
Highlight your best features with theBalm Manizer Sisters, a trio of versatile, shimmering shades that add effortless radiance and colour to your complexion. Housed in a mirrored compact for on-the-go touch-ups.
Mary-Lou Manizer®:
A 3-in-1 highlighter, shimmer and eyeshadow. With a honey-hued glow, the brightening pressed powder effortlessly diffuses light so your skin looks softer, younger and more radiant, and is perfect for brightening the eyes for a wide awake look. Sweep across your cheekbones and brow bones for a professional strobe finish, or sweep sparingly over the entire face for a subtly glowing complexion.
Cindy-Lou Manizer®:
A 3-in-1 highlighter, shimmer and eyeshadow. The light-reflecting pink-peach hue delicately illuminates your best features whilst adding a splash of healthy colour. Add the shimmering hue to your lids, cheeks and browbones for a radiant makeup look.
Betty-Lou Manizer®:
A 3-in-1 bronzer, shimmer and eyeshadow. With a shimmering bronze finish, the silky pressed powder is perfect for creating a subtle glow and brightening and defining the eyes. Sweep across your cheekbones and brow bones for a healthy tanned finish, or sweep sparingly over the entire face for a subtly glowing complexion. Talc-free.

name: HD Miracle Silicone Tear Drop Sponge - Purple
product_description:
Achieve a flawless makeup finish in no time at all with the brushworks HD Miracle Silicone Tear Drop Sponge in 'Purple', a revolutionary makeup applicator designed to speed up your daily makeup routine.
Ultra-hygienic and allergy free, the innovative makeup sponge is coated with a unique ultra-smooth (TPU) layer to minimise product wastage; it won't absorb your makeup and allows you to save more than half the amount of product compared to regular brushes and sponges. Long-lasting and easy to clean, the silicone sponge will expertly apply and blend your foundation with seamless, airbrushed results; simply spread using a circular motion and dab lightly to blend away lines. 
Skin looks smooth and flawless.
Tip: Fold the Sponge around your finger to improve control and coverage in hard to reach areas.

name: Techniques散粉刷
product_description: 薩曼莎·查普曼推出的Real Techniques散粉刷可以均勻塗抹散粉和礦物粉底，打造清透順滑妝容效果。 Real Techniques讓您變身化妝達人。

product_description:

Real techniques眼部化妝套刷含有5款眼部化妝刷：眼影打底刷、眼窩深邃刷、眼妝細節刷、眼線刷和眉筆刷。所有化妝刷都有專業刷套，並採用人性化可立式設計。

colour: Cool Brown, Frambourjoise, Funchsia, Grand Cru, Honey Mood, Hot Pepper, Nude-Ist, Ole Flamingo, Peach Club, Plum Plum Girl
name: 妙巴黎丝绒唇膏
product_description: 妙巴黎絲絨唇膏讓您即刻擁有柔滑動人的翹唇。此款唇彩有多種迷人色係可供選擇，富含精油成分，可締造長效持久的超柔滑啞光唇色。它具有如第二層皮膚般的觸感及保濕水潤功效，是一款彩妝必備品。 KD

name: Cosmetics Bord de Plage Highlighting and Bronzing Palette
product_description:
Create a smouldering summer look with the NARS Cosmetics Bord de Plage Highlighting and Bronzing Palette; a limited-edition palette that helps to step up your contour and highlight game. The sleek palette is host to six luxurious hues; four opalescent tones for illuminating the skin and two light-diffusing bronzers for a natural-looking, sun-kissed glow.
The water-activated highlighting shades deliver a universal glow, which complements and enhances any skin tone. Sweeping smoothly over the visage, the powder instantly works to illuminate skin. The bronzing powers can be used to apply a bronzed veil to the face, or applied with more precision for contouring and sculpting features. Working in synergy, all hues offer skin a natural-looking lustre with an enviable, professional looking finish.
Shades Include:
Rivage
Corniche
Crique
Galet
Laguna
Casino

name: MARY LOU MANIZER HIGHLIGHTER
product_description:
使用 theBalm Mary-Lou Manizer 展现您的最佳形象。这是一款三合一彩妆、微光和眼影工具。
这款增亮粉饼拥有蜂蜜色光泽，可以很容易地扩散光线，令肌肤更柔软年轻、更容光焕发，非常适合增亮眼部肌肤，让人神清气爽一整天。 轻轻掠过颧骨和额头骨，可实现专业闪光妆容；或少量抹于整个面部，形成淡雅亮泽的肤色。 - K.N.

name: 保湿妆前乳（30ml）
product_description:
使用ILLAMASUQA 保濕妝前乳將會幫你達到非常順滑，完美的底妝。含有豐富的微藻類和維他命B3,是一款透明的凝膠質地含有最高的水分，同時植物萃取物能夠幫助鎮定肌膚使底妝均勻，看起來健康。深層的為您的肌膚補水是一款底妝前完美的打底產品。 
泰國製造，使用徹底的植物成分。

name: Geller New York 20th Anniversary Baked Gelato Illuminator - Diamond Dust
product_description:
Light up your complexion with the Baked Gelato Illuminator from Laura Geller’s New York 20th Anniversary limited edition collection.
The pioneering hybrid formula feels like a cream but applies like a sheer powder, instantly creating a translucent, iridescent veil that can be used all over the face for an ethereal glow that lasts.
Holographic shades of pink and pearlescent hues move with the light, utilising patented technology that allows the shade to flip from violet to pink for truly three-dimensional highlight and strobing effects. Housed in a compact palette and presented in special edition packaging.

colour: Shade 1 - Cameo, Shade 2 - Porcelain, Shade 3 - Cream, Shade 4 - Beige, Shade 5 - Tan
name: 青春焕彩粉底液（30 毫升）
product_description:
Zelens 青春焕彩粉底液是一款轻薄粉底液，使肌肤如丝绸般的顺滑亮泽。结合活性成分的特殊配方，可焕活和修复肌肤，减少明显的细纹和皱纹。
该品牌由国际知名的抗衰老权威机构 Marko Lens 博士创建，它含有珍珠感光微小粒子，中度涂抹粉底液，即可拥有自然光泽，让您显得更年轻。 Uyaku 是一种日本常绿山胡椒的天然提取物，可最大化减轻衰老的迹象，有效真对环境压力提供抗氧化保护。 这款奢华的粉底液可增强肌肤的弹性，让肌肤更紧致。 E.N.
使用方法： 使用粉底刷、海绵或指尖沾取适量本品涂抹在面部。 根据需要确定涂抹的范围。

name: BrowThis Way 眉妆套件 - 中等褐色
product_description: BrowThis Way眉妆套件由Rimmel出品，它是一个绝佳的工具，只需3个简单的步骤即可使眉毛轮廓更加清晰。 该款套件拥有舒适和耐用的配方，会将让您的眉毛一整天都处于完美的状态。 – I.M

name: Techniques专业面部刷
product_description:
Real Techniques專業面部刷是一款超級緊實大刷頭面部刷，可以用來塗開乳狀或液體粉底。 
 Real Techniques專業面部刷刷頭更寬，刷毛超緊實，是您化妝刷中不可缺少的一把，打造完美無瑕底妝。作為上妝第一步，底妝越完美，後面的妝容越漂亮。 
 Real Techniques所有化妝刷根據刷柄顏色而分類，每種顏色對應不同的化妝步驟。金色系列屬於打底刷，用來上底妝。這把Real Techniques專業面部刷非常適合塗抹和推開液體和乳狀粉底，達到您滿意的覆蓋率，打造清透順滑底妝。

name: Techniques 化妆刷清洗盘
product_description:
使用 Real Techniques 化妆刷清洗盘保养您的化妆刷，它是一款轻质清洁垫，配备有独特的多个清洁面，以实现深度清洁。
这款清洗盘采用高性能的硅胶材料，其符合人体工程学的设计能给双手提供更多的舒适感，清洗盘较为凸出的一面用于清洁化妆刷刷毛之间的化妆品残留物、油脂和污物，令化妆刷在下次使用时提供更纯正一致的色彩。 可使化妆刷的清洁度提高 55%。*

name: Sandler 丹尼尔桑德勒水彩腮红 - 小天使 (15ml)
product_description:
本品十分暢銷，顏色為純淨的粉紅，特別適合膚色白皙或中等膚色，打造精緻年輕粉嫩。 
讓您24 小時時刻美麗，一周7 天天天好氣色。無論您在城市裡忙碌，坐在海灘上，還是晚上參加聚會，從早晨第一刻起直到晚上散場，您始終光彩照人，一切皆因該易上色的防水配方。

product_description:
Create fairytale worthy make-up with this Diego Dalla Palma make-up kit, worth £105 (when sold seperately).
Containing 6 full size eyeshadows, perfect for contouring and blending, giving you the perfect smokey eye. With 3 matte and 3 shimmer shades to give you daytime and nightime looks with stunning effects. Named Snow, Shield, Mirror Mirror, Fairest, Destiny and Battleground to give you seductive, enchanting results.
Teamed with Dark Night eye pencil to give you a super sultry finish and unbelievable depth.
To finish use the Wicked Queen lipstick in a vivid blood red to ensnare and captivate those around you.

product_description: 使用 Bourjois Liner Pinceau，可获得专业妆效，并根据需要打造戏剧性或自然的效果。 这款眼线笔为最终控制而设计的高精度眼线刷和零失误使用方法，无论粗细眼线均能专业而游刃有余。 配方持久且易上妆，颜色深邃，可以一笔画出弧线完美的眼线。 E.N.

colour: Alabaster, Bliss, Glow, Nude, Tan, Vanilla

product_description:
Chantecaille修复润色保湿隔离霜 ，展示自然清新、完美无瑕的底妆。 轻盈配方、三效合一、天鹅绒般柔软光滑，可轻松融入肌肤，使肌肤滋润水嫩；SPF15，保护肌肤免受紫外线辐射；同时可像粉底一样遮盖肌肤。
内含独特的百里香和蝴蝶布什提取物，具有强大的抗氧化作用；透明质酸钠，可锁住肌肤水分。 遮盖肌肤斑点及脱色；使肤色自然完美。

name: de Force By Eylure Lashes - Fleur Loves
product_description:
Add natural definition to your peepers with Eylure's Fleur de Force Lashes in 'Fleur Loves'.
Created in collaboration with Youtube sensation and top beauty vlogger, Fleur de Force, the lightweight, three quarter length false eyelashes are long-lasting, reusable and perfect for any occasion; their three quarter design, 'messed up' finish and stone-ground tapered tips add fullness to the outer corner of your eyes for a naturally sultry effect. Suitable for all eye shapes. Easy to apply.

product_description:
妙巴黎絲絨唇膏顏色大膽亮麗且上妝持久，採用豐富的輕盈配方，將醒目的顏色與持久的上妝效果相結合。 Happy Nude Year 為嬌嫩的裸粉色，適合各種場合。這款唇膏內含獨特的多種輕盈精油混合精華，可保持24 小時不脫妝，讓雙唇倍感柔軟、細嫩。 KD

product_description:
利用Maybelline的Lash Sensational Intense Mascara让眼睛变得更大。
拥有液体油墨配方和专利扇形刷及十层刷毛，该强效睫毛膏层层涂抹睫毛，塑造无粘块、丰盈、翘起和角对角呈扇形的粗长睫毛。
睫毛瞬间丰盈茂盛，引人注目。 - K.N.

product_description:
這款套裝能打造輪廓完美的深棕眉型。這款套裝採用可信賴的配方，能為您帶來可持續長達六週的深色亮澤眉毛，無需去美容沙龍，讓您舒適地在家中為眉毛染色。這款染眉膏易於使用，為您帶來自然的深顏色。 - LM

name: #Insta Fix and Go Setting Spray 100ml
product_description:
Discover an essential makeup trick with the Rimmel #Insta Fix and Go Setting Spray; a versatile setting spray that can be used before and after the application of makeup.
The transparent spray effortlessly mists over the face, absorbing quickly to lock makeup in place all day. Not only enhancing makeup’s wear and longevity, #Insta Fix and Go can be spritzed onto the visage to refresh makeup throughout the day. This restores a freshly applied look to makeup applied hours ago.
If applied prior to makeup application, the solution primes the complexion in order to offer a more durable finish. Without drying the skin, the spray gifts makeup the extra staying power is requires for all day wear.

name: Sandler 丹尼尔桑德勒黑天鹅绒防水眼线
product_description:
準備好用誇張眼妝驚艷四座吧。該眼線筆具備出色的覆蓋性，確保零暈染，憑藉突破性配方，實現長時間不脫妝。 
這款產品含豐富的矽元素，十分服帖。超級防水持久耐用，特別柔軟，顏色豐富，有各種超乎你想像的絢麗色彩，不暈染。

name: Techniques 修容刷
product_description:
美容专家 Sam 和 Nic Chapman 推出 Real Techniques 修容刷。 这款专业的修容刷是 Real Techniques "Finish"系列的一款化妆刷，其设计旨在勾勒和突出面部线条，让妆效实现最佳的自然效果。 它配备有广角刷头，是涂抹面霜或粉末化妆品的必备工具，以打造专业级的轮廓线条和修容效果。
向面颊凹陷处、鼻子下方、沿着下颌的轮廓和鬓角涂粉可让您的妆效更自然活泼或完全改变您的脸形。 带给您梦寐以求的专业级效果，为您带来更多商机。 还可以用来向您的脸颊涂抹您喜欢的腮红。 - K.N.

name: Tinted Balm SPF 30 - Rose
product_description:
引领潮流和镜面般亮泽必不可少的化妆品。 使用这款屡获殊荣的 Lanolips Tinted Balm SPF 30，快速实现丰满的双唇和色彩魅力。 这款非粘性唇彩富含该品牌的超纯级绵羊油（Natures Wonder Moisturiser™，具备与人类肌肤油脂极其相似的分子结构）和维生素 E，可滋润双唇；同时其 SPF30 成分可保护肌肤免受环境压力的影响。
这款唇彩提供了纯粹的色调，赋予双唇健康光泽，非常适合轻轻涂抹于颧骨上，作为轮廓色。 提供深层滋养，令干枯的双唇变得柔软、水嫩和滋养。

name: Tinted Balm SPF 30 - Rhubarb
product_description:
引领潮流和镜面般亮泽必不可少的化妆品。 使用这款屡获殊荣的 Lanolips Tinted Balm SPF 30，快速实现丰满的双唇和色彩魅力。 这款非粘性唇彩富含该品牌的超纯级绵羊油（Natures Wonder Moisturiser™，具备与人类肌肤油脂极其相似的分子结构）和维生素 E，可滋润双唇；同时其 SPF30 成分可保护肌肤免受环境压力的影响。
这款唇彩提供了可加深自然唇色的纯粹色调，赋予双唇健康光泽，非常适合轻轻涂抹于颧骨上，作为轮廓色。 提供深层滋养，令干枯的双唇变得柔软、水嫩和滋养。

name: Geller Baked Gelato Swirl Illuminator Palette
product_description:
Enhance your natural radiance with Laura Geller's Baked Gelato Swirl Illuminator Palette, a trio of 3-D highlighters that feel like creams but apply like sheer powders.
Perfect for targeting high points of the face, such as the brow bone and cheekbones, or for sweeping across the whole face for an all-over glow, the long-wearing, swirled highlighters deliver a wash of glowing, translucent colour that bestows your complexion with natural-looking radiance and luminosity. Their swirled design pays tribute to the delectable Italian dessert, gelato. Housed in a mirrored palette with dual-ended makeup brush.
Ballerina (candlelit rose gold)
Gilded Honey (effervescent caramel honey)
Peach Glow (peachy champagne shimmer)

name: Multipack Wispies False Eyelashes (Set of 4) - Black
product_description:
Discover the best-selling lashes in a convenient value pack with the Ardell Multipack Wispies False Eyelashes in Black. Lightweight and reusable, the natural looking false lashes are set upon an invisible band for discreet wear and the hairs have been knotted and feathered by hand for perfect uniformity.
The fluttery lashes have a graduated mixed length and are slightly more curvaceous with flared outer corners for enhanced definition. Comfortable to wear, they lend your eyes natural volume and fullness. Made with natural hair and easy to apply.

name: Eye Shadow Palette - The Nudes
product_description:
利用Maybelline的 ‘ The Nudes ’  Eye Shadow Palette定制塑造任何场合的妆容。 让您试验一系列裸色调，该眼影调色盘组合从柔和中性、香草米色到深色、烟熏色等十二种互补色调。
每种颜色易于涂抹并提供无缝混合能力，使您可以塑造分层、可叠加妆容，获得深厚、鲜明和专业效果。 配有双端涂抹棒。 - K.N.

name: Techniques 迷你化妆刷三件套
product_description:
這款Real Techniques 三件套內含三個迷你化妝刷，非常適合放在手提包中隨身攜帶，可滿足您的一切所需，讓您全天保持完美妝容。這些超軟化妝刷可用於塗抹粉底液、眼影、古銅色粉餅和腮紅，確保您保持最美妝容。 KD 
 此套裝包含以下產品：

name: Mechanical Gel Eye Liner - Beyond Black
product_description:
利用Maybelline的Mechanical Gel Eye Liner描画和修饰您的眼睛，这是一款自动、防水凝胶眼线笔，可塑造高度鲜明的妆效。
用于光滑、优质配方，该眼线笔可轻松涂抹眼线，提供强效颜料，效果可保持长达二十四小时。 其便利的笔状外形和旋转尖端，可提供精确涂抹。 - K.N.

name: Handy Love & Hand Cleansing Gel - Coco Rico
product_description:
Gently refresh on-the-go with Merci's Handy Love & Hand Cleansing Gel; a lightweight formula that instantly cleans and purifies hands without over-drying or sticky residue.
Infused with tiny emollient pearls and a cocktail of soothing ingredients, the gel leaves hands soft, fresh and delicately scented with a light Coconut fragrance. Its convenient size fits perfectly in your pocket or bag.

name: Sandler Watercolour Liquid Blush - Rose Glow (15ml)
product_description:
Add long-wearing, natural-looking colour to your complexion with the Daniel Sandler Watercolour Liquid Blush in 'Rose Glow'; a pastel pink-peach shimmer.
Enriched with Jojoba and Vitamin E, the multi-award winning, water-resistant formula nourishes and conditions skin, whilst delivering streak-free, blendable colour that applies effortlessly to create a subtle, dewy sheen. Can be used as a blusher or highlighter.

name: 妙巴黎超黑浓密魅力睫毛膏
product_description: 妙巴黎超黑濃密魅力睫毛膏可打造令人驚嘆的漂亮睫毛。獨特的配方可使睫毛濃密超黑。蘊含黑色礦物顏料、矽膠和天然蠟，倍加濃密，是必備單品。 KD

name: to Coconut Naturally Smooth Lip Balm
product_description: Pamper your pout with the yes to Coconut Naturally Smooth Lip Balm; a rich, intensely hydrating formula with a delectable natural flavour to transport the senses to a blissful tropical isle. Packed with a triple-threat moisturising blend of Aloe, Coconut and Shea Butters, it leaves lips feeling smooth, softened and nourished.

name: Scandaleyes Liquid Liner - Black 2.5ml
product_description:
Line and define your eyes with the Rimmel Scandaleyes Liquid Liner in Black; an intense, liquid eyeliner that creates an enviably bold finish.
Arriving with an integrated, ball-tip applicator, the eyeliner glides smoothly across the lid. The liquid liner is highly pigmented, allowing the eye liner to deliver a precise line of rich, deep black colour. Boasting a waterproof, fade and transfer resistant formula, the liner is able to remain flawless for up to 24 hours. Expect a bold and eye-catching finish.

colour: Alabaster, Banana, Camomile, Carob, Cream, Hazel, Ivory, Porcelain, Shea, Suntan, Vanilla, Wheat
name: 30g
product_description:
Chantecaille 未来肌肤无油粉底 ，质地清爽，配方超级轻盈。 本款无油粉底，可塑性强，因此可涂抹至任何部位，尤其适合每日涂用及晚上使用。
本品内含光反射颜料，可遮盖或减少肌肤瑕疵，展示完美妆容。 配方中含60％的水，添加有芦荟叶和茶树精华，可滋润皮肤，同时具有遮瑕性。

name: Magnif'eyes Eye Primer 6ml
product_description:
Give makeup the staying power it deserves with the Rimmel Magnif’eyes Eye Primer; an essential base product that prepares skin for flawless eyeshadow application.
The primer effortlessly smoothes over lids, absorbing quickly for an invisible finish. Once applied, the formula enhances the wear and longevity of both eyeshadow and eyeliner. The intelligent primer intensifies the colour of eye makeup, whilst preventing creasing, smudging and transfer.
Making makeup waterproof, the Magnif’eyes Eye Primer extends the wear of eye makeup by up to 24 hours. Expect smooth, flawless and long-lasting results.

name: Schwing 眼线液
product_description:
使用 theBalm 眼线液，轻松搞定眼线，浓墨的黑色眼线液可以画出分明的眼线，快速吸收，打造干净利落的妆效。
纤细的毛毡笔头有助于更快速、更精准地上妆，更易于掌控，勾勒出完美的魅眼与翘起的眼尾。 - K.R

name: 裸妆眼影盘 9.6 克
product_description:
theBalm 裸妆眼影盘是一款百搭眼影盘，它含有 12 中色彩，即可不同颜色搭配使用，也可单独使用，以为您打造无尽的眼眸妆效，持久定妆。
其质地细腻如丝绸般柔滑，容易上色且着色均匀，即可用作干粉，也可用作湿粉，以增强立体感和眼部定妆效果。 配备有双头眼影刷，以实现精确涂抹和控制妆效。 E.N.

name: 修颜精华亮桃红色
product_description:
Pixi修顏精華亮桃紅色 
使用本品可喚醒肌膚，恢復活力。遮瑕膏為鮮亮的桃紅色，可遮蓋黑眼圈，淡化細紋，減少膚色不均。立即起效，使臉部煥然一新，看起來精神煥發，年輕有光澤。 
功效： 
 -玫瑰果萃取物，促進細胞再生，增加肌膚彈性。 
 -維生素A 對抗衰老原因
 -維生素C 提亮和活化肌膚
 -維生素E 滋潤和保護肌膚

name: Vegas Nay——超魅假睫毛
product_description: Eylure 最新Vegas Nay 超魅假睫毛，内含一对假睫毛，使睫毛浓密精美，呈扇形状散开，妆容精致。 适用于所有眼睛形状，可重复使用，配有睫毛胶水及说明书，方便使用。 配方轻盈、持久长效。

name: Sandler 丹尼尔桑德勒棕色天鹅绒防水眼线
product_description:
準備好用誇張眼妝驚艷四座吧。該眼線筆具備出色的覆蓋性，確保零暈染，憑藉突破性配方，實現長時間不脫妝。 
這款產品含豐富的矽元素，十分服帖。超級防水持久耐用，特別柔軟，顏色豐富，有各種超乎你想像的絢麗色彩，不暈染。

colour: 50 Rose Ivory, 52 Vanilla, 54 Beige, 55 Dark Beige, 58 Caramel
name: Healthy Mix Foundation 30ml (Various Shades)
product_description:
Achieve a radiant and flawless complexion using the Bourjois Healthy Mix Foundation; skin-perfecting makeup that enhances the natural complexion. Boasting a soft, fresh texture, the foundation simply glides onto skin, blending effortlessly for a natural-looking seamless finish with ample coverage.
Harnessing a fruit therapy formula for an anti-fatigue effect, the foundation boasts Apricot extract to boost skin’s radiance, Melon extract to deliver essential moisture to skin and Apple extract to ensure the visage appears youthful. The liquid foundation is also infused with Crystalline Pigments, which visibly even the complexion for airbrushed results.
The makeup arrives in an array of complexion-enhancing hues to reveal fresh-looking skin for all skin tones. Expect an enviably radiant complexion that is comfortably hydrated and visibly flawless for up to 8 hours.

使用荣获多重奖项的 Lanolips 多功能 101 魔法万用膏体验强化补水功效。 这款万用膏采用纯天然配方，含有该品牌超纯的医用级绵羊油，它还被称为"天然神奇保湿霜™"，具备与人类肌肤油脂极其相似的分子机构。
这款多功能超浓稠万用膏具备 101 种用途；它可用于极其干裂的嘴唇、干燥的角质层和瘙痒的肌肤，或用于给干燥的鼻道补充水分、脆弱的指甲及蚊虫叮咬。 让您尽享滋润、舒缓而舒适的肌肤，触摸起来如丝绸般柔嫩。 其锁水配方可锁定其本身重量 200% 的水份，本品适用于婴儿。

name: 妙巴黎一秒浓密睫毛膏 - 极黑 (12ml)
product_description:
妙巴黎的1 秒濃密極黑睫毛膏可瞬間實現360° 的濃密睫毛。這款創新的睫毛膏擁有獨特的睫毛刷，它將直刷毛和球形刷毛結合在一起，可覆蓋整個睫毛，打造更為奪目的濃密睫毛，效果長達16 個小時。使用1 秒濃密睫毛膏，讓您即刻擁有迷人的捲翹睫毛。 KD 
 使用說明：

name: Techniques面部定妆刷
product_description:
薩曼莎· 查普曼推出的Real Techniques 讓您變身化妝達人 。使用這款點畫底妝刷幫您打造無瑕完美底妝。 
這把設計精美的點畫定妝刷讓您擁有無瑕清透底妝，遮蓋力度恰到好處。

name: 梦幻纯粹BB霜 SPF 15（轻度）30ml
product_description: Maybelline  梦幻纯粹BB霜  ，使肤色完美无瑕。 专门为易生粉刺暗疮或油性皮肤配制。其配方清爽，可轻松融入肌肤，缩小毛孔、对抗肤色不均和黑头；SPF 15，可保护肌肤免遭环境侵害。 本品内含 2％的水杨酸，为您展示光滑无油光的肤色及柔顺完美的妆容。

name: London WipeOut! The Amazing MicroFibre Cleansing Cloth - Pink (x2)
product_description:
Effortlessly remove makeup with the Magnitone London WipeOut! The Amazing MicroFibre Cleansing Cloth; a pack of two pink cloths that tackle stubborn makeup using just warm water.
The cloths are ultra-soft and ideal for sensitive and intolerant skin types. Without causing irritation or dragging on the delicate eye area, the towels effortlessly glide over skin; without the need for a cleanser. Unlike cleansing wipes, the eco-friendly cloths are designed to absorb water and swell when damp. The wet cloth is able to eliminate traces of makeup from skin without smearing them across the face first.
The cost effective cloths are reusable and machine washable, eliminating the need to purchase makeup remover again. Expect even long-wearing and oil-based makeup to simply melt away, leaving skin clean, cleansed and clear.

name: de Force By Eylure Lashes - Petite Fleur
product_description:
Add secret definition to your peepers with Eylure's Fleur de Force Lashes in 'Petit Fleur'.
Created in collaboration with Youtube sensation and top beauty vlogger, Fleur de Force, the lightweight false eyelashes are long-lasting, reusable and perfect for everyday use; their subtle and textured, three quarter length adds an invisible lift to your natural lashes, and their softly tapered tips and subtle kick at the corner lend your eyes the perfect amount of natural definition for the day time. Easy to apply.

name: 粉底饼
product_description:
Chantecaille 粉底饼  ，使肌肤光滑、完美无瑕。这款超细粉饼，使妆容纯粹自然。
这款粉底内含抗氧化青苹果提取物，可抵御肌肤老化和环境对肌肤的侵害。控制肌肤油脂，使肌肤无油光，因此即使油性肌肤也适用。同时对抗肤色不均，使肤色完美，可以美美地拍照啦！ 装在带镜子的小粉盒中，可轻松涂抹。

colour: Ballerina, Charming Pink, Gilded Honey, Peach Glow
name: Geller 劳拉·盖勒烘焙冰激淋高光粉饼
product_description:
Laura Geller 劳拉·盖勒烘焙冰激淋高光粉柄可增强您的肌肤自然光泽，其烘焙 3D 高光粉让您感觉起来像乳液，但涂抹起来像清透的蜜粉。
这款高光粉饼非常适合用于像眉骨、颧骨等凸出部位或涂抹在整个面部用于增加光泽，为您的肤色增加半透明的亮泽色彩，使其看起来更自然而有光泽。

name: Natural Bronzer - Sunlight
product_description: 使用 Rimmel 的 Natural Bronzer in a Sunlight shade，令肌肤呈现自然日晒光泽。 这款防水修容粉饼可改善肤色不均，让您全年保持小麦色肌肤。 其质地如天鹅绒般柔软，含可抵御 UVA 和 UVB 的 SPF15。 金色古铜粉饼将保持长达 10 小时的妆效，令肤色温暖亮泽。 – N.P.

name: London 12 Piece Eyeshadow Palette - The Rusts 12g
product_description:
Perfect for every mood, outfit or occasion, Lottie London's Eyeshadow Palette combines twelve shades in a range of shimmer and matte finishes.
With a super smooth texture that melts effortlessly onto the lids, each powder can be applied separately or blended together to create endless eye make-up looks with long-wearing results.
Housed in a chic palette with a dual-ended applicator, you can achieve show-stopping results on-the-go.

name: Beyond Powder - OMG
product_description:
Illuminate the complexion with the Illamasqua Beyond Powder in OMG; a shimmering champagne hue that instantly warms skin.
The silky powder glides effortlessly over skin, and can be used for an all-over illuminated finish or applied with more precision to perform like a highlighter. Perfect for illuminating the high points of the face and reflecting light, the powder is effective when worn on the top of the cheek bones, brow bones and even the collar bones.
Apply dry for a sheer, natural shimmer or apply the powder with a wet brush for a more dramatic, metallic finish, with long-lasting effect.

name: Beyond Powder
product_description:
使用 Illamasqua Beyond Powder使您最喜爱的面部特征更加突出，这款蜜粉烤饼为您的肤色增添了微妙的温暖色调。
装在一个易于携带的小化妆盒中，这款轻质、妆效持久的光影粉提供自然色的红晕，非常适合用于突显红润的颧骨，仅需轻轻一扫即可奏效。 可用于干燥或湿润的肌肤，以产生更强烈的妆效。 适于面部和身体以获得古铜色肌肤的效果。
巴黎欧莱雅  Infallible定型喷雾，可全天固定妆效。 这款轻盈定型喷雾，具有超细质地，可延长妆效至 24小时。 操作简单，展示完美无瑕的妆效。 E.N.

name: 妙巴黎 Liner Stylo 眼线笔 - 棕色
product_description: 妙巴黎Liner Stylo 棕色眼線筆富含棕櫚蠟和蜂蠟，是一款上色持久、用法簡單的眼線筆。這款可收縮眼線筆同樣內置削筆刀，確保每次使用時的精度。 -SA

name: - 提亮粉饼
product_description: Bourjois 妙巴黎古銅粉- 提亮粉餅使​​臉部容光煥發。巧妙的熒光配方滿佈金色星點，讓臉部盡顯閃耀光澤。 -SA

name: White Flowers Eye and Lip Make-Up Remover (125ml)
product_description:
Elemis White Flowers Eye and Lip Make-Up Remover 是每个人日常化妆的必备用品。 这一配方含温和的润肤霜，可保护眼睛周围的皮肤并有助于加强睫毛。 它还含有白芍等强效提取物，令卸妆毫不费力。 非常适合于去除防水睫毛膏和其他难以去除的化妆品。 白茶对肌肤有冷敷效果，使其在经历一整天后可迅速恢复活力。 本品可由配戴隐形眼镜或眼睛敏感的人士使用，并已通过眼科医生的试验。
添加少量到毛巾或化妆棉上，并以同一动作从面部中心向外擦拭。 必要时重复擦拭。

name: London 旅途必备——迷你刷4件套
product_description:
迷你刷四件套含四把超软的刷子，帮您实现完美上妆。尤其适用于旅游时使用。
完美粉底刷 
大型脸刷、超软刷毛。 尤其适用于压制粉饼，可沾取适量粉底、令底妆平整均匀。 刷毛超柔软、在面部及身体清扫粉底，令妆容更平整均匀。
终极眼影棒刷 
超柔软、采用弧形刷毛。 尤其适用于眼影颜色的晕刷、塑造、融合。可展现性感迷人的烟熏妆容。
特级眼影刷 
本款刷子尤其适用底色涂抹，或在皱纹处晕刷。可沾取适量眼影，效果极佳，为您打造完美眼部粉妆。
修眉刷 
眉毛线条可控、填充稀疏的眉毛、均匀涂抹色彩，使眼睛瞬时清澈明亮。 其端部紧致、带斜角。每次使用适用产品，展现专业妆容。

name: Deluxe Concealer Brush
product_description: Cover problem areas with the help of the Deluxe Concealer Brush from EcoTools. Ideal for concealing dark under-eye circles, sun spots and other minor imperfections, the gentle bristles buff concealer into the skin for a flawless, airbrushed look. Crafted with a highly sustainable bamboo handle, 100% cruelty free synthetic taklon bristles and a recycled aluminium ferrule.

name: Chisel & Glow Highlight & Contour Set
product_description:
Expertly define the face with the Chisel & Glow Highlight & Contour Set from Illamasqua. Boasting everything you need to carve a faultless contour and achieve an enviable glow, the set contains a trio of coveted Illamasqua products that partner perfectly to deliver a professional looking finish. The set is host to a cream highlighter, contouring gel and the versatile tool needed to create a show stopping look, the round buffing brush.
Gleam Highlighter - Aurora (6.5g)
Accentuate your favourite features with the Gleam Highlighter in Aurora; an iridescent cream formula that allows you to create make-up looks with depth, definition and expert results. Infused with Vitamin E and Mica Mineral, the translucent, silky highlighter delivers sheer, pearlescent pigments for a natural-looking, luminous glow. Can be used on the face and body.
Contouring Gel Sculpt (8g)
Achieve a sculpted and chiselled complexion with the Contouring Gel Sculpt, a sheer contouring gel that helps create subtle, natural-looking definition on the contours of your face. Perfect for defining your cheekbones, jawline and forehead, the gel formula creates delicate shadows on the face; apply to facial contours where shadows would naturally be cast. It enhances your face shape to enliven natural features. Easy to blend, the formula will leave your face looking naturally chiselled and sculpted.
Round Buffing Highlighter Brush
Achieve professional, flawless make-up looks with the Round Buffing Highlighter Brush; a versatile tool with high quality synthetic bristles that are suitable for all skin types. Ideal for applying highlighter or foundation, the brush features a soft domed head to buff product into the skin, creating an even, polished finish.

name: Bahama Mama Bronzer
product_description:
使用 theBalm's Bahama Mama Bronzer，实现日晒肤色。这是一款 3 合 1 古铜粉、轮廓粉和眼影膏。
这款粉饼提供哑光棕色妆效，无橙色底色，非常适合涂抹于整个面部，令肌肤容光焕发；亦可用于确定颧骨、额头和下巴的轮廓，塑造鲜明的面部。 其自然棕褐色调可兼作一款完美的眼影；适合抹入皱折中并呈现一定的深度和鲜明度。 - K.N

name: MD No Mascara Mascara - Black（8克）
product_description:
利用来自Perricone MD的 'No Mascara' 睫毛膏展现您双眼的天然之美，这款2合1睫毛护理油和睫毛膏旨在提升、加长和加厚您的睫毛。
它的滋养、强化配方利用神经肽和生物素的强大功效，帮助恢复和再生，塑造更强壮、丰润的睫毛，它已被临床证明可塑造更长、更粗、更翘的睫毛。
该睫毛膏配以创新、双面、根部至尖部睫毛刷，可提供精确涂抹，其多维度、通用色调适合所有肤色，以塑造完美双眼。 - K.N.

name: Baby Skin底霜
product_description: 利用Maybelline的Baby Skin底霜获得完美无瑕、明显光滑的肌肤。 这款轻质底霜采用 Insta-Blur技术特别配制，可减小毛孔，获得持久、专业效果。 该底霜拥有便于涂用的窄细尖头和紧凑的尺寸，非常适合外出使用，可单独或在使用化妆品前涂用，令肌肤如丝般柔软。 E.N.

name: Sandler Blue Velvet Waterproof Eyeliner
product_description:
准备好使用 Daniel Sandler Blue Velvet Waterproof Eyeliner 打造绝佳眼妆吧。 这款眼线笔拥有突破性配方，令妆容整天保持完美，优秀的覆盖力让您远离晕妆烦恼。
Daniel Sandler Blue Velvet Waterproof Eyeliner 硅酮含量高，易于上妆。 Blue Velvet 防水表现出色，持久而柔软，颜色馥郁，遮盖力超强，不晕妆。

name: Techniques Flawless Base Brush Set
product_description:
Expertly create a perfect canvas with the Real Techniques Flawless Base Brush Set; a four-piece collection that covers every makeup lover’s needs. The kits contains an array of different brushes, each performing differently yet working in synergy to ensure a flawless complexion. Ideal for base makeup, the set contains two foundation brushes, a precision concealer brush and a brush for contouring and highlighting, each housed inside the convenient brush cup.
Contour Brush
Sculpt the complexion like a professional with the Contour Brush; ideal for the delicate application of contour and highlighting makeup products. Boasting a fluffy brush head with Real Techniques’ UltraPlush™ bristles, the brush effortlessly glides over skin, distributing product smooth and evenly. Ideal for creating chiselled cheekbones.
Detailer Brush
Achieve a completely flawless complexion with the Detailer Brush; a small makeup brush that is ideal for a targeted application of concealer, or can even be used as a lip brush. Crafted with a small, precision-cut brush head, the brush can tackle and effortlessly conceal problem areas.
Buffing Brush
Create an airbrushed complexion with the Buffing Brush; a fluffy makeup brush that is ideal for the expert application of foundation. Designed to buff product onto skin, the brush delivers a seamless and natural-looking finish with full coverage. Ideal for using with loose or compact powder foundation.
Square Foundation
Apply liquid foundation with ease using the Square Foundation Brush; an essential tool with a densely packed brush head. Boasting a unique, square-shaped cut, the makeup brush is the perfect tool for building custom coverage with a liquid foundation. Expect flawless results.
Brush Cup
Keep your brushes in tip top condition with the Real Techniques Brush Cup. Designed to store your favourite makeup brushes, the cup keeps tools neat and tidy on the dressing table.

name: 24 Karat Nudes Eyeshadow Palette 10g
product_description:
Create endless eye makeup looks with the Maybelline 24 Karat Nudes Eyeshadow Palette, a neutral eyeshadow palette filled with 12 matt and shimmer shades inspired by backstage runways.
Specially curated to work as harmonious duos, trios and quads for stunning, complementary looks, the versatile palette combines sparkling golds with rich aubergines and smokey tones that enable you to create a range of looks that add subtle depth or bold definition to the eyes. Each carefully selected shadow is infused with metallic gold pigments and blends seamlessly onto the lid for an intense finish. Create soft, subdued daytime looks, or sultry, evening glamour.
Housed in a palette with dual-ended sponge tip applicator.

name: 妙巴黎 Maxi Delight 古铜面霜 (18g)
product_description: 妙巴黎推出的此款Maxi Delight 古銅面霜可讓您的肌膚呈現自然古銅色。創新型珍珠和β-胡蘿蔔素混合配方可讓您的肌膚充滿夏日光感，這款古銅面霜獨有的超細均勻質地，可讓您的肌膚倍感柔嫩光滑。 KD

name: Master Camo Color Correcting Concealer Kit 6g - Light
product_description:
Achieve a flawless base with the Maybelline Master Camo Color Correcting Concealer Kit in 'Light', a complexion-perfecting palette that corrects, conceals and highlights to create a photo-ready canvas.
Colour correcting your skin in three easy steps, the kit offers carefully curated colours that target specific skin tone concerns, such as redness, dark circles and uneven patches. Its neutralising and brightening properties counteract and conceal imperfections to lend the skin a beautifully smooth, radiant and even appearance.
Use the green shade for banishing redness; the yellow hue for under eye circles; and the highlighter to brighten shadows and enhance natural high points of the face such as the brow bone and cheekbones.
Complete with a dual-ended applicator brush.

name: Great Lash Mascara - Black
product_description: 利用Maybelline的大睫毛Mascara塑造粗大、美丽的睫毛。 具有持久、无结块配方，该睫毛膏可从根部提升、卷曲和定型睫毛，以达到丰盈效果。 其特别设计的睫毛棒可提供终极控制，令睫毛膏非常容易涂抹而不会混乱。 E.N.

name: Collections 8 Piece Eye Blending Brush Set - Pink
product_description:
Create an array of eye makeup looks with the Spectrum Collections 8 Piece Eye Blending Brush Set; a complete collection comprising eight ultra-soft makeup brushes that combine a vibrant colour palette with expert hand-crafted design. Host to a variety of brushes for a number of uses including blending, contouring and building detail, the brush set is an essential for any makeup lover.
A16 Precision Crease
Boasting a small, flat brush head, the ‘Cut A Crease Police’ eyeshadow brush has soft yet firm synthetic bristles, which can pack product onto the eye and offer intense colour payoff. The unicorn-inspired makeup brush is an ideal companion for creating an on-trend, cut crease makeup look.
B06 Tall Tapered Blender
The ‘Blending Friend’ is the perfect tool for applying and blending eyeshadows seamlessly. The coveted blending brush is crafted with a super soft, fluffy brush head, which can create an array of eye-catching makeup looks, from soft and subtle, to smokey and defined. Whether it’s blending out colour or building up hues, the tapered blender is an essential addition to any makeup brush collection.
B04 Small Angled Shader
The versatile ‘Eye Spy’ brush boasts an angled brush head and is the perfect size for blending eyeshadows and defining peepers. The soft angle effortlessly shades the outer corner of the eye and allows colour to fade into the crease for a flawless contoured eye.
A08 Medium Fluffy Shader
The ‘Happy Medium’ blender boasts a medium-sized brush head with fluffy synthetic bristles, which are ideal for sweeping powders, pigments or cream makeup products to the entire eye lid, as well as building colour in the corners for a more defined look. Ideal for a subtle everyday look or for building colours to create intense drama.
A07 Stubby Shade
The ‘Full Colour’ brush is expertly designed with soft, fluffy bristles in a short and stubby length, which allows you to pack eyeshadow onto the eyes and build intense and enviable colour. The unicorn-inspired brush is the perfect start for creating a sultry smokey eye look. Creating ultra-pigmented colour, the applicator brush is an essential addition to any brush collection.
A12 Fluffy Pencil
The small ‘Draw Me Pretty’ brush is the ideal size for more intricate finishing touches, including highlighting the inner corner of the eye, adding colour to the crease and smoking out liners. An essential addition to any brush collection, the synthetic pencil brush offers professional-looking results.
A13 Short Smudge
The ‘Short ‘N’ Sweet’ eyeshadow brush boasts short, feathered bristles that are super soft and gentle on skin. The stubby design is ideal for applying powder or cream eyeshadows to the lash line, then blending out for a soft, smudged and smokey effect. Offering the opportunity to build up colour, the unicorn-inspired short smudge brush is an essential addition to any makeup brush collection.
C06 Tulip Eye Contour
A contouring pro, the ‘Pretty as a Petal’ brush boasts a fluffy, tulip shaped brush head that is ideal for contouring around the eye area. The super soft brush is able to reach into the eye socket and create enviable depth and definition. Seamlessly blending eye makeup, the eye contour brush is an essential addition to any makeup bag.

name: Oil Free Light BB Cream (40ml)
product_description:
利用 Garnier Oil Free Light BB Cream 获得完美无瑕的肌肤。 专为混合性至油性肤质配制，该无油腻乳霜处理和对抗多余的油光，消除肌肤缺陷，并提供深层保湿，恢复健康自然、容光焕发的肌肤。
质地轻盈并可快速吸收，该美容霜可轻松融入肌肤，尽可能缩小毛孔，同时其SPF 20成分可抵御环境侵害因素和有害的紫外线照射。您将获得肤色自然和持久哑光的肌肤。 E.N.

name: Bees Lip Balm Heritage Multi Pack - Honey and Pomegranate
product_description:
Nourish your pout with the Burt's Bees Lip Balm Heritage Multi Pack; a duo of their best-selling lip balms in Honey and Pomegranate.
All natural, the signature formula is made upon a conditioning base of Beeswax, Shea Butter and Vitamin E to leave lips feeling sumptuously soft and supple. The addition of Honey adds essential vitamins, while Pomegranate Oil helps repair and replenish chaps and sores. Stash one in your handbag and keep the other in your pocket for to give your lips some daily TLC.

name: 妙巴黎铜色提亮粉饼
product_description: 使用妙巴黎銅色提亮粉餅，讓肌膚容光煥發。巧妙的熒光配方滿佈金色星點，讓臉部盡顯閃耀光澤。搭配淺色修容筆，讓您輕鬆打造完美妝容。 KD

name: Techniques睫毛梳和眉梳二合一化妆刷
product_description:
Real Techniques睫毛梳和眉梳二合一化妝刷，一刷兩用，梳子一端修出精緻眉形，刷毛一端去除多餘睫毛膏體， Real Techniques 讓您變身化妝達人，輕鬆打造您的完美眉妝。 
此產品將睫毛梳、眉梳和化妝刷合二為一，是必備的美妝配件，一邊可以用在睫毛膏前整理睫毛，或用在睫毛膏後，防止出現睫毛粘連的現象，刷出根根分明的睫毛；另一邊用於梳眉， 令眉毛自然順直。 
眉毛是影響臉部印象的重要因素，眉型也會修飾臉型，直接影響眼妝和整個妝容的造型與風格。睫毛有助於讓眼睛看起來大而有神，有提亮效果。 Real Techniques所有化妝刷根據刷柄顏色而分類，每種顏色對應不同的化妝步驟。紫色刷柄的是眼妝刷。 
高質尼龍刷毛，精細濃密。梳子的部分為精密金屬質地，並有保護蓋子，方便攜帶和保存。

name: London 12 Piece Eyeshadow Palette - The Rose Golds 12g
product_description:
Perfect for every mood, outfit or occasion, Lottie London's Eyeshadow Palette combines twelve shades in a range of shimmer and matte finishes.
With a super smooth texture that melts effortlessly onto the lids, each powder can be applied separately or blended together to create endless eye make-up looks with long-wearing results.
Housed in a chic palette with a dual-ended applicator, you can achieve show-stopping results on-the-go.

name: H2O 超轻薄绿茶抗氧化玫瑰水/滋润修颜粉底液 - 1 奶油色
product_description: Pixi 推出的奶油色 H2O Skintint 是一款轻薄透气的有色滋润修颜粉底液，可作为自然打底使用。配方包含绿茶与玫瑰水，可以保湿并提供抗氧化物，而甘菊和薰衣草可以舒缓肌肤，令肌肤焕发新生，此面霜适合全脸使用，持久均匀。用后您将感觉神清气爽、容光焕发。K.D.

colour: 105 Natural Ivory, 115 Ivory, 120 Classic Ivory, 130 Buff Beige, 220 Natural Beige, 230 Natural Buff
name: Fit Me! Matte and Poreless Foundation 30ml (Various Shades)
product_description:
Smooth and perfect the look of your complexion with Maybelline Fit Me! Matte and Poreless Foundation, a refining liquid foundation with natural, matt finish.
Ideal for normal to oily skin types, the makeup is infused with micro-powders to help control shine and blur pores; it glides effortlessly across skin, blending seamlessly to visibly minimise the appearance of pores and imperfections. Expect a more even toned, flawless complexion.
柔紗啞光妝前乳使肌膚達到自然的順滑和毫無痕蹟的底妝。使用乳膠成分使肌膚底妝能毫無阻力的塗抹開，吸收多餘的油分使底妝成霧面狀，同時保持一定的水分防止皮膚乾燥。增加妝容持久度，同時使肌膚如絲綢般細膩。

name: 爱潞儿专业眉毛染色剂 - 黑色
product_description:
這款套裝能打造輪廓完美的濃黑眉型。這款套裝採用可信賴的配方，能為您帶來可持續長達六週的深色亮澤眉毛，無需去美容沙龍，讓您舒適地在家中為眉毛染色。這款染眉膏易於使用，為您帶來自然的深顏色。 - LM 
 使用說明-皮膚過敏試驗： 
 使用說明-塗抹： 
 警告：

name: Techniques 伸缩式唇刷
product_description: 讓您的化妝包擁有更多靈活空間，Real Techniques唇刷採用創新可伸縮設計，可以用來上唇彩、口紅等。刷毛緊實，圓錐形設計，可以順滑、均勻上色，也可以很好地畫唇線。

name: Bees Tinted Lip Balm - Red Dahlia
product_description:
Add a hint of colour to your pout with the Burt's Bees Tinted Lip Balm; a deeply nourishing formula that infuses lips with long-lasting moisture and hydration.
Harnessing the powers of Shea Butter and Botanical Waxes, the luxurious balm glides on effortlessly to deliver sheer, natural-looking colour in one simple swipe. Expect soft, supple and luscious lips with a non-greasy finish.

name: Complexion Sponge
product_description:
Create a flawless base with the brushworks Complexion Sponge, a high quality, hydrophilic makeup sponge that expertly applies liquid and powder products to the face.
Flake-resistant and long-wearing, the super soft blending sponge can be used wet or dry depending on desired coverage (wet for natural, dry for fuller), and effortlessly blends makeup onto skin with seamless, professional results. Its curved shape has been specially designed to hug the facial contours; use the rounded sides for dabbing foundation onto larger areas of the face, and the precision tip for smaller, hard to reach areas (such as around the nose and inner corners of the eyes). When used wet, the sponge will expand and absorb less makeup for minimal wastage; the product will sit on the surface of the sponge rather than being soaked in.
Expect an airbrushed makeup finish.

name: 美妆遮瑕粉底液（30 毫升）（多种颜色）
product_description:
EX1 美妆遮瑕粉底液  是一款质地轻盈的粉底液，可让您的妆容完美无瑕。
这款光泽感底妆可专业遮瑕，其配方中含有"纯色"色素和漫射剂，可让妆效更接近您的自然肤色，并使肤色更加均匀，打造完美无瑕的妆容，让您看起来更年轻亮丽。
这款轻质高效粉底液可实现所期待的光滑亮白妆容。

name: Lower Lash Mascara - Black
product_description:
Expertly define your eyes with Pixi's Lower Lash Mascara; a water-resistant, rich black formula to enhance, lengthen and separate lashes.
Perfect for even sensitive and watery eyes, the mascara is infused with Vitamin E and Panthenol to nourish and condition lashes, whilst its specially designed slim brush captures lower, hard-to-reach short hairs for ultimate impact.

name: Lash防水Mascara - Black
product_description: 巴黎欧莱雅 假Lash Architect防水Mascara 可令您拥有惊人的假睫毛效果，可以拉长和丰盈睫毛，令您真正拥有引人注目的外表。 这款黑色睫毛膏的配方防水，涂上后就会原地不动，它可以重新塑造睫毛，而其 4mm 的纤维可以提升质感、曲线、拉长睫毛。 K.D.

name: Eye Primer 6ml
product_description:
Ensure eyeshadow stays put with the Bourjois Eye Primer; an essential base before the application of eyeshadow. Gliding onto the lid assisted by the integrated wand applicator, the priming formula offers an invisible, undetectable finish, that smoothes skin and prepares it for makeup.
Worn under eyeshadow, the primer enhances the application of shadows, as well as increasing their longevity to guarantee flawless hold for up to 24 hours. The waterproof formula allows for a professional looking application of makeup, ensuring it remains crease, fade and flake-free all day.

name: HD Complexion and Make-Up Kit
product_description:
Discover the essential tools for creating a flawless base with the brushworks HD Complexion and Make-Up Kit; a three-piece collection that combines two kabuki brushes with an innovative complexion sponge. Suitable for use with both liquid and powder products, the brushes can be used in synergy to apply, blend and smooth makeup, leaving the visage flawless and perfected.
Egg Shaped Complexion Sponge
Achieve a flawless base with the Egg Shaped Complexion Sponge; an expert tool for blending makeup. The latex-free sponge is effective with both liquid and powder products, simply dab across the face to blend makeup and reveal a seamless, natural-looking finish. The large surface can also be used to pat powder onto the face to reduce the appearance of shine. The pointed top of the sponge is ideal for navigating the contours of the face, such as the nose and eyes. The precision tip is able to target fine lines and creases to prevent a cakey appearance.
Angled Contour Kabuki Brush
Expertly sculpt the cheekbones with the Angled Contour Kabuki Brush; an ultra-soft makeup brush that creates a professional looking contour. Sweeping over skin, the kabuki evenly delivers liquid and powder product and is ideal for defining facial features.
Powder Kabuki Brush
Pack powder onto the complexion with the Powder Kabuki Brush; a flat-headed makeup brush developed for the expert application of powder products. Simply swirl onto the complexion for an ultra-smooth, airbrushed finish.

name: de Force By Eylure Lashes - Simply Fleur
product_description:
Add natural definition to your peepers with Eylure's Fleur de Force Lashes in 'Simply Fleur'.
Created in collaboration with Youtube sensation and top beauty vlogger, Fleur de Force, the lightweight false eyelashes are long-lasting, reusable and perfect for day time use; their subtle design and soft-tip technology adds natural definition to your eyes for a flawless and fresh, everyday look. Suitable for all eye shapes. Easy to apply.

name: Multi Tasking Brush
product_description:
Achieve flawless makeup with the brushworks Multi-Tasking Brush; a tapered, dome-shaped brush ideal for stippling, blending and buffing.
Made from synthetic taklon bristles, it’s suitable for use with both liquid and powder products to create a variety of looks and finishes. The dense, fluffy fibres pick up the perfect amount of product to build an even coverage with foundation, bronzer or blusher.
A must have for any beauty kit, use the tool to create a natural looking base, dapple cheeks with a rosy hue or define and contour.

name: Black Cherry Tinted Lip Balm 4.3g
product_description:
Drench lips in brightening moisture using the Hurraw! Black Cherry Tinted Lip Balm; an ultra-hydrating formula that cares for skin using premium organic, vegan and raw ingredients.
The rich and creamy balm is infused with a hydrating blend of Castor Seed Oil, Cocoa Seed Butter and Coconut Oil, which works to eliminate dryness and thoroughly nourish lips. Simply twist the stick and sweep across lips for instant and long-lasting moisture.
The tinted formula is complete with a delicious dose of Black Cherries, which lends the balm a sheer red tint that awakens dull lips. Expect soft and smooth skin that is ultra-kissable.
Please Note: The tint of the balm can vary slightly in colour. Although Hurraw! craft each batch with precision and aim to make every balm the ’same’, please know that the plant infusion strengths will vary based on seasonal growing fluctuations and is somewhat expected when using 100% natural ingredients.

name: 妙巴黎高感光 - 控油底霜
product_description:
妙巴黎高感光控油底霜质地轻盈，滋润肌肤的同时高效控油。这款底霜让您的肤色在任何灯光下都均匀透亮，此外，还可用它修缮妆容，使毛孔隐形。-SA
使用说明： 单独上妆以打造不惧任何灯光的亮丽肤色；或在粉底前使用，让肌肤更显柔滑，同时细致毛孔。

name: 爱潞儿眉笔 - 深棕色
product_description:
愛潞兒深棕色眉筆打造自然專業妝容，令畫眉簡單快速。 
這款眉筆可填充眉毛稀疏部位，使用配套眉筆刷快速打造自然精緻眉型，是質感妝容的最佳選擇。 -SA 
 共有四種漸變色。

name: Techniques可伸缩修容刷
product_description: 讓您的化妝包擁有更多靈活空間，Real Techniques修容刷採用全新可伸縮設計，刷毛充分，妝容服帖。適合打修容粉和定妝粉，適合各種皮膚類型使用。

name: 海绵头刷
product_description: EcoTools 海绵头刷的设计旨在涂抹液体粉底和混合遮瑕膏，用于突出面部轮廓。 海绵刷头设有圆角面和平角面，赋予其极大的灵活性。 贴合的海绵头非常适合涂抹难以涂抹的眼部、鼻子和面部区域，实现完美流畅的晕染。 采用可持续高效利用的竹质刷柄和可回收的铝箍。

name: Glow Tonic To-Go Make-Up Remover Pads (Pack of 60)
product_description:
Refresh your complexion with the Pixi Glow Tonic To-Go Make-Up Remover Pads; pre-soaked, alcohol-free toner pads housed in a travel-friendly container.
Fortified with 5% Glycolic Acid, the toning pads deliver a gentle exfoliating action to eliminate all traces of make-up without over-drying, whilst a revitalising blend of Aloe Vera and Ginseng brighten, hydrate and soften. Suitable for all skin types, you can expect a smooth, renewed complexion with restored radiance.

name: Geller 劳拉·盖勒 Spackle 超动力妆前乳 59ml
product_description:
Laura Geller 劳拉·盖勒 Spackle® 超动力妆前乳同时具备打底、遮瑕和保护肌肤的功能，这款获奖妆前乳将抗衰老成分与打底功能完美结合，为应用其他化妆品打造完美底妆。
这款妆前乳含有大量的舒缓植物萃取物和具有抗衰老功能的抗氧化剂，能轻松涂抹到肌肤，具有打底和保护肌肤免受自由基损伤的功能，增强舒缓作用，延长定妆时间，提高肌肤的弹性。 DC Detoxdefense™ 是一种由维他命、矿物质、氨基酸和磷酸酯与蕴含丰富多元酚的红酒萃取物和白藜芦醇构成的合成物，对肌肤有保护作用，让您的肌肤看起来更加完美。
涂抹在粉底下层可让您的妆效保持数小时的清爽。

name: - 浅色至中等肤色适用 (30ml)
product_description:
本款礦物有色保濕霜能使肌膚明亮、水潤，使膚色均勻。見效迅速，使膚色如陽光親吻過一般自然健康。 
 Caudalie歐緹麗保濕美肌修飾霜具有獨特配方，專為暗沉膚色設計，其專利的礦物源​​珠光可與肌膚完美融合。富含葡萄籽多酚具有抗氧化功效。透明質酸可使肌膚飽滿水潤。其媚惑、雅緻和性感的香味帶有花香、陽光親吻和森林的氣息。適用於希望肌膚如陽光親吻過一般自然的暗沉膚色女性。不含刺激粉刺成分，適合所有肌膚類型。 
使用方法：對於乾性肌膚，每天早上使用日間保濕霜後，再使用本產品。對於中性至混合性肌膚，每天早上潔膚後，直接使用本產品。 
塗在整個臉上，然後由內向外塗抹均勻。別忘了頸部也要塗，以免有任何明顯痕跡。

product_description:
小蜜蜂椰梨唇膏保湿双唇的同时，给您甜蜜的热带风味。众所周知，椰油、梨子萃取物和乳木果油具有深层的保湿特性，能令双唇光滑柔软。- K.R

name: Wispies Clusters False Eyelashes - 601 Black
product_description:
Awaken the eyes with the Ardell Wispies Clusters False Eyelashes in 601 Black. Perfect for any occasion, the false lashes are effortless to apply and can be used a number of times.
The precision engineered cluster lashes are designed with shorter lashes at the ends and longer, fuller clusters toward the centre, which has an eye opening effect. Simply add lash adhesive and expect voluminous, fluttering and long-lasting results

name: 凝胶修容膏－色号SILHOUETTE
product_description:
ILLAMASQUA 這款創新的凝膠修容膏讓你輕鬆自然的修飾臉部，打造輪廓分明的妝容。 
它的質地輕盈易於塗抹，可多次疊擦加深色彩。只要輕輕將它塗於太陽穴、下頜和顴骨下方，即可讓臉部線條更顯自然深邃，使臉部呈現自然的陰影。

name: Vintage Cosmetics Company Eyelash Curlers - Rose Gold
product_description:
Create enviable curves with The Vintage Cosmetics Company Eyelash Curlers, a pair of high quality carbon steel lash curlers with spring mechanism for maximum curve appeal.
Enhancing the shape and curvature of your natural lashes, the rose gold curlers delicately envelope the lashes with soft, silicone pads, and gently curl and reshape for curvaceous results. Warm them up ever so slightly with a hairdryer before using for enhanced results. They can even be used to bind strip lashes to your natural lashes after application by gently pressing into place.

name: Master Precise Skinny Liner - Black
product_description:
Line and define your eyes with Maybelline's Master Precise Skinny Liner in 'Black', an automatic, waterproof gel eyeliner pencil with 1.8mm micro-tip for ultra-precision application.
Delivering sleek, intense colour, the eyeliner expertly defines your eyes with long-lasting results. Staying put for up to 24 hours, the liner will accentuate your natural eye shape, allowing you to create thick to thin lines for subdued daytime looks or sultry cat eyes.

name: Collections SC020 Wonder Sponge - Pink
product_description:
Achieve an airbrushed complexion with the Spectrum Collections SC020 Wonder Sponge in Pink. The textured sponge is an essential tool for creating a flawless base with a seamless finish.
The rounded sides of the ‘Unicorn Tears’ sponge effortlessly applies and blends makeup on the large areas of the face, whilst the precision tip perfectly conceals blemishes and targets smaller areas of the face such as the contours of the nose and eyes. Simply moisten the sponge and use to apply cream, mineral or liquid makeup products.

product_description:
用Lord & Berry Skin Lipgloss令双唇璀璨夺目。 这款轻盈的配方富含维生素 E，可以滋养和保护嘴唇，同时留下的颜色"几不可见"，令双唇光亮水润，魅力不可抵挡。 该唇彩有四种不同的款式：闪耀、微光、光亮和亮彩。
使用内置棒将唇彩涂抹在唇部。 加强色彩或用在口红之上以呈现光亮色泽。

name: Beauty - 操纵杆唇膏笔
product_description:
Kardashian Beauty - 操纵杆唇膏笔可以为您的嘴唇提供强烈持久的色泽，使您的嘴唇看起来完美丰润。 用这款奶油色唇膏笔光滑轻松地涂抹嘴唇，您的嘴唇就会感觉光滑和柔软。 - L.M.
使用指南： 用唇膏笔直接涂抹嘴唇。

product_description:
Set and perfect your makeup with Christian BRETON Compact Powder, a silky face powder with natural-looking finish.
Delivering a flawless makeup look whilst locking foundation and concealer in place, the lightweight powder glides effortlessly onto skin, setting makeup in place whilst promoting a smoother-looking complexion. Expect a velvety soft, perfected canvas with long-wearing finish. Available in a range of shades to suit all skin tones.

name: Sandler 口红（3G）（各种色调）
product_description:
Daniel Sandler 口红令双唇色彩艳丽。其配方耐磨、易涂抹。涂抹后嘴唇高度亮泽。
内含滋补性成分如：维生素A、C、E等。本款口红具有强大的抗氧化保护功效，可抵抗唇部干燥，确保双唇光滑水润 ，色泽亮丽。

product_description:
使用 EX1 Cosmetics Delete 净颜去污/黑眼圈遮瑕膏，让您的肤色光滑且完美极致。
这款遮瑕膏轻盈且易于融合，能巧妙地掩盖缺陷和消除瑕疵；其富含抗氧化剂和维生素E 的配方保护皮肤免遭自由基攻击，同时舒缓和修复瑕疵。
减少黑眼圈，遮盖不规则的斑点。 让皮肤看起来自然完美无瑕。

name: Glamstick 4g
product_description:
This Glamstick from Rodial is a nourishing lip balm that helps to keep lips moisturised and smooth all day long.
Imbued with the light flavour of coconut, your lips will be gorgeously scented and boast a glamorous sheen. With added Vitamin E to nourish and Cocoa Butter to hydrate and protect, this balm adds a hint of instant warm colour to your lips.
Directions of Use

name: Cosmetics Liquid Glow 15ml
product_description:
Enhance natural radiance with the Trifle Cosmetics Liquid Glow; a liquid highlighter that delivers a long-wearing, lit-from-within make-up look.
Infused with Cocoa Extract to soften and hydrate, the blendable formula can be applied to the cheekbones, brow bones and cupid's bow for a luminous, defined and expertly sculpted finish. Your complexion appears smooth and flawless with an ethereal glow.

name: HD Definer Complexion Sponge
product_description:
Create flawless makeup looks with the brushworks HD Definer Complexion Sponge; a lightweight, double-ended tool for versatile use and even coverage.
Suitable for use wet or dry to achieve different finishes, the premium makeup sponge doesn’t absorb product for minimal waste and has been specially shaped to allow for seamless blending with a precise, pointed tip for those hard-to-reach crevices. Perfect for highlight and contour shades to build natural looking chiselled cheekbones.

name: Tangerine Chamomile Lip Balm SPF 15 (4.3g)
product_description:
Shield lips from damaging rays with the Hurraw! Tangerine Chamomile Lip Balm SPF 15; an ultra-hydrating formula that cares for skin using premium organic, vegan and raw ingredients. Enriched with SPF15, the creamy balm blocks UVA and UVB rays to give lips the extra protection they need during periods of prolonged sun exposure.
The twist-up stick effortlessly glides over lips, enveloping skin in the extra-thick formula, which boasts long-lasting results. Formulated with a skin-loving blend of Red Raspberry Seed Oil, Sea Buckthorn Oil and Pomegranate Seed Oil, the rich lip balm provides superior nourishment, hydration and protection. Not only preventing sun damage, the formula is also the perfect companion when soothing and healing already damaged lips. Expect a healthy and hydrated pout.

name: HD Midi Sponge Set
product_description:
Blend to perfection with the brushworks HD Midi Sponge Set; a four-piece selection of various shaped makeup sponges for a variety of applications.   
Suitable for use wet or dry to achieve different finishes, the premium makeup sponges won’t absorb product for minimal waste and effortless application. Each sponge has been specially shaped to allow for seamless blending with specific designs to strobe, contour and conceal. Ideal for foundation, blush and powder formulations.
The Set Contains:
1 x Midi Cone Sponge – Purple
1 x Midi Egg Sponge – Green
1 x Midi Complexion Sponge – Pink
1 x Midi Ellipse Sponge – Orange

Maximise your eyes with Maybelline's Lash Sensational Luscious Mascara in 'Richest Black'.
Infused with precious Argan, Safflower and Rose Hip Oils, the intensifying mascara coats every lash for a softer, denser feel. Its arched brush features a reservoir that holds the jet black formula in the bristles, allowing it to coat even the smallest of eyelashes and fill the lash line for an intense, plumped-up look. The multiplying mascara coats lashes on all sides and delivers full coverage to create layers and layers of luscious lashes.

name: Brow Tamer
product_description: Achieve enviable arches with the Pixi Brow Tamer; a clear brow gel that works to prolong the wear of your brow colour. Infused with Aloe Vera and Panthenol, the fast-drying formula nourishes and conditions, whilst delivering soft hold to define and shape brows. Complete with a spoolie brush for easy application, you can create perfectly groomed, professional results that last.

name: de Force By Eylure Lashes - Fully Fleur

Add beautiful definition to your peepers with Eylure's Fleur de Force Lashes in 'Fully Fleur'.
Created in collaboration with Youtube sensation and top beauty vlogger, Fleur de Force, the lightweight false eyelashes are long-lasting, reusable and perfect for every occasion; their full, fluttery design offers a kick at the corner with naturally tapered tips to lend your eyes the perfect amount of definition for day time and evening use. Easy to apply.

product_description:
DuWop 丰唇毒液奢华金色是经典亮彩毒液的升级产品。 这次添加了金色云母，舒爽的俏唇配方具有反光作用，可使双唇看起来更有光泽。  有了亮丽的光泽，您的双唇将变得更加丰盈闪亮。
这款如珍珠般宝贵光泽的丰唇毒液奢华金色拥有卓越的品质，是令人梦寐以求的独特 DuWop 系列的一款产品。 蕴含有金属云母矿物质成分，微妙的金色可让您的唇部洋溢热情。 与自然色眼妆&古铜色脸颊搭配效果更佳。
丰唇毒液产品的名人粉丝包括： Lindsay Lohan、Jennifer Aniston、Teri Hatcher、 Sienna Miller 等等。

name: Assorted Make Up Sponges
product_description:
Mix up your makeup routine with the brushworks Assorted Make Up Sponges; a 24 piece pack of various shapes and sizes suitable for use with a range of products.
Offering rounded, squared and pointed types, each sponge can be used more than once and is ideal for seamless application of foundation, blusher and concealer. Can also be used with cleanser to efficiently remove makeup.

name: Super Plus BB Cream Best 3 Set
product_description:
Korean skincare brand, Skin79, have carefully curated a BB cream gift set to help you achieve smoother, brighter, younger-looking skin. The Super Plus BB Cream Best 3 Set combines a trio of triple action blemish balms that expertly improve the appearance of skin with both natural and full coverage finishes. Expect flawless makeup results.
Super+ Beblesh Balm - Pink (7g)
A triple-function BB cream that works to brighten, smoothen and protect the skin. The fresh textured blemish balm delivers a veil of natural coverage; it absorbs effortlessly and infuses skin with vitamin-rich Damask Rose Water and Acerola to brighten and enhance radiance. Its anti-ageing properties help to keep skin looking young, and SPF 30 protects against the sun's damaging UV rays. Skin looks perfected and clarified. 
Super+ Beblesh Balm - Orange (7g)
A skin-correcting BB cream that counteracts discolouration and dark spots. The balm functions as a high coverage BB cream, concealing and correcting pigmentation issues. Boasting SPF50, the potent formula offers UVA and UVB protection to prevent any future skin damage, including discolouration. The transparent BB cream is enriched with Phytoshingosine and Ceramide, which combine to strengthen the skin’s protective barrier. Expect a smooth and brightened complexion, visibly free from damage.
Super+ Beblesh Balm - Gold (7g)
A triple action BB cream that delivers whitening, anti-wrinkle and sun protection properties; it expertly perfects the appearance of skin for a smoother, more even toned makeup look whilst improving elasticity and skin texture with its cocktail of Gold and Caviar. Delivering a hydrating veil of natural coverage, the blemish balm creates a film of protection, infusing skin with moisture whilst keeping it safe from harmful UV rays which can induce premature ageing. It also helps to keep skin clear and prevent future breakouts. Skin looks naturally flawless and perfectly moisturised.

name: Sandler 丹尼尔桑德勒水彩液体腮红 - 美丽佳人 (15ml)
product_description:
本品包含維生素E 和荷荷巴油，便於塗覆，滋潤肌膚。本品含矽配方，沒有油脂，不會堵塞毛孔，適合各種肌膚類型。矽幾乎可以完全防水不掉妝。 
粉色讓雙頰嫣紅，使面頰呈現健康紅潤的顏色。用後肌膚將倍感滋潤，看起來神采熠熠！

name: 眼妆刷六件套
product_description:
EcoTools 眼妆刷六件套含有打造完美自然妆效或烟熏妆效的所有眼妆刷。 这款六件套采用高度可持续的竹质刷柄、100％无伤害合成尼龙刷毛和可回收的铝箍。
大眼影刷：这款地球友好型眼妆刷可将眼影底妆均匀地涂抹眼部肌肤，它非常适合眼部底妆，为涂抹眼影做好准备。
斜角眼褶刷  ：这款斜角眼褶刷设计有完美的斜角，用于在眼部外侧褶痕涂抹深色眼影，以突出眼睛，缔造深邃的眼神儿。
小眼影刷 ：这款眼影刷具有向眼睛边缘区域涂抹深色眼影的理想尺寸，可为烟熏眼妆添加另一个维度。
 超细眼线刷：结合最喜欢的啫喱、眼霜或眼线液使用，以轻松画出顺畅的眼线。 非常适合缔造长眼线，增强最终的妆效。
晕染刷：这款柔软的晕染刷是缔造专业烟熏妆效的终极工具，它能够进行不同颜色眼影的晕染。
保护套： EcoTools 拉链刷子保护袋采用渐变的颜色设计，可有效保护化妆刷。 由纯天然材料制成。

product_description:
想要濃密睫毛無蒼蠅腿？快來使用芮謎奇幻黑色睫毛膏！這款睫毛刷不會造成蒼蠅腿，而摩洛哥堅果油配方能令睫毛纖長濃密，而且還能減少睫毛掉落。 - KR

product_description:
Create an expert smokey eye with the Bourjois Quad Eyeshadow in Taupissime; a sleek, golden palette that houses four complementary eyeshadow hues. Arriving with a double ended applicator with a precise, foam tip, the quad hosts everything you need for flawless makeup application.
Part of the ‘Smoky Stories’ collection, the quad boasts four powdered eyeshadows that effortlessly glide onto the eye and blend together seamlessly for a professional looking finish. The palette contains a hue to prime, shadow, define and highlight the eyes, which work in synergy to create the perfect, long-lasting smokey eye.

name: Genius Ultimate Anti-Ageing Melting Cleanser 150ml
product_description:
The ALGENIST Genius Ultimate Anti-Ageing Melting Cleanser lifts away makeup, dirt and impurities while helping to visibly replenish skin for refreshed and revitalised complexion.
Based upon ALGENIST’s proprietary biotechnology research, the luxurious formula delivers an unparalleled sensorial experience – transforming from a silk-textured oil into a fluid, milky emulsion when applied with water to maximise efficacy.
The pioneering facial cleanser combines age-defying Alguronic Acid and Microalgae Oil, a duo of patented ingredients that have been sustainably sourced and scientifically tested to deliver superior anti-ageing benefits.
Rich in Oleic Acid, Phytosterols, Tocopherols and Tocotrienols, the pair work in synergy to optimise hydration levels and counteract nutrient loss while smoothing the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles. Gentle enough for daily use, the unique cleanser leaves skin feeling soft and supple with a youthful looking radiance.

name: 妙巴黎超级眼线笔 - 极黑(0.8ml)
product_description: 這款產品能完美打造纖細或粗黑眼線，筆尖處厚而有棱角，能讓你快速輕盈地打造適合的個性眼妝。極黑的顏色非常適合打造濃艷、引人駐足觀看的妝容。而筆狀設計令上妝前所未有地簡單! KD

name: Master Contour V-Shape Duo 27g (Various Shades)
product_description:
Sculpt and define your natural features with Maybelline Master Contour V-Shape Duo, a 2-in-1 contour and highlighter stick.
The contouring chubby stick is split into two colours; one side features a defining contour shade, and the other, an illuminating highlighter. Perfect for adding definition to your face, the contouring shade can be applied to natural hollows on the face, such as under the cheekbones and along the jawline to help sculpt and sharpen your facial shape. The radiant highlighter can be applied to high points on the face, such as the cheekbones, brow bones, down the centre of the nose and the cupid's bow; areas that would naturally catch light. The result? A professionally contoured complexion with strobe-like radiance.

name: HD Miracle Silicone Shaped Sponge - Glitter
product_description:
Achieve a flawless makeup finish in no time at all with the brushworks HD Miracle Silicone Shaped Sponge in 'Glitter', a revolutionary makeup applicator designed to speed up your daily makeup routine.
Ultra-hygienic and allergy free, the innovative makeup sponge is coated with a unique ultra-smooth (TPU) layer to minimise product wastage; it won't absorb your makeup and allows you to save more than half the amount of product compared to regular brushes and sponges. Long-lasting and easy to clean, the silicone sponge will expertly apply and blend your foundation with seamless, airbrushed results; simply spread using a circular motion and dab lightly to blend away lines. 
Skin looks smooth and flawless.
Tip: Fold the Sponge around your finger to improve control and coverage in hard to reach areas.

name: Arden Eight Hour Nourishing唇Balm
product_description:
您嘴唇上娇嫩的肌肤不断暴露在空气中，需要额外的滋润和保护。 我们的产品蕴含八种必需的维生素、营养素和矿物质以及抵御有害 UVA / UVB 紫外线的先进防晒保护因子，可令嘴唇保持柔软、光滑和健康。
Dry、容易脱皮的嘴唇可能会不舒服、令人难堪。 我们的这款日常唇膏正确结合了维生素和矿物质，可滋润嘴唇，令其保持柔软光滑。  并帮助防止进一步的损害，我们的 UVA 和 UVB 广谱防晒唇膏是无以伦比的。 总之，这款带有倾斜涂抹器的便携式挤压式唇膏可以满足嘴唇所需，令其整天都看起来容光焕发、健康、美丽。

name: Million Lashes - 特Black (9ml)
product_description:
用巴黎欧莱雅 Volume Million Lashes - 超Black (9ml)打造极致的扇形卷翘睫毛 这款柔软的睫毛膏带有一把睫毛刷，刷毛众多，长短不一，可以均匀地将睫毛膏从睫毛根部涂到顶部。
用一张多余的擦拭物去除睫毛膏团块和过量部分，如此您的睫毛膏用量适宜，从而可以拥有纤长丰盈的睫毛。 - L.M.

使用说明：

用睫毛刷将睫毛膏涂抹到睫毛根部和顶部。

name: Eye Bright Liner - No.1 Nude
product_description:
使用Pixi的Eye Bright Liner来唤醒您眼睛的活力。 本产品用于眼睛的下部内缘，达到宽眼的效果。
此款防水型的眼线可以凸显您的眼白，具有精确涂抹的效果。 本产品的颜色为肉色，从而给您一种眼睛更大、更为明亮和有神的错觉。 当您较为疲劳、眼神无光时，非常适合使用本产品。
优点：
-葵花籽油具有舒缓眼睛、保湿的作用。

name: Skin Naturals 2-in-1 Make-up Remover (200ml)
product_description:
利用 Garnier Skin Naturals 2-in-1 Make-up Remover 清洁肌肤，这款温和、起泡洁肤膏可去除化妆品和杂质。
进行深层清洁，该卸妆液结合水杨酸与具有抚慰功效的卸妆剂以清除顽固的化妆品和日常污垢。 化妆品的痕迹，包括防水化妆品，均被清除，其洁肤配方可疏通毛孔，减少油光并防止污迹再次出现。 该配方非常温和，甚至可用于眼部。
肌肤的化妆品被清除，获得净化和专业保护。 - K.N.

name: Volume着色专家睫毛膏（11ml）（深黑色）
product_description:
RimmelVolume着色专家睫毛膏 ，提升增强睫毛。是一款深黑色增浓睫毛膏，富含创新型睫毛色调。
本品使每根睫毛都震撼人心。锥形刷可涂覆最短的睫毛，使双眼大而美丽。内含综合睫毛色调，自然地提高睫毛色彩。 使睫毛浓密卷翘、魅力迷人。

name: MD No Foundation Foundation - 1号 30ml (亮色)
product_description:
利用来自Perricone MD的'No Foundation ' 1号底霜获得天然、完美的肤色，这款基于矿物化妆品的配方含有广谱SPF 30成分并具有晶莹、光泽的妆效。
可轻松融入肌肤，帮助遮掩缺陷并修正肤色，该光彩恢复底霜通过抗氧化的α硫辛酸的强大效果帮助肌肤缩小毛孔，减少皱纹和缺陷。
它的晶莹妆效令肌肤焕发青春、光彩照人，打造完美无瑕的妆效。 - K.N.

name: Techniques旅行装套刷
product_description:
Real Techniques旅行裝套刷終極版旅行刷套裝包含了您出門或在家化妝所需的所有必備工具。 
套裝包含3把化妝刷和化妝包： 
 2合1式便攜化妝刷包，並採用人性化可立式設計，方便使用。手工切割超長優質合成人造纖維刷毛，100%無動物實驗。加長鋁製手柄輕便易使用。

name: Sandler 丹尼尔桑德勒隐形遮瑕粉
product_description:
有助於遮擋油光，讓肌膚清透淨白。採用高科技配方，不會讓肌膚乾燥，也不會改變粉底顏色。 
這款產品可直接塗於皮膚，或打底之後使用，不會花妝。因為其配方中含有超情報吸油性粉末，使用之後，你就能看到肌膚變得無油清爽。這款遮瑕粉十分自然，適用於所有膚色，無論深淺。 
使用說明：

name: Blush Brush
product_description: The EcoTools Blush Brush is designed to work with all blush formulas including powders and creams, in order to achieve every desired look. The square shape brush allows for precise colour application giving you ultimate control. The earth friendly tool is created with a highly sustainable bamboo handle, 100% cruelty free synthetic taklon bristles and a recycled aluminium ferrule.

name: Vintage Cosmetics Company Dolly Bow Make-Up Headband
product_description:
The Vintage Cosmetics Company Dolly Bow Make-Up Headband is a retro-inspired, polka dot headband that makes cleansing and makeup application a breeze.
Made from super soft fabric, the headband is perfect for keeping your face clear of hair during times of pampering, and features a repeat polka dot print with cute bow detail. Complete with an elasticated band for a secure fit.

name: Collections 10 Piece Essential Brush Set
product_description:
Apply makeup like a professional with the Spectrum Collections 10 Piece Essential Brush Set; a complete collection comprising ten ultra-soft makeup brushes that combine a vibrant colour palette with expert hand-crafted design. With a variety of brushes for a number of uses including the face and eyes, the brush set is an essential for any makeup lover.
B01 Flat Top Buffer
Helping you step up your foundation game, the buffer brush is designed with a flat top brush head comprising super soft bristles, which create a light buffing action on skin. The unicorn-inspired brush is the ideal tool for applying cream and liquid products evenly, with the option of buildable coverage. It is also efficient for stippling powder onto shiny and oil-prone areas of the face. Offering superior buffing and blending, the brush helps to create a flawless complexion and seamless results.
A01 Large Domed Powder
Perfect for touch ups on-the-go, the domed powder brush is an essential companion when applying translucent powder or bronzer. The super soft, synthetic bristles effortlessly pick up product and distribute it evenly across skin. Use with bronzer for an all-over sunkissed glow or translucent powder to set makeup in place and achieve long-lasting results.
A05 Precision Blush
The ‘Blush Crush’ brush boasts an angled brush head and super soft, synthetic bristles, which are ideal for applying a small amount of product and building up colour. Effortlessly blending product for a seamless finish, the brush offers natural and professional looking results. Changing the way you apply colour to cheeks, the unicorn-inspired precision blush brush is an essential addition to any brush collection, leaving cheeks shaded, highlighted and enhanced.
B03 Baby Buffer
The miniature ‘Under Cover’ buffer boasts super soft synthetic bristles and a flat top brush head, making it the most effective brush for applying and blending cream concealer into skin. The small brush is the perfect size for targeting and covering dark circles and blemishes with concealer. The baby buffer is an essential addition to any brush collection, simply buff until a flawless finish is achieved.
A06 Large Fluffy Shader
The ‘Shady Lady’ blending brush arrives in a wide, flat shape, which is ideal for applying a wash of powder and cream makeup products to the entire eye lid. The large, fluffy head boasts super soft, synthetic bristles to blend hues with a seamless, expert finish. Ideal for a subtle everyday look or for building colours to create intense drama.
B06 Tall Tapered Blender
The ‘Blending Friend’ is the perfect tool for applying and blending eyeshadows seamlessly. The coveted blending brush is crafted with a super soft, fluffy brush head, which can create an array of eye-catching makeup looks, from soft and subtle, to smokey and defined. Whether it’s blending out colour or building up hues, the tapered blender is an essential addition to any makeup brush collection.
B04 Small Angled Blender
The versatile ‘Eye Spy’ brush boasts an angled brush head and is the perfect size for blending eyeshadows and defining peepers. The soft angle effortlessly shades the outer corner of the eye and allows colour to fade into the crease for a flawless contoured eye. The fluffy, unicorn-inspired brush is an essential addition to any makeup bag.
A17 Angled Brow
Expertly frame the face with the Angled Brow Brush. The brush boasts super soft yet firm, synthetic bristles and a precise, angled brush head, which makes applying gel, wax or powder brow makeup effortless. The winged definer leaves brows defined and enhanced. The unicorn-inspired brush can also be used to apply gel eyeliner. The angled head reaches right into the lash line to deliver precise application and a fierce, cat-eye flick.
A15 Lip Liner
The ‘Get Your Pout Out’ brush boasts soft yet firm, flat bristles, which work with a variety of cream and liquid liners. Effortlessly gliding over skin, the brush is ideal for lining, defining and filling in the lips.  Complete with a tapered tip, the unicorn-inspired brush offers superior precision and prepares lips for a wash of colour.
A09 Angled Eyeliner
The ‘So Fine’ liner brush is Spectrum Collections’ thinnest brush. The precision tool comprises an ultra-fine brush head with a pointed tip and an angled ferrule. Ideal for application gel, cream or liquid eyeliner, the brush delivers superior precision and fluid movement for expert results. The angled brush allows for additional control of the movement, meaning it’s never been easier to create a fine and fluid line to define eyes.

name: Volum' Express The Falsies Waterproof Mascara - Black
product_description:
利用来自Maybelline'Volum' Express'系列的The Falsies黑色防水Mascara令双眼尽显最佳魅力。 通过专家亲角蛋白配方和灵活的专利勺形刷，该浓密睫毛膏塑造出无粘块、丰满、防水、提升和扇形的精致睫毛，令睫毛的醒目和浓密度提高300％。
可令睫毛瞬间变得浓密，从任何角度看都不会有缝隙。 - K.N.

name: Collections A17 Winged Eyeliner Brush
product_description:
Achieve an expert cat-eye with the Spectrum Collections A17 Winged Eyeliner Brush; an ultra-soft makeup brush that combines a vibrant colour palette with expert hand-crafted design.
The eyeliner brush boasts super soft yet firm, synthetic bristles and a precise, angled brush head, which allows you to apply gel eyeliner with ease. The brush glides across skin, evenly dispersing product and reaching right into the lash line. The brush’s precision makes it the perfect tool for creating flawless winged liner.

name: Stainiac Lip and Cheek Stain – Beauty Queen
product_description:
使用 theBalm Stainiac Lip and Cheek Stain – Beauty Queen，赋予肤色流行的色泽。这是一种凝胶配方，赋予双唇和脸颊自然、可清洗的色彩。
这款双效染色剂可提供典型的粉红色调，轻松赋予肤色健康亮泽；适量涂抹可获得更强烈的色彩流行体验。 其芦荟配方易于融合，让您在定型前有更多时间来融合和轻拍。 结果如何？ 拥有健康粉色色调的无痕彩妆。 - K.N

name: de Force By Eylure Lashes - Couture Fleur (Individual Lashes)
product_description:
Add customised definition to your peepers with Eylure's Fleur de Force Individual Lashes in 'Couture Fleur'.
Created in collaboration with Youtube sensation and top beauty vlogger, Fleur de Force, the lightweight, individual false eyelashes are long-lasting, reusable and perfect for any occasion. The tapered, knot-free tip flares allow you to create a custom-lash look; apply sparsely for a natural finish, or layer for a more dramatic, wide-eyed effect. Suitable for all eye shapes. Easy to apply.

name: MD No Concealer Concealer（9克）
product_description:
利用来自Perricone MD的'No Concealer‘ Concealer 轻松遮掩缺陷，该亮白配方加入广谱SPF 35成分以获得专业防晒保护。
融入肌肤帮助遮掩缺陷同时瞬间亮白，该焕发青春遮瑕膏借助维生素C脂溶性形式维生素C酯的强大效果，帮助减少肌肤变色。 它的亮白混合物非常适合娇嫩的眼部区域；它刺激胶原蛋白的产生，以帮助逐渐缓解黑眼圈，获得光彩照人、精神十足的效果。
该遮瑕膏具有完全通用功效，是完美的眼部底霜，可遮掩瑕疵和缺陷，并凸显面部高点。 - K.N.

name: Bees Refreshing Lip Balm 4.25g - Pink Grapefruit
product_description:
Boost your pucker with the Burt's Bees Refreshing Lip Balm; a 100% natural treatment bursting with vitamins and nutrients to leave your lips feeling soft and supple.
Formulated with a creamy base of Beeswax and Coconut Oil, the hydrating chapstick is enriched with Pink Grapefruit Oil to help boost moisture levels and protect against environmental aggressors. Complete with a delectable citrus flavour, it leaves lips kissably conditioned and plush. Housed in convenient tube, perfect for stashing in your handbag.

colour: Brick Red, Dusty Rose, Nude Whisper, Palest Pink, Rich Wine
name: Colorshow Shaping Lip Liner (Various Shades)
product_description: Expertly define your pout with the Colorshow Shaping Lip Liner from Maybelline. Gliding effortlessly across the lips, the creamy, high-pigmented pencil delivers long-wearing colour with a smudge-proof finish. Can be used for all-over colour or to enhance the wear of your favourite lipstick.

name: Techniques Fresh Face Favourites Brush Set
product_description:
Create a naturally flawless complexion with the Real Techniques Fresh Face Favourites Brush Set; a limited edition, four-piece collection that boasts two Real Techniques products that are new and exclusive to the set. Helping to achieve the coveted ‘no makeup makeup’ look, the Fresh Face Favourites create natural-looking dewiness with ease.
BB/CC Brush
Create a natural-looking, dewy complexion with the new and exclusive BB/CC Brush. Crafted with large, firm bristles, the tool is ideal for applying BB or CC cream evenly and effortlessly over the face.
Contour Brush
Sculpt the complexion like a professional with the Contour Brush; the ideal tool for the delicate application of contour and highlighting makeup products. Boasting a fluffy brush head with Real Techniques’ UltraPlush™ bristles, the brush effortlessly glides over skin, distributing product smoothly and evenly. Ideal for creating chiselled cheekbones.
Detailer Brush
Achieve a completely flawless complexion with the Detailer Brush; a small makeup brush that is ideal for a targeted application of concealer, or can even be used as a lip brush. Crafted with a small, precision-cut brush head, the brush can tackle and effortlessly conceal problem areas.
Wedge Sponges x 6
Blend like a professional with the new and exclusive Wedge Sponges. The set arrives with six, brightly coloured tools that are ideal for achieving a seamless makeup application. Blending and blurring harsh lines, the sponges are essential for a natural-looking finish. Tip: Use damp for additional dewiness.

name: Arden Flawless Finish Maximum Coverage Concealer (1.5g)
product_description:
使用 Elizabeth Arden Flawless Finish Maximum Coverage Concealer 消除瑕疵和不完美之处。 丰富而轻盈的质地易于融合，可完美遮盖黑眼圈，并减少细纹和皱纹。
手持粉盒配备了一面内置镜子，非常适合在旅途中对肌肤进行修饰。
使用说明：  使用遮瑕刷或指尖，取少量轻拍至问题部位，确保其融合到肌肤中。

name: Lip Chic Lipstick - Petunia
product_description: Add sumptuous colour to your pout with Chantecaille's Lip Chic Lipstick. Infused with Hyaluronic Acid to plump the appearance of lips, the formula combines the high shine of a gloss with the smooth, even coverage of a lipstick. Gliding on effortlessly, Lip Chic delivers comfortable, long-wearing colour with a non-sticky, velvety soft finish.

colour: Pure Finish 2, Pure Finish 3, Pure Finish 4, Pure Finish 6, Pure Finish 7
name: Arden Mineral Makeup (8.33g)
product_description:
用 Elizabeth Arden 矿物Makeup (8.33g) 令肌肤容光焕发。 这款产品封装在一个便携式研磨机内，每次使用时，它可以释放一层超轻矿物粉，您可以按需取用。 它几乎没有重量，可轻松地渗入肌肤，同时值得信赖的配方令肌肤清透无暇。
它含有丰富的维生素和矿物质，以及海水混合物和 SPF 20，可保护、平滑、滋养肌肤。 它适合所有肌肤类型，用后舒服，不会结块或者沉入细纹，令肌肤亮泽均匀。使用说明：用化妆棉将本品光滑地涂抹在脸上。

name: Collections B01 Flat Top Buffer Brush
product_description:
Achieve an airbrushed complexion with the Spectrum Collections B01 Flat Top Buffer Brush; an ultra-soft makeup brush that combines a vibrant colour palette with expert hand-crafted design.
Helping you step up your foundation game, the buffer brush is designed with a flat top brush head comprising super soft bristles, which create a light buffing action on skin. The unicorn-inspired brush is the ideal tool for applying cream and liquid products evenly, with the option of buildable coverage. It is also efficient for stippling powder onto shiny and oil-prone areas of the face.
Offering superior buffing and blending, the brush helps to create a flawless complexion and seamless results.

name: Paris Color Riche Gold Obsession Lipstick CP36 - Nude Gold
product_description:
Illuminate your pout with the Nude Gold CP36 Color Riche Gold Obsession Lipstick from L'Oréal Paris. Offering rich colour and care, the Gold Obsession lipstick leaves lips defined and shimmering. The Nude Gold hue provides an iridescent veil of nude colour to lips.
Enriched with a lip-loving blend of Omega-3 Oils and Vitamin E, the lipstick not only delivers luscious colour, but protects lips from drying out. The lipstick utilises velvety pigments blended with a touch of pure gold, leaving lips illuminated with a metallic finish.

name: Lip Chic Lipstick - Tuberose
product_description: Add sumptuous colour to your pout with Chantecaille's Lip Chic Lipstick. Infused with Hyaluronic Acid to plump the appearance of lips, the formula combines the high shine of a gloss with the smooth, even coverage of a lipstick. Gliding on effortlessly, Lip Chic delivers comfortable, long-wearing colour with a non-sticky, velvety soft finish.

name: Volume Million 睫毛防水Mascara
product_description:
利用L’Oreal Volume Million睫毛Mascara防水霜塑造最震撼的效果。 该millionizer睫毛刷拥有许多长短不一的刷毛，它分开您的睫毛，形成完整的扇形效果，快速、均匀地涂抹睫毛。
通过额外擦拭刷去除团块，该防水配方是潮湿天气和节假日的完美之选，可确保绝佳的保持效果。 将完美塑造您的眼睛，打造备受欢迎、富有魅力的形象。 - L.M.
使用说明：  使用内置的弹性体涂抹器将睫毛膏涂抹至您的上下睫毛。

name: Lash-Pro 单独包装假睫毛 – 多重包装无结块
product_description:
Eylure Lash-Pro 单独包装假睫毛（多重包装无结块）可创建一个定制的妆效。
提供216根单独包装的假睫毛（比同一包装多出4倍以上），这套假睫毛使您自我定制最佳的睫毛数量和厚度，塑造出理想的睫毛造型。 持久且方便适用。

name: Arden 瞬时完美妆前乳
product_description:
Elizabeth Arden 瞬时完美妆前乳 ，配方轻盈、通用型，使肤色瞬间均匀、完美无瑕，同时延长妆效。
采用光扩散技术和三重模糊聚合物，可轻松上妆，抚平肌肤、缩小毛孔、减少细纹和皱纹。 采用延时、肌肤平衡技术，内含吸油二氧化硅微粒，使肌肤完美亮泽。 展示闪耀光泽、完美无瑕的肤色，提高肤质。 - K.N

name: Palette Rosette - Rosy Radiance
product_description:
Discover the must-have palette for bringing out your inner glow with the Rosy Radiance Palette Rosette from Pixi. An all-in-one colour kit, the palette boasts an array of rose, crème and taupe hues that are able to sculpt and enhance cheeks, add a wash of colour to eyes and fill in sparse brows.
The blush, glow and contour shades combine in one handy palette to deliver radiance and shape to your face. Ideal as a gift or an indulgent treat for yourself.
8 x Eye Shades
3 x Brow Shades
3 x Face Shades
Duo Applicator

name: Artist FX™ Auto-Patting Makeup Applicator
product_description:
Discover a next generation makeup tool with the STARSKIN Artist FX™ Auto-Patting Makeup Applicator; an innovative applicator that is designed to mimic the expert airbrushing techniques of professional makeup artists.
The easy-to-use device combines a pulsating and patting action, and is able to deliver 4,800 taps a minute. Patting in foundation in this manner provides flawless and long-lasting coverage with an airbrushed finish. The electronic applicator arrives with three interchangeable heads, each suited to a different type of product, including cream, serums, foundations and powder.
The compact device can be taken on-the-go and is fully rechargeable, allowing you to achieve a professional makeup application each and every day.

name: Techniques Bold Metals平头轮廓刷
product_description: Real Techniques Bold Metals Collection  平头轮廓刷 ，用以打造您最爱的面部特色。 其加权设计让人掌控自如，配有平头和高档合成刷毛，用以涂刷霜状及粉状化妆品，可轻松凸显面部高点如：颧骨、鼻子、下巴等。 每次使用都能打造完美重塑的妆容。 E.N.

name: Banana Balm Lip Sheen 3-in-1
product_description:
使用屡获殊荣的 Lanolips Banana Balm Lip Sheen 3-in-1，实现完美双唇。这是一款致力于调理、顺滑和增强光泽的唇膏。
这款丰盈乳脂配方富含天然香蕉提取物，以及各种维生素、矿物质和抗氧化剂，有助于保护肌肤免受环境压力的伤害。 其所含该品牌独有的超纯医用级绵羊油（Nature's Wonder Moisturiser™，具备与人类肌肤油脂极其相似的分子结构）结合牛油果油，可确保双唇护理得当、丰盈亮泽。
这款多功效唇膏赋予细腻光泽，令双唇呈现健康亮泽。

name: Quad Smokey Stories 眼影 （Sau-Mondaine）
product_description:
利用 Bourjois Quad Smokey Stories眼影打造魅力迷人、完美如画的双眼。 让您体验四种互补色调，您可以通过其卓越的色彩保持和无缝融合能力涂抹底妆，修饰和突出双眼，获得天然效果。
使用最淡色调涂抹眼睑，中等色调涂抹眼影，最深色调描画眼线，使用亮粉增添光彩，打造专业效果和柔和烟熏妆效。 拥有带软垫尖头双端眼影刷，使眼影轻松与肌肤融合，用精准端部描画轮廓。 E.N.

name: Collections C01 Large Fan Brush
product_description:
Sculpt enviable cheek bones with the Spectrum Collections C01 Large Fan Brush; an ultra-soft makeup brush that combines a vibrant colour palette with expert hand-crafted design.
The ‘#No.1 Fan’ brush is the ideal companion for applying both highlighter and bronzer like a professional. The rounded brush head comprises super soft, synthetic bristles, which offer light coverage for a soft focus finish, or can be built upon for additional impact. The large fan brush is Spectrum Collections’ largest face brush, perfect for sweeping powdered bronzer or highlighter across the cheek bones and collar bones.
