The unicorn-inspired brush is an essential addition to any brush collection, allowing you to expertly contour and enhance skin with an enviable glow.

colour: Catwalk, LA Diva, P.I.N.K, Ruby, Va!Va! Voom
name: Cosmetics 矿物唇膏（多色系 3.5g）
product_description: Bellapierre Cosmetics 礦物唇膏採用全新礦物配方，可輕鬆打造迷人唇色，並能全天滋養雙唇，令其水潤瑩亮。此款唇膏含天然蠟性成分及豐富的礦物色素，全方位護理雙唇。唇膏如絲般柔滑，含多種鐵氧化物及維C、維E 等抗氧化物，能為唇部提供SPF 日曬防護。 KD

colour: Bronze, Burgundy, Chamel, Copper, Gold Pink, Pink XL, Red
name: BRETON Lipstick 3.9ml (Various Shades)
product_description:
Add a pop of colour to your pout with Christian BRETON Lipstick, a rich, creamy lip colour in a range of glossy, metallic, sheen, matt and pearlescent finishes.
Gliding effortlessly onto lips, the lipstick delivers a slick of illuminating colour that emphasises and smoothens your pout. Lips look bright and healthy with a supple feel.

name: BRETON Powder Foundation 7g (Various Shades)
product_description:
Perfect the look of your skin with Christian BRETON Powder Foundation, a pressed powder foundation that delivers long-wearing coverage whilst regulating moisture to keep skin comfortable.
A foundation and powder all-in-one, the multi-tasking makeup utilises invisible, ultra-smoothing powders to unify the appearance of skin; it creates a flawless veil with a radiant finish. Ideal for travel, the compact foundation is humidity-resistant and contains a moisture regulator to provide skin with optimal comfort.

name: Paris Infallible Total Cover Foundation (Various Shades)
product_description:
Achieve a completely flawless complexion with L'Oreal Paris Infallible Total Cover Foundation, a full coverage liquid foundation with long-wearing, ultra-matt finish that feels lightweight on skin.
Formulated with 30% more pigment for better coverage and less product, the makeup glides effortlessly onto skin, blending seamlessly to cover a multitude of imperfections, including blemishes, redness and even tattoos. Its full coverage finish expertly camouflages your complexion to leave your skin looking even toned, shine free and instantly perfected for up to 24 hours. Transfer-resistant.

name: Dollar Brows Brows on Point Micro Pencil - Taupe
product_description:
Achieve flawless eyebrows with the Brows on Point Micro Pencil - Taupe from brow experts Billion Dollar Brows. Dual ended, Brows on Point comprises a precision point to one end and a spoolie brush to the other. The ultra-fine tip creates natural looking brush strokes that mimic the appearance of individual hairs for a subtle finish, whilst the spoolie can be used to comb and blend.
The pencil boasts a mechanical function, constantly delivering a precision tip without the need to sharpen. Filling in sparse brows to accentuate your look, the brow makeup offers maximum colour pay off and a professional finish. The formula is both water and smudge proof, gliding onto brows effortlessly and providing long lasting results.

name: & Berry魔力Brow （各种颜色）
product_description:
用Lord & Berry 魔力Brow笔描画好看的眉毛。 这款智能设计具有三种高色素颜色，可以增强和定义眉毛的自然形状，而内置眉刷可以轻松地晕染眉色。
用这款综合的涂抹器将眉毛向上 Brush ，用眉笔填充任何空隙，然后用涂抹器晕染眉线、塑造眉形。

name: Ingenious Powder Cheeks N EX (Various Shades)
product_description:
Add a touch of colour to your complexion with RMK Ingenious Powder Cheeks N, a selection of vibrant blushers that add glowing radiance to your cheeks.
Blending effortlessly onto skin, the blush delivers a vivid hue that enhances your natural complexion with a striking flush of colour. Use on the apples of your cheeks or for subtle contouring.

name: Geller 劳拉·盖勒眉粉盘
product_description:
Laura Geller 劳拉·盖勒眉粉盘让您拥有专业级妆效的眉毛，它是一款多合一眉粉盘，让您有效勾勒眉形，填补、定型和突出您的完美眉毛。
使用这款双色烘焙眉粉自定义缔造完美眉毛，可改善色泽、修饰眉形、填补和定型眉毛；她采用定形蜡梳顺眉毛，使其贴合定型；所含的高光粉可增加眉毛的色泽，让您拥有专业级品质的大眼妆效。
这款眉粉盘让您拥有更丰盈符合脸形的眉毛，它是一款完美的化妆工具，增强您的自然特征。 配备双头眉毛刷。

name: Cosmetics Eyebrow Pencils - Various shades
product_description: Created to give your eyebrows that perfect finishing touch, this  Eyebrow Pencil from Bellapierre Cosmetics is an essential addition to  your makeup bag. Available in various shades, this silky pencil will  give you a precise application with maximum staying power, meaning that  you'll be looking your best all day and night. K.D.

name: Nature淡雅色调Moisturiser 50ml - 各种色调
product_description:
Living Nature 淡雅色调 Moisturiser 提供纯粹的颜色，自然的色调让您的肤色清新、容光焕发，呈现健康的色泽。
以天然矿物质和活性麦卢卡Honey强化，快速吸收和清爽的配方提供长效保湿和深层滋养，让您获得完美的彩色妆容和光滑、均匀的肤色。 适合各种类型的肌肤。

name: Liquid Lights (Various Shades)
product_description:
这款新品能令肌肤呈现闪亮的自然活力光泽。 独特的薄润透气配方亲附肌肤，令肌肤丝滑轻盈。
蕴含的反光微粒提亮肤色，令肌肤焕发年轻水嫩的神采。 多种颜色可选，兼顾明暗肌肤。 K.D.

name: 活性紧致遮瑕膏
product_description:
Chantecaille 活性紧致遮瑕膏 ，具有创新型双重功效。可遮盖抚平细纹，展示完美肤色。
本品富含浓缩型六胜肽，可抚平皱纹，使肤色均匀，遮盖黑眼圈。 专门配制；特殊配方，内含维生素E，SPF10，可滋润保护娇嫩的眼部区域；反光颗粒的加入，使您比同辈人更显年轻。

name: Longo Pro Waterproof Eye Pencil (Various Shades)
product_description:
Expertly line and define your eyes with the Vincent Longo Pro Waterproof Eye Pencil, a professional grade eyeliner pencil that delivers highly pigmented colour with a waterproof, long-lasting finish.
With a rich and creamy formula, the eyeliner glides effortlessly across the lid or waterline, creating both smokey or subdued day time looks. Its true colour on application intensifies the look of your peepers with long-wearing results.

name: & Berry 柔软触感Concealer（各种颜色）
product_description:
用Lord & Berry柔软触感Concealer掩盖瑕疵。   这款液体遮瑕膏的配方蕴含覆盆子油和枣椰子提取物的混合物，可以掩盖眼下的黑眼圈、变色和不完善之处，同时帮助对抗衰老的迹象。 它可以达到丝绒般的妆效，亚光效果可以持续一整天。
使用内置棒将遮瑕膏涂抹到瑕疵之处，注重眼部区域。

name: Cosmetics Invisiwear Compact Powder 9.5g (Various Shades)
product_description:
Perfect the look of your complexion with EX1 Cosmetics Invisiwear Compact Powder, a feather light, ultra-finely milled pressed powder that works to beautify your skin whilst setting makeup in place.
The lightweight powder delivers just a hint of colour whilst controlling shine with long-lasting effect; it's the ultimate skin finisher. Expect a flawless and photo-ready complexion.

name: 定妝润色散粉
product_description:
RMS 定妆润色散粉让您拥有无可挑剔的妆容；它是一款极其细腻亮泽的散粉，能够轻松与肌肤晕染，帮您打造如画般的妆容。
这款散粉有三种颜色可供选择，让您的面部拥有些许自然光泽，有助于吸收油脂和缩小毛孔，与此同时可祛除 T 区不喜欢的光泽，让您享有持久的哑光妆效。 配备有喷嘴，适合在外出旅行使涂抹。

name: & Berry 面霜Foundation
product_description:
Lord & Berry 面霜Foundation拥有独特的配方，很容易涂抹，涂抹时可以完全覆盖和滋润肌肤。 这款粉底是一种持久高效的乳液，含有抗氧化剂维生素E，透明质酸和摩洛哥坚果油可保护肌肤，并使您的肤色保持水嫩。
这款面霜粉底还配有 UVA-UVB 防晒剂，可防止晒伤和污染，它可以轻而易举地混合使用，使您拥有完美无瑕、光彩照人的妆效。 它有多种适合所有肤色的色调。 K.D.

name: 9-in-1 Super Make-Up BB Cream 30ml (Various Shades)
product_description:
Achieve a flawless complexion with the Rimmel 9-in-1 Super Make-Up BB Cream; a lightweight, multi-purpose formula that perfects the complexion in one simple step.
The BB cream deliver nine benefits to skin. The formula primes the visage for makeup application, which enhances its wear and longevity, offers a veil of moisture and minimises the appearance of enlarged pores. The cream sweeps over skin, concealing the look of minor blemishes, as well as covering other imperfections. Delivering a bright and mattified finish, the BB cream is complete with SPF25, which shields the complexion from damaging rays, with long-lasting effect.
Once applied to skin, the BB cream instantly smoothes the visage, yet offers an invisible, natural-looking finish. The formula arrives in several hues, which are designed to complement and enhance all skin tones. Expect flawless results.
Chantecaille腮红粉芯 ，为您的面部增添一抹红晕。膏状粉状配方可轻松融入肌肤，持久长效，使肤色自然清新。 本款富含抗氧化剂的腮红，内含白色百合球茎及桃提取物，可滋养保护皮肤，使肌肤从内而外健康红润。 可以用指尖或腮红刷涂抹。

name: 滋润精致口红
product_description: Chantecaille   滋润精致口红 ，为双唇添加华丽色彩，使唇部色泽饱满。 配方轻盈，利用抗衰老的、自天然木瓜及兰花提取物萃取的抗氧化粉等成分，轻松涂抹、舒适滋润、持续时长为四小时，而不会使肌肤过度干燥。 滋润保护肌肤，使肌肤柔软光滑。

name: iredale PurePressed Base Mineral Powder SPF20 Refill 9.9g (Various Shades)
product_description:
Sheer, semi-matte and weightless, the jane iredale PurePressed Foundation SPF20 Refill provides untraceable coverage, leaving your complexion flawless. The light diffusing properties leave skin looking healthy and younger.
Highly water resistant and pigmented, this sandy shade applies evenly and easily, providing long-lasting, gorgeous coverage. Acting as a foundation, powder, concealer and sunscreen in one, this do-it-all formula is even gentle enough for sensitive skins and is great for shading, highlighting, contouring and lining.

name: Factor 神奇匹配粉底（各种色调）
product_description:
Max Factor 神奇匹配粉底 ，令肤色完美无瑕。保湿配方、妆效持久、与各种肤色完美配合，使肌肤亮泽细嫩。
本款轻盈粉底液使肤色自然、肌肤光滑无瑕疵、晶莹透亮，使妆容完美专业。

name: BRETON Blusher 4.5g (Various Shades)
product_description:
Add a pop of colour to your makeup look with Christian BRETON Blusher, a silky, pressed powder blush to enhance and sculpt your complexion.
Delivering long-wearing colour that instantly brightens the skin, the blush is easy to blend and creates a healthy glow. Apply to the apples of your cheeks for a classic flush, or use as a contour shade to sculpt and define your complexion. The non-drying powder will lend skin a soft, naturally radiant appearance.

name: Definition Lip Gloss (Various Shades)
product_description: The High Definition Lip Gloss adds lush colour to your pout with a glossy, wet shine finish. Fortified with antioxidant-rich Vitamin E, it nourishes and hydrates the lip while delivering a visible plumping effect and subtle pigmentation. Achieve soft, kissable lips with long lasting shine.

name: Paris Nude Magique Cushion Foundation 64g (Various Shades)
product_description:
Achieve a natural-looking, flawless complexion with L'Oréal Paris Nude Magique Cushion Foundation, a revolutionary liquid foundation with a unique, cushion-drenched delivery system.
Housed in a compact, the packaging contains a foundation-soaked cushion that allows you to 'squeeze out' product by tapping on the makeup-soaked sponge; it is easy and quick to apply. The foundation's buildable coverage allows you to create a sheer, luminous finish, or build to a medium coverage depending how many layers you wish to apply. Enriched with SPF 25, the foundation is perfect for on-the-go touch ups. Skin looks smooth, luminous and perfected.

name: & Berry Pressed Powder
product_description:
Pressed Powder Lord & Berry是一款轻型、丝绸般柔软的美容粉，拥有独特的配方，蕴含精细研磨的滑石和玉米淀粉，可使您拥有去油光的妆效。 它隐形于肌肤中，均匀地在其上涂抹一层面霜，您就会拥有流光溢彩的肤色。
这款美容粉可以最大程度地减少毛孔和细纹的出现，对肌肤产生一种磨砂效果，是除了化妆包之外的必备之物。 K.D.使用说明：

name: 高亮口红（各种色调）
product_description:
Revlon高亮口红，令双唇色彩鲜艳。其高亮色泽，帮您展示超炫妆容。

本款独特的口红采用无蜡啫喱配方，展示丰富大胆色调、令双唇感觉轻柔靓丽。 双唇舒适、得到重塑。

name: & Berry Vogue Lipstick (various colours)
product_description:
Pucker up with beautiful colour thanks to Lord & Berry Vogue Lipstick. Enriched with anti-oxidants and bees wax to protect and nourish the delicate skin on the lips, it gives a velvety soft finish. When applied, it creates the illusion of fuller and more defined lips for a dramatic and glamourous look.
Apply straight from the bullet onto the lips, blot with a tissue then reapply.

name: minerals Tinted Primer SPF30 (Various Shades)
product_description:
Achieve all-day coverage with the glo minerals Tinted Primer SPF30; a multi-tasking, mattifying formula that perfects the complexion and prepares skin for makeup application.
Suitable for all skin types, including those with sensitive skin, acne and rosacea, the primer effectively smoothes skin and delivers flawless radiance. The non-comedogenic formula utilises an array of skin-conditioning silicones, which fill and visibly eliminate fine lines, wrinkles and enlarged pores to leave the face perfected with an airbrushed finish.
Use the tinted primer alone for a natural look, or apply before foundation to extend its wear. Expect a smooth and protected complexion that is radiant and youthful.

name: BRETON Liquid Foundation 30ml (Various Shades)
product_description:
Achieve a naturally flawless-looking complexion with Christian BRETON Liquid Foundation, a lightweight formula that creates a flawless yet barely there makeup look.
Gliding effortlessly onto skin, the foundation creates a veil of perfection that allows skin to breathe and won't block pores. Its smoothing properties help to even out the appearance of skin whilst minimising the look of imperfections. Delivering light yet high performance results, each shade offers a unique finish depending on your skin type; moisturising, matt and oil-free, or higher coverage. Expect a smoother-looking complexion with a 'second skin' feel.

name: Certified Organic Lip Glaze
product_description:
Douse your lips in moisturising colour. INIKA Certified Organic Lip Glaze is a high shine lip gloss infused with a host of natural and organic ingredients to leave lips feeling hydrated and protected.
Enriched with Organic Carbauba Wax and Vanilla Oil for a sensual texture and fragrance, the gloss glides effortlessly across the lips with a soft wand applicator and delivers a vibrant pop of colour and shine. Its dose of Vitamin E expertly moisturises and protects for a healthy, luscious pout. Safe, non-toxic.

name: minerals 粉饼（各种颜色）
product_description:
glo minerals 粉饼能够让肌肤展现健康亮泽，采用独家配方，融合了维生素A、C、E等多种抗氧化成分和绿茶提取物，能够遮盖并修复瑕疵，打造一个完美的底妆。 不含滑石粉，不会产生粉刺，提供全方位防紫外线保护，让肌肤免受阳光的损伤。
屡获大奖的 glo minerals 矿物彩妆采用天然、易着色的矿物粉制成这款美妆产品，拥有丰富的颜色选择，适合所有肌肤类型，能够滋润、修复并保护肌肤，打造自然的半哑光妆效。 -SA

name: Compact Foundation （各种颜色10g）
product_description:
这款Bellapierre Cosmetics Compact Foundation能够满足您完善妆容的一切要求，它是一款 5合1粉底霜，可以同时发挥遮瑕膏、粉底、定妆粉和SPF 15防晒护肤品的作用。 它的大小合适，可放在您的化妆包里，它的配方蕴含精纯矿物颜料，可以令肌肤前所未有的光滑，意味着涂抹上本品后，您的肌肤会得到滋养，保持水润。
添加的 SPF 防晒保护因子意味着，不仅您的肌肤会一直保持着画面般的完美，同时可免受环境侵害因素的损害。 Bellapierre Cosmetics Compact Foundation绝对是化妆包的必备之物，千万不要错过！ K.D.

name: Liquid Foundation
product_description:
Say hello to natural looking skin with RMK Liquid Foundation. The light and fresh texture applies evenly to your skin, creating the perfect balance of coverage and translucency for flawless looking skin.
The waterproof formula will withstand perspiration, giving you long-lasting coverage that will keep your skin looing perfect from morning until night, no matter what the weather.

name: Cosmetics Eyeliner Pencils - Various shades
product_description:
Achieve show stopping style with Bellapierre Cosmetics' Eyeliner  Pencil. Boasting an innovative formula enriched with Botanical Waxes  such as Jojoba, Safflower and Vitamin E, this pencil stays put all day  and night to ensure that you stay looking your best. K.D.
Directions of use:

name: Lip and Cheek Pencil
product_description:
NUDESTIX Lip and Cheek Pencil 兼具优质和便利性。 这种乳脂状软笔有多色可选，提供唇线笔、唇彩和颊霜。
双唇和面颊呈现相同色泽可打造极佳的效果。 这款软笔可提供优异的色彩效果、可融合性和覆盖面，并可保持数小时。 NUDESTIX 软笔除了外形美观之外，还含有牛油果油、维生素 E 和肽，可滋养双唇和肌肤。
为了提供更多便利，唇颊软笔采用生态可回收的罐子包装，其中包括一面大镜子和一把卷笔刀。

name: Stockholm Blush 2.8克
product_description: 利用 FACE Stockholm Blush 为您的双颊添加颜色，有一系列的闪烁和无闪烁色调可供选择。 天鹅绒般的细腻粉末将为面部增添轮廓塑造，并展现自然红润、健康光泽。 – E.W.

name: Beauty Eye Polish
product_description: Add sheer colour to your eyes with the RMS Eye Polish; a cream eyeshadow with a glowing, light-reflecting finish. When applied sparingly, the delicate formula nourishes and moisturises the eye area, and delivers a subtle metallic veil with a barely-there, buildable finish. It provides all the benefits of raw mineral pigments without the dryness. Can also be used as a highlighter for a frosted make-up look.

name: & Berry 防晕染眼线笔（各种颜色）
product_description:
用Lord & Berry 防晕染眼线笔提亮双眼，打造迷人的双眸，它可以轻易滑行，画出可以从早到晚都炫丽夺目的眼线。 它不会自行滑动或晕染，只是一招，就足以画出一条完美的眼线。 它在 30 秒内即会变干、密封，适合在旅途中完善自己的妆容。
拉紧眼皮描画上眼线和下眼线，将眼线笔由内眼角向外眼角温和地滑动描画。 等待30秒钟，让眼线变干和密封。

name: & Berry Velluto Eye Pencil
product_description:
The Lord & Berry Velluto Eye Pencil is a delicate, powdery liner that gives classic definition. Create a sheer look for day, or build up the colour for sultry, sexy eyes that look gorgeous at night. Easy to apply, the built-in sponge means the colour can be effortlessly smudged and blended for fail-safe application.
Apply to the lashline in small strokes. Use the built-in sponge to smudge and blend the colour.

name: iredale Smooth Affair Eyeshadow (Various Shades)
product_description:
Lend your eyes a naturally luminous finish with jane iredale Smooth Affair Eyeshadow, a cream-to-powder formula that can be worn alone or as an eyeshadow primer.
Infused with Coco Glycerides and Mineral Powders, each sheer, lustrous colour glides effortlessly onto the lids like butter, delivering a fresh, subtle hue with long-lasting finish that adds delicate definition to the eyes whilst helping to minimise the appearance of fine lines. When used as a primer, it preps lids for seamless, long-wearing makeup looks. Smudge and crease-proof.

name: Mini Brush Set
product_description:
brushworks' Mini Brush Set is a must have makeup brush collection that combines four mini face brushes. Fitted with soft, synthetic taklon bristles, each brush can be used with liquid or powder products to lend your complexion a professional, airbrushed finish. Each brush has a precision shaped handle for improved control during application.
Multi-Tasking Brush
A tapered, dome-shaped brush ideal for stippling, blending and buffing. The dense, fluffy fibres pick up the perfect amount of product to build an even coverage with foundation, bronzer or blusher. A must have for any beauty kit, use the tool to create a natural looking base, dapple cheeks with a rosy hue or define and contour.
Mini Powder Brush
A high quality makeup brush designed to apply and set makeup with expert results. The soft, fluffy, dome-shaped brush effortlessly sweeps makeup across the face, seamlessly blending to ensure flawless coverage. Picking up and distributing the perfect amount of product, the brush facilitates easy makeup application, and when used with setting powder, will help to prolong makeup wear.
Mini Concealer Brush
Perfect for concealing the under eyes and smaller areas of the face, the fluffy, tapered head picks up and delivers the perfect amount of product to help cover up dark shadows, blemishes and imperfections.
Mini Eye Shading Brush
Carefully shaped and cut to blend round the eye, the precise brush allows you to apply concealer or eyeshadow with expert, evenly blended results. Perfect for covering dark circles or for buffing eyeshadow into the crease.

Revlon超亮口红  ，属豪华款，内含四种色泽：奶油色、亚光色、珠光色、亮白色。令双唇色泽艳丽。
采用 LiquiSilk™ 配方，令颜色持久、双唇柔软。本款口红色泽艳丽、光泽闪耀，令妆容迷人漂亮。

name: 艾美倩小瓶遮瑕膏 (6ml)
product_description: 這款由艾美倩推出的迷你版原裝艾美倩遮瑕膏採用獨特有效配方，可完美遮蓋皮膚瑕疵、發紅部位、黑眼圈及微血管破裂處。該款遮瑕膏旨在均勻膚色，高度著色配方與防水技術完美結合，每次上妝都將為您提供長效持久妝容，適合整個面部使用。提供多種色調，作為化妝師與眾多名人最青睞的產品，一定不容錯過。 KD

name: Arden Eight Hour Sheer Tints (3.7g)
product_description:
Treat your lips to Elizabeth Arden's Eight Hour Sheer Tint Lip Colour; a portable version of the brand's renowned Eight Hour Cream with subtle hint of colour.
Intensely nourishing and protective, the lip formula is infused with emollients, sunscreen and antioxidant Vitamin E to keep lips moisturised and safe from external aggressors, including UV rays. Gliding effortlessly over lips, the portable stick delivers a subtle hue to leave lips soft, supple and delicately tinted. Wear alone or beneath lipstick.

name: Lid Last Shadow Pen
product_description:
此款霜变粉的眼影笔可以打造明亮和迷人的妆效，同时不会出现起皱的情况。
此款形状胖嘟嘟的眼影笔中含有反光的色素，从而能够实现柔和、华丽和无需时常补妆的效果。 无需眼影刷。
优点：
- 维生素Ë具有滋养和保护作用
- 肽类能够让细纹更为柔和以及平滑。

name: Brow Precise Micro Pencil (Various Shades)
product_description:
Add natural-looking definition to your eyebrows with the Maybelline Brow Precise Micro Pencil, a dual-ended mechanical eyebrow pencil with ultra-fine, 1.5mm tip and built-in grooming brush to precisely fill, shape and enhance your brows.
The precision pencil glides effortlessly through hairs, filling in sparse areas of the brow whilst adding depth and definition to your arches to expertly frame your face. Its ultra-fine tip delivers natural-looking strokes that blend seamlessly with your natural hairs to define, sculpt and accentuate your brows. Use the integrated grooming brush to blend and tame for an ultra-preened finish.

name: Collections A18 Oval Concealer Brush
product_description:
Expertly create a flawless complexion with the Spectrum Collections A18 Oval Concealer Brush; an ultra-soft makeup brush that combines a vibrant colour palette with expert hand-crafted design.
Boasting a flat shape with rounded bristles, the firm ‘No Baggage’ brush can be used to apply cream and liquid concealers with ease. Sweeping under the eyes or onto blemishes, the brush perfects the complexion by evening skin tone and leaving skin visibly clear. The soft yet firm synthetic bristles also make the concealer brush an ideal tool for applying contour product before blending.

name: Lip Enhancer Naturalle
product_description:
使用 Zelens Lip Enhancer （ Naturalle  ）Treat您的嘴唇，双唇润泽配方致力于明显加强保湿、唇彩和丰满度。
内含15种活性成分，包括三种天然黄油（芒果、可可和Shea）、透明质酸和磷脂，这款纯粹的护唇产品可在密集补水的同时提供紧致和饱满的效果。 天然三肽与脂肪酸配对可刺激胶原蛋白的产生，以突显嘴唇的丰满和外形。 Hydration 得到改善，同时减少嘴唇上的横向皱纹。 Lips颜色明显增强，也更加丰满。 源自绿色紫苏叶的抗氧化剂可确保嘴唇受到保护，以抵御外界侵害。
您将用于润滑、有光泽的嘴唇，看上去异常滋润和妖娆。

name: London Kabuki Babe Brush
product_description: 一只必备化妆包，Lottie London’s Kabuki Babe Brush是上定妆粉的理想工具。 刷子有厚实的手柄和浓密、超柔软刷毛，能够适量沾取化妆品打造轻薄、完美的肤色。 使用超柔软刷毛轻扫面部，以打造完美妆容。 - K.N

name: Pore Corrector Anti-Ageing Primer 30ml
product_description:
Achieve a smooth and refined complexion with the ALGENIST Pore Corrector Anti-Ageing Primer; an essential step before makeup application.
Effortlessly gliding over the visage, the primer boasts Alguronic Acid and an array of potent ingredients, which works in synergy to improve skin’s texture and tone. The silky formula is able to visibly reduce the size of pores, whilst also blurring fine lines, wrinkles and other imperfections to leave skin youthful and flawless.
The lightweight primer offers an ultra-smooth finish that enhances the wear and longevity of makeup.

name: Healthy Mix Concealer 7.8ml (Various Shades)
product_description:
Reveal a rested and radiant complexion with the Bourjois Healthy Mix Concealer; a skin-correcting formula that effortlessly covers imperfections to deliver a flawless visage. Gliding onto areas in need of additional coverage, the liquid concealer eliminates the appearance of dark circles, blemishes and discolouration.
Harnessing a fruit therapy formula for an anti-fatigue effect, the foundation boasts Apricot extract to boost skin’s radiance, Melon extract to deliver essential moisture and Raspberry extract to improve micro-circulation. Instantly brightening dull skin, the concealer revives skin’s radiance for an enviably flawless finish.

name: 101 Ointment Multi-Balm - Strawberry
product_description:
使用 Lanolips 101 Ointment Multi-Balm in 'Strawberry'，获得完美的双唇。 这款万用膏采用天然配方，含有该品牌超纯的医用级绵羊油，也被称为 Nature's Wonder Moisturiser™，具备与人类肌肤油脂极其相似的分子结构。 即使是最敏感的肌肤，也适用。
这款多功能润唇膏结合了多功能软膏、维生素 E 和 100% 纯天然草莓的愈合、滋润特性，可治疗嘴唇干裂、皮肤干燥和小伤口及蚊虫叮咬。 草莓的主要成分为 α-羟基酸，有助于消除死细胞，呈现柔软、更新的肌肤。 让您尽享滋润、舒缓而舒适的肌肤，触摸起来如丝绸般柔嫩。 其锁水配方可锁定其本身重量 200% 的水份，本品适用于婴儿。
体验其 101 种用途：皮肤干燥、脚跟龟裂、鼻腔干燥、脸颊冷皲裂；干燥变脆的指甲、纸割伤、昆虫叮咬等。

name: Techniques Detail + Define Brush Set
product_description:
Become an expert with eyeliner with the Real Techniques Detail + Define Brush Set; a coveted, three-piece collection that assists in flawless eyeliner application. Boasting an angled liner brush, small detail brush and a bonus eyeliner guide, the set covers everything you need to apply liquid, cream, gel or powder liners like a professional.
Definer Brush
Apply eyeliner with ease using the Definer Brush. Developed with firm UltraPlush™ bristles and boasting an angled brush head, the makeup brush is the perfect tool for performing a controlled application of gel and cream eyeliner along the lash line. Expect ultra-defined results.
Square Detailer Brush
Be creative with your eyes using the Square Detailer Brush; an expertly crafted tool that assists in creating small, ultra-precise lines. Crafted with precision cut bristles and a square-shaped brush head, the makeup brush is the perfect accompaniment for creating precise details and accents on any makeup look.
Bonus Liner Guide
Apply eyeliner like a professional with the Real Techniques Liner Guide. Assisting with steady liner application, the guide should be placed onto the corner of the eye to help create the perfect winged finish.

name: Push Up Drama Waterproof Mascara - Very Black 9.7ml
product_description:
Maximise your eyes with Maybelline's Waterproof Push Up Drama Mascara from 'The Falsies' collection.
With a creamy, plumping formula, and a push-up brush with cup-shaped bristles, the bold, waterproof mascara scoops up every lash to deliver instant volume, intensity and lift from root to tip; eyelashes look abundant, lengthened and shapely.

name: Techniques Lip Colour + Blur Brush Set
product_description:
Create an enviable pout with ease using the Real Techniques Lip Colour + Blur Brush Set; a coveted duo arriving in one convenient package. Working with an array of lip products, including lipsticks, stains and glosses, the brush set is an essential addition to any makeup lover’s collection.
Lip Brush
Apply lipstick like a professional with the Lip Brush; a slim pink tool with an ultra-firm, brush head. Working with lipstick, lip stain or lip gloss, the brush glides over skin, delivering product smooth and evenly. The versatile brush has been crafted with a precision tapered tip, meaning it can also be used to line and define your pout.
Lip Blur Brush
Achieve a soft focus finish with the Lip Blur Brush; an innovative tool that takes away the harshness of freshly applied lip colour. Boasting a rounded head with a comfortable, delicate texture, the brush effortlessly blurs and blends together lip colour for an enviable finish.

name: 无瑕散粉 0 号透明
product_description:
Pixi無瑕散粉 
透明散粉，適合所有肌膚類型，亮色光澤，提亮肌膚。這是化妝的最後一步程序，確保沒有瑕疵，固定妝面，防止透光。立即喚醒疲勞的肌膚。含粉撲。

name: 爱潞儿 Naturalite 070 假睫毛
product_description:
Eylure Naturalite 070 假睫毛可增強眼部神采，效果自然而不誇張。這款假睫毛質地輕盈且可重複使用，佩戴極為舒適，適合所有眼形及隱形眼鏡佩戴者。 
 包含： 
 使用說明：

name: 斐珞尔夜用洁面 (100ml/3.3 Fl.oz)
product_description:
FOREO夜用潔面帶給你豪華的護膚體驗，消除多餘的油脂，污垢和雜質。對於高性能儀式，潔面與FOREO的LUNA™裝置的T-Sonic™脈動一起使用時效果增強，能夠深入毛孔，去除污垢，彩妝殘留和死皮細胞，展現精緻，健康的膚色。 
適合所有肌膚類型，其獨特的配方轉變，從柔滑的凝膠轉變為天鵝絨般的牛奶和珍貴的隕石粉末，讓你有一個柔軟的質感和光亮的肌膚。蘊含97％的天然成分，潔面注入了辣木提取物，以減少皮膚污垢，而甜杏仁油能深入滋養，舒緩及柔滑肌膚，讓肌膚恢復光采，增加肌膚柔軟度.

name: Arden Pure Finish Mineral Bronzing Powder - Medium (7.7g)
product_description:
纯粹矿物质。 纯粹舒适。 纯粹完美。 Elizabeth Arden Pure Finish Mineral Bronzing Powder in Medium 是让肌肤获得健康日晒亮泽的完美解决方案。 取适量研磨并抹于肌肤上，呈现华丽的金色色调。
Elizabeth Arden Pure Finish Mineral Bronzing Powder in Medium 适用于所有肌肤类型，配备了折叠式歌舞伎风格的刷子，可去除亮铜色化妆粉涂抹过的面部、前胸和肩膀上的灰尘。 无论任何季节，只需转动拨盘，即可拥有清新的金色光泽。

name: Sandler 丹尼尔桑德勒水彩腮红膏 - 蜜桃红 (3.5G)
product_description:
水彩腮紅粉絲鍾愛款，特別適合這款屢獲大獎的液體配方腮紅的追隨者，尤其是那些想要打造無暇妝容，希望妝容長效持久，並且防水的愛美人士。 
這款產品對臉頰尤為呵護，內含抗氧化維他命E 和葡萄籽油，對抗自由基的侵擾。 Daniel 討厭設定規則，因而他創造了這款蜜桃紅腮紅膏，讓它發揮多重功效，適用於各類膚色。他推薦白皙偏冷色調膚色和高光類膚色。 
使用說明：

name: Enchanted Eyelashes - Camellia
product_description: Add lift to your lashes with Eylure's 'Camellia' Enchanted Eyelashes. Velvety soft, lightweight and reusable, the handmade false lashes are perfect for any occasion; their three-quarter length design lends fullness to the outer corners of your eyes for a naturally wide-eyed effect.

name: Definition Eye and Brow Palette in Foxy
product_description:
Make Up by HD Brows Eye and Brow Palette带给您完美逼真的眉毛妆效或是烟熏效果的眼妆体验，配有全能双头眉毛棒。 这款Foxy系列彩妆盘提供了中度棕色和暗金色的眉毛粉底，既能妆点眉毛，也能为双眼打造深浅有致的中色烟熏效果。
用提亮粉底来凸显眉骨；用黑色干/湿眉线粉底来勾画眉毛。 用本品内附的乳蜡轻扫眉毛能使其定型；喜欢的话还可以与粉底混合成霜质眼影。 - K.R

name: Liner Stylo - Ultra Black
product_description: Bourjois Liner Stylo 中的棕榈蜡和蜂蜡材质使其浓稠而质地柔软，呈现专业效果。 这款可伸缩眼线笔内置笔刀，给您一整天的精致眼线。 E.N.

name: Techniques双重纤维化妆套刷（限量版）
product_description:
Real Techniques 雙重纖維化妝套刷含有三把限量版雙重纖維化妝刷，讓您在任何光線下都可以營造出完美無瑕的妝容。 
適合於用來上乳狀、液體或粉狀產品，這套手工切割的優質合成纖維刷毛讓您妝容清透服帖。使用輕便易於操作，每把刷子都採用加長鋁製手柄，堅固耐用。 
 套裝包含：

name: Geller 劳拉·盖勒魅惑眼影盒（配备眼影刷）——打造漂亮的裸色眼影
product_description:
Laura Geller 劳拉·盖勒 魅惑眼影盒适合各种心情、服装和场合，它内置有 14 中裸色眼影，既可涂抹在湿润的肌肤，也可涂抹在干爽的肌肤，为您专业地勾勒您的眼部轮廓。
这款眼影结合妆效持久的底妆使用，能带给您纯拷贝色素的奢华色彩，既可单独使用，也可多种颜色叠加使用，打造无尽的妆容，让您拥有超长时间的定妆效果。 这款眼影可轻松与眼皮融合，进行光滑均匀涂抹，眼影盒还配备有嵌入式镜子和双头眼影刷。

name: Baby Lips Dr. Rescue - Coral Crave
product_description: Maybelline推出了一款Baby Lips Dr. Rescue调理唇膏，为柔滑的双唇提供12小时的水分滋润。 无油腻的润唇膏含有微量桉树和薄荷成分，使双唇清凉，舒缓干燥破裂的嘴唇并留下了天然的色泽，使唇色柔和，有健康的感觉。 舒缓双唇，使之焕发活力，获得更持久的舒适。 E.N.

colour: Allure, Ambition, Beg, Chased, Disobey, Excite, Hussy, Intrigue, Katie, Lover, Morale, Naked Rose, Nymph, S.O.P.H.I.E, Thrust, Tweak
name: Powder Blusher 4.5g (Various Shades)
product_description:
Awaken your face with the Powder Blusher from Illamasqua. Arriving in a selection of highly-pigmented hues, the blush works to radiate and illuminate the complexion.
Each powder blusher can be used to brighten, enhance and define the face shape. The powder makeup can be applied lightly for a subtle look, or intensely for a dramatic and daring finish. Use the blusher wet for a more intense colour pay off.
Expect professional looking results.
Maybelline 超大装睫毛膏 （皮革黑）色，可重塑您的双眼。 内含二十倍之多的胶原蛋白*和遮光颜料，无团块配方带给您最大的视觉冲击效果及亮度，每次使用都会为您打造浓密卷翘、时尚闪亮的睫毛。 配方独特，超大款涂抹棒，可从根部开始涂覆每根睫毛，使睫毛饱满浓密。

name: Double Up Demi Wispies False Eyelashes - Black
product_description:
Create maximum volume with the Ardell Double Up Demi Wispies False Eyelashes in Black. Ideal for complementing dramatic makeup looks, the bold lashes deliver high-definition and drama.
Created by stacking two sets of strip lashes on top of one another, the double ‘Demi Wispies’ add extreme volume and additional length to the natural lash, giving the appearance of ultra-full and fluttering lashes. The double up strip lashes are effortless to apply and can be used a number of times, simply add lash adhesive and expect long-lasting results

name: Glow-y Powder - Rome Rose
product_description: Achieve a naturally radiant complexion with the Pixi Glow-y Powder, designed in collaboration with international beauty blogger Aspyn Ovard.  Adding a hint of sheer, natural-looking colour, the mineral-based powder contains subtle light reflecting pigments to brighten and highlight, easily blended and universally flattering for all skin tones.

name: Tinted Balm SPF 30 - Red Apple
product_description:
引领潮流和镜面般亮泽必不可少的化妆品。 使用这款屡获殊荣的 Lanolips Tinted Balm SPF 30，快速实现丰满的双唇和色彩魅力。 这款非粘性唇彩富含该品牌的超纯级绵羊油（Natures Wonder Moisturiser™，具备与人类肌肤油脂极其相似的分子结构）和维生素 E，可滋润双唇；同时其 SPF30 成分可保护肌肤免受环境压力的影响。
这款唇彩提供了可亮化自然唇色的纯粹红色色调，赋予双唇健康光泽，非常适合轻轻涂抹于颧骨上，作为轮廓色。 提供深层滋养，令干枯的双唇变得柔软、水嫩和滋养。

name: 粉底液
product_description:
Illamasqua 的这款获奖粉底液可帮您打造完美无瑕的妆容。 这款轻质乳状液体粉底液可轻松上妆，定妆持久，妆效自然，而不会导致肌肤过于干燥。
这款粉底液可完美遮瑕，它采用蕴含丰富维他命的营养配方，令肌肤更加滋润柔软，同时隐藏瑕疵、均匀肤色，打造如画般的妆容。 多个颜色可选。

name: Volume Reveal Mascara 7.5ml - Black
product_description: Maximise lashes with the Bourjois Volume Reveal Mascara; a black mascara that works to define, enhance and lengthen lashes. Featuring a specially designed brush, the intense formula captures individual lashes from the root, whilst its built-in mirror with x3 zoom allows mistake-free application. Expect clump-free definition and ultimate volume.

name: 可再装的卵石粉盒
product_description: Chantecaille 卵石粉盒，是一款小巧的可多次填装的小粉盒，可盛装所有Chantecaille系列的眼影及腮红等化妆粉（单独出售）。 磁性密封条可牢固地保持粉芯不会漏出粉盒外。使您轻松换上自己钟爱的色调。  小粉盒中内置一个小镜子，方便您外出时使用。

name: Brush Guards
product_description: Keep makeup brushes in tip-top condition with the brushworks Brush Guards. An ideal storage solution, the synthetic guard slips over the top of all types of brushes, with three different sizes provided to fit all shapes. The innovative case prevents the brush head from becoming frayed or damaged, maintaining their quality and enhancing the lifespan.

colour: Beige Shooting, Cherry My Cherrie, Entry VIP, Pretty in Nude, Prune Afterwork
name: 妙巴黎 12 小时唇膏魅红系列 — 多色系 (3.5g)
product_description: 妙巴黎推出的12 小時唇膏魅紅系列採用獨特配方，可長達12 小時定妝！此款唇膏富含乳木果油，可長效保持雙唇水潤柔滑，同時融入純亮色設計，可全天保持強烈豐滿唇色。這款氣質奢華的唇膏是當代女性的必備品，有多種色係可供選擇，適合各種場合使用。 KD

colour: Fair, Light, Medium, Medium Deep, Universal
name: Dream Brightening Concealer (Various Shades)
product_description:
Perfect your eye area with Maybelline's Dream Brightening Concealer; a creamy, blendable crayon that camouflages dark circles for a more wide-awake appearance.
Infused with light-reflecting pearl pigments, the lightweight concealer delivers medium to full, natural-looking coverage to minimise under-eye darkness, puffiness and signs of fatigue. Eyes appear bright and fresh with a smooth, even tone.

name: Complete Make-Up Remover Oil (120ml)
product_description:
Astalift Complete Make-Up Remover Oil 可深层洁净肌肤，去除多余精华液和污垢及杂质聚积，让您恢复清新的肤色。 Astalift 由 FUJIFILM 打造，是一个屡获殊荣的美容品牌，采用类似于防止照片褪色的先进抗氧化技术，有助于减缓肌肤早衰。
这种不油腻的油脂含有肌肤中的一种重要结构蛋白——胶原质，也是照相胶片中使用的一种关键成分，这种成分能与虾青素共同有效地滋润肌肤。FUJIFILM 已将纳米技术专长用于研发胶片的颜色，并将其应用于该油脂，使得高浓度的滋养成分可渗透至肌肤。 呈现充分滋润的光滑亮泽肌肤。 E.N.

name: Full Lash Volume Mascara - 黑色
product_description:
使用 Shiseido 的 Full Lash Volume Mascara，获得性感的睫毛和强烈的色彩。 凭借不留痕配方和该品牌取得专利的 360° Full Expression Brush®，这款睫毛膏可实现精确涂抹，并从根部卷曲和抬高睫毛，以打造优雅的扇形效果。
其独有的可分层卷曲蜡可即刻变干，令卷曲定型；全天均可涂抹，且不会产生结块，打造如您所愿的令人印象深刻或自然的持久妆效。 可用水轻松去除。 E.N.

name: Sculpt Bronze 15ml
product_description:
Achieve a sun-kissed glow with Bourjois Sculpt Bronze; a dreamy, bronzing highlighter that enhances and illuminates a natural tan.
Boasting a silky gel formula infused with light-reflecting, pearlescent pigments, Sclupt Bronze visibly boosts a tan, whilst delivering a shimmering finish. To appear naturally sun-kissed, the bronzing liquid should be applied to areas of the face that are caressed by the sun, including the cheekbones, brow bones and forehead.
Expect an expertly sculpted complexion with an enviably radiant and luminous finish.

name: Sandler 丹尼尔桑德勒粉底刷
product_description:
質地絲滑柔軟，在使用品牌屢獲大獎的水漾粉底時的必備工具，用於臉頰和顴骨打底。 
採用taklon 化合物（革命性的合成尼龍），專為打造無暇妝容設計，是打底的好助手。本品也是美妝藝術家的終極選擇，可用來打造無暇底妝。工欲善其事必先利其器。

name: 娜迪奥眼部卸妆水 (75ml)
product_description:
由豐富新鮮玫瑰和甘菊水製成的臻至不刺激卸妝水。適合所有肌膚類型，專為嬌嫩的眼周肌膚而設計。 
使用說明：

colour: Blossom, Candy Floss, Chocolate, Danger Zone, Electro, Madness, New York, Nude, Passion, Posh
name: Cosmetics Creamy Matte Lipstick (Various Shades)
product_description: Add sumptuous colour to your pout with the Creamy Matte Lipstick from Mellow Cosmetics. Gliding on effortlessly, the ultra-smooth lipstick delivers high-pigmented, moisturising colour with a long-wearing, velvety finish. Available in a range of shades.

name: Baby Lips Vitamin Shot Lip Balm - Melon Mania
product_description:
利用Maybelline的Baby Lips维生素注射唇膏保护和完善您的翘唇，这是一款结合保湿效果与少许水果颜色的唇彩。
将双唇浸润在持续八个小时的保湿护理中，这款富含维生素的润唇膏带来安慰、保湿功效，同时赋予美妙果香味。 双唇显得甜美、滋润、自然美丽。 - K.N.

name: 爱潞儿液体眉笔 - 深棕色
product_description:
用愛潞兒深棕色液體眉筆為您的眉毛增添色彩。使用液體眉筆後，您的眉毛會暫時染色，更好地修飾眉型和輪廓。 
液體眉筆筆尖柔軟，容易上色，眉毛顏色會更顯均衡。 -SA 
 共有三種漸變色

colour: Golden 3, Golden 4, Neutral 2, Neutral 3, Neutral 4, Rose 2, Rose 3, Rose 5
name: Synchro Skin Glow Luminizing Foundation 30ml (Various Shades)
product_description:
Achieve a smooth, flawless make-up base with the Shiseido Synchro Skin Glow Luminizing Foundation; a lightweight, long-wearing formula that delivers up to eight hour hydration.
Developed with Advanced Sensing Technology, the liquid foundation works with the skin's tone and moisture levels throughout the day for a photo-ready complexion with a fresh, dewy finish.
Infused with a nourishing blend of Argan Oil, Yuzu Seed and antioxidant Wild Thyme Extract, the fluid, serum-like formula blends seamlessly onto skin to deliver buildable coverage with natural-looking, streak-free results. Helps to minimise the appearance of fine lines and enlarged pores, whilst restoring a youthful, luminous glow.

name: 魅力矿物眼影盒 - 铜色
product_description: 銅色裝Pixi 魅力礦物眼影盒內含六種美妙的顏色，是一款理想的多色眼影組合。採用持久乳狀配方製作而成的寶石色調易於塗​​抹，適合混色，您可以隨心所欲打造屬於自己的煙熏妝。提供雙面上妝海綿。 KD

name: Brow Palette - 02 Brown 3.2g
product_description:
Achieve expertly sculpted eyebrows with the Bourjois Brow Palette in 02 Brown; a 3-in-1 compact that boasts a brow powder, eyebrow wax and a shimmering highlighter, alongside a convenient, double-ended brush applicator.
The coloured wax can be used to tame and discipline brows, whilst the powder formula should be used to fill in sparse areas and create a desired shape. Complete the look with the highlighter, which instantly illuminates and visibly lifts the brow bone, leaving brows sculpted, shaped and flawless.

name: Rouge Edition Velvet Lipstick - Poppy Days 6.7ml
product_description:
Discover a new era of lipstick with the Bourjois Rouge Edition Velvet Lipstick in Poppy Days. Boasting a soft, melting texture, the liquid lipstick effortlessly glides over lips, assisted by the integrated wand applicator.
Enriched with evanescent oils, the silky formula delivers a smooth, second-skin feel with an undetectable texture. The lip colour will not strip essential moisture from lips, ensuring skin remains comfortable and hydrated, whilst flaunting a sensual hue.
Expect an ultra-lightweight finish, with velvety, on-trend matte results.

name: 爱潞儿假睫毛初学套装 118 号（加长）
product_description:
爱潞儿假睫毛初学套装 118 号（加长）专为加长设计，适合希望加长睫毛的人群。- R.H
此新手套装精选一系列易用工具，极其适合初学者。套装中含有机硅尖头睫毛刷和橙木签（以弯曲睫毛），并添加分离和粘合剂，方便您进行多种调整。
套装包含：Naturalites 专属眼角睫毛，Naturalites 101，睫毛刷，粘合剂瓶（2 个），橙木签

name: Lip Chic Lipstick - Lily
product_description: Add sumptuous colour to your pout with Chantecaille's Lip Chic Lipstick. Infused with Hyaluronic Acid to plump the appearance of lips, the formula combines the high shine of a gloss with the smooth, even coverage of a lipstick. Gliding on effortlessly, Lip Chic delivers comfortable, long-wearing colour with a non-sticky, velvety soft finish.

name: Collections B06 Tall Tapered Blender Brush
product_description:
Expertly apply eyeshadows with the Spectrum Collections B06 Tall Tapered Blender Brush; an ultra-soft makeup brush that combines a vibrant colour palette with expert hand-crafted design.
The ‘Blending Friend’ is the perfect tool for applying and blending eyeshadows seamlessly. The coveted blending brush is crafted with a super soft, fluffy brush head, which can create an array of eye-catching makeup looks, from soft and subtle, to smokey and defined.
Whether it’s blending out colour or building up hues, the tapered blender is an essential addition to any makeup brush collection.

name: Foundation Brush
product_description:
Seamlessly blend makeup with the brushworks Foundation Brush; a high-quality, flat brush that enables you to achieve professional looking results.
Suitable for both liquid and powder formulas, the soft, synthetic fibres have been shaped and designed to pick up the perfect amount of product to build smooth, even coverage, instantly veiling the appearance of blemishes and imperfections, with a rounded tip to reach every contour of your face.
Complete with an ergonomic handle for ultimate precision, the tool is a must have addition to any makeup collection for a flawless, airbrushed finish.

colour: Carameli Melo, Cherry Leaders, Coquelic'oh!, Fucshiamallow, Orangélique, Plum Plum Pidou, Ravie En Rose, VIPeach
name: Rouge Edition Souffle de Velvet 唇膏（各种色调）
product_description: 可用 Bourjois 的 Rouge Edition Souffle de Velvet 唇膏为双唇增添妖娆的色彩。 这种留色持久的配方质地丝般顺滑，能毫不费力地涂上，不会变干，呈现出哑光色，而通过其带衬垫的尖头涂抹棒，可以毫无差错地涂抹唇膏。 会使双唇超级柔软、高贵、水润，妆效最长持续十个小时。

name: Techniques Bold Metals斜角刷
product_description: Real Techniques 最新 Bold Metals斜角刷 ，这是一款多功能刷，尤其适用于增加眉毛颜色深度，涂抹眼影，帮您精准地涂抹凝胶或液体眼影或眼膏。 其加权设计，配有牢固的、带角度的端部，适合接近眼线，可轻松涂抹，瞬间打造一双美丽精致的眼睛。 E.N.

name: Super Plus Beblesh Triple Functions Balm SPF50+ PA+++ 40g - Orange
product_description:
Correct skin discolouration and dark spots with the Super Plus Beblesh Triple Functions Balm SPF50+ PA+++ 40g – Orange from Skin79. The balm functions as a high coverage BB cream, concealing and correcting pigmentation issues.
Boasting SPF50, the potent formula offers UVA and UVB protection to prevent any future skin damage, including discolouration. The transparent BB cream is enriched with Phytoshingosine and Ceramide, which combine to strengthen the skin’s protective barrier. Expect a smooth and brightened complexion, visibly free from damage.

name: Faux Cils 睫毛膏
product_description:
ChantecailleCILS 睫毛膏，使双眼神采奕奕。这款防水增浓睫毛膏，让睫毛显得浓密纤长、丰满充盈。
配方含天然蜡等成分，使睫毛浓密；其全毛刷，可熟练地涂覆每根睫毛，打造惊艳四座的、大眼睛妆容。 富含矿物盐和红海藻提取物，用以重塑打造更饱满、更浓密的睫毛；植物性聚合物，使涂抹方便。

name: Geller 劳拉·盖勒烘焙身体霜
product_description:
Laura Geller 劳拉·盖勒烘焙身体霜可有效改善您的肤色，这款丝滑的古铜色身体霜可为肌肤增添日照光泽。
内置于一个大便携包装中，使用方便，这款烘焙粉底可轻松涂抹在肌肤上，使肌肤瞬间具有古铜色的光泽；其可叠加使用的配方可供您自定义妆效——既可涂抹一层缔造微光效果，也可叠加涂抹缔造浓密的日晒妆效。
这款身体霜既可涂抹在湿润的肌肤，也可涂抹在干燥的肌肤；涂抹在湿润的肌肤时可在肌肤表面形成如钻石般引人注目的强烈光泽。

colour: Beige, Golden Beige, Golden Sun, Light Beige, Rose Ivory, Vanilla
name: 都市亮白粉底（各种色调）
product_description: Bourjois  都市亮白粉底 ，为您展示光滑完美的肤色。 本款粉底液具有轻盈透气的保湿配方，可轻松融入肌肤，均匀遮盖肌肤。持久长效，色彩滋润亮泽；SPF 30，保护肌肤免遭污染和有害紫外线的辐射。 可塑形强、与肌肤融合性好，可遮盖肌肤瑕疵，为您打造清新完美的妆容。 E.N.

name: 1000 Kisses Lip Liner 1.2g (Various Shades)
product_description:
Line and define your lips with Rimmel 1000 Kisses Lip Liner, a long-wearing lip pencil with highly pigmented finish.
Gliding effortlessly across the lips with its blend of Capric Oil and Carnauba Wax, the pencil delivers a rich, creamy colour that feels comfortable on lips and lasts for eight hours. Perfect for outlining or filling the whole lips, the liner contains Mica particles to help prevent lipstick from feathering and bleeding, and Vitamin E for moisturising, antioxidant protection. Expect long-lasting, flawless and vibrant lips.

name: Volum' Express Colossal Mascara - 100% Black
product_description:
利用来自Maybelline的'Volum' Express'系列黑色巨型睫毛膏定型您的双眼轮廓。 利用专业胶原蛋白配方和独有睫毛刷，该丰盈睫毛膏只需涂抹一次即可获得丰满妆效，睫毛体积达原来的九倍，茂密而无污迹。
睫毛看起来更饱满、更长，瞬间变得茂密。 - K.N.

name: Shine Lip Gloss - Showgirl Red
product_description:
Enhance your lips with the ModelCo Shine Lip Gloss in 'Showgirl Red', a shimmering, high shine lip lacquer that delivers a shock of beautifully reflective colour with long-lasting finish.
Gliding effortlessly onto lips with its wand applicator, the non-sticky gloss imparts a soft colour tint and features an in-built mirror for flawless, on-the-go applications . Lips looks luscious and hydrated.

name: LONDON Patent Shine 10X Nail Lacquer 11ml - Trout Pout
product_description:
Achieve salon-style results from home with the butter LONDON Patent Shine 10X Nail Lacquer; a fade-resistant, fast-drying nail polish that applies effortlessly to deliver chip-resistant colour with a gel-like cushioned effect for up to ten days.
Fortified with patented Shock Resistant Polymer Technology to prevent chipping and peeling, its unique formula coats nails in a long-wearing bright coral crème with mirror-like shine, whilst its dense curved brush applicator allows full coverage for a professional finish. Infused with Bamboo Extract and Diamond Powder, the nail varnish promotes smoother, stronger and healthier nails with every use.

name: LONDON Lippy Liquid - Ladybird
product_description:
Add sumptuous colour to your pout with the butter LONDON Lippy Liquid; a long-wearing formula that combines the pigment of a lipstick with the shine of a gloss.
Infused with Shea Butter and antioxidant Vitamin E, the liquid lipstick glides on effortlessly to moisturise and protect lips, whilst delivering non-drying colour with an ultra-glossy finish. Expect smooth, luscious lips that are subtly scented with delicious notes of Vanilla.

name: Face Pop Eyes - Deep Brown Beige
product_description:
RMK Face Pop Eyes in 'Red Brown Beige' is a limited edition eyeshadow duo that has been specially curated in celebration of the brand's twentieth birthday.
Each striking eyeshadow (pink and neutral) delivers a shimmering finish that blends effortlessly on the lid. Wear each colour individually or blend together to create a bold or subtle makeup finish. Complete with a dual-ended sponge tip applicator.

name: Powder Eyeshadow - Cascade
product_description:
Make a bold and individual statement with Illamasqua’s Powder Eyeshadow in Cascade. Part of the Extinct collection, the powder shadow boasts an extremely long lasting formula to ensure all-night intensity and a highly pigmented finish.
Cascade is a frosty, white colour with an iridescent finish that adds a subtle, translucent blue shimmer to eyes. Wear alone with a delicate wash over the eyelids, or layer up and apply with a damp brush for a more solid colour finish.

name: Geller Get Gilded Illuminating Palette
product_description:
Achieve professional make-up looks with the Get Gilded Illuminating Palette from Laura Geller. Combining a dual-ended brush, lip gloss, baked blush and three shades of eyeshadow, the collection allows you to create salon-worthy results every time. Housed in a compact with built-in mirror.
Baked Color Intense Eye Shadow in 'Dolce', 'Honey' and 'Raisin'
Beginning as liquid pigments that are baked on terracotta tiles and hand-finished in Italy, the silky formulas blend effortlessly to deliver vibrant colour that won't smudge, fade or crease. Infused with antioxidant-rich White Tea Extract, Vitamin E and Jojoba Oil to nourish and protect the eyelids, you can expect high impact results that look fresh all day long.
Baked Blush in 'Gilded Nectar'
Add a pop of colour to your complexion. Infused with swirls of liquid pigments, the smooth, long-wearing blush glides effortlessly over skin and delivers a radiant flush of colour to cheeks. Its brightening properties enhance luminosity, and its dose of antioxidants, Centella Asiatica and White Tea Extracts, help to defend against environmental aggressors.
Color Luster Lip Gloss in 'Gilded Honey'
An ultra-moisturising formula that delivers light-to-medium coverage with a high-shine finish. Enriched with Kendi Oil and antioxidant Italian Tomato Extract, the lip gloss hydrates and protects lips to leave them soft, supple and comfortable all day long. Complete with a cushioned wand for mistake-free application.
Double-Ended Powder and Eyeshadow Brush
A multi-tasking tool with rounded and angled sides for effortless, precision application of eye make-up and powder. Perfect for applying base colour, or for buffing in the crease, the brush picks up and deposits the right amount of product each time for expertly defined results.

name: Cosmetics Cheek Parfait - Marmalade 4g
product_description:
Add a flush of colour to your complexion with the Trifle Cosmetics Cheek Parfait; a cream blush that applies effortlessly to deliver buildable, long-wearing colour.
Infused with Shea Butter and Coconut Oil, the blusher nourishes and protects skin, whilst enhancing natural radiance for a bright, lit-from-within make-up look. Simply sweep the colour directly onto the apples of your cheeks and blend with your fingertips.

name: Safari Chic 豹纹蜜粉刷
product_description:
Japonesque Safari Chic 豹纹蜜粉刷融合了超级可爱的野生动物元素设计，是一款短柄、高密度的化妆刷，适用于高光粉、蜜粉和矿物散粉，带给您完美的上妆效果。
使用合成刷毛，每次上妆都有出色效果。
专业化妆和美容达人的选择！

name: 圆形刷
product_description:
使用Illamasqua圓形刷幫您達到專業水準，無暇的妝容。一款萬能的化裝工具使用高級的合成的豬鬢，適用於各種肌膚。是適合上粉底和高光的理想產品，使妝容更加均勻精緻。 
低敏。不用動物實驗。

使用Illamasqua 腮红 Brush为您的双颊涂上色彩，它是一个有柔软人造鬃毛的圆形腮红刷。

这款上妆工具非常适合在双颊涂抹面霜和化妆粉，有助于让面部呈现自然的红晕颜色。 使用化妆刷扫过您的面部轮廓和脸颊，获得红润和容光焕发的妆效。

致敏性低。 适合各种类型的肌肤。 无伤害性。

name: 贝拉皮埃尔 - 微光九色闪粉
product_description:
貝拉皮埃爾- 微光九色閃粉選用活潑動感色系，所含的微光因子可令眼部、指甲及膚色更顯神采。色彩豐富，適於多種場合使用，滿足您的一切美妝需求。 - LM 
 包含：

name: 美肤精油（300ml）
product_description:
使用 RMS 美肤精油为您的肌肤补充营养，它是一款醇厚的多功能神仙油，能够使肌肤和油脂之间达到完美平衡。
其轻盈的高度浓缩配方可增强肌肤的光泽感和抗氧化保护作用；它所蕴含的进口精油布荔蒂精油和国产草本植物萃取物协同作用可使肌肤进行水合作用，增强光泽度，有效保护肌肤。
让您拥有所期待的健康肤色，恢复应有的光泽度。

name: Maxy Powder Brush
product_description:
Achieve a flawless complexion with the PUPA Maxy Powder Brush, a multi-tasking makeup brush for applying bronzers and powders to the face and body.
Handmade in Italy, the brush is fitted with synthetic bristles and offers a full, rounded shape for professional results. Ideal for adding bronzer all over the face, setting makeup in place with powder or illuminating the body with a highlighter. The soft bristles feel comfortable on skin and deliver flawless and even application.

name: Lip Brush
product_description:
Add a pop of colour to your lips with the PUPA Lip Brush, a tapered makeup brush that expertly applies and blends lip colour with expert results.
Handmade in Italy, the brush is fitted with 100% natural marten bristles and has been designed with a tapered shape for maximum precision; it hugs the contours of the lips for a professional finish.

name: minerals Brow Quad - Taupe
product_description:
Achieve flawless brows with the glo minerals Brow Quad in Taupe. Host to a combination of products, the quad boasts everything you need to ensure brows are on point. The taupe quad is ideal for those with a fair hair colour.
The sleek black compact contains two brow powder hues, which can be used to customise the perfect shade to suit the natural brow. The brow powders work to fill, shape and define brows, transforming those that are sparse and enhancing any others.
The quad also houses a translucent eyebrow wax, which can be used on the finished brow to hold hairs in place for a long-lasting finish. The final product is a highlighter, this can be used to illuminate the brow bone, as well as other areas of the face.
Used in synergy, the products deliver defined yet natural-looking brows that will stay perfect all day.

name: Eyebrow Design Set - Brown
product_description:
Groom and perfect unruly brows with the PUPA Eyebrow Design Set. Custom tailored to suit individual shades, the comprehensive eyebrow tool kit contains everything you need to pluck, preen and shape for gorgeously defined arches – all conveniently housed in a mirrored compact for on-the-move applications.
The mini tweezers allow you to remove excess hair for the ideal starting point, while the subtly pigmented setting wax locks stray hairs into place without feeling sticky. Fortified with spherical polymers, the coloured compact powder offers a silky-soft texture and buildable coverage, working to fill in sparse gaps and add enhanced structure, with the double tipped applicator featuring a comb and angled brush for flawless looking results.

name: Cosmetics Lip Contour Kit - JuJu
product_description:
The Contour Cosmetics Lip Contour Kit combines a creamy lip liner with a matte liquid lipstick for luscious lips in an instant.
Paired for the perfect shade combination, the lip liner ensures clean and precise definition, with the intensely pigmented lipstick gliding across the lip for true colour pay off and an on-trend matte finish. Presented in gorgeous packaging, the set is ideal for on-the-go glamour.

name: Longo La Riviera Sun Matte Bronzer 5g - Sun-Drenched
product_description:
Achieve glowing perfection with Vincent Longo's La Riviera Sun Matte Bronzer; a multi-tonal, compact bronzer pressed into a unique pattern for warm, natural-looking colour with a long-lasting matte finish.
Suitable for all skin tones, the blendable powder can be applied to the entire face for a sun-kissed glow, or to targeted areas, such as the cheekbones, brow bones and centre of the nose to create a sculpted, defined make-up look. Infused with antioxidant Vitamin E to nourish and protect, the bronzer delivers the perfect balance of red and brown tones to enhance the skin's luminosity.

name: x Fleur de Force Brow Palette - Dark
product_description:
Eylure have collaborated with Youtube beauty sensation, Fleur de Force, to create a sculpting Brow Palette in 'Dark'.
The custom-mix brow kit combines a two-tone powder shadow with an illuminating highlighter for expertly filling, defining and enhancing your natural eyebrows. The waterproof brow powder combines a dark and light shade that you can blend together to achieve the perfect, individual colour for your brow tone, or use each hue independently; use the darker shade for adding depth, and the lighter shade for subtle shaping or filling sparse areas.
The illuminating highlighter is perfect for accentuating the brow bone and arch, and can even be used to add light and dimension to the inner corner of the eyes. Long-lasting, waterproof and smudge-proof.

name: Longo Duo Lip Pencil 1.8g - Roseberry/Spring Rose
product_description:
Accentuate your pout with Vincent Longo's Duo Lip Pencil; a dual-ended pencil that combines two complementary shades of creamy, long-wearing colour.
Sharpening to a fine point without breakage, the precision pencil glides on effortlessly for controlled, mistake-free application. Ideal as a lip liner or full lip colour, it helps to reduce feathering whilst delivering vitamin-rich, smudge-resistant colour with a smooth, comfortable finish.

name: Get a Grip Endurance Eyeshadow Primer 8.5g
product_description:
Prolong and intensify your eye makeup with PÜR Get a Grip Endurance Eyeshadow Primer, a high performance formula that locks makeup in place whilst laying the foundation for smooth, flawless eyeshadow application.
Infused with Agave which locks in hydration, the primer glides effortlessly across the lids, drying clear and smoothing the skin ready for product. Locking makeup in place, it will extend eyeshadow wear, resisting creasing and fading for an intense and long-lasting, vibrant finish. Can also be applied under the eye to prolong the wear of concealer, eyeshadow or eyeliner. Suitable for all skin tones.

name: Airbrush Blending Crease Brush
product_description:
Create flawless eye makeup looks with PÜR Airbrush Blending Crease Brush.
Fitted with soft, slightly dense, synthetic bristles for maximum control, the flexible makeup brush is perfect for layering and blending eyeshadows; it expertly buffs and diffuses harsh lines for seamless, professionally blended results.

name: Sculpt and Contour Foundation Brush
product_description:
Achieve a flawless base with PÜR Sculpt and Contour Foundation Brush.
The tapered brush features dense, synthetic fibres for controlled, expert application. Ideal for defining and sculpting your complexion, the makeup brush delivers the perfect amount of product; it applies and blends without smudging foundation, so you can contour for a chiselled, professional finish. Apply around the edge of the face, along the cheekbones and across jawline for expert results.

name: Perfect Brows Pencil & Clear Gel Duo - Medium/Dark
product_description:
ModelCo have collaborated with American model, Hailey Baldwin, to create the Perfect Brows Pencil & Clear Gel Duo; a two-step brow enhancer that allows you to create enviable arches with ease.
Featuring a precision tip, the soft wax pencil fills in sparse brows with natural, hair-like colour, whilst the high-gloss gel and spoolie brush tame, groom and set eyebrows in place for a perfectly defined, professional finish. Brows appear thicker, fuller and denser.

name: Coconut Luxe 100% Natural Beauty Oil
product_description:
ModelCo have collaborated with American model, Hailey Baldwin, to create the Coconut Luxe 100% Natural Beauty Oil; a multi-purpose oil to nourish and hydrate the face, body and hair.
Lightweight and fast-absorbing, the non-greasy formula utilises an antioxidant-rich blend of Coconut, Marula, Macadamia and Sweet Almond Oils to moisturise and condition skin, whilst helping to improve elasticity and minimise the appearance of stretch marks.
Ideal as a firming massage oil, replenishing post-sun treatment or restorative hair oil to combat split ends and dryness. Expect a soft, smooth body and strong, healthy-looking locks with a luxurious, rejuvenating fragrance.

name: The Filter Contour & Glow Powder
product_description:
Accentuate your favourite facial features with The Filter Contour & Glow Powder from ModelCo's collaboration with American model, Hailey Baldwin.
Combining two micro-fine pigmented powders, the convenient compact houses a bronze shade to contour and add dimension, and a light pearl shade to illuminate and highlight for a soft-focus effect.
Sweep over the face to create a natural, sun-kissed glow and a sculpted, contoured make-up look with an undetectable finish. Ideal for all skin tones.

name: LONDON Wink Eye Pencil Brown Sugar 1.2g
product_description:
Line and define your peepers with the butter LONDON Wink Eye Pencil; an ultra-smooth eyeliner that glides effortlessly across the lid, without pulling on the delicate skin. The eye pencil arrives with a sharp point that can be used to produce clean and precise lines to enhance the eyes. The smooth formula can also be smudged and blended out for a smokey and sultry-looking finish.
Once applied, the long-wearing eyeliner sets firmly into place to ensure eyes remain flawlessly defined all day, however busy your lifestyle is.

name: Crazy Cream - Tan 30ml
product_description:
Protect and perfect the complexion with the SAMPAR Crazy Cream in Tan; a lightweight, tinted moisturiser that delivers long lasting hydration, whilst protecting the visage from photo-ageing UV rays. The silky formula glides onto skin, absorbing quickly to deliver an essential veil of moisture.
Utilising a Hydrocomplex, the Crazy Cream ensures skin appears supple, firm and comfortably hydrated, whilst the addition of Adenosine boosts skin’s collagen levels to assist in reducing the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles. The moisturiser also boasts Smart Sun Prevention to shield the complexion from harmful UV’s and in turn prevent signs of sun damage and photo-ageing.
Offering both skincare and makeup benefits, the tinted formula perfects the complexion with its tan hue, which is ideal for medium skin tones. The product can be worn alone for a naturally flawless-looking finish, or can function as an effective base for a makeup routine. However the product is used, the Crazy Cream guarantees to deliver a radiant and unified finish.

name: IL Principino Eye and Lip Palette - Cool Shades
product_description:
Create subtle or defined makeup looks with Pupa's IL Principino in 'Cool Shades', a portable eye and lip palette combining four eyeshadows with a creamy lipstick and lip gloss.
Housed in a novelty, frog-shaped compact with built-in mirror, the palette (from the brand's 'This is a Love Story' collection) features four cool, neutral-toned eyeshadows that deliver highly pigmented, easy-to-blend colour, and two luscious lip colours to create a glossy, fuller-looking pout.
Perfect for popping in your handbag, it is equipped with a sponge tip applicator with regal gold crown detail.

name: Touch Trend After Dark Nails - Grey Metallic/Tipped Stiletto/Silver Lining
product_description:
Achieve a salon-worthy manicure from home with the Elegant Touch Trend Nails; a pack of stiletto false nails from the brand's After Dark Collection.
Created with super-flex technology, the flexible, easy-to-apply nails are comfortable to wear, and remove effortlessly without damaging natural nails. Complete with fast-drying glue, you can expect long-wearing, chip-free nails that can be filed into any shape.
Includes:
24 pack of nails, 10 sizes.
Glue, buffer and instruction leaflet.

name: Teint Miracle Cushion Foundation - 035
product_description:
Achieve a flawless, radiant makeup look with Lancôme Teint Miracle Cushion Foundation in '035', a buildable liquid foundation housed in a refillable compact with innovative, cushion release technology.
Delivering buildable coverage with a fresh, dewy finish, the foundation blends effortlessly onto skin to camouflage imperfections and promote a more even, radiant skin tone. The cushion delivery system ensures mess-free, easy application; simply touch to activate, then apply to skin with a patting motion to create a naturally flawless effect. The foundation is equipped with a Fresh Touch Puff, an advanced applicator that enables maximum control when picking up product, and feels cooling on contact with skin. 
Portable and refillable, its the perfect every day makeup.

name: LONDON Sheer Wisdom Lip Oil 2.5ml - Rich Nutmeg
product_description:
Add a pop of wearable colour to your lips with butter LONDON Sheer Wisdom Lip Oil in 'Rich Nutmeg', a cocoa lip colour that deeply nourishes and revitalises your pout.
The makeup-meets-skincare formula combines a host of beneficial ingredients that work in synergy to condition, moisturise and protect your lips, all while imparting a beautiful, glossy hue. Gliding effortlessly onto lips, the melting, creamy oil fuses Tahitian Coconut Oil with Chia Seed Oil and Amino Acids to nourish, revitalise and firm the appearance of lips. It delivers a sheer colour whilst providing anti-ageing and antioxidant benefits. Lips feel intensely pampered and luscious.

name: LONDON Sheer Wisdom Serum Eye Shadow 4ml - Maplewood
product_description:
Create a neutral eye makeup look with the butter LONDON Sheer Wisdom Serum Eye Shadow in 'Maplewood', a natural-looking eyeshadow that combines the benefits of makeup with anti-ageing skincare.
Delivering a neutral hue with satin-matt finish, the eyeshadow contains a blend of anti-ageing peptides to help improve the appearance of wrinkles, and Spherical Polymers for a smoothing effect. Gliding effortlessly onto lids, the uniquely textured eyeshadow transforms from a fluid serum to a light powder, imparting high performance pigments with a subtle wash of colour that resists creasing for a flawless, natural makeup look. It blends easily and adheres seamlessly to the lids. Perfect worn alone or as a primer for other eyeshadows.

name: Lipstick - Hibiscus 4g
product_description:
Add a pop of colour to your makeup look with Mavala Lipstick in 'Hibiscus'.
Gliding effortlessly across lips in a uniform layer, the lightweight lipstick delivers a rich, creamy hue that won't settle into fine lines. Its long-lasting coverage ensures lips feel comfortable all day, even if prone to dryness. Ideal for dry or sensitive lips, the lip colour helps protect against dryness for a healthy, supple-looking pout.

name: Smart Derma Mild BB Cream S (Shining) SPF30 PA+++ 40ml
product_description:
Korean-based skincare brand, Skin79, present the Smart Derma Mild Shining BB Cream; a triple-function formula that works to brighten, smoothen and protect skin.
Fortified with Allantoin, Elderflower Extract and Centella Asiatica, the radiance-renewing blemish balm combats dull, uneven skin, whilst Nordenau Water (recognised as Germany's healing water) delivers intense moisture and provides anti-ageing benefits to help minimise the appearance of wrinkles. Its SPF shields from the sun's damaging UVA and UVB rays and strengthens the skin's natural barrier function to reveal perfected, rebalanced complexion with restored luminosity.

name: Eyebrow Styling Compact GY901 4g
product_description: 这款深棕色的Shiseido Eyebrow Styling Compact助您打造完美眉毛。 这款小巧套装包含两种深棕色眉粉和一支双头眉刷，可混合出不同色调，打造心仪妆效。 这款精巧的彩妆盘内置镜面，可随包携带、随时取用。 - K.R

name: Laszlo净肤卸妆液200ml
product_description:
Erno Laszlo淨膚卸妝液高效保濕不刺激，卸妝保養一次到位。高效雙層配方設計，讓卸妝、保養同時完成。更能準確且溫和卸除髒污及彩妝，連難卸的防水彩妝都能輕鬆卸除。含黃瓜果提取物、金縷梅、山金車花、蘆薈、啤酒花、七葉樹等多種植物萃取，可有效舒緩眼周肌膚緊繃與疲勞，並具安撫保濕效果。 
 使用方法 ：

name: Luminizing Satin Eye Color Trio GD804 - Opera 3g
product_description: The Shiseido Luminizing Satin Eye Color Trio in Opera will allow you to enhance your eyes with dazzling colour. Featuring three stunning eyeshadows which are easy to apply and blend using the included brush and sponge applicator, the eyeshadow palette will allow you to create both subtle and dramatic looks depending on your mood. - L.M.

name: 魅眼眼影5 g（各种色调）
product_description: Maybelline魅眼眼影，巧妙重塑您的双眼。是一款紧凑型眼影盘，结合了捕光妆前乳及三色补充色调的眼影粉。 本款柔滑妆前乳，能与肌肤完美融合、可塑性好，为您打造完美眼影。使肌肤更有立体感，轻松照亮您的双眼。 配有双头眼影涂抹棒。

name: Arden Eight Hour Limited Edition Skin Protectant 50ml
product_description:
Treat your skin to the nourishing properties of Elizabeth Arden's Limited Edition Eight Hour Skin Protectant; a classic cream that became an instant success after its creation in 1930. 
Enriched with a combination of Petrolatum (a skin-soothing Beta-Hydroxy), and Vitamin E, the smoothing and restorative formula works to relieve, protect and comfort dry, cracked skin; it helps to ease redness and minor skin irritations, including scrapes and abrasions. Its softening and hydrating properties help to calm and restore wanting skin, and its anti-inflammatory benefits ensure chapped, cracked skin feels restored and replenished. Perfect for dry skin, sunburn and chapped lips, the apricot-coloured balm is a multi-purpose moisturiser that keeps skin soft and protected.
Housed in limited edition packaging.

name: Concealer Pencil
product_description: NUDESTIX Concealer Pencil 有助于遮盖肌肤上的细纹、斑点和其他瑕疵。 Concealer Pencil 可提供哑光妆效。 该产品含维生素 E 和牛油果油，有助于滋润肌肤，恢复肤色。 是您外出时增添活力或彩妆润色的理想产品。 Concealer Pencil 可用于所有肤色。 它可用于突出您的特点或让您呈现崭新妆容。 NUDESTIX pencils 不含防腐剂，也未进行动物实验。 本产品含抗氧化和保湿成分，可活化肌肤。

name: Cosmetics 01 Sculpting Brush
product_description: Highlight and conceal with the Contour Cosmetics 01 Sculpting Brush, perfectly shaped for precise makeup application. Featuring soft and flexible synthetic fibres, the small brush enables you to apply cream and powder formulas with expert precision. Use it to conceal discolouration in hard to reach crevices or draw meticulous contour lines and achieve immaculately sculpted cheekbones. Completely cruelty free, the sculpting brush is a must have tool for a professional finish.

name: Kate Summer Shades Lipstick （各种颜色）
product_description: 利用来自Rimmel的Kate Moss系列的Summer Shades Lipstick 令您的翘唇展现完美。 该口红拥有光滑、霜膏质地，可轻松涂抹于双唇，提供持久、高冲击力的颜色。 利用其不干燥、反光配方即刻获得华丽的双唇。 从一系列的色调中为这个夏季找到自己喜欢的颜色。 E.N.

使用Sigma弯翘睫毛膏套装来打理和让您的睫毛变得弯曲 ，该款睫毛膏防水、定型效果长达13小时。
该款睫毛膏配备弯曲、模压塑料棒可创造出令人难以置信的形状，提升您的睫毛的外型，给人耳目一新的感觉。它可以提高睫毛定型效果，创造出期待的效果。 强化的黑色配方可轻松涂满睫毛根部到尖部，向上、向前卷曲、拉伸您的睫毛，其毛刷浓密、均匀，定型效果良好，不会留下墨染痕迹，亦不会产生睫毛结块现象。 睫毛弯而翘，令人羡慕。

name: LONDON Plush Rush Lip Liner - Really Rose
product_description:
Line and define your lips with butter LONDON Plush Rush Lip Liner, a water resistant lip formula that works to define and plump the appearance of your pout.
Infused with filling spheres that help to add volume to lips and reduce the appearance of wrinkles, the lip liner applies effortlessly, and blends seamlessly with its built-in brush. Delivering true colour that never bleeds or feathers, the lip liner can be worn alone, or layered beneath your favourite lipstick for maximum colour and staying power.

colour: Gold Brown, Harmony, Natural, Pearl, Pink Diamond, Rose, Smoke
name: BRETON Eyeshadow 2g (Various Shades)
product_description:
Add definition and depth to your eyes with Christian BRETON Eyeshadow, a range of soft, silky eye colours in individual pots.
Perfect for adding subtle colour or dramatic intensity to your eyes, the eyeshadows glide effortlessly onto the lid, delivering perfect coverage and blending seamlessly for long-lasting delicate, smokey or bold makeup looks. Can be applied wet or dry depending on desired finish.

name: 全效遮瑕膏
product_description:
Chantecaille 全效遮瑕膏，使肤色臻美。创新型啫喱配方，可轻松融入肌肤，展示自然清新、完美无瑕的妆容。
这款轻盈遮瑕膏内含橄榄油和塔马奴坚果油， 为肌肤补水，滋养皮肤；洋甘菊、绿茶、兰花提取物等成分，可遮盖黑眼圈、肌肤瑕疵及缺陷。 本品可淡化细纹，使肤色均匀光滑，美美哒准备拍照哦！

name: Classic Film Eyes (Various Shades)
product_description:
Add depth and dimension to your eyes with RMK's Classic Film Eyes; a water-based formula that blends effortlessly to deliver a long-wearing, metallic finish.
With a unique liquid texture that transforms into smooth powder upon application, 'The Silver Screen Collection' eyeshadow creates a smooth veil on the lids, allowing you to enhance natural beauty with picture-perfect colour, inspired by the nostalgia of classic Hollywood cinema.

colour: London Girl, Rosette, Seal of Approval, She Knows the Ropes, Sigma Pink
name: Lip Eclipse 液体唇膏
product_description: Sigma Lip Eclipse 液体润唇膏可为您的双唇增添奢华色彩。 这款不透明的液体唇膏采用高度着色配方，配备有缓冲涂抹头，可轻松涂抹在肌肤上，定妆持久，让您拥有洋红色的丝滑唇妆。

name: 纯粹闪亮保湿口红（4g）（各种色调）
product_description: Rimmel   纯粹闪亮保湿口红 ，使双唇更完美。 内含维生素A、C、E等，深度滋润，妆效持久，色泽艳丽；同时软化保护嘴唇，使您微微一笑，引领潮流。

name: Colour Band Eyeshadow
product_description: 高色素色泽，持续 24 小时不脱妆。 Bourjois Colour Band Eyeshadows 质地柔滑，易上妆。 这款眼影上妆顺滑精准，颜色混合协调。 日妆晚妆都适合，妆容持久，即使在疲惫一天后仍能焕发光彩。 E.N.

name: Vanitas Matte Lipstick (Various Shades)
product_description:
Douse your pout in Illamasqua Vanitas Matte Lipstick, an intensely pigmented lip colour with creamy, matt finish.
Gliding effortlessly across the lips, the long-wearing lipstick delivers immediate colour pay off that stays put for all-night perfection. Its versatile, matt colour can be applied lightly and worn as a lip stain with all-day staying power. Achieve professionally, perfected lips.

colour: Black Blue, Black Noir, Deep Plum, Oyster Glow
name: 无尽丝滑眼线笔
product_description:
Pixi無盡絲滑眼線筆 
 Pixi 流暢絲滑眼線筆即刻突顯您的眼部曲線。這款長效防水型眼線筆將帶給您眼線液般的效果，更便於您使用。 
完全無模糊或暈妝的設計可讓您全天保持無暇動人。有了這款創新型智能眼線筆，便無需再進行其他修飾。 
功效： 
 - 維生素E 可滋養保護細嫩肌膚

name: 奶油色闪粉
product_description: 使用 奶油色闪粉 （来自 Illamasqua品牌）为您的双眸增加深度和造型。 这款妆效持久的哑光眼影可防褶皱及防水，轻松上妆，提供可塑性、色彩强烈的卓越妆效，让您根据需要创建一个自然清新或戏剧性的专业级妆容。 也可用于面部、嘴唇和身体，获得多方面妆效。

name: Arden Ceramide Lift and Firm Concealer (5.5ml)
product_description:
Elizabeth Arden Ceramide Lift and Firm Concealer 是一款轻盈的、带有光泽的高遮瑕度遮瑕膏，可实现完美无瑕的青春肤色。
超柔滑的质地实现舒适的使用感受。这款彩妆能与肌肤无缝融合，帮助掩饰黑眼圈及肌肤瑕疵，同时先进的细胞丰盈技术能够提拉和紧致肌肤。 这款智能遮瑕膏利用 Ceramide Triple Complex，帮助强化和再造肌肤，重获丰润青春肌肤所需的重要水分。 其轻盈扩散剂有助于实现柔光效果，专业去除肌肤瑕疵和细纹，抵御较深皱纹、肿胀和黑眼圈，呈现更加光滑、紧密、亮泽肌肤。
这款抗皱遮瑕膏令肤色更加完美，专业抚平肌肤，同时含有抗衰老维生 素A、C 和 E，抵御衰老和外部因素。

name: Cosmetics Lip Pencils - Various shades
product_description: Created to give your lips that perfect finishing touch, this Lip Pencil from Bellapierre Cosmetics is an essential addition to your makeup bag. Available in various shades, this silky pencil will give you a precise application with maximum staying power, meaning that you'll be looking your best all day and night. K.D.

name: Intense Matte Lip + Cheek Pencil - Various Shades
product_description:
Create endless make-up looks with the NUDESTIX Intense Matte Lip and Cheek Pencil; a creamy, versatile formula that can be used as a lipstick, lip liner and blush.
Waterproof and long-wearing, the pencil glides on effortlessly to deliver smooth, high pigmented colour with a matte finish, whilst preventing feathering for up to six hours. Lips feel comfortable and hydrated, and cheeks are defined with a flush of natural-looking colour.
Eco-packaged in a collectible tin with a pencil sharpener and mirror for mistake-free application.

name: LipLift Max - Petal Ice
product_description:
这款化妆品是引领潮流的必备品。 Pixi的这款LipLift Max丰唇霜能瞬间打造出雍容华贵的双唇。该品牌的产品亲附肌肤，让您不必大费周折即可打造出无瑕妆效。 其独特配方富含的多肽成分能带来快速强效的丰盈效果，令双唇愈发饱满；荷荷巴油能加强保湿效果，滋润双唇； 芦荟和洋甘菊能有效舒缓和软化嘴唇，同时让您的笑容更加灿烂。 它的精细笔尖亲附肌肤、使用方便；清新的薄荷香味让您的双唇清凉舒爽。 E.N. 
使用说明：可单独使用以达到丰唇效果，或用在唇彩之上以呈现光亮色泽。

name: Matte 'N Metal Eye Shadow Palette 12g
product_description:
Create a range of eye makeup looks with the Stila Matte 'N Metal Eye Shadow Palette, a neutral eyeshadow palette filled with 12 complementary matt and shimmer eyeshadows.
The versatile palette combines six matt hues with six metallic shades, enabling you to create a range of looks that add subtle depth or bold definition to the eyes. From matt brown to rose gold; pewter to bronze, each carefully selected shadow is triple-milled and blends seamlessly on the lid, delivering true-colour pigment with an intense finish. Their soft texture imparts high impact, long-lasting results in one sweep. Can be used wet or dry depending on desired intensity.
Housed in a mirrored compact.
Vintage (Matt Pale Neutral Pink)
Velvet (Matt Pale Pink)
Feathered (Matt Pale Sand)
Fringe (Matt Light Taupe)
Suede (Matt Mid-Tone Mauve Pink)
Velour (Matt Mid-Tone Warm Tan)
Bohemian (Metallic Light Pewter)
Retro (Metallic Rose Gold)
Sequin (Metallic Gold)
Smolder (Metallic Smoky Gunmetal)
Sizzle (Metallic Rosy Copper)
Flare (Metallic Cool Bronze)

name: Stockholm Lipliner 2克
product_description: 利用 FACE Stockholm的Lipliner 凸显您的唇部并预防唇膏脱皮。 可提供一系列丰富色彩，唇线笔将加强和补充您的唇膏或唇彩选择。 – E.W.

name: London Brow Pencil and Highlighter Duo - Medium
product_description: Accentuate your eyes with the Brow Pencil and Highlighter Duo from Lottie London. Featuring a dual-ended design, the pencil combines a highlighter to illuminate brow bones, and a hair-like colour to enhance natural shape and fill in sparse eyebrows. Adds dimension to your face for a professional eye make-up look.

name: Grapefruit Lip Balm 4.3g
product_description:
Restore moisture to dry lips with the Hurraw! Grapefruit Lip Balm; an ultra-hydrating formula that cares for skin using premium organic, vegan and raw ingredients.
The refreshing balm is enriched with a skin-loving blend of Coconut Oil, Cocoa Seed Butter and Olive Oil, which deliver a nourishing veil of hydration to lips, with long-lasting effect. Enveloping skin in a zesty grapefruit fragrance, the twist-up stick ensures lips feel fruity and fresh.
Complete with a sheer pink tint, the lip balm drenches lips in essential moisture, whilst delivering a sheer gloss for a bright and healthy-looking finish.

colour: Bronzed Beige, Cognac, Deep Amber, Gentle Beige, Honey Beige, Mahogany, Perfect Beige, Porcelain Beige, Softly Beige, Softly Beige 1, Toast, Toasty Beige, Vanilla, Vanilla Shell
name: Arden Flawless Finish 海绵霜Makeup (23克)
product_description: 无暇肌肤的秘密在于皮肤表面反射的光泽。 Elizabeth Arden最畅销的粉底，现采用钻石提升肌肤光泽，瞬间减少皮肤褪色和细纹，造就完美均匀、光泽四溢的妆效，妆效时间可持续12小时。

name: Bees 小蜜蜂亮彩唇膏 - 牡丹 2.6g
product_description:
色彩和珠光的结合，为这款世界著名的润唇膏增添了一丝魅力。
护理、顺滑和凸显唇部，有十二种颜色选择。发光土质颜料为自然蜂蜡唇膏增加一抹色彩，为双唇提供所需营养。
维生素 E、椰子油和向日葵油等天然成分能够滋润双唇。
是时候尝试闪亮的颜色了。

name: 娜迪奥散粉刷
product_description:
極致柔軟的定制大號刷，能妝容整日無暇煥彩，是塗抹淡淡的散粉、粉餅和古銅色散粉的完美之選。 
這款散粉刷能令粉末狀妝品均勻分佈、流暢自然，映襯肌膚之美，打造臻至完美的妝容。確保妝容的專業性，每次化妝都能呈現高品質的妝容效果。
適用於液體，霜狀和粉狀的粉底。這款資生堂至美粉底刷使用了日本傳統造刷工藝，無論哪種粉底劑型都能創造出完美的妝面。較短的刷柄使刷子更容易控制，這款刷子使用了柔軟的錐形野豬鬢，使刷子能夠照顧到臉部的輪廓和細小的部位。

name: Arden Flawless Finish Ultra Smooth Pressed Powder (8.5g)
product_description:
用 Elizabeth Arden Flawless Finish Ultra Smooth Pressed Powder (8.5g) 拥有美丽均匀的肌肤。 它极其轻便，可令肌肤整天都保持如丝般光滑，而不会结块或沉入细纹中。
这款产品具有奇妙的多重功能，可以独自使用进行补妆，或者用于粉底之上降低光泽度，淡化腮红。 这款效果持久的配方经过皮肤测试，可令您的面色润泽，从早到晚都容光焕发。 使用说明：用一把大刷子将本品涂抹到裸露的皮肤或打过粉底的皮肤上。

name: Brow Control and Shape Gel
product_description:
使用Eyelure Brow Control and Shape Gel能令眉毛服帖，助您打造精致双眉。 使用眉型刷让眉毛更精致，保证眉毛全天服帖。
这款眉胶富含芦荟、泛醇、荨麻叶精华和ProCircul8，长效持久，绝不会令你失望。 -SA

name: The Luxe Collection False Eyelashes - Bauble
product_description: Add luxurious definition to your peepers with Eylure's 'Bauble' False Eyelashes from The Luxe Collection. Super soft, lightweight and reusable, the tapered, silk-effect lashes are perfect for any occasion; their full and velvety design with soft tips lend your eyes a wide-eyed effect whilst still being wearable. Perfect for a glamorous look. Glossy and long-lasting.

name: Barnes 闪亮身体乳 - 原色（120ml）
product_description: 使用 Scott Barnes 闪亮身体乳 - 原色（120ml），让肌肤焕发好莱坞明星般的亮泽。 这款可持续24小时的有色润肤霜能够为肌肤增添柔和的色调，妆效柔和，自然莹亮，让面部和身体肌肤持久散发迷人光泽。它可以瞬间让肤色变暖，让肌肤表面闪耀若隐若现的光泽。 -SA

name: Teint Divin Mineral Tinted Moisturizer - Medium To Dark Skin
product_description:
用Caudalie Teint Divin 矿物润色Moisturiser（麦芽至Dark Skin 适用）享受明亮、滋润、均匀的肌肤。 矿基颜料、葡萄籽多酚和牛油果油令肌肤具有天然、健康、日光浴过的外观。
Caudalie Teint Divin矿物润色Moisturiser（麦芽至 Dark Skin 适用）是为深色皮肤专门配制的，可令您的肤色一年到头都红润亮泽。 这款滋养型滋润乳富含葡萄籽多酚的抗氧化剂和透明质酸的舒缓、饱满性滋润因子，可以改善肤色的整体外观。 这款精致的滋润乳不含刺激粉刺成分，适合所有皮肤类型，其温暖的花香味让人想起夏天。
使用说明：

name: London Cream Colour Correcting Palette 16.8g
product_description:
Perfect your complexion with the Cream Colour Correcting Palette from Lottie London. Combining four creamy, blendable formulas, the kit helps to diminish the appearance of common skin concerns.
Housed in a chic compact with a convenient mirror, the palette includes a mint green shade to minimise redness and blemishes, a lilac shade to brighten dull, lack-lustre skin, an orange hue to banish under-eye circles and a yellow tone to combat pigmentation and signs of fatigue.
Expect a smooth, flawless finish and an even, balanced skin tone.

name: Paris Mega Volume Collagene Waterproof Mascara - Miss Hippie Black 01
product_description: L'Oréal Paris presents the Mega Volume Miss Hippie Waterproof Mascara, with an intense, collagen-rich formula that works to instantly volumise and thicken the look of lashes without clumping, smudging or running. The super fuzzy brush features kaleidoscopic bristles, which coat each individual lash layer by layer for a bold, feathery finish. Apply to top and bottom lashes for that effortless retro look, perfect for festivals.

name: Geller 劳拉·盖勒魅惑眼影盒（配备眼影刷）——打造漂亮而清爽的眼影
product_description:
Laura Geller 劳拉·盖勒魅惑眼影盒适合各种氛围、服装和场合，它内置有 14 种抗晕染眼影，既可涂抹在湿润的肌肤，也可涂抹在干爽的肌肤，可专业地勾勒您的眼部轮廓。
这款眼影结合妆效持久的底妆使用，能带给您纯拷贝色素的奢华色彩，既可单独使用，也可多种颜色叠加使用，打造无尽的妆容，让您拥有超长时间的定妆效果。 这款眼影可轻松与眼皮融合，进行光滑均匀涂抹，眼影盒还配备有嵌入式镜子和双头眼影刷。

name: Techniques Enhanced Eye Brush Set
product_description:
Create an array of makeup looks with the Real Techniques Enhanced Eye Brush Set; a five-piece collection that covers any makeup addict’s needs. The set contains an array of brushes for expert eyeshadow application, as well as a brush tailored to eyeliner and a comb for volumising lashes. Delivering professional looking results, you can expect enviably enhanced eyes.
Medium Shadow Brush
Apply eyeshadow with ease using the Medium Shadow Brush. Crafted with a wide and flat brush head with tapered bristles, the makeup brush softly sweeps a wash of colour onto the lid. Suitable for both powder and cream eyeshadows, the shadow brush also blends product effortlessly.
Essential Crease Brush
Add depth to the eye with the Essential Crease Brush; an ultra-soft makeup brush with an intelligent, tapered design. The synthetic brush is able to reach into the crease of the eye, blending powdered or cream eyeshadows for a seamless finish.
Fine Liner Brush
Expertly line and define your peepers with the Fine Liner Brush; the ultimate precision tool. Working with both cream and liquid eyeliners, the brush glides across the eye, evenly distributing product for an ultra-precise finish.
Shading Brush
Achieve a bold eye makeup look with the sleek purple Shading Brush. The brush boasts a dense brush head with short bristles that are ideal for packing colour onto the lid, yet still providing even distribution. Expect intense colour pay off.
Lash Separator
Reveal full and flattering lashes using the Lash Separator; a fine toothed, metal comb that divides lashes and eliminated mascara clumps.
Brush Cup
Keep your brushes in tip top condition with the Real Techniques Brush Cup. Designed to store your favourite makeup brushes, the cup keeps tools neat and tidy on the dressing table.

name: Flawless Beauty Primer No.1 Even Skin
product_description:
Pixi Flawless Beauty Primer No.1 Even Skin可以让改善肤色不均的情况，让您的肤色看起来更为年轻，容光焕发。 此款多功效的底妆产品富含维生素和抗衰老成分，能够改善皮肤弹性，同时可以起到强效滋养和补水的作用。 您的皮肤会呈现出容光焕发和健康年轻的光彩。

使用说明：

name: for Men - Anti-Blemish Coverstick 2.5ml
product_description:
Recipe for Men - Anti-Blemish Coverstick 2.5ml 
A high-coverage concealer for targeted treatment of spots, blackheads and skin blemishes. The dermatologically approved anti-blemish formula contains highly effective smoothing and anti-irritating ingredients such as salicylic acid (1,8%), bisabolol, amaranth oil and Australian myrtle oil. The creamy, non-oily texture absorbs excess sebum, while still allowing your skin to breathe. Waterproof and long-lasting (more than 4 hours).

name: Sandler Watercolour Liquid Blush - Golden Glow (15ml)
product_description:
Add long-wearing, natural-looking colour to your complexion with the Daniel Sandler Watercolour Liquid Blush in 'Golden Glow'; a pastel pink-peach shimmer.
Enriched with Jojoba and Vitamin E, the multi-award winning, water-resistant formula nourishes and conditions skin, whilst delivering streak-free, blendable colour that applies effortlessly to create a subtle, dewy sheen. Can be used as a blusher or highlighter.

name: MD No Bronzer Bronzer - 棕色 (10ml)
product_description:
利用来自Perricone MD的‘No Bronzer’  Bronzer 塑造和定义您的肌肤特点，这款轮廓塑造配方富含广谱SPF 30成分以提供专业防晒效果。
这款焕发青春的古铜色仿晒霜为肌肤带来一层暖色膜，发挥维生素C酯的强大功效，这种维生素C脂溶性形式可最大限度地减少变色。 它的多功效、适应性色彩模仿健康肌肤色素，塑造广受欢迎的肌肤色泽，帮助在面部自然轮廓上塑造阴影，打造肌肤造型。  
这款古铜色仿晒霜帮助亮白和遮掩缺陷，非常适合为前额、颧骨和下巴增添深度。 - K.N.

name: Paris Colour Riche La Palette Nude Eye Shadow Palette 7g
product_description:
L'Oréal Paris Color Riche La Palette Eyeshadow Palette 非常适用于各种情绪、服装或场合，结合了各种哑光和闪光色调的十种补充色调，可清楚地描出眼线。
从明亮、昏暗的粉红色和裸色，到紫色烟熏色调，眼影可单独描绘或混描，形成永久妆容且具备出众的色彩持久性。
本品可以很容易地融化在眼睑上，便于均匀平整地涂抹。调色板配有自带化妆镜和双头刷，实现特别受欢迎的效果。 E.N.

Natio Define眉筆

Chantecaille最纤长睫毛膏，轻松打造浓密纤长的特级睫毛。 采用最新肽技术，配方持久长效，可极大地增加睫毛长度、厚度，使睫毛饱满充盈、浓密纤长。
本款睫毛膏具有天然蜡的独特组合，使睫毛纤长浓密，不结块。富含玫瑰水油，可调理睫毛，使睫毛粘贴牢固，拒绝晕染。 这款双螺旋刷，不结块，尤其适用于打造轻柔质感，美妙浓密的睫毛，使双眼美丽动人。
