product_description:
使用 Eylure  假睫毛初学套装101 号，让睫毛浓密有魅力。 即使是最短的睫毛，钝形边缘也可以让它变得浓密，看起来自然。 - R.H
此新手套装精选一系列易用工具，极其适合初学者。 套装中含硅树脂尖头睫毛刷和橙木签（以弯曲睫毛），并添加分离和粘合剂，方便您进行多种调整。
套装包含： Naturalites 专属眼角睫毛、Naturalites 101、睫毛刷、粘合剂瓶（2个）、橙木签

name: Master Strobing Liquid 100 25ml - Light
product_description:
Add luminous radiance to your complexion with Maybelline Master Strobing Liquid 100 in 'Light', a liquid highlighter infused with micro-pearls to enhance and brighten your features.
Delivering an illuminating strobe effect, the liquid formula blends effortlessly onto skin, adding radiance and dimension to help sculpt and contour your complexion. Wear alone on high points of the face such as the brow bone, down the centre of the nose and the cheekbones, or mix with primer or foundation for an all-over glow. Skin looks beautifully dewy and radiant.

name: London Pore Eraser Stick 9g
product_description:
Perfect your complexion with the Lottie London Pore Eraser Stick; a travel-friendly formula that can be applied directly to the face for minimal fuss and on-the-go touch-ups.
Blendable and buildable, the concealer stick instantly blurs visible pores, whilst combating uneven skin tone and eliminating unwanted shine. Skin is smooth, flawless and refined with a long-wearing finish.

name: Techniques Bold Metals尖头新型刷
product_description: Real Techniques   Bold Metals尖头修型刷 ，可增加眼睛色彩深度、重塑双眼。 这款加权刷拥有浓密的刷毛和锥形刷头，最适合均匀全面地涂抹眼影，轻松融合打造烟熏效果及完美妆容。 E.N.

product_description:
用巴黎欧莱雅 Volume Million Lashes - Black 打造极致的扇形卷翘睫毛 这款柔软的睫毛膏带有一把睫毛刷，刷毛众多，长短不一，可以均匀地将睫毛膏从睫毛根部涂到顶部。
用一张多余的擦拭物去除睫毛膏团块和过量部分，如此您的睫毛膏用量适宜，从而可以拥有纤长丰盈的睫毛。 - L.M.

用睫毛刷将睫毛膏涂抹到睫毛根部和顶部。

name: Lengthening 115 假睫毛
product_description: Eylure Lengthening 115号假睫毛为您的双眸增添新的维度。 质地轻盈且可重复使用，有自然美感的闪亮假睫毛非常适合在白天和夜晚间使用；它们使您双眸的中心部分更加醒目，使您拥有大大的、柔情似水的黝黑眼眸。 使眼睛更清澈明亮、大而有神。 功效持久。

name: Collections A11 Spooly Brush
product_description:
Tame unruly brows with the Spectrum Collections A11 Spooly Brush; a professional brow tool that combines a vibrant colour palette with expert hand-crafted design.
The simple spooly comprises a comb to one side, which helps to tidy unruly brows, whilst the firm brush works to soften the application of makeup product for a more natural-looking finish. Used alone or working with wax, gel or powder brow makeup, the spooly brush is an essential addition to any makeup bag; keeping brows on point.

product_description:
利用 Garnier Pure Active Light BB Cream 获得完美肌肤，这是一款控油护肤膏，既可以掩盖肌肤缺陷，又能够防止其复发。
利用矿物颜料瞬间遮掩缺陷，该多功效BB可令肤色均匀，其2％水杨酸成分有助于消除缺陷和黑头，让肌肤更光滑洁净。 其轻盈、透气质地，令其轻松渗入肌肤，该保湿霜提供了一层美丽、自然的覆盖膜，令容易出现污迹的肌肤更加洁净、肤色平衡、容光焕发。
新增SPF 15有助于防御紫外线导致的损伤。 - K.N.

colour: Alabaster, Beige, Bisque, Buff, Cameo, Cream Nude, Linen, Natural, Soft Beige, Spice, Toasty Beige, Vanilla Shell, Warm Cappuccino, Warm Mahogany, 栗色

product_description:
让 Elizabeth Arden 无暇裸妆粉底带给您完美无瑕的肤色；这款粉底液拥有低至中级遮瑕力，可以打造自然亮泽的妆效。
这款粉底液适合所有皮肤类型，上妆轻松顺滑，妆感轻盈透气，为肌肤戴上一层完美面纱；它采用水色粉配方和柔焦色粉，让肌肤容光焕发；同时大豆脂质技术还有助于瞬间缩小毛孔，如果持续使用，还具有细致毛孔的功效。
这款粉底液能够改善肤质，保护肌肤；富含维生素和抗氧化剂，为肌肤强效补水；采用 SPF 15 防晒配方，保护肌肤不受紫外线损伤。 带给您肤色均匀、完美无暇的肌肤。 恍若无妆，更添质感。

colour: Immaculate Snow, Midnight Black, Pure Espresso, Urban Grey
name: Paris Superliner Le Khol (Various Shades)
product_description: Define your eyes from every angle with LOréal Paris Superliner Le Khol; a silky, long-wearing eyeliner that glides on effortlessly for professional results. Delivering a high-intensity finish, the pencil features a fine tip for precise, mistake-free application, allowing you to create a look as natural or dramatic as desired.

name: Absolu Rouge Cream Lipstick (Various Shades)
product_description:
Let your lips do the talking with the Lancôme Absolu Rouge Cream Lipstick; hydrating lip colour that arrives in a variety of shades, from timeless hues to vibrant new colours.
The lip-shaping lipstick treats the pout to a veil of moisturising colour, simply click the rose and sweep effortlessly over lips. Utilising Pro-Xylane™, the creamy formula seeks to boost skin’s moisture levels, leaving lips kissably soft, hydrated and comfortable.
Each L’Absolu Rouge Cream Lipstick offers ultra-smooth results and a luminous satin finish. Expect enviable definition.

name: - Black
product_description:
用巴黎欧莱雅Telescopic False Lash Mascara - Telescopic Black (9ml)获得丰盈魅睫。 这款创新的纤维配方具有极好的拉长效果，可以增密睫毛，打造出拉长睫毛的效果，仿佛睫毛比以前变长了。
新的Telescopic刷可以拉伸睫毛，增密睫毛，如此您可以永远抛弃那些假睫毛了！ - L.M.

colour: Alarm, Birthday Suit, Nude Pink, Pink Blush, Starry Eyed

product_description:
使用 Magnifibres Treatment Lash Primer 改善睫毛外形。这是一种调理配方，可为涂抹睫毛膏建立完美的基底。 "三效合一"的产品使得睫毛看起来更长、更稠密，可单独使用或者在涂抹喜欢的睫毛膏之前使用。
85% 的女性表示，在经过短短的八周时间后，她们的睫毛看起来更长了。

name: Kate Nudes Lipstick （各种色调）
product_description: 利用Rimmel的Kate Moss系列的裸色唇膏令您的翘唇尽显完美。 这款唇膏拥有柔软、乳霜质地，可轻松上妆，提供持久、中性色彩。 提供其不干燥配方瞬间获得美艳双唇，可从一系列色调中选择适合各种肤色的颜色。 E.N.

name: London Blend and Snap Sponge
product_description: 使用 Lottie London's Blend and Snap Sponge打造无暇底妆 ，一款有弧度的化妆海绵，可以用来轻松准确涂抹妆前乳，粉底和膏状腮红。 混合化妆棉不含乳胶，由高级材料制成，其特性有锥形设计能使海绵到达脸部难以涂抹的区域，使肤色无暇闪亮。 - K.N

name: London Retractable Eyebrow Pencil with Spoolie 9g (Various Shades)
product_description:
Create enviable arches with Lottie London's Retractable Eyebrow Pencil; a long-wearing brow pencil with a built-in spoolie brush to smooth, groom and blend.
Delivering natural, hair-like colour, the precision pencil helps to fill in sparse brows, whilst enhancing shape and adding dimension to your face for a professional finish. Tames unruly brows to leave them beautifully defined. Available in a range of shades to suit all hair tones.

name: Cosmetics 纯矿物碎粉底 8克（各种色调）
product_description:
EX1 Cosmetics 纯矿物碎粉底 是一款100％矿物粉底，提供自然外观的覆盖。 矿物碎可以毫不费力的通过擦拭进入您的皮肤，让您的肤色简约轻盈、清新无瑕。
这款外观天然的粉底富含抗衰老的抗氧化剂和维生素E，将使皮肤受到保护并具有自然完美的外表。

name: London Brush, Bag & Beyond
product_description: 将您所有的化妆品都装进 Lottie London  'Brush, Bag & Beyond'中。 透明刷子袋上有多彩的标志和商标，拉链设计。 尺寸Perfect适合旅行或装入手包中。 E.N.

name: Glow-y Powder - Santorini Sunset
product_description: Achieve a naturally radiant complexion with the Pixi Glow-y Powder, designed in collaboration with international beauty blogger Aspyn Ovard.  Adding a hint of sheer, natural-looking colour, the mineral-based powder contains subtle light reflecting pigments to brighten and highlight, easily blended and universally flattering for all skin tones.

name: iredale 珍爱芮德魅惑唇膏 - 东京
product_description:
豐潤雙唇。採用超清爽，純天然原料，打造彈力豐潤翹唇。顏色為珊瑚紅，帶給你持久美麗。 
讓雙唇豐滿誘惑，就用它- 珊瑚紅，薄荷生薑清爽芬芳，讓雙唇豐盈。採用獨特的多肽類物質，給雙唇保濕滋潤，帶來看得見的豐潤感。效果持久，即使輕輕擦拭過後，雙唇還能保持自然色彩，讓你感覺無限清爽！乳木果油、向日葵油和蘆薈能有效保護雙唇，而綠薄荷和生薑能刺激循環，讓雙唇更豐潤，更美麗。

name: Lip Venom Flash Silver (3.5ml)
product_description:
DuWop Venom Flash Silver 是原有 Lip Venom plumping gloss 的衍生产品。 这一次是注入了 Silver Mica，这款俏唇膏会让唇部更具动人光泽。  有了圆润的光泽，双唇就会瞬间充满动感。
Venom Flash Silver 采用珍贵的珍珠配方，闪耀着独特 DuWop 产品系列所拥有的卓越品质。 含有金属云母矿物质，闪亮的银色色调赋予双唇清凉的亮泽。 与明亮双眸能搭成很好的平衡。 我们能建议使用 DuWop Smoke in Plum Wine 吗？
青睐 Venom line 的名人包括 Lindsay Lohan、Jennifer Aniston、Teri Hatcher 和 Sienna Miller。
使用说明：
 
未进行动物实验。

name: 相约 Trimony 哑光眼影盘
product_description: theBalm 相约 Trimony 哑光眼影盘适合各种场合，它含有九种多功能眼影，质地光滑。 这款眼影可轻松与眼部肌肤融合，让您拥有光滑均匀的妆效。既适合几种颜色调和使用，也可以单独使用，打造无尽的妆效，让您尽享超级持久的定妆效果。

name: Enchanted Eyelashes - Rose
product_description: Add length and depth to your lashes with Eylure's 'Rose' Enchanted Eyelashes. Soft, lightweight and reusable, the handmade false lashes are perfect for evenings and nights out; their full, feathery design and dark, smokey finish lends eyes sultry definition for a striking effect.

name: Volume着色专家睫毛膏（11ml）（黑色）
product_description:
RimmelVolume着色专家睫毛膏 ，提升增强睫毛。是一款黑色增浓睫毛膏，富含创新型睫毛色调。

本品使每根睫毛都震撼人心。锥形刷可涂覆最短的睫毛，使双眼大而美丽。内含综合睫毛色调，自然地提高睫毛色彩。 使睫毛浓密卷翘、魅力迷人。

name: Repairing Tint and Blur Moisturiser SPF30 40ml (Various Shades)
product_description:
Perfect and protect your skin with the Repairing Tint and Blur Moisturiser SPF30 from clinical skincare brand, ALGENIST.
Bridging the gap between makeup and skincare, the award-winning, multi-tasking formula delivers natural coverage to help even out skin tone, and utilises Microalgae Oil to replenish essential moisture and nutrients. Instantly blurring the look of imperfections, the tinted moisturiser camouflages dark spots and dark circles whilst neutralising red and sallow patches. Fortified with SPF 30, it provides broad spectrum sun protection and rejuvenates skin whilst improving and refining texture. Skin looks hydrated and revitalised.

name: Hello Glow!
product_description:
Achieve a lit-from-within complexion with the Pixi Hello Glow!. The three-piece set combines a liquid highlighter, powder blush duo and lip plumping gloss to help you create an effortlessly radiant and healthy-looking visage.  
Glow Booster in Peach Gold
Lightweight and silk-textured, the liquid primer enhances your natural radiance and perfectly preps skin for further makeup. Working to smooth and blur the look of imperfections, the fluid highlighter contains brightening Mica as well as iridescent pigments to impart a dewy, radiant finish.
Beauty Blush Duo in Peach Honey
The mineral-based powder is the perfect finishing touch to any makeup look, adding soft and natural looking radiance with a hint of sheer color coverage. Infused with light reflecting particles and a soft shimmer, the universally flattering pair are easily blended to highlight and lift dull complexions.
LipLift Max in Honey Sheen
The LipLift Max has a unique formula infused with peptides to add a burst of volume to make lips look fuller, and Jojoba Oil to enhance moisture and intensively hydrate. Aloe and Chamomile work to soothe and soften, whilst adding a subtle sheen to your smile. The precision pen tip glides on for effortless application and the refreshing mint flavour leaves a cooling sensation.

name: B. Palette Perfection Eye Quad - b. fabulous
product_description: Build the perfect smoky eye with the Lilah B. Palette Perfection Eye Quad in b. fabulous. The eyeshadow quad offers four complementary shades in both matte and shimmer finishes, allowing you to create multi-dimensional and layered looks. Super blendable and highly pigmented, simply dust the lighter shade all over the lid for a natural finish or add in depth and precise lining with the darker hues. Housed in Lilah B.’s signature chic pebble-shaped case.

name: Cosmetics Multi Use Contouring Set - Contour Two
product_description: Sculpt your features like a pro with the Contour Cosmetics Multi Use Contouring Set in Contour Two. Combining six varied shades of smooth cream formulas, the universal contour palette offers three highlighters with yellow, pink and neutral undertones and two cool, dark shades that perfectly suit a range of skin tones from pale to dark. Each colour blends effortlessly to add definition and shape to your facial structure, leaving you with perfectly chiselled cheekbones and a flawless complexion.

name: 摩纳集控油粉 - 浅色
product_description:
使用本品均勻膚色，去除過多油脂。滋潤和舒緩配方蘊含維生素C 和E，幫助治愈受損的肌膚，專門對抗男性肌膚的大量油脂分泌。 
專為高清電視上鏡的專業人士製作，即使最苛刻的情況下也無法察覺，讓肌膚看起來自然，沒有油光。  使用說明： 使用粉撲在前額、鼻樑兩內里和臉頰與下顎輕拍粉末，向上撲至髮際線。

name: Face Base
product_description: The ModelCo Face Base is a cult-favourite makeup primer that creates a smooth, flawless base to ensure long lasting coverage. Oil free and enriched with Vitamins C and E, the clear formula veils the look of imperfections, helping to minimise the look of fine lines and reduce the appearance of pores for the perfect canvas. Skin feels velvety-soft and foundation lasts for up to ten hours.

name: & Berry Shiny Lipstick - La Fiesta
product_description:
Add nourishing, vibrant colour to your pout with Lord & Berry's 20100 Shining Crayon Lipstick; a jumbo lip pencil that glides on effortlessly for a high-shine finish.
Long-wearing and ultra-comfortable, the pencil delivers highly pigmented colour, whilst soothing and softening lips for a trendsetting smile. Easy to hold and perfect for use on-the-go.

name: 便携奢华蜜粉刷
product_description: Japonesque 推出的这款便携奢华蜜粉刷是打造无暇蜜粉妆容的完美工具。 由高级天然刷毛制成，非常紧实，只需轻轻一扫便可将蜜粉均匀地涂抹于肌肤，不留下任何刷痕或斑块。

name: Definition Eye & Brow Pro Palette
product_description:
The High Definition Eye & Brow Pro Palette contains six pressed powders in neutral, earthy shades to suit all hair colours and help you create a professional, contoured look.
Ultra-lightweight and easily blended, each powder is enriched with Vitamins C and E to ensure a long-lasting, smooth and natural looking finish. Use the lighter tones to add highlight and the darker shades to create intense definition. Presented in a chic compact palette with convenient mirror for touch ups on-the-go.

name: Angled Blusher Brush
product_description:
Add a flush of colour to your complexion with the PUPA Angled Blusher Brush, a slanted makeup brush for applying powder blush and bronzer products to the face.
Handmade in Italy, the brush is fitted with Dermocura® synthetic fibre bristles that feel soft on application, and features a slanted head that seamlessly hugs the cheekbones for flawless results. Use to add colour to cheeks or for contouring and sculpting the face with bronzer.

name: Vamp! Compact Eyeshadow Duo - Dark Night
product_description:
Create subdued or smokey makeup looks with the PUPA Vamp! Compact Eyeshadow Duo in 'Dark Night', a carefully curated eyeshadow duo that combines two complementary shades.
Creamy and easy-to-blend, each highly pigmented colour delivers a rich finish with long-lasting wear. Use each colour individually or blend together to create a unique eye makeup look. Feels comfortable on the lid. Complete with dual-ended sponge tip applicator.

name: Eyeshadow Brush
product_description:
Illamasqua Eyeshadow Brush是一款便捷的美妆工具，配备有人造刷毛，可轻松勾勒细腻的眼部线条。
这款精心设计的化妆工具有柔软的、长短不一的刷毛，Perfect 涂抹面霜、粉底液和液体眼影，；较短的刷毛可用于精心上彩妆，而较长的刷毛则可用于混合阴影。 用画圈的方法遮盖瑕疵，以实现烟熏妆效。

name: Brush iQ Mini Contour Brush Kit
product_description:
Tweezerman's Brush iQ Mini Contour Brush Kit combines the perfect tools for achieving a flawless makeup base. Certified by makeup artists, the travel-sized brushes and blending sponge allow you to expertly and easily apply your foundation with professional results. The brushes utilise Dunpont Natrafil patented technology which optimises the pick-up and release of product.
Mini Pointed Foundation Brush:
Perfect for applying cream formulas such as primers and liquid foundations. Its synthetic hairs are more hygienic than animal fibres, and perform with unrivalled results, picking up and delivering products for flawless skin. The travel-sized brush is perfect for covering large surface areas but also for detailing in natural curves and contours; its tapered tip enables perfect coverage in hard-to-reach areas.
Mini Contour Foundation Brush:
Perfect for contouring and defining facial features. Its synthetic hairs are more hygienic than animal fibres, and perform with unrivalled results, picking up and delivering products for flawless skin. The travel-sized brush features a unique angle to blend seamlessly along the angles of the face.
Blending Sponge:
Perfect for blending foundation along the hairline and jawline, this hypoallergenic (non-latex) sponge can be used damp or dry and creates a natural finish on skin. Velvety soft and a must-have for seamless blending.

name: Eyebrow Design Set - Dark Brown
product_description:
Groom and perfect unruly brows with the PUPA Eyebrow Design Set. Custom tailored to suit individual shades, the comprehensive eyebrow tool kit contains everything you need to pluck, preen and shape for gorgeously defined arches – all conveniently housed in a mirrored compact for on-the-move applications.
The mini tweezers allow you to remove excess hair for the ideal starting point, while the subtly pigmented setting wax locks stray hairs into place without feeling sticky. Fortified with spherical polymers, the coloured compact powder offers a silky-soft texture and buildable coverage, working to fill in sparse gaps and add enhanced structure, with the double tipped applicator featuring a comb and angled brush for flawless looking results.

name: Airbrush Blurring Concealer Brush
product_description:
Achieve a flawless base with PÜR Airbrush Blurring Concealer Brush.
Fitted with soft, synthetic bristles, the fluffy, domed head has been specially designed to apply concealer to blemishes and under eye circles, camouflaging imperfections to lend skin an airbrushed finish. The makeup brush expertly blends out lines and edges without smudging to ensure maximum coverage is attained.

name: x Fleur de Force Brow Palette - Medium
product_description:
Eylure have collaborated with Youtube beauty sensation, Fleur de Force, to create a sculpting Brow Palette in 'Medium'.
The custom-mix brow kit combines a two-tone powder shadow with an illuminating highlighter for expertly filling, defining and enhancing your natural eyebrows. The waterproof brow powder combines a dark and light shade that you can blend together to achieve the perfect, individual colour for your brow tone, or use each hue independently; use the darker shade for adding depth, and the lighter shade for subtle shaping or filling sparse areas.
The illuminating highlighter is perfect for accentuating the brow bone and arch, and can even be used to add light and dimension to the inner corner of the eyes. Long-lasting, waterproof and smudge-proof.

name: LONDON Wink Eye Pencil Busker 1.2g
product_description:
Line and define your peepers with the butter LONDON Wink Eye Pencil; an ultra-smooth eyeliner that glides effortlessly across the lid, without pulling on the delicate skin. The eye pencil arrives with a sharp point that can be used to produce clean and precise lines to enhance the eyes. The smooth formula can also be smudged and blended out for a smokey and sultry-looking finish.
Once applied, the long-wearing eyeliner sets firmly into place to ensure eyes remain flawlessly defined all day, however busy your lifestyle is.

colour: Ode to Pink, Own It, Rubicund, Sigma Pink, Signed, Sealed, Stage Name
name: 强效唇膏笔
product_description: Sigma 强效唇膏笔可为您的双唇增添奢华色彩，它采用高效着色配方，能够轻松勾勒唇线，突出双唇，让您尽享洋红色的双唇。 这款唇膏笔采用旋转式设计，具有定妆持久的特点，色彩甜美，而不会导致肌肤过度干燥，让您尽享柔软、水润而丝滑的双唇。

name: Root Beer Lip Balm
product_description:
Quench thirsty lips with the Hurraw! Root Beer Lip Balm; an ultra-hydrating formula that cares for skin using premium organic, vegan and raw ingredients.
The convenient, twist-up lip balm is enriched with Sweet Almond and Coconut Oil, which work in synergy to envelop lips in essential, long-lasting hydration. Arriving with a sweetly spiced scent, the creamy lip balm is sure to satisfy those root beer cravings. Let dry lips drink up.

name: minerals Brow Quad - Brown
product_description:
Achieve flawless brows with the glo minerals Brow Quad in Brown. Host to a combination of products, the quad boasts everything you need to ensure brows are on point. The taupe quad is ideal for those with dark hair; from brunette to black.
The sleek black compact contains two brow powder hues, which can be used to customise the perfect shade to suit the natural brow. The brow powders work to fill, shape and define brows, transforming those that are sparse and enhancing any others.
The quad also houses a translucent eyebrow wax, which can be used on the finished brow to hold hairs in place for a long-lasting finish. The final product is a highlighter, this can be used to illuminate the brow bone, as well as other areas of the face.
Used in synergy, the products deliver defined yet natural-looking brows that will stay perfect all day.

name: Best Seller Kit - Blush Medium
product_description:
PÜR's Best Seller Kit in 'Blush Medium' is a carefully curated makeup set that combines everything you need to achieve a flawless, sunkissed complexion. Combining a primer with a powder foundation, bronzer and mascara, the kit will allow you to experience long-lasting, perfected makeup. Complete with a makeup brush for effortless application.
Prep & Perfect Correcting Primer
A skin-perfecting primer infused with clinically proven ingredients to smooth and prep skin for flawless, long-lasting foundation. Utilising a Ceretin Complex which contains age-defying Retinol, the hydrating formula expertly reduces the appearance of lines and wrinkles whilst instantly minimising the look of pores and promoting a more uniform, even toned complexion. Neutral in colour, the antioxidant-rich primer is suitable for all skin tones, and feels lightweight on skin. Its brightening and firming properties lend your makeup a radiant, youthful finish, and its cocktail of Salicylic Acid, Shea Butter and Aloe Vera work in synergy to decongest pores, moisturise and soothe the complexion. Makeup looks flawless and silky smooth with extended wear.
4-in-1 Pressed Mineral Powder Foundation SPF 15 in 'Blush Medium'
A lightweight, pressed powder foundation with award-winning formula that utilises innovative skincare ingredients. Delivering minimal coverage for a natural, flawless complexion, the all-in-one foundation works as a foundation, concealer, powder and SPF simultaneously to improve the appearance of skin; it's clinically proven to camouflage and prevent imperfections. Encapsulated Mineral Water intensely hydrates, whilst botanical extracts promote a brighter, more even toned complexion. Skin looks flawless and is protected against harmful UV rays. Mess-free application. Suitable for contact lens wearers. 
Mineral Glow Powder in 'Bronze'
A micronized mineral bronzer that adds all-over warmth to the complexion. Perfect for sweeping over the whole face, or for contouring to sculpt and define, the powder delivers rich, golden undertones to create a sunkissed finish. Infused with moisturising Shea Butter and a Ceretin Complex that utilises Retinol, it helps to improve elasticity whilst reducing the appearance of lines and wrinkles. Skin looks beautifully radiant, smooth and healthy. Suitable for contact lens wearers. 
Big Look Mascara
A volumising mascara with clump-resistant application wand. Coating lashes in a rich, nourishing formula, the buildable mascara lifts and lengthens even the smallest of eyelashes to create a maximised, dramatised eye makeup look. Infused with Argan Oil, Coconut Oil and antioxidant Vitamin E, the black mascara adds a dewy sheen to lashes whilst intensifying, nourishing and preserving moisture. Lashes are protected and expertly volumised. 
Chisel Brush
A professional makeup brush that has been specially designed to flawlessly apply the 4-in-1 Pressed Mineral Powder Foundation. Working well with all powder products, the brush offers soft, synthetic bristles that pick up and deliver the perfect amount of product for flawless, well-blended results.

name: IL Bacio Kit - Soft Rose
product_description:
Add a pop of colour to your makeup look with Pupa's IL Bacio Kit in 'Soft Rose', a portable lip colour palette offering one lip gloss and three creamy lipsticks.
Housed in a novelty, lip-shaped compact with gold crown embellishment, the palette is the smallest piece from the 'This is a Love Story' collection, and is the perfect way to add a touch of colour to your complexion. Use the creamy lipstick colours all-over the lips, and add a splash of gloss to the centre of lips to create the appearance of a fuller pout.
Perfect for popping in your handbag, it is equipped with a handy mirror for on-the-go touch-ups.

name: Sua Maesta Makeup Palette - Green
product_description:
Create a range of makeup looks with Pupa's Sua Maesta in 'Green', a face, lip and eye palette combining seven eyeshadows with two lip creams, two lip glosses and one cream blusher.
Housed in a novelty, crown-shaped compact with built-in mirror, the palette (from the brand's 'This is a Love Story' collection) features two layers of colour. The top layer offers a striking green eyeshadow surrounded by luscious lip and cheek colours, and the bottom layer contains six neutral-toned eyeshadows that deliver highly pigmented, easy-to-blend colour.
Create subtle or show-stopping makeup looks; neutral smokey eyes and glossy, 3D effect lips. Complete with a sponge tip eyeshadow applicator.

name: 炫彩眼线笔 - S.O.P.H.I.E
product_description:
使用Illamasqua 炫彩眼线笔（S.O.P.H.I.E）画眼线以突显您的双眸，它是一款色彩醇厚的深黑色眼线笔，着色持久。
这款眼线笔的质地柔滑、易于浑融，可轻松地略过肌肤，熟练地突显和深化眼睛，使您获得一个有最大影响力和清晰度的颜色冲击。 作为一个眼线笔，它既可以突显眼皮的折痕，又能够使整个眼皮形成一体以形成一个戏剧性的效果。

name: Vernis in Love Nail Polish - 351
product_description:
Add a pop of colour to your digits with Lancôme's Vernis in Love Nail Varnish, a glossy nail polish with even coverage and luscious colour.
Available in a range of bold and pastel shades, the nail polish glides effortlessly onto nails, delivering a rich gloss of colour with high shine and fast, even coverage. Easy to apply.

name: LONDON Sheer Wisdom Lip Oil 2.5ml - Dusty Mauve
product_description:
Add a pop of wearable colour to your lips with butter LONDON Sheer Wisdom Lip Oil in 'Dusty Mauve', a mauve lip colour that deeply nourishes and revitalises your pout.
The makeup-meets-skincare formula combines a host of beneficial ingredients that work in synergy to condition, moisturise and protect your lips, all while imparting a beautiful, glossy hue. Gliding effortlessly onto lips, the melting, creamy oil fuses Tahitian Coconut Oil with Chia Seed Oil and Amino Acids to nourish, revitalise and firm the appearance of lips. It delivers a sheer colour whilst providing anti-ageing and antioxidant benefits. Lips feel intensely pampered and luscious.

name: Lipstick - Pivoine 4g
product_description:
Add a pop of colour to your makeup look with Mavala Lipstick in 'Pivoine'.
Gliding effortlessly across lips in a uniform layer, the lightweight lipstick delivers a rich, creamy hue that won't settle into fine lines. Its long-lasting coverage ensures lips feel comfortable all day, even if prone to dryness. Ideal for dry or sensitive lips, the lip colour helps protect against dryness for a healthy, supple-looking pout.

name: Smart Derma Mild BB Cream M (Moisture) SPF35 PA++ 40ml
product_description:
Intensely moisturise your skin with the Smart Derma Mild BB Cream with SPF 35 PA++ from Korean skincare brand, Skin79, a triple action BB cream that brightens, smoothens and protects the complexion whilst providing long-lasting hydration.
Gently caring for damaged skin, the rich yet mild blemish balm delivers a veil of hydration onto skin; it expertly prevents moisture loss and nourishes dry, rough patches with its blend of nourishing Allantoin, Panthenol and Centella Asiatica. Rich in antioxidants and anti-ageing properties, the BB cream combines Nordenauer Water with Moringa Ceramide to maximise moisture levels and promote a younger, healthier-looking complexion. Keeps skin safe from harmful UV rays with SPF 35.

name: Eye Shadow Brush (M)
product_description: Apply and blend your eyeshadow with ease thanks to the Shiseido Eye Shadow Brush (M). Made with soft, natural hair bristles which won't irritate your eyelids, the makeup brush will allow you to achieve a professional finish. - L.M.

name: Sharpener
product_description: Shiseido Sharpener让您的妆效保持轮廓分明。 专门设计用于Shiseido眼线笔和唇线笔，能有效锋利笔尖，提升上妆精确度和可控性。 - K.N.

name: Nature 蜜粉饼 14克 - 各种色调
product_description:
使用 Living Nature Pressed Powder可Perfect您的肌肤，这款轻质粉饼可以单独使用以获得柔和的光泽，或覆盖在粉底霜上起到定妆的作用。
创新和智能化的香粉利用反光的天然矿物质，提供淡雅的颜色，同时保持完美的妆容，效果持久。 适合所有肌肤类型，您将会获得恢复亮度后的健康肤色。 装在一个有镜子的铝制粉盒中。

name: Cosmetics 14 Blending Brush
product_description: Get that professional finish with the Contour Cosmetics 14 Blending Brush. Expertly designed for superior control and makeup application, the face brush features a circular brush head with dense, soft bristles perfect for applying cream and powder formulas. The flat top is ideal for creating layers of makeup whilst immaculately blending to create a smooth and even coverage. Completely cruelty free with flexible synthetic fibres, the blending brush is an essential tool to ensure a flawless base.

name: minerals Suede Matte Lip Crayon (Various Shades)
product_description:
Achieve an on-trend matte lip with the glo minerals Suede Matte Lip Crayon; a conditioning lipstick that has been inspired by a crayon, allowing a simple and convenient application.
Rich in antioxidants, the crayon is fortified with Vitamins C and E, alongside a skin-loving blend of Mango Oil and Shea Butter. The lip colour envelops lips in moisture and nourishing protection, ensuring lips look healthy as well as vibrant.
The pencil arrives with an integrated sharpener located in the cap, ensuring the crayon is always in tip top condition, even whilst on-the-go. Expect highly pigmented lip colour that is ultra-smooth and long-wearing.

colour: Crimson 08, Fire Red 09, Fuchsia Burst 06, Kiss of Coral 03, Nude 01, Pink Affair 05, Raisin 10, Rustic Red 07, Taupe 02, Vintage Pink 04
name: Arden Gelato Collection Lip Liner (Various Shades)
product_description:
Line and define your lips with Elizabeth Arden Gelato Collection Lip Liner.
Gliding effortlessly along the lips, the smooth, creamy formula helps to reduce the appearance of fine lines whilst plumping and perfecting the look of your pout. Perfect worn alone, or as a primer for lipstick, it will help to shape and define your natural lips whilst prolonging lipstick wear for long-lasting results.

name: Cosmetics 07 Angled Brush - Silver
product_description: Expertly apply makeup with the Contour Cosmetics 07 Angled Brush. Crafted from super soft synthetic fibres, the fluffy face brush is perfect for applying powder based products and ensuring an even coverage. The brush head is slightly angled, making it ideal for using contour powder to define and shape cheekbones, or use it to buff on bronzer or blusher for an immaculately blended finish. Completely cruelty free and featuring a pretty silver-toned handle, the brush is a must-have product for any makeup bag.

name: Lips The Red Fishnet
product_description: Make a statement with our Red Fishnet Print! The ultimate form of self-expression, Violent Lips Temporary Lip Appliques will give you a perfectly patterned pout that will last through the night! This innovative line of Temporary Lip Appliqués will keep the print and color on your lips for 4 to 8 hours. Vitamin enhanced with a smooth feel and glossy finish, the appliqués are easy to apply to lips of all sizes. How to Apply Violent Lips - Step By Step with Isabella from Violent Lips on Vimeo.

colour: Bae, Bendo, Betty B, Bondi, Bossa Nova
name: Perfect Pout Semi-Matte Lipstick (Various Shades)
product_description:
ModelCo have collaborated with American model, Hailey Baldwin, to create the Perfect Pout Semi-Matte Lipstick.
Rich and velvety, the creamy formula glides effortlessly onto lips to deliver full coverage in a single stroke; it saturates your pout in long-lasting, semi-matte colour that stays in place. Lips are smooth, comfortable and hydrated with a fuller appearance.

name: Subtil Cushion Blusher (Various Shades)
product_description:
Add a touch of colour to your complexion with Lancôme Subtil Cushion Blusher, an award-winning, buildable cheek colour with innovative cushion release technology.
Delivering the vibrancy of a liquid blush, the colour instantly brightens and refreshes the complexion, adding a pop of colour to your makeup look. The colour-drenched cushion is easy to use and mess-free; simply touch to activate, then apply colour to cheeks with the mini puff applicator provided. Dab onto cheeks with a gentle patting motion; start with little product and build up until desired intensity is achieved.

name: Beauty Lip Shine
product_description:
Treat your lips to the hydrating properties of RMS Lip Shine, a nourishing, non-sticky lip colour infused with organic oils and pure mineral pigments to lend lips a healthy sheen.
Infused with nutrient-rich Buriti Oil, the light, emollient formula visibly hydrates whilst imparting a sheer wash of colour and shine. It delivers antioxidant properties thanks to its natural fatty acids and Vitamins A and C, and can also be added to cheeks for a light blush with extra sheen.
Lips feel drenched and quenched.

name: Clown Regular Eyelashes
product_description: These eyelashes from paperself are Inspired by the art of Chinese paper-cutting, Eyelashes blend an element of traditional culture with contemporary design. Unique and expressive, accentuate the corners of your eyes with the smaller lashes for a subtle daytime look, or make a statement with the full lashes for a special occasion.

name: Cid I-Slick 光滑豪华唇彩（颓废派） (3.5ml)
product_description:
New CID Cosmetics 光滑豪华唇彩（颓废派），既有口红的色彩，也有唇彩的舒适。 尤其适用于恐惧涂口红，同时越来越厌倦涂唇彩的女士。
New CID Cosmetics 光滑豪华唇彩（颓废派），设有旋转笔涂抹装置，配有超软硅胶笔尖，每次使用都可精准涂抹，令双唇超柔软。 柔滑配方，看似光泽，实则为口红效果。
使用说明：

name: 矿物腮红刷
product_description:
Japonesque 推出的这款矿物腮红刷经过精心造型设计，能够均匀地涂抹色粉，轻松打造自然的腮红妆。
非常适合用于提亮肤色，勾画轮廓，让散粉和粉饼与妆容自然融合。
每款矿物毛刷均融合了独特的抗菌技术，有助于消除各类细菌，防止发炎、各种感染和粉刺等肌肤问题。 抗菌处理可以防止有害细菌在刷毛上繁殖。

name: LONDON LIPPY Come To Bed Red
product_description:
Add sumptuous colour to your pout with the butter LONDON Lippy Liquid; a long-wearing formula that combines the pigment of a lipstick with the shine of a gloss.
Infused with Shea Butter and antioxidant Vitamin E, the liquid lipstick glides on effortlessly to moisturise and protect lips, whilst delivering non-drying colour with an ultra-glossy finish. Expect smooth, luscious lips that are subtly scented with delicious notes of Vanilla.

name: Cosmetics Lip Balm
product_description:
Say hello to nourished lips with Bellapierre Cosmetics Lip Balm. Formulated with hydrating and softening vitamin E, it gives your lips a subtle sheen whilst keeping them kissably soft and supple. - L.M.
Directions of Use:  Apply a small amount to the lips as and when needed.

name: Definition Mascara Brush
product_description: Minimise clumps and smudges with the High Definition Mascara Brush; a must-have tool for applying mascara. Featuring a fan shaped head, the brush separates lashes and helps you to achieve perfect coverage from root to tip. Ideal for blending false lashes with your own for a high impact finish.

name: Definition Angled Eye Shading Brush
product_description: Perfect for buffing and diffusing eyeshadow, the Angled Eye Shading Brush from High Definition allows you to create a smouldering eye make-up look. Featuring a specially shaped head and soft, natural bristles, the brush effortlessly picks up and distributes powder products for a professional finish.

name: Stockholm Contouring Brush #31
product_description: FACE Stockholm的Contouring Brush＃31 允许您使用腮粉和腮红凸显面部轮廓。 采用高品质、超软合成材料制造，该化妆刷在化妆时从面部轻柔扫过。 – E.W.

name: Velvet Touch Shadow Palette - Shade 03
product_description:
Japonesque推出的这款高色素眼影盘包含四种颜色，能随心组合打造出炫色聚光的双眸。 它蕴含的矿物和微珍珠给人以立体感官，实为您化妆包中的必备之物。
盒体设计奢华小巧，内嵌镜面，便于携带，随时使用。 K.D.

name: LONDON Plush Rush Lipstick - Frisky
product_description:
Treat your lips to the moisturising and plumping properties of butter LONDON Plush Rush Lipstick, a long-wearing, creamy lipstick that delivers a shock of colour whilst dousing lips in essential moisture.
Accentuating the natural curves of your pout, the luscious formula is enriched with a Phyto-Endorphin Complex to boost your mood, and a Plumping Complex to help increase the appearance of fullness; lips look smoother, firmer and more defined. Standing the test of time, the lipstick withstands feathering and bleeding, so your pout looks irresistably kissable, for longer.

name: B. Eye/Lip Liner Brush #5
product_description: Achieve a professional finish with the Lilah B. Eye/Lip Liner Brush #5, a chic tool designed to allow you to precisely apply eye and lip liners. It features super soft bristles and a long stem handle for enhanced control, whilst the angled head enables you to accurately define specific areas without smudging or smearing.

name: Compulsive Cosmetics Concealer Brush #003
product_description: Perfect your complexion with the Concealer Brush #003 from Obsessive Compulsive Cosmetics. Featuring a weighted, nickel-plated ferrule and ergonomic handle, the unique brush offers superior control when tipped towards the face, whilst its soft, synthetic bristles effortlessly distribute cream, liquid and powder products to expertly cover imperfections. Crafted from sustainable materials and bonded with vegan-sourced adhesive.

name: Pressed Powder - PP 010
product_description:
使用 Illamasqua Pressed Powder（来自010品牌）实现完美的妆容；它是一种半透明的定妆粉，可使面部减少油光，突显化妆效果。
精细研磨的化妆粉有柔滑如丝般的质地，可轻松地分布在肌肤上，起到控油、散发光泽及获得延长妆容时间的作用，效果持久。 您将有一个有天鹅绒般妆效的完美肤色。 装在一个镶有镜子的小化妆盒中以方便补妆。

name: Compulsive Cosmetics Small Shader Brush #008
product_description:
Achieve a flawless make-up look with the Small Shader Brush #007 from Obsessive Compulsive Cosmetics. Crafted from sustainable materials and bonded with vegan-sourced adhesive, the brush features a weighted, nickel-plated ferrule for superior control.
With a specially shaped head and soft, synthetic nylon and taklon fibres, the professional brush can be used to apply and blend cream or powder products with ease and precision. Delivers the perfect amount of product to smaller areas of the face, allowing you to shade, smudge and create expert results.

name: 活力四射眼影调色盘
product_description:
借助这款活力四射Eyeshadow 眼影盘 （来自 Illamasqua品牌）打造无尽完美的妆容。 利用这四色的眼影，您可以勾勒和突出眼部线条，定妆持久，过渡无缝自然。
这款羽量轻的眼影既可单独使用，也可多色调和使用，它能与眼睑完美融合，令妆色更加顺滑均匀。不会油腻、褪色或晕染。 内置与带有镜子的精致眼影盒中。 还可用于身体的肌肤。
'Stealth': 柔滑浅乳酪色。
'Wolf'：巧克力褐色。
'Obsidian'：浓黑色。
'Vintage'：仿古金色。
Japonesque专业减折晕染刷，帮您完美涂抹眼影。 设有锥形刷头及轻柔刷毛，天然纤维制作，是眼妆的必备工具，可轻松涂抹粉状眼影。也可根据需要打造沙龙级妆容或艳丽的烟熏妆。

name: Definition Kajal Liner - Intense Black
product_description: The High Definition Kajal Liner creates a sleek, defined and dramatic look. Featuring a soft, creamy texture, the innovative eye liner is intensely pigmented and effortlessly glides on with a contoured tip for ultimate precision, ideal for the classic cat eye and vintage flicks. Blend out for a sultry smoky look.

name: Stockholm Foundation Brush＃34
product_description: 利用 FACE Stockholm的Foundation Brush＃34 均匀涂抹粉底。 采用高品质、超柔软合成材料制作的刷毛舒适地在面部涂抹粉底液以获得完美妆效。 – E.W.

name: Geller 劳拉·盖勒遮瑕刷
product_description:
Laura Geller 劳拉·盖勒遮瑕刷经久耐用，功能强大，可为面部狭窄的区域轻松涂抹液体或乳霜类产品。
这款遮瑕刷配备有扁平的刷头和特殊设计的尖端，能够涂抹眼睛、鼻子和唇线周围难于涂抹的区域，它非常适用于遮瑕，包括暗斑、伤疤和瑕疵。 能涂抹适量的产品，让您拥有光滑无瑕的妆效。

name: LONDON Plush Rush Lipstick - Fab
product_description:
Treat your lips to the moisturising and plumping properties of butter LONDON Plush Rush Lipstick, a long-wearing, creamy lipstick that delivers a shock of colour whilst dousing lips in essential moisture.
Accentuating the natural curves of your pout, the luscious formula is enriched with a Phyto-Endorphin Complex to boost your mood, and a Plumping Complex to help increase the appearance of fullness; lips look smoother, firmer and more defined. Standing the test of time, the lipstick withstands feathering and bleeding, so your pout looks irresistably kissable, for longer.

name: Color Lip Gloss - 03 Shiny Rose
product_description:
Drench your lips in a lustrous sheen with the RMK Color Lip Gloss in 'Shiny Rose'.
Combining the vibrant colour of a lipstick with the clarity of a lip Gloss, the colour glides effortlessly over lips with its square-shaped applicator, and delivers a veil of sheer yet brilliant colour. Its host of moisturising ingredients, including Shea Butter, Rosehip Oil keep lips feeling hydrated and comfortable.

name: LONDON Plush Rush Lipstick - !!!
product_description:
Treat your lips to the moisturising and plumping properties of butter LONDON Plush Rush Lipstick, a long-wearing, creamy lipstick that delivers a shock of colour whilst dousing lips in essential moisture.
Accentuating the natural curves of your pout, the luscious formula is enriched with a Phyto-Endorphin Complex to boost your mood, and a Plumping Complex to help increase the appearance of fullness; lips look smoother, firmer and more defined. Standing the test of time, the lipstick withstands feathering and bleeding, so your pout looks irresistably kissable, for longer.

name: IL Bacio Kit - Pop Red
product_description:
Add a pop of colour to your makeup look with Pupa's IL Bacio Kit in 'Pop Red', a portable lip colour palette offering one lip gloss and three creamy lipsticks.
Housed in a novelty, lip-shaped compact with gold crown embellishment, the palette is the smallest piece from the 'This is a Love Story' collection, and is the perfect way to add a touch of colour to your complexion. Use the creamy lipstick colours all-over the lips, and add a splash of gloss to the centre of lips to create the appearance of a fuller pout.
Perfect for popping in your handbag, it is equipped with a handy mirror for on-the-go touch-ups.

name: Lip Lacquer - Viva (3)
product_description:
Douse your lips in rich, moisturising colour with the ModelCo Lip Lacquer in 'Viva', a highly pigmented lip gloss that delivers a slick of vivid, long-wearing colour.
Gliding effortlessly onto lips with its wand applicator, the non-sticky gloss imparts a rich colour tint whilst intensely hydrating to keep lips feeling comfortable and luscious all day.

name: Flawless & Poreless No.1 Translucent
product_description: 这华丽的底妆产品可以抚平细纹，起到滋润的效果，从而减少毛孔的出现。 本底妆产品在上妆前能够让您的面部完全遮瑕，具有滋养成分，能够清洁和疏通毛孔。

name: Cosmetics Gel Eyeliner - Black
product_description: Accentuate your eyes with the Black Gel Eyeliner from Mellow Cosmetics. Easy-to-apply, the smooth, creamy formula glides on effortlessly to deliver long-wearing, waterproof colour that won't fade or smudge. Create classic, thin lines or thicker, bolder eye make-up looks that last. Complete with a brush.

name: Beauty Ultimate Makeup Remover Wipe x 20
product_description:
Gently refresh your complexion with the RMS Ultimate Makeup Remover Wipe (Pack of 20).
Enriched with Coconut Oil, an ingredient with superior anti-bacterial properties, the cleansing wipes effortlessly eliminate even stubborn eye make-up without over-drying or uncomfortable tightness.
Suitable for sensitive skin types, the towelettes calm and soothe rashes, sunburn and blemish-prone skin, whilst delivering intense nourishment to leave your complexion soft, smooth and revitalised. Gentle enough for use on babies.

name: 长效持久矿物眼线笔 - Black
product_description:
用 KORRES 长效持久矿物眼线笔 - Black勾画和界定您的双眼。 它的配方蕴含神经酰胺和滋补性的火山矿物质，质地柔软光滑，可轻松滑动到您的眼睛之上，如此您就可以打造完美的烟熏眼。
它的色彩强烈，可以描画出持久和防晕染的眼线，一整天都不会改变。 - L.M.

name: Double Ended Eye Brush
product_description:
Create multiple eye looks with the brushworks Double Ended Eye Brush; a versatile tool that assists in producing a flawless finish.
The brush boasts a fluffy shading brush to one end, which is the perfect size and shape for sweeping product across the lid, whilst the hand-cut, angled liner brush delivers precise results. The angled head can be used to glide eyeliner across the lash line, or is perfect for adding details to eyeshadow.
Working effectively with both powder and liquid products, the dual-action eye brush guarantees to enhance the eyes, whilst offering a professional looking finish.

name: 摩纳集控油粉 - 中色
product_description:
使用本品均勻膚色，去除過多油脂。滋潤和舒緩配方蘊含維生素C 和E，幫助治愈受損的肌膚，專門對抗男性肌膚的大量油脂分泌。 
專為高清電視上鏡的專業人士製作，即使最苛刻的情況下也無法察覺，讓肌膚看起來自然，沒有油光。  使用說明： 使用粉撲在前額、鼻樑兩內里和臉頰與下顎輕拍粉末，向上撲至髮際線。

name: New York 美宝莲纽约 24 小时长效唇彩 - 510 激情红色
product_description:
Maybelline 美寶蓮寶蓓護唇膏採用超水潤配方，深入滋養雙唇，為你輕鬆打造完美翹唇。此款唇膏完全不油膩，讓雙唇持久水潤，呈現自然唇色，且可有效預防雙唇乾燥、開裂。此款唇膏採用加粗型管體設計，是你手袋的必備品，不僅可打造完美唇色還能提供SPF20 級別的防護，有效對抗環境中的有害物質。 EN 
 效果：  88% 雙唇更光滑*  82% 雙唇更水潤*  70% 雙唇更柔軟*  83% 雙唇更動人* 
 *討論嘉賓自評推薦。

name: Wispies Cluster False Eyelashes - 603 Black
product_description: Enhance your lashes with the Ardell Wispies Cluster False Eyelashes in style 603. Reusable and easy to apply, the falsies have been carefully handcrafted with subtle clusters of lashes along an invisible band for a discreet and natural looking result. Knotted, feathered tips ensure perfect uniformity with longer lengths to the middle for an eye-opening effect. Lightweight and comfortable. Made from natural hair.

name: Dollar Brows Three Steps to Beautiful Brows
product_description:
Get professional results with the Three Steps to Beautiful Brows kit from the brow experts, Billion Dollar Brows. Designed to condition, colour and control, the set contains Boost brow conditioner to accelerate hair growth, a Universal pencil to fill in any gaps and an effective Brow Gel to complete the look and hold brows into place. When combining each step, the Beautiful Brow kit delivers long-lasting, flawless brows.
Brow Boost 4ml
Create beautiful and healthy looking brows with Brow Boost. Paraben free, the formula is designed to prime and condition eyebrows, leading to boosted growth. Brow Boost is tinted pink and delivers a translucent hue that blends into the brow invisibly and ensures makeup glides on effortlessly. Can be used both over and under brow makeup.
Universal Brow Pencil 0.25g
Shape, fill and define your brows with Universal Brow Pencil, a water-resistant, mechanical eyebrow pencil that works with almost all skin tones and hair colours. Extremely versatile, the dual-ended pencil is a neutral taupe colour that works equally well on blonde hair as it does on dark hair. Its smooth formula delivers a soft, natural finish for brows that look fuller and shapely. Use feather like strokes to achieve a natural finish, and utilise the spoolie to blend, groom and control.
Brow Gel 3ml
Take control of your brows with Brow Gel, a clear formula that works to lock eyebrow colour in place whilst taming hairs. Utilising high quality ingredients, the brow gel with spoolie applicator helps prolong the wear of your brow colour whilst imparting a radiant glow for a polished makeup look. The perfect brow tamer, the formula never flakes or leaves brows with a noticeable film.

name: Vintage Cosmetics Company Blemish Wand Soft Touch - Pink
product_description:
Promote a clearer complexion with The Vintage Cosmetics Company Blemish Wand Soft Touch in Pink, a useful beauty tool that enables you to safely and easily extract blemishes and blackheads without marking or scarring the skin.
Helping to unblock pores, the wand is made from high quality stainless steel and features a small loop to one end for removing white heads, and a flat side to the other for gently drawing out blackheads. Durable and easy to use, it will leave your skin looking spotless and clarified. Complete with a soft touch handle for easy, non-slip grip.

name: Geller 劳拉·盖勒沙滩哑光古铜色烘焙保湿粉饼
product_description:
Laura Geller 劳拉·盖勒沙滩哑光古铜色烘焙保湿粉饼让您拥有勉晒型棕色肌肤，这款便携装的古铜色粉饼可让您拥有自然的古铜色肌肤。
其轻盈的配方中蕴含有抗氧化剂和保湿成分，可轻松涂抹在肌肤上，不仅具有保湿作用，还能让肌肤拥有奢华的哑光颜色，以缔造休假后的光泽。
让肌肤拥有所期待的金色日晒肤色。 内置于带有镜子的便携包装中。

name: La La Tan - Regular
product_description:
Create the ultimate iconic glow with Madame La La Tan in Regular (200ml). The dynamic do-all self tan perfecting mousse has been formulated with Coco water sourced from Baja California (Mexico), recognised by Madame La La for it's skincare benefits. The tan works to hydrate the skin, help to firm, tone and improve elasticity whilst creating a gorgeous colour to your skin.
Designed to create the ultimate LA iconic glow, the tan develops in just 3 hours, making skin look flawless. The LA tan combines Coco water extract, Vitamins A & E, and Aloe Vera Extract and Green Tea Extract to enable the quick dry tan to instantly colour correct like a CC for the body, reducing the appearance of cellulite, lumps, bumps and uneven skin tones.
The LA tan lasts for 10 days and fades naturally so you don't have to worry about dreaded tanning patchiness. -SA

name: 3.5ml
product_description: 这款产品是DuWop系列产品中的最新产品，配方独特，使牙齿更白、更好看，还你丰满的双唇。蓝色丰唇毒液中的浅蓝色色调，会使您的笑容更灿烂。 成分：

name: Collections A02 Angled Foundation Brush
product_description:
Achieve a flawless complexion with the Spectrum Collections A02 Angled Foundation Brush; an ultra-soft makeup brush that combines a vibrant colour palette with expert hand-crafted design.
Applying foundation with ease, the makeup tool is crafted with an angled, densely-packed brush head, which is perfect for use with cream or liquid products. The unicorn-inspired brush offers a slightly heavier coverage than a buffing brush and can also be used for contouring; with the angled edge offering precision.
The foundation brush is an essential addition to any makeup bag, applying and blending product with ease for a professional looking finish.

name: Hot Mama Shadow and Blush
product_description:
使用 theBalm's Hot Mama Shadow & Blush，突出展示最佳形象。这是一款日晒粉红-桃红色调的 3 合 1 眼影、腮红和轮廓色笔。
这款多功能粉饼存放于配有镜子的方便、紧凑的盒子中，赋予脸颊和眼睑自然色泽，并散发金色光泽。 非常适合用于突出颧骨并提亮双眸。 - K.N

name: HD Complexion and Contouring Set
product_description:
Become a contour and highlight expert with the brushworks HD Complexion and Contouring Set; a three-piece sponge collection that assists in the flawless application of foundation and other base makeup. Each latex-free sponge arrives in a unique shape, which allows it to perform a specific task; from blending concealer around the eyes to applying liquid foundation. Expect a professional-looking, airbrushed finish.
Complexion Sponge
Achieve a flawless base with the Complexion Sponge; an expert tool for blending makeup. The latex-free sponge is effective with both liquid and powder products, simply dab across the face to blend makeup and reveal a seamless, natural-looking finish. The large surface can also be used to pat powder onto the face to reduce the appearance of shine.
Tear Drop Sponge
Experience an airbrushed finish with the Tear Drop Sponge. The larger areas of the sponge can be used to apply and blend liquid and cream foundation, whilst the pointed top of the applicator is ideal for navigating the contours of the face, such as the nose and eyes. The precision tip is able to target fine lines and creases to prevent a cakey appearance.
Micro Sponge
The Micro Sponge is the perfect tool for creating precise details with makeup. Its small surface area can be used to seamlessly blend contour product, in order to carve and define enviable cheekbones. The micro sponge’s small design also makes it perfect for applying and blending product at the contours of the face, such as concealing the under-eye area or applying foundation around the nose.

name: Volcanic Minerals Mascara - 01 黑色 （新款）
product_description: 此款黑色的 Volcanic Minerals Mascara为KORRES旗下的产品，可以完美的打造出引人注目、大胆的睫毛效果，同时不会带来任何沉重感。本款产品富含火山或物质、棉花提取物、向日葵聚合物和葡萄提取物，是增加眼部轮廓的超级产品，可以真正让您的眼睛绽放光彩。。 - E.D

name: Techniques Bold Metals三角粉底刷
product_description:
Real Techniques   Bold Metals三角粉底刷 ，打造完美底妆。 这款加权刷，配有极好的柔软刷毛，让人自如掌控，打造均匀完美妆容。
专门设计的毛刷，配有平边，可遮盖更大的脸部区域，斜角边尤其适用于涂刷眼部区域及狭窄的鼻子周围及发际线周围，可轻松地与肌肤融合。 E.N.

name: 爱潞儿假睫毛初学套装 020 号（自然）
product_description:
愛潞兒自然假睫毛020 號為您的天然睫毛增加中等濃密的睫毛，使稀疏的睫毛變密變長，更添一抹魅力。 此初始套裝精選一系列易用工具，極其適合初學者。套裝中含有機矽尖頭睫毛刷和橙木簽（以彎曲睫毛），並添加分離和粘合劑，方便您進行多種調整。 
 套裝包含： Naturalites專屬眼角睫毛，Naturalites 101，睫毛刷，粘合劑瓶（2個），橙木簽

name: for Men - 遮瑕膏 0.1 浅色 2.5ml
product_description:
这款霜状质地的滋润遮瑕液富含维生素E，能有效遮盖黑眼圈、眼袋和浮肿，以及皮疹和青春痘等肌肤小瑕疵。
有三种颜色可选：浅色、中等肤色和暗色。

name: London Powder Highlighter Quad 15g
product_description: Accentuate your favourite facial features with the Powder Highlighter Quad from Lottie London. Combining four shades that suit all skin tones, the blendable powders can be applied to the cheekbones, brow bones and cupid's bow to illuminate and strobe your complexion. Housed in a chic compact with a convenient mirror, you can create a smooth, defined and expertly sculpted make-up look with an ethereal glow.

name: 假睫毛031号（自然款）
product_description: 使用 Eylure 假睫毛031号（自然款），为天然睫毛更添丰盈，打造自然的眼妆。 - R.H

name: Correction Concentrate - Awakening Apricot
product_description:
Specifically blended for olive and deep skin tones, the Pixi Correction Concentrate in Awakening Apricot seeks to neutralise discolouration and combat dark tones.
Dense and creamy, the highly pigmented formula instantly conceals imperfections and perfectly blends for a natural, even looking coverage. Enriched with Rose Hip extract and vitamins, it helps regenerate elasticity levels and brighten skin for long term corrective benefits.

name: Lash-Pro 单独包装假睫毛（2根和3根独立包装）
product_description:
使用 Eylure单独包装假睫毛（有2根或3根独立包装）可创建一个定制的妆效
提供一系列单独包装的假睫毛，即2根和3根独立包装，这套假睫毛使您自我定制最佳的睫毛数量和厚度，塑造出理想的睫毛造型。 持久且方便适用。

name: 古铜色粉饼刷
product_description: EcoTools 古铜色粉底刷帮您打造自然效果的妆效，让您的肌肤散发日晒光泽。 圆头长毛的刷头可供顺畅轻松地涂抹古铜色蜜粉饼和散粉，以缔造容光焕发的妆效。 这款工具采用高度可持续的竹质刷柄、100％无伤害合成尼龙刷毛和可回收的铝箍。

name: Vintage Cosmetics Company Alice Bow Make-Up Headband
product_description:
The Vintage Cosmetics Company Alice Bow Make-Up Headband is a retro-inspired, polka dot headband that makes cleansing and makeup application a breeze.
Made from super soft fabric, the headband is perfect for keeping your face clear of hair during times of pampering, and features a repeat polka dot print with cute bow detail. Complete with an elasticated band for a secure fit.

name: Choice Resist Smoothing Primer Serum SPF30 30ml
product_description:
Discover a 3-in-1 essential with Paula's Choice Resist Smoothing Primer Serum SPF30; a lightweight formula that functions as a primer, serum and SPF in one convenient solution.
The silky formula glides over skin and its lightweight texture is able to instantly blur imperfections in order to achieve a flawless makeup application. Enriched with an array of plant-based antioxidants, the soothing primer shields skin from environmental damage, as well as sun damage due to SPF30.
The luxurious solution visibly perfects the complexion before makeup application, ensuring base makeup appears smooth and well-applied, as well as enhancing its longevity.

name: 爱潞儿眉粉盒 - 深棕色
product_description:
愛潞兒深棕色系眉粉有染色蠟和兩塊眉粉，令你的眉毛看起來更為立體。 
眉粉盒可打造三種不同的陰影效果，深色蠟、提亮蠟和棕色蠟。這三種顏色能令眉毛立體精緻。 -SA

colour: Black Velour, Brown Fusion, Mystic Grey
name: Paris Superliner Le Smoky (Various Shades)
product_description: Expertly define your eyes with the LOréal Paris Superliner Le Smoky; a precision eyeliner with excellent colour pay off. Featuring a dual-ended design with a built-in smudge tip, the pencil glides effortlessly across the lids to deliver rich, long-wearing colour. Leave untouched for sharp definition, or blend for a sultry, smokey eye make-up look.

name: productTitle zh Shiseido Full Lash Volume Mascara - 棕色"
product_description:
利用来自Shiseido的 丰满睫毛精华液获得丰盈的睫毛和浓密的眉毛。 其独特配方富含精氨酸以调理睫毛和眉毛，同时可提供水分，防止它们变得稀疏、短小、纤细。
从根部快速吸收，该轻盈精华液配有用来精确涂抹的短绒尖端涂抹器，可促进快速生长，打造更饱满健康的睫毛。 通过使用大量睫毛膏、接长和假睫毛修复受损睫毛。 E.N. 
60％的用户在4周后发现睫毛明显丰满。
80％的用户在4个月后发现睫毛明显更长、更密。

name: Hero Project Undo Bi-Phase Waterproof Eye Make-Up Eraser 160ml
product_description:
Eliminate all traces of makeup with the Undo Bi-Phase Waterproof Eye Make-Up Eraser from British beauty brand, The Hero Project. Suitable for all skin types, including those with sensitive skin, the cleansing formula removes makeup quickly and effectively. Ideal for those with a busy lifestyle.
Working gently on skin and eyelashes, the formula doesn’t require scrubbing or pulling in order to eradicate makeup traces. The innovative bi-phase miscellar liquid combines in one simple shake and boasts a handy push top dispenser. Requiring just a small amount, ‘Undo’ erases makeup instantly, including stubborn products like waterproof mascara.
Enriched with skin-loving, natural Chamomile and Cornflower, the softening formula is able to soothe and nourish eyelashes, as well as the sensitive skin at the delicate eye area. The remover is also formulated with Hyaluronic acid, which delivers hydration and conditions the hair and skin, without leaving behind a greasy residue.
Expect thoroughly cleansed eyes that are free from makeup, hydrated and comfortable.

name: Paris Color Riche Gold Obsession Lipstick CP37 - Pink Gold
product_description:
Illuminate your pout with the Pink Gold CP37 Color Riche Gold Obsession Lipstick from L'Oréal Paris. Offering rich colour and care, the Gold Obsession lipstick leaves lips defined and shimmering. The Pink Gold hue provides an iridescent veil of pink colour to lips.
Enriched with a lip-loving blend of Omega-3 Oils and Vitamin E, the lipstick not only delivers luscious colour, but protects lips from drying out. The lipstick utilises velvety pigments blended with a touch of pure gold, leaving lips illuminated with a metallic finish.

name: Black Lip Balm Mint and D. Duty Moisturizer 44ml
product_description:
Soothe, relieve and protect with Jack Black’s Lip Balm Mint and Double Duty Moisturiser; a skincare duo consisting of lip balm and face moisturiser. Both products ensure the lips and face are hydrated and guarded against sun exposure, windburn and temperature extremes. – E.W.
Intense Therapy Lip Balm (7g)
An emollient balm enriched with superior skin conditioners and antioxidants, helping to soothe and relieve dry, chapped, irritated lips. It contains a broad-spectrum sun protection with SPF 25, while guarding against windburn and temperature extremes. Natural mint helps freshen breath while shea butter, avocado oil and lanolin soften and condition lips.
Double Duty Face Moisturiser (44ml)
Double Duty Face Moisturiser SPF 20 with Blue Algae Extract and Sea Parsley features an emollient formula that visibly improves your skin's overall appearance, providing lasting hydration without oiliness or heaviness. With a blend of potent anti-oxidants and vitamins, it offers a broad-spectrum UVA and UVB protection to help shield skin from premature ageing due to sun exposure.

name: Volume Reveal Adjustable Volume Mascara - Black
product_description:
Boost and build volume without clumps using the Bourjois Volume Reveal Adjustable Volume Mascara in Black; a revolutionary formula that is ideal for adding volume for any occasion, and even whilst on-the-go.
Infused with new generation waxes, the creamy formula can be endlessly applied to lashes, without having to remove makeup first, or leaving lashes clumpy. The mascara arrives with an integrated wand applicator with neoprene bristles, which quickly and effortlessly glide along the lashes, coating each lash for a long-lasting, volumised effect.
The mascara is complete with a convenient 3x magnifying mirror adorned to the side, perfect for maximising volume with precision throughout the day.

name: Anti-Ageing Medium BB Cream (50ml)
product_description: 利用来自Garnier的 Anti-Ageing BB Cream 获得完美无瑕、焕发青春的肌肤。 结合矿物颜料与具有防皱功效的pro-xylane，该不油腻乳霜可对抗肤色不均，消除肌肤缺陷并恢复健康光泽，同时可提供高达24小时的保湿效果。 质地轻盈且可快速吸收，该美容护肤霜可轻松融入肌肤，减少细纹和皱纹的出现，而其SPF15成分可抵御环境侵害因素，令肌肤光滑细腻、柔软水嫩。 E.N.

name: Naturals 033号假睫毛
product_description: 使用 Eylure’s Naturals 033 号假睫毛使您的双眸更加深邃。 质地轻盈且可重复使用，有自然美感的假睫毛适合任何场合；弯翘的睫毛和加长的妆效突显了您眼睛的自然之美。 Perfect增加了您双眼的长度和丰满。 功效持久。

name: 完全充电的电磁 Mascara 13ml - Black
product_description:
PÜR Fully Charged Magnetic Mascara 是新一代抗衰老睫毛膏，利用电磁技术拉提和增加您睫毛的浓密度，使之更加有型。
这款产品的配方利用一种磁性聚合物基质的功效使每根睫毛与一个正电荷结合，以实现瞬间拉提、分离和定型，妆效持久。 创建戏剧性的睫毛妆效而不会结块，全部睫毛均将会获得最佳妆效。

name: Cosmetics The Pro Blender Sponge - Black
product_description: Achieve a flawless complexion with The Pro Blender Sponge from Contour Cosmetics. Expertly shaped to enhance makeup application, the soft sponge effortlessly blends foundation and contour cream to ensure an even look. Featuring a pointed tip for precise blending and a rounded edge for stippling larger areas across the face, you can expect a professional finish with this essential contouring tool for a smooth, sculpted and defined complexion.

name: 24小时防水眼线
product_description:
Chantecaille 24小时防水眼线 ，重塑双眼线条。 快干防水配方，可防止雨水和湿气，持久长效，防晕染，使双眼精致漂亮。
本品光滑、霜状质地，可轻松涂画整个眼线，展示完美妆容，使睫毛浓密漂亮。 内含的强化颜料，帮您展示多种妆容，既可使双眼自然清新，也可使晚妆持久亮泽。

这款Eylure质感153号假睫毛将突出双眸的天然美感。 这款假睫毛的毛发较长，边缘额外延伸，非常适合塑造纤长飘逸的感觉。
这款假睫毛可重复使用，适合所有眼形，是长期佩戴或偶尔佩戴的理想之选。 质地轻盈，佩戴舒适，自带睫毛胶与使用说明，让您轻松佩戴。 - L.M.

name: Push Up Angel Mascara 9.5ml - Very Black
product_description:
Enhance your eyes with Maybelline Push Up Angel Mascara in 'Very Black', a lifting mascara that adds volume and definition to the outer lashes for a sultry, winged effect.
The mascara’s exclusive push-up wing brush sweeps eyelashes to the side whilst lifting and plumping at the root to create an ethereal, winged lash look. The rich black formula holds the lifted wing look in place for long-lasting shape and definition.

colour: Golden 3, Golden 4, Neutral 1, Neutral 4, Rose 2, Rose 3, Rose 5
name: 同步 Skin 持久Foundation 粉底液SPF20 (30ml)（各种色调）
product_description:
使用 Shiseido同步Skin持久SPF20 Foundation粉底液  形成自然完美的肤色，它是一款无油粉底，可形成中等和可塑的覆盖层，获得自然的哑光妆效。
致力于使您的肤色均匀一致以获得淡雅和不易察觉的妆效，这款效果持久的粉底液轻松地滑过肌肤，采用先进的传感技术，响应并与您的肌肤状况同步，以获得精美完善的第二肌肤妆效。 帮助维持肌肤的透明度，同时防止油光、暗哑和皱褶，这款智能粉底富含SPF 20以免受紫外线侵害，并结合百里香和圣约翰草提取物来软化和保护肌肤。
您将会拥有完美无瑕的肤色而不会有很重的粉感。

colour: Coriander, Lapis, Opal, Patchouli, Peony, Sesame, Shell, Smokey Topaz, Titanium
product_description: Chantecaille眼影粉芯，为双眼添加闪亮色泽。此款眼影，丝般柔软，可轻松融入肌肤，无褶皱、持久长效。 内含人参，可调理眼皮，与肌肤融合性好、可塑性好。干式或湿式均可涂用，以增加强度金和色彩。

name: London Concealer with Built In Sponge Applicator 8ml (Various Shades)
product_description:
Achieve a smooth, flawless make-up base with the Lottie London Sponge Applicator Concealer; a vitamin-rich formula that expertly covers imperfections without caking or creasing.
Blending seamlessly onto skin, the buildable liquid concealer hides blemishes and dark spots to create a perfect canvas for foundation application. Available in a range of shades and complete with a built-in sponge for on-the-go touch-ups.

name: 遮瑕膏
product_description:
大胆展示您的肌肤，改善您的肌肤。RMS 遮瑕膏是一款轻盈的遮瑕膏，能够有效展现肌肤的自然光泽，遮掩瑕疵。
保湿配方使其既可用作粉底液，也可用作轻度遮瑕膏，能够轻松涂抹到肌肤，与您的肤色相适应，遮掩瑕疵和红血丝，同时还具有保湿和增强自然光泽度的作用。 其第二层肌肤妆效永远不会让您感觉厚重，能专业地缩小毛孔，以打造可供拍照的妆容。
让您拥有所期待的无可挑剔亮泽肌肤。

name: Slick Stick 眼线笔
product_description:
使用 Illamasqua 的 Slick Stick 眼线笔勾勒和突显您眼睛的轮廓；这款可伸缩的防水眼线笔，创造出高清晰度的化妆效果。
拥有柔滑、高品质的配方，这款乳膏状眼线笔轻松在眼内勾勒，提供强烈的色彩并有最佳的持久妆效。 其精准的笔尖使您可以完成无差错的勾勒，展示专业级妆容。

name: Enchanted After Dark False Eyelashes - Dark Forest
product_description: Achieve show-stopping results with the 'Dark Forest' Enchanted After Dark False Eyelashes from Eylure. Lightweight and reusable, the super soft false lashes are perfect for any occasion and eye shape; their shorter-length design adds delicate volume and definition to enhance natural beauty. Complete with adhesive glue and an instruction booklet for easy application.

name: Geller 劳拉·盖勒 Spackle 保湿妆前乳 59ml
product_description:
Laura Geller 劳拉·盖勒 Spackle® 保湿妆前乳同时具备打底、遮瑕和保湿功能，它将保湿成分与打底功能完美结合，为应用其他化妆品打造完美底妆。
这款妆前乳蕴含有丰富的维他命和纯天然舒缓成分，包括芦荟凝胶和古布阿苏果籽油，能轻松地涂抹到肌肤，具有打底和滋养功能，增强舒缓和遮瑕作用，延长定妆时间。
让肌肤感觉水润、舒适，为整天的定妆做好准备。

colour: Cameo, Coral Kiss, Diamond, Iridescent Mauve, Latte, Passion Fruit, Precious Petal, Red Door Red, Rosegold, Sunset, Sweet Pink
name: Arden Beautiful Colour唇彩( 6.5ml)
product_description:
用 Elizabeth Arden Beautiful Colour唇彩 (6.5ml) 令双唇光彩炫丽。 这款产品富含支持胶原蛋白生成丰唇的三胜肽，以及护理和锁住水分的芒果和牛油果油，您的嘴唇会看起来和感觉起来柔软水嫩。
柔软、桨叶形状涂抹器可以涂抹适量的唇彩，而内置的镜子方便在路上可随意涂抹。

使用说明：

使用涂抹器将唇彩滑过嘴唇。

name: Bees Sedona Sands Lip Crayon
product_description: 这款化妆品是引领潮流的必备品。 使用 Burt's Bees 100% 纯天然唇线笔快速获得丰满的双唇，实现持久的亚光色。该产品富含牛油果油、肯迪油和荷荷巴油。 其柔软、乳状质地使得产品可顺畅地滑动；笔尖令涂抹很方便，不会造成锐化混乱。 提供顺滑和保护作用，实现完美双唇。 E.N.

name: Techniques Bold Metals椭圆形眼影刷
product_description: Real Techniques  Bold Metals椭圆形眼影刷，可用于涂抹乳膏或粉状化妆品，软化涂抹在眼皮上的眼影。 这款加权刷配有超级柔软的人造刷毛和丰满圆头，与肌肤能完美融合，可轻松涂粉，打造出专业的眼影效果。 清洗后不褪色。 E.N.

name: HD Miracle Silicone Oval Sponge - Pink
product_description:
Achieve a flawless makeup finish in no time at all with the brushworks HD Miracle Silicone Oval Sponge in 'Pink', a revolutionary makeup applicator designed to speed up your daily makeup routine.
Ultra-hygienic and allergy free, the innovative makeup sponge is coated with a unique ultra-smooth (TPU) layer to minimise product wastage; it won't absorb your makeup and allows you to save more than half the amount of product compared to regular brushes and sponges. Long-lasting and easy to clean, the silicone sponge will expertly apply and blend your foundation with seamless, airbrushed results; simply spread using a circular motion and dab lightly to blend away lines. 
Skin looks smooth and flawless.
Tip: Fold the Sponge around your finger to improve control and coverage in hard to reach areas.

name: 色号IVORY
product_description:
Omorovicza礦物遮瑕膏可塑造完美立體感，還原光澤剔透的無暇美肌。質地清爽細膩，此款遮瑕膏可提亮面部疲憊黯淡區域，讓肌膚全天保持在最佳狀態，有效遮蓋黑眼圈、色斑、粉刺和疤痕。富含維他命C和E，此款礦物遮瑕膏不僅完美遮瑕，還可均勻膚色，同時促進膠原蛋白的生成，恢復肌膚新生光彩，讓臉部肌膚更顯年輕有活力，散發自然光澤。 
 使用方法：

name: Master Smoky眼线笔（各种色调）
product_description: Maybelline Master Smoky眼线笔是打造完美双眼的化妆必备品。 该眼影采用双端设计，具有柔软滑腻的眼线笔，为眼睑提供超饱和色素的色彩，同时创新涂抹工具可轻松进行混合。 适合白天和夜晚展现魅力，该眼影可长久保持，并允许您根据需要塑造来自然或引人注目的妆效。 E.N.

name: London Conceal It Brush
product_description: 使用Lottie London's Conceal It BrushPerfect肤色，这是一款超柔软，有角度，刷毛有弧度的遮瑕刷子。 刷子能够Perfect遮挡痘痘和黑眼圈，适量沾取的化妆品令肌肤完美无瑕。 使用带角度的刷头大面积遮挡面部各个角落的瑕疵，如眼睛底下，鼻翼以及脸颊。 - K.N

name: Cosmetics Contour Compact - Contour Two
product_description: Sculpt your features like a pro with the Contour Cosmetics Contour Compact in Contour Two. Combining six varied shades of smooth cream formulas, the universal contour palette offers three highlighters with yellow, pink and neutral undertones and two cool, dark shades that perfectly suit a range of skin tones from pale to dark. Each colour blends effortlessly to add definition and shape to your facial structure, leaving you with perfectly chiselled cheekbones and a flawless complexion. Presented in a portable compact for on-the-go applications and touch ups!

name: Vanilla Bean Lip Balm 4.3g
product_description:
Envelop lips in a heavenly scent using the Hurraw! Vanilla Bean Lip Balm; an ultra-hydrating formula that cares for skin using premium organic, vegan and raw ingredients.
Infused with tiny Vanilla Beans, the balm lends lips a sweet and dreamy scent that smells good enough to eat. The creamy formula is also fortified with Candellia Wax, Coconut Oil and Cocoa Seed Butter, which ensure lips are drenched in a veil of long-lasting moisture.
Combining nourishing hydration and a heavenly aroma, the lip balm is sure to become a skincare essential.

name: 魅力矿物眼影盒 - 银色星空 (5.76g)
product_description:
Pixi 魅力礦物眼影盒銀色星空眼影有六款奢華寶石色，不論你出席哪種場合，總有一款適用。本品超級容易使用，而且特別服帖。內含一塊兩頭用上妝海綿，有它在手，上妝不亂。 
閃亮眼影採用霜狀配方，能很好地吸附於皮膚，讓你的妝容全天清爽！

name: - BronzeBeam (1.2g)
product_description:
这款漂亮的Pixi无限丝滑眼线笔，助您"睛"彩瞬间现。 一款持久、防水的眼线笔，效果等同于液体眼线笔，且更易使用。
不晕染或不脱妆的配方意味着您整天都会完美无瑕。 这款创新、智能的眼线笔无需润饰。

colour: Candy Pink, Cherry Almond, Cherry Sorbet, Chili Spice, Fucshia Fever, Peach Buttercream
name: Geller 劳拉·盖勒魅惑液体唇膏
product_description:
Laura Geller 劳拉·盖勒魅惑液体唇膏为您的双唇增添流行色彩，它是一款高色素的唇膏，可实现持久定妆，让您尽享全面妆效。
这款不粘着的唇膏蕴含有维他命 E 和独特质地的啫喱，其液体配方可使其轻松涂抹在唇部，唇膏干爽后具有轻盈的半哑光效果，而不会带给肌肤干燥或不舒适的感觉。
让您拥有梦寐以求的带有光泽的健康双唇。

name: Cosmetics Tinted Brow Gel - Dark Brown
product_description:
Expertly define your eyebrows with the Mellow Cosmetics Tinted Brow Gel; a lightweight, non-sticky formula that allows you to create enviable arches with minimal effort.
Featuring a spoolie brush applicator, the brow gel enhances shape and tames unruly hairs, whilst helping to fill in sparse brows with natural, hair-like colour and a long-wearing finish. Expect perfectly groomed, tinted brows that last.

name: Luminizing Satin Eye Color Trio GR412 - Lido 3g
product_description: Shiseido Luminizing Satin Eye Color Trio的Lido系列让您双眼成为全场瞩目的焦点。 提供三款绝美眼影，随附一支眼影刷和一支海绵头眼影棒，让您随时随地轻松上妆。 质地丝般柔滑，完美亲附眼皮，与肤色无缺融合，打造专业妆容。

colour: Low Key, Power Trip, See Thru, Teddy, Tutu, Vamp
name: On Point Lip Liner 25g (Various Shades)
product_description:
Prime, prep and define your lips with PÜR On Point Lip Liner, a long-wearing lip pencil that helps prolong the wear of other lip colours.
Perfect worn alone or for priming lips, the liner glides effortlessly across the lips, laying the perfect foundation for subsequent colour application; it helps lock colour in place and prevent bleeding and feathering for a long-lasting, flawless makeup look.
Infused with a plumping peptide, it will create the appearance of a fuller pout whilst smoothing and perfecting the lips for youthful, supple results.

name: Luminizing Satin Eye Color Trio YE406 - Tropicalia 3g
product_description: The Shiseido Luminizing Satin Eye Color Trio in Tropicalia will allow you to enhance your eyes with dazzling colour. Featuring three stunning eyeshadows which are easy to apply and blend using the included brush and sponge applicator, the eyeshadow palette will allow you to create both subtle and dramatic looks depending on your mood. - L.M.

name: Pore Smoothing Corrector (13ml)
product_description: 助您消除油光，平滑肤色。 这款修复产品不会引起粉刺且已通过皮肤科临床试验，能消除油光和多余油脂，打造完美哑光基底。 这款遮瑕膏质地丝般柔滑，能抹平毛孔，令肤色均匀有条理；添加的双效完美粉末能减少细纹；吸油粉末则能赋予肌肤持久的哑光质感，令人艳羡。 - K.N.

name: Arden Pure Finish Mineral Makeup Brush
product_description:
这款超柔软、有角度的 Face Powder Brush 由合成毛发制作而成，确保了最高的纯净度。 本品非常适用于与所有化妆粉配合使用，提供恰到好处的用量并形成均匀的肤色；紧凑的包装还包括一把迷你折叠式面刷。
Face Powder Brush 是专为 Elizabeth Arden Pure Finish Mineral Powder Foundation SPF20 而设计，但也可与任何粉饼、散粉或烫金粉配合使用，以确保完美、专业的涂抹。 刷子的倾角符合面部轮廓，便于全面涂抹并实现均匀的肤色。 刷子采用合成毛发制作而成，确保最高纯净度和柔软度；还配备了迷你折叠面刷，可折叠起来放入紧凑的包装中。

name: Portable Lip Brush
product_description: Shiseido Portable Lip Brush身材小巧，可随包携带，随时随地还原完美唇彩。 这款化妆刷配有柔软的天然刷毛，能精确地勾画唇线、涂抹唇彩，是所有钟爱口红女性的必备之物。 - L.M.

name: Absolu Rouge La Base Lipstick - 00
product_description:
Hydrate and protect the lips with the Lancôme Absolu Rouge La Base Lipstick; a creamy lip base that offers long lasting hydration and an invisible finish.
One sweep of the lipstick envelops the pout in a veil of essential moisture. Infused with Pro-Xylane™, the lip base instantly replenishes hydration levels, leaving lips smooth, calm and comfortable. Wear alone for a natural, healthy look or pair with your favourite lipstick for additional moisture.

name: Camo 笔式遮瑕膏 - 中粗
product_description:
可用 Menaji Camo 笔式遮瑕膏（中粗）遮盖瑕疵。 这种遮瑕膏以油为主要成分，极不显眼，可遮蔽斑点、肿块和一般瑕疵，并且富含 SPF8 防晒成分，可防止皮肤受到有害阳光的侵害。
本品特为应对产油量本来就较大的男士皮肤而配制，不含香水，致敏性低，从而使其甚至适合最敏感的面部皮肤。

使用说明：

name: Le Chrome 豪华双色眼影：马拉喀什花园
product_description:
Chantecaille Le Chrome 豪华双色眼影，内含两种高色素金属眼影，尤其适用于打造各种烟熏眼妆，使眼睛看起来更生动明艳。
超级柔软、持久长效，妆效光滑；无折痕，融合性超好。涂刷干眼影，妆容纯粹闪亮；涂刷湿眼影，可加深色调，打造液态金属妆效。 装在便捷的别致小盒中，小盒带有化妆镜和两涂刷装置。尤其适用于随时随地需要补妆者。
色调： 灯笼 （暖金黄色）和番红花 （金薰衣草色）

colour: Evening Glow, Summer Twilight, Sunny Day
name: Bees 唇彩
product_description: 让 Burt's Bees 唇彩为您的双唇增添迷人光泽和色彩。 特别添加深层滋润的精油，蕴含丰富的营养，100％采用天然成分。 唇彩的闪亮光泽令双唇带有珠光色彩和闪亮光泽。 - K.R

name: Cosmetics完美Concealer棒（各种色调）
product_description:
使用自锐化化妆笔 Amazing Cosmetics 完美 Concealer 棒，可以获得一个光滑而完美的肤色，实现自然的而持久的妆效。
该款遮瑕棒可遮盖缺陷、黑眼圈、瑕疵和肤色不均，同时使您最喜爱的面部特征，包括颧骨、鼻子和下巴的弧线，更加显眼和轮廓分明。它的末端有一个精确定妆的尖头，使其可以温和而不费力地滑行。 可塑、可混合，它可以单独使用或被其他化妆品覆盖以获得一个完美的妆效。

name: Arden Ceramide Lash Extending Treatment Mascara (7ml)
product_description:
Maximise your lashes with Elizabeth Arden's Ceramide Lash Extending Treatment Mascara, a conditioning and lengthening mascara that will extend and fortify the look of your eyelashes.
Infused with the brand's Ceramide Triple Complex (comprising Ceramides 1, 3 and 6), and conditioning ingredient, Keravis™, the vitamin-rich formula coats every lash to lengthen, separate and define whilst revitalising and nourishing lashes. Its lash-loving formula helps to reinforce and restore lashes natural protective barrier to leave them looking supple and healthy. Making eyelashes appear longer and fuller, the mascara will give you a wide-eyed appearance without smudging, clumping or flaking.

name: Nature Thickening睫毛膏 8ml - 各种色调
product_description: Thickening Mascara （来自 Living Nature  品牌）让您获得甜美的睫毛。 以埃洛石强化，无香料配方使睫毛增加厚度而无结块，同时特别设计的涂抹棒从根部精心描画每根睫毛，获得极致的效果和轮廓。 适用于敏感型肌肤。 容易除去。

name: Certified Organic Lip Tint
product_description:
Add a flush of natural-looking colour to your lips with INIKA Certified Organic Lip Tint, a vegan lip balm infused with Coconut Oil and Shea Butter to nourish and condition your pout.

Delivering a wash of sheer colour, the lip tint glides effortlessly over lips, hydrating and protecting to leave lips looking soft, supple and moisturised with a splash of kissable colour.

Certified organic, vegan, cruelty-Free and halal.

colour: Bare Kiss 10, Black Cherry 22, Candy Girl 02, Cherry Up! 17, Coral Glaze 13, Flirty Fuchsia 05, Grape Affair 21, Just Peachy 14, Natural Blush 09, Nude Fizz 08, Peach Bliss 11, Pink Berry Burst 01, Pink Lemonade 07, Plum Perfect 20, Poppy Pout 16, Red Door Crush 15, Red Velvet 18, Rose Macaroon 03, Strawberry Sorbet 06, Tangerine Dream 12
name: Arden Gelato Plush-Up Lipstick 3.5g (Various Shades)
product_description:
Add a slick of moisturising colour to your lips with Elizabeth Arden Gelato Plush-Up Lipstick, a buttery smooth lip colour that delivers a melting, gelato-like texture onto lips.
Imparting a sheer wash of colour with a glossy finish, the lipstick feels cooling on application, and has a plumping effect to leave lips looking luscious, contoured and defined.

name: Stockholm BB Natural Beauty Balm 7.5ml
product_description:
利用 FACE Stockholm的BB Natural Beauty Balm 提供底霜、遮掩和保护功效。 天鹅绒般的乳霜配方，融入肌肤，帮助滋润保湿，并带来均匀、干净的肤色。 该BB霜可以单独作为轻薄隔离使用或作为打底霜使用，以提高粉底的持久效力。
Titanium和氧化锌提供UVA/UVB防晒功能，而维生素E提供富含抗氧化剂的滋润功效。 – E.W.

name: & Berry H2Ohhh! Lip Gloss
product_description:
Achieve a gorgeous pout with Lord & Berry H20hhh! Lip Gloss. Rich and creamy, the emollient-rich formula produces an irresistible 3D shine that makes lips look full and defined. It can also be used over the top of lipstick for a high-impact, glossy shine that further enhances the colour. Paraben free, Lord & Berry H20hhh! Lip Gloss plumps lips for the added benefit of reducing the appearance of wrinkles around the mouth area.
Use the wand to apply the gloss the your lips, layering up the colour depending how much shine you want to achieve.

name: LONDON Trout Pout Lippy (7ml)
product_description:
Add sumptuous colour to your pout with the butter LONDON Lippy Liquid; a long-wearing formula that combines the pigment of a lipstick with the shine of a gloss.
Infused with Shea Butter and antioxidant Vitamin E, the liquid lipstick glides on effortlessly to moisturise and protect lips, whilst delivering non-drying colour with an ultra-glossy finish. Expect smooth, luscious lips that are subtly scented with delicious notes of Vanilla.
theBalm  怀特先生（现在）眼线笔，妆效持久、无污迹。 本款眼线笔内置卷笔刀、质感绸缎般光滑，可轻松上妆，巧妙地重塑双眼，为双眼增添精美色彩，根据您的终极需求，打造自然清新的妆容，或生动夸张的妆容。 E.N.

name: BRETON Cream to Powder Foundation 17g (Various Shades)
product_description:
Create a flawless canvas with Christian BRETON Cream to Powder Foundation, a solid formula that is creamy to touch and transforms into a lightweight powder on contact with skin.
Delivering excellent coverage with a natural-looking finish, the fine and creamy foundation expertly smoothens the look of skin whilst camouflaging imperfections to lend the complexion a more even, flawless appearance. Lightweight on skin, it won't feel like a mask and is infused with pigments to lend you a perfected canvas.

colour: Anais, Angel, Bronze, Natural, Plum, Strass
name: BRETON Lip Gloss 3.5ml (Various Shades)
product_description:
Add instant shine and protection to your lips with Christian BRETON Lip Gloss, a luscious lip formula that combines colour with care to leave lips looking bright and feeling comfortable.
Gliding effortlessly onto lips with a lightweight feel, the gloss delivers a shock of vibrant colour and a host of nourishing active ingredients that leave lips feeling soft, plumped and supple. Imparting long-lasting shine, the lip colour will ensure lips look vivid and healthy.

name: Cosmetics Double Agent Concealing Balm Kit - 3N
product_description:
The Cargo Cosmetics Double Agent Concealing Balm Kit features two fantastic products, a cream and a powder concealer, which help to hide any imperfections whilst working to highlight your skin. The powerful yet gentle formula consists of sweet almond oil which works specifically to target under eye circles, marula oil and tea seed oil which improve the skin’s elasticity and maintain the skin´s moisture levels. 
Enriched with butters, vitamins and pigments, the formula leaves the skin nourished and hydrated. Suitable for all skin types, your complexion will be left with a natural, flawless, professional and lightweight coverage. A.B.
The balm can be easily blended into the skin thanks to the creamy texture. Warm the balm up using your fingertips and apply to the necessary areas. 
The powder helps to set your look ensuring that you have a full coverage throughout the day.
Use the small applicator with the powder to set.

name: 仙尘 （银色）
product_description:
Pixi仙尘是一款彩色眼影粉。 Pixi 是一系列呵护肌肤的产品，内含植物萃取物及有益成分，让您在数分钟内打造完美无瑕的妆效。 天然云母颜料专门配制，富含珍珠粉，使双眼漂亮迷人，炯炯有神。 配有眼影刷及涂覆装置，使涂抹更顺畅、更精准。 E.N. 
使用方法：用眼影刷涂抹，擦掉多余的眼影粉。 晕染眼影粉，令妆容更富立体感。

name: Stockholm染色Brow Fix 3ml
product_description:
利用 FACE Stockholm的Brow Fix 修眉毛，这是一种染色、基于凝胶的配方，用于控制眉毛。
提供卓越固定能力而无剥落危险，眉毛凝胶有助于保持眉毛固定，并配有便于使用的卷筒刷。 塑造、驾驭并定型您的完美眉毛。 - K.N.

name: Definition Eyeshadow Palette in Foxy
product_description:
HD Brows的Foxy系列眼影盘提供了专为搭配暗金色到中度棕色秀发而设计的魅惑眼影，完美打造惊艳双眸。 这组高色度眼影粉包含由浅到深的5种颜色，兼有哑光和绸亮两种质感，带给您变幻多姿的眼妆体验。 - K.R
 HD Brows Eyeshadow Palette in Foxy包含以下颜色：- 绸亮质感：松露色- 绸亮质感：古铜色- 哑光质感：蜂蜜色- 绸亮质感：金黄色- 哑光质感：裸色

name: Bronzing Pencil in Golden Sugar/Earth
product_description:
Achieve a sun-kissed, luminous complexion with the NUDESTIX Bronzing Pencil. With a dual-ended design, the blendable pencil delivers a long-wearing, bronzed look and allows you to accentuate your favourite facial features for a refined, sculpted appearance.
Its lightweight, waterproof formula effortlessly glides onto skin and dries to a silky powder so you can contour and highlight for a natural-looking, professional finish every time. Housed in a collectable tin with integrated mirror and handy sharpener. E.N.

name: W Color Mascara SS 02
product_description: Make sure you stand out! RMK’s W Color Mascara SS 02 in Brown & Orange will forever change the way you add volume to your eyelashes. This double-headed mascara has two different shades, brown for your upper lashes and orange for the bottom lashes. This allows for a colorful contradiction that exudes both brightness and volume. The bristles will help to boost length and define even the tiniest of lashes. – N.P.

name: / CC霜刷
product_description:
Japonesque便携式BB / CC霜刷  ，打造完美无瑕的妆容。是一款多功能的化妆刷设有可调节手柄 ，帮您自选纤维密度。
采用天然合成毛发，向您展示绝美妆效。本款便携式刷子为轻柔球形顶，尤其适用于涂刷BB霜和CC霜，展示完美无瑕的妆容。柔软的纤维刷毛可轻松涂刷BB霜和CC霜，令妆容纯粹自然。
伸缩手柄使纤维更加密集。 配有保护盖。

name: Dollar Brows 60秒修眉套件
product_description:
Billion Dollar Brows 60秒修眉套件，花最短的时间，修出最美的眉毛。 包含一把高性能刷子和如丝般柔滑的眉粉。展示漂亮妆容。
 眉刷 
完美精心修剪眉毛的必备化妆工具之一。 采用了双端设计，倾斜的刷头专门设计而成，刷毛可轻松沾取眉粉，描画出柔软干净的线条；螺旋状眉刷端可巧妙修整眉毛，保持眉形。
 眉粉（灰褐色） 
此款眉粉操作简单，如天鹅绒般丝滑，可填补眉毛，同时使眉形更自然，脸型更漂亮。 本款精细的眉粉具有完美的肌肤贴合性及自然的眉色，可重塑眉毛，使之发出自然光泽，展示迷人的拱形。

name: LONDON Plush Rush Lipstick - Buzzed
product_description:
Treat your lips to the moisturising and plumping properties of butter LONDON Plush Rush Lipstick, a long-wearing, creamy lipstick that delivers a shock of colour whilst dousing lips in essential moisture.
Accentuating the natural curves of your pout, the luscious formula is enriched with a Phyto-Endorphin Complex to boost your mood, and a Plumping Complex to help increase the appearance of fullness; lips look smoother, firmer and more defined. Standing the test of time, the lipstick withstands feathering and bleeding, so your pout looks irresistably kissable, for longer.

name: Cosmetics Double Agent Concealing Balm Kit - 1C
product_description:
The Cargo Cosmetics Double Agent Concealing Balm Kit features two fantastic products, a cream and a powder concealer, which help to hide any imperfections whilst working to highlight your skin. The powerful yet gentle formula consists of sweet almond oil which works specifically to target under eye circles, marula oil and tea seed oil which improve the skin’s elasticity and maintain the skin´s moisture levels. 
Enriched with butters, vitamins and pigments, the formula leaves the skin nourished and hydrated. Suitable for all skin types, your complexion will be left with a natural, flawless, professional and lightweight coverage. A.B.
The balm can be easily blended into the skin thanks to the creamy texture. Warm the balm up using your fingertips and apply to the necessary areas. 
The powder helps to set your look ensuring that you have a full coverage throughout the day.
Use the small applicator with the powder to set.

name: Definition Contour Brush
product_description:
Achieve a professional contoured makeup look with the High Definition Contour Brush, a softly angled makeup brush with natural bristles for soft, even application.
