Perfect for sculpting the complexion with bronzer and powder products, its soft tilt hugs the contour of your cheeks to ensure a professional finish, and blends effortlessly and evenly with smooth colour distribution.
Cruelty-free.

name: LONDON Plush Rush Lip Liner - Red Hot
product_description:
Line and define your lips with butter LONDON Plush Rush Lip Liner, a water resistant lip formula that works to define and plump the appearance of your pout.
Infused with filling spheres that help to add volume to lips and reduce the appearance of wrinkles, the lip liner applies effortlessly, and blends seamlessly with its built-in brush. Delivering true colour that never bleeds or feathers, the lip liner can be worn alone, or layered beneath your favourite lipstick for maximum colour and staying power.

name: LONDON Plush Rush Lip Gloss - In Love
product_description:
Enhance the look of your pout with butter LONDON Plush Rush Lip Gloss, a plumping lip formula that works to add a slick of colour to your lips whilst creating a fuller appearance.
Delivering high shine colour, the lip gloss glides effortlessly across lips with a cushion like feel, and expertly stimulates hyaluronic synthesis to enhance your natural lip shape. Lips appear fuller, smoother and plumper. Leaving lips with a lasting tingling sensation, the lip gloss will boost lips, your mood and your confidence.

name: LONDON Plush Rush Lip Liner - Sizzle Pink
product_description:
Line and define your lips with butter LONDON Plush Rush Lip Liner, a water resistant lip formula that works to define and plump the appearance of your pout.
Infused with filling spheres that help to add volume to lips and reduce the appearance of wrinkles, the lip liner applies effortlessly, and blends seamlessly with its built-in brush. Delivering true colour that never bleeds or feathers, the lip liner can be worn alone, or layered beneath your favourite lipstick for maximum colour and staying power.

name: LONDON Plush Rush Lipstick - Impulsive
product_description:
Treat your lips to the moisturising and plumping properties of butter LONDON Plush Rush Lipstick, a long-wearing, creamy lipstick that delivers a shock of colour whilst dousing lips in essential moisture.
Accentuating the natural curves of your pout, the luscious formula is enriched with a Phyto-Endorphin Complex to boost your mood, and a Plumping Complex to help increase the appearance of fullness; lips look smoother, firmer and more defined. Standing the test of time, the lipstick withstands feathering and bleeding, so your pout looks irresistably kissable, for longer.

name: Compulsive Cosmetics Angle Brush #009
product_description:
Define your eyes with the Angle Brush #009 from Obsessive Compulsive Cosmetics. Crafted from sustainable materials and bonded with vegan-sourced adhesive, the brush features a weighted, nickel-plated ferrule for superior control.
With an angled brush head and soft, synthetic nylon and taklon fibres, the professional brush can be used in the crease, corners or across the entire lid to create depth and definition. Ideal for applying brow product, eyeliner or lip liner with expert results.

name: Compulsive Cosmetics Tapered Blending Brush #004
product_description: Expertly define your eyes with the Tapered Blending Brush #004 from Obsessive Compulsive Cosmetics. Crafted from sustainable materials and bonded with vegan-sourced adhesive, the weighted brush features soft nylon and taklon bristles that effortlessly apply and blend eyeshadows into the crease. Perfect for contouring, or creating sultry, smoky make-up looks.

name: Sculpting Pencil in Medium/Deep
product_description: Accentuate your favourite facial features with the NUDESTIX Sculpting Pencil. With a dual-ended design, the pencil delivers long-lasting coverage and allows you to highlight and contour for a refined, smoother complexion. Its skin-nourishing formula is infused with moisturising shea butter and vitamin E, whilst its matte cream texture can be blended easily for a natural finish. Housed in a collectable tin with integrated mirror and handy sharpener. E.N.

name: 5-in-1 BB Cream Eyeshadow Shade Extension - Rich Camel
product_description:
The bareMinerals 5-in-1 BB Cream Eyeshadow is the next generation of eyeshadow; offering a powerful combination of makeup and skincare for truly flawless results.
The featherlite hybrid formula glides onto the lid with a rich, creamy colour coverage, working to smooth the look of fine lines and discolouration while priming skin to create the perfect base that doesn’t crease or smudge for optimum adherence and staying power.
With the addition of brightening actives and mineral-based SPF 15 filters, the eyeshadow is easily applied with the paddle applicator and can be blended and layered for the desired effect. Wear alone or underneath your favourite eyeshadows for up to 12 hours wear.

name: Certified Organic Lipliner - Safari
product_description: 使用 INIKA 经认证的 Organic Lipliner，改善双唇外形。 采用压制植物蜡和油的共混物配制而成，并结合天然矿物颜料，打造妆效持久的唇线笔。 其轻盈的乳脂状褐色色调可轻松融入双唇，实现便捷、均匀的涂抹，延长口红的保持时间，且不会羽化或出血。

name: Color Lip Gloss - 04 Basic Rose
product_description:
Drench your lips in a lustrous sheen with the RMK Color Lip Gloss in 'Basic Rose'.
Combining the vibrant colour of a lipstick with the clarity of a lip Gloss, the colour glides effortlessly over lips with its square-shaped applicator, and delivers a veil of sheer yet brilliant colour. Its host of moisturising ingredients, including Shea Butter, Rosehip Oil keep lips feeling hydrated and comfortable.

name: Color Lip Gloss - 09 Orange Cinnamon
product_description:
Drench your lips in a lustrous sheen with the RMK Color Lip Gloss in 'Orange Cinnamon'.
Combining the vibrant colour of a lipstick with the clarity of a lip Gloss, the colour glides effortlessly over lips with its square-shaped applicator, and delivers a veil of sheer yet brilliant colour. Its host of moisturising ingredients, including Shea Butter, Rosehip Oil keep lips feeling hydrated and comfortable.

name: LONDON Plush Rush Lip Gloss - Dance Party
product_description:
Enhance the look of your pout with butter LONDON Plush Rush Lip Gloss, a plumping lip formula that works to add a slick of colour to your lips whilst creating a fuller appearance.
Delivering high shine colour, the lip gloss glides effortlessly across lips with a cushion like feel, and expertly stimulates hyaluronic synthesis to enhance your natural lip shape. Lips appear fuller, smoother and plumper. Leaving lips with a lasting tingling sensation, the lip gloss will boost lips, your mood and your confidence.

name: Color Lip Gloss - 11 Golden Nude
product_description:
Drench your lips in a lustrous sheen with the RMK Color Lip Gloss in 'Golden Nude'.
Combining the vibrant colour of a lipstick with the clarity of a lip Gloss, the colour glides effortlessly over lips with its square-shaped applicator, and delivers a veil of sheer yet brilliant colour. Its host of moisturising ingredients, including Shea Butter, Rosehip Oil keep lips feeling hydrated and comfortable.

name: Lip Lacquer - Casablanca (4)
product_description:
Douse your lips in rich, moisturising colour with the ModelCo Lip Lacquer in 'Casablanca', a highly pigmented lip gloss that delivers a slick of vivid, long-wearing colour.
Gliding effortlessly onto lips with its wand applicator, the non-sticky gloss imparts a rich colour tint whilst intensely hydrating to keep lips feeling comfortable and luscious all day.

name: Shine Lip Gloss - Tangerine
product_description:
Enhance your lips with the ModelCo Shine Lip Gloss in 'Tangerine', a shimmering, high shine lip lacquer that delivers a shock of beautifully reflective colour with long-lasting finish.
Gliding effortlessly onto lips with its wand applicator, the non-sticky gloss imparts a soft colour tint and features an in-built mirror for flawless, on-the-go applications . Lips looks luscious and hydrated.

name: Instant Brows Brow Pencil - Light to Medium
product_description:
Expertly frame your face with ModelCo's Instant Brows Brow Pencil in 'Light to Medium', a dual-ended eyebrow pencil with built-in spoolie brush.
Instantly filling gaps in your brows with a soft and natural finish, the pencil features a fine tip for precision application, and a unique, buildable wax formula that glides effortlessly through the brows, defining, filling and enhancing to help shape and contour your face. Expect beautifully defined and groomed brows with a natural finish. Long-wearing.

name: LONDON Lippy Liquid - Ruby Murray
product_description:
Add sumptuous colour to your pout with the butter LONDON Lippy Liquid; a long-wearing formula that combines the pigment of a lipstick with the shine of a gloss.
Infused with Shea Butter and antioxidant Vitamin E, the liquid lipstick glides on effortlessly to moisturise and protect lips, whilst delivering non-drying colour with an ultra-glossy finish. Expect smooth, luscious lips that are subtly scented with delicious notes of Vanilla.

name: LONDON BlushClutch Palette - Just Darling
product_description:
Add a flush of colour to your complexion with the butter LONDON BlushClutch Palette in 'Just Darling'. Housed in a mirrored compact, the palette combines three cool-toned shades of blusher and a white gold highlighter pen for a subtle strobe of light.
Infused with Ruby Powder and Pepper Tree Extract, the creamy, primer-infused powders deliver buildable, natural-looking colour with a long-wearing, lit-from-within finish. For a soft glow, apply the highlighter pen to the brow bones, bridge of the nose and centre of your lips for a three-dimensional, contoured make-up look.
'Magnolia' - dusty rose sheen
'Petal' - soft matte nude
'Orchid' - deep mauve shimmer

name: 高光混合粉
product_description:
RMS 推出混合粉；它是一款奢华的玫瑰金色高光粉，能够与任何唇、脸颊或眼妆产品无缝晕染，让您的肌肤拥有珠光般的光泽。
这款高光粉可有效突出您喜欢的特征，既可用在面部，也可用在身体的肌肤，以打造专业级的光亮妆效，而其丝滑的质地可让您进行无缝涂抹，以拥有"从肌肤内部亮泽"的妆效。

name: Face Pop Eyes - Natural Brown
product_description:
RMK Face Pop Eyes in 'Natural Brown' is a limited edition eyeshadow duo that has been specially curated in celebration of the brand's twentieth birthday.
Each striking eyeshadow (pink and neutral) delivers a shimmering finish that blends effortlessly on the lid. Wear each colour individually or blend together to create a bold or subtle makeup finish. Complete with a dual-ended sponge tip applicator.

name: Vintage Cosmetics Company Toenail Clippers - Floral
product_description:
Prep your nails for the perfect pedicure with The Vintage Cosmetics Company Toenail Clippers.
Made from durable stainless steel with a vintage-inspired floral design, the clippers have been specially designed to tackle thick toenails and are sturdy and sharp for precise results. Easy to use.

name: Vintage Cosmetics Company Airbrush Make-Up Brush Set
product_description:
The Vintage Cosmetics Company Airbrush Make-Up Brush Set combines a trio of face brushes to help you achieve a flawless makeup base. Each brush is fitted with soft, synthetic bristles and an aluminium ferrule for a long-lasting, rust-free life. Complete with wooden handles. Housed in vintage-patterned packaging.
Foundation Brush
A flat, slightly tapered brush that expertly applies liquid foundation with flawless results. The synthetic bristles seamlessly blend product into skin, promoting a smooth and even toned complexion.
Concealer Brush
A small brush for precision and targeted application. Its perfectly formed brush head is perfect for dabbing concealer onto smaller areas of the face, helping to camouflage under eye circles, blemishes and redness.
Powder Brush
A super soft brush for applying loose powder or mineral makeup. Its large, fluffy head is perfect for sweeping across the whole face and patting powder down to set makeup in place.

name: Cosmetics Creamsicle - Acerola 20ml
product_description:
Add a pop of colour to your complexion with the Trifle Cosmetics Creamsicle; a creamy, tinted lip and cheek stain with a long-wearing finish.
Infused with Organic Shea Butter, the blendable, buildable balm melts onto skin to soften and moisturise, whilst delivering smooth, vibrant colour for a bright, lit-from-within look that won't fade.

name: Cosmetics Sponge Bronzer 3g
product_description:
Enhance natural radiance with the Trifle Cosmetics Sponge Bronzer. Beginning as a mousse, the pressed powder has been liquefied, poured into pans and allowed to set for smooth, flawless application.
Infused with Aloe Vera, Goji Berry and Rosehip Extract, the blendable, buildable formula is perfect for sweeping across the entire face for a sun-kissed glow, or for contouring the cheekbones, forehead and jawline to create a sculpted, defined make-up look.

name: Geller 劳拉·盖勒名副其实遮瑕膏 16.39ml
product_description:
Laura Geller 劳拉·盖勒名副其实遮瑕膏让您的肌肤看起来更加完美，它是一款基于硅胶的遮瑕霜，有助于遮掩任何伤疤、黑眼圈和胎记，均匀唇线和遮掩不喜欢的刺青。
其配方中蕴含有对肌肤有益的维他命和遮瑕成分的混合物，可轻松涂抹到肌肤，能持久定妆，令肤色均匀光滑，具有防水性。 这款专业的遮瑕膏有助于均匀肤色，遮盖瑕疵，让您拥有无可挑剔的完美妆容。

name: Juicy Shaker Lip Gloss - 112
product_description:
Add luscious colour to your pout with the Juicy Shaker Lip Gloss from Lancôme. Fortified with a bi-phased formula that synergises beautiful pigments and a nourishing blend of Sweet Almond Oil, Omega 3 and Cranberry Oil, you can expect super smooth, plump lips with mirror-like shine.
Housed in unique cocktail shaker-inspired packaging with a shake-to-wake formula, the lip gloss allows you to tailor colour vibrancy; simply shake more for an intensified make-up look. Complete with a soft cushioned applicator to hug the lip contour for a mistake-free finish.

name: Matte Primer 30ml
product_description: Achieve a flawless complexion with the Illamasqua Matte Primer. Ideal for oily skin, the lightweight formula works to prolong the wear of your foundation while creating a smooth, shine-free base. Fortified with oil-regulating Silica, it helps absorbs excess sebum and minimise the look of imperfections for an even and mattified finish. Wear alone, layer or mix with foundation for skin that looks perfected and balanced.

name: Earl Grey Lip Balm 4.3g
product_description:
Get your tea fix with the Hurraw! Earl Grey Lip Balm; an ultra-hydrating formula that cares for skin using premium organic, vegan and raw ingredients.
Hydrating lips in one simple swipe, the tea scented lip balm is formulated with a skin-loving blend of Jojoba Seed Oil, Cocoa Seed Butter and Olive Fruit Oil. These work in synergy to envelop lips in a comforting veil of moisture.
Finished with the unique scent of Italian Bergamot Orange, which lends the balm a distinctive flavour, the creamy lip balm leaves lips ultra-smooth and moisturised.

name: Brow Tame and Define Wax
product_description:
Eylure Brow Tame and Define Wax能驯服难以驾驭的眉毛。 本品富含迷迭香油、植物蜡和甜杏仁油，可有效强化和控制眉形，令眉毛井然有序。
这款眉蜡不会产生拖拽，能滋养眉毛，促进毛发健康生长，塑造眉形，令眉毛瞬间光滑整洁。 -SA

name: Mco High Definition Concealer - Light Beige
product_description: Perfect your complexion with the ModelCo Mco High Definition Concealer. Lightweight and ultra-creamy, the silky formula delivers a buildable, medium coverage to minimise the appearance of dark circles and imperfections. Enriched with antioxidants to help protect skin, it lasts all day without creasing or drying, seamlessly blending to hide redness and spots for a flawless, natural looking finish.

name: Texture 150 根假睫毛
product_description: 使用Eylure’s Texture 150 号假睫毛使您的双眸更加深邃。 质地轻盈且可重复使用，有自然美感的假睫毛适合在白天和夜晚间使用；其更加丰盈、加长的妆效和外眼角处超长的部分突显了质地和自然的造型。 Perfect增加了您双眼的深度和丰盈感。 功效持久。

name: Definition Brow Wax
product_description:
Hold defined brows in place with the Brow Wax from High Definition. Able to tame unruly brows, the translucent gel is designed to set brows, holding each hair in its desired place.
Acting like hairspray for brows, the lightweight formula holds and conditions eyebrows all day. Enriched with Argan Oil, the wax softens the hair, delivering a long-lasting and shiny yet non-sticky finish. Brows are left immaculate.

name: Oil Free Medium BB Cream (40ml)
product_description:
利用 Garnier的Oil Free Medium BB Cream 完善混合性至油性肌肤，这是一款具有最佳掩盖功效的控油霜，可专业遮掩缺陷肌肤缺陷，同时提供紫外线防护。
具有轻盈、无油配方，多功效BB霜旨在均匀肤色，平滑细纹并提供二十四小时保湿补水，获得健康自然、容光焕发的肌肤。
利用矿物颜料瞬间完美肌肤，吸收剂珠光体对抗油光，该护肤霜吸收多余的油脂，获得控制和平衡的肤色。 肌肤变得均匀、焕发光彩并散发自然光泽。 - K.N.

name: Collections A03 Oval Foundation Brush
product_description:
Build an ideal base with the Spectrum Collections A03 Oval Foundation Brush; an ultra-soft makeup brush that combines a vibrant colour palette with expert hand-crafted design.
The ‘So Oval You’ brush comprises firm yet super soft, synthetic bristles, which allow for a precise and even application of product. The small, oval head is suited to the contours of the face, ensuring cream and liquid products are applied expertly.
Offering light to moderate coverage, the unicorn-inspired face brush leaves the complexion even and perfected.

name: Cosmetics Silicone Sponge x1 Pack
product_description:
Achieve a flawless makeup finish with Snatch Cosmetics Silicone Sponge, a revolutionary makeup blender designed to eliminate product wastage when applying liquid makeup.
Made from premium silicone to reduce product wastage, the 'sponge' won't absorb your makeup; it enables you to use less product compared to traditional brushes and sponges. Durable, anti-microbial and easy to clean, the silicone sponge will expertly apply and blend your foundation with seamless, airbrushed results and zero product absorption; simply spread using a circular motion and dab lightly to blend away lines. Skin looks smooth and flawless.

name: Geller 劳拉·盖勒均匀肤色妆前乳
product_description:
使用 Laura Geller 劳拉·盖勒 Spackle® 均匀肤色妆前乳让您的肌肤为无瑕化妆做好准备；其轻盈的修正肤色配方可有效延长定妆的时间。
本品能最大程度减轻变色的迹象，其桃红色可营造柔光效果，以遮盖瑕疵，调节不均匀的肤色，让您的肤色看起来更自然。 既可单独使用，也可涂抹在粉底液下层，令肌肤看起来更细腻清爽。

name: 自然眉垛- 中褐色
product_description:
Pixi自然眉垛 
 Pixi 自然眉垛既是眉筆，又是啫喱，輕鬆馴服叛逆不羈的眉毛。眉垛一端是可勾畫極致眉妝的斜角防水眉筆，一端是彩色的輕柔定型啫喱，讓您的睫毛整天有型有範。現在，超級巨星般的眉妝輕鬆描！

name: Sexy Mama Anti-Shine Translucent Powder
product_description:
使用 theBalm's Sexy Mama Anti-Shine Translucent Powder，实现完美的肤色。这是一款控油定妆粉，可打造柔软的哑光肤色。
这款半透明粉饼非常适合用于定妆，可利用微小的吸油珠吸收多余光泽和油脂，呈现柔软的哑光肤色。 其无形的、天鹅绒般的保护层令肌肤完美无瑕，上镜效果极佳。 - K.N

name: Good Feel Better眼影刷
product_description: Look Good Feel Better 眼影刷，用以涂开、融合、打造完美眼影。Look Good Feel Better 是全球唯一的癌症慈善机构，为癌症治疗后有明显副作用的妇女提供帮助。 专业品质刷，其名称压制在把手上方便识别，设有锥形圆边，可将眼影均匀涂抹至眼皮上。 起柔软刷毛非常适合敏感型皮肤。 E.N.

name: Arden Beautiful Colour Maximum Volume Mascara (10.25ml)
product_description:
Discover a new dimension in lash power with the Elizabeth Arden Beautiful Colour Maximum Volume Mascara; an intense black formula that leaves lashes enviably defined.
The mascara arrives with an integrated brush applicator, which effortlessly glides through eyelashes, separating each lash and coating individual fibers in product. Once dry, the mascara is smudgeproof, leaving lashes flawlessly defined all day. Expect long fluttering lashes with maximised volume.

name: Tinted Cinnamon Lip Balm
product_description:
Treat lips to a tingly treat with the Hurraw! Tinted Cinnamon Lip Balm; an ultra-hydrating formula that cares for skin using premium organic, vegan and raw ingredients.
The creamy balm effortlessly glides over skin, nourishing lips with a blend of organic Coconut Oil, Cacao Butter and Castor Oil, which works to deliver long-lasting moisture and ensure lips are free from dryness. Also boasting Sri Lankan Cinnamon Bark Oil, the tinted balm offers a sweet and spicy scent that leaves behind a unique tingling sensation.
The cinnamon lip balm is complete with wildcrafted alkanet root, which gives the balm a dreamy red tint that envelops the lips in sheer colour. Expect a brightened pout that is soft, smooth and hydrated.

name: Ageless Illuminating Primer (50g)
product_description:
塑造均匀肤色，为化妆做好准备；具有极强的瑕疵遮盖力，延长持妆效力，卓效淡隐肉眼可见的细纹。
适合所有肌肤类型，做好妆前打底的同时让您焕发青春气息。 蕴含认证有机玫瑰果油能有效修复滋养受损皮肤组织；芦荟能改善肤色，使您由内到外都散发出极佳气质。
使用说明：

name: La La Bronzing Ball (5g)
product_description:
Achieve a sun-kissed glow with the coveted Bronzing Ball from Madame La La. Allowing you to contour, highlight and bronze with ease, the multitasking ball is a dome shaped bronzer.
Arriving in one shade to suit all skin tones, the buildable formula provides sheer coverage and can be built up as desired. Enriched with Coco Water and Vitamin E, the bronzer delivers hydration upon application, alongside a beautiful bronzed glow. The Bronzing Ball is the ideal size to put in your handbag for touch ups on-the-go.

name: Arden 无暇遮瑕提亮笔
product_description:
Elizabeth Arden 无暇遮瑕提亮笔能够立即擦除疲态，放松肌肤，散发光泽；采用超轻盈配方，让眼部瞬间提神。
融合了能有效修复问题区域的水合物、抗氧化剂和反光色粉，凸显面部轮廓；这款遮瑕膏可以多层覆盖，拥有低至中级遮瑕力，可用于所有肌肤类型，而且十分温和，可以用于娇嫩的眼周肌肤。 - E.D

name: Arden 水晶透亮唇彩 8.5ml
product_description: 使用这款  8.5ml 的Elizabeth Arden 水晶透亮唇彩，让您的香唇焕发华丽光泽。 这款犀利的唇彩可以单独使用，也可以涂在唇膏之上，清新的留兰香将让您精神振奋。使用说明：单独使用或用在唇膏之上。

colour: Barcelona, Budapest, London, New York, Paris, Puerto Rico, Rome, Shanghai, Tehran, Tokyo
name: Cosmetics Liquid Lip Paint (Various Shades)
product_description: Perfect your pout with the Mellow Cosmetics Liquid Lip Paint; a long-wearing, high-pigmented lipstick that delivers non-drying colour with a velvet matte finish. Featuring a cushioned wand applicator, the ultra-smooth formula glides on effortlessly for full coverage, bold colour that lasts. Available in a range of shades.

name: Lip Pen
product_description:
有了这款可旋转的 NUDESTIX lip pen，为双唇选择哑光或亮泽妆效从未如此简单。 哑光液体唇线笔含有革命性的凝胶聚合物，赋予双唇柔软、滋润、诱人亲吻的感觉，同时确保色泽全天保持亮丽、充满活力。 肽、牛油果油和维生素 E 组成了无粘土和无挥发性配方，令双唇保持滋润。 唇线笔的哑光妆效非常适合用于白天和夜间打造中性、自然的妆容。

  得益于凝胶色彩聚合物，唇彩唇笔可持久保持中性、自然的色泽。 这种温和而有效的配方能保持滋润和湿度水平，确保时刻拥有完美双唇。 使用 NUDESTIX 系列彩妆笔，强化天生丽质。 这种多功能彩妆笔适用于所有肤色，赋予清新的面部、裸状和中性妆容，同时凸显您最喜爱的特色。 这一彩妆系列富含维生素、抗氧化剂和保湿剂，易于使用，定能赋予您亮泽肤色。 NUDESTIX 唇线笔经过皮肤测试，但未进行动物测试，不含香料和防腐剂，适合所有肤质，甚至最敏感的肌肤。 A.B.

name: Matte Chic Liquid Lipstick 6.5g
product_description: The Matte Chic Liquid Lipstick from Chantecaille delivers intense, long-lasting colour with a virtually weightless feel. Infused with advanced peptides, the moisturising formula works to stimulate natural collagen production and blur imperfections for a visible plumping effect. The precise doe-foot applicator allows the colour to effortlessly glide on without bleeding or feathering, and it quickly sets for a bold, matte finish that doesn’t fade or transfer.

colour: Caramel, Creamy Beige, Fair Ivory, Natural Tan, Pecan, Soft Ivory, Sun Beige, Truffle, Warm Ivory, Warm Nude
name: Fit Me Matte & Poreless Foundation 30ml (Various Shades)
product_description:
Smooth and perfect the look of your complexion with Maybelline Fit Me! Matte and Poreless Foundation, a refining liquid foundation with natural, matte finish.
Ideal for normal to oily skin types, the makeup is infused with micro-powders to help control shine and blur pores; it glides effortlessly across skin, blending seamlessly to visibly minimise the appearance of pores and imperfections. Expect a more even toned, flawless complexion.

name: Sandler 丹尼尔桑德勒水彩腮红 - 蜜糖红 (15ml)
product_description:
讓你擁有傾倒眾人的完美臉頰。本品顏色為帶珠光淺紅色，充滿可愛氣息，能讓雙頰立馬散發光澤，本品還能加入底妝中，讓整個妝面呈現健康光澤。 
讓您24 小時時刻美麗，一周7 天天天好氣色。無論您在城市裡忙碌，坐在海灘上，還是晚上參加聚會，從早晨第一刻起直到晚上散場，您始終光彩照人，一切皆因該易上色的防水配方。 
使用說明：

name: Vintage Cosmetics Company Slanted Tweezers Floral
product_description:
Shape, groom and preen your eyebrows with The Vintage Cosmetics Company Slanted Tweezers, a pair of high quality stainless steel tweezers with a vintage-inspired floral design.
Offering a slanted tip, the tweezers expertly remove stray hairs with ultimate precision; use the slanted edge for general tweezing, or the tip to grab even the smallest of hairs. The must-have beauty tool allows you to clean up or completely reshape your brows.

colour: Dark Blonde, Deep Brown, Medium Brown
name: Brow Precise Fibre Filler 8ml (Various Shades)
product_description:
Create enviable arches with Maybelline's Brow Precise Fibre Filler; a tinted brow gel with a unique, tapered paddle brush for precise, professional results.
Infused with thickening fibres, the easy-to-apply brow mascara fills in sparse eyebrows with natural, hair-like colour for a perfectly groomed, fuller-looking finish that lasts.

colour: 01 Majes' Pink, 02 Toute Nude, 03 Jolie Brune, 04 Selfpeach!, 05 Red To Toe, 06 Framboiselle, 07 Purpledélique, 08 Bloody Berry
name: Rouge Laque Lipstick 6ml (Various Shades)
product_description:
Perfect your pout with the Bourjois Rouge Laque Lipstick; intense, long-lasting lip colour that arrives in an array of mouth-watering hues ranging from dreamy pinks to bold, statement reds.
The glossy formula is infused with Nymphaea extract, which envelops lips in a veil of moisturising colour that keeps skin hydrated and ensures a smooth finish. Gliding onto lips with a non-sticky finish, the liquid lipstick boasts an integrated wand applicator for a flawless and precise application.
The Laque Lipstick enhances lips without running or feathering, ensuring a flawless and enviable pout, without the need for lip liner.

name: Paris Glam Bronze - Cushion Soleil
product_description: L'Oréal Paris presents the Glam Bronze Cushion de Soleil, a creamy liquid bronzer with an innovative cushioned sponge that leaves skin with a fresh, dewy and sunkissed look. It’s buildable and effortlessly blended, meaning you can create a customisable summer glow at any time of year – simply tap the applicator onto the cushion to release the bronzer. Housed in a convenient compact with an integrated mirror ideal for quick on-the-go applications and touch ups.

name: London Full Monty Travel Case

product_description:
Create an array of eye-catching looks with Le Chrome Luxe Eye Duo - Monte Carlo from Chantecaille. Host to a two sensuous shades and a duo of applicators, the compact is able to add depth and definition to eyes, whilst providing a professional finish.
Each hue delivers crease-resistant colour and boasts an ultra-blendable formula for seamless application. The eyeshadows can be applied wet or dry; offering a range of finishes from a liquid-metal look to a sheer wash of metallic radiance. Longwearing, Le Chrome Luxe Eye Duo will give you sultry and demure eyes.
Grace
An elegant peach shade, infused with light reflecting gold.

A sultry, coppery-bronze hue.

这款透明的面部散粉适合各种肤色，能够吸收多余的油脂、定妆和缩小毛孔，与此同时可有效修正 T 区不喜欢的肤色，让其拥有持久的哑光效果。 配备有喷嘴，适合在外出旅行时涂抹。

name: Face Powder Brush
product_description: Achieve a flawless make-up look with the RMK Face Powder Brush; a large face brush with super-soft bristles. Featuring a voluminous, rounded tip with a blend of grey squirrel and mountain goat hair, the tool picks up product perfectly and distributes an even coat over skin. Ideal for applying both loose and pressed powders on the face and body.

product_description:
Perfect for every mood, outfit or occasion, the L'Oréal Paris Color Riche Lip Palette combines six complementing shades in a variety of matte and satin textures.
Combining conditioning creams and intense pigments for rich, hydrating colour that doesn't over-dry lips, the shades can be blended together or worn alone for endless make-up looks.
Gliding effortlessly onto lips to enhance your pout, the lip colour palette is complete with a lip brush and integrated mirror for precise, mistake-free application, anywhere, any time. E.N.

Crafted with uniquely cut, rounded tip bristles that mimic the shape of a finger, the brush is ideal for easy application under and around the eyes without irritating sensitive skin or transferring oils from hands. The straight and firm bristles allow for optimal blending for a smooth finish.
The earth friendly tool is created with a highly sustainable bamboo handle, 100% cruelty free synthetic taklon bristles and a recycled aluminium ferrule.

name: ml）
product_description: L'Oreal Paris 假睫毛造型睫毛膏 ，打造精美睫毛。 这款黑色睫毛膏，使睫毛浓密纤长。可提升睫毛韧性、使睫毛卷翘浓密。采用创新的梳型刷，可从睫毛根开始涂覆每根睫毛，打造终极视觉冲击，展示超亮泽的睫毛，使睫毛时尚前卫、引人注目、无结块。 使眼睛清澈明亮、炯炯有神，从各种角度重塑个人形象。 E.N.

product_description:
Achieve an on-trend nude lip with the Go Nude Neutral Lip Set from Illamasqua. Host to a trio of coveted lip products, the set contains a luxurious lipstick, precise liner and a liquid lip colour, covering all bases for achieving a professional looking nude lip.
Glamore Lipstick - Starkers (4g)
Add sumptuous, hydrating colour to your pout with the Starkers Glamore Lipstick. Enriched with moisturising Vitamin E, the long-wearing lipstick glides on effortlessly to soften and condition, whilst delivering a luscious nude colour in just one stroke. Lips are smooth, comfortable and defined.
Lip Colouring Pencil - Woo (1.4g)
Define your pout with the Woo Lip Pencil; a soft, gentle lip liner that can be used as a natural-looking lip colour, or to prevent feathering and bleeding. The smooth formula glides effortlessly over the lips to deliver a long-wearing nude hue with ultimate staying power, whilst the precision tip allows mistake-free application for a professional finish.
Lip Lure - Rose (4g)
Add lustrous colour to your pout with the Liquid Lip Lure. Arriving in a rose pink hue, the liquid lipstick glides on effortlessly to deliver intense, high-pigmented colour with the mirror-like shine of a lip gloss. The unique cushioned wand allows mistake-free application for a long-wearing, picture-perfect finish.

name: Enchanted Eyelashes - Lily
product_description: Add fullness to your lashes with Eylure's 'Lily' Enchanted Eyelashes. Soft, lightweight and reusable, the handmade false lashes are perfect for any occasion; their shorter design adds subtle definition to your peepers. Perfect for festivals and barely-there looks.

product_description: 本品可讓睫毛更濃密更捲翹。對抗稀疏的睫毛，使睫毛更濃密，適合日常使用。

product_description:
Achieve a flawless complexion with Maybelline Superstay 24hr Primer, an ultra-smoothing makeup primer that works to even the complexion whilst prolonging makeup wear.
Creating the perfect base for long-lasting makeup, the primer delivers a comfortable veil onto skin, mattifying shiny areas and creating a more unified complexion in preparation for foundation application. Its smoothing properties help to minimise the appearance of shine and imperfections to promote a professional, photo-ready makeup finish. Skin looks smooth, fresh and flawless, all day.

product_description: Accentuate your facial features with Lottie London's Strobe Stix; a chubby highlighter to perfect your complexion. Gliding on effortlessly, its blendable crème formula can be applied to the cheekbones, brow bones and bridge of the nose for a luminous, defined and expertly sculpted finish. No need to sharpen.

product_description:

Long-wearing and skin-conditioning, the highlighter balm effortlessly smoothes across skin with light-reflecting, holographic optics that utilise exclusive technology, which allows the shade to flip from violet to pink, creating three-dimensional coverage with a truly iridescent lustre. Perfect for highlighting and strobing.

尤其适用于涂抹粉底液。刷子为平顶，采用合成纤维制成，效果无与伦比，使您涂抹粉底时最终把握控制权。 向您展示完美妆容，无论您追求纯粹自然的妆效，还是完美饱满的妆容，本款粉底刷均可帮您实现。 配有一把包有紫藤的舒适手柄。

name: 9ml
product_description: 利用Zelens 'Flirt Mascara'定型、加长和丰盈睫毛。 利用植物源成分和20年科研支持，Zelens结合22种活性成分创造了这款防水的睫毛膏。 配有一种独特肽复合物刺激睫毛生长，该配方可轻松涂抹和分离每根睫毛，塑造浓密、深厚和鲜明的化妆效果。 专门设计的毛刷和高性能的配方协调一致，实现专业化效果。 - K.N.

name: LONDON Lippy Liquid Lipstick - Dahling
product_description:
Add sumptuous colour to your pout with the butter LONDON Lippy Liquid; a long-wearing formula that combines the pigment of a lipstick with the shine of a gloss.
Infused with Shea Butter and antioxidant Vitamin E, the liquid lipstick glides on effortlessly to moisturise and protect lips, whilst delivering non-drying colour with an ultra-glossy finish. Expect smooth, luscious lips that are subtly scented with delicious notes of Vanilla.

name: LONDON Plush Rush Lipstick - Daring
product_description:
Treat your lips to the moisturising and plumping properties of butter LONDON Plush Rush Lipstick, a long-wearing, creamy lipstick that delivers a shock of colour whilst dousing lips in essential moisture.
Accentuating the natural curves of your pout, the luscious formula is enriched with a Phyto-Endorphin Complex to boost your mood, and a Plumping Complex to help increase the appearance of fullness; lips look smoother, firmer and more defined. Standing the test of time, the lipstick withstands feathering and bleeding, so your pout looks irresistably kissable, for longer.

Achieve a flawless look with the 24-Piece Professional Cosmetic Make Up Brush Set from Rio. This 24-piece collection of brushes provides you with all the tools you need to expertly apply makeup; blend the perfect foundation base, contour and highlight cheekbones or create a sultry smoky eye. Featuring different sizes, shapes and angles, each high quality brush has super soft bristles to allow makeup to effortlessly glide onto skin and the handles are ergonomic and weighted for an even application.
They’re suitable for a range of cosmetics in both powder and liquid formulas, including foundation, eyeshadow, eyeliner, blusher, bronzer and concealer. Presented in a faux leather roll-up pouch that protects and maintains the brushes, it’s an ideal set for travelling and allows you to create a truly dimensional, professional finish wherever you are.
Large Fan Brush
Large Powder & Bronzer Brush

name: Compulsive Cosmetics Angled Blending Brush #005
product_description:
Expertly define your eyes with the Angled Blending Brush #005 from Obsessive Compulsive Cosmetics. Crafted from sustainable materials and bonded with vegan-sourced adhesive, the brush features a weighted, nickel-plated ferrule for superior control.
With an angled brush head and soft, synthetic bristles, the professional brush can be used in the crease, corners or across the entire lid to create depth and contour. Delivers the perfect amount of product, allowing you to shade, smudge and line with ease. Ideal for applying brow product.

name: Compulsive Cosmetics Precision Lip Brush #010
product_description:
Shape and define your pout with the Obsessive Compulsive Cosmetics Precision Lip Brush #010; a must-have tool for effortless application of lip products.
Crafted from sustainable materials and bonded with vegan-sourced adhesive, the brush features a weighted, nickel-plated ferrule for superior control, and a tapered head with soft, synthetic fibres for ultimate precision.

name: Brow Brightener - Gold
product_description: Achieve enviable arches with the Pixi Brow Brightener; a tinted brow gel infused with a golden sheen to illuminate the eye area. Enriched with Panthenol and Aloe Vera, the fast-drying formula nourishes and conditions brow hairs, whilst taming even the most unruly brows for a perfectly groomed finish. Complete with a spoolie brush for easy application, brows appear fresh and luminous with long-lasting hold.

name: Compulsive Cosmetics Large Tapered Blending Brush #012
product_description: Achieve professional make-up results with the Large Tapered Blending Brush #012 from Obsessive Compulsive Cosmetics. Crafted from sustainable materials and bonded with vegan-sourced adhesive, the weighted brush features a nickel-plated ferrule and soft, synthetic bristles that distribute, buff and blend loose powders and cream products. Ideal for smaller areas around the eye.

name: Good Feel Better Sculpting Sponge
product_description:
Achieve an expertly contoured complexion with the Sculpting Sponge from Look Good Feel Better; the only global cancer charity supporting women with the visible side effects of cancer treatment.
A make-up bag must-have, the professional quality sponge features rounded sides to blend large areas of the face with a stippling action, whilst the pointed, precision tip is perfect for hard-to-reach areas. Effortlessly applies liquid, cream and powder products. Can be used damp or dry.

name: Definition Buffer Brush
product_description: Create a flawless make-up look with the High Definition Buffer Brush; a must-have tool for applying liquid foundation and contouring product. Featuring densely packed, flat-topped bristles, the brush allows you to soften contour lines for an expertly sculpted, airbrushed effect.

name: Pong Pong Bare Necessities Highlighting Pencil 1.5g
product_description:
Achieve a subtle highlight with the Jelly Pong Pong Bare Necessities Highlighting Pencil; a versatile crayon that functions as an eye shadow base, water liner, concealer and a highlighter.
Effortlessly applied and seamlessly blended onto skin or into base makeup, the effective pencil instantly illuminates the face. Brightening skin, the pencil is able to visibly disguise minor blemishes, as well as reduce the appearance of dark under eye circles.
Enriched with Maracuja and Rooibos Tea extracts, the Bare Necessities pencil ensures skin appears radiant and lustrous. Use to brighten the brow bone, eyes or upper cheek bone.

name: 5-in-1 BB Cream Eyeshadow Shade Extension - Smoky Espresso
product_description:
The bareMinerals 5-in-1 BB Cream Eyeshadow is the next generation of eyeshadow; offering a powerful combination of makeup and skincare for truly flawless results.
The featherlite hybrid formula glides onto the lid with a rich, creamy colour coverage, working to smooth the look of fine lines and discolouration while priming skin to create the perfect base that doesn’t crease or smudge for optimum adherence and staying power.
With the addition of brightening actives and mineral-based SPF 15 filters, the eyeshadow is easily applied with the paddle applicator and can be blended and layered for the desired effect. Wear alone or underneath your favourite eyeshadows for up to 12 hours wear.

name: 5-in-1 BB Cream Eyeshadow Shade Extension - Exotic Lilac
product_description:
The bareMinerals 5-in-1 BB Cream Eyeshadow is the next generation of eyeshadow; offering a powerful combination of makeup and skincare for truly flawless results.
The featherlite hybrid formula glides onto the lid with a rich, creamy colour coverage, working to smooth the look of fine lines and discolouration while priming skin to create the perfect base that doesn’t crease or smudge for optimum adherence and staying power.
With the addition of brightening actives and mineral-based SPF 15 filters, the eyeshadow is easily applied with the paddle applicator and can be blended and layered for the desired effect. Wear alone or underneath your favourite eyeshadows for up to 12 hours wear.

name: Color Lip Gloss - 05 Rose Retro
product_description:
Drench your lips in a lustrous sheen with the RMK Color Lip Gloss in 'Rose Retro'.
Combining the vibrant colour of a lipstick with the clarity of a lip Gloss, the colour glides effortlessly over lips with its square-shaped applicator, and delivers a veil of sheer yet brilliant colour. Its host of moisturising ingredients, including Shea Butter, Rosehip Oil keep lips feeling hydrated and comfortable.

name: Lip Lacquer - Fire Red (8)
product_description:
Douse your lips in rich, moisturising colour with the ModelCo Lip Lacquer in 'Fire Red', a highly pigmented lip gloss that delivers a slick of vivid, long-wearing colour.
Gliding effortlessly onto lips with its wand applicator, the non-sticky gloss imparts a rich colour tint whilst intensely hydrating to keep lips feeling comfortable and luscious all day.

name: Fatlash Volumising Mascara
product_description:
Add drama to your makeup look with the ModelCo Fatlash Volumising Mascara, a super volumising and lengthening black mascara that creates fuller, thicker-looking eyelashes.
Combining a buildable, smudge-proof formula with a curved silicon brush, the black mascara expertly coats, separates and lifts every lash whilst its bomber-shaped tip allows you to apply vertically to capture even the smallest of lashes. Delivering jet black colour, the creamy, volumising mascara will leave lashes with a voluptuous, high-impact finish. Non-drying and non-flaking.

name: Lip Lacquer - Morocco (5)
product_description:
Douse your lips in rich, moisturising colour with the ModelCo Lip Lacquer in 'Morocco', a highly pigmented lip gloss that delivers a slick of vivid, long-wearing colour.
Gliding effortlessly onto lips with its wand applicator, the non-sticky gloss imparts a rich colour tint whilst intensely hydrating to keep lips feeling comfortable and luscious all day.

name: Instant Brows Brow Pencil - Medium to Dark
product_description:
Expertly frame your face with ModelCo's Instant Brows Brow Pencil in 'Medium to Dark', a dual-ended eyebrow pencil with built-in spoolie brush.
Instantly filling gaps in your brows with a soft and natural finish, the pencil features a fine tip for precision application, and a unique, buildable wax formula that glides effortlessly through the brows, defining, filling and enhancing to help shape and contour your face. Expect beautifully defined and groomed brows with a natural finish. Long-wearing.

name: Mco High Definition Concealer - Medium Beige
product_description: Perfect your complexion with the ModelCo Mco High Definition Concealer. Lightweight and ultra-creamy, the silky formula delivers a buildable, medium coverage to minimise the appearance of dark circles and imperfections. Enriched with antioxidants to help protect skin, it lasts all day without creasing or drying, seamlessly blending to hide redness and spots for a flawless, natural looking finish.

name: LONDON BlushClutch Palette - Simply Sweet
product_description:
Add a flush of colour to your complexion with the butter LONDON BlushClutch Palette in 'Simply Sweet'. Housed in a mirrored compact, the palette combines three warm-toned shades of blusher and a rose gold highlighter pen for a subtle strobe of light.
Infused with Ruby Powder and Pepper Tree Extract, the creamy, primer-infused powders deliver buildable, natural-looking colour with a long-wearing, lit-from-within finish. For a soft glow, apply the highlighter pen to the brow bones, bridge of the nose and centre of your lips for a three-dimensional, contoured make-up look.
'Peony' - soft peach shimmer
'Blossom' - matte warm nude
'Poppy' - matte coral

name: Miracle Veil Skin Perfecting Cream
product_description:
Achieve a smooth, flawless complexion with the ModelCo Miracle Veil Skin Perfecting Cream; a lightweight, skin-correcting primer that works to improve skin tone and texture.
Infused with Rosehip Oil, Chamomile Extract and Pomegranate Oil, the silky, multi-tasking formula blends effortlessly onto skin to help blur imperfections, redness and pigmentation, whilst minimising the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles for a radiant, youthful-looking finish. Enhances luminosity and creates an even canvas for make-up application.

name: Vintage Cosmetics Company Essential Make-Up Brush Set
product_description:
The Vintage Cosmetics Company Essential Make-Up Brush Set combines a trio of face brushes to help you achieve flawless makeup results. Each brush is fitted with soft, synthetic bristles and rust-proof, aluminium ferrules. Complete with wooden handles. Housed in vintage-patterned packaging.
Foundation Brush
A flat, slightly tapered brush that expertly applies liquid foundation with flawless results. The synthetic bristles seamlessly blend product into skin, promoting a smooth and even toned complexion.
Powder Brush
A super soft brush for applying loose powder or mineral makeup. Its large, fluffy head is perfect for sweeping across the whole face and patting powder down to set makeup in place. Also suitable for use with mineral makeup and can be used as a stippling brush.
Blusher Brush
The perfect sized makeup brush to add just the right amount of product onto cheeks. It delivers cream or powder blushers and expertly blends to leave your complexion looking naturally rosy and healthy. The versatile brush also works well defining and contouring your features, adding depth and dimension to your finished makeup look. The soft bristles feel comfortable on your skin.

name: Vintage Cosmetics Company Blusher Brush
product_description:
Add a flush of colour to your cheeks with The Vintage Cosmetics Company Blusher Brush.
Fitted with soft, synthetic bristles, and an aluminium ferrule that won't rust, the makeup brush is the perfect size to add just the right amount of product onto cheeks. It delivers cream or powder blushers and expertly blends to leave your complexion looking naturally rosy and healthy. The versatile brush also works well defining and contouring your features, adding depth and dimension to your finished makeup look. The soft bristles feel comfortable on your skin, and its wooden handle makes it easy to use.

name: Face Pop Eyes - Silver Mauve Beige
product_description:
RMK Face Pop Eyes in 'Silver Mauve Beige' is a limited edition eyeshadow duo that has been specially curated in celebration of the brand's twentieth birthday.
Each striking eyeshadow (pink and neutral) delivers a shimmering finish that blends effortlessly on the lid. Wear each colour individually or blend together to create a bold or subtle makeup finish. Complete with a dual-ended sponge tip applicator.

name: Cosmetics Praline Eyeshadow Palette 17g
product_description:
Achieve endless eye make-up looks with the Trifle Cosmetics Praline Eyeshadow Palette; six eyeshadow shades in a range of hues, from neutral bronze to khaki and deep eggplant.
Infused with creamy, coated micronised pigments, the blendable, long-wearing powders have been hot-pressed for smooth, flawless application. Melting effortlessly onto lids, each colour can be applied dry or wet for a more intense finish with superior staying power. Complete with an integrated mirror and a dual-ended sponge applicator.

name: & Berry豪华贝尔海绵
product_description: Lord & Berry豪华贝尔海绵形状巧妙，可光滑准确地涂抹粉底液。 尖头适合将粉底液涂抹到那些难以涂抹的区域，包括鼻子两侧和眼睛下面。 这款柔软的海绵可以轻松地涂抹粉底液，如此您可以实现完美无瑕的肤色。

Sigma造型睫毛膏套装 ，防水睫毛膏组合，定型效果持久，长达13小时，最大限度地美化和打理您的眼睫毛。 专业拉伸、蜷曲和加粗您的眼睫毛，黑色睫毛膏的增强效果从根部延伸到尖端，给您的双眼睫毛打造出随心所欲的结构和型状。
 非常睫毛睫毛膏：
配备加厚、超丰盈睫毛棒，睫毛膏的放大效果最大限度地使您的睫毛变厚、变长，提高睫毛主体部分定型效果，创造期待的艺术效果。 强化的黑色配方轻松覆盖睫毛根部到尖部，定型效果良好，不会留下墨染痕迹，亦不会产生睫毛结块现象。 睫毛令人羡慕地变得丰盈、挺拔。
 高粗睫毛膏： 
该款睫毛膏配备坚实、笔直的睫毛棒来拉伸您的睫毛，最大限度地强化、提升您睫毛的外观。 强化的黑色配方可轻松涂满睫毛根部到尖部，向上卷曲、拉伸您的睫毛，定型效果良好，不会留下墨染痕迹，亦不会产生睫毛结块现象。 睫毛浓密，长而挺拔。
弯翘睫毛膏： 
该款睫毛膏配备弯曲、模压塑料棒可创造出令人难以置信的形状，提升您的睫毛的外型，给人耳目一新的感觉。 强化的黑色配方可轻松涂满睫毛根部到尖部，向上、向前卷曲、拉伸您的睫毛，其毛刷浓密、均匀，定型效果良好，不会留下墨染痕迹，亦不会产生睫毛结块现象。 睫毛弯而翘，令人羡慕。

name: The Coolfix Rollerball 10ml
product_description: 使用 Shaveworks The Cool Fix Rollerball，舒缓镇静脱毛后的肌肤。 配方含乙醇酸、mediacalm 复合物、肌醇六磷酸和邻羟苯基酸，可去除、舒缓、溶解死皮细胞，减少皮疹发生。 唇部和眉毛配方有助于消除皮肤炎症及泛红，可在上蜡、修眉和纹眉后立即使用，促进肌肤愈合。 A.B.

name: Ingenious Powder Eye Shadow - N Ex-15
product_description: RMK present the Ingenious Powder Eye Shadow; a silky powder that melts onto eyelids for added depth and definition. With a shimmering finish, the eye shadow blends seamlessly without creasing or fading, allowing you to create your desired look with superior stay-ability and a smooth finish. E.N.

name: Brush iQ Eye Defining Brush Kit
product_description:
Tweezerman's Brush iQ Eye Defining Brush Kit combines the perfect tools for achieving flawless eye makeup looks. Certified by makeup artists, the travel-sized brushes with Dunpont Natrafil patented technology allow you to expertly and easily apply your eyeliner and eyeshadows with professional results.
Line Glider Brush:
Perfect for precisely applying eyeliner to the lids. Its unique blend of fibres and curved, ergonomic brush head fit the natural contours of your eye for detailed and expert results. Can be used with any formula for precise application.
Shader Brush:
Perfect for adding colour to the lids. The soft fibres help soften and diffuse edges without irritation for perfectly layered and blended makeup looks.
Blender Brush:
Create smokey, blended looks with this expertly designed brush. Its fibres help blend and layer colours for smokey, sultry looks. Perfect for smoothly applying colour to the crease.

name: Cosmetics 07 Angled Brush - Rose Gold
product_description: Expertly apply makeup with the Contour Cosmetics 07 Angled Brush with a limited edition Rose Gold handle detail. Crafted from super soft synthetic fibres, the fluffy face brush is perfect for applying powder based products and ensuring an even coverage. The brush head is slightly angled, making it ideal for using contour powder to define and shape cheekbones, or use it to buff on bronzer or blusher for an immaculately blended finish. Completely cruelty free, the lush brush is a must-have product for any makeup bag.

name: Smoulder Eyeshadow Brush
product_description:
使用Illamasqua Smoothing Eyeshadow Brush可轻松勾勒细腻的眼部线条，它是一款有轻盈、略呈斜角的人造刷毛的美妆工具。
Perfect对混合和涂抹您所喜欢的眼影，这款化妆刷柔软、灵活和呈"羽毛状"的刷头将化妆品细致地涂抹在眼睛周围，形成一个烟熏的惊人效果，呈现出一个性感迷人的外观。 Ultra薄且易于使用的。

name: Foundation Brush
product_description:
Achieve a flawless base with PUPA Foundation Brush, a flat makeup brush specially developed to apply liquid, compact or cream foundations and concealers.
Handmade in Italy, the brush is fitted with synthetic bristles and offers a flat shape to expertly apply foundation and concealers with professional, seamless coverage. Skin looks flawless and photo-ready.

name: Definition Faux Eye Lashes - Bombshell (Multipack)
product_description: Intensify your peepers with High Definition Faux Eyelashes in 'Bombshell'. Lightweight and reusable, these natural looking false lashes are perfect for wearing through the day, lending your lashes subtle volume and length. Perfect for adding root depth and extra definition to your eyes.

name: Pupart Palette - Electric Allure
product_description:
Create a range of eye makeup looks with the PUPA Pupart Palette in 'Electric Allure', a sultry eyeshadow palette filled with nine complementary eyeshadows in smokey and jewel-toned shades.
The versatile palette allows you to create a range of looks that add subtle depth or bold definition to the eyes; it combines a range of coordinating colours with iridescent, pearly, satin or matt finishes. Infused with antioxidant Vitamin E, each carefully selected shade is highly pigmented and effortlessly blendable; their soft, creamy texture delivers high impact, long-lasting results in one sweep.
Housed in a mirrored compact with application brush and 'how-to' leaflet.

name: Luminys Baked All Over Illuminating Blush Powder - Rose Stripes
product_description: Perfect your complexion with the PUPA Luminys Baked All Over Illuminating Blush Powder. Developed with ‘baking’ technology to create an ultra-smooth and highly pigmented formula, the face powder features gradual ombré coloured powders in subtle stripes. With a soft shimmer, the shades are perfect for adding dynamic depth to cheeks and a touch of highlight, with universally flattering hues to suit all skin tones.

name: minerals Protective Liquid Satin Foundation - Honey Fair
product_description:
Achieve a dewy and radiant complexion with the glo minerals Protective Liquid Satin Foundation; a skin-nurturing formula that works to perfect skin. Suitable for all skin types, the liquid makeup is effective even on sensitive skin and those with rosacea.
Non-comedogenic, the liquid mineral foundation effortlessly glides over the face, providing a veil of high coverage that conceals and corrects blemishes, redness and other minor imperfections. The foundation is infused with Vitamins A, C and E, alongside a healthy dose of Green Tea extract, which work in synergy to provide essential nutrients to the face. This ensures skin is visibly radiant and healthy-looking.
Alongside creating a flawless, airbrushed complexion, the makeup provides skin with broad-spectrum UV protection as an added bonus to care for skin. Arriving in a vast array of shades, glo possesses a hue for any skin tone.

name: Luminys Baked All Over Illuminating Blush Powder - Golden Bronze Stripes
product_description: Perfect your complexion with the PUPA Luminys Baked All Over Illuminating Blush Powder. Developed with ‘baking’ technology to create an ultra-smooth and highly pigmented formula, the face powder features gradual ombré coloured powders in subtle stripes. With a soft shimmer, the shades are perfect for adding dynamic depth to cheeks and a touch of highlight, with universally flattering hues to suit all skin tones.

name: iredale Bronzer Refill - Rose Dawn
product_description:
Add a sunkissed glow to your complexion with the jane iredale Bronzer Refill in 'Rose Dawn', an individual bronzer pan that is specially designed to fit into the sleek, refillable compact.
Combining four shades of cool pink and bronze in one pressed powder formula, the bronzer adds natural-looking colour to skin and blends effortlessly; mix all four colours together for a customised look, or use each shade individually to contour, chisel and highlight your complexion. The multi-tasking bronzer can also be used to brighten and add depth to eyes, lips and cheeks, and contains extracts of Pomegranate and Pine Bark for antioxidant protection and natural preservation. 
Apply dry or mix with moisturiser for more intense results.

name: Touch Polished Nails Glamour Collection - Bianca
product_description:
Achieve a salon-worthy manicure from home with the Elegant Touch Polished Nails in 'Bianca', a pack of false nails from the brand's Glamour Collection.
Created with super-flex technology, the flexible, easy-to-apply nails are comfortable to wear, and remove effortlessly without damaging natural nails. Complete with fast-drying glue, you can expect long-wearing, chip-free nails that can be filed into any shape.

name: Grandiose Eye Liner - 03
product_description:
Achieve expert precision with the Lancôme Grandiose Eye Liner; an award-winning liquid liner that arrives with an innovative pivot applicator. The eye liner boasts a water-based formula, which dries quickly to deliver an intense, highly-pigmented line and a smudge-resistant, matte finish.
The unique applicator has been designed to bend in order to allow ultimate control, as well as close access to the base of the lashes. Once bent, the applicator provides the ergonomic technique for symmetric access to both eyes, which is ideal when creating feline flicks. The pivoting applicator is complete with an ultra-fine felt tip head. This is both supple and resistant, the perfect combination for creating an enviably smooth and precise application.
Adapting to all eye shapes and sizes, the intelligent Grandiose Eye Liner guarantees to line and define peepers perfectly.

name: Sourcils Styler Brow Mascara - 01
product_description:
Achieve full brows with help from the Lancôme Sourcils Styler Brow Mascara; an innovative brow product co-created with renowned celebrity makeup artist, Lisa Eldridge.
Arriving with an innovative, hairbrush-inspired applicator, the brow mascara effortlessly sweeps through eyebrows. Begin by pushing the brush against the hairs to coat them in product and achieve a thick and full effect, then smooth in the direction of hair growth to create enviable definition.
The smudge-resistant gel formula dries quickly, holding brows flawlessly in place for up to 14 hours without the need for a touch up.

name: Pupart Gold Cover Makeup Palette - Warm Shades
product_description:
Achieve a flawless makeup look with Pupa's Pupart Gold Cover Makeup Palette in 'Warm Shades', a comprehensive makeup kit housing products for the face, lips and eyes.
Stored in a slim compact with geometric gold design, the makeup palette offers a skin-perfecting concealer to help camouflage blemishes, and an array of warm, neutral-toned eyeshadows that deliver highly pigmented, easy-to-blend colour. The ideal kit for adding a healthy flush to your skin, it also contains a compact blush to make cheeks pop. Complete with six luscious lip glosses, an eye primer and two dual-ended sponge tip applicators. Built-in mirror for on-the-go touch-ups.
Contains: 1 x concealer, 1 x compact blush, 1 x all over, 1 x eye primer, 6 x compact eyeshadows, 2 x double sponge tip applicators, 6 x lip glosses.

name: Golden Snail Intensive BB Cream SPF50+ PA+++ 45g
product_description:
Perfect your complexion with the Golden Snail Intensive BB Cream SPF50 PA++ from innovative Korean skincare brand Skin79.
Balancing a careful selection of patented ingredients and plants, the tinted moisturiser delivers a triple-action formula that seeks to combat signs of premature ageing, intensively hydrate and shield against harmful UV rays.
Suitable for all skin types, the advanced formula contains a Golden Snail Multi Complex; renowned for its reparative properties, with Snail Mucus Filtrate helping to repair damaged skin cells and replenish moisture levels for a smooth and softened texture. Enriched with extracts of Red Ginseng and Yam Root, redness and imperfections appear corrected and skin looks revitalised and flawless.

name: Lipstick - Cherry Blossom
product_description:
Add a pop of colour to your makeup look with Mavala Lipstick in 'Cherry Blossom'.
Gliding effortlessly across lips in a uniform layer, the lightweight lipstick delivers a rich, creamy hue that won't settle into fine lines. Its long-lasting coverage ensures lips feel comfortable all day, even if prone to dryness. Ideal for dry or sensitive lips, the lip colour helps protect against dryness for a healthy, supple-looking pout.

name: LONDON Sheer Wisdom Lip Oil 2.5ml - Buff
product_description:
Add a pop of wearable colour to your lips with butter LONDON Sheer Wisdom Lip Oil in 'Buff', a warm nude lip colour that deeply nourishes and revitalises your pout.
The makeup-meets-skincare formula combines a host of beneficial ingredients that work in synergy to condition, moisturise and protect your lips, all while imparting a beautiful, glossy hue. Gliding effortlessly onto lips, the melting, creamy oil fuses Tahitian Coconut Oil with Chia Seed Oil and Amino Acids to nourish, revitalise and firm the appearance of lips. It delivers a sheer colour whilst providing anti-ageing and antioxidant benefits. Lips feel intensely pampered and luscious.

name: LONDON Sheer Wisdom Serum Eye Shadow 4ml - Sepia Tan
product_description:
Create a neutral eye makeup look with the butter LONDON Sheer Wisdom Serum Eye Shadow in 'Sepia Tan', a natural-looking eyeshadow that combines the benefits of makeup with anti-ageing skincare.
Delivering a neutral hue with satin-matt finish, the eyeshadow contains a blend of anti-ageing peptides to help improve the appearance of wrinkles, and Spherical Polymers for a smoothing effect. Gliding effortlessly onto lids, the uniquely textured eyeshadow transforms from a fluid serum to a light powder, imparting high performance pigments with a subtle wash of colour that resists creasing for a flawless, natural makeup look. It blends easily and adheres seamlessly to the lids. Perfect worn alone or as a primer for other eyeshadows.

name: The Luxe Collection False Eyelashes - Cameo
product_description: Add sultry definition to your peepers with Eylure's 'Cameo' False Eyelashes from The Luxe Collection. Super soft, lightweight and reusable, the tapered, silk-effect lashes are perfect for any occasion; their three quarter design kick out at the corner of the eyes to create an elongated effect. Perfect for adding a romantic flutter to your peepers. Glossy and long-lasting.

theBalm沙漠古铜粉饼，内含一种两用粉饼，可用作轮廓粉和腮红，缔造出阳光肤色。
本款持久长效的古铜色粉饼，尤其适用于全脸涂抹，展示哑光棕色妆容、使肌肤容光焕发；同时重塑颧骨、额头、及下巴，使面部妆容精致。 可防褪色、自然晒黑色调，也可兼做阳光肤色腮红，打造淡淡的海滩阳光浴后肤色。 - K.N

colour: Blush, Cherry, Diva, Fire, Fuchsia, Intimacy, Lust, Scarlett, Tulip Red, Vintage Pink, 橘色
name: & Berry 20100 唇膏笔（多色系）
product_description:
Lord & Berry 20100 唇膏筆可打造長效活力唇色，令雙唇呈現迷人光澤。它質地柔滑，極易上色，可精緻均勻地覆蓋雙唇。 - LM 
 使用說明： 可隨時塗抹於嘴唇。

colour: 100 Pink Me Love Me, 120 You're All Mine, 200 It's a Keeper, 500 Revolution Red, 510 Best of the Best, 610 Cheeky Coral, 620 Call Me Crazy, 800 Under My Spell, 810 One-of-a-Kind

product_description: 利用Rimmel的唯一Lipstick完善您的翘唇。 拥有光滑、霜膏质地和倾斜尖端，该口红可轻松涂抹于双唇，提供持久、高冲击力的颜色。 利用其不干燥、滋润配方即刻获得华丽的双唇。 从一系列的色调中选择您的本季最爱。 E.N.

product_description:
Expertly define eyes with the Le Stylo Ultra Slim Liquid Eyeliner from Chantecaille, an innovative liner with similarities to a graceful calligraphy pen which allows easy application with optimum control and precision.
Infused with Rosewater, Natural Clay and Acrylic Polymers, the formula ensures long-lasting wear and concentrated colour pigmentation for sharp contrast. The perfectly calibrated tip glides onto the lid smoothly without the need to tug or pull, adding intense definition to the lash line instantly. Water-resistant and smudge-proof, the eyeliner creates effortless yet perfect cat-eyes, flicks and wings.

product_description: Billion Dollar Brows剪刀，具有耐久性和高性能，让您轻松自如地修剪眉毛。 该剪刀由优质不锈钢制作，拥有超薄精密刀片，出色的控制性和准确性，帮您打造完美眉形。

超保湿配方，内含抗氧化绿茶成分，可保护软化嘴唇；具有创新型植物微粒和独特的胶凝系统，打造丰满立体的妆容。 可单独使用或涂抹在您钟爱的口红上方。

name: Absolu Rouge Matte Lipstick (Various Shades)
product_description:
Let your lips do the talking with the Lancôme Absolu Rouge Matte Lipstick; hydrating lip colour that arrives in a variety of shades, from timeless hues to vibrant new colours.
The lip-shaping lipstick treats the pout to a veil of moisturising colour, simply click the rose and sweep effortlessly over lips. Utilising Pro-Xylane™, the creamy formula seeks to boost skin’s moisture levels, leaving lips kissably soft, hydrated and comfortable.
Each L’Absolu Rouge Matte Lipstick offers creamy mate results, without stripping skin of moisture. Expect enviable definition.

colour: Beige Bite, Love Blush, Makeout Merlot, Melon Crush, Orchid Crush, Pink Pucker, Ravishing Rose, Ruby Romance

product_description:
Add a slick of rich colour to your pout with Laura Geller's Fifty Kisses Lip Locking Liquid Color, a pure pigment liquid lipstick with soft, satin finish.
Delivering a highly pigmented hue that stays true to colour, the lipstick glides effortlessly onto lips with its uniquely curved applicator; it hugs the natural lip contour to ensure precise, professional-looking results. Equipped with a built-in well to ensure the perfect amount of colour is delivered every time. Lips look luscious and irresistibly kissable.

colour: Coral Caress, Heavenly Rose, Nude Oasis, Pampering Pink, Purple Serenity, Rejuvenate Red
name: Arden Lip Oil 7ml (Various Shades)
product_description:
Douse your lips in hydrating colour. Elizabeth Arden's Lip Oil is a lightweight lip colour that combines the hydrating benefits of an oil with the pigment of a gloss.
Delivering a slick of luscious colour, the tinted lip oil is infused with five precious oils (including Coconut and antioxidant Avocado) that work in synergy to hydrate, protect and deliver anti-ageing effects. Lending lips a glossy finish which creates the appearance of a fuller-looking pout, the lip oil smoothens and moisturises whilst adding a pop of colour to your makeup look. Feels comfortable on application.

name: Lash Booster Mascara
product_description:
这款睫毛膏为全能型产品，既可以让睫毛保持卷曲，也可以固定睫毛形状、还能使睫毛看起来更长或者更浓。您的眼睛会看起来更为性感，让您的眼部具有闪亮光泽、防水的妆效。
此款睫毛膏可以让您的睫毛达到美丽的极致，使其看起来浓密多彩，效果持久。 此款锥形刷可以刷到所有睫毛的根部区域，采用的防晕染配方可以让每根睫毛更长、更为浓密。

name: for Men Super Smooth Lip Balm 15ml
product_description: Treat dry, chapped lips to the Super Smooth Lip Balm from Recipe for Men. Enriched with a moisturising blend of Shea Butter, Lanolin and Beeswax, the non-sticky formula delivers superior hydration, whilst Vitamin E defends against environmental aggressors to restore soft, comfortable lips. Housed in a convenient tube for use on-the-go, its dose of Menthol cools and soothes, leaving lips refreshed, revitalised and conditioned no matter where you are.

name: 睫毛膏——浓密纤长 6.5 毫升
product_description:
MDMflow 浓密纤长睫毛膏可最大化拉长您的睫毛；这款浓密的黑色睫毛膏帮您缔造轮廓清晰、层次分明和丰盈诱惑的睫毛。
其非常易于着色的配方蕴含有丰富的蜂蜡、甘油、巴西棕榈蜡，可帮您缔造纤长粗壮的睫毛，其特殊的刷头设计旨在从根到稍刷到每根睫毛，以实现最佳效果。 这款睫毛膏易于卸妆，让您每次使用都有所期待的轻松卸妆效果，而且这款睫毛膏不会出现打结问题。

name: B. Eye All Over Brush #3
product_description: Blend, build and contour eyeshadow with the Lilah B. Eye All Over Brush #3, a chic tool designed to allow you to create a professional makeup look with ease. It features super soft fluffy bristles for superior blendability and a long stem handle for enhanced control, plus it’s suitable for wet and dry applications to create varied finishes. Achieve a sultry smoky eye with multiple hues or gently dust one colour all over for a natural daytime look.

name: LONDON Plush Rush Lip Gloss - Pillow Talk
product_description:
Enhance the look of your pout with butter LONDON Plush Rush Lip Gloss, a plumping lip formula that works to add a slick of colour to your lips whilst creating a fuller appearance.
Delivering high shine colour, the lip gloss glides effortlessly across lips with a cushion like feel, and expertly stimulates hyaluronic synthesis to enhance your natural lip shape. Lips appear fuller, smoother and plumper. Leaving lips with a lasting tingling sensation, the lip gloss will boost lips, your mood and your confidence.

name: LONDON Plush Rush Lip Gloss - First Kiss
product_description:
Enhance the look of your pout with butter LONDON Plush Rush Lip Gloss, a plumping lip formula that works to add a slick of colour to your lips whilst creating a fuller appearance.
Delivering high shine colour, the lip gloss glides effortlessly across lips with a cushion like feel, and expertly stimulates hyaluronic synthesis to enhance your natural lip shape. Lips appear fuller, smoother and plumper. Leaving lips with a lasting tingling sensation, the lip gloss will boost lips, your mood and your confidence.

name: LONDON Plush Rush Lipstick - Delighted
product_description:
Treat your lips to the moisturising and plumping properties of butter LONDON Plush Rush Lipstick, a long-wearing, creamy lipstick that delivers a shock of colour whilst dousing lips in essential moisture.
Accentuating the natural curves of your pout, the luscious formula is enriched with a Phyto-Endorphin Complex to boost your mood, and a Plumping Complex to help increase the appearance of fullness; lips look smoother, firmer and more defined. Standing the test of time, the lipstick withstands feathering and bleeding, so your pout looks irresistably kissable, for longer.

name: LONDON Plush Rush Lipstick - Provocative
product_description:
Treat your lips to the moisturising and plumping properties of butter LONDON Plush Rush Lipstick, a long-wearing, creamy lipstick that delivers a shock of colour whilst dousing lips in essential moisture.
Accentuating the natural curves of your pout, the luscious formula is enriched with a Phyto-Endorphin Complex to boost your mood, and a Plumping Complex to help increase the appearance of fullness; lips look smoother, firmer and more defined. Standing the test of time, the lipstick withstands feathering and bleeding, so your pout looks irresistably kissable, for longer.

colour: Apocalypse Red, Gone with the Nude, Hollywood Beige, King Pink, Pink Lady, Red Actually, Tangerine Vertigo, Wuthering Purple
name: Paris Infallible Lip Paint 8ml (Various Shades)
product_description:
Saturate your lips in colour with LOréal Paris Infallible Lip Paint, a high impact lip colour with long-wearing, full coverage finish.
Delivering a highly pigmented hue, the liquid lipstick glides effortlessly across lips with its precise applicator and imparts a vibrant shock of colour that feels comfortable on lips.

name: Chocolate Lip Balm
product_description:
Soothe your sugar cravings with the Hurraw! Chocolate Lip Balm; an ultra-hydrating formula that cares for skin using premium organic, vegan and raw ingredients.
The super smooth balm is enriched with a sweet, skin-loving blend of Coconut Oil, Cocoa Seed Butter and Jojoba Seed Oil, which deliver a nourishing veil of hydration to eliminate dryness and ensure lips feel comfortable. Finished with a generous dose of unsweetened raw chocolate, the creamy formula reveals moisturised lips that are scented with a delicious chocolate aroma.

name: Mesmerizing Mineral Palette - Sunset Mattes
product_description:
Achieve endless make-up looks with the Pixi Mesmerising Mineral Palette. Combining six shades of eye shadow in complementing shades, you can define and highlight your eyes for natural-looking results with excellent colour longevity and seamless blendability.
Formulated with light-reflecting minerals and nourishing vitamin E to protect the delicate skin around the eye, the silky powder melts effortlessly onto the lids to deliver medium-toned hues that won't crease or fade. Complete with a dual-ended sponge-tip applicator.

name: 洁面摩丝（150ml）
product_description:
Uriage洁面摩丝是一款清洁乳液， 可轻松产生很多泡沫，消除日常污垢、彩妆，而不会令肌肤过度干燥或紧绷。
本款无皂料摩丝配方温和清洁，保持肌肤自然平衡，使肌肤清新洁净。内含亚速尔群岛石榴提取物及Uriage温泉水，可舒缓保护肌肤、滋润肌肤。 肌肤柔软干净、容光焕发。

name: Vamp Extreme! Mascara - Extra Black 12ml
product_description:
Achieve fuller, thicker looking lashes with the PUPA Vamp Extreme! Mascara; a volumising, intense black mascara that delivers ultimate impact and definition without clumping.
With a high concentration of pure black pigments and unique polymers, the innovative formula works to curl, lengthen and amplify lashes, whilst its specially designed brush allows mistake-free, controlled application. Captures even the shortest lashes for a wide-awake, show-stopping finish.

name: Foundation Case
product_description: Made to house the UV Powder Foundation, this sleek RMK Foundation Case boasts two compartments for foundation and an applicator sponge. Also designed with a compact mirror for easy touch-ups. K.D.

name: Le Chrome豪华双色眼影：圣马可广场
product_description:
Chantecaille Le Chrome 豪华双色眼影，内含两种高色素金属眼影，尤其适用于打造各种烟熏眼妆，使眼睛看起来更生动明艳。
超级柔软、持久长效，妆效光滑；无折痕，融合性超好。涂刷干眼影，妆容纯粹闪亮；涂刷湿眼影，可加深色调，打造液态金属妆效。 装在便捷的别致小盒中，小盒带有化妆镜和两涂刷装置。尤其适用于随时随地需要补妆者。
色调： 乳鸽色 （午夜紫色）和大理石色 （软灰）

name: Compulsive Cosmetics Large Powder Brush #001
product_description: Achieve a flawless make-up look with the Large Powder Brush #001 from Obsessive Compulsive Cosmetics. Crafted from sustainable materials and bonded with vegan-sourced adhesive, the brush features an oversized head with nylon and taklon fibres that perfectly distribute powder, liquid and cream products. Its weighted, nickel-plated ferrule and ergonomic handle allow effortless blending for a smooth, even and professional finish every time.

name: LONDON Plush Rush Lip Gloss - Flash Mob
product_description:
Enhance the look of your pout with butter LONDON Plush Rush Lip Gloss, a plumping lip formula that works to add a slick of colour to your lips whilst creating a fuller appearance.
Delivering high shine colour, the lip gloss glides effortlessly across lips with a cushion like feel, and expertly stimulates hyaluronic synthesis to enhance your natural lip shape. Lips appear fuller, smoother and plumper. Leaving lips with a lasting tingling sensation, the lip gloss will boost lips, your mood and your confidence.

name: Compulsive Cosmetics Short Shader Brush #006
product_description:
Define your eyes with the Short Shader Brush #006 from Obsessive Compulsive Cosmetics. Crafted from sustainable materials and bonded with vegan-sourced adhesive, the brush features a weighted, nickel-plated ferrule for superior control.
With a thick, compact head and soft, synthetic nylon and taklon fibres, the professional brush can be used to apply and blend eyeshadow on the entire lid. Delivers the perfect amount of product, allowing you to shade, smudge and create expert make-up looks.

name: Definition Domed Buffer Brush
product_description: Achieve smooth, streak-free results with the Domed Buffer Brush from High Definition. Ideal for blending foundation, concealer or contouring products, its super-soft bristles and specially shaped head allow you to create a flawless, airbrushed effect with ease.

name: 5-in-1 BB Cream Eyeshadow Shade Extension - Luminous Pearl
product_description:
The bareMinerals 5-in-1 BB Cream Eyeshadow is the next generation of eyeshadow; offering a powerful combination of makeup and skincare for truly flawless results.
The featherlite hybrid formula glides onto the lid with a rich, creamy colour coverage, working to smooth the look of fine lines and discolouration while priming skin to create the perfect base that doesn’t crease or smudge for optimum adherence and staying power.
With the addition of brightening actives and mineral-based SPF 15 filters, the eyeshadow is easily applied with the paddle applicator and can be blended and layered for the desired effect. Wear alone or underneath your favourite eyeshadows for up to 12 hours wear.

name: Color Lip Gloss - 06 Spice Red
product_description:
Drench your lips in a lustrous sheen with the RMK Color Lip Gloss in 'Spice Red'.
Combining the vibrant colour of a lipstick with the clarity of a lip Gloss, the colour glides effortlessly over lips with its square-shaped applicator, and delivers a veil of sheer yet brilliant colour. Its host of moisturising ingredients, including Shea Butter, Rosehip Oil keep lips feeling hydrated and comfortable.

name: Color Lip Gloss - 01 Soft Pink
product_description:
Drench your lips in a lustrous sheen with the RMK Color Lip Gloss in 'Soft Pink'.
Combining the vibrant colour of a lipstick with the clarity of a lip Gloss, the colour glides effortlessly over lips with its square-shaped applicator, and delivers a veil of sheer yet brilliant colour. Its host of moisturising ingredients, including Shea Butter, Rosehip Oil keep lips feeling hydrated and comfortable.

name: Vintage Cosmetics Company Rose Infused Cosy Socks - Pink
product_description:
Keep your feet snug and smelling sweet with The Vintage Cosmetics Company Rose Infused Cosy Socks.
Infused with a sweet Rose scent, the slipper socks will keep your feet warm and cosy whilst imparting a subtle fragrance to help uplift the senses.

name: Vinoperfect Radiance Tinted Moisturizer Broad Spectrum SPF20 - 02 Medium
product_description: Caudalie Vinoperfect Radiance Tinted Moisturizer Broad Spectrum SPF20 是一款轻盈的肤色修正霜。 其独特的天然色素与肌肤融为一体，以减少瑕疵、黑斑和粉刺，呈现健康、亮泽的肤色。 这款无油脂保湿霜可提供防晒膜，避免肌肤受到阳光的有害紫外线的伤害，令肌肤水润并呈现天然亮泽。 E.N.

name: 娜迪奥 Clever Stick Spf15 - 裸色 (15G)
product_description:
集粉底、遮瑕膏和粉餅多重功用於一身，其防曬係數為SPF 15，絲滑質地，呈現無暇、無痕絲滑美肌。 
使用說明：

name: Face Pop W Stick Gloss - Teatime Dream
product_description:
Enhance your pout with RMK's Face Pop W Stick Gloss in 'Teatime Dream', a dual-ended lip gloss with Jelly Gloss to one end and Color Gloss to the other.
Combining rich pink with a muted beige, each gloss glides effortlessly across lips, delivering a luscious hue with creamy texture and shiny finish. Lips look healthy and glossy.

Zelens增彩和补水丝滑妆前乳改造暗沉干燥的皮肤，持久覆盖粉底。 其无油配方含氨基酸，可保持皮肤的水分含量，同时减少多余的油，收窄毛孔，使肤色均匀。 轻巧透气的妆前乳为在皮肤上完美无瑕地打粉底做好准备，并增加光泽，使皮肤焕发自然光彩。 它有抗氧化作用，能防止自由基的侵害和环境刺激，还有消炎作用，顺滑干燥的皮肤。 E.N. 
使用方法： 涂在粉底下，实现全覆盖，或者单独涂在保湿霜上，达到裸妆效果。

name: Face Pop Eyes - Golden Soft Beige
product_description:
RMK Face Pop Eyes in 'Golden Soft Beige' is a limited edition eyeshadow duo that has been specially curated in celebration of the brand's twentieth birthday.
Each striking eyeshadow (pink and neutral) delivers a shimmering finish that blends effortlessly on the lid. Wear each colour individually or blend together to create a bold or subtle makeup finish. Complete with a dual-ended sponge tip applicator.

name: 唇彩——浅粉色（5毫升）
product_description:
用Zelens唇彩重塑双唇，经滋养的双唇闪耀细微光泽。 其特殊配方中有十五种活性成分，深入调理，使嘴唇感觉光滑饱满。 其天鹅绒般的质地可修复皲裂、开裂和干燥的嘴唇，愈合保护屏障，强化和再生嘴唇组织。
野芒果油水合物、乳木果油增加柔软度，透明质酸和绿色紫苏叶最大限度地减少细纹，并具有抗氧化保护作用，防止环境刺激。 这种奢华的打理可改善唇形、体积和颜色，同时保持水分。 这种唇膏小巧玲珑，最适合在路上使用。 E.N. 
使用说明： 只要皮肤感觉干燥或皲裂时就涂在嘴唇上。 也可用作隔夜丰唇护理。

name: Naturals 027号假睫毛
product_description: 使用 Eylure’s Naturals 027 号假睫毛突显您双眸的自然之美。  质地轻盈且可重复使用，有自然美感的假睫毛适合任何场合；其精致、丰盈的妆效和锥形尖端突显了您眼睛的自然之美。 Perfect为您的双眼巧妙地增添长度和丰盈感。。 功效持久。

name: Vintage Cosmetics Company Foundation Brush
product_description:
Achieve an airbrushed complexion with The Vintage Cosmetics Company Foundation Brush, a flat, slightly tapered brush that expertly applies liquid foundation with flawless results.
Fitted with soft, synthetic bristles and rust-proof aluminium ferrules, the brush distributes foundation evenly across skin and allows you to buff and blend product onto skin for a seamless, even toned makeup look. Complete with a cream wooden handle.

name: Vintage Cosmetics Company Contour Face Make-Up Brush Set
product_description:
The Vintage Cosmetics Company Contour Face Make-Up Brush Set combines a trio of must-have face brushes for achieving a professionally chiselled and contoured complexion. Each brush serves its own purpose; defining your facial features, adding colour to cheeks and enhancing your natural luminosity. Fitted with soft, synthetic bristles and an aluminium ferrule for a long-lasting, rust-free life.
Flat Contour Brush
A densely bristled, flat contouring brush that helps to add depth and dimension to your facial features. Perfect used with powder or cream contour products, the brush expertly defines and sculpts, adding depth to the hollows of your cheeks, hairline, jawline and either side of the nose. Expect a professionally contoured complexion.
Angled Blusher Brush
A soft and angled blusher brush that adds a flush of rosy colour to your cheeks. The angled design is perfect for applying blush products to the apples of your cheeks and sweeping across to the temples to create a warm and healthy-looking complexion.
Stippling Brush
Perfect for adding the finishing touch to your makeup look. The dense brush can be used with concealer or liquid and powder highlighters to help illuminate areas of the face that naturally catch the light (such as brow bones, cheekbones, inner corners of the eye and down the centre of the nose). It expertly applies and blends product to leave your complexion looking flawless and expertly contoured.

name: 2X Sigma Spa® Brush清洁手套- 粉色
product_description:
Sigma 2X Sigma Spa®Brush清洁手套是从原来的清洗手套的升级，旨在高性能和更舒适地彻底清洁您最喜欢的化妆刷。
清洁手套有两个大拇指，可以轻松舒适地从眼部转到面部，并结合八种专利清洗物质，包括新的"Refined Plus Eyes"和"Refined Plus Face"。 它的小巧、舒适贴合为您提供更多控制性和抓握便利，它旨在深层清洁您的眼部和面部化妆刷。 采用高性能、凸起硅树脂以便进行更强效、深层清洁。 - K.N.

name: IL Bacio Kit - Classic Rose
product_description:
Add a pop of colour to your makeup look with Pupa's IL Bacio Kit in 'Classic Rose', a portable lip colour palette offering one lip gloss and three creamy lipsticks.
Housed in a novelty, lip-shaped compact with gold crown embellishment, the palette is the smallest piece from the 'This is a Love Story' collection, and is the perfect way to add a touch of colour to your complexion. Use the creamy lipstick colours all-over the lips, and add a splash of gloss to the centre of lips to create the appearance of a fuller pout.
Perfect for popping in your handbag, it is equipped with a handy mirror for on-the-go touch-ups.

name: Face Pop W Stick Gloss - Romantic Sparkle
product_description:
Enhance your pout with RMK's Face Pop W Stick Gloss in 'Romantic Sparkle', a dual-ended lip gloss with Jelly Gloss to one end and Color Gloss to the other.
Combining rich pink with a muted beige, each gloss glides effortlessly across lips, delivering a luscious hue with creamy texture and shiny finish. Lips look healthy and glossy

name: Definition Complexion Essentials
product_description: The High Definition Complexion Essentials set combines four must-have makeup products to help you achieve a warm, sculpted, defined and highlighted complexion.

name: Pro Stippling Brush
product_description:
令湿性和干性化妆品完美融合于您的肌肤，打造自然无暇底妆。 双层刷毛，轻松涂抹，实为必备化妆神器。 - L.M.
使用说明：用双层刷毛将湿性和干性化妆品涂抹融合于您的肌肤。

name: Color Blender SPF30 PA+++ - Pink
product_description:
Korean skincare brand, Skin79, present the Color Blender SPF30 PA+++ in 'Pink'; a triple-function, anti-ageing formula that works to correct and conceal yellow tones on the complexion.
Fortified with Calendula Oil, Red Ginseng and Vitamin B3, the lightweight, radiance-renewing emulsion addresses dullness and uneven skin tone, whilst providing UV protection to defend against environmental aggressors and the sun's harmful rays. Expect a brighter, smoother and more refined complexion with minimised wrinkles.

name: Vintage Cosmetics Company Teardrop Blending Sponge Infused with Vitamin E - Pink
product_description:
