name: 盈润修护唇膏（多色可选）
product_description: 让 Rimmel 盈润修护唇膏为双唇增添一抹色彩。 维生素A、C和E将会唇部注入大量的水分，让双唇变得丰盈，焕然一新。 这款护唇膏采用轻盈质地，保持一整天的舒适，为双唇增添色彩。 通过了皮肤科专家的临床试验。 LB

colour: Alive, Alskling, Cool, Hjarta, Ladakh, Naked, Potential, Silk, Success, Summer, Tint, Ullas Roda, V.I.P.
name: Stockholm Lipstick 3.4g
product_description:
选用 FACE Stockholm 口红为嘴唇描绘动人色彩。 提供三种配方：传统膏体、经典亚光和微妙薄雾。每种唇膏在涂抹时只需撅一下嘴便可轻松完成。
唇色提供持久的妆效；通过融合滋养油和蜂蜡，本品可软化嘴唇，同时强化自然噘嘴。 化妆包中的完美必备品。 – E.W.

name: Beauty Volumizing Mascara
product_description:
Achieve intensely full eyelashes with the Volumizing Mascara from RMS, a mascara to instantly thicken, lengthen and extend the lashes. The exclusive brush is designed to shape and intensify the fullness of the lashes for a stunning effect.
The 100% natural, glossy black formula with mineral pigments and organic plant waxes ensures the mascara will not clump, flake or smudge and lashes will appear thicker and more voluminous.

name: 光泽妆前乳
product_description:
這款產品能令肌膚煥發光彩，同時改善提亮膚色。這款獨特的妝前乳含反光色素，可吸收光線以增強皮膚自然的光澤，令皮膚呈現珍珠般亮白。本品能保護肌膚，讓肌膚呈現絲般柔滑，便於上妝。 KD 
 使用說明：

偷香睫毛膏 ，使睫毛浓密乌黑，可重塑双眼。富含泛醇，可调理睫毛，加强睫毛韧性。
使睫毛浓密纤长，增强睫毛韧性。配有螺旋睫毛刷；不结块配方，可涂覆每根睫毛，给大家带来强烈的视觉冲击，从睫毛根部至睫毛梢，打造引人注目的假睫毛效果。 令双眼性感迷人。 - K.N

name: Cosmetics Foundation 隔离霜
product_description:
这款Bellapierre CosmeticsFoundation隔离霜是一款完美的隔离霜，旨在消除肌肤的干燥状态和细纹，为您的粉底打造完美的基础。 这款配方不含苯甲酸酯类，蕴含了具有滋养功能的矿物，能迅速被肌肤吸收，不会留下粘性残留物。
在涂抹粉底之前将本品涂抹到肌肤上，打造可以持续一整天的完美无暇的妆容。 K.D.
使用说明：

name: Lookfantastic Exclusive Quad Palette
product_description:
The Illamasqua Lookfantastic Exclusive Quad Palette is a limited edition eyeshadow set with four complementary shades to create a stunning look.
Housed in a sleek mirrored compact, each shade boasts a water-resistant, silk-textured formula for seamless application and blending, with refined silicone particles to ensure long-lasting wear. Worn separately or layered for a sultry smoky eye, the mixture of shimmering copper tones with neutral nudes and a pop of colour are perfect for building a unique finish.
Shades: Servant, Tango, Terra, Vernau.

name: Glow Foundation SPF37 PA+++ #23
product_description:
Achieve a smooth, flawless complexion with the Glow Foundation SPF37 PA+++ from Korean Skincare brand, Skin79, a lightweight liquid foundation that delivers long-wearing, natural-looking coverage.
Enriched with Avocado Oil, Niacinamide and Allantoin, the blendable, buildable foundation infuses skin with intense moisture and hydration, whilst camouflaging blemishes and imperfections for an airbrushed finish. Its Multiple Shining Effect brightens and whitens lack-lustre complexions to correct dull, uneven skin tones without fear of the product caking.

name: London工作室之星 ——点画刷
product_description: Lottie London工作室之星——点画刷 尤其适用于涂抹粉底液及粉底霜，展示完美无瑕的底妆。 二种纤维设计，只需将刷毛沾到粉底上，随后在肌肤上以小圆形旋转轻扫，使妆容完美无刷痕。

colour: Fuchsia Flood (#512), Iced Iris (#510), Juniper Water (#531), Orchid Ocean (#533), Russet River (#532), Scarlet Soaked (#520), Tulip Tide (#515)
name: Bees Lipstick (Various Shades)
product_description:
Discover conditioning lip colour with a Lipstick from Burt's Bees. Combining vivid colour with 8-hour moisture, each luxurious lipstick delivers full coverage and an intense hue with a smooth, satin finish.
Without drying out lips, the lipstick formula is fortified with completely natural, moisturising ingredients. A blend of Moringa and Raspberry seed oils, works harmoniously with Beeswax and Vitamin E to leave lips soft, smooth and hydrated.

name: Lip Stick - Mirage
product_description: Add sumptuous, saturated colour to your pout with the Chantecaille Lip Stick; a long-wearing, creamy lipstick that glides on effortlessly to deliver comfortable, full coverage. Infused with natural Beeswax, emollient Amino Acids and Vitamins A and C, the nourishing formula leaves lips velvety soft, smooth and hydrated.

name: Vata Lip Balm
product_description:
Discover a unique chapstick with the Hurraw! Vata Lip Balm; an ultra-hydrating formula that cares for skin using premium organic, vegan and raw ingredients.
Inspired by basic Ayurvedic Dosha principles, a traditional medicine of India, the rich lip balm is infused with Cold Pressed Organic Sesame Seed Oil and an array of plants, fruits and roots known to complement each Dosha. The creamy balm is enriched with organic Coconut Oil, Cacao Butter and Castor Oil, which work in synergy to deliver long-lasting moisture that ensures lips are free from dryness.
Complete with fragrances from three essential oils; soothing almond, spicy cardamom and Turkish rose, the lip balm envelops lips in nourishing moisture and a unique scent.

name: Lipstick
product_description: 使用 Illamasqua Lipstick为您的面部添加华丽、湿润的色彩。 这款妆效持久的唇膏有各种奶油哑光系列色和闪光的饰面，可轻松上妆，在软化和爽肤的同时仅用寥寥几笔即可传递甜美的色彩。 Lips变得光滑、舒服和有型。

name: Black 天然润唇膏（4.25g）
product_description: Jack Black 天然润唇膏可有效舒缓干燥、皲裂和敏感的唇部肌肤。 这款旋转式不油腻的唇膏蕴含有维他命 C、可可油和荷荷巴油，能滋养和保湿双唇，而天然薄荷油具有爽肤功效，让双唇散发着清爽的薄荷芳香。 让您的双唇更加柔软、舒适，保护唇部肌肤免受环境侵害因素的影响。

name: Color Show Kohl Eyeliner 5g (Various Shades)
product_description: Intensify your peepers with the Maybelline Color Show Khol Eyeliner. The creamy eyeliner glides effortlessly across the lid, delivering rich colour with its infusion of bold kohl pigments. The buildable liner is perfect for layering to create a range of customised, eye-defining look

name: Nine 波浪卷发棒
product_description: Cloud 9 波浪卷发棒是一款屡获殊荣的造型工具，适合长短发，它有一个又长又直而且光滑的圆筒，允许您打造令人惊叹的卷发。 这款卷发棒采用了创新的温度控制装置，为造型增加了灵活性，它还配有一个便利的支架，如此就可以将它放在支架上而不会损坏表面。 - E.D

name: Arden FourEver Bronzing Powder
product_description:
Sculpt and define your complexion with Elizabeth Arden FourEver Bronzing Powder; a 4-in-1 compact with bronzer, contour, highlight and blush powders.
Blending seamlessly together, the carefully curated shades add natural-looking warmth to your complexion whilst enhancing your best features; they also absorb excess oil to lend the skin a healthy, matt finish. Swirl the shades together and sweep all-over face, or use each colour alone to contour and highlight. The deep, contour shade is perfect for sculpting and adding dimension; apply around the face, along the jawline and in the hollows of the cheeks. The bronzer is best applied all over for a healthy, sunkissed complexion. The highlighter illuminates and brightens; apply to high points of the face, such as the brow bone, cheekbones and down the centre of the nose for a radiant makeup look. The blush will add a flush of natural colour to your cheeks.
Each ultra-refined powder is infused with soft focus, micro-fine particles to diffuse light and blur fine lines and wrinkles, and a dose of Hyaluronic Acid and antioxidant Vitamins to lock in moisture whilst protecting against premature ageing. Expect a sculpted, chiselled and sunkissed complexion.
Housed in a mirrored compact, and equipped with a half-moon brush for flawless application.

name: Mint Lip Balm
product_description:
Awaken dry lips with the Hurraw! Mint Lip Balm; an ultra-hydrating formula that cares for skin using premium organic, vegan and raw ingredients.
Effortlessly gliding over lips, the creamy lip balm is enriched with a skin-loving blend of Coconut Oil and Jojoba Seed Oil, which delivers instant and long-lasting hydration, whilst a generous dose of Peppermint Oil offers a refreshing scent. Enveloping lips in a crisp, icy mint fragrance, the lip balm guarantees to reveal a comfortably hydrated smile.

name: Luminizing Satin Eye Color Trio RD711 - Pink Sand 3g
product_description:
Shiseido Luminizing Satin Eye Color Trio的Pink Sands系列带给您变幻多姿的眼妆体验。 这款小巧套装包含三种可混合的眼影粉、一支双头眼影棒和一支眼影刷，不同颜色可单独或混配使用，打造心仪妆效。
这款精巧的彩妆盘内置镜面，可随包携带、随时取用。 - K.R

name: 7g
product_description: 資生堂臉部三色粉使肌膚散發出自然的光澤。附帶一個小刷子，三合一的產品有修容，高光和腮紅。只用簡單的親親一抹您的臉頰就會散發出自然的光澤。這款產品的設計仔細考慮了顏色和質感，使妝容看起來更立體。單獨適用一個顏色或者三種顏色混在一起使用的顏色都很好看。

name: Kumadori 散粉刷
product_description:
Japonesque 最新 Kumadori 散粉刷  ，将日本的歌舞伎剧场与现代妆容的需要结合在一起。
采用天然纤维，使妆容无与伦比。这是一款多功能化妆刷，设有超软的圆刷头，尤其适用于为肌肤涂刷一层化妆粉；也可与粉底、定妆粉、或轮廓刷一起使用。 配有一把包有紫藤的舒适手柄。

name: Eye Shadow Brush
product_description:
Create professional eye make-up looks with the RMK Eye Shadow Brush; a short, densely packed tool that blends and distributes eyeshadow or powder products with minimal effort.
Featuring a tapered tip with an ultra-soft blend of squirrel and raccoon hair, the eyeshadow brush allows you to create smokey, blurred effects for a smouldering, salon-worthy finish.
Perfect for buffing out harsh lines, you can expect a seamless, diffused look every time.

name: & Berry 单声道卷笔刀
product_description: 用Lord & Berry 单声道卷笔刀在旅途中削尖唇线笔和眼线笔。 这款锋利的卷笔刀使用方便，可毫不费力地削尖您的唇线笔和眼线笔，而它的尺寸不大，适合放在手提包里应急，方便唇线笔和眼线笔突然断裂时使用。

name: Mineral Blusher Blooming Nude
product_description:
使用 INIKA Mineral Blusher 打造天然肌肤光泽，中性棕褐色腮红适合所有肤质。 高亮矿物配方，令妆容更加持久、色泽明艳，这款腮红是化妆包的必备品。
不含滑石粉、油脂、香精和防腐剂，亲肤的同时令肌肤呈现动人光彩。 K.D.使用说明：

name: 娜迪奥机械唇线笔 - 猩红
product_description:
Natio娜迪奧機械持久唇線筆 
採用防水防暈染配方研製而成，確保您無論陰晴，都整日靚麗迷人！設計為機械筆，使用方便，觸感有如天鵝絨般柔軟絲滑般，方便您描畫精準無暇唇妝，不暈染。

name: to PrimRose Lip Oil
product_description: The yes to PrimRose Lip Oil is a luscious multi-tasking treatment that leaves your pout feeling nourished, protected and hydrated with a subtle gloss finish. Containing soothing extract of Primrose, it intensively moisturises and softens for plush, kissable lips. Perfect worn alone or layered over lipstick.

name: Geller 劳拉·盖勒斜角液体粉底刷
product_description:
Laura Geller 劳拉·盖勒斜角液体粉底刷让您拥有不可挑剔的底妆；它是一款手工制成的专业合成纤维工具，用于无缝涂抹液体粉底。
这款粉底刷由 5,000 根超级柔软的刷毛构成，斜角的扁平刷头能够在面部进行更大面积的涂抹，而斜角的尖端非常适合勾勒眼部轮廓和涂抹鼻子和发际线周围的狭窄区域。 能进行中等至完全遮盖的无缝涂抹，让您拥有如画般的妆效。

name: London Flawless Base Brush
product_description: 使用 Lottie London's Flawless Base Brush 打造完美肤色 ，蓝色粉底刷子刷毛超柔软。 刷子Perfect适合使用您最钟爱的粉底液，使化妆品服帖在肌肤上，打造均匀平滑妆容。 使用超级柔软的刷子轻扫过面部，打造无暇妆容。 - K.N

name: Cosmetics Make Up Bag - I Came, I Saw, I Contoured
product_description: Stash your favourite makeup products in this Contour Cosmetics Make Up Bag. Crafted with a high-quality metallic finish, the chic wash bag features a top zip fastening and is perfectly sized to fit in your handbag for on-the-go applications. Complete with the playful slogan to the front – ‘I Came, I Saw, I Contoured’ – it’s the perfect storage solution.

name: Glamour Shot Matte Perfection Concealer 15ml
product_description:
Eliminate unwanted shine with the SAMPAR Glamour Shot Matte Perfection Concealer; an innovative, universal formula that targets oily skin at the T-zone.
Formulated with HQA Microlens, the transparent concealer glides onto skin, delivering an invisible, soft focus finish that illuminates and unifies the complexion. The clear formula utilises Lentil extract, which slows down sebum production and eliminates unwanted shine, whilst also reducing the appearance of enlarged pores.
The unique formula also boasts an Urban Advance Complex, which blends Shea Butter serum, Mint Endorphin and Probiotic Sugar together to act as an antioxidant shield. This protects skin from environmental aggressors, as well as strengthening its natural defences.
Expect an ultra-smooth complexion that is enviably matte and visibly healthy.

colour: After Midnight, Blackbird, Blue Jean Baby, Blue Velvet, Brown Eyed Girl, Brown Sugar, Deep Purple, Fade to Grey, Purple Rain, Teal Waters
name: Geller 劳拉·盖勒 INKcredible 防水眼线笔
product_description: Laura Geller 劳拉·盖勒 INKcredible 防水眼线笔能够专业地突出您的眼部轮廓。 其丝滑的配方能够轻松勾勒出极其自然的浓烈色彩眼线，不晕染不褪色，让您尽享定妆持久的专业级妆效。 它配备有内置研磨工具，让您每一次都可以精确涂抹。

name: & Berry 闪亮眼线笔 - 黑色
product_description:
忽闪忽闪大眼睛，眨巴眨巴亮晶晶细腻丝滑质地，令双眸闪亮迷人，其高色素配方赋予眼妆饱满色泽，惊世美眸再现。妆容持久、极富戏剧张力，也可用于描画性感烟熏妆。性质非常温和，不会刺激上下眼睑。
说明： 用短线条描画上下眼线，也可根据需要自行调节。

name: Enchanted After Dark False Eyelashes - Into Darkness
product_description: Achieve show-stopping results with the 'Into Darkness' Enchanted After Dark False Eyelashes from Eylure. Lightweight and reusable, the super soft false lashes are perfect for any occasion and eye shape; their graceful, wispy design with flair at the outer corners adds delicate definition to enhance natural beauty. Complete with adhesive glue and an instruction booklet for easy application.

name: Techniques Eyebrow Grooming Set
product_description:
Expertly frame the face with the Real Techniques Eyebrow Grooming Set; a five-piece collection that boasts all the essential tools for groomed and defined brows. Containing scissors, tweezers and three makeup brushes all houses inside a convenient pouch, the Eyebrow Grooming set is the perfect addition to any makeup collection.
Brow Scissors
Expertly groom brows with the stainless steel Brow Scissors. Crafted with rounded tips, the scissors are the perfect tool for trimming short and fine hairs. Expect sleek and tamed brows that frame the face.
Angled Tweezer
Keep on top of growing brows with the Angled Tweezer; a stainless steel tool developed for professional brow shaping. Crafted with flat, angled edges, the tweezer is able to reach the smallest of hairs to ensure brows are shaped and flawless.
Brow Brush
Achieve flawless eyebrows with the Brow Brush; a sleek, purple makeup brush that applies and blends product for a natural-looking finish. Crafted with an angled brush head and UltraPlush™ bristles, the brush assists in filling sparse brows and creating an on-trend, defined finish.
Brow Spoolie
Ensure brows are groomed using the Brow Spoolie. Designed with fine yet firm bristles, the spoolie combs through brows, taming strays and blending brow makeup for a natural-looking finish.
Brow Highlighting Brush
Complete the brows with the Brow Highlighting Brush; an essential tool for ultra-defined brows. Use the brush to conceal and highlight the brow bone for a professional looking finish.
Case
Keep your essentials organised with the Real Techniques Case. Boasting a number of compartments, the case keeps essential tools safe and tidy.

获得完美的肤色，而非只是在所化的妆容上层层扑粉！ 这款PÜR Minerals使用套装利用矿物颜料遮盖你的肌肤，遮盖效果显著。 目前，这与其他化妆产品无太大差异。 抗细纹和抗斑痕配方是PÜR Minerals的与众不同之处。 经过八周的临床研究，使用PUR Minerals使用套装后，89％的参与者认为他们的皮肤更加水嫩柔软，75％的人说他们的皮肤明显减少炎症的发生。 LB 套装包括： 4合1压制矿物质化妆粉（0.15盎司/ 4.3 克） 这个压制粉底含有乳木果油，维生素和专有的抗衰老综合成分，适用于所有皮肤类型。 结合纯矿物质粉底，遮瑕，散粉和SPF15等功效，当你在匆忙之中时，这款产品能满足你的所需，可呈现光彩照人的形象。 中性底霜（0.3液体盎司/ 10毫升）： 这款底霜的实际效果会使你的肌肤就像原本完美的画布一般，而非营造无瑕皮肤的一种错觉。 这款产品可减少黑斑，细纹和毛孔的出现，真正可以达到承诺的效果。 矿物质闪粉（0.12盎司/ 3.4 克）： 在调整肤色的同时，给你的肌肤赋予古铜色的外观。 矿物质闪粉给你提供了阳光照耀下的效果，同时紧致并呵护你的肌肤。 强效+ 睫毛膏（0.12盎司/ 3.4 克）： 无论你是想要更纤长，更浓密还是更卷翘的睫毛 - 强效+ 睫毛膏会帮你实现所有的愿望。 这款3合1功能的产品结合了富含维生素的配方，让你的睫毛不仅能锁住水分，而且看上去更健康。 一支减少结块的画棒可帮你营造丝丝分明，数量增多的精致睫毛效果。 塑形刷： 这款神奇的粉刷是为使用我们的4合1化妆粉而专门设计的，但是也可以与任何其他粉底产品配合使用。 达到完美均匀的遮盖效果，这款粉刷是必具之选。

  第1步：  在清洁，滋润的皮肤上平推中性底霜，并使其变干 。 第2步： 使用塑形刷将4合1压制矿物质化妆粉以打圈的方式涂抹，达到均匀，无暇定妆的效果。 所需的遮盖范围。 第3步：使用普通粉刷或塑形刷，将矿物质闪粉平扫到你的面部和颈部，达到健康光泽的效果。 第4步： 使用强效+睫毛膏完成最后妆容。 用画棒缓慢，细密，重复性地在上下睫毛处反复刷过。

name: Powder Brush
product_description:
Create a flawless base with the brushworks Powder Brush, a high quality makeup brush designed to apply and set makeup with expert results. 
Fitted with synthetic taklon bristles, the soft, fluffy, dome-shaped brush is ideal for use with both powder and liquid products; it effortlessly sweeps makeup across the face, seamlessly blending to ensure flawless coverage. Picking up and distributing the perfect amount of product, the brush facilitates easy makeup application, and when used with setting powder, will help to prolong makeup wear. Complete with a precision shaped handle.

name: Collections A09 Angled Eyeliner Brush
product_description:
Expertly line and define your peepers with the Spectrum Collections A09 Angled Eyeliner Brush; an ultra-soft makeup brush that combines a vibrant colour palette with expert hand-crafted design.
The ‘So Fine’ liner brush is Spectrum Collections’ thinnest brush. The precision tool comprises an ultra-fine brush head with a pointed tip and an angled ferrule. Ideal for application gel, cream or liquid eyeliner, the brush delivers superior precision and fluid movement for expert results.
The angled brush allows for additional control of the movement, meaning it’s never been easier to create a fine and fluid line to define eyes. The unicorn-inspired brush is a makeup bag essential.

name: 天然椰浆乳霜（70g）
product_description:
RMS 推出天然椰浆乳霜；其具有多重益处的有机配方采用创新型的技术，适用于面部、身体和秀发，能带给您清爽的舒适感。
这款轻盈的乳霜蕴含有丰富的月桂酸，以其抗菌和抗细菌作用而文明，可用作面部清洁剂、身体保湿乳、除臭剂，也可用作卸妆乳，能祛除最顽固的睫毛膏。
采用纯天然未萃取的抗氧化剂保护肌肤免受环境侵害因素的影响，预防肌肤提前衰老，这款椰浆乳霜能滋养、舒缓和水润所有类型的肌肤，包括敏感型肌肤、易受损伤和生痤疮的肌肤。 非常适合肘部、膝盖、晒伤和干燥的全身肌肤。

name: Definition Eye and Brow Palette in Vamp
product_description:
Make Up by HD Brows Eye and Brow Palette带给您完美逼真的眉毛妆效或是烟熏效果的眼妆体验，配有全能双头眉毛棒。 这款Vamp系列彩妆盘提供了中度棕色和深棕色的眉毛粉底，既能妆点眉毛，也能为双眼打造深浅有致的深色烟熏效果。
用提亮粉底来凸显眉骨；用黑色干/湿眉线粉底来勾画眉毛。 用本品内附的乳蜡轻扫眉毛能使其定型；喜欢的话还可以与粉底混合成霜质眼影。 - K.R

name: Bees Lipstick - Doused Rose
product_description: Add long-wearing, moisturising colour to your pout with the Burt's Bees Lipstick. Infused with nourishing Moringa and Raspberry Seed Oils, the satin-smooth formula glides on effortlessly to hydrate and protect lips, whilst delivering luxurious colour that lasts. Ideal for everyday wear.

name: Cosmetics Glowing Complexion Essentials Kit - Medium
product_description:
The Bellápierre Cosmetics Glowing Complexion Essentials Kit in 'Medium' combines a selection of must-have makeup products to leave your skin flawless and healthy looking. Utilising only natural and kind-to-skin ingredients, the collection is suitable for all skin types and will leave your skin looking radiant and feeling happy.
Makeup Base (8.5g):
A multi-tasking product that can be used as a concealer or waterproof base for other pigments. Its natural formula transforms shimmer products into matte shades, and expertly conceals blemishes and imperfections that are difficult to cover with makeup. Paraben free.
Mineral Foundation in 'Cinnamon' (4g):
A 5-in-1 mineral foundation formulated with four natural ingredients. Utilising kind and gentle minerals, the foundation delivers complete coverage as a foundation, and works as a concealer and setting powder whilst protecting skin with SPF 15+. Skin appears flawless and your natural skin tone is enhanced. Non-comedogenic.
Mineral Bronzer in 'Warming Matte' (2g):
A warming mineral bronzer with an award-winning, silky powder formula. Perfect for adding sunkissed radiance to your skin, the bronzer helps enhance your natural tone whilst delivering a healthy, natural-looking tan. Non-comedogenic, talc and paraben free.
Mineral Luminizer in 'Champagne' (2.35g):
A finely milled highlighter perfect for illuminating natural high points on the face. Dust lightly all over for a shimmery finish, or apply to cheekbones, brow bones and down the centre of the nose for a naturally radiant finish.
Kabuki Brush:
Specifically designed for use with mineral foundations and powders, this best-selling brush utilises synthetic bristles with a super-soft, dense shape that helps deliver complete and seamless coverage for flawless looking skin. 100% synthetic fibres that will not shed during application.

name: Eye Define Waterline - Tightline Black
product_description: Expertly enhance your peepers with the Pixi Eye Define Waterline; an ultra-black eye liner that delivers long-wearing, smudge-proof colour. Featuring a precision tip for mistake-free application, the retractable pencil glides on effortlessly to define and accentuate eyes with ultimate staying power. Waterproof.

name: BE213 - Nude 3g
product_description:
使用資生堂絲柔亮滑眼影組使你的眼睛變成焦點。由三種美麗的顏色組成，這款眼影盤含有一頭海綿和一頭刷子的眼影刷，使化妝變得更加方便不管你在哪。這款眼影非常容易上色，同時能夠輕易的暈開使您的眼妝看起來更加專業。 
 使用方法:

colour: Buff, Fair Beige, Natural Beige, Toffee, True Beige, True Ivory
name: Dream Satin Liquid Foundation 30ml (Various Shades)
product_description:
Achieve a smooth, flawless complexion with the Maybelline Dream Satin Liquid Foundation; a lightweight, breathable formula that allows you to create an airbrushed, poreless finish.
Delivering full, blendable coverage, its satin texture applies seamlessly to deliver long-wearing, natural-looking colour that hides the appearance of visible pores and imperfections. Infused with Hyaluronic Acid SPF 13, you can expect an even, picture-perfect complexion that lasts for up to ten hours.

colour: Deep, Fair, Golden Medium, Honey, Light, Medium, Porcelain, Sand, Tan
name: Geller 劳拉·盖勒烘焙液体亮肤粉底液 30ml
product_description:
体验下一代烘焙美妆产品。 Laura Geller 劳拉·盖勒烘焙液体亮肤粉底液采用烘焙液体配方，让您尽享第二层肌肤自然而全面的妆效。
这款美妆产品质地轻盈，定妆持久，具有柔彩矫正功能，可专业地隐藏瑕疵，均匀肤色，增强肌肤的光泽度。 其无痕的液体配方蕴含有多种保湿成分，将松散的颜料混合在杏仁油中，然后将其在赤陶瓷砖上烘焙，以形成完美的彩色微粒，可轻松涂抹到肌肤上。
让您拥有梦寐以求的光滑与光泽，帮您缔造可供拍照的妆效。

name: Dollar Brows Brows on Point Micro Pencil - Light Brown
product_description:
Achieve flawless eyebrows with the Brows on Point Micro Pencil - Light Brown from brow experts Billion Dollar Brows. Dual ended, Brows on Point comprises a precision point to one end and a spoolie brush to the other. The ultra-fine tip creates natural looking brush strokes that mimic the appearance of individual hairs for a subtle finish, whilst the spoolie can be used to comb and blend.
The pencil boasts a mechanical function, constantly delivering a precision tip without the need to sharpen. Filling in sparse brows to accentuate your look, the brow makeup offers maximum colour pay off and a professional finish. The formula is both water and smudge proof, gliding onto brows effortlessly and providing long lasting results.

colour: Deep, Fair, Light, Light/Medium, Medium, Tan
name: Reveal Colour Correcting Anti-Ageing Serum Foundation SPF15 30ml (Various Shades)
product_description:
Cover, correct and perfect your complexion with the Reveal Colour Correcting Anti-Ageing Serum Foundation SPF 15 from clinical skincare brand, ALGENIST.
Bridging the gap between makeup and skincare, the lightweight, serum foundation delivers buildable, full coverage with a radiant, semi-matt finish that expertly evens the skin tone whilst minimising the appearance of imperfections. Gliding effortlessly across skin, the foundation won't feel heavy on the face, and utilises an AlgaCorrecting Complex that corrects and treats dull, uneven skin tone. Smoothing and evening your complexion, its dose of Microalgae Oil and Alguronic Acid work in synergy to hydrate, lock in moisture and provide long-term and anti-ageing benefits.
Skin looks smooth and flawless with long-lasting results. Fortified with SPF 15 to help prevent sun damage.

colour: Copper, Hermatite, Lagoon, Seashell, Starfish, Triton
name: 香缇卡美人鱼眼影
product_description: Chantecaille 香缇卡美人鱼眼影能够突显眼部轮廓，增强立体效果。 这款单色眼影蕴含有抗皱合欢树提取物，有助于显著提拉眼皮，让您的双眸看起来更年轻。

name: minerals Cream Stay Shadow Stick (Various Shades)
product_description:
Make a statement with the glo minerals Cream Stay Shadow Stick; a long-wearing eyeshadow that arrives with a built-in sharpener integrated into the cap. Working as both a shadow and an eyeliner, the creamy formula effortlessly glides onto the lid and is able to produce a precise line or can be used more liberally to shade the lid, due to its blendable nature.
The stick also doubles as an eyeshadow primer, prepping the lid before the application of other colours. This extends the wear of makeup and prevents creasing and smudging.
Each pigment-rich hue delivers intense colour pay off and creates a professional-looking finish.

colour: About Last Night, Addiction, Dutty Wine, Ever After, FBF, Fever, Innocent, Obsessed, Oh Bae, Passion
name: Velvet Matte Liquid Lipstick 2ml (Various Shades)
product_description:
Treat your lips to PÜR Velvet Matte Liquid Lipstick, a conditioning lip colour with unique, mousse texture and true matt finish.
Despite its matt finish, the lip colour delivers nourishing and moisturising benefits to keep lips feeling hydrated and comfortable. The doe foot applicator glides effortlessly over lips, adding a slick of rich, velvety colour that won't flake or dry out skin. Utilising Colour Perfecting Technology, the liquid lipstick imparts a smooth, flawless hue that lends your pout a velvety, perfected finish.

name: Enchanted After Dark False Eyelashes - The Raven
product_description: Achieve show-stopping results with 'The Raven' Enchanted After Dark False Eyelashes from Eylure. Lightweight and reusable, the super soft false lashes are perfect for any occasion and eye shape; their full, voluminous design adds depth, dimension and definition to enhance natural beauty. Complete with adhesive glue and an instruction booklet for easy application.

Gatineau温和型眼部卸妆液 可轻松清除残妆、舒缓肌肤、为娇嫩的眼部补水。不会出现油渍残留。
富含黄瓜、绿茶、芦荟等成分。其配方清爽，可舒缓敏感肌肤、洗去最顽固的睫毛膏、清洁睫毛睫毛。 适用于眼部护理，令双眼明亮凉爽。消除眼部疲劳、最大程度地减少眼部浮肿。

name: Longo Thinstick Lipstick (Various Shades)
product_description:
Line and define your lips with the Vincent Longo Thinstick Lipstick, a slim, waterproof lipstick that delivers medium-to-full coverage with a demi-matt finish. 
Perfect for both lining your lips and filling with colour, the lipstick douses your pout in vivid, long-wearing colour. Its rich and creamy formulation glides effortlessly on, and its dose of Vitamin E ensures lips are nourished and protected. Lips look enhanced and vibrant.

name: Lip Enhancer Illusion Lip Liner
product_description:
Create the appearance of fuller lips with the ModelCo Lip Enhancer Illusion Lip Liner, a soft wax lip pencil with skin-coloured pigments for a natural finish. 
Enriched with a host of emollient ingredients, including Bees Wax, Carnauba Wax, Cocoa and Shea Butter, the lip liner glides effortlessly over the lips, subtly enhancing, increasing and defining their natural shape to create the illusion of a fuller pout. Its unique shade is perfect worn under any lipstick, and it expertly corrects uneven lines for a luscious and perfected lip finish.
Equipped with an in-built sharpener for touch-ups on-the-go.

colour: Bubble Gum, Chocolate Cream, Clementine Citrus, Raspberry
name: Cosmetics Super Lipgloss - Various shades
product_description: Created to give your lips a dash of mouthwatering colour whilst  enhancing your pout, this Super Lipgloss by Bellapierre Cosmetics works  to give you that show stopping finish that lasts. Enriched with natural  ingredients, this lipgloss will nourish and hydrate the lips whilst  boasting unique and feminine colour. K.D.

name: Geller Quench-n-Tint Hydrating Foundation (Various Shades)
product_description:
Perfect and moisturise your skin with Laura Geller Quench-n-Tint Hydrating Foundation, a lightweight and refreshing liquid foundation that delivers weightless coverage with a naturally glowing finish.
Its natural wash of colour looks undetectable on skin, and its flat reflective pigments blur imperfections to promote a flawless-looking complexion. Infused with a host of hydrating ingredients, including Hyaluronic Acid and Marine Botanical Droplets, the makeup utilises Water Encapsulation Technology to intensely hydrate, restore radiance and reduce the appearance of fine lines.
Feels as refreshing as a splash of water to the face.
Please Note: Formulated with Squalane that is plant derived.

name: 芮谜凯特摩斯系列长效唇膏 — 多色系
product_description: 由超模凱特摩斯親自設計的芮謎長效唇膏以高濃度色係為主打，可保持長達8 小時的定妝效果。此款唇膏採用Black Diamonds 設計，質地柔滑，為您帶來前所未有的閃亮唇色。 - ED

name: Double Ended Face Brush
product_description:
Achieve uppermost precision when contouring and highlighting with the brushworks Double Ended Face Brush; a versatile tool that assists in producing a flawless finish.
The makeup brush can be used to apply both cream and powder contouring product, simply sweep over the area of the face you wish to sculpt, carve and define. With two differing, hand-cut brush heads, one pointed and one angled, the super soft tool can perform an array of tasks; from enhancing shadows under the cheek bone to brightening the brow bone. Expect a professional looking finish.

name: Almond Lip Balm
product_description:
Thoroughly nourish lips with the Hurraw! Almond Lip Balm; an ultra-hydrating formula that cares for skin using premium organic, vegan and raw ingredients.
Evoking thoughts of a freshly baked almond biscotti, the creamy lip balm envelops lips in essential hydration. The hydrator is enriched with a skin-loving blend of Sweet Almond, Coconut and Jojoba Seed Oil, which envelop the pout in long-lasting moisture and drench lips in nourishment.
Complete with fresh pressed Almond Oil, the smooth balm leaves lips ultra-comfortable and touchably soft.

name: Nature Glow提亮Foundation 30ml - 各种色调
product_description:
使用 Glow 提亮 Foundation（来自Living Nature品牌）获得完美的打底效果。 其细腻的配方中富含麦卢卡Honey、纯净矿物质和天然油脂，在提供充足养分的同时让肌肤呈现出淡雅、健康的光泽。
轻质的乳霜质地毫不费力融合到皮肤上，粉底霜使细纹减少，肌肤恢复亮度，呈现出均匀、光滑的肤色。 适合各种类型的肌肤。 是晚间使用的佳品。

colour: Copper Gold, Deep Brown, Khaki Gold
name: Ingenious Liquid Eyeliner
product_description: Create a look as natural or dramatic as desired with the Ingenious Liquid Eyeliner from RMK. With a fine tip for precise, smudge-free application, the liner is a make-up essential to define eyes in one easy stroke. Its silky formula glides effortlessly along the eye for a long-wearing finish and can be blended for a sultry effect. E.N.
Chantecaille口红 ，为双唇增添华丽色彩，使唇部色泽饱满。持久长效，上妆轻松，令唇部肌肤舒适滋润。 内含天然蜂蜡、润肤氨基酸和维生素A和C等成分，滋养型配方，使双唇如天鹅绒般柔软光滑水润。

name: London Colour Lip Gloss 8ml (Various Shades)
product_description:
Enhance your pout with Lottie London's Colour Lip Gloss; a high-pigmented formula that applies effortlessly to deliver long-wearing, kissable colour.
Featuring a wand applicator, the lip gloss glides onto lips to add full coverage, luscious colour with a non-sticky finish. Expect smooth, comfortable and luscious lips around the clock.

colour: Amber, Blaylock, Gold, Mirrorball, Olive, Slate, Violet

product_description:
Obsessive Compulsive Cosmetics present the Cosmetic Glitter; a versatile, micronised metallic glitter for the face, hair, body and nails.
Easy to apply, the light-diffusing glitter can be used to enhance your hair style, sprinkled over your favourite nail polish for added sparkle, or swirled onto skin for a pop of colour.

name: Arden Ceramide Ultra Lipstick (3.5g) （各种颜色）
product_description:
用 Elizabeth Arden Ceramide Ultra Lipstick (3.5g) 令嘴唇丰润饱满。 这款产品注入了 Volulip，可以用富含水分的颜料令嘴唇变得丰盈，令垂直线变得光滑。
Ceramide 三元配合物可以强化肌肤，令肌肤变得柔软滑嫩,嘴唇看起来更年轻。 这款产品格外炫丽，用后您的嘴唇会光鲜亮泽、手感柔软滋润长达 20 小时。

使用说明：

将本品 Smooth地涂抹到唇上，单独使用或者给口红打底。

colour: Basic, Fleek, Hey Bae, Squad, Werk It

product_description: Expertly define your pout with the Lottie London Longwear Lip Liner; a precision pencil that glides on effortlessly to enhance natural lip shape. Perfectly outlining and defining, the lip pencil delivers bold, long-wearing colour with mistake-free application. Can be sharpened.

Pixi提亮雙頰啫喱 
輕輕鬆松即可打造自然嬌美妝容。凝膠呈半透明狀，可瞬間提亮膚色，帶給肌膚一抹自然秀色。 
適用於面頰和唇部，無需修飾即可呈現清新美感。

 - 蘆薈原液可滲入肌膚和唇部，舒緩修復皮膚細胞

colour: Lady Slipper, Nymphaea, Pet Name, Sigma Pink

product_description: Sigma 腮红可有效增强肤色。 这款多功能腮红粉含有色彩浓烈的颜料，着色强劲有力，非常适合用于轻扫整个面部，以增强肌肤的光泽感，勾勒自然轮廓，或用粗美妆刷为脸颊增添流行色彩。 配置于一个配备有小镜子的便携腮红盒中，以便外出旅行时随时涂抹。

name: Nature Pure Foundation 30ml - 各种色调
product_description:
使用 Pure Foundation（来自Living Nature品牌）获得完美的打底效果。 具有轻质、乳霜质地，毫不费力融合至肌肤上，矿物质粉底妆容完美持久，获得无条痕的妆效。。
结合麦卢卡Honey和麦卢卡油，这款配方具有抗菌、促进愈合和舒缓的特性，而其维生素E、Macadamia、Jojoba和Avocado油的共混物可以滋养和保护您的肤色。 适合各种类型的肌肤。

name: 保湿精华Foundation 30ml（各种色调）
product_description:
使用 PÜR 保湿精华Foundation享受轻盈、纯净的化妆品所带给您的体验，它是一个创新的保湿精华液粉底，利用封装水与来自瑞士阿尔卑斯山的水。
超轻盈和透气，妆容感觉舒适，在肌肤上几乎不被察觉，但同时它仍然能够进行中等覆盖并有水嫩的妆效，且结果使肤色更均匀且可以掩盖缺陷。 得益于瑞士水清新和净化的性能，这款保湿液可提供持久保湿和光泽，肌肤上几乎没有化妆的痕迹，感觉舒适且妆容完美。

name: Definition Lip Gloss (Various Shades)
product_description: The High Definition Lip Gloss adds lush colour to your pout with a glossy, wet shine finish. Fortified with antioxidant-rich Vitamin E, it nourishes and hydrates the lip while delivering a visible plumping effect and subtle pigmentation. Achieve soft, kissable lips with long lasting shine.

colour: Bare, Blush, Mandarin, Toasty, Vintage Rose
name: & Berry终极唇线笔
product_description:
用Lord & Berry终极唇线笔保护双唇，勾勒唇形。 它的配方蕴含澳洲坚果油和睡莲萃取精华，并富含 LXB 复合物，可软化和保护唇部区域娇嫩的肌肤。 它具有极致的融合性，可以描画自然的唇线，且易于使用、携带舒适。
用终极唇线笔描画唇线、填充唇部，然后涂上唇彩或口红。

name: MultiBalm Blusher
product_description:
Add a pop of colour to your complexion with the Pixi MultiBalm Blusher; a versatile crème-powder formula for the lips and cheeks.
Fortified with Aloe Vera, Shea Butter and Rose Hip Oil, the dual purpose balm delivers a healthy-looking glow to the cheekbones, whilst imparting your lips kissable colour that lasts. Blendable and buildable, you can expect a fade-resistant, flirty make-up look.

name: 闪亮唇彩
product_description:
Chantecaille 闪亮唇彩，为唇部增添华丽色彩。 无粘结、高光泽配方；配有母鹿脚状涂覆装置，可轻松在唇部滑行涂抹。
本款超保湿唇彩含有水合分子和新颖聚合物，可提供长达六个小时的光泽，而不会使唇部过度干燥，打造立体丰满的双唇。 令双唇光滑水润、色彩持久长效。

colour: Smoky Black, Smoky Bronze, Smoky Brown, Smoky Mink, Smoky Plum
name: Lid & Line
product_description:
使用Pixi旗下的Lid & Line来让您的眼睛更为迷人性感。 本产品具有眼影、眼线和晕染多重功效，可以让您毫不费力地打造出您想要的上妆效果。
产品经过创新设计，可以在数秒就可上妆完毕，毫不费力。 轻轻滑抹能够达到完美的柔和效果，也可以实现突出的锐利妆效。
优点：
- 维生素Ë可以滋养眼睑
- 芦荟可以起到舒缓和保湿的作用
-微晶蜡可以起到滋养的作用，使上妆滑抹更为容易。
- 云母可以保证妆容的浓密效果。

colour: BE740 Vision, OR341 Fleur, OR418 Day Lily, PK249 Bloom, PK343 Secret, PK417 Bubblegum, RD304 Sweet Pea, RD732 Blush, RS347 Ballet, RS448 Sensation, RS452 Tulip, RS745 Fantasia
name: Perfect Rouge 臻美原色唇膏（4g）
product_description: Shiseido Perfect Rouge 臻美原色口红将为柔软滋润的双唇赋予鲜活浓郁的色彩，只需一层，尽显魅色。 富含超强锁水活肤DE成分，能够锁住水分，让双唇丰润，持久一整天。 - K.R

colour: Golden Beige, Light Beige, Medium Beige, Natural Beige, Porcelain, Sand
name: Like A Doll Perfecting Make-Up Fluid Nude Look Foundation (Various Shades)
product_description:
Achieve an immaculate visage with the ‘Like A Doll’ Perfecting Make-Up Fluid Nude Look Foundation from PUPA.
Suitable for all skin types, the super fluid liquid foundation veils skin with micronised pigments that create a weightless colour coverage and more even complexion for a tailor-made finish. Volatile Silicones leave a silky-soft texture, with soft focus powders working to diffuse light, effectively blurring imperfections while enhancing luminosity.
Effortlessly blended, the foundation leaves skin looking more even, smooth and perfected yet it feels as though you’re not wearing any makeup at all for a barely-there beauty. SPF 15 provides additional protection from sun damage.

name: Nature 腮红 4克 - 各种色调
product_description:
使用 Living Nature's Blusher获得发光的完美妆容；轻盈的矿物质香粉为您的肌肤增添有自然色彩的柔和光泽。
具有丝绸般的质地，可毫不费力地扫过脸颊，持久妆容和混合彩妆呈现出均匀、无痕迹的妆效，让使您最喜爱的面部特征更加突出，展示专业级妆容。 您将获得一个有美丽光泽和完美色彩的妆效。

name: 冰茶唇膏——百香果（4g）
product_description:
DuWop 冰茶修护唇膏就像炎炎夏日里的一杯高浓度果汁，对于任何美妆套装，它就是一种清新的添加剂。 百香果中夹杂着奇异果的馨香，具有微妙的降温作用，稍带颜色。
冰茶修护唇膏百香果味是 DuWop 品牌的一款奢华半透明唇膏，其所蕴含的荷荷巴油、芦荟和绿茶萃取物可为唇部肌肤补充水分。 所蕴含的防晒剂有助于保护唇部肌肤。

name: BRETON Loose Powder 2.5g (Various Shades)
product_description:
Set and perfect your makeup with Christian BRETON Loose Powder, a waterproof setting powder with natural-looking finish.
Delivering a flawless makeup look whilst locking foundation and concealer in place, the silky, loose powder glides effortlessly onto skin, camouflaging blemishes to promote a smoother, more even toned complexion. Expect a velvety soft, perfected canvas with water-resistant finish.

name: 眼部提亮色 - No.1 淡色
product_description:
Pixi眼部提亮色- No.1淡色 
使用Pixi 眼部喚醒工具立即為雙眼添加活力。眼周提亮遮瑕凝膠是潤色眼部啫喱，可提亮雙眼，減少細紋和皺紋。增加年輕光澤，減少紅腫，水潤肌膚，將眼周暗沉的雙眼變成充滿活力的雙眼。 
功效： 
 -薰衣草水清爽放鬆
 -波尿酸撫平細紋
 -維生素作為強效抗衰老和抗氧化成份
 -蘆薈汁舒緩和治愈疲勞的肌膚。

name: Sandler奢华Matte Lipstick (Gigi)
product_description:
用Daniel Sandler奢华Matte Lipstick (Gigi)滋养双唇，同时令色泽持久。 它可轻易地在嘴唇上滑行，使嘴唇颜色亮丽，而且不会褪色或羽化。 增强耐磨的聚合物可使唇膏保持数小时，而不会使嘴唇感到干燥、紧绷或不舒服。
叶酸呵护成分有助于嘴唇变得丰满，牛油果油、荷荷巴油和多种维生素之类的营养成分可以令嘴唇感觉光滑、柔软和水嫩。

name: Cosmetics Compact Bronzer （牡丹）
product_description:
用 Bellapierre Cosmetics Compact Bronzer（牡丹）打造健康的棕褐色皮肤。 这款丝般光滑的矿物颜料可瞬间令您的肌肤散发出健康的光泽，而且很容易融合渗透到肌肤中。
这款多任务的古铜色化妆品还可以增强肌肤的光彩，它也富含舒缓性和滋养性荷荷巴油，可令您的肌肤柔软水嫩和健康。 它适合各种肌肤（即使是最敏感和问题性肌肤），是化妆包的必备之物。 - L.M. 使用说明：

name: Small Peonies Individual Eyelashes (2 Pairs)
product_description: These eyelashes from paperself are Inspired by the art of Chinese paper-cutting, Eyelashes blend an element of traditional culture with contemporary design. Unique and expressive, accentuate the corners of your eyes with the smaller lashes for a subtle daytime look, or make a statement with the full lashes for a special occasion.

colour: Berry Bellini, Champagne Toast, Fuschia Spritz, Honey Dipped, Lustrous Plum, Pink Dazzle, Polished Peach, Radiant Red
name: Geller Shine Stick Triple Benefit Lip Color (Various Shades)
product_description:
Douse your lips in moisturising colour with Laura Geller Shine Stick Triple Benefit Lip Color, a rich lipstick with 3-in-1 benefits.
Combining the pure pigments of a lipstick with the high shine of a gloss and moisture of a lip balm, the hydrating and highly pigmented formula glides effortlessly across lips, delivering a rich slick of colour that hydrates to promote a plumper appearance. Long-wearing, the lip colour will stay put with true colour pigments.
Honey Dipped: Shimmering golden nude
Champagne Toast: Warm peachy nude
Berry Bellini: Deep berry
Polished Peach: Peachy melon
Pink Dazzle: Glistening pink
Fuchsia Spritz: Vibrant fuchsia
Lustrous Plum: Rich wine
Radiant Red: Poppy red

name: Powder Travel Brush
product_description:
一款由天然鬃毛制成的优质粉刷，能将散粉、矿物粉或古铜粉均匀地涂洒在皮肤上。 圆形尖头设计，身材小巧，便于放入您的包包中随时携带。 - L.M.
使用说明：用刷子将散粉、矿物粉或古铜粉涂撒于面部或身体。

name: Sandler 丹尼尔桑德勒豪华哑光口红- Red Carpet
product_description:
奢華滋養雙唇，長效不脫色。輕鬆滑過嘴唇，留下飽滿色彩，不會褪色，不會羽化。更加長效持久的聚合物能夠長達數小時保持不脫色，而且不會使唇部感覺乾燥、緊繃或不適。 
葉酸護理球狀唇膏可幫助使唇部呈現豐滿外觀，乳木果、荷荷巴油和多種維生素等滋潤成分令唇部感覺光滑柔軟水嫩。

name: Certified Organic Lip Balm
product_description: INIKA's Certified Organic Lip Balm 打造柔软丰满双唇，是化妆包必备品，能够轻易滑过双唇，实现持久滋润和保湿。 这款护理膏配方透明，可单独使用或在口红之后使用，更加亮泽。 易于使用的扭动设计。

name: IL Bacio Kit - Pop Pink
product_description:
Add a pop of colour to your makeup look with Pupa's IL Bacio Kit in 'Pop Pink', a portable lip palette offering one lip gloss and three creamy lipsticks.
Housed in a novelty, lip-shaped compact with gold crown embellishment, the palette is the smallest piece from the 'This is a Love Story' collection, and is the perfect way to add a touch of colour to your complexion. Use the creamy lipstick colours all-over the lips, and add a splash of gloss to the centre of lips to create the appearance of a fuller pout.
Perfect for popping in your handbag, it is equipped with a handy mirror for on-the-go touch-ups.

name: Good Feel Better Blush Brush
product_description: 必备化妆工具。 这种手工雕刻的圆形腮红刷可以塑型，突出脸颊和轮廓线以实现自然的妆效。 它具有多种功能，您可以轻松自如地进行造型、打鼻影、晕染和除尘。每款刷子均配有一个加重的手柄，并附有凸起的刷子名称，便于查找。"Look Good Feel Better" 是全球唯一的癌症慈善机构，支持妇女与癌症治疗的明显副作用。 E.N.

name: Stockholm Precision Eyeliner 1ml
product_description:
使用 FACE Stockholm's Precision Eyeliner 打造闪亮妆容，这是一款自动眼线液笔，上妆均匀流畅。
使用简便的眼线笔于日本设计，特性是笔头尖细精确好控制，打造高色素颜色，线条干净，快干不晕染。 Eyes看起来线条平整超性感。 - K.N

name: Stockholm Lash Booster Mascara 8克
product_description:
利用 FACE Stockholm的Lash Booster Mascara 美化您的眼睛，这是一种强化睫毛膏，用于提升睫毛外观，同时提供深层滋养。
它利用植物蜡和聚合物的混合，并采用创新助长复合配方进行调理，刺激睫毛生长。 每根睫毛涂有少许强化色素，巨大睫毛棒确保睫毛充分发挥其潜力；增强效果以获得更长的睫毛。 每日使用以见证经过临床验证的更长、更茂盛的睫毛。 作为日常睫毛膏至少连续使用60天，获得可衡量的结果：睫毛变长1.5毫米，变粗15％。 睫毛看起来更强壮、更茂密。 - K.N.

colour: Dark Beige, Fair, Light Caramel, Light Golden, Medium Beige
name: Cosmetics Illuminate - Various Shades
product_description:
The AmazingCosmetics® Illuminate Concealer has an ultra-lightweight, silk textured formula that glides across skin to deliver a medium coverage and soft, subtle glow with luminising pigments.
Powered by light diffusing technology, the creamy concealer effectively blurs the appearance of fine lines and imperfections while lifting the look of discolouration and redness. Enriched with Vitamin E and plant-based Cassia Angustifolia, it provides hydration and antioxidant protection to calm inflammation. Ideal for concealing dark circles and discolouration, the doe-foot applicator ensures a smooth, even application.

name: & Berry Glacee 修眉膏 - 自然色
product_description:
描畫精緻眉妝，有它就夠。彩色啫喱與眉毛的天然色澤卓效混合，塑造眉形，平添幾分美妙動人光澤。此眉毛膏棒可精準描畫眼妝，刷毛溫和分隔眉毛，令眉毛飽滿精緻。 
 說明：使用內置眉毛棒“梳理”眉毛。

name: Cosmetics Double Agent Concealing Balm Kit - 6W
product_description:
The Cargo Cosmetics Double Agent Concealing Balm Kit features two fantastic products, a cream and a powder concealer, which help to hide any imperfections whilst working to highlight your skin. The powerful yet gentle formula consists of sweet almond oil which works specifically to target under eye circles, marula oil and tea seed oil which improve the skin’s elasticity and maintain the skin´s moisture levels. 
Enriched with butters, vitamins and pigments, the formula leaves the skin nourished and hydrated. Suitable for all skin types, your complexion will be left with a natural, flawless, professional and lightweight coverage. A.B.
The balm can be easily blended into the skin thanks to the creamy texture. Warm the balm up using your fingertips and apply to the necessary areas. 
The powder helps to set your look ensuring that you have a full coverage throughout the day.
Use the small applicator with the powder to set.

name: Dollar Brows 美眉混妆刷
product_description:
Billion Dollar Brows  美眉混妆刷 ，突出强调眉毛。
该上妆工具非常适用于荧光笔描眉骨后使用，其刷头为平头，带合成刷毛。可轻扫眉毛上各种闪亮色调。 眉骨上的反光色调，可提高眉毛亮度，打造完美妆容。

name: Nature唇Brush
product_description: 使用 Living Nature 唇 Brush实现专业的效果。 带有锥形尖端以进行精密化妆，这款唇刷可以用来涂抹您所喜欢的口红，或干、湿眼影。

name: Compulsive Cosmetics Foundation Brush #002
product_description:
Achieve a flawless make-up base with the Foundation Brush #002 from Obsessive Compulsive Cosmetics. Offering superior control when tipped towards the face, the weighted brush features synthetic nylon and taklon bristles to create an even, streak-free finish.
Crafted from sustainable materials and bonded with vegan-sourced adhesive, the professional brush comprises a tapered head that seamlessly distributes and blends all types of foundation, whilst the tip effortlessly applies product around the eye contour, nose and hairline.

name: Geller 劳拉·盖勒浓密丰盈睫毛打底膏——黑色
product_description:
Laura Geller 劳拉·盖勒浓密丰盈睫毛打底膏为您的睫毛打造良好的底妆，它是一款黑色卷翘睫毛打底膏，有助于拉长和定型睫毛。
其具有打底和丰盈功能的配方有助于帮您打造更加粗壮、浓密的睫毛，卷曲的睫毛刷能够专业地控制每一根睫毛；其强化功能可有效防止睫毛折断，让您的睫毛看起来更加健康而有弹性。 之后涂抹您喜欢的睫毛膏，以见证浓密柔韧而不打结的睫毛。

name: LONDON Plush Rush Lip Gloss - Flirt
product_description:
Enhance the look of your pout with butter LONDON Plush Rush Lip Gloss, a plumping lip formula that works to add a slick of colour to your lips whilst creating a fuller appearance.
Delivering high shine colour, the lip gloss glides effortlessly across lips with a cushion like feel, and expertly stimulates hyaluronic synthesis to enhance your natural lip shape. Lips appear fuller, smoother and plumper. Leaving lips with a lasting tingling sensation, the lip gloss will boost lips, your mood and your confidence.

name: 专业扁平粉底刷
product_description:
適合液體和粉狀粉底，由緊湊的合成纖維製成，尖端呈扁平狀，打造完美無暇底妝。 - LM 
 使用說明 ：使用錐形鬃毛推開液體和粉狀粉底。

name: Compulsive Cosmetics Large Shader Brush #007
product_description:
Achieve a flawless make-up look with the Large Shader Brush #007 from Obsessive Compulsive Cosmetics. Crafted from sustainable materials and bonded with vegan-sourced adhesive, the brush features a weighted, nickel-plated ferrule for superior control.
With a specially shaped head and soft, synthetic nylon and taklon fibres, the professional brush can be used to apply and blend cream or powder products with ease. Delivers the perfect amount of product, allowing you to shade, smudge and create expert results.

name: Definition Eye Essentials Collection
product_description:
The High Definition Eye Essentials Collection allows you to create subtly sultry, or deeply dramatic eye makeup looks for any occasion.
The false eyelashes are versatile enough to be worn during the day or night.

name: Definition Powder Foundation Pro Palette
product_description:
Cover and contour like a professional with the Powder Foundation Pro Palette from High Definition. Boasting an array of matte hues, the versatile palette is ideal for changing seasons, allowing you to embrace tanned or paler skin.
All in one place, the foundation palette delivers full face coverage, alongside being ideal for contouring. With lighter and dark shades to sculpt the face, the foundation powder leaves the complexion flawless.
Shades Include:
Bisque
Shell
Fawn
Dune
Maple
Chestnut

name: LONDON Plush Rush Lip Gloss - Siren
product_description:
Enhance the look of your pout with butter LONDON Plush Rush Lip Gloss, a plumping lip formula that works to add a slick of colour to your lips whilst creating a fuller appearance.
Delivering high shine colour, the lip gloss glides effortlessly across lips with a cushion like feel, and expertly stimulates hyaluronic synthesis to enhance your natural lip shape. Lips appear fuller, smoother and plumper. Leaving lips with a lasting tingling sensation, the lip gloss will boost lips, your mood and your confidence.

name: Cosmetics 熠彩&修容套装——中等色调
product_description:
Bellápierre Cosmetics 熠彩&修容套装特别适用于护理中等肤色的肌肤，它包含化妆包中五种必备产品。 可有效优化您的面部特征，缔造光滑无可挑剔的妆容，以让您尽享专业描画的妆效。
由 100% 纯天然矿物质制成。 
矿物质粉底液——‘肉桂色’（4g）
它是采用五合一配方的粉底液，具有遮瑕、打底、修容、定妆和防晒功效。 这款轻盈的散粉适合所有肤质，蕴含有四种天然矿物质成分：云母、氧化锌、氧化铁和二氧化钛可有效遮掩瑕疵、淡化细纹，让您拥有无暇而精致的妆容。 既可调和使用，也可叠加涂抹。
矿物质修容粉（2.35g） 
这款修容粉非常适合颧骨、前额和鼻梁的中部，能够进行专业地修颜，精致地突出面部线条，以增加深度和立体感。 易于晕染，可有效遮掩面部特定部位的瑕疵，实现专业级的妆效。
矿物质高光粉（2.35g）
可打造荣光焕发的妆容，用于强调面部的凸出部位，包括颧、眉骨和沿着鼻梁向下的部位。 其极致细腻轻盈的质地能够与肌肤轻松融合，有效提亮肤色，突出您最喜欢的面部特征。
 遮瑕刷 
这款遮瑕刷采用纤细的锥形设计，非常适合遮瑕和遮掩黑眼圈或斑点。 尖端和人造刷毛能够进行小面积遮瑕，扁平的一面可轻松进行大面积遮瑕，有效均匀肤色。
美妆刷
这款美妆刷非常适合涂抹古铜粉、修容粉和高光粉，它质地柔软，人造刷毛能够向面部均匀地涂抹粉类产品，以实现非常鲜明的妆效。 让您实现轻松描画、叠加和勾勒轮廓，让您拥有专业级的妆容。

name: Cosmetics Corrector - Light Medium 0.22oz
product_description:
The Amazing Cosmetics Corrector utilises a colour correction system to minimise the appearance of dark circles, discolouration, spots and uneven skin tone. Ideal for light to medium skin tones.
Enriched with Vitamin E and Cucumber extract, the dual-sided corrector combines two specific shades to help neutralise blue tones found in the under eye area and redness that occurs with blemishes and scars. Creamy and easily blended, the lightweight formula contains Sodium Hyaluronate to help maintain moisture levels, while Ceramide NP boosts skin repair, leaving you with a perfected and healthier-looking complexion.

name: Ready 14.0 Palette - The Bare Sensuals
product_description:
The Bare Sensuals 14.0 Palette from bareMinerals contains a coveted selection of 14 eyeshadows that have been inspired by the delicate hues of a coastal horizon at sunset.
Offering the award-winning SeaNutritive Mineral Complex base with up to 12 hours wear and a host of nourishing actives for a sumptuously smooth texture, the extensive edit contains an array of romantic shades, from soft, pink-y nudes to more sensual, deeper tones, in both matte and metallic finishes for the perfect day-to-night combination.   
The slimline palette is accompanied with a compact mirror, step-by-step guide and a dual-ended, domed blending brush for truly professional looking results.  
Shades Included (from left to right): 
Mystify (antique lavender)
Ensemble (smoke-out plum)
Upgrade (hazy lilac)
Exposed (fairy white)
Fortune (pink champagne)
Shazam (shimmering pink)
Cloud Nine (copper rose)
Lure (modern mauve)
Persuasion (glistening umber)
Catalyst (shimmering burgundy)
Hard To Get (ballet slipper pink)
Indulge (lavender gray)
Waltz (soft pink taupe)
Hot Spell (simmering mauve)

name: Cosmetics Face Foundation Base Matt Primer
product_description: Say hello to flawless skin with the innovative Face Foundation Base Matt Primer from Contour Cosmetics. Ultra-lightweight and velvet-textured, the mattifying formula glides across skin to blur and smooth the appearance of imperfections, creating an even and perfectly prepped base. Suitable for all skin types, it ensures effortless and immaculate makeup application with long lasting results.

name: IL Bacio Kit - Classic Red
product_description:
Add a pop of colour to your makeup look with Pupa's IL Bacio Kit in 'Classic Red', a portable lip colour palette offering one lip gloss and three creamy lipsticks.
Housed in a novelty, lip-shaped compact with gold crown embellishment, the palette is the smallest piece from the 'This is a Love Story' collection, and is the perfect way to add a touch of colour to your complexion. Use the creamy lipstick colours all-over the lips, and add a splash of gloss to the centre of lips to create the appearance of a fuller pout.
Perfect for popping in your handbag, it is equipped with a handy mirror for on-the-go touch-ups.

name: Nine Wide Iron
product_description: Perfect for long, thick hair, the Cloud Nine Wide Iron boasts wider than average plates which allow for more hair to be straightened, waved or curled at once. Featuring an innovative temperature control gauge, these irons also boast a curved body for ease of use and super smooth plates to ensure your hair doesn't suffer for your style. - E.D

name: Shea黄油唇Balm - 成熟树莓色
product_description:
成熟树莓色的Pixi Shea黄油唇Balm是最佳有色润唇膏，易于涂抹，效果立现。 这款润唇膏装在您的手袋中 Perfect，它的设计为旋升式，配有一个安全的点击盖子，方便保管。
它颜色清浅，外观别致，配有牛油果油，可以滋养和滋润双唇，确保您拥有持久诱人的嘴唇！ K.D.

name: 乳木果油唇膏 - 琵熹粉嫩色
product_description: 琵熹粉嫩色Pixi 乳木果油唇膏含有獨特的水潤滋養配方，可令雙唇更加水潤動人，同時還可呈現淡雅色彩。該旋升式唇膏富含乳木果成分，可快速輕鬆塗抹，實現完​​美唇妝！ KD

name: 娜迪奥天然精纯矿物粉底液- 自然色 (50ml)
product_description:
本品蘊含反光礦物質能適應您的膚色和肌膚的質地，煥現清爽舒適、光彩照人美肌。還能軟化細紋，令肌膚瞬時綻現光采。 
使用說明：

name: Cosmetics Contour Compact - Contour Original
product_description: Sculpt your features like a pro with the Contour Cosmetics Contour Compact in Original. Combining six varied shades of smooth cream formulas, the contour palette offers warm undertones and light shades that perfectly suit pale to olive skin tones. Each colour blends effortlessly to add definition and shape to your facial structure, leaving you with perfectly chiselled cheekbones and a flawless complexion. Presented in a chic portable compact for on-the-go applications and touch ups!

name: Mineral Powder - Nude 01
product_description:
Achieve a photo-ready complexion with the ModelCo Mineral Powder; a weightless, mattifying formula that combines the benefits of a foundation, concealer and powder in one.
Working to conceal shine without blocking natural radiance, the loose powder blends seamlessly onto skin to deliver a silky soft veil; it helps to minimise the appearance of imperfections, whilst enhancing luminosity for a smooth, flawless finish. Suitable for all skin types, including sensitive and acne-prone.

name: Good Feel Better Angled Contour Brush
product_description: 使用这种针对专家应用的多功能斜角轮廓刷涂抹腮红、古铜色粉或粉底。 用于增强轮廓或给颧骨自然雕刻的样子。 每款刷子均配有一个加重的手柄，并附有凸起的刷子名称，便于查找。 "Look Good Feel Better"是全球唯一一家针对癌症治疗的明显副作用而为女性提供支持的癌症慈善机构。 E.N.

name: Color Lip Gloss - 07 Red Flash
product_description:
Drench your lips in a lustrous sheen with the RMK Color Lip Gloss in 'Red Flash'.
Combining the vibrant colour of a lipstick with the clarity of a lip Gloss, the colour glides effortlessly over lips with its square-shaped applicator, and delivers a veil of sheer yet brilliant colour. Its host of moisturising ingredients, including Shea Butter, Rosehip Oil keep lips feeling hydrated and comfortable.

name: & Berry 光泽亮肤遮瑕棒
product_description:
遮蓋瑕疵、提亮膚色。配方包含澳洲堅果油和睡蓮提取物，該乳狀遮瑕膏可提供中度遮蓋，隱藏黑眼圈、細紋和微小瑕疵。向肌膚深層注入水分，長效遮瑕，令瑕疵隱匿不見，肌膚煥現耀眼光澤。 
 說明： 
將遮瑕膏直接應用於遮瑕部位，主要集中於眼部區域。也用於突出顴骨。

name: Vamp! Waterproof Mascara - Extra Black 9ml
product_description:
Accentuate your eyes with the PUPA Vamp! Waterproof Mascara; an amplifying black mascara dedicated to volumising, thickening and lengthening lashes.
Synergising a water-resistant Hydrophobic Polymer and an innovative plastic film coating, the creamy, buildable formula delivers ultimate impact and definition for an intense, smudge-proof finish. Its specially designed brush and rounded tip capture even the shortest lashes to reveal bigger, bolder results.

name: Glamour Shot Eyes Concealer 10ml
product_description:
Achieve a flawless complexion with the SAMPAR Glamour Shot Eyes Concealer; an innovative, universal formula that targets wrinkles, fine lines and dark circles that are present at the eye contour. The anti-ageing formula is technically a skincare product, but is able to offer similar results to makeup alongside its expected skincare benefits.
Formulated with HQA Microlens and Hyaluronic Acid, the clear concealer glides onto delicate skin, delivering an invisible, soft focus finish. It works to reduce the appearance of dark circles, redness and fine lines and wrinkles, as well as lifting skin with immediate effect due to Oat extract.
The unique formula also boasts an Urban Advance Complex, which blends Shea Butter serum, Mint Endorphin and Probiotic Sugar together to act as an antioxidant shield. This protects skin from environmental aggressors, as well as strengthening the its natural defences.
Expect a smooth and illuminated eye area that is unified and radiant.

name: 娜迪奥眼影刷
product_description:
用娜迪奧眼影刷輕鬆而精準地描畫眼影。這款方形短眼影刷刷毛濃密，非常適合描畫和暈染眼影，卓效修飾眼部線條。 
這款眼影刷能令眼影均勻分佈、流暢自然，映襯肌膚之美，打造臻至完美的眼妝。確保妝容的專業性，每次化妝都能呈現高品質的妝容效果。

name: Cindy Loumanizer 玫瑰高光修容粉饼
product_description:
使用 theBalm Cindy Lou Manizer 玫瑰高光修容粉饼，让您的优点尽现。这款多效必备艺术大师级修容产品包含一个多效粉饼，集眼影、腮红和自然修容粉三重功效于一体。
这款桃粉色的粉饼可以作为腮红，让双颊更添一抹暖色；也可以作为眼影，令眼睑闪耀淡淡的色泽；还能作为修容粉，突出最美的面部特征。 -SA

name: HD Detail and Contour Sponge
product_description:
Achieve a flawless base with the brushworks HD Detail and Contour Sponge; a dual-purpose complexion sponge that is the perfect tool for blending out product, as well as precision application.
The latex-free sponge is effective with both liquid and powder products, simply dab across the face to blend makeup and reveal a seamless, natural-looking finish, which is ideal when sculpting high definition cheekbones during contouring. The larger surface can also be used to pat powder onto the face to reduce the appearance of shine.
The pointed top of the sponge is ideal for navigating the contours of the face, such as the nose and eyes. The precision tip is able to reach areas often missed with other applicators and target fine lines and creases to prevent a cakey appearance. Expect professional looking results and a high quality contour.

name: Techniques 终极版套刷
product_description: Samantha Chapman 打造的Real Techniques 核心套刷包含4 件必備工具：扁頭刷、尖頭刷、掃刷、橢圓刷。套刷配備專業刷盒和支架。現已推出超值兩件套，購買套裝既可節省開支，更能勾勒美麗如畫的妝容。

name: 3 维111 号假睫毛
product_description: Eylure 3 维 111号假睫毛为您的睫毛增添自然长度和造型。  轻盈且可重复使用，具有自然美感的假睫毛被打造出一个层次分明的效果，同时获专利的衬托带技术则增加了眼睛的长度和深度，突显了您双眸的自然之美。 Perfect增加了您双眼的长度和丰满。 功效持久。

name: 20th Anniversary Brush Kit
product_description:
Create professional makeup looks with the RMK 20th Anniversary Brush Kit, a limited edition set specially curated to celebrate the brand's 20th anniversary.
Housed in an original RMK brush case, the set offers two eyeshadow brushes for expert blending and shading; two sponge tipped applicators for placing colour; and an eyeliner brush for defining the lash line.

name: Volcanic Minerals Mascara - 02 褐色（新款）
product_description: 此款褐色的 Volcanic Minerals Mascara为KORRES旗下的产品，可以完美的打造出引人注目、大胆的睫毛效果，同时不会带来任何沉重感。本款产品富含火山或物质、棉花提取物、向日葵聚合物和葡萄提取物，是增加眼部轮廓的超级产品，可以真正让您的眼睛绽放光彩。 - E.D

name: Geller 劳拉·盖勒 Spackle 醚油妆前乳 59ml
product_description: Laura Geller 劳拉·盖勒 Spackle® 醚油妆前乳让您拥有光滑无瑕的妆容。 其轻盈的无油配方蕴含有珍珠粉和浓缩甘草粉，可有效抑制肌肤产生黑色素；能有效应对肤色不均匀和色素沉着问题。 这款有色妆前乳适用于各种类型的肌肤，能与肌肤无缝融合，使肤色看起来更自然，同时确保使妆效维持数小时的清新自然。

name: 眼睑妆前乳
product_description:
theBalm眼睑妆前乳 ，为后续眼影涂抹做好准备，使双眼楚楚动人。快干配方，作为眼影妆前乳，具有增亮性能。

本品可沿着眼睑轻松滑行，配方丰富，具有光反射特性，使眼影漂亮迷人、持久长效。 本款妆前乳为必备工具，内含舒缓肌肤的成分，以确保眼睑完全放松，为涂抹眼影打好基础。 - K.N

colour: Blonde, Dark Brown, Light Brown, Medium Brown
name: Arden Statement Brow (Various Shades)
product_description:
Perfect your arches with the Elizabeth Arden Statement Brow; a multi-tasking tinted brow gel that works to condition, fill and define in one simple sweep.
Fortified with Beeswax and Carnauba for long lasting hold, the pigmented formula delivers the coverage of a pencil with the natural finish of a powder. Kaolin provides fuller texture and shape, while microspheres ensure a smooth and effortless application that stays smudge-free for up to 12 hours of wear. Achieve maximum impact eyebrows for a powerful makeup look.

name: Cosmetics Glowing Complexion Essentials Kit - Fair
product_description:
The Bellápierre Cosmetics Glowing Complexion Essentials Kit in 'Fair' combines a selection of must-have makeup products to leave your skin flawless and healthy looking. Utilising only natural and kind-to-skin ingredients, the collection is suitable for all skin types and will leave your skin looking radiant and feeling happy.
Makeup Base (8.5g):
A multi-tasking product that can be used as a concealer or waterproof base for other pigments. Its natural formula transforms shimmer products into matte shades, and expertly conceals blemishes and imperfections that are difficult to cover with makeup. Paraben free.
Mineral Foundation in 'Ivory' (4g):
A 5-in-1 mineral foundation formulated with four natural ingredients. Utilising kind and gentle minerals, the foundation delivers complete coverage as a foundation, and works as a concealer and setting powder whilst protecting skin with SPF 15+. Skin appears flawless and your natural skin tone is enhanced. Non-comedogenic.
Mineral Bronzer in 'Warming Matte' (2g):
A warming mineral bronzer with an award-winning, silky powder formula. Perfect for adding sunkissed radiance to your skin, the bronzer helps enhance your natural tone whilst delivering a healthy, natural-looking tan. Non-comedogenic, talc and paraben free.
Mineral Luminizer in 'Champagne' (2.35g):
A finely milled highlighter perfect for illuminating natural high points on the face. Dust lightly all over for a shimmery finish, or apply to cheekbones, brow bones and down the centre of the nose for a naturally radiant finish.
Kabuki Brush:
Specifically designed for use with mineral foundations and powders, this best-selling brush utilises synthetic bristles with a super-soft, dense shape that helps deliver complete and seamless coverage for flawless looking skin. 100% synthetic fibres that will not shed during application.

name: Cosmetics Tinted Brow Gel - Light Brown
product_description:
Expertly define your eyebrows with the Mellow Cosmetics Tinted Brow Gel; a lightweight, non-sticky formula that allows you to create enviable arches with minimal effort.
Featuring a spoolie brush applicator, the brow gel enhances shape and tames unruly hairs, whilst helping to fill in sparse brows with natural, hair-like colour and a long-wearing finish. Expect perfectly groomed, tinted brows that last.

colour: Hot Pink, Pale Pink, Silver Pink, Strawberry Pink
name: Face Pop Creamy Cheeks (Various Shades)
product_description:
Add a healthy flush of colour to your complexion with RMK Face Pop Creamy Cheeks, a duo of cream-textured blushers with soft, dewy finish.
Delivering subtle definition, the blushers can be applied with a sponge to lend your cheeks a healthy, glowing appearance. Use the deeper shade for defining, and the lighter shade for highlighting. Complete with application sponge.

name: Cosmetics 修容&高光专业彩妆盒
product_description:
Bellápierre Cosmetics 修容&高光专业彩妆盘可有效突出您喜欢的面部特征。 这款便携彩妆盘包含六种不同修容粉，套装配备有遮瑕亮颜所需的所有产品。
可专业地描画和打造精致妆容，每款修容粉都非常容易晕染到面部特定区域的肌肤，以增加深度和立体效果 修容粉可轻松涂抹到前额、鼻梁、下颌和下颌轮廓，而高光粉能够提亮肤色，使您的面部更有光泽，让您拥有完美的妆容。

name: Geller 劳拉·盖勒烘焙亮肤腮红
product_description:
Laura Gellers 劳拉·盖勒烘焙亮肤腮红为您的面容增添流行色彩，这款便携装的腮红生产于意大利，它经过在赤陶瓷砖上烘焙 24 小时而制成。
这款定妆持久的光滑腮红蕴含有液体淡斑色素，可轻松涂抹在肌肤上，让您的脸颊洋溢着红润的光泽。 其亮肤功能可增强妆效的光泽，所含的抗氧化剂雷公根和白茶萃取物有助于保护肌肤。
让您拥有亮丽而健康的面容。

name: & Berry丝滑眼线笔
product_description:
Lord & Berry 丝滑眼线笔适合敏感型眼睛，它可以描画眼线，定义眼部轮廓，令您获得丝般柔滑半哑光的妆效。 这款眼线笔易于控制，可以晕染，打造性感魅力的双眸。  它经过眼科测试，可以用于内眼睑，增强眼睛本来的颜色。
沿着眼睑内边描画眼线，如果要使眼线鲜明地展现出来，可以在下眼睑内边描画，在上眼睑外边描画眼线。 如果要打造更为不显眼的妆容，则描画精细、精确的眼线。 眼线描画完毕之后就不停地眨眼，让眼线自然晕染。 它可以独自使用，也可与眼影搭配使用。

name: Eyebrow Long Lasting Waterproof Pencil (Various Shades)
product_description:
Intensify your brows with the PUPA Eyebrow Long Lasting Waterproof Pencil; a double sided pencil that creates a naturally defined finish.
Boasting a new generation formula, the water resistant pencil is effortlessly applied to brows, creating fine, precise lines that mimic hairs. Arriving with a soft spoolie to one side, the pencil not only adds definition to brows, but combs hairs and blends the colour to deliver a natural result.
Expect long lasting colour with a professional-looking finish.

name: Rich Liquid Foundation 30ml (Various Shades)
product_description:
Achieve maximum coverage with the Illamasqua Rich Liquid Foundation; a coveted makeup base utilised and loved by professional makeup artists.
The liquid formula is effortlessly applied to the complexion, offering seamless, blended and water-resistant results. Delivering a semi-matte finish, the foundation conditions the skin and is able to eliminate excess oil to reduce unwanted shine. A perfect base for flawless and long lasting makeup application.

name: Cosmetics Brow Pomade (Various Shades)
product_description:
Create enviable arches with the Mellow Cosmetics Brow Pomade; a creamy gel formula that applies effortlessly to deliver natural, hair-like colour.
Blendable and buildable, the smudge-proof, volumising brow gel enhances shape and tames unruly hairs, whilst helping to fill in sparse eyebrows for an expertly defined finish that lasts. Available in a range of shades.

name: Dollar Brows Brows on Point Micro Pencil - Blonde
product_description:
Achieve flawless eyebrows with the Brows on Point Micro Pencil - Blonde from brow experts Billion Dollar Brows. Dual ended, Brows on Point comprises a precision point to one end and a spoolie brush to the other. The ultra-fine tip creates natural looking brush strokes that mimic the appearance of individual hairs for a subtle finish, whilst the spoolie can be used to comb and blend.
The pencil boasts a mechanical function, constantly delivering a precision tip without the need to sharpen. Filling in sparse brows to accentuate your look, the brow makeup offers maximum colour pay off and a professional finish. The formula is both water and smudge proof, gliding onto brows effortlessly and providing long lasting results.

colour: Bazaar, Blossom, Iconic, Muse, Perfect Nude, Red Passion
name: & Berry Timeless Kissproof Lipstick
product_description: Add luscious colour to your pout with Lord & Berry's Timeless Kissproof Lipstick. Fortified with a nourishing, antioxidant-rich blend of Neem, Sesame and Indian Frankincense Essential Oils, the lipstick delivers long-wearing, transfer-resistant colour with a vibrant matte finish. Features a unique applicator tip that defines lips in one effortless stroke.

name: Cosmetics Velvet Brush
product_description: Wield the perfect tool for flawless skin. The Amazing Cosmetics Velvet Brush is hand shaped and hand cut, and inset with 100% wool bristles for a professional finish every time. Luxurious and comfortable, use the brush to sweep powder across the face to set your foundation in place, or in dedicated areas to conceal, highlight and add a flush of blush. A multi-tasking miracle. - K.N.

name: Eye Accents Kit
product_description:
Lend the perfect finishing touch to your makeup look with the Pixi Eye Accents Kit. Carefully curated to help you achieve dazzling eyes, the set contains a precision mascara, specially designed to define and separate your lower lashes, and a clear brow gel to set your perfectly sculpted brows in place.
Lower Lash Mascara
A water-resistant mascara specially created to coat the lower, hard-to-reach lashes. Combining a vitamin-rich formula with a precision, short bristled brush, the mascara expertly coats and separates from root to tip, delivering a shock of black that is long-wearing and suitable for sensitive eyes. Infused with Vitamin E and Panthenol to nourish, strengthen and protect. No parabens. Not tested on animals.
Brow Tamer
A long-wearing, clear brow gel that expertly sets and defines your brows, all day. Holding your desired shape in place, the gel is the perfect finishing touch for your eyebrows. Its Aloe Vera-infused formula feels calming on skin, and it leaves brows with a natural, soft effect.

name: Get The Look Palette - It's Lip Time
product_description:
Add luscious colour to your pout with Pixi's Get The Look Palette - It's Lip Time; a collection of twelve lip crèmes in a range of natural and vibrant shades.
Blending effortlessly onto lips to deliver high-pigmented, non-drying colour, each lip tint can be worn alone or layered with other shades to create a customised finish. Complete with a mirror for mistake-free application on-the-move.

name: Brow Magician (Various Shades)
product_description:
Shape, define and tame your brows with Eylure Brow Magician, an innovative 2-in-1 eyebrow kit that allows you to fill, sculpt and set your brows.
The dual-ended tool features a brow crayon to one end; a natural-looking shade that allows you to shape and fill sparse areas for a fuller-looking, more sculpted arch, and a long-stay brow 'mascara' to the other; its easy-to-use, loaded spoolie brush enhances and builds colour whilst taming hairs into place.
Brows look beautifully sculpted and defined.

name: London Longwear Kohl Eyeliner Pencil 9g (Various Shades)
product_description: Expertly define your eyes from every angle with the Kohl Eyeliner Pencil from Lottie London. Featuring a precision tip for controlled application, the eye pencil glides on effortlessly to deliver a look as subtle or dramatic as desired. Creates a gel-like finish with excellent stay-ability. Can be sharpened.

name: Lemon Lip Balm
product_description:
Refresh the lips with the Hurraw! Lemon Lip Balm; an ultra-hydrating formula that cares for skin using premium organic, vegan and raw ingredients.
Fortified with a hydrating blend of Sweet Almond, Jojoba Seed and Olive Fruit Oil, the creamy citrus lip balm envelops lips in long lasting moisture in just one simple swipe. The balm works to eliminate areas of dryness, whilst treating the pout to an uplifting lemon fragrance. Expect touchably soft lips with an added lemony kick due to the addition of Malagasy Lemongrass.

name: Sandler Watercolour Creme Rouge Blush - Soft Bronze (3.5g)
product_description:
Add natural-looking colour to your complexion with the Daniel Sandler Watercolour Crème Rouge Blush in 'Soft Bronze'; a delicate pink-peach hybrid with a twist of bronze.
Infused with an antioxidant blend of Vitamin E and Grape Seed Oil, the blusher blends effortlessly onto bare skin or over foundation to deliver smooth, streak-free colour, whilst defending against free radicals and environmental aggressors. Enhances natural radiance for glowing perfection.

name: Shine Lip Gloss - Marshmallow
product_description:
Enhance your lips with the ModelCo Shine Lip Gloss in 'Marshmallow', a shimmering, high shine lip lacquer that delivers a shock of beautifully reflective colour with long-lasting finish.
Gliding effortlessly onto lips with its wand applicator, the non-sticky gloss imparts a soft colour tint and features an in-built mirror for flawless, on-the-go applications . Lips looks luscious and hydrated.

name: Cosmetics Color Correcting Concealer Palette
product_description:
Achieve a flawless complexion with the Color Correcting Concealer Palette from Bellápierre Cosmetics.
Counteract the look of redness, dark circles and uneven skin tones with this multi-tasking kit, containing six versatile concealers that use color opposites to neutralize imperfections, a technique used by makeup artists for decades.
The creamy, mineral-based formulas effortlessly glide onto skin and seamlessly blend for a natural finish. Housed in a chic compact with a convenient mirror, the palette is a must-have set for any beauty buff to combat discolouration and blemishes.

name: Geller 劳拉·盖勒 Spackle 香槟酒妆前乳 59ml
product_description:
Laura Geller 劳拉·盖勒 Spackle® ‘香槟酒’妆前乳让您拥有荣光焕发的不可挑剔妆容；其轻盈配方能够瞬间舒缓肤色不均匀的肌肤，有效延长定妆时间，为您的妆容增加淡淡的光泽。
这款含有丰富抗氧化剂的妆前乳具备原始 Spackle® 系列妆前乳的所有优点，还能使肌肤更有光泽，可轻松涂抹到肌肤，改善肤质，最大化减少瑕疵的迹象。 它适合各种类型的肌肤，其所蕴含的芦荟凝胶可让您的肌肤看起来更加柔软而完美无瑕。 蕴含有白茶和雪松根萃取物。

name: London Shade and Shadow Brush
product_description: 使用Lottie London's Shade and Shadow Brush打造精美眼妆，专业级带角度刷子，刷头超柔软。 Perfect适合定妆，晕染和勾勒，刷子能够完美的为眼部渲染颜色，增加浓度和定妆。 可用在褶皱、眼角或整个眼皮上，打造平滑晕染线条。 - K.N

name: Papaya Pineapple Lip Balm
product_description:
Drench lips in a tropical treat with the Hurraw! Papaya Pineapple Lip Balm; an ultra-hydrating formula that cares for skin using premium organic, vegan and raw ingredients.
Formulated with over 60% Cold Pressed Papaya Seed Oil, the lip balm is rich in essential fatty acids, which envelop skin in a veil of nourishing moisture. The lip balm also boasts a generous dose of Papaya Fruit Extract, which works to eliminate dead skin cells and reveal ultra-soft and smooth lips. Complete with a delicious Pineapple scent, the lip balm leaves lips thoroughly nourished and completely kissable in one simple swipe.

name: Pressed Powder - N01
product_description: A setting powder that delivers the fine textured translucent layer that fits for the flawless finish. By blending the 4 different textures with the powder brush, they work to eliminate the shine on T-zone and correct the tone for a natural bright complexion. Comes in a compact with a sliding compartment to keep the brush in place.

name: London Treasure Tattoos
product_description: Lottie London's Treasure Tattoos ，一套提升气质，使用简单，金属制的身体修饰品。 Perfect修饰整体装扮，金色纹身可重叠或与首饰搭配使用，增添节日气氛，打造波西米亚风。 - K.N

name: 组合眼线笔 - Super Natural 系列 (2.21g)
product_description:
Pixi 組合眼線筆- Super Natural 系列(2.21g) 可輕鬆為您打造自然的眼部煙熏妝。這款眼線筆採用雙頭設計，具有防水功能，一頭是啞光炭褐色筆頭，用來勾勒線條，另一頭是高光裸色筆頭，用來補充細節，該產品可快速改善眼部妝容，同時產品的組合配方具有舒緩鎮定、提亮光澤和增加活力的功效，讓您的雙眸始終明亮動人，光彩熠熠。 - LM 
 使用說明：

name: LONDON Plush Rush Lip Gloss - Fireworks
product_description:
Enhance the look of your pout with butter LONDON Plush Rush Lip Gloss, a plumping lip formula that works to add a slick of colour to your lips whilst creating a fuller appearance.
Delivering high shine colour, the lip gloss glides effortlessly across lips with a cushion like feel, and expertly stimulates hyaluronic synthesis to enhance your natural lip shape. Lips appear fuller, smoother and plumper. Leaving lips with a lasting tingling sensation, the lip gloss will boost lips, your mood and your confidence.

name: & Berry Back to Black 睫毛膏
product_description: 這款精美的Lord & Berry Back to Black 睫毛膏專門用於打造完美的捲翹長睫效果，本品為深黑色，是打造濃密烏黑長睫效果的不二選擇。 — ED

name: - Black
product_description:
用KORRES科尔矿物眼线笔 - Black勾画和定义您的眼睛。 这款眼线笔的配方蕴含滋养性维生素和滋补性火山矿物质，质地柔软光滑，可以轻松滑动到您的眼睛上，如此您就可以打造完美的烟熏眼。
它的色彩强烈，可以描画出持久和防晕染的眼线，一整天都不会改变。 - L.M.

name: Mco Translucent Pressed Powder - Neutral
product_description:
Achieve a smooth, flawless complexion with the ModelCo Mco Translucent Pressed Powder; a weightless, mattifying powder that creates an undetectable veil over skin for a shine-free finish.
Infused with antioxidant Vitamin E, the velvety formula blends seamlessly onto skin to set make-up in place, whilst controlling unwanted shine and blurring imperfections to reveal a picture-perfect complexion. Delivers natural to medium coverage to help improve skin tone and texture.

name: Ombre Hypnôse Mono Eye Shadow - P203 Rose Perlée
product_description:
Create natural or smokey eye makeup looks with Lancôme Ombre Hypnôse Mono Eye Shadow in 'P203 Rose Perlée', a dusky pink colour with pearly finish.
Sweeping effortlessly onto lids, the smooth, easy-to-blend eyeshadow delivers buildable colour that can be applied subtly to create a sheer wash, or built upon for an intensified, dramatic look. Highly pigmented, the crease-resistant eyeshadow imparts smooth, even coverage every time for a flawless, show-stopping effect.
Housed in a mini compact with dual-ended applicator sponge.

name: Cosmetics Creamsicle - Gelato 20ml
product_description:
Add a pop of colour to your complexion with the Trifle Cosmetics Creamsicle; a creamy, tinted lip and cheek stain with a long-wearing finish.
Infused with Organic Shea Butter, the blendable, buildable balm melts onto skin to soften and moisturise, whilst delivering smooth, vibrant colour for a bright, lit-from-within look that won't fade.

name: Hyséac 痤疮治疗遮瑕棒
product_description:
UriageHyséac 痤疮治疗遮瑕棒 ，是一款多功效抗痘棒，可遮盖并治愈混合性肌肤及油性肌肤的瑕疵。
方便使用，非常适合外出时使用。双重护肤配方，是一款水醇、调整型药膏，使肌肤瑕疵变干，舒缓肌肤。其浅色色调及柔光粉末，可遮盖肌肤瑕疵。 该产品具有抗菌性能，内含TLR2-Regul®聚合物，使肌肤完美无瑕，无油光；Uriage温泉水，可舒缓滋润肌肤、增强皮肤屏障。
肌肤干净放松。

name: LONDON Lippy Liquid - Fruit Cake
product_description:
Add sumptuous colour to your pout with the butter LONDON Lippy Liquid; a long-wearing formula that combines the pigment of a lipstick with the shine of a gloss.
Infused with Shea Butter and antioxidant Vitamin E, the liquid lipstick glides on effortlessly to moisturise and protect lips, whilst delivering non-drying colour with an ultra-glossy finish. Expect smooth, luscious lips that are subtly scented with delicious notes of Vanilla.

name: LONDON Iconoclast Liquid Liner - Brilliant Black
product_description: Expertly define your eyes from every angle with the butter LONDON Iconoclast Liquid Liner in 'Brilliant Black'. Featuring a precision tip for controlled, mistake-free application, the eyeliner glides on effortlessly to create subtle, thin lines or dramatic cat eyes. Delivers a high-shine, long-wearing finish that lasts up to sixteen hours.

name: Spa® 专业化妆刷清洁手套
product_description:
The Sigma Spa®－專業化妝刷清潔手套是一款專門為清洗刷子而設計的工具，可以快速有效的仔細的清潔您的刷子。 
清潔手套可直接套在拇指以外的手指上，在手腕處保持固定，七種專利材質包括沖洗，為深層清潔眼部和臉部刷子設計。 
方便旅行攜帶，獨特的清潔工具適合於刷子套裝一起隨身攜帶。

name: Color Drama Lip Contour Palette 4g - Blushed Bombshell
product_description:
Create a fuller-looking pout with Maybelline's Color Drama Lip Contour Palette in 'Blushed Bombshell', an all-in-one lip colour kit that allows you to prime, line, colour and highlight your lips.
Equipped with a dual-ended applicator brush, the palette combines a carefully curated range of nude and pink hues that are perfect for priming, defining and brightening your lips; use the brush to prime, line, fill and highlight for luscious, contoured lips.

name: & Berry Mascare Treatment Mascara （ Black）
product_description:
用 Lord & Berry Mascare Treatment Mascara 获得卷翘丰盈纤长的睫毛。 这款3合1配方可以呵护睫毛，令睫毛变得浓密、丰盈，使其处在原始状态。 这款睫毛膏可以快干，不会结块，因而是您化妆套装的必要补充之物。
说明 ：使用内置棒将睫毛膏涂用于上下睫毛。 用眼妆卸妆液卸除该睫毛膏。

name: 哑光纯净半透明粉（较浅色）
product_description:
本品为肌肤增添微妙的亮度，可遮盖肌肤细纹，使肌肤无油光。 通过更深的颜料，对这种颜色进行定制。
本品看起来就像一种半透明粉，实际上是一种创新型陶土，质地轻盈精良、透明度无与伦比。 
本品很像传统的粘土面膜，它也可以去除肌肤表面杂质，在当天洗去即可。 天然配方，不含苯、不含油脂、无香料、无滑石粉，可在肌肤上自如滑行，使肌肤亮泽，肤色清新纯净。
本品不含苯甲酸酯类、防腐剂、油脂、香料、滑石粉等成分。 DuWop从来没有在动物身上进行测试。
使用说明：

name: Endless Silky Eye Intensify Duo - Brown Eye Intensify
product_description:
Pixi的这款Endless Silky Eye Intensify Duo能使双眸更加明艳动人。该品牌的产品亲附肌肤，让您不必大费周折即可打造出无瑕妆效。 这款防水的双头眼线笔能提供持久妆效，使用时不会产生晕染。 它丝滑配方让笔尖能轻松游走于眼皮之上，呈现自然色调，增强眼部效果。 E.N. 
使用说明：用双头笔的深色笔尖描画眼线，然后用浅色笔尖提亮内外眼角。

name: Masquara 浓密
product_description: 使用 Illamasqua Masquara 浓密突显您的双眸；这款创新的睫毛膏使睫毛浓密、加长和轮廓清晰 注入从核桃中提取的活性物，作为天然染料提取物，浓黑的色彩配方使睫毛染色以获得极致的效果和造型，让您在短短两个星期后即可体验到色彩强度的改善。 睫毛显得更长、更醒目，并有专业级的加强效果。

name: Betty Lou Mainzer 高光修容蜜粉
product_description:
theBalm Betty Lou 高光修容蜜粉是一款集蜜粉、高光和眼影于一身的三合一美妆，令肌肤散发阳光的健康光泽。
这款柔滑的粉饼带有若影若现的古铜色泽，非常适合打造雅致的透亮妆效或用于提亮眼部。 轻轻扫于颧骨和眉骨，可实现健康亮泽的妆容；或少量抹于整个面部，形成淡雅亮泽的肤色。 - K.N.
不含滑石粉 。

name: 晕色眼影刷
product_description:
Illamasqua 晕色眼影刷是一款便捷的美妆工具，配备有人造刷毛，可轻松勾勒细腻的眼部线条。

这款眼影刷非常柔软，刷毛短而丰厚，刷头的形状非常适合晕色和涂抹霜类和粉类产品；采用更短的刷毛有利于控制涂粉的位置，而更厚的刷毛可打造专家级的晕染效果。 用画圈的方法晕染，以实现烟熏妆效。

低过敏性。 适合各种类型的肌肤。 无伤害。

name: 7 Lights Powder Illuminator 10g
product_description:
Inspired by the original rainbow face powder created in 1917, Shiseido's 7 Lights Powder Illuminator can be used as a highlighter, blush, bronzer or an all-over powder.
Infused with innovative light-reflecting pigments, the unique powder combines seven rainbow-coloured shades to address multiple skin concerns; it blends seamlessly onto skin to help correct uneven tone, combat dryness and restore a radiant, healthy-looking glow. Housed in a mirrored compact.

name: Sandler Watercolour Creme-Rouge Blusher - Soft Pink (3.5g)
product_description:
这款 Daniel Sandler Watercolour Crème-Rouge Blusher in Soft Pink 适合所有腮红爱好者，它曾获得奖项的液体配方，可提供完美的妆效，妆效持久且可防水！
这款 Daniel Sandler Watercolour Crème-Rouge Blusher in Soft Pink 可提供额外的脸颊护理，蕴含的抗氧化剂维生素 E 和葡萄籽油有助于抵御自由基损伤。 Daniel 讨厌设定规则，所以他创造了这款柔软的桃红腮红膏，可用于多种肤色。 他建议暖色调肤色使用柔和的粉红色产品。
使用说明：

name: Vintage Cosmetics Company Scissors - Rose Gold
product_description:
Made from premium stainless steel with a chic rose gold design, The Vintage Cosmetics Company Scissors allow you to precisely cut fingernails, toenails and strip lashes.
Easy to use, their sleek, sharp design makes them a must-have beauty tool for all your trimming needs. Housed in vintage-inspired, floral packaging.

name: ml
product_description: Maybelline 超大装睫毛膏  ，使睫毛浓密充盈，重塑您的双眼。 拥有专家级蛋白配方，不结块。这款黑色睫毛膏为您带来终极视觉冲击及高亮度，打造震撼人心的妆容。 特殊设计，双弯棒，可沾取更多的睫毛膏，使睫毛更浓密饱满，时尚前卫。

name: Cosmetics 12 色眼影盘——回归自然
product_description:
Bellápierre Cosmetics ‘回归自然’12 色眼影盘让您打造无尽妆容。 这款眼影盘含有十二种颜色，可让您突出双眸和对眼周围肌肤进行高亮处理，具有极佳的持久定妆效果，能进行无缝晕染。
这款营养丰富的如天鹅绒般柔软眼影能轻松与眼皮融合，以实现光滑均匀的妆容，既可单独涂抹，也可多种颜色调和自定义彩色，具有不油腻、不褪色或晕染的特点。 内置于便携包装中，配备有双头眼印刷和内置小镜子。

colour: Coco, Gold, Jade, Lilac, Metallica, Olive, Peach, Pitch, Plum
name: Cosmetics Baked Eyeshadow (Various Shades)
product_description: Accentuate your eyes with the Mellow Cosmetics Baked Eyeshadow; a silky smooth powder that delivers long-wearing, crease-resistant colour. Blendable and buildable, the high-pigmented eyeshadow can be applied dry for a soft, smokey finish, or wet for a more intense eye make-up look with superior staying power.

name: Arden Ceramide Plump Perfect Ultra Lift And Firm Moisture Lotion Spf 30 (50ml)
product_description:
这款抗衰老超级保湿霜将肌肤丰盈度提升到一个新的水平！ Elizabeth Arden Ceramide Plump Perfect Ultra Lift And Firm Moisture Lotion SPF 30 可平滑表面细纹，并专注于较深的皱纹，以紧致、提升和重新致密肌肤。
凭借 CPT 工艺（细胞丰盈工艺）和 SNAP-8，体验新水平的酰胺丰盈好处。SNAP-8 是一种基于肽和胶原的新型天然来源提取物，用作肌肤的双重丰盈成分。
持续使用这款轻盈的 Elizabeth Arden Ceramide Plump Perfect Ultra Lift And Firm Moisture Lotion，您会发现肌肤会变得更光滑、紧致、明显放松，并恢复活力。 本品含广谱 UVA/UVB SPF 30，有助于抵御日晒的老化效应。

name: Definition Brow Crème (Various Shades)
product_description:
Create defined yet natural-looking brows with the High Definition Brow Crème; a versatile formula that helps to fill in brows and enviably frame the face.
Arriving in three shades that cover hair colours ranging from fair to dark, the brow crème works on all hair and skin tones. The rich formula glides onto brows like a cream, but dries with a matte finish, similar to a powdered product. Working to fill sparse brows and add definition in the form of transfer-resistant hair-like strokes, the brow crème ensures eyebrows appear flawless all day, and all night.
Bombshell: Best suited to fair hair and skin.
Foxy: Ideal for medium hair and skin.
Vamp: Perfect for dark hair and skin.

name: 6ml
product_description:
使用 Illamasqua凝胶 可以完成无限多样的化妆造型；使用初级的凝固胶，将粉末产品转变为防水膏状物。
特别适合用于眉毛产品、眼线笔或眼影，其快干配方在强化颜色的同时确保了卓越的寿命，使您可以获得更醒目、更明显的妆效。 也可以在粉底前使用，以获得更流畅、更精致的妆容。

colour: Beige, Bisque, Cognac, Cream, Vanilla Shell, Warm Sunbeige
name: Arden Ceramide紧致肌肤Makeup SPF1530毫升
product_description:
使用Elizabeth Arden Ceramide紧致肌肤Makeup SPF 15 30毫升，让皮肤获益于颜色、遮盖和抗衰老技术的终极功效。 本品大量采用CPT技术，能丰盈提拉皮肤，带来更加饱满年轻的容颜。
云母和氧化铝模糊细纹，营造出明亮、柔韵的效果。 三重份子钉复合物可增强和重塑皮肤，而协调颗粒则可带来精确持久的颜色。 使用说明：涂抹于手指上，向上向外揉抹。

name: BalmShelter 保湿粉底液 SPF18（多色）
product_description:
使用 theBalm BalmShelter 保湿粉底液 SPF 18打造完美肤色，采用轻盈配方，均匀肤色，令肌肤柔嫩光滑。
这款保湿粉底液质地轻盈，为肌肤提供一层顺滑如丝的保护，易于推开，能够均匀肤色，改善肤质，阻挡有害紫外线的同时还能滋润肌肤。 期待更光滑、更紧致的肌肤。 - K.N.

name: Reveal Concentrated Luminizing Drops 15ml (Various Shades)
product_description:
Highlight your best features with ALGENIST Reveal Concentrated Luminizing Drops, a lightweight serum highlighter infused with light reflecting pigments and ultra-fine, luminous pearls to lend your complexion a radiant glow.
Gliding effortlessly onto skin, the featherweight formula diffuses light to create a soft focus, luminous effect whilst colour correcting and treating uneven skin tone with an AlgaCorrecting Complex. Wear it alone to highlight targeted areas such as the cheekbones and down the centre of the nose, or mix with your daily beauty products for an all-over glow. It also delivers anti-ageing and blurring properties with its dose of Alguronic Acid; a patented compound that helps reduce the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles. Expect naturally radiant-looking skin.

colour: Chocolate Brown, Deep Night, Extra Black
name: Vamp! Mascara 9ml (Various Shades)
product_description:
Achieve unbeatable volume with PUPA Vamp! Mascara; a thickening, high-performance formula that delivers high definition lashes.
