Enriched with an array of waxes, the smudge-proof mascara boasts a creamy formula that coats each individual lash, whilst a special filming agent offers strong yet flexible hold.
The built-in applicator is designed in an intelligent sinuous shape with soft and dense fibers. This allows for the ideal dose of mascara to create exaggerated and volumised lashes. The round tip allows you to target the shortest and most difficult to reach eyelashes, ensuring each hair is coated for the fullest results.

name: London Kiss Collective Mini Liquid Velvet Lipstick Trio
product_description:
Enhance your pout with Ciaté London's Kiss Collective Mini Liquid Velvet Lipstick Trio, a set of moisturising, matt lipsticks enriched with intensely conditioning, Hyaluronic Acid.
Delivering a creamy, non-drying colour with highly pigmented pay off, the lipsticks utilise Ciaté’s proprietary blend of moisturising PlushPigment™ to create lush, velvety colour that glides effortlessly onto lips for a bold finish. Their dose of Hyaluronic Acid helps lips appear smooth, supple and fuller, and their precision tips ensure perfect application. Lips look matt and sultry with incredible hydration.
The Set Contains Shades: 'Starlet', 'Pin Up', and 'Wonderland'.

name: Geller The Iconic New York City Collection Eye Shadow Palette in Downtown Cool 13.2g
product_description:
The Laura Geller Iconic New York City Collection Eye Shadow Palette in ‘Downtown Cool’ is an opulent edit of chic shades inspired by the cultural hub of downtown Manhattan, whether it's an insightful tour around a historical museum or dinner in ever-on-trend SoHo.
The mirrored compact houses twelve carefully-curated eyeshadows in a range of shades and finishes, from matte nude to shimmering gold, each with a rich, densely-pigmented formula. Easily blended, each shade sweeps across the lid for instant, stay-true colour, perfect for creating subtle daytime looks or a sultry smoky eye.
Shades: Cloud Nine (lustrous bisque)
Heather (dusty matte plum)
Shimmer Toast (glimmering rosy taupe)
Electric Plum (purple pearl)
Sahara (matte mushroom)
Brick (matte cayenne)
Gilded Bronze (metallic brass)
Navy (matte navy blue)
Cream (matte vanilla)
Nutmeg (matte clay)
Goddess (sparkling topaz)
Gotham (black onyx)

name: Stay All Day Liquid Lipstick 3ml (Various Shades)
product_description:
Perfect your pout with Stila's Stay All Day® Liquid Lipstick, a creamy-matt lip colour that delivers full coverage with a long-wearing finish that stays put for up to six hours.
Enriched with Vitamin E and Avocado Oil, the weightless liquid lipstick glides effortlessly over lips, intensely nourishing and hydrating whilst imparting a shock of comfortable colour that won't bleed or transfer. Equipped with a doe foot applicator, lips are left silky, supple and saturated in moisture.

name: Orange Lip Balm
product_description:
Inject life into dull, dry lips with the Hurraw! Orange Lip Balm; an ultra-hydrating formula that cares for skin using premium organic, vegan and raw ingredients.
The rich and creamy balm effortlessly glides over lips, enveloping them in a veil of essential moisture, due to the skin-loving combination of Sweet Almond, Jojoba and Castor Seed Oil. Delivering an uplifting orange fragrance in one simple swipe, the lip balm refreshes lips, leaving skin soft, smooth and smelling good enough to eat.

name: Super Lips Long-Lasting Lip Lacquer (Various Shades)
product_description:
ModelCo have collaborated with American model, Hailey Baldwin, to create the Super Lips Long-Lasting Lip Lacquer.
Weightless and non-sticky, the high shine formula combines the texture and finish of a gloss with the staying power and pigment of a lipstick; it glides effortlessly onto lips with its precise applicator tip, saturating your pout in vivid colour that nourishes and hydrates to lend lips a fuller, plumped-up appearance.
Long-lasting and richly pigmented, the lip gloss will leave your lips with a luxe, high shine finish.

name: Compact BR6024克
product_description: 这款中度棕色的Shiseido Eyebrow Styling Compact助您打造完美眉毛。 这款小巧套装包含两种中度棕色眉粉和一支双头眉刷，可混合出不同色调，打造心仪妆效。 这款精巧的彩妆盘内置镜面，可随包携带、随时取用。 - K.R

name: Kapha Lip Balm
product_description:
Treat lips to a herbal infusion using the Hurraw! Kapha Lip Balm; an ultra-hydrating formula that cares for skin using premium organic, vegan and raw ingredients.
Inspired by basic Ayurvedic Dosha principles, a traditional medicine of India, the rich lip balm is infused with Cold Pressed Organic Sesame Seed Oil and an array of plants, fruits and roots known to complement each Dosha. The creamy balm is enriched with organic Coconut Oil, Cacao Butter and Castor Oil, which work in synergy to deliver long-lasting moisture that ensures lips are free from dryness.
Complete with fragrances from three essential oils, zesty grapefruit, stimulating eucalyptus and warming ginger, the lip balm envelops lips in nourishing moisture and an energising scent.

name: The Genuine Lapland Lip Balm Tube 10ml
product_description:
The Genuine Lapland Lip Balm from Polaar delivers intense hydration all year round. Its magical formula is infused with a vitamin-rich blend of arctic raspberries, blackberries and lingon berries for powerful antioxidant protection against wind, cold temperatures and pollution.
Fast-absorbing and non-greasy, the white beauty balm is packed with nourishing shea butter, beeswax and coconut oil to repair dryness and deeply moisturise lips, leaving you with restored, comforted skin no matter where you are.

name: Milky Make Up Remover Emulsion (200ml)
product_description:
使用 Embryolisse Milky Makeup Remover，温和清洁面部。这是一款滋养乳液，赋予肌肤柔滑的保护层，能温和有效地去除彩妆和杂质。
该配方富含以温和得名的天然活性成分，可深层洁净，同时保护肌肤的天然屏障；滋润和舒缓甚至最干燥、最敏感的肤色。
这款乳白色乳液适用于干性及敏感型肌肤，令肌肤洁净、充满活力，最重要的是舒适。 - K.N

name: 珠光月色丰唇毒液（3.5ml）
product_description:
DuWop 珠光月色丰唇毒液让您双唇在暮色中拥有闪耀妆效。 这款经典炫彩丰唇毒液具备原始丰唇毒液的所有美唇功能，可让您的唇色更加亮泽。 这款乳状炫彩丰唇毒液可让您的双唇拥有像星星一般的闪耀光芒！
精油混合物发挥其神奇的作用后可让面部变得更加红润。 所蕴含的肉桂、生姜、荷荷巴油和乳脂鳄梨油有助于着色，让您的双唇具有别致的光泽。  DuWop 珠光月色丰唇毒液采用超轻盈的配方，不会带给肌肤有任何像"果酱一般的粘着感"，其营养丰富的乳质配方可让您一整天或一整晚都保持魅惑唇妆，闪耀珍珠般的光芒。 它是老法宝的神奇替代品。 请不要错过这款护唇膏，它所缔造的唇妆可供您在月光下翩翩起舞，让您闪耀的唇光照亮其他人的靴子！
丰唇毒液产品的名人粉丝包括： Lindsay Lohan、Jennifer Aniston、Teri Hatcher、 Sienna Miller等等。
使用说明：
未在动物身上进行实验。

name: Luminys Baked All Over Illuminating Blush Powder - Natural Stripes
product_description: Perfect your complexion with the PUPA Luminys Baked All Over Illuminating Blush Powder. Developed with ‘baking’ technology to create an ultra-smooth and highly pigmented formula, the face powder features gradual ombré coloured powders in subtle stripes. With a soft shimmer, the shades are perfect for adding dynamic depth to cheeks and a touch of highlight, with universally flattering hues to suit all skin tones.

name: Good Feel Better Concealer Brush
product_description: 使用这种软毛遮瑕刷，您可以同时进行涂抹和晕染。 一种精密的工具，非常适合用来减少瑕疵和掩饰黑眼圈或雀斑。 每款刷子均配有一个加重的手柄，并附有凸起的刷子名称，便于查找。 "Look Good Feel Better"是全球唯一一家针对癌症治疗的明显副作用而为女性提供支持的癌症慈善机构。 E.N.

name: Collections C05 Domed Contour Brush
product_description:
Apply contour cream with precision using the Spectrum Collections C05 Domed Contour Brush; an ultra-soft makeup brush that combines a vibrant colour palette with expert hand-crafted design.
The ‘Best Face Forward’ brush is intelligently crafted with super soft, synthetic bristles that effortlessly pick up cream contour products. The brush glides over skin, sculpting enviable cheekbones and achieving a flawless contour. Designed to be used before larger contour brushes, which blend out the product, the domed contour brush is an essential addition to any brush collection.

name: Collections A19 Fine Detailer Brush
product_description:
Focus on the finer details with the Spectrum Collections A19 Fine Detailer Brush; an ultra-soft makeup brush that combines a vibrant colour palette with expert hand-crafted design.
Working on the face, eyes and lips, the versatile ‘To The Point’ brush boasts soft yet firm, synthetic bristles, which boast an array of uses. The unicorn-inspired detailer brush can be used to apply concealer, fill brows and complete an intricate eye look. The brush is an essential addition to any perfectionist’s brush collection.

name: 助眠洋娃娃睫毛
product_description: Illamasqua 洋娃娃假睫毛由手工制成，对眼睛无伤害，能够丰盈睫毛，增加自然睫毛的长度。 这款假睫毛质地柔软轻盈，适合在任何场合佩戴，让您拥有精美而根根分明的长睫毛。 它经久耐用，可反复使用，为您轻松地反复缔造娇媚而自然的睫毛。

name: Vintage Cosmetics Company Aloe Vera Infused Cosy Socks - Mint
product_description:
Keep your feet snug and smelling sweet with The Vintage Cosmetics Company Aloe Vera Infused Cosy Socks.
Infused with a fresh Aloe Vera scent, the slipper socks will keep your feet warm and cosy whilst imparting a subtle fragrance to help uplift the senses.

name: - 中号
product_description: 这款  Japonesque 专业中号眼影刷由天然纤维手工制作，可为唇部、眼眉上色，也可用于任意眼周区域，确保精确涂抹。 这款化妆刷采用长杆设计，方便掌握。 - L.M.

name: The Colossal Go Extreme Mascara - Black
product_description: 利用来自Maybelline的Extreme Mascara定型眼睛轮廓，这款饱满睫毛膏可加强睫毛。 拥有专家级蛋白配方，不结块。这款黑色睫毛膏为您带来终极视觉冲击及高亮度，打造震撼人心的妆容。 特殊设计，双弯棒，可沾取更多的睫毛膏，使睫毛更浓密饱满，时尚前卫。 E.N.

name: H2O Skintint - 3 warm
product_description:
Pixi H2O Skintint 温和配方旨在舒缓、舒爽皮肤，补充皮肤水分，可改善肤色，使其容光焕发。 该魔弹无苯甲酸酯类和香料，包含了Green Tea和Rose水，可滋润皮肤、提供抗氧化，而洋甘菊和Lavender可舒缓皮肤，为其补充营养和水分。
Skintint 比传统配方更轻盈、更透气，可在皮肤上形成一层均匀、天然而持久的薄膜。 它适合敏感型皮肤，是您必备的化妆品！ K.D.

name: 闪亮抗衰老古铜啫喱
product_description:
Chantecaille 闪亮抗衰老古铜啫喱，轻松打造太阳肤色。  超轻型、超保湿、创新型液态凝胶，可保湿滋润肌肤，使肌肤光滑柔软，为肌肤增添了一道亮丽的古铜光芒。
内含的覆盆子干细胞提取物，可作为强大的抗氧化剂，以舒缓肌肤明显红肿；抗衰老的熊果聚合物，可减少肌肤细纹。 这款完美的棕褐色加强凝胶，持久长效、无褶皱。只需添加一滴至粉底上轻拍或加至颧骨上轻拍，打造润泽闪亮的肤色。

name: Collections A14 Brow Definer Brush
product_description:
Expertly frame the face with the Spectrum Collections A14 Brow Definer Brush; an ultra-soft makeup brush that combines a vibrant colour palette with expert hand-crafted design.
The ‘Wing It’ brow brush boasts super soft yet firm, synthetic bristles and a precise, angled brush head, which makes applying gel, wax or powder brow makeup effortless. The winged definer leaves brows defined and enhanced.
The unicorn-inspired brush can also be used to apply gel eyeliner. The angled head reaches right into the lash line to deliver precise application and a fierce, cat-eye flick.

name: Poreraxel Sebum Control Pact
product_description: Control oily and combination skin with the Poreraxel Sebum Control Pact from Korean brand Skin79; a mattifying face powder that effectively balances and regulates sebum production for a smooth finish. Enriched with extracts of antioxidant-rich Lavender and anti-bacterial Marjoram, the refined formula alleviates the look of redness and imperfections while absorbing excess grease, particularly in the susceptible T-zone.

name: Watermax Moisture BB Cream 50ml
product_description:
Achieve a naturally flawless complexion with Mizon Watermax Moisture BB Cream, a lightweight beauty balm fortified with SPF 25 for sun protection.
Delivering a veil of perfection onto skin that never looks caked, the BB cream expertly conceals imperfections and smoothens the appearance of skin with a natural-looking finish. It resists moisture and provides the complexion with a long-lasting flawless appearance. It also contains a blend of Shea Butter, Mango Seed Oil and Aloe to intensely nourish.

name: 幻彩双眸套装 No.2 自然/褐色
product_description:
Pixi幻彩雙眸套裝No.2自然/褐色 
完美的全能產品，用於提亮迷人雙眼。 Pixi 的幻彩雙眸套裝小巧緊湊，適用於隨時補妝，其中包括兩個遮瑕膏、一個提亮色和一個高光色，能夠喚醒您的雙眼。

name: Master Camo Color Correcting Concealer Kit 6g - Medium
product_description:
Achieve a flawless base with the Maybelline Master Camo Color Correcting Concealer Kit in 'Medium', a complexion-perfecting palette that corrects, conceals and highlights to create a photo-ready canvas.
Colour correcting your skin in three easy steps, the kit offers carefully curated colours that target specific skin tone concerns, such as redness, dark circles and blemish pigmentation. Its neutralising and brightening properties counteract and conceal imperfections to lend the skin a beautifully smooth, radiant and even appearance.
Use the correcting shades for banishing pigmentation and under eye circles, and use the highlighter to brighten shadows and enhance natural high points of the face such as the brow bone and cheekbones.
Complete with a dual-ended applicator brush.

name: Cameo Stick 双头轮廓棒8.6g（浅色）
product_description:
PÜR Cameo Stick 双头轮廓棒 （浅色）带有轮廓混合海绵，可突显您的自然特征，其2合1轮廓和凸显配方可塑造并使您脸的自然轮廓更加醒目。
利用自然的光反射成分，在使您自然的突出特征更加亮丽的同时使面部阴影部分愈加醒目，这款产品熟练地"雕琢"和"刻画"，提供乳状柔和的纹理，形成一个完美无瑕的妆效。
用浅色阴影粉以突出面部的凸起点，如眉毛、颧骨和鼻子的中心，并用较深色的阴影粉强调面部自然的阴影区域，如颧骨下方、下巴和额头。
这款轮廓底粉内含一个Ceretin®复合物，其成分包括有保湿作用的神经酰胺和抗衰老的维生素A，有助于也有助于遮盖黑斑和细纹，让您拥有一个完美无瑕、滋润和完善的肤色。 最后使用海绵涂抹，使化妆品流畅地融合以完成妆效。

name: Gingerbabe Lip Eclipse Collection (Worth £51)
product_description:
Transform your look from day to night with the Gingerbabe Lip Eclipse Collection from Sigma. The collection boasts three different shades of Lip Eclipse lip glosses, which combined as a trio create the perfect gift.
The easy-to-wear liquid lipstick is formulated with a highly-pigmented colour that provides the coverage of a lipstick with the hydration of a gloss. The sponge applicator tip provides extreme control, delivering a precise pout. Lips are left kissably smooth, with a satin finish.
Lip Eclipse - Rosette
A deep dressed up pink / mauve shade.
Lip Eclipse - Seal of Approval
A neutral light pink / nude shade.
Lip Eclipse - She Knows the Ropes
A bright watermelon shade.

name: Sandler Watercolour - Gentle (15ml)
product_description:
Daniel Sandler Watercolour in Gentle 融合米色与桃色色调。 这款裸色奢华纯粹，轮廓鲜明，焕发年轻光彩。适合白皙至中等肤色。
使用 Daniel Sandler Watercolour in Gentle，7*24 小时美丽不停歇。 易于融合的防水配方，无论是在城市奔忙，还是海边派对嗨一整晚，都能让您从早美到晚。
使用说明：

name: Duo - 软Black
product_description: 这款天然软质碳黑 PixiBrow Duo是眉笔和凝胶组合，可以很快塑造和驯服您凌乱的眉毛。 这款Brow Duo的一端包含一支带有斜角尖方便最终使用的防水眉笔，而另一端装有一个有色软装凝胶可使您画好的眉形全天不变。 现在，您只需做一点点工作就可以拥有超级明星的美丽眉毛啦！

colour: Bold Red, Coral Crush, Nude, Raspberry, Rose Petal
name: Arden Beautiful Color Moisturizing Lipstick Matte Finish Extension (3.5g)（各种色调）
product_description:
全新 Beautiful ColourMoisturising Lipstick 色泽持久，可呈现光滑暗哑妆效，保持时间长达 12 小时。 这款口红易于涂抹，令双唇柔软、光滑，同时保持湿润，无其他唇膏易形成的多余粘性残留。
中等至全覆盖温和光滑配方，富含维生素和牛油果油，有助于呵护舒缓双唇。 Elizabeth Arden Beautiful ColourMoisturising Lipstick 不掉色，无瑕疵，适合所有类型，赋予双唇完美妆效。 A.B.

name: Sandler卡布提Brush
product_description:
用Daniel Sandler 卡布提 Brush避免所有混合、变成青铜色和涂腮红的失误！ 这款符合人体工程学设计的刷子可以使粉易于涂抹，取得立竿见影的完美妆效。
该Daniel Sandler 卡布提 Brush 面积为 600mm 乘以43mm，如此拥有完美的周长可以提供均匀的覆盖，避免混合不够或施粉过多。 这款刷子适用于古铜色化妆品、腮红和粉末，是随身携带在包里的完美小武器。

name: Arden Dare to Bare Bronzing Body Oil 50ml (Limited Edition)
product_description:
Add warm radiance to your skin with Elizabeth Arden Dare to Bare Bronzing Body Oil, a hydrating and illuminating formula that delivers a veil of shimmering bronze from head to toe.
Infused with a cocktail of protective and moisturising ingredients, including Jojoba and Macadamia Oil, and antioxidant Vitamin E, the lightweight bronzing oil instantly hydrates and lends skin a smooth, shimmering glow. Mica helps to blur fine lines and wrinkles for a youthful effect, and its Vanilla and Coconut scent transports your senses to a tropical paradise. 
Skin is radiant and illuminated. Apply to areas that catch the light, such as décolleté and shoulders, or mix with cream blush for a shimmering complexion.

name: London Brow Pencil and Highlighter Duo - Dark
product_description: Accentuate your eyes with the Brow Pencil and Highlighter Duo from Lottie London. Featuring a dual-ended design, the pencil combines a highlighter to illuminate brow bones, and a hair-like colour to enhance natural shape and fill in sparse eyebrows. Adds dimension to your face for a professional eye make-up look.

name: Full Lash Volume Mascara - Brown
product_description:
使用 Shiseido 的 Full Lash Volume Mascara，获得性感的睫毛和强烈的色彩。 凭借不留痕配方和该品牌取得专利的 360° Full Expression Brush®，这款睫毛膏可实现精确涂抹，并从根部卷曲和抬高睫毛，以打造优雅的扇形效果。
其独有的可分层卷曲蜡可即刻变干，令卷曲定型；全天均可涂抹，且不会产生结块，打造如您所愿的令人印象深刻或自然的持久妆效。 可用水轻松去除。 E.N.

name: Lipstick - Dahlia 4g
product_description:
Add a pop of colour to your makeup look with Mavala Lipstick in 'Dahlia'.
Gliding effortlessly across lips in a uniform layer, the lightweight lipstick delivers a rich, creamy hue that won't settle into fine lines. Its long-lasting coverage ensures lips feel comfortable all day, even if prone to dryness. Ideal for dry or sensitive lips, the lip colour helps protect against dryness for a healthy, supple-looking pout.

name: Cosmetics 唇颊两用腮红（5g）
product_description:
Bellapierre Cosmetics 唇颊两用腮红可为您的肤色增添流行色彩；其无油配方可使肌肤拥有自然光泽。
这款两用腮红既可调和使用，也可进行叠加涂抹，均匀地涂抹在肌肤上，可打造精致的妆容，或叠加涂抹拥有更浓烈的妆效。 既可用作唇膏，也可涂抹在脸颊打造脸颊的透明色彩。 是手袋中的必备品。

name: Lipstick - Camelia 4g
product_description:
Add a pop of colour to your makeup look with Mavala Lipstick in 'Camelia'.
Gliding effortlessly across lips in a uniform layer, the lightweight lipstick delivers a rich, creamy hue that won't settle into fine lines. Its long-lasting coverage ensures lips feel comfortable all day, even if prone to dryness. Ideal for dry or sensitive lips, the lip colour helps protect against dryness for a healthy, supple-looking pout.

colour: Bloom, Coral Sea, Dusk, Laughter, Morning Sun
name: Nature 唇膏 4克 - 各种色调
product_description:
使用 Living Nature Lipstick为您的嘴唇涂上流行颜色；顺滑、乳膏状配方中添加了天然色素和滋养蜡。
Hand注入的颜色，每只唇膏经过单独处理可毫不费力地上唇彩，妆效完美持久，色彩甜美，不会过度干燥。

colour: Anime, Anti-Feathered, Black Dahlia, Feathered, Grandma, Hoochie, Lydia, NSFW, Pool Boy, Sebastian, Sybil, Tarred, Trick
name: Compulsive Cosmetics Cosmetic Colour Pencil (Various Shades)
product_description: Obsessive Compulsive Cosmetics present the Cosmetic Colour Pencil; a long-wearing, versatile formula that can be used on the lips, eyes and body for a pop of colour. Features a precision tip for effortless, mistake-free application and definition. Complete with a lid.

name: London Wonderwand Liner (Various Shades)
product_description:
Line and define your peepers with the Wonderwand Eye Liner from Ciaté London. Boasting an innovative hybrid formula, the eyeliner is easy to apply, similar to a khol pencil, yet features the staying power of a gel product.
The formula is extremely blendable, allowing you to smudge the line out with the built-in liner brush, for an on-trend smoky look. Alternatively, sweep the intensely pigmented formula across the lash line, for a precise and defined finish. Arriving in an array of playful hues, the Wonderwand Eye Liners can deliver an endless amount of creative makeup looks.

name: HD Complete Blender Sponge Set
product_description:
Blend and contour to perfection with the brushworks HD Complete Blender Sponge Set. The versatile set combines one complexion sponge for all-over use and two micro sponges for those hard-to-reach crevices.
Made from soft, hydrophilic fibres, the makeup sponges don’t absorb product for minimal waste, with smooth edges for even coverage and a pointed tip for precise application. Suitable for use wet or dry, with both foundation, blush and bronzer products, the trio allow you to create flawless makeup looks with a smooth, airbrushed finish.

name: 唇颊两用腮红膏
product_description:
RMS 唇颊两用腮红膏可有效为您的肌肤增加流行色彩，既是矿物质唇膏，又是腮红，帮您打造滋润肤色，可叠加涂抹。
其多功能配方中蕴含有营养丰富的有机成分，具有保湿和护肤功效，与此同时，让肌肤具有水洗颜色，可叠加涂抹以打造更浓的妆效。
让您的双唇和脸颊闪烁健康亮丽的光泽。

colour: Artifact, Authentic, Brasstacks, Clove, Datura, Distortion, Dope, Flicker, Ironic, Oberon, Overlook, Platonic, Technoir, Twirl
name: Compulsive Cosmetics Loose Colour Concentrate Eye Shadow (Various Shades)
product_description: Add depth and definition to your eyes with the Loose Colour Concentrate Eye Shadow from Obsessive Compulsive Cosmetics. Easy to apply, the micro-refined, light-reflecting mineral pigment powder blends seamlessly for expertly defined eyes and crease-proof colour with excellent stay-ability. The versatile formula can be used on the eyes, lips, cheeks and body.

name: Oh My Gloss Lip Oil Tint 6.5ml (Various Shades)
product_description:
Douse your lips in high shine colour with Rimmel's Oh My Gloss Lip Oil Tint.
Delivering true colour pigment with a glossy finish, the lightweight, non-sticky lip gloss glides effortlessly across lips with its lip-hugging applicator, imparting rich colour that lasts up to 6 hours and leaves your pout feeling comfortable and cushion soft. Its cocktail of Argan Oil and Vitamin E intensely nourish and protect to keep lips looking healthy and moisturised.

name: Cream Blusher 4g (Various Shades)
product_description:
Brighten up your makeup look with Illamasqua's Cream Blusher, a creamy textured blush that expertly highlights your cheeks and helps to contour your complexion.
Housed in a compact, the blush is easy-to-blend, and builds effortlessly on skin until desired colour intensity is achieved. The creamy formula can be used after foundation application for a striking pop of colour, or prior to foundation to lend your cheeks a diffused glow. Its dose of Vitamin E means it can also be used as a lip stain for a complementary makeup finish.

name: Eye Brow Cake 4.5g (Various Shades)
product_description:
Define your brows with the Eye Brow Cake from Illamasqua. Arriving in an array of shades, the high performance powder has been created to suit and enhance all hair colours.
Giving eyebrows edge, the Brow Cake helps to frame eyes by adding shape and definition to eyebrows with ease. Offering stunning results both wet and dry, apply the powder with an eyebrow brush to produce a flawless and professional looking finish with soft definition or sharp shape.

name: & Berry天后眉粉（各种色调）
product_description:
Lord & Berry天后眉粉 ，这款哑光眉粉，即可干用，也可湿用，使眉毛更加自然秀气。
本款眉粉持久长效、具有耐热性，尤其适用于重塑眉毛、填满眉毛。使眉毛色彩靓丽，眉形漂亮。 湿用时，可延长妆效；干用时，带您体验柔软丝滑的质感。 梳理整洁和有光泽的眉毛，具有自然的妆效。 - K.N

name: 巧目亮眸Eyeshadow 8ml (各种色调)
product_description:
PÜR 巧目亮眸 Eyeshadow可创建一系列的眼妆效果，它是一款多用途产品，可作为妆前乳、眼影和亮油。
沿着眼皮轻松扩散，具有金属光泽的纯色彩妆可作为一个出色的妆前底油，仿佛是一副完美无瑕的画布，为下一步化妆做好准备。 单独使用时，可产生乳状、荧光色阴影，形成一个淡雅魅力。 这款眼影易融合，并可巧妙构建妆效，非常适合涂抹在您已完成的眼妆上面；沿着您外眼角轻轻描画以创造戏剧性、夸张的外观。 最后使用无乳胶硅胶涂抹棒定妆。
Chantecaille胭脂粉芯，使面颊呈现健康红润的颜色。 本款轻盈微粒配方，采用创新型技术，含超细粉。可轻松与肌肤贴合，持久长效、妆效完美。 内含抗衰老的维生素A、C、E，使您面色红润、容光焕发，肌肤超柔滑。

colour: Bewitching Coral, Chilli, English Rose, Pearl Maron, Pink Brandy
name: Factor Colour Elixir Lipstick（多种色调）
product_description: 用 Max Factor Colour Elixir Lipstick 可以为双唇增添奢华的色彩。 这种耐久型唇膏富含强力抗氧化剂白茶，以及乳木果和鳄梨油混合调理剂，既有极自然的色彩，涂抹毫不费力，对双唇又有滋润、补水和软化作用。 有多种色调可选。 E.N.

colour: 24/7 Fuchsia, Eternal Cherry, Non-Stop Orange, Pink Goes On, Steady Red-y
name: Superstay 24hr Super Impact Lip Colour (Various Shades)
product_description: Enhance your pout with Maybelline's Superstay 24hr Super Impact Lip Colour; a conditioning balm and long-wearing, saturated lip gloss in one convenient design. Gliding effortlessly onto lips, the non-greasy balm softens and hydrates to keep colour in place without smudging or fading. Available in a range of shades, you can expect bold, kissable colour that lasts.

name: Flawless Vitamin Veil
product_description: Pixi为您打造富含维生素的迷人遮瑕效果。 Flawless Vitamin Veil可以让您肤色看上去十分均匀，同时看不出您涂了任何粉底。 让您的皮肤享受多种维生素、矿物质和改善皮肤成分的好处，从而能够更加丰盈、补水、保护和滋养您的皮肤。

name: Geller Double Take Baked Versatile Powder Foundation (Various Shades)
product_description:
Create the perfect makeup base with Laura Geller Double Take Baked Versatile Powder Foundation, a medium to full coverage foundation that has been baked on terracotta tiles for a unique texture.
Providing all-day wear, the foundation utilises ActivMesh Technology for maximum coverage with a weightless feel, and expertly conceals imperfections and pores for a smooth, healthy-looking complexion. Boasting dual-performance, it can be applied both wet and dry depending on desired coverage; apply dry for a medium/buildable coverage, or wet for a fuller, more flawless finish.

colour: Almond, Bois, Carnelian, Celestite, Flax, Iron Ore, Java, Malachite, Marble, Marigold, Olivier, Perle, Pyrite, Rose Quartz, Tanzanite
product_description: Chantecaille闪亮眼影粉芯，为双眼添加闪亮色泽。此款眼影，丝般柔软，可轻松融入肌肤，无褶皱、持久长效。 内含超细珍珠微粒，可塑性好、与肌肤融合性好。丰富的色彩搭配，使双眼闪耀珠光光泽、清澈明亮。

name: minerals Cream Glaze Lip Crayon (Various Shades)
product_description:
Treat your lips to a burst of colour and intense conditioning with the glo minerals Cream Glaze Lip Crayon; a high-shine, crayon-inspired lip colour.
Anti-oxidant rich, the crayon is infused with Vitamins C and E, alongside a healthy dose of Mango Oil and Shea Butter. The lip colour envelops lips in moisture and nourishing protection, ensuring lips look healthy as well as vibrant.
The pencil arrives with an integrated sharpener located in the cap, ensuring the crayon is always in tip top condition, even whilst on-the-go. Expect intense, highly pigmented lip colour that is long-wearing and ultra-nourishing.

colour: Fair, Medium Beige, Medium Golden, Tan Golden
name: CosmeticsVelvet Mineral®粉饼 Foundation 10克 - 各种色调
product_description:
使用 Velvet Mineral® 粉饼Foundation （Amazing Cosmetics品牌），获得一个完美的肤色。
该款采用喷射研磨工艺制成的粉饼具有轻盈、超精细质感，可以与皮肤完美融合，收缩毛孔、减少细纹和瑕疵，效果持久且覆盖自然，让肌肤如丝绸般的光滑，实现完美无瑕的妆效。 您将获得一个舒适、透气的肤色，没有任何化妆粉结块和痕迹。

name: 王牌眼线笔
product_description:
Sigma 王牌眼线笔可专业地突出您的眼部轮廓；这款液体眼线笔就有定妆持久、颜色饱满的特点。
这款轻松涂抹、快速干燥的眼线笔能够突出眼部轮廓，让您的双眼更有魅力，并且不会发生剥落、晕染或褪色，让您能够进行准确无误地专业涂抹。 配备有锥形精确眼线刷，每一下涂抹都能更加突出您的双眼。

name: 夏季保湿系列唇膏笔
product_description:
这款化妆品是引领潮流的必备品。 这款 PÜR Minerals 矿物质夏季保湿系列唇膏笔让您瞬间拥有奢华亮丽的双唇，它是一款双头唇膏笔，一端为唇膏，另一端为唇彩。 其不含任何对羟基苯甲酸酯的配方中蕴含有纯天然萃取物，可为唇部肌肤补充水分，增强保湿效果，同时保护肌肤免受自由基的伤害，打造完美妩媚的双唇。 其精确的笔尖可轻松着色，凸显您的唇部线条，让您的微笑更加灿烂。 E.N.
使用说明： 将唇彩涂抹在干燥的唇部，然后涂抹补水唇膏，这样可让您的双唇保持一整天的妆效。

colour: BAM!, BOOM!, GRRRR!, HUBBA HUBBA!, POP!, POW!, SNAP!, VA VA VOOM!, ZAAP!
product_description: theBalm 超美唇彩，持久长效、不油腻。拥有高光配方，每次使用都为您展示完美如画的甜美双唇。 内含强大的抗氧化剂人参，可调理保护、深度滋润肌肤，使您获得终极舒适，令双唇柔软光滑，绽放华丽色彩。 本款唇彩配有系列色调，既可单独使用，也可在口红上涂抹，展示饱满丰盈的妆容。

colour: 02 Maron Brown, 03 Golden Mauve, 04 Red Brown
name: W Eyebrow Colors (Various Shades)
product_description:
Expertly frame your face with the RMK W Eyebrow Color; a dual-ended, brow-defining mascara to enhance volume and create enviable arches with effortless application.
Featuring a unique spoolie brush to groom and shape, and a pointed liner head that draws precise lines, filling in brows for a denser, fuller appearance. Available in a variety of shades to complement the tone of your eyebrows and skin, you can expect a long-wearing, natural-looking finish.

colour: Golden, Ivory, Light Beige, Soft Sand, Toasted Almond
name: London Full Coverage Matte Foundation Stick 9g (Various Shades)
product_description:
Create a flawless make-up base with the Full Coverage Matte Foundation Stick from Lottie London. Enriched with Vitamins C and E, the creamy, moisturising formula is ideal for touch-ups or use when travelling.
Gliding effortlessly onto skin, the blendable foundation delivers buildable, natural-looking colour with a long-wearing matte finish. Can be used as a contouring tool to sculpt and define, or applied directly to the face for a smooth, photo-ready complexion.

name: Nature 遮瑕霜 (7ml) - 各种色调
product_description:
使用Living Nature Concealer获得一个完美无瑕的、明显更光滑的肤色；其轻质乳霜配方毫不费力地融合至肌肤上，以尽量减少瑕疵和黑眼圈的出现，特别是眼睛周围的区域。
适合所有肌肤类型，它所含的麦卢卡Honey和麦卢卡油滋养和保护肌肤，而纯矿物质则会完善您的肤色，为使用化妆品做好准备。 对抗肤色不均，呈现出更加亮丽、精致的外观，获得无条痕的妆效。

name: Longo Sheer Pigment Lipstick (Various Shades)
product_description:
Douse your lips in hydrating colour with the Vincent Longo Sheer Pigment Lipstick, a lightweight yet highly pigmented lipstick that delivers a sheer wash of vivid colour with a glossy finish.
Ultra-light and long-wearing, the lipstick glides effortlessly on, imparting a brilliant veil of colour whilst enriching the lips with its blend of Mango Butter and antioxidant Vitamin E. Lips are intensely hydrated, supple and beautifully defined.

name: 夏日之选Liquid Veil四合一喷雾粉底
product_description:
用PUR矿物公司的Liquid Veil四合一喷雾粉底塑造完美无瑕、光彩照人的肤色，这个品牌为任何肤色的女士打造自然的妆容。 其独特的配方中加入了液晶，以保持水分含量，保证一整天不失水，还加入了Ceretin®复合物，让皮肤更光滑，像绸缎一样闪亮。 E.N. 
使用方法： 充分摇动后直接喷到粉底刷上。 在洗净的湿润皮肤上轻画圆圈，以均匀覆盖。 为了达到最佳效果，在妆前乳上施用。

name: Longo Everbrow Micro Pencil and Sharpener (Various Shades)
product_description:
Add natural definition to your eyebrows with the Vincent Longo Everbrow Micro Pencil and Sharpener, an ultra-thin eyebrow pencil that precisely fills, shapes and enhances your brows with a natural finish.
The long-wearing, smudge-resistant formula glides effortlessly onto skin, filling in sparse areas of the brow whilst adding depth and definition to your arches to expertly frame your face. Easy-to-use, the pencil will deliver professional results with all-day wear.
Complete with a sharpener.

name: Factor Facefinity 3合1 粉底（各种色调）
product_description:
Max FactorFacefinity 3合1粉底  ，是一款持久长效的粉底液。使肤色完美、妆效持久。发挥底妆功效，如遮瑕膏一样遮盖肌肤瑕疵，如粉底一样持久长效。
富含 SPF 20，保持皮肤免受紫外线侵害。本产品多功效、无油光，可保护肌肤，打造柔滑底妆，妆效持续一整天。同时可遮盖肌肤瑕疵。 令肤色完美无瑕、智能配方使肌肤可自由呼吸，妆容完美。

name: Arden 真彩自然眉笔
product_description:
使用 Elizabeth Arden 真彩自然眉笔勾勒完美眉形。 这款眉笔可以画出根根分明的超细眉线，填充眉毛的稀疏处。
这款眉笔还专门配有眉毛刷，帮助您塑造眉形，让眉毛焕然一体，更加饱满自然。 -SA

name: Air完美CC Compact气垫粉底液（包括补充装）
product_description: 利用来自PÜR Minerals的 Air完美CC Compact气垫粉底液 获得完美无瑕的肌肤。 让肌肤吸收具有滋养功效的巴西巴巴苏油和可强效保湿的月桂酸和肉豆蔻酸，其摩丝状质地可提供轻薄至中等程度遮掩而不会增加负担，同时抗氧化剂维生素E可抵御环境压力并抚平细纹。 具有可混合和可叠加特性，该粉底液每次均可轻松融入面部肌肤，不会留下斑纹。 盛放于创新的液体配送气垫内以便整洁涂用。 E.N.

name: Stockholm珍珠眼影 2克
product_description: 利用来自FACE Stockholm的珍珠眼影塑造迷人双目。 可提供一系列光滑流畅、宝石般的色调，这款半弧形眼影可以单独使用或与哑光眼影混合使用以寻求额外效果。 该持久配方为您的眼睑提供了一层柔和、闪烁色彩的半透明面纱。 – E.W.

colour: Burnish, Cream, Golden, Pewter, Smoke, Stardust
name: Eye Pencil
product_description: NUDESTIX Eye Pencil 可作为眼线笔、眼影膏，或轮廓笔使用。 眼线笔为双头，确保易用性。 这款眼线笔配有内置的卷笔刀，因而您永远不必担心本品变得太不精确或无法使用。 眼线笔可实现细腻、光滑而精确的涂抹。 本品可用于画出细眼线。 随附的海绵也可用于涂抹现有色彩，令双眸呈现奶油色或缎色。 您可选择各种色调的 NUDESTIX Eye Pencil ，包括奶油色、闪光、星尘、金色、古铜色、亮色、青灰色和烟熏色。

name: Concealer 2g (Various Shades)
product_description:
Reveal a flawless complexion with the Illamasqua Concealer; a coveted cream concealer that works to eliminate the appearance of blemishes and other problem areas.
Rich and creamy, the correcting makeup blends seamlessly, offering a professional looking finish. Tested under the harsh lights of film sets, the trustworthy concealer guarantees to keep skin looking flawless from every angle, all day long.

name: Arden Ceramide Cream Blush
product_description: Ceramide Cream Blush的触感为柔软的膏状，可以轻易地进行上妆，实现均匀的涂抹。 本产品质地轻盈，可以补充和滋润肌肤，同时能够让脸颊上展现出持久的红妆。 我们家独有的Ceramide Triple Complex，以及维生素A、C和E能够打造完美的光泽，同时可以延缓皮肤的衰老。 - S.C

colour: Shade A Light Warm, Shade D Fair Cool, Shade H Medium Warmer, Shade M Medium Cool
name: Stockholm Picture Perfect粉底霜 43克
product_description: 专门针对干燥和老化肌肤， 这款来自FACE Stockholm 的Picture Perfect Foundation 具有轻质、高色素乳霜配方，可帮助塑造完美的肤色。 该粉底霜帮助掩盖肌肤表面缺陷，令肌肤顺滑光泽，完美无瑕。 – E.W.

colour: Beige, Golden, Ivory, Light Beige, Pale Toffee, Soft Sand, Toasted Almond
name: London Medium Coverage Matte Foundation 28ml (Various Shades)
product_description:
Achieve a photo-ready complexion with the Lottie London Medium Coverage Matte Foundation; a water-based formula that delivers long-wearing, natural-looking colour.
Enriched with Vitamin C, the liquid foundation expertly covers blemishes and imperfections, whilst evening out skin tone to reveal a smooth, flawless complexion with a matte finish. Available in a range of shades.

colour: Flame Red, Magnetic Smile, Pink Attitude, Purple Rain, Rose Nu, Secret Garden, Sleek and Chic, Sweet Heart
name: & Berry 炫彩滋润口红（各种色调）
product_description:
Lord & Berry 炫彩滋润口红  ，富含滋养成分，使双唇亮泽、丝滑、舒适。
可轻松上妆、含高亮色素，立即为双唇增添色彩，具有可塑性，打造自然妆效或前卫的妆效。 内含澳洲坚果油、牛油果油、维生素E等成分，这些成分融合在一起，可呵护双唇，打造感性质地，感觉就像是您的第二层肌肤。 使双唇充满活力、滋润柔软。 - K.N

name: minerals Precise Micro Browliner (Various Shades)
product_description:
Expertly define your brows with the glo minerals Precise Micro Browliner; a twist-up brow pencil with an integrated spoolie brush. The versatile makeup tool works to fill, smooth and groom brows in an instant.
The Browliner boasts an ultra-slim applicator, which is ideal for filling in and transforming sparse brows. The fine pencil is able to create hair-like strokes with upmost precision; striving to achieve a natural-looking finish.
Effortlessly to apply, the retractable brow pencil creates flawless brows that frame the face. The formula can be built up until your desired definition and shape is accomplished.

name: Definition Powder Blush (Various Shades)
product_description: The High Definition Powder Blush has a lightweight, silk-textured formula that effortlessly blends onto skin with a natural looking, velvet smooth finish. Enriched with Vitamins C and E, it delivers a long lasting, buildable colour for a radiant complexion. Complete with compact mirror for on-the-go touch ups.

colour: Lovely Pink, Nude Mauve, Tempting Touch, Translucent, Truly Fair
name: Factor Creme Puff 定妆粉（各种色调）
product_description: Max Factor Creme Puff 定妆粉 ，使面部无油光、适合所有肤质。 超细配方，内含反光颗粒，可轻松地上妆、持久长效、完美无瑕。同时提高肤色亮度，使人容光焕发，美人如画。 既可单独使用，也可涂抹粉底后使用，使肌肤细腻、肤色柔和。

name: Stockholm眼影霜 4克
product_description: 利用来自FACE Stockholm的眼影霜塑造充满活力的眼睛。 该乳霜质感的眼影提供一系列发光颜色，可在您的眼睑上轻松涂抹。 它提供了无褶皱的光洁妆效，而且可混合、可叠加和防水。 通过其高色素特性，您的眼睛全天会保持华丽的色彩涂层。 – E.W.

colour: Anita BoyToy, Foxxy Pout, Ima Goodkisser, Mia Moore
name: 女孩唇膏（多种颜色）
product_description: theBalm 女孩唇膏让您拥有完美双唇。 这款柔软的乳脂质地唇膏可轻松涂抹，其高效的着色效果可实现持久定妆，而不会引起唇部肌肤的过度干燥，营养丰富的调节配方可深度滋润肌肤，让您每次使用都会有极致柔软的体验。 多个颜色可选。 E.N.

name: LONDON Plush Rush Lip Gloss - Birthday Suit
product_description:
Enhance the look of your pout with butter LONDON Plush Rush Lip Gloss, a plumping lip formula that works to add a slick of colour to your lips whilst creating a fuller appearance.
Delivering high shine colour, the lip gloss glides effortlessly across lips with a cushion like feel, and expertly stimulates hyaluronic synthesis to enhance your natural lip shape. Lips appear fuller, smoother and plumper. Leaving lips with a lasting tingling sensation, the lip gloss will boost lips, your mood and your confidence.

name: Definition Eye Define
product_description:
Line and define your eyes with Eye Define from High Definition. Gliding on smoothly to deliver an easy application, the eyeliner pencil defines the eye with a long-lasting finish.
Created with high colour pigments and a blend of carefully selected waxes, the liner provides a smudge resistant finish with an intense colour payoff. Enriched with Vitamins C and E, the eyeliner pencil boasts added antioxidant benefits.

name: Baby Lips Pop Art Lip Balm 19g (Various Shades)
product_description:
Add a hint of tint to your lips with Maybelline Baby Lips Pop Art Lip Balm, a moisturising lip balm that delivers a sheer wash of colour whilst improving hydration.
Gliding effortlessly across lips, the balm imparts a subtle shade whilst smoothing and softening your pout. Lips feel moisturised, supple and irresistibly kissable.

name: Dollar Brows 眉色 6ml (全色调)
product_description: Billion Dollar Brows  丰眉刷，巧妙地重塑眉毛。 装在一个便捷管内，同时配有螺旋状眉刷，简单便利的眉色可填补眉毛的任何间隙，同时重塑眉形，使其焕发自然色采。

name: Definition No.128 Eyelashes
product_description: Add intensity to your lashes with Eylure's Definition No.128 Eyelashes. Soft, lightweight and reusable, the handmade false lashes are perfect for any occasion; their pretty design with lightly spike edges adds attitude and definition, whilst their unique curve allows them to hug the eye contour for effortless application and comfortable wear.

name: Dollar Brows 眉刷
product_description:
Billion Dollar Brows 眉刷  ，为双端刷：斜角状和螺旋状。可重塑眉形。
本品是完美精心修剪眉毛的必备工具之一，斜角刷的刷毛专门设计而成，可轻松沾取眉粉，使眉线柔软干净；螺旋状眉刷，轻松地贴合肌肤、修整眉毛，重塑眉形，展示自然妆容。

name: Enchanted Eyelashes - Jasmine
product_description: Enhance your natural lashes with Eylure's 'Jasmine' Enchanted Eyelashes. Soft, lightweight and reusable, the handmade false lashes are perfect for any occasion; their dainty, delicate design with flicked corners lend eyes a subtle kick to the outer corner for an innocent, wide-eyed effect.

name: Eye Shadow - Invoke
product_description:
Transform peepers with the Illamasqua Eyeshadow in ‘Invoke’; a highly pigmented, intense formula that delivers outstanding colour pay off and long lasting wear.
Part of the May Queen collection to celebrate the folklore festivities of May Day, the 'Invoke' shade embraces the essence of spring-time renewal with a fresh, copper-toned hue and glistening glitter pigments for an iridescent metallic finish.
Wear alone across the lid in a simple wash of colour, layer up for a bolder impact or apply with a damp brush for a solid slick of colour to reinvigorate your look. Housed in the sleek signature compact.

name: LONDON Plush Rush Lip Liner - Sensual Nude
product_description:
Line and define your lips with butter LONDON Plush Rush Lip Liner, a water resistant lip formula that works to define and plump the appearance of your pout.
Infused with filling spheres that help to add volume to lips and reduce the appearance of wrinkles, the lip liner applies effortlessly, and blends seamlessly with its built-in brush. Delivering true colour that never bleeds or feathers, the lip liner can be worn alone, or layered beneath your favourite lipstick for maximum colour and staying power.

name: & Berry Silk Kajal Liner - Black
product_description:
Line and define your peepers with the Silk Kajal Liner – Black from Lord & Berry. Updating the original kohl eyeliner, the Kajal liner delivers similar results but with the ease and precise control of a pencil.
The black eyeliner boasts a soft tip that glides onto the eyes and offers a semi matte finish. Use the liner to create a precise, defined line, or smudge out for a sultry, smokey look.

name: Eyelash Curler
product_description:
RMK’s Eyelash Curler has a wider curve that will fit along the eye frame, a new resilient rubber filling and more stable handles. These features combined, allow you to gently catch and create curvaceous lashes right from the root.
In one grasp the RMK Eyelash Curler creates an eye opening effect by curling your lashes before applying your mascara. With such a curling and lifting effect you’ll witness your mascara staying on your lashes and not smudging on the eye area below.
Directions of use:

name: Pro 5 Piece OVA Brush Set
product_description:
Achieve a flawless, airbrushed base with the 5 Piece Ova Brush Set from Niko Pro. Offering five innovative oval-shaped brushes in a range of sizes, the set allows you to expertly apply all types of makeup including both cream- and powder-based formulas.
Each tool features dense yet luxuriously soft nylon bristles, which ensure an even and smooth coverage, plus the ergonomically curved handle and oval brush head are designed to adapt to the contours of your face for an immaculate finish.
The larger brushes are ideal for effortlessly blending foundation and buffing out blusher or bronzer, whilst the smaller pieces are perfect for precise contouring and highlighting. Featuring opulent silver-toned ferrules, the brush set will be a gorgeous addition to any dressing table or makeup kit.

name: 幻彩双眸套装 No.1 偏白/自然
product_description:
Pixi幻彩雙眸套裝No.1偏白/自然 
完美的全能產品，用於提亮迷人雙眼。 Pixi 的幻彩雙眸套裝小巧緊湊，適用於隨時補妝，其中包括兩個遮瑕膏、一個提亮色和一個高光色，能夠喚醒您的雙眼。 
隱藏瑕疵，遮蓋黑眼圈，抗皺配方結合抗衰老成份，保護和滋潤眼部肌膚。

name: Beauty Eye Polish
product_description: Add sheer colour to your eyes with the RMS Eye Polish; a cream eyeshadow with a glowing, light-reflecting finish. When applied sparingly, the delicate formula nourishes and moisturises the eye area, and delivers a subtle metallic veil with a barely-there, buildable finish. It provides all the benefits of raw mineral pigments without the dryness. Can also be used as a highlighter for a frosted make-up look.

name: Watery Pact SPF50+ PA+++ #23 18g
product_description:
Achieve a flawless complexion with the Watery Pact SPF50+ PA+++ #23 from Korean brand, Skin79. The emollient foundation offers an even complexion that is smooth and hydrated, ideal for use as a primer. #23 delivers a medium hue for darker skin tones.
Enriched with Lotus Flower, the hydrating formula provides skin with long-lasting moisturisation to keep makeup looking freshly applied all day long.

name: Pink BB Pumping Cushion
product_description:
Take your favourite BB cream on-the-go with the Pink BB Pumping Cushion from Korean brand Skin79. Effortless to apply, the pumping cushion expresses Skin79’s coveted Pink BB formula, which controls sebum and visibly brightens the complexion. The compact arrives with a handy cushion puff, which aids the application.
Enriched with a potent blend of Cornus fruit, Omija and Boxthorn extract, alongside Damask Rose and Cherry Blossom, the formula protects the skin against environmental aggressors and provides a soothing feel. The BB cream boasts a Vita Brightening Complex, allowing the formula to even and visibly brighten skin tone, as well as delivering anti-ageing benefits. Expect radiant skin, whenever and wherever you are.

name: W Color Mascara SS 01
product_description: Make sure you stand out! RMK’s W Color Mascara SS 01 in Black & Pink will forever change the way you add volume to your eyelashes. This double-headed mascara has two different shades, black for your upper lashes and pink for the bottom lashes. This allows for a colorful contradiction that exudes both brightness and volume. The bristles will help to boost length and define even the tiniest of lashes. – N.P.

name: Lip Jelly Gloss 05
product_description:
Douse your lips in RMK's Lip Jelly Gloss, a sheer, juicy lip colour with thick, glossy texture.
Gliding smoothly across lips, the highly concentrated, moisturising gel delivers a sheer wash of shiny pink colour, creating a full, plumped-up effect with its ultra-glossy formula. For fool proof application, the lip gloss features a newly developed, spoon-shaped spatula to pick up and deliver product effortlessly.

name: Compact Bronzer （星光）
product_description:
用Bellapierre Cosmetics Compact Bronzer（星光）打造健康的棕褐色皮肤。 这款丝般光滑的矿物颜料可瞬间令您的肌肤散发出健康的光泽，而且很容易融合渗透到肌肤中。
这款多任务的古铜色化妆品还可以增强肌肤的光彩，它也富含舒缓性和滋养性荷荷巴油，可令您的肌肤柔软水嫩和健康。 它适合各种肌肤（即使是最敏感和问题性肌肤），是化妆包的必备之物。 - L.M. 使用说明：

name: Color Lip Gloss - 08 Apricot Flash
product_description:
Drench your lips in a lustrous sheen with the RMK Color Lip Gloss in 'Apricot Flash'.
Combining the vibrant colour of a lipstick with the clarity of a lip Gloss, the colour glides effortlessly over lips with its square-shaped applicator, and delivers a veil of sheer yet brilliant colour. Its host of moisturising ingredients, including Shea Butter, Rosehip Oil keep lips feeling hydrated and comfortable.

name: Injection Cushion BB Cream SPF50+ PA+++ #21 14g
product_description:
Achieve a natural-looking, flawless complexion with the Injection Cushion BB Cream SPF50+ PA+++ from Korean skincare brand, Skin79; a moisturising BB cream with a patented, sponge-drenched delivery system.
Housed in a compact, the packaging contains a BB cream-soaked cushion that allows you to 'squeeze out' product by tapping on the makeup-soaked sponge with the application puff. Quick and easy to apply, the cream blends effortlessly into skin, creating a smoother, more even toned complexion that never looks cakey. Its blend of Hydrolyzed Collagen extract and Palmitoyltripeptide-5 enhance skin's moisture, and its innovative packaging ensures the blemish balm is never exposed to air or pollutants which can dry out and negatively affect the makeup's quality. Delivers smooth, natural and long-lasting coverage.
Contains SPF 50+ to keep skin safe from harmful UV rays.

name: Correct Primer 8g
product_description:
Perfect skin with the Correct Primer from Korean beauty brand Mizon. Universally flattering, the CC primer has a silky-smooth formula that glides across skin to effectively disguise the appearance of enlarged pores, blemishes and lines.
The soft shade brightens and lifts skin, with powder pigments helping absorb excess sebum production and combat excess shine, allowing makeup to last longer. Enriched with Moringa to protect against environmental damage, the multi-tasking balm leaves skin looking flawless and healthy.

name: Correct Volume Mascara - Black 5g
product_description:
Perk up your lashes with the Correct Volume Mascara in Black from South Korean-based beauty brand Mizon.
Delivering weightless volume and intense black pigmentation, the mascara adds length and definition without leaving eyelashes feeling heavy or clumped. The silhouette-shaped brush ensures an even and smooth application, catching even the smallest of lashes for fuller and voluptuous results. Easily removed without causing irritation.

name: Fluidsplash 3-in-1 Foundation - Shore 03
product_description:
Achieve a smooth, flawless complexion with the ModelCo Fluidsplash 3-in-1 Foundation; an oil-free formula that combines the benefits of a concealer, foundation and eye base.
Infused with Aloe Vera and antioxidant Vitamin E, the ultra-hydrating liquid foundation blends seamlessly onto skin to minimise the appearance of blemishes and imperfections, whilst delivering long-lasting coverage for a dewy, radiant finish. Provides SPF15+ protection.

name: Blush 2-in-1 Duo
product_description:
Achieve that gorgeous rosy glow with the ModelCo Blush 2-in-1 Duo. Combining two best-selling blusher shades that are universally flattering for all skin tones, the micronised powders seamlessly blend across skin with a buildable coverage for custom intensity and depth. Long lasting and instantly brightening, light diffusing pigments add a soft-focus, healthy-looking radiance. Complete with Kabuki brush for a seamless, professional looking finish.
Shades: Cosmopolitan (dusty rose pink) and Peach Bellini (soft peach shimmer)

name: 娜迪奥眼线液 - 黑色(2G)
product_description:
這款黑色眼線液讓您的雙眸整日嫵媚動人。每次都能打造專業媚眼，這樣一款佳品，佳人必備！ 
使用說明：

name: Cosmetics Creamsicle - Ganache 20ml
product_description:
Add a pop of colour to your complexion with the Trifle Cosmetics Creamsicle; a creamy, tinted lip and cheek stain with a long-wearing finish.
Infused with Organic Shea Butter, the blendable, buildable balm melts onto skin to soften and moisturise, whilst delivering smooth, vibrant colour for a bright, lit-from-within look that won't fade.

name: Cosmetics Multi Use Contouring Set - Contour Original
product_description: Sculpt your features like a pro with the Contour Cosmetics Multi Use Contouring Set in Original. Combining six varied shades of smooth cream formulas, the contour palette offers warm undertones and light shades that perfectly suit pale to olive skin tones. With concealer and highlighter hues, each colour blends effortlessly to add definition and shape to your facial structure, leaving you with perfectly chiselled cheekbones and a flawless complexion.

name: Smoulder Eyeshadow Brush
product_description:
Illamasqua Smoulder Eyeshadow Brush是一款具有短而密集的人造刷毛的美妆工具，可轻松勾勒细腻的眼部线条。
Perfect使彩妆模糊和扩散，这款化妆刷密集的刷头熟练地沿着眼睛涂抹和混合化妆品，创造了烟熏妆和模糊的效果，呈现出一个性感迷人的外观。 用画圈的方法遮盖瑕疵，以实现烟熏妆效。

name: Compulsive Cosmetics Crème Colour Concentrate (Various Shades)
product_description: Add a natural glow to your complexion with the Crème Colour Concentrate from Obsessive Compulsive Cosmetics. Enriched with a nourishing blend of Aloe Leaf, Cocoa Extract and Vitamin E, the long-wearing cream formula blends seamlessly to deliver a flush of colour with a semi-matte finish. Versatile and easy-to-apply, simply use as an eyeshadow, blush, highlighter or lip colour for endless make-up looks.

name: 夏日之选晚霞亮颜粉（8克）
product_description:
用PUR矿物公司的晚霞亮颜粉达到完美无瑕、光彩照人的肤色，这个品牌为任何肤色的女士打造自然的妆容。 其独特的配方中加入了乳木果油，以顺滑肌肤，还加入了Ceretin®复合物，以尽量减少细纹和皱纹，呈现更柔和的纹理。 云母把来自缺陷和瑕疵的光线反射开，让黑斑不可见。 E.N. 
使用说明：用粉刷扫过双颊、眉骨和颈下。 为了使轮廓清晰，用平刷扫过眉骨，并与外眼角成一个角度扫到鼻子。

name: Professionals BB Cream Primer - Sand Pearl
product_description:
Create a flawless complexion with the PUPA Professionals BB Cream Primer. Exclusively developed by the PUPA laboratories, the multi-tasking formula combines the moisturising properties of a BB cream with the perfecting benefits of a primer.
A blend of Hyaluronic Acid and Beeswax ensure ultimate hydration and moisture balance, while advanced Silicone Polymers work to create a protective barrier between skin and makeup for longer lasting results. With a natural looking colour pigment coverage and SPF 20, it leaves skin feeling soft, smooth and protected with the appearance of blemishes and imperfections effectively disguised.

name: Diva's Lashes Mascara - Black 10ml
product_description:
Create a false-lash look with PUPA Diva's Lashes Mascara; a volumising, intense black formula to plump, maximise and thicken lashes in one single stroke.
Utilising microgranules of Black Cellulose, the high-definition mascara delivers ultimate impact without clumping, flaking or smudging, whilst its specially designed brush features larger, stiffer bristles to capture lashes from the root. Expect show-stopping, luscious lashes with maximum control.

name: Lip Jelly Gloss 02
product_description:
Create colourful, captivating lips with the Lip Jelly Gloss 02 from RMK; a sheer tone lip gloss in Romantic Pink. The lip gloss jelly features a thick and glossy formula that adds lustrous juiciness to a plump pout.  
A newly developed, spoon-shaped spatula allows you to coat your lips to perfection with the highly concentrated moisturising gel. Lips are left full, glossy and with juicy colour. – E.W.

name: Lip and Cheek Set - Cherry Glam
product_description:
Enhance your natural beauty with the INIKA Lip and Cheek Set - Cherry Glam; a four-piece makeup set arriving alongside a convenient cosmetic bag. The all-natural collection boasts an effective primer, mineral blusher, pink lipstick and a lip brush for expert application.
Certified Organic Pure Primer with Hyaluronic Acid (4ml)
Achieve long-lasting foundation coverage with the Certified Organic Pure Primer with Hyaluronic Acid; a hydrating formula that prepares skin for makeup application. Enriched with a generous dose of Hyaluronic Acid, the priming formula delivers a veil of moisture to the complexion, which visibly plumps skin and helps to reduce the appearance of any fine lines or wrinkles. A smooth and hydrated face is the perfect base for ensuring makeup has a lasting, professional- looking finish.
Mineral Blusher Puff Pot - Rosy Glow (3g)
Enhance the complexion with a rosy glow from the Mineral Blusher Puff Pot; a loose powder formula that delivers pure performance. Ideal for sensitive skin types due to its gentle formula, the blusher provides a sweep of warming colour to the cheeks.
Certified Organic Vegan Lipstick - Pink Poppy (4.2g)
Add a pop of colour to the lips with the Pink Poppy Certified Organic Vegan Lipstick; a creamy, pink hue. Enriched with a skin-loving blend of Shea Butter and Jojoba oil, the formula not only delivers enviable colour, but nourishes, hydrates and protects lips. The Pink Poppy hue delivers a long lasting hue with an intense colour pay off.
Vegan Lip Brush
Apply lip colour with precision with the Vegan Lip Brush. Boasting a small yet firm brush head, the applicator applies lipstick, tints or lip gloss evenly and accurately each time, delivering a professional finish. The brush is perfect for taking on-the-go, arriving with a lid, the brush can stay protected whilst inside your handbag.

name: Best Seller Kit - Light
product_description:
PÜR's Best Seller Kit in 'Light' is a carefully curated makeup set that combines everything you need to achieve a flawless, sunkissed complexion. Combining a primer with a powder foundation, bronzer and mascara, the kit will allow you to experience long-lasting, perfected makeup. Complete with a makeup brush for effortless application.
Prep & Perfect Correcting Primer
A skin-perfecting primer infused with clinically proven ingredients to smooth and prep skin for flawless, long-lasting foundation. Utilising a Ceretin Complex which contains age-defying Retinol, the hydrating formula expertly reduces the appearance of lines and wrinkles whilst instantly minimising the look of pores and promoting a more uniform, even toned complexion. Neutral in colour, the antioxidant-rich primer is suitable for all skin tones, and feels lightweight on skin. Its brightening and firming properties lend your makeup a radiant, youthful finish, and its cocktail of Salicylic Acid, Shea Butter and Aloe Vera work in synergy to decongest pores, moisturise and soothe the complexion. Makeup looks flawless and silky smooth with extended wear.
4-in-1 Pressed Mineral Powder Foundation SPF 15 in 'Light'
A lightweight, pressed powder foundation with award-winning formula that utilises innovative skincare ingredients. Delivering minimal coverage for a natural, flawless complexion, the all-in-one foundation works as a foundation, concealer, powder and SPF simultaneously to improve the appearance of skin; it's clinically proven to camouflage and prevent imperfections. Encapsulated Mineral Water intensely hydrates, whilst botanical extracts promote a brighter, more even toned complexion. Skin looks flawless and is protected against harmful UV rays. Mess-free application. Suitable for contact lens wearers. 
Mineral Glow Powder in 'Bronze'
A micronized mineral bronzer that adds all-over warmth to the complexion. Perfect for sweeping over the whole face, or for contouring to sculpt and define, the powder delivers rich, golden undertones to create a sunkissed finish. Infused with moisturising Shea Butter and a Ceretin Complex that utilises Retinol, it helps to improve elasticity whilst reducing the appearance of lines and wrinkles. Skin looks beautifully radiant, smooth and healthy. Suitable for contact lens wearers. 
Big Look Mascara
A volumising mascara with clump-resistant application wand. Coating lashes in a rich, nourishing formula, the buildable mascara lifts and lengthens even the smallest of eyelashes to create a maximised, dramatised eye makeup look. Infused with Argan Oil, Coconut Oil and antioxidant Vitamin E, the black mascara adds a dewy sheen to lashes whilst intensifying, nourishing and preserving moisture. Lashes are protected and expertly volumised. 
Chisel Brush
A professional makeup brush that has been specially designed to flawlessly apply the 4-in-1 Pressed Mineral Powder Foundation. Working well with all powder products, the brush offers soft, synthetic bristles that pick up and deliver the perfect amount of product for flawless, well-blended results.

name: & Berry 大卷笔刀
product_description: 适合粗短的眼线笔和唇线笔使用，这款卷笔刀是您的必备化妆品配件。- J.D

name: 3 Mermaid Matte Eye Shadow
product_description:
The Mermaid Matte Eye Shadow Set from Chantecaille boasts highly pigmented, shimmering formulas that can be used dry as an eyeshadow or wet as a distinctive eyeliner. Enriched with luxurious Silk Tree extract, the creamy powder is effortless to apply and easily blended, delivering a buildable base with a deep, rich pigmentation. Soft metallic particles create a gorgeous sheen with intense, long-lasting colour.
Shades: 
Elephant - smokey grey
Lion - creamy vanilla
Bee - neutral brown
我的彩妆盘，尤其适用于盛装 Chantecaille 系列彩妆粉。分为八块，可盛装任何眼影、腮红或乳膏。  拥有一个磁系统，以确保产品固定到位，尺寸规格适合旅行，内含一个6"X4"的小镜子与全尺寸的基本眼刷。

name: Velvet Cleansing Milk 200ml
product_description:
Clarify and refresh your complexion with the SAMPAR Velvet Cleansing Milk; a weightless, gentle formula that expertly eliminates all traces of make-up and pollution without stripping moisture.
Infused with Rose Water and Lime Blossom, the luxurious milk purifies and rejuvenates the face and eye area, whilst the brand's groundbreaking Urban Advance Complex of Shea Butter Serum, Mint Endorphin and Probiotic Sugar provides antioxidant protection to defend against the damaging effects of environmental aggressors. Expect a soothed, revitalised complexion with renewed radiance.

name: & Berry 奢华眼线笔 - 黑色
product_description:
讓眼線彰顯您的風格。完美勾勒眼線，或粗或細，輕鬆滑過肌膚，持久妝容不花妝。 
這款眼線筆採用可伸縮設計，內置卷筆刀，非常實用。 -SA 
 使用方法： 用細線條描畫上下眼線。

name: Good Feel Better Foundation Brush
product_description: 这种手工雕刻的粉底刷是一款极品美容工具，可以获得专业效果。 简单的使用即可创建均匀、完美的妆效。 用以涂抹、分刷、融合粉饼，使其完全遮盖面部。 每款刷子均配有一个加重的手柄，并附有凸起的刷子名称，便于查找。 "Look Good Feel Better"是全球唯一一家针对癌症治疗的明显副作用而为女性提供支持的癌症慈善机构。 E.N.

name: Eye Liner Brush
product_description:
Combining durability and high performance, Chantecaille's Eye Liner Brush allows effortless application of brow colour and eyeliner.
Crafted from non-endangered wood with a pale ivory coating and nickel-plated ferrule, the tool features soft, synthetic taklon fibres and a flat, angled tip that lines, defines and shapes for a professional finish.
使用 PUR Minerals大眼效果防水睫毛膏 ，转动旋转头，营造一双夸张大眼效果，可在雨中长久保持。 摩洛哥坚果油配方包含充分的滋养成份，如欧米加脂肪酸，维生素E和抗氧化剂，确保呵护你的睫毛，同时达到明星般效果。 涂敷器的特点是拥有一个大号手柄，无结块尖端可接触到你的睫毛的每一毫米处，实现纤长，浓密和细致的效果。 这是一款无伤害性和化学成分的睫毛膏，这一条会严格执行。 -MB

PÜR Minerals的这款平衡控油粉底不仅看上去不错，而且是真正有效！ 它为你的肌肤留下一层中性粉状柔和面纱，有效利用控油Sebaryl因子对抗多余油脂。 可作为淡妆粉底单独使用，使肤色变得均匀，或在4合1压制矿物质化妆粉上使用，达到浓重遮盖以及有效控油的效果。 LB
使用说明：
使用塑形刷，以打圆圈的形式移动，达到均匀，完美定妆效果。 所需的遮盖范围。

name: Brow Master™ Brow Gel
product_description: Get perfect arches with the bareMinerals Brow Master™ Brow Gel; a smooth, natural-looking formula that seamlessly blends with all hair colours to create a flawless finish. The buildable gel allows you to customise your look, from filling sparse gaps to contouring a precise shape. Applied with an angled brush for maximum precision, eyebrows appear instantly fuller and redefined.

name: Doubleglow7 香槟色 8g
product_description:
DuWoplow 的 Doubleglow7 是一款亮白乳霜，能够瞬间亮肤、爽肤，可用在美妆产品的下层、上层或替代粉底液使用。
Doubleglow7 蕴含有七种重要营养成分：荷荷巴、芦荟、百合萃取物和亮白珍珠以及维他命 A、E 和 F。这七种神秘的有效成分共同作用可使肌肤拥有亮丽光泽。

name: Good Feel Better Flawless Complexion Sponge
product_description: 一种多功能海绵，设计为两个不同的表面用于多种用途。 圆形表面帮助晕染产品以获得更光滑的妆效，而尖形表面则准确地掩饰瑕疵以实现完美妆容。 每款刷子均配有一个加重的手柄，并附有凸起的刷子名称，便于查找。 "Look Good Feel Better"是全球唯一一家针对癌症治疗的明显副作用而为女性提供支持的癌症慈善机构。 E.N.

name: Wake Me Up Mascara - Extreme Black
product_description:
利用来自Rimmel的Wake Me Up Mascara Extreme Black丰盈睫毛，这款焕发活力的睫毛膏可提升、卷曲和增长睫毛。 富含维生素和黄瓜提取物，以焕发和激活睫毛活力，同时可提供极致影响和最大修饰效果。
其特别设计的睫毛棒提供更强的控制性和无污染涂抹，从而塑造令人瞩目的理想效果而不产生结块。 精密的睫毛刷可从根部涂抹睫毛，以打造大眼效果。 E.N.

name: Khol Pencil - Black 1.4g
product_description:
Line and define your eyes with Mavala's Khol Pencil in 'Black', an extra mild eyeliner ideal for sensitive eyelids.
Gliding effortlessly across skin, the liner delivers an intense black colour that can be blended out for a smokey finish. Use on the upper eyelid; create sultry cat eyes or add depth to your lash line.

name: Lipstick - Lilas 4g
product_description:
Add a pop of colour to your makeup look with Mavala Lipstick in 'Lilas'.
Gliding effortlessly across lips in a uniform layer, the lightweight lipstick delivers a rich, creamy hue that won't settle into fine lines. Its long-lasting coverage ensures lips feel comfortable all day, even if prone to dryness. Ideal for dry or sensitive lips, the lip colour helps protect against dryness for a healthy, supple-looking pout.

name: 斐珞尔艾丽丝眼部按摩仪
product_description:
高端美容護膚品牌foreo帶來全新產品艾麗絲™眼部按摩儀，創新的交錯式聲波脈動技術結合技術為雙眼帶來明亮活力，使雙眼展現年輕態。該按摩儀器有兩種模式：溫柔舒適的“原生模式”能夠模擬人工按摩的感覺，“溫泉模式”，採用了專業美容的拍打和細膩的波動. 
這款眼部按摩儀由優質，衛生的矽膠材質精心製成，專門為嬌嫩的眼部肌膚打造而成，按摩儀可以防止細菌的積聚，提高了護膚品特別是精華液和麵霜的吸收。減少眼部浮腫和黑眼圈，同時平滑魚尾紋，修復細紋和皺紋，展現活力雙眸. 
防水，易清潔，其結構緊湊，輕巧的設計適合旅行攜帶，可以隨時給你眼睛帶來活力。多個等級的按摩強度以適應個人的需要和舒適的要求. 
 特點:

name: Perfection Ultime Anti-Ageing Complexion 霜SPF30 30ml - Dark
product_description:
使用 Gatineau Perfection Ultime Anti-Ageing Complexion Cream SPF30 （Dark），您会拥有光滑、容光焕发的肌肤，它是一款密集补水的保湿霜，带有自然而有光泽的色调。
这款增亮保湿霜轻盈且有保护作用，使肌肤容光四射、神采倍增；其独特的肽复合物有助于让您年轻的肌肤饱满并增加弹性。 这款配方将甘草根提取物、玻尿酸、六胜肽和维生素B3与SPF 30混合在一起，有助于防止早衰和外部环境的损害。
您将拥有一个更光滑、更亮丽和更均匀的肤色，同时获得一个令人难以置信的保湿效果。 可以单独使用，或涂在粉底下面使您神采焕发。

name: Perfection Ultime Anti-Ageing Complexion 霜SPF30 30ml - 浅色
product_description:
使用 Gatineau Perfection Ultime Anti-Ageing Complexion 乳SPF30（浅色），您会拥有光滑、容光焕发的肌肤，它是一款密集补水的保湿霜，带有自然而有光泽的色调。
这款增亮保湿霜轻盈且有保护作用，使肌肤容光四射、神采倍增；其独特的肽复合物有助于让您年轻的肌肤饱满并增加弹性。 这款配方将甘草根提取物、玻尿酸、六胜肽和维生素B3与SPF 30混合在一起，有助于防止早衰和外部环境的损害。
您将拥有一个更光滑、更亮丽和更均匀的肤色，同时获得一个令人难以置信的保湿效果。 可以单独使用，或涂在粉底下面使您神采焕发。

name: Collections C04 Angled Powder Brush
product_description:
Create enviable cheekbones with the Spectrum Collections C04 Angled Powder Brush; an ultra-soft makeup brush that combines a vibrant colour palette with expert hand-crafted design.
Boasting a large, angled brush head with super soft bristles, the ‘Killer Cheek Bones’ brush sweeps powdered makeup over skin, applying product to places in need of definition, such as the jaw and cheekbones. The unicorn-inspired brush is an essential addition to any brush collection, ensuring each and every contour is flawless.

name: x Fleur de Force Brow Palette - Light
product_description:
Eylure have collaborated with Youtube beauty sensation, Fleur de Force, to create a sculpting Brow Palette in 'Light'.
The custom-mix brow kit combines a two-tone powder shadow with an illuminating highlighter for expertly filling, defining and enhancing your natural eyebrows. The waterproof brow powder combines a dark and light shade that you can blend together to achieve the perfect, individual colour for your brow tone, or use each hue independently; use the darker shade for adding depth, and the lighter shade for subtle shaping or filling sparse areas.
The illuminating highlighter is perfect for accentuating the brow bone and arch, and can even be used to add light and dimension to the inner corner of the eyes. Long-lasting, waterproof and smudge-proof.

name: Nature卷笔刀
product_description: 使用Living Nature 卷笔刀让您的化妆用笔保持锋利。 专门设计用于同一品牌的眼线笔和唇线笔，能有效锋利笔尖，提升上妆精确度和可控性。

name: LONDON Wink Eye Pencil Earl Grey 1.2g
product_description:
Line and define your peepers with the butter LONDON Wink Eye Pencil; an ultra-smooth eyeliner that glides effortlessly across the lid, without pulling on the delicate skin. The eye pencil arrives with a sharp point that can be used to produce clean and precise lines to enhance the eyes. The smooth formula can also be smudged and blended out for a smokey and sultry-looking finish.
Once applied, the long-wearing eyeliner sets firmly into place to ensure eyes remain flawlessly defined all day, however busy your lifestyle is.

name: Eyebrow Lipocils Ink - Brown
product_description:
Achieve perfect brows with the Talika Lipocils Ink; a comprehensive eyebrow treatment that immediately fills sparse gaps with natural looking colour while a 4-week regrowth formula helps improve density and fullness with continued use.
The easy-to-use felt pen ensures precise and accurate application with a long-lasting, anti-smudge colour concealer enhancing shape and definition.
Powered by plant extracts and regenerative peptides, the Growth Serum and Regenerating Care formula seeks to stimulate regrowth for improved thickness, while improving bulb cells to anchor existing hair follicles and combat hair loss. The addition of Coleus stimulates the synthesis of Melanin, resulting in naturally enhanced colour pigmentation.
Brows look instantly sleek and perfectly groomed; while with continued use they appear thicker, stronger and less scattered.

name: Definition Brow Essentials Collection - Bombshell
product_description:
Designed specially for those with fair hair and skin, the High Definition Brow Essentials Collection in 'Bombshell' combines everything you need to achieve perfectly groomed brows. The set features a versatile eye and brow palette for expert filling and shaping, a defining brow pencil and a clear setting gel to ensure a professional finish is achieved, every time.
Brow Define in 'Bombshell':
A medium firm eyebrow pencil enriched with waxes and vitamins to create fuller-looking brows. Perfect for filling, defining and shaping, the easy-to-blend pencil delivers smudge-proof colour with a natural finish, enhancing and sculpting for a professional look. Equipped with a built-in sharpener for precise application, the long-wearing formula, with added antioxidants, will ensure your brows stay bold and perfected, all day long. Dermatologically approved. Suitable for sensitive skin.
Brow Beater Setting Gel:
A clear, non-sticky setting gel that holds brows in place whilst conditioning for healthy-looking eyebrows. The taming formula feels lightweight on application, and expertly sets your perfectly defined brows in place, all day long.
Eye and Brow Palette in 'Bombshell':
A comprehensive eyebrow and eye palette combining three long-lasting brow powders with a highlighter and setting wax. The versatile set allows you to fill in your brows, defining, enhancing and sculpting for a well-groomed, professional finish. The silky-smooth powders are easy to apply and blend, and are infused with antioxidant Vitamins E and C; they double as eyeshadows to create soft, smokey makeup looks. Use the highlighter to enhance your brow bone, and the wax for a defined or bolder finish. Includes: 'Light Blonde',' Medium Blonde', 'Carbon', highlighter and wax. Housed in a mirrored compact with double ended applicator brush.

name: LONDON ShadowClutch Palette - Natural Charm
product_description:
Accentuate your eyes with the butter LONDON ShadowClutch Palette in 'Natural Charm'. Combining six warm-toned, neutral eyeshadow shades, you can create endless eye make-up looks with superior colour pay-off and seamless blendability.
Melting effortlessly onto the lids for smooth, even application, the high-pigmented, ultra-fine milled powders feature a built-in, oil-absorbing primer for a long-wearing, crease-resistant finish. Housed in a mirrored compact with a dual-ended brush for use on-the-go.
'Linen' - matte vanilla
'Quartz' - warm beige sheen
'Camo' - dark khaki sheen
'Camel' - matte nude
'Citrine' - coral sheen
'Leather' - matte chocolate brown

name: Juicy Shaker Lip Gloss - 201
product_description:
Add luscious colour to your pout with the Juicy Shaker Lip Gloss from Lancôme. Fortified with a bi-phased formula that synergises beautiful pigments and a nourishing blend of Sweet Almond Oil, Omega 3 and Cranberry Oil, you can expect super smooth, plump lips with mirror-like shine.
Housed in unique cocktail shaker-inspired packaging with a shake-to-wake formula, the lip gloss allows you to tailor colour vibrancy; simply shake more for an intensified make-up look. Complete with a soft cushioned applicator to hug the lip contour for a mistake-free finish.

name: & Berry Stylographic Eyeliner - Shodo
product_description: Accentuate your eyes with the Lord & Berry Stylographic Eyeliner; a long-wearing liner with a tapered precision tip. Gliding effortlessly across the eyes in one stroke, the eyeliner allows you to create thin or thick lines with controlled, mistake-free application. Add drama and definition for a professional cat eye look.

name: Snail Repair Blemish Balm 50ml
product_description:
Perfect the look of your complexion with Mizon Snail Repair Blemish Balm, a multi-functional BB cream that works to smoothen and hydrate skin whilst camouflaging imperfections.
Enriched with 45% Snail Secretion Filtrate, a hero ingredient in Korea known for its smoothing and anti-inflammatory properties, the BB cream works to conceal existing breakouts whilst improving skin's overall appearance. Its skin-smoothing formula delivers excellent coverage that expertly camouflages blemishes and scarring without accentuating them. Its dose of Papaya extract brightens and smoothens, and Adenosine helps to diminish fine lines and prevent wrinkles. Skin is hydrated without the shine, and looks smooth, even in tone and flawless.
Please Note: Comes in one shade only - suits very fair skin with pink undertones.

name: Reveal Colour Correcting Finishing Powder 9g
product_description:
The ALGENIST Reveal Colour Correcting Finishing Powder combines exclusive skincare technologies with advanced neutralising pigments to help combat uneven skin tone and discolouration with long term results.
Developed utilising exclusive biotechnology research, the ultra-refined face powder is based around an AlgaCorrecting Complex with a contrasting colour spectrum to correct redness with a soft-focus, airbrushed finish. The long-lasting formula attracts light while eliminating shine, effectively blurring the appearance of pores and wrinkles for a flawless looking complexion. Use to set makeup or dust where light naturally hits for a radiant glow.

name: Geller 劳拉·盖勒浓密睫毛膏——黑色
product_description:
Laura Geller 劳拉·盖勒浓密睫毛膏帮您打造像假睫毛一样浓密的睫毛；其极致浓密的黑色配方可让您每一下涂抹都拥有丰盈、最大化拉长和加粗睫毛的效果。
这款基于凝胶的睫毛膏蕴含有球状粉末和营养丰富的维他命 B5，具有超强的丰盈和定型效果，而其专业设计的超大尺寸睫毛刷，能够从根部控制睫毛。 让您拥有所期待的奢华睫毛，而不会引起睫毛脱落、干燥或倾倒。

name: 斐珞尔男士洁面 (100ml/3.3 Fl.oz)
product_description:
FOREO給你帶來潔淨肌膚的完美體驗,專為男士設計,變革凝膠泡沫配方,將灰塵,污垢，雜質從皮膚排除的同時強化和煥活肌膚。 
富含96%的天然成分,包括排毒辣木果提取物,再生熱液礦物養分,潔面適合男性的LUNA潔面儀T-Sonic™波動技術。配合潔面儀的震動，活性成分能最大限度地發生作用，給毛孔提供深層的滲透淨化，同時增強皮膚抗氧化能力。肌膚倍感潔淨,重新煥發了生機和活力.

name: Pixelated眼影盘
product_description:
Japonesque Pixelated 眼影盘，使妆容性感迷人。本品内含四种独家专业基本色调和六种 Pixelated彩色眼影色调。
六种 pixelated 色彩，结合一系列补充色调及微粉化色彩，为您展示震撼人心的轻微反光的妆容。这四种基本眼影色调，为您的眼睛增添了精细的色彩及亮度。 每种色调都是高色素，可轻松融合，为您打造真实的加强色彩。

name: Mad Lash Mascara - Black
product_description:
Lengthen your lashes with the Mad Lash Mascara - Black from theBalm. Creating an ‘out of this world’ look, the mascara is able to capture each lash to deliver extreme length and volume.
Arriving with a unique, injection moulded wand applicator; Mad Lash is able to transform the look of lashes. The intense black formula boasts intense colour pay off that defines lashes and leaves them long, full and fluttering.

name: London Brow Volume Powder 9g (Various Shades)
product_description:
Expertly frame your face with the Lottie London Brow Volume Powder; a lightweight, long-wearing powder that adds dimension to fine, sparse eyebrows.
Featuring an applicator wand for easy, mess-free usage, the brow powder delivers hair-like colour to fill in gaps and enhance natural shape for fuller, thicker-looking eyebrows in an instant. Available in a range of shades to suit all hair tones.

colour: Fly, Free, Haze, Higher, Spirit, Trace, Trip
name: 助眠唇膏笔 2.4g
product_description: Illamasqua 的唇膏笔让您拥有无限的创意，这款乳状多功能蜡笔唇膏推出一些列颜色，每款都蕴含有浓烈的色素，让您拥有活泼亮丽的色彩。它采用定妆持久的轻盈配方，可轻松涂抹在肌肤上，并且可叠加涂抹缔造出多种妆效——直接使用唇膏笔涂抹可缔造浓艳的色彩，或集中颜色调和使用以缔造更精致的水洗颜色。

name: London Powder Blusher 7g (Various Shades)
product_description:
Achieve glowing perfection with Lottie London's Powder Blusher; a lightweight, blendable powder that delivers a flush of colour to your complexion.
Available in a range of shades, the long-wearing blush builds effortlessly on skin to lend your cheeks a beautiful glow with excellent colour pay-off. Accentuates and defines your favourite facial features.

colour: Candy Red, Creamy Caramel, Pink Crush, Playful Purple, Strawberry Pop, Sugary Orange
name: Baby Lips Color Crayon (Various Shades)
product_description: Accentuate your pout with the Baby Lips Color Crayon from Maybelline. Infused with moisturising oils, the easy-to-apply lip balm glides on effortlessly to soften and hydrate lips, whilst delivering bold, kissable colour with a long-wearing finish. Available in a range of shades.

name: Cosmetics Contour & Highlight Cream Palette
product_description:
Define and illuminate skin with the Contour & Highlight Cream Palette from Bellápierre Cosmetics. The set combines six multi-dimensional shades to help you achieve a sculpted and chiselled facial structure.
Universally flattering and ultra-blendable, the smooth cream formulas effortlessly glide onto skin with pure mineral pigmentation to enhance skin texture. Step-by-step instructions are included to ensure you achieve a professional, natural-looking finish. Housed in a chic compact complete with a convenient mirror, it’s a must-have for any makeup addict.

name: 便携式散粉刷
product_description:
Japonesque便携式BB / CC霜刷  ，打造完美无瑕的妆容。是一款多功能的化妆刷设有可调节手柄 ，帮您自选纤维密度。
采用合成毛发，展示无与伦比的妆容。这是一款便携式刷子，配有柔软的球形刷头，尤其适用于基础粉和古铜色化妆粉的涂刷；也可用来涂刷光影粉，令肤色焕发 光釆。
伸缩手柄，会使纤维更密集，尤其适用于精妙的轮廓。 配有保护盖。

name: Sandler Watercolour Creme Bronzer - Fiji (3.5g)
product_description:
Daniel Sandler Watercolour Crème Bronzer in Fiji 亮丽的粉色可稍微提亮肤色，其顺滑配方与肌肤完美融合，令肌肤焕发年轻光彩。
对于大多数人而言，古铜色化妆品是化妆包内的关键必备品。而这款 Daniel Sandler Watercolour Crème Bronzer in Fiji 将超越每个女孩的期待，成为她们最好的朋友。 美黑古铜色化妆品将点亮肤色，赢得赞誉和羡慕。
使用说明：

name: 丝柔亲肤底妆刷
product_description:
RMS 丝柔亲肤腮红刷让您拥有无可挑剔的底妆；它是打造专业级妆效的重要美妆工具。
这款化妆刷具有经久耐用和高性能的特点，其分层的优质合成纤维刷毛成紧密的螺旋式排列，能轻松进行晕染，让您每次使用都能打造光滑无痕妆效。
这款化妆刷采用创新的双重工艺设计，配备有长、短刷毛，能够涂抹面部任何一条曲线，将腮红涂抹在肌肤，而不是让颜色敷在肌肤表面。 让您拥有所期待的整体喷绘般的妆效。

name: Definition Lash and Brow Booster
product_description:
Make Up by HD Brows Lash and Brow Booster让您拥有更修长浓密的睫毛和眉毛。 本品为透明凝胶质，富含活性成分和一种强效肽复合成分Capixyl，涂抹后能令眉毛和睫毛更浓密、更饱满、更修长。
非常适合那些饱受短小稀疏睫毛困挠或想要改善眼眉外观的人群；其蕴含的维生素原B5和红三叶草精华能滋润毛发，完美护理和改善您的眉毛和睫毛。 -SA
使用说明：每日在上妆前涂抹于睫毛和眉毛

name: London 综合上光刷
product_description: Lottie London 综合上光刷 尤其适用于化妆粉，帮您轻松打造完美无瑕的涂抹效果。 刷毛浓密，可轻松涂抹定妆粉、软化所有面部轮廓线。展示专业精致的妆容。

name: E71 Highlight Diffuser™ Brush
product_description:
Enhance your eyes with Sigma's E71 Highlight Diffuser™ Brush; a must-have tool fitted with the brand's anti-bacterial, hypoallergenic SigmaTech® fibres.
With an angled, densely packed head, the versatile brush can be used to highlight brow bones, diffuse colour or soften edges for a well-blended finish. Its specially designed, patented three-ring ferrule is made from SigmaAlloy™ for ultimate strength, whilst the lightweight handle is crafted from a sustainable source of wood with eight layers of paint, making it scratch resistant.

name: Luminizing Satin Eye Color Trio RD299 - Beach Grass 3g
product_description: Shiseido Luminizing Satin Eye Color Trio的Beach Grass系列让您双眼成为全场瞩目的焦点。 提供三款绝美眼影，随附一支眼影刷和一支海绵头眼影棒，让您随时随地轻松上妆。 质地丝般柔滑，完美亲附眼皮，与肤色无缺融合，打造专业妆容。

name: Shea Butter Lip Balm - Scarlet Sorbet
product_description: Easy and efficient to apply, the Pixi Shea Butter Lip Balm in Scarlet Sorbet is the ultimate tinted lip balm. Perfect for keeping in your handbag, the lightweight balm boasts a twist-up design with a secure click lid for safe keeping. Featuring a subtle slick of sheer colour, the unique ‘lip-texture’ formula is hand poured into a luxurious base of Shea Butter to moisturise and soften, with additional vitamins to nourish and protect with long term results.

name: Hello Rose!
product_description:
Achieve that English Rose complexion with the Pixi Hello Rose!. The three-piece set combines a liquid highlighter, powder blush duo and lip plumping gloss to help you create a glowing and healthy-looking visage with a flush of delicate colour.  
Glow Booster in Pink Pearl 
Lightweight and silk-textured, the liquid highlighter enhances your natural radiance and perfectly preps skin for further makeup. Working to smooth and blur the look of imperfections, it contains brightening Mica as well as iridescent pigments to impart a dewy, radiant finish.   
Beauty Blush Duo in Rose Gold
The mineral-based powder is the perfect finishing touch to any makeup look, adding soft and natural looking radiance with a hint of highly pigmented color coverage. Infused with light reflecting particles and a soft shimmer, the universally flattering pair are easily blended to highlight and lift dull complexions.
LipLift Max in Sheer Rose
The LipLift Max has a unique formula infused with peptides to add a burst of volume to make lips look fuller, and Jojoba Oil to enhance moisture and intensively hydrate. Aloe and Chamomile work to soothe and soften, whilst adding a subtle sheen to your smile. The precision pen tip glides on for effortless application and the refreshing mint flavour leaves a cooling sensation.

name: Glow-y Powder - London Lustre
product_description: Achieve a naturally radiant complexion with the Pixi Glow-y Powder, designed in collaboration with international beauty blogger Aspyn Ovard.  Adding a hint of sheer, natural-looking colour, the mineral-based powder contains subtle light reflecting pigments to brighten and highlight, easily blended and universally flattering for all skin tones.

name: Vintage Cosmetics Company Gourd Blending Sponge Infused with Collagen - Pink
product_description:
Achieve a flawless complexion with The Vintage Cosmetics Company Gourd Blending Sponge Infused with Collagen, a latex-free makeup sponge that expertly applies and blends a range of makeup products onto your skin with an airbrushed finish.
Infused with Collagen for an anti-ageing boost, the gourd-shaped blender allows you to apply foundation and concealer to large areas of the face, whilst targeting smaller, hard-to-reach areas such as around the eyes and nose. Versatile and easy to use, it will also blend your favourite highlighters and blushers, and serves as a great tool for contouring. Soaking the sponge in water prior to use will ensure makeup doesn't absorb into the sponge (which means no wastage!).

name: Vintage Cosmetics Company Scissors - Floral
product_description:
Made from premium stainless steel with a vintage-inspired floral design, The Vintage Cosmetics Company Scissors allow you to precisely cut fingernails, toenails and strip lashes.
Easy to use, their sleek, sharp design makes them a must-have beauty tool for all your trimming needs.

name: LONDON Plush Rush Lip Gloss - Free Fall
product_description:
Enhance the look of your pout with butter LONDON Plush Rush Lip Gloss, a plumping lip formula that works to add a slick of colour to your lips whilst creating a fuller appearance.
Delivering high shine colour, the lip gloss glides effortlessly across lips with a cushion like feel, and expertly stimulates hyaluronic synthesis to enhance your natural lip shape. Lips appear fuller, smoother and plumper. Leaving lips with a lasting tingling sensation, the lip gloss will boost lips, your mood and your confidence.

name: X Cheryl Evening Eyelashes - Oh My Goddess
product_description: Add maximum intensity to your lashes with Eylure's Cheryl Evening Eyelashes in 'Oh My Goddess'. Soft, lightweight and reusable, the handmade false lashes are perfect from desk to dance floor; their bold, full design adds sophisticated definition, whilst their unique curve allows them to hug the eye contour for effortless application and comfortable wear.

name: Vamp! Compact Eyeshadow Duo - Milk Chocolate
product_description:
Create subdued or smokey makeup looks with the PUPA Vamp! Compact Eyeshadow Duo in 'Milk Chocolate', a carefully curated eyeshadow duo that combines two complementary shades.
Creamy and easy-to-blend, each highly pigmented colour delivers a rich finish with long-lasting wear. Use each colour individually or blend together to create a unique eye makeup look. Feels comfortable on the lid. Complete with dual-ended sponge tip applicator.

name: Geller 劳拉·盖勒至尊唇部打底霜
product_description: Laura Geller 劳拉·盖勒至尊唇部打底霜让您突显完美无瑕的唇部轮廓。 其营养配方中蕴含有野玫瑰果油和抗氧化维他命 E，可有效淡化细纹和丰盈双唇，防止褪色，定妆您喜欢的唇膏。

name: Medium BB Cream and Blur (40ml)
product_description:
利用 Garnier Medium BB Cream and Blur获得完美无瑕的肌肤，这是一款集底妆和修复霜于一体的日常保湿霜。 其结合甘油、维生素C和矿物颜料的独特配方消除肌肤缺陷，并提供深层保湿，同时提供SPF 30以抵御环境侵害因素。
可快速吸收而且轻盈，该美容霜可对抗肤色不均并锁住水分，令肌肤更光滑、柔软，并明显缩小毛孔、减少细纹和皱纹。 体验轻薄遮掩、持久哑光和更加年轻、亮丽的肤色。 E.N.

name: Geller 劳拉·盖勒粉底刷
product_description:
Laura Geller 劳拉·盖勒可伸缩式粉底刷非常适合涂抹散粉，取少量的散粉类产品即可拥有均匀专业的涂抹效果。
这款粉底刷配备有超柔软的合成尼龙刷毛，能让您轻而易举地涂抹和调和散粉和腮红，而刷毛不会吸收面部的化妆品或油脂。 让您每次都能尽享光滑无瑕的妆效。

theBalm系列产品之一：魅影浓长睫毛膏，是一款黑色睫毛膏，内含泛醇、竹子和维生素E等成分，使睫毛浓密漂亮，可调理睫毛，使睫毛更强韧。
强效配方，可提升睫毛质地、加强睫毛韧性、使睫毛浓密纤长。配有睫毛刷，可巧妙涂覆每根睫毛，给大家带来强烈的视觉冲击，从睫毛根部至睫毛梢，打造最浓最长的假睫毛效果。 令双眼性感迷人。 - K.N

theBalm 烟熏三色眼影盘套装1，展示性感迷人的妆容。这款眼影盘含三种高亮色素、烟熏色调。
各种色调均为三倍研磨的颜料，为高色素，既可干涂，也可湿刷，打造系列不同妆容，展示丝滑的肌肤。 帮您呈现神奇的烟熏妆双眼，无脱落，展示专业妆效。 - K.N

name: 迷人矿物质眼影盘（蛋白石之光）
product_description:
PIXI 迷人矿物质眼影盘 ，令妆容持久生效。 内含6色眼影作为补充色调，用以重塑突显美丽的双眼，展示自然清新的妆容，妆效持久，与肌肤完美融合。
内含反射光的矿物质和营养维他命E等成分，用以护眼部周围娇嫩肌肤；配方柔滑，粉末状，可轻松与眼睑融合，打造宝石风格的色调，不会起皱或褪色。 配有双端海绵尖涂抹装置。 E.N.

name: 颜色纠正底霜具有保湿和平衡的功效，为紫色
product_description:
PUR Minerals 颜色纠正底霜 - 补水且平衡，为紫色， 是第一个不含油脂和硅的底霜，非常适合那些发炎和受到刺激的皮肤。 底霜有舒缓，澄清和控油的作用，为剩余的彩妆环节奠定完美的基础。
富含矿物质的配方是由水杨酸，薰衣草提取物构成的，PUR Minerals自身的Ceretin复合霜带有淡紫色，有助于减少斑痕的出现。 Pentavitin提供了瞬间以及长达72小时的持久水润，确保你的肌肤永远不会存在脱水的感觉。

name: Matte Chic Liquid Lipstick - Marisa
product_description: The Matte Chic Liquid Lipstick from Chantecaille delivers intense, long-lasting colour with a virtually weightless feel. Infused with advanced peptides, the moisturising formula works to stimulate natural collagen production and blur imperfections for a visible plumping effect. The precise doe-foot applicator allows the colour to effortlessly glide on without bleeding or feathering, and it quickly sets for a bold, matte finish that doesn’t fade or transfer.

name: Lip Balm (15ml)
product_description:
使用 MONU First Defence Lip Balm，令双唇滋润柔滑。 富含维生素 A、小麦胚芽油和强效抗氧化维生素 E 的滋养共混物，舒缓和防止双唇衰老。
这款丰盈唇膏适用于修复干燥或干裂的双唇，恢复水分，保持持久舒适并散发令人振奋的玫瑰香味。

name: Duo Bronzer - Brown (8g)
product_description:
由全天然成分制成，瞬间让您的肌肤呈现出暖巧克力和金焦糖的颜色，提升肤色。 通过生态认证，蕴含有机荷荷巴油、椰子油和向日葵油和植物甘油。
