小巧的环保木盒防止粉末撒出，镜面盖设计方便涂抹。 -SA

Zelens控油和收缩毛孔天鹅绒妆前乳持久覆盖粉底，达到半哑光妆效。 天鹅绒般的质感非常适合容易发亮的油性及混合性皮肤类型。 其配方无油、无对羟基苯甲酸酯，含有绿色紫苏叶的成分，有抗氧化作用，防止自由基的侵害和环境刺激。 减少多余的油脂以收缩毛孔，使肤色均匀，为在皮肤上完美无瑕地打粉底做好准备。 E.N. 
使用方法： 涂在粉底下，实现全覆盖，或者单独涂在保湿霜上，达到裸妆效果。

name: Seashell Eye and Cheek Trio 40ml
product_description:
Achieve a soft glow with the Chantecaille Seashell Eye and Cheek Trio; a sea-shell inspired palette that boasts a trio of shimmering powder hues and an ultra-soft brush for application.
The pale pink shade can be swept across the entire lid to deliver an ethereal wash of colour, whilst the neutral taupe hue can be applied to the crease to define the eye contour and add the appearance of depth. Each shimmering colour can function as an eyeshadow, but can also be dusted onto the cheeks for a natural looking rosy flush. Expect a radiant finish.
Rose Quartz - A sparkling peony
Driftwood - A light brown
Cheek Cheer Shade - A golden tangerine

colour: Black Forest, Earth, Raven, Slate, Violet Damask
name: 闪亮丝滑眼线笔
product_description: Chantecaille   闪亮丝滑眼线笔 ，可巧妙重塑双眼。 本款削尖的眼线笔，可轻松精准地在肌肤上滑行，持久长效， 具有高光泽、不脱色。 配方灵活，可描眼线，也可作为眼影涂至眼睑上。

colour: Apex, Bronx, Dizzy, Heroine, Incubus, Jules, Justify, Obsidian, Servant, Sex, Slink, Stealth, Succumb, Tango, Truth, Vapour, Vernau, Vulgar, Wolf
name: Powder Eye Shadow 2g (Various Shades)
product_description: Enhance your eyes with the Illamasqua Powder Eye Shadow; a high-pigmented, long-wearing powder that melts effortlessly onto the lids for a smooth, even finish. Blendable and buildable, the versatile eyeshadow can be used on the eyes, face and body as a blusher, contouring powder or highlighter with superior colour pay-off.

colour: Blonde, Cinnamon, Golden Orchid, Graphite, Mediterranean, Periwinkle, Romance, Seashell, Shimmering Emerald, Shimmering Taupe, Sky, Smolder, Sugar Cube, Truffle
name: Arden Beautiful Colour Eyeshadow (2.5g)
product_description:
用 Elizabeth Arden Beautiful Colour Eyeshadow （2.15g）打造美丽动人的双眸。 这款产品的配方采用了高级颜料技术，每种颜色的颜料颗粒都富含硅、视黄醇亚油酸酯和抗氧化剂，可改善眼部区域娇嫩肌肤的外观，同时防止进一步的环境损害。
这款产品易于融合，奢华的配方可提供光滑防皱的颜色，令双眸熠熠生辉。 本品装在一个时尚的小粉盒里，随附一把刷子和一个内置镜，方便在路上使用。 使用说明：用刷子 Smooth地扫过上眼皮和下眼皮。

name: Powder Foundation 10g (Various Shades)
product_description:
Reveal a flawless, matte complexion with the Powder Foundation from Illamasqua.  Providing medium to full coverage, the ultra-fine makeup is quick and easy to apply and is perfect for taking on-the-go for touch-ups, aided by the internal mirror.
In one simple sweep, the powder offers an immaculate and even canvas that can be layered up for enhanced coverage. Imperfections are blurred and the complexion boasts a smooth, velvet matte finish.

colour: Blush, Coral, Crimson, Mocha, Orchid, Plumrose, Raisin, Taupe
name: Arden Beautiful Colour Smooth Line Lip Pencil 1.05g
product_description:
使用 Elizabeth Arden Beautiful Colour Smooth Line Lip Pencil 1.05g 勾勒唇部完美线条。 本品可锐化至一个细点，赋予精确的线条，提升唇部轮廓。
唇线笔另一端的笔头设计巧妙，便于嘴唇上色，且能轻松地混合各种颜色，实现无缝涂抹。 使用说明：

colour: Ballet Blush, Bare, Framboise, Fuchsia, Honey, Papaya, Red Door Red, Rose, Sugared Kiss
name: Arden Beautiful Color Precision Glide Lipliner（多种色调）
product_description:
使用Elizabeth Arden Beautiful Color Precision Glide Lipliner（多种色调）来轻松地展现您唇部的风采。 本款产品有效持续时间长达12小时，有多种颜色可供选择，不会出现条纹状或者褪色的情况，从而使您的唇部全天保持完美妆效。
本产品为光滑的膏状，可以在唇部上轻易地涂抹，凸显嘴部的自然线条，同时，经过特别研制的色素可以生成一种柔韧的保护膜，从而给您一种奢华的感觉，同时又能延长口红的使用寿命，提高光泽程度。 本产品符合人体工程学设计，抓握的线条设计可以保证精确涂抹，同时而灵活的口红刮板和卷笔刀可以很容易地混合。  - L.M.使用说明：

colour: Daring Beige, Extreme Pink, Fearless Red, Fiery Red, Luscious Raspberry, Pink Lover, Seductive Magenta
name: （多色）
product_description:
Douse your lips in rich, hydrating colour. The Color Bold Liquid Lipstick from Elizabeth Arden is a creamy, intensely pigmented lip formula that combines the coverage of a lipstick with the shine of a lip gloss.
Infused with conditioning emollients and micro-fine pigments, the liquid lipstick glides effortlessly across the lips with its easy-to-use flocked tip applicator, and delivers a rich shock of high-impact colour that feels moisturising and comfortable to wear. Its long-lasting formula will never feather or bleed, so lips look luscious, glossy and saturated for longer.

colour: Shade 2, Shade 3, Shade 4, Shade 5, Shade 6, Shade 7, Shade 8
name: Arden Prevage Anti-Aging Foundation (Various Shades)
product_description:
Witness a perfected and youthful-looking complexion with Elizabeth Arden Prevage® Anti-Aging Foundation, a liquid foundation that feels beautifully lightweight on skin whilst delivering light to medium coverage with a naturally luminous finish.
Infused with a potent antioxidant Idebenone Complex and a host of anti-ageing ingredients, the youth-inspiring makeup glides effortlessly over skin, blending seamlessly to help blur imperfections and even out skin tone; its moisture-rich hydra-pigments expertly lock in moisture whilst providing long-wear colour with skin-smoothing properties. Working to diminish signs of ageing day after day, the anti-ageing foundation continuously repairs the appearance of skin, promoting a younger looking complexion by protecting from external aggressors and reducing the look of fine lines and wrinkles.
Skin looks naturally radiant with a smooth, perfected appearance.

colour: Caramel #13, Cocoa Riche #14, Crème Beige #2, Golden Beige #8, Golden Tan #10, Honey Pecan #11, Mahogany #16, Natural Tan #9, Porcelain #1, Sandy Beige #7, Sienna #15, Soft Amber #4, Soft Beige #3
name: Longo Water Canvas Crème-to-Powder Foundation (Various Shades)
product_description:
Create a flawless base with the Vincent Longo Water Canvas Crème-to-Powder Foundation, a unique, oil-free makeup that delivers light to medium coverage with a comfortable 'second skin' feeling.
Lightweight and refreshing on contact, the foundation blends effortlessly into skin, transforming into a luxurious texture that expertly evens out the complexion whilst camouflaging imperfections. Formulated with a patented process, it utilises 75% Microwater to hydrate and nourish skin whilst providing antioxidant protection. Skin looks naturally perfected and healthy.

colour: Amaryllis, Bourbon Rose, Calla Lily, Camellia, China Rose, Gaia, Gypsy Rose, Heirloom Rose, Mandarin, Moroccan Rose, Nocturne, Patience, Red Juniper, Sari Rose, Tea Rose, Violetta
name: 精美口红
product_description: Chantecaille精美口红 ，为双唇增添华丽色彩。 内含透明质酸，使嘴唇饱满丰盈。配方高亮泽，可均匀涂抹。 本款精美口红可轻松地在嘴唇滑行，使唇部舒适滋润，持久长效、不油腻、天鹅绒般柔软。

colour: Dare to Pink, Play with Fire
name: Provocalips 持久亮色唇彩（多色可选）
product_description:
Rimmel Provocalips 持久亮色唇彩具有长达16小时的持久，是每个女孩的最佳选择。 这款唇彩将让双唇从早到晚保持光滑滋润，您可以放心接吻、出行、用餐。 卸妆时只需用油性卸妆水去除便可。  LB
第1步：涂抹唇膏，张开双唇持续60秒，待产品吸收。
第2步：涂抹一层面油，以锁住颜色、水分和亮泽。

colour: b. fearless, b. lovely, b. memorable, b. real, b. sassy, b. true
name: B. Divine Duo™ Lip and Cheek Stain (Various Shades)
product_description: Perfect your cheeks and pout with the Lilah B. Divine Duo™ Lip and Cheek Stain, a multi-tasking balm that adds a pop of colour and boasts conditioning properties. The creamy formula is enriched with natural extracts of Aloe and Agar to intensely hydrate, whilst the colour is long-lasting and easily blended. Simply dab the tint onto lips or cheeks to achieve a subtle slick of pigmented colour that’s perfect for day or night.

colour: Aqua, Chocolat, Emerald, Lilac Rose, Quartz, Rose Gold
product_description: Chantecaille 炫彩眼影粉芯，为双眼添加金属色。这款柔软丝滑的眼影，可轻松融入肌肤，展示纯粹的珍珠色妆容。 本款眼影粉芯采用柔光珍珠微粒， 可塑性好、能与肌肤很好地融合，令肤色闪亮、肌肤轻柔超放松。

name: Reveal Colour Correcting Radiant Primer 30ml
product_description:
The ALGENIST Reveal Colour Correcting Radiant Primer perfectly preps skin for seamless, natural looking makeup application with a more radiant and even tone.
The advanced, tinted primer utilises the latest in biotechnological research to deliver instant and long-term benefits. The proprietary AlgaCorrecting Complex effectively neutralises redness and discolouration for a uniform complexion, with universally-flattering pigments veiling the appearance of imperfections.
An age-defying combination of Alguronic Acid and Microalgae Oil have been scientifically tested to deliver superior anti-ageing benefits, rich in Oleic Acid, Phytosterols, Tocopherols and Tocotrienols to optimise hydration levels and counteract nutrient loss.
Brimming with antioxidants and Vitamin E, the multi-tasking formula can be used alone for barely-there coverage or as a base for foundation to improve longevity. Skin feels smooth and supple with a healthy looking radiance.

name: IRIS™眼部按摩器 - 花瓣粉红
product_description:
使用来自FOREO的IRIS™眼部按摩器令双眼光彩照人，焕发青春，该品牌专门生产高档美容仪器。该工具以创新的交替T-Sonic™技术设计，它设有两种模式：温柔"Pure模式"复制人工按摩的感觉，"Spa模式"，结合轻敲和细腻搏动以提供专业美容护理体验。
通过优质、超卫生硅树脂制造，可温柔护理娇嫩的眼部轮廓部位，该设备能够防止细菌积聚并改善护肤品，尤其是精华液和乳霜的吸收。 减少浮肿和黑眼圈，同时平滑鱼尾纹、细纹和皱纹，令双眼焕发活力。
完全防水、易于清洁，其紧凑、轻巧的设计使IRIS™非常适合旅行使用，您随时随地可以让双眼焕发活力。 具有多个强度等级的高级亮眼装置，以满足个人需要和舒适性要求。 E.N.

name: Eye Shadow - Maiden
product_description:
Transform peepers with the Illamasqua Eyeshadow in ‘Maiden’; a highly pigmented, intense formula that delivers outstanding colour pay off and long lasting wear.
Part of the May Queen collection to celebrate the folklore festivities of May Day, the 'Maiden' shade embraces the essence of spring-time renewal with a radiant gold-toned hue and glistening glitter pigments for an iridescent metallic finish.
Wear alone across the lid in a simple wash of colour, layer up for a bolder impact or apply with a damp brush for a solid slick of colour to reinvigorate your look. Housed in the sleek signature compact.

name: Geller 劳拉·盖勒 Spackle 舒缓妆前乳
product_description:
Laura Geller 劳拉·盖勒 Spackle® 舒缓妆前乳为您打造无可挑剔的底妆；其极致水润的配方旨在平静和舒缓敏感的肌肤。
这款轻盈的妆前乳蕴含有抗氧化成分和纯天然植物萃取物，能轻松地与肌肤融合，减轻刺激感，而其创新性的绿色颜料可有效遮盖红血丝。 既可单独使用，也可涂抹在粉底液下层，令肌肤看起来更加光滑自然。

colour: Delicate Pink, Golden Brown, Intense Apricot
name: Like A Doll Luminys Blush (Various Shades)
product_description:
Look pretty in pink with the ‘Like A Doll’ Luminys Blush from PUPA. Universally flattering for all skin types, the powder blusher has been baked for an intensified colour pigmentation and luxuriously silky texture that seamlessly blends.
Enriched with micro-refined Pearl extract, it illuminates skin with a soft shimmer, while Jojoba Oil and Vitamin E ensure an even and smooth coverage with long lasting results. Dust across cheeks as a highlighter or for that perfect rosy glow.

name: Desert Bronzing Powder (Various Shades)
product_description: Dust cheeks with the PUPA Desert Bronzing Powder for a gorgeous, sun-kissed glow. The powdered bronzer delivers a silky smooth colour coverage that blends perfectly for a natural and even finish with a warm, matte tone. Perfect for contouring and adding depth, the long lasting bronzer can be built up and adjusted for custom results to suit all skin tones. Housed in chic compact ideal for on-the-go touch-ups.

name: Glamore Lipstick 4g (Various Shades)
product_description:
Add a pop of vibrant colour to your pout with the Illamasqua Glamore Lipstick; a satin finish lipstick available in a selection of intense shades.
Delivering long-wearing, highly pigmented colour, the hydrating lipstick glides effortlessly across lips; its dose of moisturising Vitamin E ensures lips feel comfortable and conditioned all day. Can be worn traditionally or applied beneath a sheer lip gloss for added dimension.

name: & Berry 光泽亮肤遮瑕棒（各种色调）
product_description:
Lord & Berry遮瑕棒，使肤色完美亮泽。这是一款遮瑕膏和粉底棒的结合物，遮盖力为中等，可塑性强，可帮助遮盖黑眼圈和肌肤瑕疵。
富含澳洲坚果油和睡莲提取物，可轻松均匀地上妆，遮盖细微瑕疵、黑眼圈、斑点、细纹等，持久长效。 丰富耐热配方，使肌肤更完美、肤色更均匀。 - K.N

colour: After Dark, Dark, Light, Light/Medium, Lighter Than Light, Medium, Medium Dark, Mid Medium
name: Photobalm Powder Foundation - Various Shades
product_description:
Create a flawless make-up base with theBalm's Photobalm® Powder Foundation; a lightweight, blendable powder that delivers natural-looking, long-wearing colour.
Ideal for all skin types, its buildable formula buffs effortlessly onto the face for a perfected, camera-ready complexion in a flash. Housed in unique, vintage style packaging with a built-in mirror.

name: iredale Bitty Brow Kit - Blonde
product_description:
这款随身装包含三支眉刷、透明植物眉蜡和着色眉粉，瞬间画眉点睛，完美匹配您的靓丽金发。
盒体小巧精妙，便于携带，完美打造柔美自然的双眉。 有了这款随取随用的美眉套装，您能随时为双眉着色、加深和加亮，同时遮盖烦人的灰白杂色。

name: Quad Smokey Stories Eye Shadow - Faux Blancs四色眼影
product_description:
妙巴黎四色眼影讓你擁有一個令人如痴如醉的完美眼妝，四種顏色供你填充，自由界定彰顯你眼部出色魅力，色彩更持久，顏色暈染過渡自然. 
只需要用最亮的眼影來填充你的眼瞼，以中等色作為陰影，用最深的顏色來界定，用閃亮的顏色來使顏色柔和，這樣煙熏妝就完成了，眼影棒採用了雙端魔杖軟墊尖和精密輪廓尖端的設計. EN

name: Cosmetics Compact Blush Amaretto
product_description: Say hello to radiant cheeks with Bellapierre Cosmetics Compact Blush Amaretto. A talc-free, powder mineral blush, it defines your  cheekbones with beautiful, natural-looking colour that leaves your  complexion looking bright and fresh. - L.M.

name: 润唇&润肤膏——淡雅香子兰
Pressed Powder - N04
product_description: A setting powder that delivers the fine textured translucent layer  that fits for the flawless finish. By blending the 4 different textures  with the powder brush, they work to eliminate the shine on T-zone and  correct the tone for a natural bright complexion. Comes in a compact  with a sliding compartment to keep the brush in place.

name: Arden Flawless Finish Foundation Brush
product_description: 这款 Elizabeth Arden Flawless Finish Foundation Brush专用于涂抹液体和面霜基底。 多维刷毛不会拉扯或脱落，平直而坚固的设计让您精准化妆。

name: Sandler Shimmer Shadow - Gilded Taupe
product_description:
Enhance the eyes with the Daniel Sandler Shimmer Shadow in Gilded Taupe; a sheer, satin eyeshadow that adds instant radiance to the peepers.
The shimmering powder shadow effortlessly sweeps over the lid, delivering a sheer veil of colour. Use dry for a subtle wash of colour, or apply the shimmer shadow damp to create a richer finish with an enviable lustre.

name: 色号BEIGE
product_description:
Omorovicza礦物遮瑕膏可塑造完美立體感，還原光澤剔透的無暇美肌。質地清爽細膩，此款遮瑕膏可提亮面部疲憊黯淡區域，讓肌膚全天保持在最佳狀態，有效遮蓋黑眼圈、色斑、粉刺和疤痕。富含維他命C和E，此款礦物遮瑕膏不僅完美遮瑕，還可均勻膚色，同時促進膠原蛋白的生成，恢復肌膚新生光彩，讓臉部肌膚更顯年輕有活力，散發自然光澤。 
 使用方法：

name: Cosmetics Lip Contour Kit - Rio
product_description:
The Contour Cosmetics Lip Contour Kit combines a creamy lip liner with a matte liquid lipstick for luscious lips in an instant.
Paired for the perfect shade combination, the lip liner ensures clean and precise definition, with the intensely pigmented lipstick gliding across the lip for true colour pay off and an on-trend matte finish. Presented in gorgeous packaging, the set is ideal for on-the-go glamour.

name: 美宝莲 Pink Punch 宝蓓润唇膏
product_description:
來自Maybelline 美寶蓮的Pink Punch 寶蓓潤唇膏採用特有超水潤配方，是一款全新的時尚唇膏，可為您打造迷人的​​精美翹唇。這款SPF20 的彩色唇膏蘊含特有配方，可為雙唇呈現精美色彩，同時具有旋出式設計，使用非常方便，保證輕鬆塗抹到位。 KD 
 使用說明：

name: Luster Glide Silk Infused Eye Liner - Amethyst
product_description: Expertly define your eyes with the Luster Glide Silk Infused Eye Liner from Chantecaille. With a precision tip that glides on effortlessly, the sharpenable pencil delivers long-wearing, transfer-proof colour with high-shine and ultimate staying power. Its versatile formula can be applied to the lash line, or blended onto the lids as an eyeshadow.

name: Teint Idole Ultra Cushion Foundation Refill (Various Shades)
product_description:
Lancôme's Teint Idole Ultra Cushion Foundation Refill has been designed to fit your empty Lancôme Teint Idole Ultra Cushion Foundation compact.
Delivering long-wearing, full coverage with a luminous velvet finish, the foundation blends effortlessly onto skin to camouflage imperfections and promote a more even, radiant skin tone. The cushion technology ensures mess-free, easy application; simply touch to activate, then apply to skin with a patting motion to create a true, full coverage effect. Lightweight and refreshing despite its high coverage, the makeup feels comfortable on skin and inspires a bright, natural-looking glow. Equipped with a puff applicator for easy application.
Portable and refillable, its the perfect every day makeup.

colour: Bloody Good, Clover, In Spades, Nancy, Sigma Pink, Stamina
name: 强效唇膏
product_description:
Sigma 强效唇膏为您的双唇添加流行的奢华色彩；它是采用高效着色配方的唇膏，内置于磁性旋转管中。
这款质地柔软的乳状唇膏可轻松涂抹在双唇，提供持久的定妆效果，而斜角顶端可让您实现准确无误地涂抹，以尽享极致柔软的双唇。

name: Gleam Highlighter
product_description:
使用 Illamasqua Gleam Highlighter 突出您喜欢的功效。这是一种彩虹色乳霜配方，让您的妆容具备深度、清晰度和突出的效果 。
半透明的柔滑彩妆笔含有维生素 E 和云母矿物质，提供纯粹的珠光色素，并形成自然亮泽。 可在面部和身体上使用。

name: Dollar Brows 眉粉2g（全色调）
product_description:
Billion Dollar Brows 眉粉  ，突出您的眉毛。 此款眉粉操作简单，如天鹅绒般丝滑，可填补眉毛，同时使眉形更自然，脸型更漂亮。
本款精细的眉粉具有完美的肌肤贴合性及自然的眉色，可重塑眉毛，使之发出自然光泽，展示迷人的拱形。

name: Skin Base Mixer 30ml (Various Shades)
product_description:
Modify your foundation with the Illamasqua Skin Base Mixer; a tool that can create a new hue or help to adapt your foundation shade to suit the season. The ultimate fix, the mixers can adjust the brightness, warmth and depth of the complexion, as well as intelligently adapting to correct issues such as blemishes and discolouration. Arriving in a variety of hues, each Skin Base Mixer boasts a different purpose, benefitting different skin tones.
White
For a bright and lifted appearance, the white hue mixed with a Skin Base Foundation, or used alone, is ideal.
Amber
Amber is perfect for reducing redness, as well as balancing an uneven, olive tone complexion. Mix with your Skin Base Foundation.
Terracotta
Blur dark pigmentation with the Terracotta shade. Adding warmth, the hue is ideal for use around the eyes, mouth and hairline.
Chestnut
To achieve a chiselled under-contoured look, the Chestnut colour is the go-to mixer. The dark hue is designed to add further depth to the complexion.

name: W Eyebrow (Pencil) 03
product_description:
RMK W Eyebrow (Pencil) 03 in olive brown brings you an ingenious design to help you create perfect eyebrows.
Boasting a retractable pencil at one end and at the other a felt head for adding powder, the pencil also features a screw brush for grooming and smudging the eyebrow at the centre of the pencil.
The oval-shaped pencil gives you great control for eyebrows with an exquisite shape and great natural look. -SA

colour: Golden Banana, Golden Oriental, Golden Sienna, Porcelain, Topaz
name: Longo Perfect Canvas Loose Face Powder (Various Shades)
product_description:
Perfect the look of your skin with the Vincent Longo Perfect Canvas Loose Face Powder, an ultra-lightweight powder that creates a smooth, matt makeup finish.
Blending effortlessly into skin, the loose powder delivers a veil of invisible perfection, setting makeup in place whilst camouflaging pores and absorbing excess shine. Its brightening and refining properties leave skin looking healthy and naturally flawless. Can be used alone or layered over foundation or tinted moisturiser; it’s the perfect base for applying eye and cheek colours.

colour: Beguiling Brown, Charming Charcoal, Enchanting Emerald, 黑色
name: Geller 劳拉·盖勒眼线笔
product_description: Laura Geller 劳拉·盖勒眼线笔可从各个角度勾勒您的眼部轮廓。 这款液体眼线笔采用快干配方，具有浓烈的色彩，不会褪色或晕染，其精确的笔尖可实现顺滑无误地勾勒，缔造专业级品质的妆效。 具有防水性。

colour: Black, Black, Brown, Brown, Brown, Dark Grey, Green, Grey, Light Grey, Vanilla White
name: Nature Eyeshadow 1.5g - 各种色调
product_description: 使用Living Nature 眼影为您的双眼添加深度和轮廓。 使用纯矿物粉，这款可混合和可塑性强的粉饼能毫不费力地融至肌肤，妆容持久、色彩纯正，不会起皱。 在干燥肌肤上使用，呈现柔和、微妙的色彩，或在湿润肌肤上使已获得高亮度。

colour: Coralicious, Fire Red, Orange Juice, Red Passion, Rose Nude, Sable Brown
name: I'm Matt Lip Fluid Liquid Lip Colour (Various Shades)
product_description:
Enhance your pout with the PUPA I'm Matt Lip Fluid Liquid Lip Colour; a lightweight, velvety formula that delivers long-wearing, sumptuous colour with a matte finish.
Adding comfortable, hydrating colour with highly pigmented pay-off, the liquid lipstick glides effortlessly onto lips for a bold, lush finish. Features a flocked wand applicator for mistake-free, controlled results.

name: On-The-Glow Cream Highlighter (Various Shades)
product_description:
ModelCo have collaborated with American model, Hailey Baldwin, to create the On-The-Glow Cream Highlighter; a versatile formula to accentuate your favourite facial features.
Blending seamlessly onto skin, the silky cream formula can be worn alone, or layered with eyeshadows and lip, cheek and face highlighting products for a customised make-up look.
Delivering subtle, natural-looking colour and a perfect hint of radiance, you can achieve a sculpted, defined finish with a sheer glow. Simply apply to cheek bones, browbones and down the bridge of the nose to enhance luminosity.

name: 眉粉（各种色调）
product_description:
theBalm眉粉  ，可巧妙重塑并凸显眉毛。本款眉粉持久长效，为您打造完美如画的眉形，使眉毛浓密饱满，色泽自然。
本款天鹅绒般柔滑的粉饼，可与肌肤无缝混合，填补眉毛的任何空隙，同时修整眉毛的自然形状，使脸部更富立体感。 配有内置镜，可精准涂抹。 E.N.

colour: Light, Light/Medium, Lighter than Light, Medium, Mid Medium
name: timeBalm 抗皱粉底（各种色调）
product_description:
theBalm   timeBalm 粉底 ，展示完美无瑕的肤色。 适合所有肌肤类型和各种肤色。本款粉底配方轻盈，使用海绵涂抹，可轻松融入脸部肌肤，可全遮盖或中度遮盖肌肤，展示均匀光滑、自然清新的妆容。
霜状配方、持久长效，可塑性强、与肌肤贴合性好。内含维生素A、C、E，以保持肌肤水分、保护肌肤免遭环境侵害；蜜蜡，有助于缩少毛孔和减少就瑕疵，打造完美如画、光滑细嫩的妆容。 E.N.

colour: Forever Flush, Nature Ray, Swan Lake, Terra Dew
name: Longo Water Canvas Blusher (Various Shades)
product_description:
Add a healthy flush of colour to your makeup look with the Vincent Longo Water Canvas Blusher, a unique, crème-to-powder blush that delivers a subtle yet buildable glow to your cheeks.
With a unique texture, the blush blends effortlessly into skin, transforming into a luxurious powder that expertly brightens up the complexion; its formulation of 75% Microwater hydrates and moisturises whilst a dose of Vitamin E keeps skin protected and healthy-looking.

colour: Box Red, Cool Deep Pink, Deep Berry, Deep Green, Deep Purple, Hot Orange, Pink Nude, Pow, Rose Pink, Warm Red
name: 魅惑唇釉
product_description: Add lustrous colour to your pout with the Illamasqua Liquid Lip Lure. Available in a range of shades, the liquid lipstick glides on effortlessly to deliver intense, high-pigmented colour with the mirror-like shine of a lip gloss. Its unique cushioned wand allows mistake-free application for a long-wearing, picture-perfect finish.

colour: Holographic Sheer Pink, Pure Pink, Rose Pink
name: Face Pop Matte Lips (Various Shades)
product_description:
Add a pop of colour to your lips with RMK Face Pop Matte Lips, a velvety lipstick with comfortable matt finish.
Available in a range of pink tones, the lipstick glides on effortlessly, delivering a vivid yet natural-looking hue with smooth, lightweight feel.

name: Insta Conceal and Contour Palette 7g (Various Shades)
product_description:
Discover an innovative, multi-tasking palette with the Rimmel Insta Conceal and Contour Palette; a trio of natural hued, creamy shades, which highlight, conceal and contour the complexion.
The concealer can be used to mask the appearance of dark circles under the eyes, or to cover minor blemishes and imperfections. This ensures the base is flawless and perfected, ready for the highlight and contour. The light, highlighting hue should be applied to the high points of the face. Ideal for the bridge of the nose, brow bones and chin, the highlighter ensures a bright and radiant finish, whilst the dark, contouring shade adds definition. The contour cream should be used in the shadows of the face, ideal for sculpting enviable cheek bones or carving a high impact jaw.
Use all three shades in synergy to achieve a naturally flawless complexion and an expertly sculpted visage with your best features on show.

name: Chai Spice Lip Balm
product_description:
Envelops lips in a fragrant treat using the Hurraw! Chai Spice Lip Balm; an ultra-hydrating formula that cares for skin using premium organic, vegan and raw ingredients.
Effortlessly gliding over lips, the creamy lip balm is enriched with a skin-loving blend of Sweet Almond and Jojoba Seed Oil, which delivers instant and long-lasting hydration. The lip balm is inspired by Hurraw!’s favourite beverage,  chai tea and boasts a blend of Black Pepper, Cinnamon, Clove, Anise and Vanilla,  which lend the hydrator a rich spiciness. Lips are left thoroughly nourished and completely kissable in one simple swipe.

colour: Brixton Lights, Nude Shock, Pink Lane, Rose Records
name: Moisture Renew Lipstick 4g (Various Shades)
product_description:
Add a pop of colour to your pout with Rimmel's Moisture Renew Lipstick, a creamy, hydrating lip colour that delivers a rich, highly pigmented colour.
Gliding effortlessly on, the lipstick imparts a vivid hue whilst saturating lips in long-lasting moisture and care with its cocktail of Vitamins A, C and E. Intensely hydrating, it will leave lips feeling super soft and comfortable.

name: Color Performance Cheek Blusher - Ex-02
product_description: The RMK Color Performance Cheek Blusher features three shades of high-pigmented colour to give your complexion a healthy glow. Housed in a silver compact, the lightweight powder melts effortlessly onto the cheeks for superior colour longevity, whilst the soft brush allows you to experiment by shading, highlighting and blending. Wear the shades alone or together to create customised colour and a look as dramatic or natural as desired. E.N.

name: Shine Lip Gloss - Fairy Floss
product_description:
Enhance your lips with the ModelCo Shine Lip Gloss in 'Fairy Floss', a shimmering, high shine lip lacquer that delivers a shock of beautifully reflective colour with long-lasting finish.
Gliding effortlessly onto lips with its wand applicator, the non-sticky gloss imparts a soft colour tint and features an in-built mirror for flawless, on-the-go applications . Lips looks luscious and hydrated.

name: Pro Made Easy Eye Set Thrive - Dark
product_description:
Expertly define your eyes with the Pro Made Easy Eye Set from Illamasqua. Combining a volumising mascara, innovative brow colour and a versatile eyeshadow palette, you can achieve professional make-up looks.
Masquara Gain
An innovative mascara to volumise, lengthen and define lashes. Infused with a walnut-derived active that acts as a natural dye extract, the jet black formula tints lashes for ultimate impact and definition, allowing you to experience improved colour intensity after just two weeks. Lashes appear bigger, bolder and expertly enhanced.
Vital Eyeshadow Palette
Combining four complementing shades, you can define and highlight eyes with excellent colour longevity and seamless blendability. Melting effortlessly onto the lids for smooth and even application, the rich, velvety powder can be worn alone or together to deliver customised colour that won't crease, fade or smudge. Housed in a convenient mirrored compact. Can also be used on the body. Shades include: 'Bubbles' (warm peach), 'Trace' (grey brown), 'Envision' (warm brown) and 'Drop' (deep brown).
Brow Build in 'Thrive'
Tint, tame and define brows. With built-in fibres, the formula glides on to deliver long-wearing colour, allowing you to create enviable arches and emphasise the shape of your brows without having to worry about smudging or fading. Its handy spoolie brush fills in sparse brows for a fuller, thicker appearance with natural hair-like colour.

name: Green Tea Lip Balm
product_description:
Meet the needs of extremely thirsty lips with the Hurraw! Green Tea Lip Balm; an ultra-hydrating formula that cares for skin using premium organic, vegan and raw ingredients.
Instantly hydrating lips in one simple swipe, the creamy balm is infused with Organic Cold Pressed Hemp Oil, which is rich in omega fatty acids and therefore envelops lips in a veil of intense moisture. Dryness is eliminated with long-lasting effect.
The balm is complete with a healthy dose of Match Green Tea for added antioxidant benefits. The hardworking formula strives to leave lips ultra-comfortable and fragranced with a subtle green tea scent.

name: Fibre Lash Brush-on Lashes
product_description:
Enhance the look of your lashes with the ModelCo Fibre Lash Brush-on Lashes, an award-winning two-step kit that combines a lengthening mascara with innovative brush-on lash fibres.
Working in unison to promote longer, dramatic lashes, the lash extension kit expertly adds 3-5mm of length to your natural lashes, boosting volume and definition with a water-resistant finish. Simply use the mascara to add length and definition, then apply the lash fibres to instantly enhance lash appearance. Finish with a final coat of mascara to seal in the fibres. Infused with Bees Wax and Carnauba Wax, the fibre lash formula keeps lashes nourished whilst delivering high-impact, voluptuous results. Smudge-proof, clump-free and easy to remove with warm water.

name: Dollar Brows Brows on Point Micro Pencil - Raven
product_description:
Achieve flawless eyebrows with the Brows on Point Micro Pencil - Raven from brow experts Billion Dollar Brows. Dual ended, Brows on Point comprises a precision point to one end and a spoolie brush to the other. The ultra-fine tip creates natural looking brush strokes that mimic the appearance of individual hairs for a subtle finish, whilst the spoolie can be used to comb and blend.
The pencil boasts a mechanical function, constantly delivering a precision tip without the need to sharpen. Filling in sparse brows to accentuate your look, the brow makeup offers maximum colour pay off and a professional finish. The formula is both water and smudge proof, gliding onto brows effortlessly and providing long lasting results.

name: Sandler 丹尼尔桑德勒豪华哑光口红- Gigi
product_description:
奢華滋養雙唇，長效不脫色。輕輕一抹，飽滿色彩躍然唇上，不脫色，不暈染。其中含提高口紅耐久性的聚合物，使口紅長效不脫色，拒絕乾燥、緊繃和不適。 
葉酸護唇顆粒能促使雙唇更豐滿，其中的牛油樹脂、荷荷巴油和復合維生素等滋養成份卓效呵護雙唇，水潤柔滑妝感立現。

name: Geller The Iconic New York City Collection Eye Shadow Palette in Uptown Chic 13.2g
product_description:
The Laura Geller Iconic New York City Collection Eye Shadow Palette in ‘Uptown Chic’ is a luxurious collection of sophisticated shades inspired by the bustling uptown of Manhattan, whether it's a wistful stroll through Central Perk or a night out at the bright lights of Broadway.
The mirrored compact houses twelve carefully-curated eyeshadows in a range of shades and finishes, from matte nude to shimmering gold, each with a rich, densely-pigmented formula. Easily blended, each shade sweeps across the lid for instant, stay-true colour, perfect for creating subtle daytime looks or a sultry smoky eye.
Shades: Love Note (matte soft peachy nude)
Desert (shimmering fawn)
Bubbling (effervescent golden peach)
Brownstone (matte mocha brown)
Petal Pink (soft pinky mauve matte)
Uptown Tulip (lustrous desert rose)
Electric Rose (sizzling reddish copper)
Blackberry (shimmering plum wine)
Adobe (matte terracotta)
Chestnut Sparkle (chocolate shimmer)
24K Gold (metallic gold)
Fudge (matte blackened brown)

name: BB/CC Cream Brush
product_description:
本品刷毛由混合纤维制成，长度倍增，卓效涂抹和混合BB霜和CC霜。 由天然和合成矿物成分混制而成，实为必备的化妆神器。 - L.M.
使用说明：用双倍长度的刷毛涂抹和混合BB霜和CC霜。

name: B. Palette Perfection Eye Quad - b. stunning
product_description: Build the perfect smoky eye with the Lilah B. Palette Perfection Eye Quad in b. stunning. The eyeshadow quad offers four complementary shades in both matte and shimmer finishes, allowing you to create multi-dimensional and layered looks. Super blendable and highly pigmented, simply dust the lighter shade all over the lid for a natural finish or add in depth and precise lining with the darker hues. Housed in Lilah B.’s signature chic pebble-shaped case.

name: Reveal Concentrated Colour Correcting Drops 15ml (Various Shades)
product_description:
Cover, correct and perfect your skin with ALGENIST Reveal Concentrated Colour Correcting Drops, a selection of lightweight serums that target specific skin concerns, such as redness and dullness.
Helping to neutralise dullness, redness, fatigue and dark circles, each specially curated colour improves the appearance of skin, visibly correcting to balance out and even skin tone. Infused with a host of beneficial ingredients, including an AlgaCorrecting Complex, Microalgae Oil and Alguronic Acid, the colour-correcting drops expertly rejuvenate skin whilst replenishing moisture and delivering anti-ageing and instant, skin-evening properties.
Bridging the gap between makeup and skincare, the drops can be worn alone or blended with daily skincare and makeup products to promote a smoother complexion and prolonged makeup wear. Expect a visibly corrected complexion with a more balanced and healthy appearance.
Pink: Corrects dullness and fatigued skin.
Green: Corrects redness.
Apricot: Corrects dark circles and dark spots.
Blue: Corrects sallowness and yellow tones.

name: Mineral Blusher Peachy Keen
product_description:
使用INIKA Mineral Blusher打造天然肌肤光泽，中性桃色腮红适合所有肤质。 高亮矿物配方，令妆容更加持久、色泽明艳，这款腮红是化妆包的必备品。
不含滑石粉、油脂、香精和防腐剂，亲肤的同时令肌肤呈现动人光彩。 K.D.使用说明：

Japonesque混装三件套 ，帮您熟练上妆。本套产品包含三块柔软海绵。配有轻巧手柄，及不含乳胶的高密度海绵头，可轻松将面霜、粉饼、粉底等混合在一起。
圆形海绵可将额头下巴处的化妆品顺畅地涂抹；带角度海绵可触及所有面部轮廓；尖头设计，可轻松将化妆品涂抹至不易涂抹之部位。 可达到使用气刷后的专业效果。

name: B. Bronzed Beauty™ Bronzer
product_description: Get that sunkissed glow instantly with the Lilah B. Bronzed Beauty™ Bronzer. Formulated with raw extracts of Aloe and Agar, the powdered bronzer features two shades allowing you to contour and highlight effortlessly whilst working to gently hydrate skin. Intensely pigmented and super blendable, the bronzer is perfect lightly dusted over cheekbones for a natural, radiant finish.

name: Vintage Cosmetics Company Gracie False Strip Lashes
product_description:
Reach new lengths with The Vintage Cosmetics Company Gracie False Strip Lashes, a pair of reusable false eyelashes that extend and enhance the look of your natural eyelashes.
Lightweight and comfortable to wear, the lashes add natural-looking length and fullness to your peepers, taking you perfectly from day to night with their versatile design. The synthetic strip lashes are easy to apply and reusable.

name: Minerals Impact Plus Mascara
product_description: Take lashes to new lengths with the PÜR Minerals Impact Plus Mascara; a nourishing, mineral-based treatment to strengthen from within while creating instant volume and glamour. The highly pigmented formula coats each and every lash with bold, smudge-proof colour, with vitamins and conditioning agents helping create natural fullness and healthier looking regrowth.

name: Lipstick 2.5克（各种色调）
product_description:
使用 KORRES树莓Twist Lipstick  为您的嘴唇增添浓烈的色彩；它是一款适合长期使用的旋转唇膏笔，可全面覆盖嘴唇而不会造成过度干燥。
富含覆盆子油，这款唇膏笔轻松而精确地涂上高光泽、华丽的色彩，同时深层补充养分、保湿和滋润干燥的嘴唇，使之柔软光滑。 提供抗氧化保护，使嘴唇保持柔软和舒适。

name: Collections A10 Small Fan Brush
product_description:
Add the finishing touches to your makeup look with the Spectrum Collections A10 Small Fan Brush; an ultra-soft makeup brush that combines a vibrant colour palette with expert hand-crafted design.
The ‘Feeling Fancy’ small fan brush is the ideal companion for applying highlighter like a professional. The super soft, synthetic bristles sweep a subtle veil of highlighter over the cheek bones, brow bones or anywhere that can be enhanced with a glow. The brush can be used to apply an array of powder products, or is perfect for brushing away excess product under the eyes after eyeshadow application.
The unicorn-inspired fan brush is an essential addition to any brush collection, making highlighter application a breeze.

colour: Light, Light/Medium, Lighter Than Light, Medium, Medium/Dark
name: timeBalm 抗皱遮瑕膏（各种色调）
product_description: theBalmtimeBalm 抗皱遮瑕膏，展示完美无瑕的肤色。 内含维生素A、C、E、大豆油、泛醇、亚油酸等成分。配方轻盈，可深度滋润保养肌肤，保护肌肤免遭环境侵害，使肌肤细腻、全方位遮盖黑眼圈和肌肤瑕疵。 配有海绵，特级质地，可轻松融入面部肌肤，展示光滑均匀的完美底妆。 E.N.

name: Vintage Cosmetics Company Smokey Eye Make-Up Brush Set
product_description:
The Vintage Cosmetics Company Smokey Eye Make-Up Brush Set combines a trio of eye brushes that allow you to create effortless, sultry, smokey eyes. Fitted with soft, synthetic bristles and rust-proof aluminium ferrules, each brush is labelled with its purpose, ensuring fool-proof, professional-looking results. Complete with wooden handles. Housed in vintage-inspired floral packaging.
Shadow Brush
A dome-shaped eyeshadow brush for applying base colours over the entire lid. Its soft bristles allow you to sweep colour across the eye with ease, creating the perfect canvas to build a smokey eye.
Angled Shadow Brush
An angled eyeshaodw brush perfect for building and layering colour onto the lids; it delivers product with ease and expertly blends and buffs to create a smokey eye. Its angled tip allows you to effortlessly add depth to your crease to create the illusion of bigger eyes. The bristles are soft and feel comfortable on application.
Smudger Brush
A short, densely-bristled brush, perfect for smudging and buffing deep shapes into the crease, or for blending smokey shades together for a seamless finish.

name: Stockholm Matte Lipstick 3.4克
product_description: 选用FACE Stockholm的哑光口红为嘴唇描绘动人色彩。 可提供多种色调，每种口红各提供无光泽的强烈饱和色彩。 凭借持久和不干燥配方，唇色光彩照人并持久不变。 完美的手袋对于充满活力的哑光翘唇至关重要。 – E.W.

colour: Agave, Cerise, Lotus, Magnolia, Narcissia, Poppy, Sweet Pea, Tulipe
name: 口红
product_description: Chantecaille口红 ，为双唇增添华丽色彩，使唇部色泽饱满。持久长效，上妆轻松，令唇部肌肤舒适滋润。 内含天然蜂蜡、润肤氨基酸和维生素A和C等成分，滋养型配方，使双唇如天鹅绒般柔软光滑水润。

name: Arden Pure Finish Mineral Tinted Moisturiser (50ml)
product_description:
Perfect the appearance of skin with Elizabeth Arden's Pure Finish Mineral Tinted Moisturiser SPF 15 PA++, a hydrating formula that delivers sheer, natural coverage to smoothen the look of your complexion.
Infused with a cocktail of vitamins and antioxidants to moisturise and protect, the cream glides effortlessly over skin, delivering a natural-looking tint that helps even out skin's appearance whilst locking in moisture and enhancing radiance. Its Micro-light Minerals (naturally-derived mineral pigments) diffuse light to create the illusion of smoother fine lines and wrinkles. Expect a transformed complexion with a fresh, luminous glow.
Please Note: Formulated with Squalane that is plant derived.

name: Stockholm眼线笔
product_description: 利用 FACE Stockholm的眼线笔为眼睛描画眼线和定型。 可提供多种色调，这款眼线膏为您喜欢的眼影提供补充。 高度着色眼线笔轻轻在肌肤和黑线上滑动而不用力拉动。 塑造各种风格的形象，无论是端庄娴静或是戏剧效果的眼睛。 – E.W.

colour: Blu Raven, Felis Brown, Flamenco, Golden Orbit, Velvet Plum
name: Longo Crème Gel Eyeliner (Various Shades)
product_description:
Add depth and definition to your eyes with the Vincent Longo Crème Gel Eyeliner, a richly pigmented liner that delivers long-wearing colour with a subtle pearl finish.
Expertly defining your eyes, the rich, waterproof eyeliner glides effortlessly onto the lid, allowing you to create thin or thick lines whilst doubling as a long-wearing eyeshadow with its creamy, easy-to-blend texture. Eyes look brighter and beautifully defined. Smudge and flake-proof.

name: Endless Silky Eye Pen - Velvet Violet
product_description: Expertly define your eyes with Pixi's Endless Silky Eye Pen; an award-winning, smudge-proof eyeliner that delivers high-pigmented colour with superior stayability. Enriched with antioxidant Vitamin E to nourish and protect the delicate eye area, the waterproof, silky formula glides on effortlessly to enhance your peepers in a single stroke.

name: Compulsive Cosmetics Skin Concealer (Various Shades)
product_description:
Achieve a flawless complexion with the Obsessive Compulsive Cosmetics Skin Concealer; a weightless, creamy formula that works to create a smooth, even make-up base.
Enriched with a nourishing blend of Aloe Leaf, Cocoa Extract and Vitamin E, the skin-perfecting concealer blends effortlessly to minimise the appearance of dark circles and imperfections, whilst delivering intense hydration to leave your complexion with a fresh, dewy and semi-matte finish.

name: Instain 持久腮红（各种色调）
product_description:
theBalmInstain 持久腮红  ，展示闪亮的完美妆容。配方轻盈、使面颊色彩自然清新。
本款腮红，持久长效，质地丝般柔滑，可完美融入肌肤，打造均匀完美的妆容。内置镜子，方便涂抹。 多种色调，供您挑选！使肌肤焕发光釆、健康亮泽。 E.N.

Revlon彩色哑光唇膏，是一款出色的哑光唇膏着色剂，令双唇舒适，为双唇增添色彩，带给您唇膏般的感受。
添加了牛油果油、芒果、椰子等成分。本款唇彩丰润、操作简单，可轻松地在嘴唇上进行涂抹。令双唇颜色鲜艳、柔软光滑、娇嫩欲滴。 本品可伸缩进退、无需削尖。

colour: 05 Nude Flush, 15 Electric Pink, 20 Coral Courage, 35 Rebel Red, 40 Berry Boost, 50 Nude Thrill
name: Color Sensational Vivid Matte Liquid Lipstick 8ml (Various Shades)
product_description:
Add showstopping colour to your pout with Maybelline Color Sensational Vivid Matte Liquid Lipstick, a high impact lip formula that delivers a vivid shock of colour with a sultry, matt finish.
Easy to apply with its precise wand applicator, the liquid lipstick glides smoothly across lips, imparting a rich hue; its creamy base combines with pure pigments to deliver intense colour pay off. Lips look luscious and irresistibly supple.

colour: Deep 1, Deep 2, Medium 1, Medium 2, White Light
name: Skin Base Lift Concealer 2.8g (Various Shades)
product_description:
Create a flawless makeup canvas with the Illamasqua Skin Base Lift Concealer, a creamy concealer that lifts and brightens the appearance of the under eye area.
Expertly correcting uneven skin tone and camouflaging pigmentation, the brightening concealer blends effortlessly into skin, delivering long-wearing coverage that conceals dark circles and other imperfections for a visibly lifted-looking under eye. Skin looks naturally flawless and radiant.
Housed in a mirrored compact.

colour: 05 A Wink of Pink, 15 Pink-a-Boo, 20 Taupe with Me, 25 Life's a Peach, 30 Pink Pizzaz
name: Baby Lips Moisturising Lip Gloss 16g (Various Shades)
product_description:
Saturate your lips in hydrating colour with Maybelline Baby Lips Moisturising Lip Gloss, a creamy lip gloss that delivers high shine colour with intense moisture.
Gliding effortlessly across lips with a wand applicator, the non-sticky lip gloss coats your pout in rich, glossy colour whilst a dose of Vitamin E smoothens and softens. Lips feel supple and enjoy four hour moisture.

name: Cover Stick Concealer (Various Shades)
product_description:
Discover high coverage with the PUPA Cover Stick Concealer; an ultra-easy concealer stick that covers imperfections and eliminates signs of fatigue.
Boasting a comfortable, creamy texture, the cover stick glides over blemishes and dark circles for a smooth, high coverage finish. The product blends onto the face seamlessly and creates natural-looking results that makes skin appear flawless.

name: & Berry 阿基米亚高Performance Mascara (Black)
product_description:
用Lord & Berry 阿基米亚高Performance MascaraCare 睫毛并延长睫毛。 这款 3 合 1 配方可以滋养、延长睫毛，令睫毛卷翘丰盈、扑闪扑闪长长翘翘。 它富含 D-泛醇、Bamboo提取物及维生素 E，有助于防止水分流失，同时令睫毛再生。  这款防水配方可引起深度色素沉着，能够快速干燥，而无结块或污迹。 这款柔软的睫毛膏会呵护睫毛，可以轻松均匀地涂用。
说明 ：使用内置棒将睫毛膏涂用于上下睫毛。 用眼妆卸妆液卸除该睫毛膏。

colour: #TBT, Fleek, Hey Bae, Queen, Squad, Werk It
name: London Longwear Matte Liquid Lipstick 6ml (Various Shades)
product_description: Add kissable colour to your pout with the Longwear Matte Liquid Lipstick from Lottie London. Featuring a wand applicator, the liquid lipstick glides on effortlessly to deliver high-pigmented, velvety colour with a comfortable matte finish and excellent stay-ability. Expect smooth, luscious lips around the clock.

name: Nature Eyeshadow Compact

The Contour Cosmetics Lip Contour Kit combines a creamy lip liner with a matte liquid lipstick for luscious lips in an instant.
Paired for the perfect shade combination, the lip liner ensures clean and precise definition, with the intensely pigmented lipstick gliding across the lip for true colour pay off and an on-trend matte finish. Presented in gorgeous packaging, the set is ideal for on-the-go glamour.

product_description:
The Contour Cosmetics Lip Contour Kit combines a creamy lip liner with a matte liquid lipstick for luscious lips in an instant.
Paired for the perfect shade combination, the lip liner ensures clean and precise definition, with the intensely pigmented lipstick gliding across the lip for true colour pay off and an on-trend matte finish. Presented in gorgeous packaging, the set is ideal for on-the-go glamour.

product_description:

Arriving in theBalm’s signature, playfully decorated packaging with an integrated mirror, the essential makeup product is ideal for taking on-the-go.
Effortlessly sweeping onto cheeks, the powdered blusher arrives in a warm-neutral tone, which is able to complement and enhance all skin tones. The blush boasts an ultra-smooth formula that blends seamlessly onto base makeup for a natural-looking, satin-matte finish. Expect long-lasting results.

product_description:

Eylure 自然系列假睫毛（浓密型）适合所有眼形，佩戴隐形眼镜的人群也可使用。 易于粘贴，安全卫生，Eylure 假睫毛可以提升双眼的自然美感，无需使用麻烦的睫毛膏！ 内附假睫毛胶和使用说明。

product_description:
Achieve a flawless base with the Lilah B. Virtuous Veil™ Concealer and Eye Primer. Luxuriously creamy and moisture-rich, the creamy concealer effortlessly blends into skin to minimise the appearance of blemishes and imperfections with long lasting, natural-looking coverage.
It can be used as an eyeshadow primer on lids to enhance the longevity of your eyeshadows, plus it evens out discolouration and dark circles. Formulated with Native Essence derived from Sea Fennel, the treatment enhances moisture levels and purifies skin, allowing its natural radiance to shine through whilst covering minor imperfections to leave you with a perfected and even complexion.

Adding length, separation and definition to your eyelashes, the green mascara features a curved brush that allows you to apply with control and precision, and its nourishing formula leaves lashes feeling soft and supple. Expect elongated lashes with a professional finish.

让您拥有所期待的完美唇部轮廓。

product_description:
Line and define your peepers with the Elizabeth Arden Beautiful Color Bold Defining Liquid Eyeliner, a waterproof liquid eyeliner that delivers high impact colour with 24 hour wear.
Perfect for achieving both subtle makeup looks or dramatic cat eyes, the eyeliner's micro-fine applicator tip allows you to apply thick or thin lines with ease and precision, and its buildable, quick-drying formula is smudge-proof and sweat-resistant to ensure long-lasting perfection.
The eyeliner glides effortlessly over the lash line, expertly defining your best features with a shock of true black colour.

Expertly define your eyes with the PUPA Vamp! Definition Liner Eye Liner with Felt-Tip Applicator; a liquid eyeliner that delivers professional results.
Created with a soft, felt-tip applicator, the eyeliner effortlessly glides across the lid and provides even, flawless and ultra-pigmented colour. The fast-drying liquid is able to create a fine lines that defines peepers, as well as producing expert flicks for the ultimate cat-eye.

使用方法： 涂在瑕疵上，并用指尖或毡尖使之化开。 可用在粉底下，达到持久的覆盖效果。

product_description: Line and define your pout with the Color Boost Lip Crayon from Bourjois. The chubby pencil adds vibrant, moisturising colour to your lips, whilst Silk Extract and SPF 15 smoothen and soften for ultra-comfortable wear. Lips are hydrated and protected with subtle shine.

Delivering a pearly sheen with smooth and natural finish, the vivid eyeshadows blend seamlessly without creasing or fading; they stay true to colour and allow you to professionally define your eyes and create customised makeup looks.

product_description: Choosing a perfect tool can make a world of differnece to your foundation's finishing. This RMK Foundation Brush is crafted carefully with best blend of natural hairs, calculated lengths volume texture and shaped top to bring the best results of our foundation in just one stroke. It delivers your foundation on the skin even at angles and on detailed areas for the perfectly smooth finished surface. Directions: After applying makeup base or moisturiser, take an appropriate amount of foundation with the foundation brush, and apply from the centre of your face and spread outwards evenly.

colour: Natural Brown, Soft Brown, Soft Coral

Add a healthy flush of colour to your complexion with RMK Face Pop Powder Cheeks, a blusher duo with soft, pearlescent finish.
Delivering subtle definition, the blushers are effortlessly blendable and lend your cheeks a lustrous sheen. Use the deeper shade for contouring, and the lighter shade for highlighting. Complete with application sponge.

name: Pro Made Easy Eye Set Rise - Medium
product_description:
Expertly define your eyes with the Pro Made Easy Eye Set from Illamasqua. Combining a volumising mascara, innovative brow colour and a versatile eyeshadow palette, you can achieve professional make-up looks.
Masquara Gain
An innovative mascara to volumise, lengthen and define lashes. Infused with a walnut-derived active that acts as a natural dye extract, the jet black formula tints lashes for ultimate impact and definition, allowing you to experience improved colour intensity after just two weeks. Lashes appear bigger, bolder and expertly enhanced.
Vital Eyeshadow Palette
Combining four complementing shades, you can define and highlight eyes with excellent colour longevity and seamless blendability. Melting effortlessly onto the lids for smooth and even application, the rich, velvety powder can be worn alone or together to deliver customised colour that won't crease, fade or smudge. Housed in a convenient mirrored compact. Can also be used on the body. Shades include: 'Bubbles' (warm peach), 'Trace' (grey brown), 'Envision' (warm brown) and 'Drop' (deep brown).
Brow Build in 'Rise'
Tint, tame and define brows. With built-in fibres, the formula glides on to deliver long-wearing colour, allowing you to create enviable arches and emphasise the shape of your brows without having to worry about smudging or fading. Its handy spoolie brush fills in sparse brows for a fuller, thicker appearance with natural hair-like colour.

product_description:
可用 Menaji Camo 笔式遮瑕膏（细）遮盖瑕疵。  这款油性遮瑕膏可遮盖皮肤斑点、不平、缺陷等。它富含SPF8 保护因子，可保护皮肤免受紫外线辐射。
本款产品专门配制，可控制男性皮肤的严重的油光现象。它不含香料、低致敏性，适合所有皮肤类型，最敏感的皮肤亦可使用。  使用说明：

product_description:

出色的配方、易于混合、质地温和。可轻松地在肌肤上滑动，使肤色光泽靓丽。 突出显示脸部高点，如：颧骨、额头骨等轮廓，展示专业妆容。 操作简单，转动即可。

product_description:
The Laura Geller Filter Corrector Color Perfecting Balm gets you insta-ready in no time, with advanced colour-correcting technology to virtually erase the look of all imperfections.
The trio of balms effortlessly glide across skin and seamlessly blend for even, natural looking coverage. Applied before makeup, the peach shade is perfect for the under eye area to neutralise dark circles and hide hyperpigmentation, while the light blue shade works to eliminate yellowness and impart a brighter tone. The green hue is ideal for concealing the appearance of redness, including acne and rosacea.
Used in conjunction, the trio visibly tackle all skincare woes to leave you with a unified and perfected complexion that will look flawless for any close-up. Housed in a convenient, layered compact for on-the-go.

附带耐用的尼龙背带。

Highlight your best features with Elizabeth Arden Beautiful Color Bold Illuminating Liquid Highlighter, a weightless, golden highlighter with comfortable liquid texture that delivers a translucent, radiant veil onto skin; perfect for highlighting high points on the face, such as cheekbones and brow bones.
Infused with light-reflecting mineral pearls that create a multi-dimensional effect on skin, the illuminating highlighter features a mesh touch delivery system that dispenses the perfect amount of product every time; on application, it blends seamlessly into any makeup (without disturbing what's been applied underneath) to create a beautifully luminous glow.

这款唇膏可让饱满的双唇全面着色，它可顺畅地控制每一条曲线，而其柔软的涂抹棒可供您准确无误地涂抹。 让您的双唇更加光滑，诱人亲吻，拥有如画般的完美。

Ardell101睫毛 ，可美化眼睛。 本款前卫的假睫毛重量轻，可重复使用。非常适合白天或晚上佩戴。使您的睫毛又长又浓密。 本款短假睫毛引人注目，佩戴后使眼睛清澈明亮、大而有魅力。 睫毛丝用一条黑带子勒在一起，确保安全。
天然毛发制作而成、操作简单。

product_description:
Treat your lips to the hydrating properties of RMS Lip Shine, a nourishing, non-sticky lip colour infused with organic oils and pure mineral pigments to lend lips a healthy sheen.
Infused with nutrient-rich Buriti Oil, the light, emollient formula visibly hydrates whilst imparting a sheer wash of colour and shine. It delivers antioxidant properties thanks to its natural fatty acids and Vitamins A and C, and can also be added to cheeks for a light blush with extra sheen.
Lips feel drenched and quenched.

涂抹 Menaji 控油粉（青铜色）会使您的皮肤平滑、消除多余的油脂。 富含维生素C和维生素E，其配方滋养舒缓肌肤、修复受损皮肤。 尤其适用于男性皮肤，可中和皮肤中的高油分。
为高清晰电视机前的人士打造，即使在最恶劣的环境下， 依然不会发现脸上的控油粉，您的肤色依然自然无油光。 使用说明：使用涂抹器沿额头扑粉，紧着着是鼻梁、脸颊、下巴，朝发际线方向涂抹。

name: Eyebrow Lipocils Ink - Chestnut
product_description:
Achieve perfect brows with the Talika Lipocils Ink; a comprehensive eyebrow treatment that immediately fills sparse gaps with natural looking colour while a 4-week regrowth formula helps improve density and fullness with continued use.
The easy-to-use felt pen ensures precise and accurate application with a long-lasting, anti-smudge colour concealer enhancing shape and definition.
Powered by plant extracts and regenerative peptides, the Growth Serum and Regenerating Care formula seeks to stimulate regrowth for improved thickness, while improving bulb cells to anchor existing hair follicles and combat hair loss. The addition of Coleus stimulates the synthesis of Melanin, resulting in naturally enhanced colour pigmentation.
Brows look instantly sleek and perfectly groomed; while with continued use they appear thicker, stronger and less scattered.

用这款细长眉刷可以将粉底涂抹于全眉，或沿睫毛线涂抹以达到精确利落的妆效。 -SA

product_description: HD Brows Volumising Mascara赋予双眼"假睫毛"般的逼真妆效。 本品不结块不剥落，使用双头睫毛棒涂抹，较短的软齿端用来在睫毛根部大量涂抹；较长的梳形端用来分散睫毛膏和给睫毛造型。 - K.R

来自PÜR Minerals的 "Secret Crush"Eyeshadow调色板由八种哑光、光滑和闪烁颜色组成。 拥有丝滑、轻盈质地，该眼影可混合和可叠加，每次使用可让您打造专业效果。 可轻松涂到眼睑上，通过整体涂用获得烟熏效果或突出轮廓，获得戏剧性或天然妆效。 与涂抹刷及镜子装在一款别致的盒子内，该眼影非常适合外出使用。 E.N. 
色调包括：  耳语，欲望，激情，冥想，痴情，崇拜，幽会，谣言。

name: Pressed Powder - N03
product_description: A setting powder that delivers the fine textured translucent layer  that fits for the flawless finish. By blending the 4 different textures  with the powder brush, they work to eliminate the shine on T-zone and  correct the tone for a natural bright complexion. Comes in a compact  with a sliding compartment to keep the brush in place.

name: Balmshelter Tinted Moisturiser Spf18 - Medium
product_description:
我们知道每天让肌肤保持完美无瑕有多么困难，但我们的这种愿望最终还是实现了！ theBalm BalmShelter Tinted Moisturiser SPF18 in Medium 不仅提供防晒功效，还会让您获得完美肌肤。 太棒了，不是吗？
theBalm BalmShelter Tinted Moisturiser SPF18 in Medium 是一种具备广谱防晒功效的超保湿配方，含有尿囊素、月桂酸己酯和......好吧，我们把这些科学的成分留给研究人员去探究吧？ 我们只谈这款保湿霜的惊人功效：可愈合和舒缓肌肤，有助于保持柔软的肌肤，可用作细胞增殖治疗产品！ 妙极了，您真的需要入手一款！

colour: Golden Honey, Natural Beige, Porcelain, Sublime Nude, Tender Rose, Warm Beige
name: Like A Doll Nude Skin Compact Powder (Various Shades)

Achieve flawless skin in a flash with the ‘Like A Doll’ Nude Skin Compact Powder from PUPA. Specially developed to create a barely-there, naked effect, the powder foundation combines spherical particles and mineral pigments to veil skin with an even and smooth coverage that effectively blurs the look of imperfections and discolouration without feeling heavy or mask-like.
The feather-light, silky-smooth formula blends seamlessly with your skin tone and can be built up for desired effect, while SPF 15 provides protection against sun damage. Use alone for a soft matt finish, dust over makeup as the finishing touch for long lasting results and stash the mirrored compact in your bag for on-the-go touch ups to combat shine.

Line and define your lips with Christian BRETON Lip Liner, a creamy lip pencil that can be worn alone or layered beneath lipstick to prolong wear.
Gliding effortlessly onto lips with precision and control, the soft pencil delivers a rich colour that defines, highlights and sculpts your lips. It also prevents feathering and bleeding when wearing lipstick to keep your makeup looking flawless for longer.

colour: Black Violet, Espresso, Gunmetal, Smokey Black
name: Arden Beautiful Colour 烟熏Eyes Powder眼线笔 (1.1g)
product_description: Elizabeth Arden Beautiful Colour 烟熏 Eyes Powder 眼线笔 (1.1g) Elizabeth Arden Beautiful Colour 烟熏Eyes Powder眼线笔是一款可打造柔软粉质妆效的持久乳状笔。 用眼影棒尖晕染颜色，打造"烟熏"妆。 Perfect 那些希望眼线不太引人注目的女士。

name: Geller Brow Gel Pencil
product_description:
Expertly frame your face with Laura Geller's Brow Gel Pencil; a dual-ended pencil that allows you to achieve well-groomed eyebrows with natural-looking colour.
Filling in gaps in thin, sparse brows, the buildable, long-wearing formula glides on effortlessly to define and shape, whilst the spoolie brush blends and grooms for enviable arches with superior stayability.

colour: Blush Medium, Golden Medium, Light, Light Tan, Porcelain, Tan
name: Bare It All 4-in-1 Skin Perfecting Foundation 45ml (Various Shades)
product_description:
Witness flawless skin with PÜR Bare It All 4-in-1 Skin Perfecting Foundation, a multi-tasking liquid foundation that delivers a demi-matt finish with high performance, 12 hour wear.
Perfect for the face and body, the long-wearing makeup blends seamlessly onto skin; it helps to conceal and blur imperfections whilst correcting problem areas over time, giving you the confidence to go makeup free. Utilising PÜR’s proprietary Energy Complex and Ceretin® Complex, the foundation will renew the look of your skin, lending it a smooth, flawless and perfected appearance.

name: 香缇卡水漾晶亮抗衰老亮肤光影液 23ml
product_description:
Chantecaille 香缇卡水漾晶亮光影液可突显您的特点，其抗衰老亮肤光影液可有效提亮肤色，为肌肤补充水分。
其轻盈配方中蕴含有微米级反光颗粒和牢固定型成分*，具备瞬间亮肤效果，遮盖明显的瑕疵，令肌肤看起来更加光滑紧致。
其质地如天鹅绒般柔软，能轻松与肌肤融合，让肌肤更有光泽，突显面部轮廓。 涂抹在粉底上层可提亮肤色，或结合其他化妆品/护肤品使用，以实现整体的亮肤效果。

colour: Anime, Anita, Black Dahlia, Black Metal Dahlia, Derelict, Grandma, Hollywood, Hoochie, Indrid, John Doe, Lydia, Memento, NSFW, Pagan, Queen, Rx, Stalker, Stud, Tarred, Traffic
name: Compulsive Cosmetics Lip Tar (Various Shades)
product_description:
Add luscious colour to your lips with the Obsessive Compulsive Cosmetics Lip Tar; an intense liquid lipstick that glides on effortlessly to deliver full coverage.
Enriched with Hemp Oil and Vitamin E, the high-pigmented formula conditions and hydrates, whilst a dose of refreshing Peppermint Oil leaves lips feeling revitalised. Its doe foot applicator hugs the lip contours for a picture-perfect pout.

name: Dollar Brows 60 Seconds to Contour Brows Kit
product_description:
Instantly achieve flawless brows with the 60 Seconds to Contour Brows Kit from brow experts, Billion Dollar Brows. Giving you the brows you’ve been craving, the kit boasts everything you need to lift and define your eyebrows; bringing out your inner glow. The Contour Brows Kit contains a dual ended highlighter and concealer pencil, blending brush and pencil sharpener, which combine to offer professional results.
Dual-Sided Highlighter and Concealer Pencil 2.83g
The dual sided pencil works as both a concealer and highlighter. The concealer can be used to define brows and cover any regrowth or imperfections, whilst the highlighter enhances the brow bone to visibly lift brows and offer added definition. Arriving in a universal hue, the highlighting pencil will complement any skin tone and deliver picture-perfect brows.
Smudge Brush
Working in synergy with the Highlighter and Concealer Pencil, the Smudge Brush effortlessly blends out the product to deliver a professional finish and a natural looking glow. The brush features a straight brush head, ideal for smudging cream based cosmetics.
Pencil Sharpener
Keep your pencils on point with the essential Pencil Sharpener. Comprising a dual hold design, the effective tool sharpens pencils to optimum precision, allowing for better results. The sharpener is complete with an integrated cleaning tool.

name: 专业蜜粉刷
product_description:
Japonesque 推出的这款专业蜜粉刷非常适合打造完美无暇的阳光肌肤。
采用超软的圆顶状刷毛，非常适合在两颊、肩颈和前胸抛光上色或涂抹蜜粉。

name: 矿物粉刷
product_description:
Japonesque 推出的这款矿物粉刷经过精心造型设计，让您轻松控制粉量。 轻松实现光滑无暇的完美妆效。
非常适合散粉和粉饼，用于抛光或晕染。

name: Colorburst Lacquer Balm 唇彩(各种色调)
product_description:
Revlon Colorburst Lacquer Balm 唇彩是一种高亮泽的唇彩，涂抹后令双唇舒适闪亮。
添加了牛油果油、芒果、椰子等成分。本款唇彩丰润、操作简单，可轻松地在嘴唇上进行涂抹。令双唇颜色鲜艳、柔软光滑、娇嫩欲滴。 本品可伸缩进退、无需削尖。

name: 基础化妆刷套装
product_description:
該套裝含4 把必備化妝刷。不論是粉底液、散粉、眼影還是眼線，底妝所需工具都裝在一個便攜袋中，更好地保護刷毛。 - LM 
 包含：

name: Gel Colour - Fluster 8g
product_description:
Achieve glowing perfection with the Illamasqua Gel Colour; a gel-based, sheer cheek tint that adds a pop of colour to your complexion.
With a smooth, high-pigmented formula, the blusher stick glides on effortlessly to deliver blendable, buildable colour with an even, streak-free finish. Expect a radiant, healthy sheen and excellent colour payoff. Can also be used as a lip stain.

name: Appetit Eyeshadow Palette
product_description:
Create barely there looks or smouldering smokey eyes with theBalm's Appetit, an eyeshadow palette filled with a selection of delectable, talc-free shadows in neutral and smokey shades.
Combining nine complementary eyeshadows with shimmer, matt and foil finishes, the versatile palette allows you to create a range of looks that add subtle depth or bold definition to the eyes. The shadows can be used both wet or dry; use dry for a more muted finish, and use wet for added shine and drama. The carefully selected hues are highly pigmented and effortlessly blendable. Complete with an integrated mirror.

name: Geller Filter Fix Baked Correcting Setting Powder Universal Apricot
product_description:
Achieve a flawless makeup base with Laura Geller Filter Fix Baked Correcting Setting Powder in Universal Apricot, a loose, baked setting powder that prolongs makeup wear whilst blurring the appearance of imperfections.
The universal shade contains skin-brightening Apricot Pigments that camouflage blemishes and unwanted marks, and ultra HD Perfecting Pigments to lend skin a smooth, photo-ready finish. Delivering a flawless veil that blends seamlessly onto skin, the lightweight powder will hydrate the complexion whilst regulating excess shine to keep makeup looking freshly applied for longer. The loose powder is dispensed via a netted pot delivery system.

name: Me Shine On Tinted Lip Salve Rose Blush
product_description: Boasting a nourishing, hydrating formula containing essential fatty acids and vitamins, in addition to anti-oxidants, this Shine On Tinted Lip Salve by Balance Me adorns the lips with a high shine, pigmented finish. K.D.

name: Definition Illuminator
product_description: The High Definition Illuminator instantly highlights and lifts dull complexions. The ultra-lightweight pressed powder contains light-diffusing, pearlescent pigments to deliver a soft shimmer, enhancing the look of contours and creating a sculpted appearance. Enriched with Vitamins C and E as well as nourishing Argan Oil, the super smooth formula glides onto skin and is easily blended for a natural, healthy-looking glow.

name: Definition Smudger Brush
product_description: Create expert results with the High Definition Smudger Brush; a must-have tool for distributing and blending eyeshadow or eyeliner. Featuring soft, natural bristles and a compact, rounded head, the multi-tasking brush picks up and deposits the perfect amount of product, allowing you to achieve a sultry, smokey eye make-up look.

name: B. Retractable Bronzer Brush #2
product_description: Achieve that effortless sun-kissed glow with the Lilah B. Retractable Bronzer Brush #2, a compact and chic brush that’s the perfect addition to any beauty buffs’ makeup collection. Simply twist the top to reveal the super soft bristles that allow you to blend powdered bronzer with precision and control for a flawless finish. Hypo-allergenic and super hygienic, the tool is ideal for on-the-go applications.

name: & Berry完美长效防水毡头眼线笔（黑柜）
product_description:
Lord & Berry 完美防水眼线笔 ，可重塑双眼。这款眼线笔100％防水，帮您自如精确地打造各种眼线，从细到粗均可。
采用新开发的"薄片生成器'，可提高耐用性。配方持长效，可轻松上妆，丝般柔滑。持续时长超过二十四小时，打造精致迷人的双眼。 快干轻盈配方、彻底防晕染、卸妆后无任何污点。 - K.N

name: London 12 Piece Eyeshadow Palette - The Smokes 12g
product_description:
Perfect for every mood, outfit or occasion, Lottie London's Eyeshadow Palette combines twelve shades in a range of shimmer and matte finishes.
With a super smooth texture that melts effortlessly onto the lids, each powder can be applied separately or blended together to create endless eye make-up looks with long-wearing results.
Housed in a chic palette with a dual-ended applicator, you can achieve show-stopping results on-the-go.

name: 资生堂丝质柔滑修饰乳（30ml）
product_description: Shiseido資生堂絲質柔滑修飾乳是一款用於彩妝之前的產品，令妝容更完美。不會導致粉刺，經皮膚學專家敏感程度測試， 細膩的妝前乳，減少不均勻膚色、粗大毛孔及幼紋的顯著度，整天賦予自然亮麗容。令粉底更貼服持久，締造全日長效水凝美肌。

name: Endless Silky Eye Pen - Cobolt Blue
product_description: Expertly define your eyes with Pixi's Endless Silky Eye Pen; an award-winning, smudge-proof eyeliner that delivers high-pigmented colour with superior stayability. Enriched with antioxidant Vitamin E to nourish and protect the delicate eye area, the waterproof, silky formula glides on effortlessly to enhance your peepers in a single stroke.

name: 微光矿物眼线笔
product_description:
用KORRES微光矿物眼线笔描画和定义您的迷人双眸。 这款眼线笔的配方蕴含滋养性蜂蜡和滋补性火山矿物质，质地柔软光滑，可以轻松滑动到您的眼睛，而微光的眼线为双眸增添了微妙、富有魅力的触感。
它的色彩强烈，可以描画出持久和防晕染的眼线，一整天都不会改变。 - L.M.

name: London All Eyes on You Eyeshadow Brush
product_description: 使用 Lottie London's All Eyes on You Eyeshadow Brush打造自然或性感眼妆，多效眼影刷子刷头紧密圆润。 刷子Perfect能够适量沾取化妆品，适合上底妆，或在褶皱处晕染。膏状和粉状粉底同样适用。 - K.N

name: Fluidsplash 3-in-1 Foundation - Urchin 04
product_description:
Achieve a smooth, flawless complexion with the ModelCo Fluidsplash 3-in-1 Foundation; an oil-free formula that combines the benefits of a concealer, foundation and eye base.
Infused with Aloe Vera and antioxidant Vitamin E, the ultra-hydrating liquid foundation blends seamlessly onto skin to minimise the appearance of blemishes and imperfections, whilst delivering long-lasting coverage for a dewy, radiant finish. Provides SPF15+ protection.

name: Face in a Box Starter Kit - Trust
product_description:
INIKA 的 Face in a Box Starter Kit in  'Trust' 包含实现无暇妆容所需的一切元素。 专为中等到深色肌肤设计，含一些列化妆要件，呈现自然光泽肤色，打造美丽妆容。
适用于中等肤色及深肤色。 
Loose Mineral Foundation - Trust (3g):
多用途的轻量级配方将遮瑕、打底和粉饼融为一体，配方成分为每次化妆做好完美打底。 天然防晒等级SPF25，不堵塞毛孔，呈现无暇光泽妆容。 适合粉刺、伤疤、酒糟鼻或色斑的遮瑕。
Liquid Foundation - Tan (10ml):
可靠的天然覆盖粉底融合了透明质酸，以滋润和提亮肌肤。 这款含抗氧化剂的彩妆融合了保湿霜的水润和底妆的遮盖力，能够轻松上色，无油脂残留，无缝遮盖瑕疵，同时含维生素、矿物质和阿甘树及玫瑰果等滋养油脂，为肌肤表皮提供营养。 不阻塞毛孔。
Mineral Bronzer - Sunloving (3.5g):
天然古铜色化妆品令肌肤散发美晒光彩，可以单独使用也可作为打底。 令面部轮廓更为立体，只需轻轻扫过面部或肩部。
Certified Organic Pure Primer (10ml):
这款底妆为底妆打好基础，改善妆容的持久度，同时保护肌肤。 含透明质酸，水润肌肤。
Certified Organic Perfection Concealer - Medium (4ml):
轻量级的完美遮瑕，遮住黑眼圈、面部瑕疵和色斑，打造无暇底妆。 将轻薄反光矿物质与乳木果油和芦荟结合在一起，补水配方能够轻易融合，打造光泽妆容，同时掩饰暗沉、浮肿双眼。
Mineral Mattifying Powder (0.7g):
半透明的散粉，适合在底妆前使用，来吸收多余油脂，或在底妆后使用，令妆容更加自然清爽。 融合丝滑轻薄矿物质，令肌肤感受舒缓轻薄。 天然防晒SPF15，实现完美肤色和保护。 不阻塞毛孔。 即使是最敏感的肌肤也非常适合。
Mineral Blush - Rosy Glow (0.7g):
丝滑柔软的矿物质腮红，高度浓缩配方，蓬松上妆器。 令脸颊呈现暖色，柔软配方实现健康光彩，敏感肌肤适用。 不含滑石粉、苯甲酸酯类和其他填充剂。
Vegan Kabuki Brush:
这款化妆刷由可持续木材和不经动物实验的合成刷毛制成，易上妆。 备受赞誉的 Kabuki 化妆刷是很多人梦寐以求的。其厚重浓密的刷头可实现全面无缝遮盖，令肌肤完美无瑕。 令肌肤倍感柔软。 100% 适用于绝对素食者，其经认证无伤害性。
使用資生堂超補水濕粉粉盒為您精緻的底妝補妝。獨特的設計使用於資生堂超補水濕粉以及海棉。
Japonesque减折晕染刷，是一款创新型化妆毛刷，可重塑眼睛，帮您打造轻松流畅的眼部折线。 刷毛密集、锥形尖端、天然纤维制成；刷边缘可用于分配颜色，以增加颜色深度和亮度；刷平面可精准晕染，每次使用，都帮您展现专业妆容。

name: Lip and Cheek Set - Pretty in Pink
product_description:
Enhance your natural beauty with the INIKA Lip and Cheek Set - Pretty in Pink; a four-piece makeup set arriving alongside a convenient cosmetic bag. The all-natural collection boasts an effective primer, mineral blusher, nude lipstick and a lip brush for expert application.
Certified Organic Pure Primer with Hyaluronic Acid (4ml)
Achieve long-lasting foundation coverage with the Certified Organic Pure Primer with Hyaluronic Acid; a hydrating formula that prepares skin for makeup application. Enriched with a generous dose of Hyaluronic Acid, the priming formula delivers a veil of moisture to the complexion, which visibly plumps skin and helps to reduce the appearance of any fine lines or wrinkles. A smooth and hydrated face is the perfect base for ensuring makeup has a lasting, professional- looking finish.
Mineral Blusher Puff Pot - Pink Petal (3g)
Enhance the complexion with a rosy glow from the Mineral Blusher Puff Pot; a loose powder formula that delivers pure performance. Ideal for sensitive skin types due to its gentle formula, the blusher provides a sweep of warming colour to the cheeks.
Certified Organic Vegan Lipstick - Nude Pink (4.2g)
Add a pop of colour to the lips with the Nude Pink Certified Organic Vegan Lipstick; a creamy, pink hue. Enriched with a skin-loving blend of Shea Butter and Jojoba oil, the formula not only delivers enviable colour, but nourishes, hydrates and protects lips. The Nude Pink hue delivers a long lasting hue with an intense colour pay off.
Vegan Lip Brush
Apply lip colour with precision with the Vegan Lip Brush. Boasting a small yet firm brush head, the applicator applies lipstick, tints or lip gloss evenly and accurately each time, delivering a professional finish. The brush is perfect for taking on-the-go, arriving with a lid, the brush can stay protected whilst inside your handbag.

name: Camo 笔式遮瑕膏 （ 青铜色）（7克）
product_description:
Menaji Camo 笔式遮瑕膏（青铜色）可遮盖肌肤瑕疵。 这款油性遮瑕膏可遮盖肌肤斑点、不平、缺陷等。富含SPF8，可保护肌肤免受紫外线辐射。
本款产品专门配制，可控制男性皮肤的高油脂含量。未添加香料、低致敏性。适合所有皮肤类型，即使是最敏感的皮肤也可以使用。 

使用说明：

name: Endless Silky Eye Pen - Matte Mulberry
product_description:
Line and define your peepers with the Pixi Endless Silky Eye Pen in Matte Mulberry. Gliding onto the eye like silk, the liner creates a flawless line in a single sweep.
The eye pencil boasts an ultra-longwearing, waterproof formula that guarantees to stay in place all day and all night; without the need for a touch-up. Gentle yet effective, the eyeliner delivers an intense colour pay off. Matte Mulberry offers a matte brown plum hue.

name: 娜迪奥 Extreme Volume Smudge Proof 睫毛膏 - 黑色 (10ml)
product_description:
娜迪奧黑色Extreme Volume Smudge Proof 睫毛膏讓您擁有稠密濃黑的捲翹睫毛。這款必備睫毛膏採用絲般柔滑、防暈染、防水配方，確保睫毛根根分明，效果持久，彰顯眼睛和睫毛之美。 
使用說明：

name: 纯粹毒液（浆果）
product_description:
纯粹浆果毒液，是DuWop系列中的一种纯粹红色毒液，使双唇散发出淡淡的光泽、色彩持久保持。 本品会使双唇饱满丰盈，完美魅惑，同时可舒缓调理唇部，令人舒适、色彩持久保持。
本品包装罐环保可回收，是您化妆袋之外的一个可爱的存放之地。 漂亮的色调也将引领当季之潮流。
使用说明：

name: 2×3.8g
product_description:
DuWop时光倒流两件套，内含两件高知名度产品：逆向唇线笔及逆向眼线笔，打造极致活力二件套。 完美套件，用以解决一些化妆界的最大的问题：
限量版时光倒流套件包括：全尺寸版DuWop逆向唇线笔及逆向眼线笔。
逆向唇线笔和逆向眼线笔均为无色哑光笔，用以改善嘴唇周围和眼睛周围的细纹，使之饱满充盈，从而提高肌肤质地、改善肌肤外观。 内含的神奇成分：长寿菇™，是一种"脂肪提升"产品， 即修复有细纹出现的肌肤。 其成分包括：纯坚果油和维生素E等，用以软化滋润肌肤。

name: Safari Chic 豹纹化妆刷套装
product_description:
使用 Japonesque Safari Chic 豹纹化妆刷套装，探索野性的一面。
这款完美的化妆刷3件套包含3把带有丰盈刷毛的化妆刷，精工打造，带给您完美无暇的上妆效果，刷毛融合了野生动物图案的别致设计；附带一个微纤维品牌化妆包，非常易于携带。

name: Sourcils Styler Brow Mascara - 00
product_description:
Achieve full brows with help from the Lancôme Sourcils Styler Brow Mascara; an innovative brow product co-created with renowned celebrity makeup artist, Lisa Eldridge.
Arriving with an innovative, hairbrush-inspired applicator, the brow mascara effortlessly sweeps through eyebrows. Begin by pushing the brush against the hairs to coat them in product and achieve a thick and full effect, then smooth in the direction of hair growth to create enviable definition.
The smudge-resistant gel formula dries quickly, holding brows flawlessly in place for up to 14 hours without the need for a touch up.

name: Longo Dew Drop Radiant Blush 5g - Sandalwood
product_description:
Add a flush of colour to your complexion with the Vincent Longo Dew Drop Radiant Blush; a long-wearing, compact powder infused with a subtle pearl shimmer to reflect light.
Developed with a unique powder-pressing technique, the buildable blusher blends seamlessly onto skin to add dimension and enhance natural radiance for a bright, lit-from-within make-up look. Infused with antioxidant Vitamin E to nourish and protect, you can expect a smooth, demi-matte finish with a delicate glimmer.

name: Longo Dew Drop Radiant Blush 5g - Temple Peach
product_description:
Add a flush of colour to your complexion with the Vincent Longo Dew Drop Radiant Blush; a long-wearing, compact powder infused with a subtle pearl shimmer to reflect light.
Developed with a unique powder-pressing technique, the buildable blusher blends seamlessly onto skin to add dimension and enhance natural radiance for a bright, lit-from-within make-up look. Infused with antioxidant Vitamin E to nourish and protect, you can expect a smooth, demi-matte finish with a delicate glimmer.

name: Teint Miracle Cushion Foundation Refill - 035
product_description:
Lancôme's Teint Miracle Cushion Foundation Refill 035 has been designed to fit your empty Lancôme Teint Miracle Cushion Foundation compact.
Delivering buildable coverage with a fresh, dewy finish, the foundation blends effortlessly onto skin to camouflage imperfections and promote a more even, radiant skin tone. The cushion delivery system ensures mess-free, easy application; simply touch to activate, then apply to skin with a patting motion to create a naturally flawless effect. The foundation is equipped with a Fresh Touch Puff, an advanced applicator that enables maximum control when picking up product, and feels cooling on contact with skin. 
Portable and refillable, its the perfect every day makeup.

name: 组合眼线笔 - Wide Awake 系列 (2.21g)
product_description:
Pixi 組合眼線筆- Wide Awake 系列(2.21g) 可輕鬆為您打造光彩靚麗的眼部妝容。這款眼線筆採用雙頭設計，具有防水功能，一頭是啞光裸色筆頭，用來為皮膚上色，另一頭是高光膏狀筆頭，用來提高皮膚亮度，該產品可快速改善眼部妝容，同時產品的組合配方具有舒緩鎮定、提亮光澤和增加活力的功效，讓您的雙眸始終明亮動人，光彩熠熠。 - LM 
 使用說明：

使用Sigma高粗睫毛膏套装打理和拉伸您的睫毛 ，该款睫毛膏防水、定型效果长达13小时。
该款睫毛膏配备坚实、笔直的睫毛棒来拉伸和延长您的睫毛，最大限度地提升您的睫毛外观，提高睫毛主体部分定型效果，创造出期待的效果。 强化的黑色配方可轻松涂满睫毛根部到尖部，向上卷曲、拉伸您的睫毛，定型效果良好，不会留下墨染痕迹，亦不会产生睫毛结块现象。 睫毛长而翘，令人羡慕。

name: Sandler Blending Brush
product_description:
Daniel Sandler Blending Brush 沿眼皮平滑混合，打造柔和烟熏妆容，适合眉骨高光。 由极细天然毛发精制而成，可以随心所欲打造轮廓和眼影。
使用这款 Daniel Sandler Blending Brush，轻松描出眼影。 手包大小的化妆刷确保无缝融合，打造专业妆容。

name: Herzog Egyptian Earth Face Powder - Hator (Dark) (10ml)
product_description:
Give your skin a warm glow with Karin Herzog Egyptian Earth in the shade "Hator". The makeup was used in Ancient Egypt as a protection against the harsh rays of the sun, producing a very natural, clear and velvety complexion whilst still allowing the skin to breathe. The dark powder provides an optimised alternative to all types of foundation providing natural coverage and blending seamlessly for a translucent, satin finish.
The product contains Mica (shining stone), which deflects light giving skin a look of brightness and radiance. The Egyptian Earth Powder works to control oil production for long-lasting results, even inclement weather and exercise do not affect the staying power of this makeup which lasts throughout the day without running into the creases of the skin.

name: Blush Up Brush
product_description: Illamasqua 的 Blush Up Brush 将耐久性和高性能相结合，可轻松涂抹腮红。 以优质人造刷头制造并带有独特的扁平刷头，这款化妆刷可贴和您面部轮廓，是涂抹化妆品和勾勒轮廓的佳品，使您能够实现专业级的塑形、造型妆效。 易于清洁。

name: 活力四射眼影盘
product_description:
借助这款 Illamasqua 的活力四射眼影盘打造无尽完美的妆容。 利用这四色的眼影，您可以勾勒和突出眼部线条，定妆持久，过渡无缝自然。
这款羽量轻的眼影既可单独使用，也可多色调和使用，它能与眼睑完美融合，令妆色更加顺滑均匀。不会油腻、褪色或晕染。 内置与带有镜子的精致眼影盒中。 还可用于身体的肌肤。
‘斑斓气泡（Bubbles）’：水蜜桃粉
‘Trace’：灰咖色。
 
 
 ‘无限遐想（Envision）’  ：柔和棕。
 ‘水滴（Drop）’  ：深棕。

name: Gold BB Pumping Cushion
product_description:
Apply your favourite BB cream whilst on-the-go with the Gold BB Pumping Cushion from Korean brand Skin79. Effortless to apply, the pumping cushion expresses Skin79’s triple action Gold BB formula, which works to visibly firm the skin and produce a matte finish. The compact arrives with a handy cushion puff, which aids the application.
Enriched with a cocktail of 24K gold, Caviar Extract and Argan oil, the lightweight formula gently moisturises the skin, whilst delivering multiple anti-ageing and sun protection benefits. Expect naturally flawless skin that is youthful and healthy looking.

name: 迷人矿物质眼影盘 （紫色水晶光环）
product_description:
PIXI 迷人矿物质眼影盘 ，令妆容持久生效。 内含6色眼影作为补充色调，用以重塑突显美丽的双眼，展示自然清新的妆容，妆效持久，与肌肤完美融合。
内含反射光的矿物质和营养维他命E等成分，用以护眼部周围娇嫩肌肤；配方柔滑，粉末状，可轻松与眼睑融合，打造宝石风格的色调，不会起皱或褪色。 配有双端海绵尖涂抹装置。 E.N.

name: Eye Basic Brush
product_description:
Combining high performance and durability, the Chantecaille Eye Basic Brush works best for all-over, even application of eye colour on the lids.
Crafted from non-endangered wood with a pale ivory coating, the handle offers superior control, whilst the soft pony hair bristles and firm, tapered tip deliver seamless, smooth colour for a professional finish. Can also be used to sweep highlighter under the brows, or to shade the sides of the nose for a contoured make-up look.

name: Cosmetics Treasure Chest Eyeshadow Palette
product_description:
Achieve endless eye make-up looks with the Treasure Chest Eyeshadow Palette from Mellow Cosmetics. Combining twelve shades in a range of matte and shimmering finishes, the palette is perfect for creating daytime or evening looks.
Blending seamlessly onto lids for smooth, flawless application, each high-pigmented, buildable powder delivers long-wearing, crease-resistant colour with superior staying power. Can be worn alone or mixed together for customised results.

name: Glow Skin Perfecting Beauty Balm
product_description:
ModelCo have collaborated with American model, Hailey Baldwin, to create the Glow Skin Perfecting Beauty Balm, a multi-tasking, skin-refining formula that promises to perfect your complexion.
Lightweight and oil free, the silky, blendable balm creates a luxurious veil over skin; it delivers an instant boost of hydration, whilst enhancing natural radiance to create a lit-from-within look. Can be worn alone or used as a primer to minimise the appearance of fine lines and pores for smooth, flawless make-up application. Combats signs of fatigue to leave your complexion fresh and dewy with restored luminosity.

name: Me Shine On Tinted Lip Salve Ruby Red
product_description: Boasting a nourishing, hydrating formula containing essential fatty acids and vitamins, in addition to anti-oxidants, this Shine On Tinted Lip Salve by Balance Me adorns the lips with a high shine, pigmented finish. K.D.

name: Strobe and Bronze Palette - Glow and Bronze
product_description:
Achieve a professional makeup finish with Pixi's Strobe and Bronze Palette, a mix of bronzer and highlighting shades to add warmth and radiance to your complexion.
Designed in collaboration with beauty blogger, Maryam Maquillage, the face kit combines three bronzing shades with three highlighters, allowing you to add all-over warmth to your face, define natural hollows and enhance luminosity. Blending seamlessly onto skin, the sunkissed bronzers are perfect for sculpting your cheeks, forehead and nose, or for sweeping across the whole face, and the highlighters are best applied to high points on the face (areas that naturally catch the light) such as cheekbones, corner of the eyes and down the centre of the nose.
The sheer, buildable powders are fade-resistant to leave you with flawless, long-lasting makeup.

name: Brightening Eye Powder Kajal - Nude
product_description:
Perk up tired peepers with the Chantecaille Brightening Eye Powder Kajal; an advanced eye liner pencil works to instantly alleviate signs of fatigue and dullness.
Enriched with Aloe Vera, the creamy, nude-toned formula glides across the waterline to brighten the whites of the eye and minimise the look of redness. Boasting long-lasting and comfortable wear, it leaves eyes looking refreshed and wide awake.

name: Matte Chic Liquid Lipstick - Jerry
product_description: The Matte Chic Liquid Lipstick from Chantecaille delivers intense, long-lasting colour with a virtually weightless feel. Infused with advanced peptides, the moisturising formula works to stimulate natural collagen production and blur imperfections for a visible plumping effect. The precise doe-foot applicator allows the colour to effortlessly glide on without bleeding or feathering, and it quickly sets for a bold, matte finish that doesn’t fade or transfer.

name: Beach GelTint and Fresh SilkGloss
product_description:
Add a pop of colour to your pout with the Pixi GelTint and SilkGloss in 'Beach' and 'Fresh', a dual-ended lip colour with lip tint to one end, and luscious lip gloss to the other.
Infused with Aloe Vera, Jojoba and Shea Butter, the nourishing lip colour glides effortlessly on, delivering a wash of hydration with a long-lasting, stained effect finish. Lips feel comfortable and nourished with a healthy slick of colour.

name: Feline Kit Liquid Eye Liner & Applicator Tool
product_description:
ModelCo have collaborated with American model, Hailey Baldwin, to create the Feline Kit Liquid Eye Liner & Applicator Tool.
Featuring a precision 3D tip, the intense black eyeliner glides effortlessly onto lids to deliver long-wearing, smudge-proof colour for a professional make-up look.
