Serving as a guide and 'steady hand', the three-sided tool allows you to line and define your eyes, and acts as a mess-free shield when creating a variety of angles and shapes. Can also be used for lip, brow, mascara and eyeshadow products.

name: Berry GelTint and Sweet SilkGloss
product_description:
Add a pop of colour to your pout with the Pixi GelTint and SilkGloss in 'Berry' and 'Sweet', a dual-ended lip colour with lip tint to one end, and luscious lip gloss to the other.
Infused with Aloe Vera, Jojoba and Shea Butter, the nourishing lip colour glides effortlessly on, delivering a wash of hydration with a long-lasting, stained effect finish. Lips feel comfortable and nourished with a healthy slick of colour.

name: Bronzing Duo - Glint/Solar 2 x 4g
product_description:
Emanate sultry glamour with the Illamasqua Bronzing Duo in Glint/Solar; a chic mirrored compact combining two sun-kissed shades to bronze, contour and highlight.
Easily blended and universally flattering, the pressed powders contain crushed pearl essence for a subtle shimmer and smooth, even finish. Ideally balanced to add light and shaded definition all over the face, the duo leave skin looking radiant and glowing.

name: Complement Palette 6.5g
product_description:
Expertly define your eyes with the Complement Palette from Illamasqua. Combining four eyeshadow shades in shimmer, metallic and matte finishes, you can create endless eye make-up looks with superior colour pay-off and seamless blendability.
Melting effortlessly onto the lids for smooth, even application, the high-pigmented, long-wearing powders deliver crease-resistant colour that suits all skin tones. Housed in a mirrored compact, you can create sultry, smokey eyes on-the-go.
'Focus' - cool brown metallic
'Slink' - soft champagne shimmer
'Forgiveness' - rich chocolate plum
'Queen of the Night' - blackened plum

name: Sandler Green Velvet Waterproof Eyeliner
product_description:
准备好使用 Daniel Sandler Green Velvet Waterproof Eyeliner 打造绝佳的眼妆吧。 这款眼线笔拥有突破性配方，令妆容整天保持完美，优秀的覆盖力让您远离晕妆烦恼。
Daniel Sandler Green Velvet Waterproof Eyeliner 硅酮含量高，易于上妆。 Green Velvet 防水表现出色，持久而柔软，颜色馥郁，遮盖力超强，不晕妆。

name: Vegas Nay —— 逸美假睫毛
product_description: Eylure 最新Vegas Nay 逸美假睫毛，富有质感，使睫毛纤细浓密，妆容精致美丽。 适用于所有眼睛形状，可重复使用，配有睫毛胶水及说明书，方便使用。 配方轻盈、持久长效。

name: Translucent Face Powder SPF10 N00 (8.5g)
product_description: Designed to give your complexion a perfected semi-matte finish, this Translucent Face Powder SPF10 by RMK boasts an innovative micro bead formula which works to blend easily over the skin. Concealing open pores and dull tones, it'll give your complexion a healthy radiant glow. K.D.

name: Collections A12 Fluffy Pencil Brush
product_description:
Add the finer details to your eye makeup looks with the Spectrum Collections A12 Fluffy Pencil Brush; an ultra-soft makeup brush that combines a vibrant colour palette with expert hand-crafted design.
The small ‘Draw Me Pretty’ brush is the ideal size for more intricate finishing touches, including highlighting the inner corner of the eye, adding colour to the crease and smoking out liners. An essential addition to any brush collection, the synthetic pencil brush offers professional-looking results.

name: Vintage Cosmetics Company Connie False Strip Lashes
product_description:
Subtly enhance your makeup look with The Vintage Cosmetics Company Connie False Strip Lashes, a pair of reusable false eyelashes that lend your eyes a soft and naturally fuller appearance.
Lightweight and comfortable to wear, the crossed knot lashes add natural-looking fullness and volume to your peepers; their soft black colour makes them ideal for those with lighter hair colours, or those who desire a less dramatic finish. The synthetic strip lashes are easy to apply and reusable.

name: LONDON Plush Rush Lipstick - Rebellious
product_description:
Treat your lips to the moisturising and plumping properties of butter LONDON Plush Rush Lipstick, a long-wearing, creamy lipstick that delivers a shock of colour whilst dousing lips in essential moisture.
Accentuating the natural curves of your pout, the luscious formula is enriched with a Phyto-Endorphin Complex to boost your mood, and a Plumping Complex to help increase the appearance of fullness; lips look smoother, firmer and more defined. Standing the test of time, the lipstick withstands feathering and bleeding, so your pout looks irresistably kissable, for longer.

name: iredale GreatShape Eyebrow Kit - Blonde
product_description:
Refine your brows with the GreatShape Eyebrow Kit from jane iredale. Designed to create defined brows with a natural looking finish, the eyebrow kit is host to a pigmented brow powder and nourishing wax, alongside a handy dual-ended applicator. Stowed inside a rose-gold mirrored compact, the brow kit contains everything you need for flawless brows.
Mineral-rich, the powder glides onto brows to add colour and depth, filling in any sparse areas and delivering a long-lasting, water resistant finish.
The brow wax is created with a botanical formula that nourishes and protects each strand. Without leaving behind a sticky residue, the wax can be used to hold brows in place, resulting in an enviable shape.

name: Dream Sun Bricks Bronzer Powder Blondes Palette
product_description: Maybelline presents the Sun Bricks Bronzer Powder Blondes Palette, an all-in-one must have beauty product for any makeup buff. The chic palette features a natural matte bronzer as well as lighter, shimmery ‘bricks’ that are perfect for highlighting. Dust all over for a subtle sunkissed glow or apply the darker shade with precision as a contour for enhanced depth and structure.

name: Sourcils Styler Brow Mascara - 03
product_description:
Achieve full brows with help from the Lancôme Sourcils Styler Brow Mascara; an innovative brow product co-created with renowned celebrity makeup artist, Lisa Eldridge.
Arriving with an innovative, hairbrush-inspired applicator, the brow mascara effortlessly sweeps through eyebrows. Begin by pushing the brush against the hairs to coat them in product and achieve a thick and full effect, then smooth in the direction of hair growth to create enviable definition.
The smudge-resistant gel formula dries quickly, holding brows flawlessly in place for up to 14 hours without the need for a touch up.

name: LONDON Plush Rush Lipstick - Free
product_description:
Treat your lips to the moisturising and plumping properties of butter LONDON Plush Rush Lipstick, a long-wearing, creamy lipstick that delivers a shock of colour whilst dousing lips in essential moisture.
Accentuating the natural curves of your pout, the luscious formula is enriched with a Phyto-Endorphin Complex to boost your mood, and a Plumping Complex to help increase the appearance of fullness; lips look smoother, firmer and more defined. Standing the test of time, the lipstick withstands feathering and bleeding, so your pout looks irresistably kissable, for longer.

name: Sandler 丹尼尔桑德勒眼影刷 2 把
product_description:
用最好的刷子，打造完美眼妝。這款眼影刷特別適合修飾眼皮及眉骨下方，完成最後的潤色。 
先用眼影刷1，再用眼影刷2。眼影刷2（採用100% 天然毛髮製成）為更濃密的彩妝刷，能更好地在眼線周圍運用深色色調，並且能更好地貼合皮膚。

name: Vintage Cosmetics Company 3 Piece Tweezer Set
product_description:
Shape, groom and preen your eyebrows with The Vintage Cosmetics Company 3 Piece Tweezer Set, a trio of high quality stainless steel tweezers with a vintage-inspired, floral design.
Offering three types of tips, the tweezers expertly remove stray hairs with ultimate precision. The must-have beauty set for cleaning up or completely reshaping your brows. Complete with a matching floral travel pouch for safe storage.
Slanted Tweezers
Ideal for general brow tidying and reshaping. Use the slanted tip to remove hairs and create your desired shape.
Pointed Tweezers
Perfect for removing ingrown hairs and splinters. Great for fine hair removal.
Precision Pointed Tweezers
Equipped with both a slanted and pointed tip for expert results. Use the slanted tip to shape and define, and the point to precisely remove extra fine hairs.

name: LONDON Plush Rush Lipstick - Elated
product_description:
Treat your lips to the moisturising and plumping properties of butter LONDON Plush Rush Lipstick, a long-wearing, creamy lipstick that delivers a shock of colour whilst dousing lips in essential moisture.
Accentuating the natural curves of your pout, the luscious formula is enriched with a Phyto-Endorphin Complex to boost your mood, and a Plumping Complex to help increase the appearance of fullness; lips look smoother, firmer and more defined. Standing the test of time, the lipstick withstands feathering and bleeding, so your pout looks irresistably kissable, for longer.

name: Brow Sharpener
product_description: Keep your brows on point with Eylure's Brow Sharpener. The dual chamber pencil sharpener is perfect for sharpening eyebrow pencils; keeping your brow pencil sharp enables better control and natural-looking, feather-like strokes.

name: Vintage Cosmetics Company Blending Set Infused with Vitamin E
product_description:
Achieve a flawless complexion with The Vintage Cosmetics Company Blending Set Infused with Vitamin E, a set of latex-free makeup sponges that expertly apply and blend a range of makeup products onto your skin with an airbrushed finish. 
Infused with Vitamin E for a moisturising boost, each specially shaped blender allows you to apply foundation and concealer to large areas of the face, whilst targeting smaller, hard-to-reach areas such as around the eyes and nose. Versatile and easy to use, they will also blend your favourite highlighters and blushers, and serve as a great tool for contouring. Soaking the sponges in water prior to use will ensure makeup doesn't absorb into them (which means no wastage!).

name: Eye Shadow - Ritual
product_description:
Transform peepers with the Illamasqua Eyeshadow in ‘Ritual’; a highly pigmented, intense formula that delivers outstanding colour pay off and long lasting wear.
Part of the May Queen collection to celebrate the folklore festivities of May Day, the 'Ritual' shade embraces the essence of spring-time renewal with a fresh, iridescent pink hue and glistening glitter pigments for an iridescent metallic finish.
Wear alone across the lid in a simple wash of colour, layer up for a bolder impact or apply with a damp brush for a solid slick of colour to reinvigorate your look. Housed in the sleek signature compact.

name: Vintage Cosmetics Company Pedicure Purse - Pink/Floral Satin
product_description:
The Vintage Cosmetics Company Pedicure Purse houses an array of must-have beauty tools for achieving the perfect pedicure, wherever you are. Made from high quality stainless steel with a pink and vintage floral design. Housed in a pink satin purse.
Toenail Clippers - Perfect for clipping and trimming long or broken nails.
Nail Scissors - For snipping and trimming your toenails.
Cuticle Pusher - A dual-ended tool with large paddle for gently pushing back cuticles, and a smaller paddle for cleaning around and under nails.
Cuticle Tool - A must-have for trimming hangnails and keeping cuticles preened.
Toe Separators - A handy toe separator to keep good distance between toes when painting to avoid smudges and transferring.
Orange Sticks - Can be used to shape the base of the nail, clean underneath or swipe away any nail varnish mistakes.

name: Exaggerate No.146 Eyelashes
product_description: Add intensity to your lashes with Eylure's Exaggerate No.146 Eyelashes. Soft, lightweight and reusable, the handmade false lashes are perfect for any occasion; their full and feathery design adds sophisticated definition, whilst their unique curve allows them to hug the eye contour for effortless application and comfortable wear.

name: Color Lip Gloss - 02 Sparkle Rose
product_description:
Drench your lips in a lustrous sheen with the RMK Color Lip Gloss in 'Sparkle Rose'.
Combining the vibrant colour of a lipstick with the clarity of a lip Gloss, the colour glides effortlessly over lips with its square-shaped applicator, and delivers a veil of sheer yet brilliant colour. Its host of moisturising ingredients, including Shea Butter, Rosehip Oil keep lips feeling hydrated and comfortable.

name: Cosmetics Lip & Cheek Jam 6ml
product_description:
Add a flush of colour to your complexion with the Trifle Cosmetics Lip & Cheek Jam; a dual-purpose, 99% natural formula that imparts a healthy, buildable wash of colour.
The water-based lip and cheek stain creates a bright, radiant make-up look whilst defining and adding vibrant colour to your lips. Expect smooth, streak-free colour that lasts up to ten hours without over-drying.

name: Make Your Pout Lip Set
product_description:
Create endless make-up looks with Sigma's Make Your Pout Lip Set; a four-piece collection that combines cool pink, vivid orange and deep brick red hues with a range of matte, cream and high-shine finishes.
Power Stick in 'Bloody Good'
A long-wearing formula housed in a magnetic, twist-up tube. With a soft, creamy texture, the lipstick glides onto lips to deliver high pigmented, full coverage colour, whilst its slanted tip allows mistake-free application for a super smooth finish.
Power Crayon in 'Sigma Pink'
A high pigmented formula that glides on effortlessly to line and define lips with the brand's signature pink hue. With a twist-up design, the pencil delivers long-wearing, luscious colour without over-drying, leaving lips soft, hydrated and silky smooth.
Lip Eclipse in 'She Knows the Ropes'
Add sumptuous colour to your pout. With a high pigmented formula and cushioned tip applicator, the opaque liquid lipstick glides on effortlessly to deliver a juicy watermelon hue with a long-lasting, smooth finish.
Power Liner in 'Make Your Mark'
With a twist-up design, the long-wearing pencil can be used alone for an all-over matte look, or applied with your favourite lip colour for a more intense finish. Applies effortlessly and precisely to deliver a silky smooth, light red shade.

name: 双色修容蜜粉－色号ILLUM/NEFERTITI
product_description: 使用ILLAMASQUA 雙色修容蜜粉幫您達到專家級的修容效果。混合自然的修容色幫助加深臉部輪廓，高光幫助提亮和強調臉部突出部分。這款產品容易使用和暈染開。幹的狀態時使用能達到自然的效果，濕的狀態時使用能達到更強烈的效果。自帶的小鏡子使它更方便使用，適合任何膚色。

name: Translucent Face Powder (Refill) P00 (6.5g)
product_description: Designed to give your complexion a  perfected semi-matte finish, this   Translucent Face Powder refill SPF10  by RMK boasts an innovative micro   bead formula which works to blend  easily over the skin. Concealing  open  pores and dull tones, it'll give  your complexion a healthy  radiant glow.  The refill is designed to fit  perfectly into your  compact, so you can  be sure to never run out! K.D.

name: Brush（带盖）
product_description: Illamasqua 精细 Eyeliner Brush （带盖）将耐用性和高性能相结合，可用于涂抹液体、乳膏状和粉状彩妆至娇嫩的眼部区域。 以优质人造刷头制造并有带斜角的刷头，这款刷子可以让您在瞬间以柔和、精准的线条勾勒出美丽的眼部轮廓。 存放在可拆卸的手柄中，便于旅行携带。

name: 迷人矿物质眼影盘（矿物轮廓）
product_description:
PIXI 迷人矿物质眼影盘 ，令妆容持久生效。 内含6色眼影作为补充色调，用以重塑突显美丽的双眼，展示自然清新的妆容，妆效持久，与肌肤完美融合。
内含反射光的矿物质和营养维他命E等成分，用以护眼部周围娇嫩肌肤；配方柔滑，粉末状，可轻松与眼睑融合，打造宝石风格的色调，不会起皱或褪色。 配有双端海绵尖涂抹装置。 E.N.

name: Sandler 丹尼尔桑德勒眉笔
product_description:
這款優質眉刷能迅速上色，打造精緻眉型。質地柔滑，使用簡單。其特有的斜角型毛刷可細緻精確地給眉毛上色。 
打造精緻輪廓，讓你更好展現自然美麗，為你的自然美麗加分。特別適合打造您想要的眉毛顏色，畫出精緻眉型，讓眉毛服帖好打理。這樣，才能畫出輪廓清晰而自然的眉毛，讓五官更立體。

name: Precision Crease Brush
product_description:
Create a range of eye makeup looks with PÜR Precision Crease Brush, a makeup tool designed to expertly apply cream and powder eyeshadows.
The soft, tapered brush utilises synthetic bristles to pick up and distribute the perfect amount of product; in an effortless back and forth motion, it layers, buffs and blends colour in the crease to add depth and dimension to the eyes without pulling or dragging,

name: Lip Jelly Gloss 04
product_description:
Create colourful, captivating lips with the Lip Jelly Gloss 04 from RMK; a sheer tone lip gloss in Orange Pearl. The lip gloss jelly features a thick and glossy formula that adds lustrous juiciness to a plump pout.  
A newly developed, spoon-shaped spatula allows you to coat your lips to perfection with the highly concentrated moisturising gel. Lips are left full, glossy and with juicy colour. – E.W.

name: 丰唇毒液唇膏 巧克力香草味
product_description:
DuWop 丰唇毒液唇膏（巧克力香草味）是 DuWop 毒液系列新推出的产品，它在丰唇毒液原有配方的基础上创造了这一具有丰唇效果的甜辣配方。 毒液唇膏混合了荷荷巴油、牛油果和向日葵精油，能够滋润双唇，使其丰盈迷人。
让您拥有魅不可挡的丰润双唇，这款 DuWop 唇膏还带有香草巧克力的香味。 -SA

name: Brow Sculpt and Groom Brush
product_description:
Fill and define your brows with ease. The PÜR Brow Sculpt and Groom Brush is a 2-in-1 eyebrow tool with grooming spoolie to one end, and angled brush to the other.
The angled brush (with synthetic bristles) is perfect for applying powder and gel brow products; fill, shape and define your hairs for professional results. The spoolie brush grooms, combs and preens whilst blending product to ensure a natural-looking finish.

name: Longo Water Canvas Travel Compact
product_description:
Keep your makeup perfected throughout the day with the Vincent Longo Water Canvas Travel Compact, an airtight and moisture controlled compact that allows you to touch up your foundation on-the-go.
Equipped with a Water Canvas Makeup Sponge and generous mirror, the compact is specially designed to hold a refill of your favourite Water Canvas Foundation; it will keep your foundation fresh and protected against air and moisture for flawless, effortless touch-ups wherever you are.

name: 极致遮盖霜套装
product_description:
用 Menaji 极致遮盖霜套装Refresh 肌肤、控油、遮盖缺陷。 这三件产品可令您的肌肤呈现出完美的妆效，并且帮助肌肤保持柔软、光滑柔顺。
淋浴时使用Face＆Body磨砂膏令肌肤恢复活力。 用迷彩遮瑕棒遮盖黑眼圈和瑕疵，然后用控油Powder进行修饰，打造持久的哑光表面。

name: Mineral 闪粉
product_description:
使用PUR Minerals矿物质闪粉，可达到常年阳光照射后的健康肤色效果。 这款粉底不含油脂，酒精，添加剂，香料或化学染料成分，神奇地适用于所有皮肤类型，让你散发出健康的光泽。 铜色和金色色调的蜜粉还可以转用做眼影或腮红，可以称作多种功用。 对素食者适用且不含麸质，它甚至还适用于过敏症患者。 LB
使用粉底化妆刷将矿物质闪粉，压制的矿物质粉底扫在你的面部，颈部或身体上，达到阳光照耀的效果。 矿物质光彩粉可单独使用或在涂抹4合1矿物质美妆粉底后使用。

name: Definition Faux Eye Lashes - Vamp (Multipack)
product_description: Intensify your peepers with High Definition Faux Eyelashes in 'Vamp'. Lightweight and reusable, these striking false lashes are perfect for achieving a fuller, more dramatic look, lending your lashes a vampy, more defined appearance.

name: Longo La Riviera Sun Matte Bronzer 5g - Sun-Kissed
product_description:
Achieve glowing perfection with Vincent Longo's La Riviera Sun Matte Bronzer; a multi-tonal, compact bronzer pressed into a unique pattern for warm, natural-looking colour with a long-lasting matte finish.
Suitable for all skin tones, the blendable powder can be applied to the entire face for a sun-kissed glow, or to targeted areas, such as the cheekbones, brow bones and centre of the nose to create a sculpted, defined make-up look. Infused with antioxidant Vitamin E to nourish and protect, the bronzer delivers the perfect balance of red and brown tones to enhance the skin's luminosity.
平头PUR矿物质液体塑形刷 使用PUR Minerals4合1液体或粉底涂抹。 这款专业化妆刷是由天然和合成纤维的混合物构成，可达到超级平整遮盖和完美分布的效果。 用这支塑形刷涂抹并延展，每次都能达到喷涂，无暇定妆的效果。 -MB

name: Certified Organic Lipliner - Moroccan Rose
product_description: 使用 INIKA 经认证的 Organic Lipliner，改善双唇外形。 采用压制植物蜡和油的共混物配制而成，并结合天然矿物颜料，打造妆效持久的唇线笔。 其轻盈的乳脂状深粉色调可轻松融入双唇，实现便捷、均匀的涂抹，延长口红的保持时间，且不会羽化或出血。

name: 幻彩双眸妆前乳 No.1
product_description:
本品持久抗皱，抚平细纹，使肌肤完美无暇。
先进创新技术提供均匀的妆底。反光配方具有多重功效，使肤色均匀，同时提亮和明亮双眼。裸色适合所有肌色，质地轻薄，可中和油腻的眼皮。

name: Lip Jelly Gloss 07
product_description:
Douse your lips in RMK's Lip Jelly Gloss, a sheer, juicy lip colour with thick, glossy texture.
Gliding smoothly across lips, the highly concentrated, moisturising gel delivers a sheer wash of coral pink colour, creating a full, plumped-up effect with its ultra-glossy formula. For fool proof application, the lip gloss features a newly developed, spoon-shaped spatula to pick up and deliver product effortlessly.

name: 丰唇毒液唇彩 （粉红香槟）（10.4 ml）
product_description:
DuWop屡获殊荣的毒液（光泽粉红香槟），装在一个挤压管中，有着著名的丰唇毒液的火热激情和闪耀亮泽，色彩丰富持久。 使双唇展示出最可爱的婴儿粉，充满活力，饱满丰润、闪耀光泽。 
精油混合物发挥其神奇的作用后可让面部变得更加红润。 内含肉桂、生姜、荷荷巴油和乳脂鳄梨油等成分，有助于着色，让您的双唇闪耀别致的光泽。 毒液系列产品，现代与经典的结合，一直带领大家追求饱满丰润的双唇。 DuWop为毒液系列产品注入了炫目的色彩，所有产品名称均来自有毒植物的名字。 粉红香槟毒液，每天涂抹，尽显魅力双唇。温暖的色调，让您在夜晚展示完美双唇。 涂上毒液、喝着您最爱的香槟、尽情地享受美妙的生活吧！
丰唇毒液产品的名人粉丝包括： Lindsay Lohan、Jennifer Aniston、Teri Hatcher、 Sienna Miller等等。
使用说明：
未进行动物实验。

name: People Age Defy+着色DD Moisturiser SPF15 - Light（30ml）
product_description:
利用 Green People Age Defy+着色DD Moisturiser SPF15 in' 轻度 "修复完善您的肌肤，这款英国首个有机认证的日常防御保湿润肤霜，可对抗衰老，同时调理改善肤色。
富含充分保湿植物活性成分，包括荷荷巴、牛油果脂和角鲨烷，该着色润肤霜可瞬间滋润和调理肌肤，同时天然地球矿物颜料提供轻薄遮盖，能够适应浅白肤色。 它易于混合的质地可修正肤色缺陷，减少红肿并修复蜡黄肤色，而其源自海茴香的干细胞可积极促进细胞再生，减少老年斑，令肌肤亮白、紧致。 肌肤将重焕活力，散发青春气息。 加入SPF 15防御有害UVA和UVB。 - K.N.

name: Moisture Blender SPF30 PA++ 40ml
product_description:
Hydrate and protect skin with the Moisture Blender SPF30 PA++ from Korean skincare brand Skin79; a rich, moisturising cream that seeks to smooth and soften the surface layer of skin.
Enriched with a harmonic blend of plant extracts and oils, the velvet-textured cream effortlessly melts into skin to deliver essential nutrients and vitamins. A protective barrier shields against free radical damage and broad spectrum UV rays, helping alleviate signs of premature ageing and discolouration for a refined and healthy-looking complexion.

name: & Berry轮廓中性唇线笔 (Clear)
product_description:
用Clear Lord & Berry 轮廓中性唇线笔勾勒完美的唇形。 这款柔软滑腻的配方富含水溶性小麦蛋白，在接触到水分时会膨胀，可温和巧妙地填充嘴部区域的细纹。 这款产品易于使用，其有效成分可刺激细胞再生，可令肌肤更光滑、更年轻。
说明： 用唇线笔描画唇线，然后涂抹唇膏和唇彩。

name: Color Lip Gloss - 10 Nude Pink
product_description:
Drench your lips in a lustrous sheen with the RMK Color Lip Gloss in 'Nude Pink'.
Combining the vibrant colour of a lipstick with the clarity of a lip Gloss, the colour glides effortlessly over lips with its square-shaped applicator, and delivers a veil of sheer yet brilliant colour. Its host of moisturising ingredients, including Shea Butter, Rosehip Oil keep lips feeling hydrated and comfortable.

name: Geller 劳拉·盖勒烘焙双色高亮粉（带粉底刷）——波托菲诺/法国香草
product_description:
Laura Geller 劳拉·盖勒烘焙双色高亮粉让您拥有完美的亮肤效果。 这款双色高亮粉配备有双头粉底刷和小镜子，能够实现无缝融合，彰显您喜欢的妆容。
将其涂抹在眉骨和眼角内侧可从内向外突显眼部轮廓，或将这款丝滑的粉涂抹在颧骨、前额和沿着鼻中心的下部涂抹以打造多维立体效果。 涂抹在湿润的肌肤可增强色彩的强度。
 ‘法国香草’： 经典润滑的纯米色。
 ‘菲诺港’： 晶莹剔透的桃红色。

name: IL Bacio Kit - Soft Orange
product_description:
Add a pop of colour to your makeup look with Pupa's IL Bacio Kit in 'Soft Orange', a portable lip colour palette offering one lip gloss and three creamy lipsticks.
Housed in a novelty, lip-shaped compact with gold crown embellishment, the palette is the smallest piece from the 'This is a Love Story' collection, and is the perfect way to add a touch of colour to your complexion. Use the creamy lipstick colours all-over the lips, and add a splash of gloss to the centre of lips to create the appearance of a fuller pout.
Perfect for popping in your handbag, it is equipped with a handy mirror for on-the-go touch-ups.

name: Definition Eye & Brow Palette - Bombshell
product_description:
Achieve perfectly groomed and defined eyebrows with the High Definition Eye & Brow Palette in 'Bombshell', a comprehensive eyebrow and eye palette combining three long-lasting brow powders with a highlighter and setting wax. Specially formulated for fair hair and skin.
The versatile compact allows you to fill in your brows, defining, enhancing and sculpting for a well-groomed, professional finish. The silky-smooth powders are easy to apply and blend, and are infused with antioxidant Vitamins E and C; they double as eyeshadows to create soft, smokey makeup looks. Use the highlighter to enhance your brow bone, and the wax for a defined or bolder finish. Housed in a mirrored compact with double ended applicator brush.
Includes: 'Light Blonde',' Medium Blonde', 'Carbon', highlighter and wax.
Suitable for fair hair and skin.

name: 迷你私人唇膏套装
product_description:
DuWop 迷你私人唇膏套裝幫助打造完美唇色。有珠光、粉色和珊瑚色，打造無暇唇色。嘴唇的唇色在5 分鐘內即可變成完美唇色。 
唇膏套裝包括三種天然衍生的顏料：胭脂樹紅、芙蓉花和指甲花，經典七十年代“情緒口紅”背後的技術可提供適應每種唇色的活力色彩。蜂蠟、蓖麻油和維生素E 等其他補水成份讓唇色輕薄柔和。 -SA

name: Full Cover Foundation Brush
product_description:
Pixi的这款"Full Cover"粉底刷是打造专业妆效的绝佳美容工具。 它的刷毛由耐用的合成纤维制成，柔软密实，使用轻松不费力，妆效均匀无瑕疵。 用以涂抹、分刷、融合粉饼，使其完全遮盖面部。 球形刷头能完美贴合面部轮廓，不会留下明显刷痕或不均匀的条纹。 E.N. 
使用说明：将粉底轻轻点涂于肌肤，然后刷抹均匀。 也可用来抹匀古铜粉底、腮红、提亮粉底或眼影。

name: Stockholm大圆顶刷 #2
product_description: 这款来自FACE Stockholm的大圆顶刷＃2 允许您快速、均匀地在面部涂抹粉和腮红。 化妆刷是利用优质山羊毛制成，以进行柔软、舒适地涂抹。 – E.W.
Chantecaille 中性防晒唇彩 SPF15 ，可舒缓唇部肌肤，使双唇滋润光滑，同时保护唇部远离太阳紫外线辐射。 这款中性色调的唇膏富含玫瑰、蜂蜜等的滋补性提取物，融入肌肤后，使双唇滋润柔软。

name: Professionals BB Cream Primer for Combination-Oily Skin - Dark/Medium
product_description:
Create a flawless complexion with the PUPA Professionals BB Cream Primer for Combination/Oily Skin. Exclusively developed by the PUPA laboratories, the multi-tasking formula combines the moisturising properties of a BB cream with the perfecting benefits of a primer.
A blend of Hyaluronic Acid and Beeswax ensure ultimate hydration and moisture balance, while advanced Silicone Polymers work to create a protective barrier between skin and makeup for longer lasting results. With a natural looking colour pigment coverage and SPF 20, it leaves skin feeling soft, smooth and protected with the appearance of blemishes and imperfections effectively disguised.

name: Baby Lips Vitamin Shot Lip Balm - Peach Punch
product_description:
利用Maybelline的Baby Lips维生素注射唇膏保护和完善您的翘唇，这是一款结合保湿效果与少许水果颜色的唇彩。
将双唇浸润在持续八个小时的保湿护理中，这款富含维生素的润唇膏带来安慰、保湿功效，同时赋予美妙果香味。 双唇显得甜美、滋润、自然美丽。 - K.N.

name: Vamp! Compact Eyeshadow Duo - Silver Stone
product_description:
Create subdued or smokey makeup looks with the PUPA Vamp! Compact Eyeshadow Duo in 'Silver Stone', a carefully curated eyeshadow duo that combines two complementary shades.
Creamy and easy-to-blend, each highly pigmented colour delivers a rich finish with long-lasting wear. Use each colour individually or blend together to create a unique eye makeup look. Feels comfortable on the lid. Complete with dual-ended sponge tip applicator.

name: Glamour Shot Foundation 25ml
product_description:
Discover the first transparent foundation with the SAMPAR Glamour Shot Foundation; an innovative, universal formula that is designed to replace liquid foundation. The anti-ageing formula is technically a skincare product that is able to offer similar results to makeup as well as its expected skincare benefits.
Formulated with HQA Microlens and Hyaluronic Acid, the clear foundation glides onto the visage, delivering an invisible, soft focus finish. This reduces the appearance of enlarged pores, redness and fine lines and wrinkles, whilst Oat extract visibly lifts skin with immediate effect.
The unique formula also boasts an Urban Advance Complex, which blends Shea Butter serum, Mint Endorphin and Probiotic Sugar together to act as an antioxidant shield. This protects skin from environmental aggressors, as well as strengthening the complexion’s natural defences.
Expect a smooth, matte complexion that is unified and radiant.

name: LONDON Fitlash Primer
product_description: Enhance lashes with butter LONDON's Fitlash Primer; a blue-tinted, conditioning lash primer to boost the benefits of your favourite mascara. Fortified with Rice Bran Wax, Meadowfoam Seed Oil and Wheat Amino Acids, the formula nourishes and strengthens lashes, whilst adding definition and increased fullness for bigger, bolder results. Coats and lifts from the root to lengthen, separate and thicken lashes with a clump-free finish.

name: 娜迪奥描画眼线笔 - 木炭色
product_description:
Natio Define眉筆 
娜迪奧Define 眉筆採用超絲滑配方，每次都可以帶來專業級效果。該款眉筆中加入荷荷巴精油，滋潤保濕，流暢絲滑，是修眉、畫眉、描眉的理想之選。 
使用說明：

name: Super Long Lash Mascara - Black (10ml)
product_description:
让您的睫毛更修长、更浓密。 每位女性都向往长长的睫毛，这款佳品助您随心所欲地妆点您的睫毛，实现梦想每一天。
全新高科技睫毛刷，质地柔软，专为超长睫毛设计，令睫毛根根分明，效果持久，用色彩来延伸每一根睫毛。
使用说明：

name: 娜迪奥 Clever Stick Spf15 - 米黄 (15G)
product_description:
集粉底、遮瑕膏和粉餅多重功用於一身，其防曬係數為SPF 15，絲滑質地，呈現無暇、無痕絲滑美肌。 
配方獨特，以最簡便迅速的方式打造如緞面般光滑的肌膚，是奔忙一族打造漂亮妝容的完美之選。 
使用說明：

name: 20th Anniversary Eyeshadow Palette 01
product_description:
Created in celebration of the RMK's 20th anniversary, the limited edition '20th Anniversary Eyeshadow Palette 01' combines six eyeshadows in one compact.
Offering matt, pearl and shimmering finishes, each shade delivers a natural-looking, buildable hue that blends effortlessly to define and enhance the shape and colour of your eyes. Blend the colours together or use individually to create customised makeup looks.

name: Lip Colour - Flutter (4g)
product_description:
长时间不脱色，富含精油成分，令双唇如天鹅绒般柔软、如丝般柔滑。 粉色裸色调，令双唇在噘起时显得恰到好处且极具诱惑。
为双唇妆点绚丽的色彩和必需的滋润效果。 这款惊艳的唇膏是每位女性化妆包中的主打产品，令双唇绽放绝美的色彩。
使用说明：

name: LONDON Sheer Wisdom Serum Eye Shadow 4ml - Butter Cream
product_description:
Create a neutral eye makeup look with the butter LONDON Sheer Wisdom Serum Eye Shadow in 'Butter Cream', a natural-looking eyeshadow that combines the benefits of makeup with anti-ageing skincare.
Delivering a neutral hue with satin-matt finish, the eyeshadow contains a blend of anti-ageing peptides to help improve the appearance of wrinkles, and Spherical Polymers for a smoothing effect. Gliding effortlessly onto lids, the uniquely textured eyeshadow transforms from a fluid serum to a light powder, imparting high performance pigments with a subtle wash of colour that resists creasing for a flawless, natural makeup look. It blends easily and adheres seamlessly to the lids. Perfect worn alone or as a primer for other eyeshadows.

name: Lipocils Lipo and Mascara - Black 2.5ml
product_description:
Achieve legendary lashes with the Talika Lipocils Lipo and Mascara; a 2-in-1, dual-ended lash regrowth and lengthening mascara in one.
Specialists in eyelash growth for over 60 years, Talika have developed Lipocils Expert® - a highly advanced, deeply conditioning formula that delivers triple action benefits with five natural ingredients, seeking to stimulate regrowth, intensify natural pigmentation and enhance curl.
The exclusive black mascara provides instant results for thicker and voluminous looking lashes free from clumps or flaking, while the Lipocils treatment boasts long lasting visible results in just 28 days. Lashes appear intensified and full with maximum curl and density.
PUR Minerals风华女孩泥面膜，正是你所需要的一款产品，展现更加洁净，清晰的肤色。 在水杨酸的作用下，温和地去除角质和疏通毛孔，天然粘土使之得以净化，你能够瞬间去除彩妆！ 这款非干性面膜具有改善肤色和肤质的功效，且无伤害性和化学成分。 -MB

name: 全面眼眉美化凝胶
product_description:
可用 Chantecaille 的眼眉全面美化凝胶将双眉梳得整整齐齐；这是一种可使眼眉柔顺的配方美容品，可方便地用螺旋状眉刷涂抹。
这种凝胶富含泛酰醇，可强化毛发，轻易就能涂到双眉上，以便对双眉进行描画和定型，并使其一整天都不走形。 这种美化溶液可使双眉柔顺并且整整齐齐，不会使眉毛变硬，也不会有粘性残留物。
可在执行日常眉毛护理的最后一步时使用，以使双眉看起来完美无瑕并将这种状态保持更长时间。

name: Airbrush Blurring Powder Brush
product_description:
Achieve a flawless, sculpted complexion with PÜR Airbrush Blurring Powder Brush.
The domed face brush utilises soft, synthetic bristles to expertly distribute and blend powder makeup, including blushers, bronzers and highlighters. Picking up the perfect amount of products, it’s perfect for sweeping powders across the whole face, or targeting specific areas for contouring, highlighting and brightening.

name: No Filter Blurring Photography Primer 15ml
product_description:
Prime, perfect and correct your skin with PÜR No Filter Blurring Photography Primer, a unique makeup primer with prismatic blurring micro-pearls to improve the appearance of skin whilst prolonging makeup wear.
Perfect worn alone, as a primer or mixed into foundation, the colour correcting formula moisturises, camouflages imperfections and illuminates skin all-in-one, whilst locking makeup in place for a flawless finish. Infused with Coconut, Olive and Shea essential oils, a vitamin-rich Energy Complex with moisturising Agave, and age-defying ingredients, the primer expertly preps the complexion for smooth makeup application, creating the perfect canvas for long-lasting, youthful-looking results. Skin is left feeling nourished and radiant. When mixed with foundation, it will create a dewy yet shine-free finish.

name: Best Seller Kit - Light Tan
product_description:
PÜR's Best Seller Kit in 'Light Tan' is a carefully curated makeup set that combines everything you need to achieve a flawless, sunkissed complexion. Combining a primer with a powder foundation, bronzer and mascara, the kit will allow you to experience long-lasting, perfected makeup. Complete with a makeup brush for effortless application.
Prep & Perfect Correcting Primer
A skin-perfecting primer infused with clinically proven ingredients to smooth and prep skin for flawless, long-lasting foundation. Utilising a Ceretin Complex which contains age-defying Retinol, the hydrating formula expertly reduces the appearance of lines and wrinkles whilst instantly minimising the look of pores and promoting a more uniform, even toned complexion. Neutral in colour, the antioxidant-rich primer is suitable for all skin tones, and feels lightweight on skin. Its brightening and firming properties lend your makeup a radiant, youthful finish, and its cocktail of Salicylic Acid, Shea Butter and Aloe Vera work in synergy to decongest pores, moisturise and soothe the complexion. Makeup looks flawless and silky smooth with extended wear.
4-in-1 Pressed Mineral Powder Foundation SPF 15 in 'Light Tan'
A lightweight, pressed powder foundation with award-winning formula that utilises innovative skincare ingredients. Delivering minimal coverage for a natural, flawless complexion, the all-in-one foundation works as a foundation, concealer, powder and SPF simultaneously to improve the appearance of skin; it's clinically proven to camouflage and prevent imperfections. Encapsulated Mineral Water intensely hydrates, whilst botanical extracts promote a brighter, more even toned complexion. Skin looks flawless and is protected against harmful UV rays. Mess-free application. Suitable for contact lens wearers. 
Mineral Glow Powder in 'Bronze'
A micronized mineral bronzer that adds all-over warmth to the complexion. Perfect for sweeping over the whole face, or for contouring to sculpt and define, the powder delivers rich, golden undertones to create a sunkissed finish. Infused with moisturising Shea Butter and a Ceretin Complex that utilises Retinol, it helps to improve elasticity whilst reducing the appearance of lines and wrinkles. Skin looks beautifully radiant, smooth and healthy. Suitable for contact lens wearers. 
Big Look Mascara
A volumising mascara with clump-resistant application wand. Coating lashes in a rich, nourishing formula, the buildable mascara lifts and lengthens even the smallest of eyelashes to create a maximised, dramatised eye makeup look. Infused with Argan Oil, Coconut Oil and antioxidant Vitamin E, the black mascara adds a dewy sheen to lashes whilst intensifying, nourishing and preserving moisture. Lashes are protected and expertly volumised. 
Chisel Brush
A professional makeup brush that has been specially designed to flawlessly apply the 4-in-1 Pressed Mineral Powder Foundation. Working well with all powder products, the brush offers soft, synthetic bristles that pick up and deliver the perfect amount of product for flawless, well-blended results.

name: - 轻度SPF30（30毫升）
product_description: KORRES野玫瑰CC霜是一款保湿霜，其配方能够增加光泽，使皮肤更明亮。 这款无油脂的轻量级保湿霜富含维生素C，最大程度减少细纹和皱纹的出现，并遮盖瑕疵。 玫瑰油含有亚油酸，可在皮肤表面形成保护层，以再生和舒解皮肤。 它的SPF30能阻挡有害的阳光射线，并减少受损皮肤引起的红肿和刺激。 您可以体验更柔软、更水润的皮肤以及更均匀的肤色。 E.N.

name: Face Pop Eyes - Silver Gold Beige
product_description:
RMK Face Pop Eyes in 'Silver Gold Beige' is a limited edition eyeshadow duo that has been specially curated in celebration of the brand's twentieth birthday.
Each striking eyeshadow (pink and neutral) delivers a shimmering pigment that blends effortlessly on the lid. Wear each colour individually or blend together to create a bold or subtle makeup finish. Complete with a dual-ended sponge tip applicator.

name: Volume Lash Mascara - Extreme Black
product_description:
Achieve a false lash look with ModelCo's Extreme Black Volume Lash Mascara, created in collaboration with American model, Hailey Baldwin.
Equipped with a tapered silicone brush, the volumising mascara captures individual lashes from the root for ultimate impact and definition with a clump-free, water-resistant finish. Separates, curls and lengthens lashes to create show-stopping results.

name: IRIS™眼部按摩器 - 薄荷
product_description:
使用来自FOREO的IRIS™眼部按摩器令双眼光彩照人，焕发青春，该品牌专门生产高档美容仪器。该工具以创新的交替T-Sonic™技术设计，它设有两种模式：温柔"Pure模式"复制人工按摩的感觉，"Spa模式"，结合轻敲和细腻搏动以提供专业美容护理体验。
通过优质、超卫生硅树脂制造，可温柔护理娇嫩的眼部轮廓部位，该设备能够防止细菌积聚并改善护肤品，尤其是精华液和乳霜的吸收。 减少浮肿和黑眼圈，同时平滑鱼尾纹、细纹和皱纹，令双眼焕发活力。
完全防水、易于清洁，其紧凑、轻巧的设计使IRIS™非常适合旅行使用，您随时随地可以让双眼焕发活力。 具有多个强度等级的高级亮眼装置，以满足个人需要和舒适性要求。 E.N.

name: Geller Spackle Multi Tasking Primer & Setting Mist
product_description:
Achieve a flawless complexion with the Laura Geller Spackle Multi-Tasking Primer & Setting Mist; a weightless formula that works to prime, hydrate and set make-up.
Enriched with soothing Aloe Vera, Cucumber Extract and Vitamin B5, the fast-absorbing mist can be used before make-up application, to set foundation in place, or anytime throughout the day for an instant refresh.

name: Treatment Waterproof Mascara - Night Blue 10ml
product_description:
Maximise and nourish your lashes with Mavala's Treatment Waterproof Mascara in 'Night Blue', a water-resistant mascara with conditioning, lash-loving formula.
Thickening, fortifying and lengthening your eyelashes, the long-wearing blue mascara features a professional curved brush that grabs every lash, curling, lengthening and separating, and its Silk Protein-enriched formula conditions and protects to enhance the appearance of your natural lashes. Lashes look silky, soft and elongated.

name: Extreme Volume Smudge Proof Mascara - Brown/Black (10ml)
product_description:
让您拥有稠密浓黑的卷翘睫毛。 这款睫毛膏采用丝般柔滑、防晕染、防水配方，确保睫毛根根分明，效果持久，彰显眼睛和睫毛之美。
让您的双眸大放异彩。 这款华丽的睫毛膏妆效持久，让您整日焕发光彩。
使用说明：

colour: Coral Beige, Mode Beige, Natural Beige, Red Beige
name: Face Pop Lips (Various Shades)
product_description:
Define your lips with RMK Face Pop Lips, a rich, smooth lipstick with subtle shimmer finish.
Available in a range of neutral tones, the lipstick contains delicate pearl particles that help to create a smoother, full-looking pout. Gliding effortlessly across lips, it delivers a shock of rich colour to complement your natural lip shape and skin tone.

name: Smart Derma Mild BB Cream A (All Day) SPF50 PA+++ 40ml
product_description:
Discover the ultimate, all-in-one product with the Smart Derma Mild BB Cream A (All Day) SPF50 PA+++ from Skin79. Caring for even sensitive skin types, the BB cream works to moisturise, prime and protect, with long lasting results.
The formula boasts Network Holding technology, meaning it works as a primer and improves the wear of makeup. Concentrated with Amino acids, BB Cream A visibly improves skin’s elasticity, leaving behind a smooth and supple complexion.
The lightweight formula melts effortlessly into the skin and can be applied throughout the day without fear of the product caking.

name: Vintage Cosmetics Company Brush Cleaning Tool - Pink
product_description:
Keep your makeup brushes clean and hygienic with The Vintage Cosmetics Company Brush Cleaning Tool in Pink, a 100% silicone and ergonomic makeup brush cleaning pad.
Waterproof and durable, the cleansing tool helps to rid your brushes of oil, dirt and makeup residue, all of which can contribute to clogged pores and blemishes. The textured surface agitates the bristles on your brushes to help dislodge dirt and build-up, leaving them clean, soft and ready for flawless makeup application.

name: Baby Lips Lip Balm - Intensive Care
product_description:
Maybelline旗下的Baby Lips是一款超级补水的润唇膏，能够让您的亮唇在8小时内都展现水嫩的迷人风采。 此款润唇膏具有方便的扭转盖，具有SPF20的紫外线防护程度。
Baby Lips具有不断更新的独家配方，致力于保护双唇，同时让其保持柔嫩水滑。 是您手包中的终极必备之物！ K.D.

name: 颜色纠正底霜，暗斑精华， 桃色
product_description: 使用PUR Minerals颜色纠正底霜，桃色来消除黑眼圈，老年斑，雀斑及肤色不均的现象。 富含矿物质的配方是由自然色完善成分构成。 肌肤将会呈现更加明亮，健康的外观，而临床证明皮肤护理技术有助于减少细纹的产生。 PUR  Minerals自然彩妆，为你的肌肤做好完美的准备，可迎接其余的化妆过程，适合所有肤色。

name: Collections A15 Lip Liner Brush
product_description:
Define your pout with the Spectrum Collections A15 Lip Liner Brush; an ultra-soft makeup brush that combines a vibrant colour palette with expert hand-crafted design.
The ‘Get Your Pout Out’ brush boasts soft yet firm, flat bristles, which work with a variety of cream and liquid liners. Effortlessly gliding over skin, the brush is ideal for lining, defining and filling in the lips.  Complete with a tapered tip, the unicorn-inspired brush offers superior precision and prepares lips for a wash of colour.

name: minerals Suede Matte Lipstick (Various Shades)
product_description:
Drench lips in colour with the glo minerals Suede Matte Lipstick; a conditioning lip colour in a convenient, slender stick for precise application.
Rich in antioxidants, the lipstick is fortified with Vitamins C and E, alongside a skin-loving blend of Mango Oil and Shea Butter. The lip colour envelops lips in moisture and nourishing protection, ensuring lips look healthy as well as vibrant.
Complete with an added touch of peppermint, the matte lipstick envelops lips in a refreshing scent, whilst offering a cooling sensation, which works to revive the senses. Expect highly pigmented lip colour that is ultra-smooth and long-wearing.

name: Nature眼线笔 4.13克 - 各种色调
product_description: 使用 Living Nature 眼线笔勾勒和突显您眼睛的轮廓；质软而柔和的眼线笔，创造出高清晰度的化妆效果。富含植物蜡和天然氧化物，乳膏状的眼线笔毫不费力地在眼线周围滑过，给予强烈的色彩，留下极致的妆容。 其精准的笔尖使您可以完成无差错的勾勒，展示专业级妆容。

name: Geller Easy Illuminating Stick
product_description:
Accentuate your favourite facial features with Laura Geller's Easy Illuminating Stick; a chubby highlighter to illuminate your complexion.
Infused with light-reflecting optics, the creamy formula can be worn alone or applied over foundation for an expertly defined, sculpted make-up look. Glides smoothly over cheekbones, brow bones and the bridge of the nose to deliver a long-wearing, luminous finish.

name: Dollar Brows Universal Brow Pencil - Blonde
product_description:
Shape, fill and define your brows with Billion Dollar Brows Universal Brow Pencil - Blonde, a mechanical eyebrow pencil designed specifically for light hair and skin tones.
The dual-ended pencil is a neutral colour that works great on fair hair; its smooth formula can be built upon for desired intensity, and delivers a soft, natural finish for brows that look fuller and shapely. Use feather like strokes to achieve a natural finish, and utilise the spoolie to blend away harsh lines whilst grooming and controlling hairs. Washes off easily.

name: Geller The Delectable Eyeshadow Palette with Brush - Smokey Neutrals
product_description:
Perfect for every mood, outfit or occasion, The Delectable Eyeshadow Palette from Laura Geller combines fourteen crease-resistant shades that can be applied wet or dry to expertly define eyes.
Combining the long-wearing benefits of a primer with luxurious colours of pure Baked pigments, the eyeshadows can be worn alone or blended together to create endless make-up looks with superior staying power. Melting effortlessly onto the lids for smooth, even application, the palette is complete with an integrated mirror and dual-ended brush.

name: & Berry 20100 哑光唇膏笔（多色系）
product_description:
Lord & Berry 20100 啞光唇膏筆可打造長效活力唇色，令雙唇呈現自然啞光韻味。它質地柔滑，極易上色，可精緻均勻地覆蓋雙唇。 - LM 
 使用說明： 可隨時塗抹於嘴唇。

name: Bees 100% Natural Gloss Lip Crayon - Bordeaux Vines 2.83g
product_description:
Add kissable colour to your pout with the Burt's Bees 'Bordeaux Vines' Gloss Lip Crayon; a long-wearing, ultra-hydrating formula that glides on effortlessly to deliver a deep red hue with medium to full coverage.
Enriched with a nourishing blend of Kendi Oil, Shea Butter and Jojoba Oil, the chubby crayon softens and protects, whilst infusing lips with eight-hour moisture to leave them smooth, supple and comfortable. No sharpening required.

colour: Fair, Light Golden, Medium Beige, Medium Golden, Tan Golden
name: Cosmetics AmazingConcealer® Foundation 35ml - 各种色调
product_description:
使用 Amazing Cosmetics AmazingConcealer® Foundation，获得完美的打底效果；它是一款有持久效果的防水粉底，与皮肤顺畅融合，以实现完全覆盖的专业妆容。
具有半透明的矿物基和轻盈色素，无油配方可减少细纹，粗大的毛孔和表观的缺陷，同时有滋养作用的维生素克服了肤色不均的问题，让您获得一个更顺畅和更精致的肤色 适合所有肌肤类型，您可以拥有自然的色彩，不褪色、无痕迹，亦不会造成皮肤干燥。

name: 美宝莲 Cherry Me 宝蓓润唇膏
product_description:
來自Maybelline 美寶蓮的Cherry Me 寶蓓潤唇膏採用特有超水潤配方，是一款全新的時尚唇膏，可為您打造迷人的​​精美翹唇。這款SPF20 的彩色唇膏蘊含特有配方，可為雙唇呈現精美色彩，同時具有旋出式設計，使用非常方便，保證輕鬆塗抹到位。 KD 
 使用說明：

name: Foundation & Mask Brush
product_description: Discover a versatile brush for both cosmetics and beauty treatments with the Foundation & Mask Brush from Chantecaille. Boasting innovative synthetic fibers, the sleek brush dispenses product both quickly and effectively, whether that be a signature foundation or luxurious mask. Whatever the use, the professional tool delivers flawless results.

name: minerals Protective Liquid Satin Foundation - Golden Fair
product_description:
Achieve a dewy and radiant complexion with the glo minerals Protective Liquid Satin Foundation; a skin-nurturing formula that works to perfect skin. Suitable for all skin types, the liquid makeup is effective even on sensitive skin and those with rosacea.
Non-comedogenic, the liquid mineral foundation effortlessly glides over the face, providing a veil of high coverage that conceals and corrects blemishes, redness and other minor imperfections. The foundation is infused with Vitamins A, C and E, alongside a healthy dose of Green Tea extract, which work in synergy to provide essential nutrients to the face. This ensures skin is visibly radiant and healthy-looking.
Alongside creating a flawless, airbrushed complexion, the makeup provides skin with broad-spectrum UV protection as an added bonus to care for skin. Arriving in a vast array of shades, glo possesses a hue for any skin tone.

name: 爱潞儿高歌女孩睫毛 - Cheryl
product_description: 由謝麗爾⋅科爾(Cheryl Cole) 為愛潞兒而設計，是您夜間外出的必備假睫毛。華麗、精妙、多用，這款曼妙的俏皮睫毛讓您擁有宛若科爾般的獨特韻味。是的，它配得上科爾的青睞

name: Cosmetics 极致遮瑕套装
product_description:
Bellápierre Cosmetics 极致遮瑕套装让您拥有光滑无可挑剔的妆容。 它含有四种修颜产品和一把便携遮瑕刷，让您遮掩瑕疵，打造专业级品质的妆效。
黑眼圈遮瑕膏
桃红色可遮掩眼睛下方的蓝色或紫色黑眼圈。 其创新配方中蕴含有向日葵籽和荷荷巴油，可有效祛除黑眼圈、眼袋和瑕疵，让您的面容看起来更年轻，眼部轮廓更清晰。
绿色黑眼圈遮瑕膏
这款轻盈的遮瑕膏可有效遮掩红斑和痘印。 这款遮瑕刷采用绿色配方，定妆持久，全面遮掩瑕疵和色斑，能纠正肤色，有效修容和重新平衡肤色。
轮廓霜
这款轮廓霜非常适合颧骨、前额、鼻梁和下颌轮廓，能够进行专业地修颜，精致地突出面部线条，以增加深度和立体感。 易于晕染，可有效遮掩面部特定部位的瑕疵，实现专业级的妆效。
香蕉定妆粉
这款质地轻盈的黄色蜜粉可有效遮掩变色，瞬间减轻明显的红色瑕疵。 可轻松涂抹在肌肤上，其淡黄色的蜜粉涂抹在肌肤后完全透明，定妆持久，让您拥有光滑柔软的妆效。
 遮瑕刷 
这款遮瑕刷配备有锥形刷头，非常适合遮瑕和遮掩黑眼圈或斑点。 人造刷毛能够进行小面积遮瑕，扁平的一面适用于大面积遮瑕，有效均匀肤色。

name: 夏日之选醒后眉笔
product_description:
用PUR矿物公司的夏日之选醒后眉笔达到最准确的涂敷效果。 用这件独门工具可以塑造个人的眉形和轮廓，自然的还是戏剧性的全凭君意。 双端妆笔拥有自锐化设计，避免了手忙脚乱，它既有眉笔又有修容笔，增加了色彩，使眼睛看上去更明亮。 E.N. 
使用方法：用眉笔尖依眉毛的形状画短划。 如果想让眼睛更明亮，在眉毛下沿眼睛的水线施用眼霜，从内眼角到外眼角画柔软的短划。

name: 塑形染眉膏
product_description: 這款能夠染色，定型，疏理的染眉膏來自Illamasqua. 配合內涵的纖維這款染眉膠容易上色能夠勾勒出眉形，同時不用擔心暈染。螺旋型刷頭確保染眉膠能夠上色自然，使眉毛看起來像自然生長般自然。

name: Brow Designer (Various Shades)
product_description:
Expertly frame your face with Eylure Brow Designer, an instant brow tint to help enhance the colour and definition of your eyebrows.
Expertly darkening and defining hairs without marking skin, the formula helps to boost the appearance of sparse brows; its soft and natural finish lends your brows a fuller, more sculpted appearance. Defining and filling your eyebrows will help to shape and contour your face.
Expect beautifully defined brows with a natural-looking finish.

colour: Android, Beguile, Berber, Furore, Ore, Static
name: Pure Pigment 1.3g (Various Shades)
product_description:
Be creative with light using Illamasqua Pure Pigment; a high-shine, pure-colour powder designed to highlight the eyes, cheeks and brow bone.
Arriving in an eye-catching selection of metallic hues, Pure Pigment is able to complement and enhance any skin tone, as well as providing an array of different looks. The powder can be worn alone, or mixed with eyeshadow and blusher to add a glittering shimmer finish. Apply wet for a bolder, more dramatic colour pay off.

name: Browder 完美 Brow Powder 2g（各种色调）
product_description:
使用PÜR Browder 完美 Brow Powder可自如而然地突显您的眉毛，它是一个独特的纤维配方，可填补眉毛中间的空白和稀疏之处而不会带来生硬的"人为描绘"的感觉。
Perfect塑造、填补和为眉毛定型，这款持久妆效的眉粉可提供自然而大胆的造型，熟练地填补您眉毛中间的空白部分，同时突显它们的自然形状。 最后使用一个植绒涂抹器定妆，这款产品亦也可用于描画烟熏眼线。 梳理整洁和有光泽的眉毛，具有自然的妆效。

name: Geller 劳拉·盖勒 Spackle 原始经典妆前乳 59ml
product_description:
Laura Geller 劳拉·盖勒 Spackle® 经典妆前乳让您尽享完美无瑕的妆容；其轻盈配方能够瞬间舒缓肤色不均匀的肌肤，有效延长定妆时间。
这款含有丰富抗氧化剂的妆前乳蕴含有白茶和雪松根萃取物，可轻松涂抹到肌肤，改善肤质，最大化减少瑕疵的迹象。 它适合各种类型的肌肤，其所蕴含的芦荟凝胶可让您的肌肤看起来更加柔软而完美无瑕。

name: Cosmetics Glowing Palette
product_description:
Highlight your complexion with the Glowing Palette from Bellápierre Cosmetics. The set combines six universally flattering shades to suit a wide range of skin tones, formulated with natural ingredients and mineral pigments for long-lasting colour that’s kind to skin.
Each powder seamlessly blends for a soft, buildable finish with a subtle shimmer to pinpoint your favourite features. Housed in a chic compact with a convenient mirror, the palette is the perfect partner for your contour or strobing regime.

name: W Eyebrow (Powder) 01
product_description:
RMK W Eyebrow (Powder) 01 in dark brown brings you an ingenious design to help you create perfect eyebrows.
Boasting a retractable pencil at one end and at the other a felt head for adding powder, the pencil also features a screw brush for grooming and smudging the eyebrow at the centre of the pencil.
The oval-shaped pencil gives you great control for eyebrows with an exquisite shape and great natural look. -SA

name: Pure Pigment - Axolotl
product_description:
Add a touch of sparkle to your peepers with Illamasqua’s Pure Pigment in Axolotl. Part of the Extinct collection, pure pigment is a finely milled loose powder that boasts an intense colour payoff. The formula can be applied lightly and is buildable for added impact and a more dramatic finish.
Axolotl is a sparkling silver colour with a shimmering metallic finish, able to add brilliance to the eyes. Pure Pigment can be worn alone or over other products to give them a glistening edge.

name: LONDON Wink Eye Pencil Union Jack Black 1.2g
product_description:
Line and define your peepers with the butter LONDON Wink Eye Pencil; an ultra-smooth eyeliner that glides effortlessly across the lid, without pulling on the delicate skin. The eye pencil arrives with a sharp point that can be used to produce clean and precise lines to enhance the eyes. The smooth formula can also be smudged and blended out for a smokey and sultry-looking finish.
Once applied, the long-wearing eyeliner sets firmly into place to ensure eyes remain flawlessly defined all day, however busy your lifestyle is.

name: Perfection Ultime Anti-Ageing Complexion Cream SPF30 30ml - Medium
product_description:
Achieve a smooth, radiant canvas with Gatineau Perfection Ultime Anti-Ageing Complexion Cream SPF30 in 'Medium', a deeply hydrating moisturiser with natural tinted glow.
Lightweight and protective, the brightening moisturiser delivers a sheer wash of radiance onto skin; its unique peptide complex helps plump and enhance elasticity for younger-looking features. Blending Liquorice Root Extract, Hyaluronic Acid, Argireline and Vitamin B3 with SPF 30, the formula aids in defending against premature ageing and external attacks.
Expect a smoother, brighter, more even complexion with an incredibly hydrated finish. Can be worn alone or layered under foundation for an enhanced glow.

使用Sigma非常睫毛膏套装来打理和加粗您的睫毛，该款睫毛膏防水、定型效果长达13小时
配备加厚、超丰盈睫毛棒，睫毛膏的放大效果最大限度地使您的睫毛变厚、变长，提高睫毛主体部分定型效果，创造期待的艺术效果。 强化的黑色配方轻松覆盖睫毛根部到尖部，定型效果良好，不会留下墨染痕迹，亦不会产生睫毛结块现象。 睫毛令人羡慕地变得丰盈、挺拔。

name: HD Multi Tasking Sponge
product_description:
Discover a versatile beauty tool with the brushworks HD Multi Tasking Sponge; an essential applicator that delivers the flawless application of foundation and other liquid makeup products. Crafted with a variety of sides in a number of shapes, the high quality sponge performs an array of makeup tasks.
The flat side works effectively when contouring with cream product, whilst the tapered end is ideal for detailing. The pointed top of the sponge designed for navigating the contours of the face, such as the nose and eyes. The precision tip is able to reach areas often missed with other applicators and target fine lines and creases to prevent a cakey appearance. Expect effortless application and seamless blending, leaving the face flawless and sculpted.

name: Sandler 丹尼尔桑德勒水彩液体腮红 - 天使 (15ml)
product_description:
本品包含維生素E 和荷荷巴油，便於塗覆，滋潤肌膚。本品含矽配方，沒有油脂，不會堵塞毛孔，適合各種肌膚類型。矽幾乎可以完全防水不掉妝。 
桃紅色讓雙頰嫣紅，使面頰呈現健康紅潤的顏色。用後肌膚將倍感滋潤，看起來神采熠熠！

name: Sandler Watercolour Creme Bronzer - Riviera (3.5g)
product_description:
随着气温飙升，可别忘了使用 Daniel Sandler Watercolour Crème Bronzerin Riviera 哦。 独特的古铜配方使肤色如被阳光亲吻一般温暖而无暇。
这款 Daniel Sandler Watercolour Crème Bronzer in Riviera 呈现出暖色和微亮色调之间的完美平衡。 这款古铜色化妆品功效全面，且易于使用。无论在城市还是海边度假都可使用，时刻展现最美的自己。
使用说明：

name: Techniques 眉刷套装
product_description:
Real Techniques 眉刷套装  ，可重塑眉毛形状。 本套装装在全景式盒中，内装五种工具，可帮您清理、重塑眉毛。 使用两把镊子和三把斜刷修眉，您会显得更专业。修眉分五个简单步骤。
斜角镊子： 材质不锈钢，其平斜边可帮您打理眉毛、重塑眉形。
细化镊子： 材质为不锈钢，带尖的精密端可清洗精细的毛发。
斜眉刷： 使用该工具修整眉毛，令眉毛色泽自然、妆容精致。
倾斜拱状眉笔：  尤其适用于为您绘制眉毛形状。 在眉端、眉中、眉梢各轻涂一点颜色。 也可用于涂抹眉毛颜色和使用眼线笔。
倾斜眉刷： 熟练涂抹眉毛颜色、并将颜色涂匀。
全景盒： 支架及手提盒合为一体。 可在家使用或外出时使用。 将盒子放好，倒置湿刷晾干。

name: Stockholm Blemish and Capillary Corrective Concealer 2.8克
product_description:
隐瞒和正确的使用 FACE Stockholm's Blemish and Capillary Corrective Concealer  遮瑕和修正肤色，这是一款能够中和肌肤上各种瑕疵的完美配方。

浓稠的遮瑕膏涂抹方便，能够遮住表面瑕疵，如黑眼圈，破裂的毛细血管和雀斑。 使您的肤色看起来更明亮，均匀。 - K.N

name: "您是哪一款"系列 纤长浓密型黑色睫毛膏
product_description:
theBalm 隆重推出 "您是哪一款"系列 高大英俊（纤长浓密）的黑色睫毛膏；这款具有放大效果的黑色睫毛膏能够让睫毛浓密强韧，并增加睫毛长度，让您打造不粘黏，不留晕染的妆容。
专门设计的刷头便于精确涂抹，从根部让睫毛变得浓密，根根分明，获得最佳效果，另外添加了泛醇、橄榄蜡和米蜡等护发成分，令睫毛强韧，持久不脱妆，打造大师级妆容。 E.N.

name: Collections C03 Tulip Powder Brush
product_description:
Complete your contour with the Spectrum Collections C03 Tulip Powder Brush; an ultra-soft makeup brush that combines a vibrant colour palette with expert hand-crafted design.
The ‘Flawless Finish’ face brush allows for the precision application of both powder and cream formulas. Designed with an ultra-soft tapered tip, the tulip brush is ideal for contouring around the hairline, as well as adding highlight to the brow bone, cheek bones and nose.
Expect a flawless contoured finish that is makeup artist-worthy.

colour: Cinderella, Elite, Haute Couture Bikini, Haute Couture Fuchsia, Jezebel, Naturally Nude, Nude Rose, Paradise, Pop Pink, Red Scarlet Surprise, Ruby Red, Upper East Side
name: Miss PUPA Ultra Brilliant Lipstick (Various Shades)
product_description:
Boost your pout with the Miss PUPA Ultra Brilliant Lipstick from PUPA. Formed upon a base of creamy waxes and volume-enhancing natural extracts, the lipstick delivers a smooth texture with ultra-intense colour pigmentation and a wet gloss finish.
Brightening polymers create an extraordinary crystallised effect for maximum volume and shape, while Cotton extract enhances moisture levels to prevent the lipstick drying out or flaking. Lips appear fuller and plush with a dazzling lustre and long-lasting hue.

name: Pixelated Color Eyelighter (Various Shades)
product_description:
Brighten and illuminate tired, weary eyes with the Japonesque Pixelated Color Eyelighter, a creamy concealer that expertly camouflages and neutralises signs of fatigue around the eye area.
Helping to brighten dark circles and energise dull skin, the luxurious concealer utilises HD pigments that scatter light to diffuse the appearance of bags and imperfections. Eyes appear radiant and wide awake.

name: Longo Water Canvas Highlighter (Various Shades)
product_description:
Add a healthy glow to your facial contours with the Vincent Longo Water Canvas Highlighter, a unique, crème-to-powder formula that delivers a luminous glow to your complexion.
With a unique texture, the highlighter blends effortlessly into skin, transforming into a luxurious powder that expertly brightens up high points on the face, such as cheekbones, brow bones and down the centre of the nose. Utilising 75% Microwater, it hydrates and moisturises whilst a dose of Vitamin E keeps skin protected and healthy-looking.

name: & Berry Glacee 眉毛定型凝胶（自然色）
product_description:
用Lord & Berry Glacee 眉毛定型凝胶打造漂亮整洁的眉毛。 这款有色凝胶可轻松地与眉毛的天然颜色相融合，塑造眉形并增添微妙的光泽。
说明： 用内置棒将凝胶"梳理"到眉毛上。

name: Master Precise Curvy Eye Liner - Intense Black
product_description:
Create showstopping makeup looks with the Maybelline Master Precise Curvy Eyeliner in 'Intense Black', an innovative liquid eyeliner with patent pending tip that hugs the contour of your eye to define and enhance your peepers.
Delivering a shock of full-bodied colour, the eyeliner features an easy grip pen for enhanced control during application, and a curve hugging tip that glides effortlessly along the lid to create precise, seamless lines. Create sultry cat eyes with ease.

name: Sugar Plum Power Crayon Lip Collection (Worth £45)
product_description:
Perfect your pout with the Sugar Plum Power Crayon Lip Collection from Sigma. The trio of Sigma’s best-selling Power Crayons is ideal as a gift, or an indulgent treat for yourself.
The collection contains three varying shades of high-pigment colour that can be worn alone or mixed-and-matched to create a custom look for any occasion. Presented in an easy-to-use twistable crayon, application of the hydrating formula is incredibly easy and the results are long-lasting.
Lip Power Crayon - Ode to Pink
A cool bubblegum pink shade.
Lip Power Crayon - Own It
A deep purple shade.
Lip Power Crayon - Rubicund
A neutral pink shade.

name: Smooth Eye Liner - Black (2g)
product_description: Get beautifully defined eyes with Natio Smooth Liner - Black. The soft texture glides effortlessly onto your eyelids to enhance the natural shape of your eyes. Suitable for even the most sensitive eyes, it also doubles up as a smoky eyeshadow, making it the perfect multi-tasker.

name: Cosmetics Spotlight - The Ultimate Illuminating Set
product_description:
The Ultimate Illuminating Set from Contour Cosmetics combines a trio of shimmering nude powders to flawlessly highlight and define.
Universally flattering for all skin tones, the harmonious shades seamlessly glide onto skin with a silk-like texture and subtle metallic pigments, effortlessly blended for a natural looking luminosity. Dust across the high points of your face and where the light naturally hits for a dew-glistened complexion in an instant.
Housed in a chic, branded compact for an on-the-go glow.
Shades: Verve, Mink, Clique.

name: LONDON Yummy Mummy Lippy (7ml)
product_description:
Add sumptuous colour to your pout with the butter LONDON Lippy Liquid; a long-wearing formula that combines the pigment of a lipstick with the shine of a gloss.
Infused with Shea Butter and antioxidant Vitamin E, the liquid lipstick glides on effortlessly to moisturise and protect lips, whilst delivering non-drying colour with an ultra-glossy finish. Expect smooth, luscious lips that are subtly scented with delicious notes of Vanilla.

name: 布荔奇古铜修容粉
product_description:
RMS 布荔奇古铜修容粉可让您的肌肤闪耀日晒光泽。 这款乳状的古铜修容粉蕴含有巴西布荔奇果油，蕴含有丰富的维他命 A 和β-胡萝卜素。 这款透明的古铜修容粉可让您的肌肤看起来更加健康亮泽，既不会呈现出人造光泽，也不会像普通修容粉那样通常会使肤色更加暗沉。
这款古铜色修容粉的目的旨在使肌肤拥有自然的日晒妆效，而不会带有橙色、灰色或粉色色调。 轻盈的乳状质地使其能轻松涂抹在肌肤上，并且适用于各种类型的肌肤。 一种适用于较暗肌肤的高效高光膏。

name: Cosmetics 熠彩&修容套装——白皙肤色
product_description:
Bellápierre Cosmetics 熠彩&修容套装特别适用于护理白皙肤色的肌肤，它包含化妆包中五种必备产品。 可有效优化您的面部特征，缔造光滑无可挑剔的妆容，以让您尽享专业描画的妆效。
矿物质粉底液——‘象牙白’（4g）
它是采用五合一配方的粉底液，具有遮瑕、打底、修容、定妆和防晒功效。 这款轻盈的散粉适合所有肤质，蕴含有四种天然矿物质成分：云母、氧化锌、氧化铁和二氧化钛，可有效遮掩瑕疵、淡化细纹，让您拥有无暇而精致的妆容。 既可调和使用，也可叠加涂抹。
矿物质修容粉（2.35g） 
这款修容粉非常适合颧骨、前额和鼻梁的中部，能够进行专业地修颜，精致地突出面部线条，以增加深度和立体感。 易于晕染，可有效遮掩面部特定部位的瑕疵，实现专业级的妆效。
矿物质高光粉（2.35g）
可打造荣光焕发的妆容，用于强调面部的凸出部位，包括颧、眉骨和沿着鼻梁向下的部位。 其极致细腻轻盈的质地能够与肌肤轻松融合，有效提亮肤色，突出您最喜欢的面部特征。
 遮瑕刷 
这款遮瑕刷采用纤细的锥形设计，非常适合遮瑕和遮掩黑眼圈或斑点。 尖端和人造刷毛能够进行小面积遮瑕，扁平的一面可轻松进行大面积遮瑕，有效均匀肤色。
美妆刷
这款美妆刷非常适合涂抹古铜粉、修容粉和高光粉，它质地柔软，人造刷毛能够向面部均匀地涂抹粉类产品，以实现非常鲜明的妆效。 让您实现轻松描画、叠加和勾勒轮廓，让您拥有专业级的妆容。

name: Colouring Eye Pencil 1.4g (Various Shades)
product_description:
Expertly define your eyes with Illamasqua's Colouring Eye Pencil; a multi-tasking pencil that can be used as an eyeliner, to define the crease or across the entire lid for endless make-up looks.
With a smooth, blendable formula, the creamy pencil glides on effortlessly to deliver intense, long-wearing colour with ultimate staying power. Its precision tip allows mistake-free application for a professional finish.

name: London Matte Powder Bronzer 9g (Various Shades)
product_description:
Achieve glowing perfection with Lottie London's Matte Powder Bronzer; a lightweight pressed powder that blends effortlessly onto skin to enhance natural radiance.
Perfect for sweeping across the entire face for a sun-kissed glow, or for contouring the cheekbones, forehead and jawline to create a sculpted, defined make-up look. Ideal for all skin tones.

colour: b. classic, b. natural, b. original, b. pure, b. timeless
name: B. Flawless Finish Foundation (Various Shades)
product_description: Perfect your complexion with the Lilah B. Flawless Finish Foundation. Expertly formulated with a unique combination of raw Aloe and Agar extracts, the powdered foundation provides an even, buildable coverage with a naturally luminous finish that feels as if you’re not wearing makeup at all. It’s ultra-lightweight and long lasting, working to keep skin hydrated without feeling cakey or clogged. Available in natural, flattering shades to suit various skin tones and housed in a chic pebble-shaped case.

name: & Berry Reglam Eyeshadow
product_description:
Add a pop of colour to your eyes with Lord & Berry's Reglam Eyeshadow; a long-wearing, crease-proof eyeshadow with a velvety finish.
Buildable and blendable, the pencil-style eyeshadow glides effortlessly across the lid to deliver smooth, creamy colour with superior pay-off. Can also be used to highlight the eye contour.

colour: EM-61 Enchanted Moonlight, EM-64 Enchanted Moonlight, EM-68 Enchanted Moonlight, GR-12 Garden Rose, GR-13 Garden Rose, GR-19 Garden Rose, SB-43 Sunset Beach, SB-46 Sunset Beach, SB-48 Sunset Beach, TM-21 Twilight Madness, TM-24 Twilight Madness, TM-27 Twilight Madness, TR-92 Tobacco Road, TR-94 Tobacco Road, TR-97 Tobacco Road, TT-71 Tempting Touch, TT-73 Tempting Touch, TT-76 Tempting Touch
name: Beauty Swift Eyeshadow (Various Shades)
product_description: Expertly define your eyes with the RMS Swift Eyeshadow; a light-reflecting pressed powder that delivers long-wearing, non-drying colour. Infused with wild-crafted Buriti Oil and organic Jojoba Oil, the buildable eyeshadow can be applied dry for a soft, smokey finish, or wet for more intense colour. Available in a range of hues, each shade name is inspired by 1960’s black and white television shows.

name: Arden Lasting Impression Mascara (Various Shades)
product_description: Make a statement with the Elizabeth Arden Lasting Impression Mascara. Clinically proven to create longer-looking lashes, the high performance lengthening mascara boasts a unique brush with five iconic spheres to capture and coat even the tiniest lashes for maximum extension and a full, fanned out finish. Enriched with Ceramides and Avocado Oil, it intensively conditions and strengthens for thicker, healthier looking lashes free from clumps or flakes. Lashes appear lifted and defined, bound to make a lasting impression.

name: Geller 劳拉·盖勒平衡亮肤修颜粉底液
product_description:
Laura Gellers 劳拉·盖勒烘焙平衡亮肤修颜粉底液让您拥有荣光焕发的不可挑剔妆容，这款便携装的粉底液生产于意大利，它经过在赤陶瓷砖上烘焙 24 小时而制成。
这款粉底液蕴含有用于矫正柔和褐斑的乳状颜料，其轻盈的乳状液体能均匀地涂抹在肌肤上，可智能调节肤色，缔造无瑕而有光泽的妆效。 其平衡、亮肤功能有助于祛除暗沉和红血丝，而其所含的抗氧化剂雷公根和白茶萃取物有助于保护肌肤，减轻衰老的迹象。
让您拥有梦寐以求的均匀而有光泽的肤色。 既可单独使用，也可涂抹在粉底液下层，使肌肤健康而有光泽。

colour: Deep, Light, Medium, Porcelain, Sand, Tan
name: Geller 劳拉·盖勒烘焙亮肤遮瑕膏 6ml
product_description:
Laura Geller 劳拉·盖勒亮肤遮瑕膏让您拥有完美肤色，它采用轻盈配方，可专业遮掩黑眼圈、瑕疵和缺陷。
这款具有全面遮瑕功能的乳状质地遮瑕膏蕴含有烘焙颜色矫正颜料，可轻松涂抹在肌肤的瑕疵部位；其羽量轻的配方能确保遮掩细纹，使肌肤有极致的舒适感。
让您的肌肤看起来完美无瑕，如天鹅绒一般的光滑。

colour: Champagne, Dark Taupe, Emerald, Fairyland, Golden Pink, Lavender, Mint, Navy, Pearl Gray, Sugar Pink, Taupe, Violet
name: Vamp! Wet and Dry Eyeshadow (Various Shades)
product_description:
Enhance your eyes with the PUPA Vamp! Wet and Dry Eyeshadow; a double-use, baked powder shadow that is able to create multiple, effective makeup looks. Applied dry, the eyeshadow delivers a veil of luminous colour that illuminates the eye area and when used wet, the powder provides a more intense and vibrant colour.
Arriving in an array of dreamy hues, each shade boasts a satin or pearl finish that captures the light and offers unique radiance. The eyeshadow is presented in a sleek compact with a convenient foam applicator.

name: Eyes that Hypnotise Pure Pigment Trio
product_description:
Add a touch of sparkle to your peepers with Illamasqua’s Eyes that Hypnotise Pure Pigment Trio. The Pure Pigment shadows feature a finely milled loose powder that boasts an intense colour payoff and a shimmering finish. The formulas can be applied lightly and are buildable for added impact and a more dramatic finish. The trio of hues can be applied to highlight the eyes, cheeks, lips and brows, allowing you to be creative and play around with different makeup looks.
The Set Contains:
Pure Pigment - Fortune (1.3g)
True gold
Pure Pigment - Beguile (1.3g)
Light shimmer
Pure Pigment - Alluvium (1.3g)
Iridescent midnight blue

name: Licorice Lip Balm
product_description:
Experience and aromatic punch with the Hurraw! Licorice Lip Balm; an ultra-hydrating formula that cares for skin using premium organic, vegan and raw ingredients.
Perfect for liquorice lovers, the smooth and creamy balm is enriched with a sweet, skin-loving blend of Coconut Oil, Cocoa Seed Butter and Olive Oil, which deliver a nourishing veil of hydration to lips. The twist-up stick is complete with a delicious dose of Anise Seed Oil, which lends the balm a natural sweetness. Expect a smooth and hydrated pout that is calm, comfortable and free from dryness.

name: & Berry 光泽亮肤遮瑕棒（多种颜色）
product_description:
Lord & Berry 光泽亮肤遮瑕棒可有效遮掩瑕疵。 其配方中含有澳洲坚果油和睡莲提取物，这款乳脂状遮瑕膏具备中等遮瑕效果，可有效遮盖黑眼圈、细纹和明显的瑕疵。 它可为肌肤补充水分，提供持久的遮瑕效果。
使用瓶嘴将遮瑕膏涂抹在瑕疵除，集中涂抹眼周围区域。

colour: Golden Beige, Light Beige, Medium Beige, Natural Beige, Porcelain, Sand
name: Made To Last Extreme Staying Power Total Comfort Foundation (Various Shades)
product_description:
Embrace a flawless complexion with the PUPA Made To Last Extreme Staying Power Total Comfort Foundation; a long lasting yet comfortable foundation.
Utilising ‘Last&Fix’ pigments which set firmly onto skin, the foundation is able to stay in place all day, maintaining the same colour and flawless finish. The unique, water-resistant formula delivers medium to high coverage that can be built up to achieve your desired look. Expect a shine-free, matte makeup look that lasts for hours.

colour: Basic Brun, Butter, Deep Black, Elm Green, Hyacinth Violet, Midnight Blue, Pearly Sky, Pure Silver
name: Multiplay Triple-Purpose Eye Pencil (Various Shades)
product_description:
Create captivating eyes with the PUPA Multiplay Triple-Purpose Eye Pencil; a long-lasting liner that lines and defines your peepers.
The kajal pencil effortlessly glides onto the eye, delivering ultra-intense colour payoff with a blendable finish. The double sided pencil can be sharpened for precise and defined results, or smudged using the built-in smudging brush. This can create an array of looks from smokey eyes to using the pencil as eyeshadow.
The eyeliner arrives in several enchanting hues; the brown shades are perfect for blue eyes, the violet tones enhance green eyes and the blue ones are great for brown eyes, whilst black works to enhance all gazes.

name: for Men - 遮瑕膏 0.2 中色 2.5ml
product_description:
乳狀護理液體遮瑕膏，含維生素E。遮住眼部下方的黑眼圈、眼袋和腫脹，以及肌膚小瑕疵，例如小皮疹和疙瘩。 
有三種顏色：淡色、中色和暗色。

name: Coffee Bean Lip Balm
product_description:
Thoroughly nourish lips with the Hurraw! Coffee Bean Lip Balm; an ultra-hydrating formula that cares for skin using premium organic, vegan and raw ingredients.
The creamy lip balm intelligently combines Sweet Almond, Coconut and Olive Fruit Oil, which creates a nourishing formula that thoroughly moisturises lips to leave them soft, smooth and kissable. Infused with Coffee Bean extract and a touch of raw Chocolate, the chapstick treats lips to a delicious mocha fragrance that lips can’t help but drink up. Expect all-day hydration.

name: Color Performance Cheek Blusher - 03
product_description: The RMK Color Performance Cheek Blusher features three shades of high-pigmented colour to give your complexion a healthy glow. Housed in a silver compact, the lightweight powder melts effortlessly onto the cheeks for superior colour longevity, whilst the soft brush allows you to experiment by shading, highlighting and blending. Wear the shades alone or together to create customised colour and a look as dramatic or natural as desired. E.N.

name: Arden Prevage Anti-Aging Dual End Foundation Brush
product_description: Achieve a flawless make-up base with the Prevage Anti-Aging Dual End Foundation Brush from Elizabeth Arden. Seamlessly distributing and blending foundation for effortless application, the specially designed brush features a heart-shaped end to cover larger areas of the face, and a smaller, tapered head that is perfect for eye contours and narrow areas around the nose and hairline. Its soft, synthetic bristles wash easily with soap and water for ultimate hygiene. Expect an even, streak-free finish every time.

name: Shine Lip Gloss - Strip Tease
product_description:
Enhance your lips with the ModelCo Shine Lip Gloss in 'Strip Tease', a shimmering, high shine lip lacquer that delivers a shock of beautifully reflective colour with long-lasting finish.
Gliding effortlessly onto lips with its wand applicator, the non-sticky gloss imparts a soft colour tint and features an in-built mirror for flawless, on-the-go applications . Lips looks luscious and hydrated.

colour: Alert, Lustrious, Perfect, Simplicity, Smart, Unique
name: Stockholm Pot Gloss 2.8克
product_description: 利用来自 FACE Stockholm的Pot Gloss滋润您的双唇并添加活力色彩。 可选择一系列闪烁及无闪烁颜色，这款滋润唇彩为霜膏质地，可在整个唇部顺滑涂抹。 完美的手包大小润唇膏盒意味着您可以在全天随时涂抹。 – E.W.

name: Luminys Touch Face Illuminator (Various Shades)
product_description:
Capture the light with your makeup using the PUPA Luminys Touch Face Illuminator; a two in one highlighter and concealer that adds instant brightness to the complexion.
Utilising a P-LB Complex, the liquid formula combines makeup with skincare; not only concealing blemishes and dark circles, but working to eliminate their appearance completely. The illuminator is infused with soft focus powders that radiate the face and reflect light.
Expect a flawless complexion that boasts a luxurious glow.

name: Brow This Way with Argan Oil 5ml (Various Shades)
product_description:
Keep brows held flawlessly in place with the Rimmel Brow This Way with Argan Oil; a smudge-proof eyebrow gel that sculpts and defines brows, whilst offering enviable hold.
Arriving with an integrated spoolie applicator, Brow This Way sweeps through natural brows and coats each hair in product. The lightweight gel effortlessly sculpts the brows with each brush stroke, whilst the coloured formula adds extra definition in order to frame the face. Enriched with Argan Oil, the brow product not only enhances brows, but nourishes and conditions the fiber.
The gel arrives in an array of colours, which are designed to suit all hair colours and skin tones, whilst the clear hue is universal. Expect bold yet natural-looking brows that are flawless all day.

可以用来涂抹眉粉、眉笔或膏状产品。

product_description: A setting powder that delivers the fine textured translucent layer  that fits for the flawless finish. Comes in a compact  with a sliding compartment to keep the brush in place.

特别容易混合和构建，如丝般柔滑的粉末轻柔溶于眼睑和面部，提供长期颜色效果，可单独使用或结合使用以塑造各种妆效。 配有集成式镜子。 E.N.

name: Definition Precision Eyebrow Scissors
product_description: Keep your brows on point with the High Definition Precision Eyebrow Scissors; an essential grooming tool that is able to tackle and trim eyebrows, ranging from unruly brows to the tiniest of hairs. Crafted with sharp, precision blades, the scissors provide superior eyebrow trimming, which keeps brows neat and tidy.

name: to Coconut Cooling Lip Oil
product_description: Treat your pout to the yes to Coconut Cooling Lip Oil; a nourishing, lightweight treatment that delivers intense moisture to dry and chapped lips. Enriched with a delectable blend of Coconut, Olive and Eucalyptus Oils, it helps soften and smooth lips while adding a natural-looking sheen.

product_description:
體驗HD Brows雙層眼線膠 ，打造與眾不同的眼妝。本品含黑色偏深棕色眼線膠，持久配方打造精緻眼妝。眼角微微上揚的桃花眼妝、引人注目的貓眼眼妝都不在話下。 - KR 
 使用說明： 
 *本品不包含眼線刷。

name: & Berry 修容高光盘（6色）
product_description:
Lord & Berry修容高光盘 ，使人富有一种自然美，重塑面部轮廓。 这些综合修容套件内含六种不同色调，囊括了您的需求，可遮盖面部瑕疵，凸显面部轮廓。 可巧妙地重塑面容、为面部增添光泽。各种色调都很轻松地与肌肤的特定部位融合，打造精致而富有立体感的面部妆容。 - K.N
高亮粉（光影粉）  ： 
这款柔滑的低亮度光影粉，为您打造容光焕发的肌肤。可用于突出面部高点如：颧骨、眉骨、鼻梁等。 超精细粉饼质地，内含闪亮珍珠，使肌肤看起来晶莹剔透。 涂至内眼角，使双眼又大又明亮。
古铜粉（压制古铜粉）  ： 
这种纯粹古铜粉，打造太阳肤色。尤其适用于涂抹至整个面部或轻轻点至颧骨。 粉饼配方，散粉色彩，可轻松与肌肤融合，展示完美的太阳肤色、使肌肤焕发金色光芒。
 遮瑕膏（霜状遮瑕膏）  ： 
粉状质地、尤其适用于提亮眼睛周围的肤色、遮盖眼部瑕疵。 模糊配方，可遮盖不匀的肤色、黑眼圈、细纹或皱纹。
浅色轮廓霜（塑形霜及粉底）  ： 
持久长效、中度或高度遮盖肌肤，针对目标肌肤部位进行轮廓修复重塑。 尤其适用于颧骨、额头中间、鼻梁等部位。其增亮特性和丝滑效果，可打造自然肤色、使肌肤焕发光采。 富含天然矿物质和油脂等，粉状配方，可轻松与肌肤融合。适合所有肤质，尤其是油性皮肤或居住在高湿度地区的人们。
强力调节粉（塑形霜及粉底）  ： 
持久长效、中度或高度遮盖肌肤，针对目标肌肤部位进行面部轮廓修复重塑。 非常适合于发际、下巴、下颏等部位使用，配方柔滑，可塑性强，能与肌肤很好地融合，使肌肤亮泽而富有立体感，打造自然眼影效果、重塑五官、提升面部妆效。
 腮红（霜状腮红）  ： 
霜状轻盈腮红，可为面颊增添一抹红晕。 可轻松融入肌肤、尤其适用于脸颊，为肤色增添一片健康红润的光泽。 不油腻。

name: Pink GelTint and Pretty SilkGloss
product_description:
Add a pop of colour to your pout with the Pixi GelTint and SilkGloss in 'Pink' and 'Pretty', a dual-ended lip colour with lip tint to one end, and luscious lip gloss to the other.
Infused with Aloe Vera, Jojoba and Shea Butter, the nourishing lip colour glides effortlessly on, delivering a wash of hydration with a long-lasting, stained effect finish. Lips feel comfortable and nourished with a healthy slick of colour.

name: Bees Nappa Vineyard Lip Crayon
product_description: 这款化妆品是引领潮流的必备品。 使用 Burt's Bees 100% 纯天然唇线笔快速获得丰满的双唇，实现持久的亚光色。该产品富含牛油果油、肯迪油和荷荷巴油。 其柔软、乳状质地使得产品可顺畅地滑动；笔尖令涂抹很方便，不会造成锐化混乱。 提供顺滑和保护作用，实现完美双唇。 E.N.

name: Absolue Precious Cells Lip Balm 15ml
product_description: Envelope lips with the Lancôme Absolue Precious Cells Lip Balm; a rich, luxurious treatment to hydrate, repair and plump. Enriched with Vitamin E and the proprietary Pro-Xylane™, the sheer formula rapidly absorbs, working to smooth the look of fine lines and wrinkles. The addition of Acacia Honey, Beeswax and Rosehip Seed Oil ensures your pout is left feeling smooth, supple and redefined.

name: Brow and Lash Gel 7ml
product_description:
Expertly frame your face with the Illamasqua Brow and Lash Gel; a multi-tasking formula that can be used as a mascara primer to help prevent lash breakage, or over brow make-up to improve the wear of products.
Allowing you to create voluminous, longer-looking lashes and perfectly groomed, enviable eyebrows, the transparent formula applies wet and dries quickly to hold your look in place without flaking or smudging.

product_description:
这款 Daniel Sandler 塑型Slim Effect粉饼适合给肌肤上色、塑造深度、修饰轮廓，您只需刷几下即可打造优雅的妆容。 这款两色粉饼 Perfect所有肤色，先在需要突出的部位（如颧骨）涂抹颜色较深的粉，然后再使用本品可取得最好的效果。
这款塑型 Slim Effect 粉饼还配有一个化妆镜，可确保您的外表形象全天都处于最佳状态，它是您的手袋的必备之物。

product_description:
本品蘊含反光礦物質能適應您的膚色和肌膚的質地，煥現清爽舒適、光彩照人美肌。還能軟化細紋，令肌膚瞬時綻現光采。

name: Unscented Lip Balm
product_description:
Pamper dry lips with the Hurraw! Unscented Lip Balm; an ultra-hydrating formula that cares for skin using premium organic, vegan and raw ingredients.
Effortlessly gliding over lips due to its rich and creamy texture, the mild lip balm delivers instant and long-lasting hydration. The twist-up balm is enriched with Cold Pressed Meadowfoam Seed Oil, which envelops the lips in essential moisture, whilst a healthy dose of Vitamin E provides antioxidant properties to shield lips from free radicals. Arriving unscented, the hydrator focuses solely on treating lips, leaving the pout unbeatably soft and smooth.

product_description:

其配方中蕴含有丰富的矿物质颜料和经过认可的有机油脂、黄油和蜡的混合物，可使睫毛拥有极致卷翘与浓密，让您打造所需的浓密效果。 其独特的睫毛刷甚至能控制极其纤细的睫毛，以通过超强的控制力实现专业级的妆效。

product_description:
精心混合純古銅色和性感的粉色珠光，閃耀動人，搭配中等膚色和深色膚色，打造出完美的溫暖色調。 
讓您24 小時時刻美麗，一周7 天天天好氣色。無論您在城市裡忙碌，坐在海灘上，還是晚上參加聚會，從早晨第一刻起直到晚上散場，您始終光彩照人，一切皆因該易上色的防水配方。

product_description:

采用特殊设计，其荣获专利的三圈金属箍由高品质 SigmaAlloy™ 合金制成，具有极佳的强度，而轻质的手柄采用可持续利用的原料木头制成，外面涂有八层油漆，具有抗划伤性。

E71 细节高光阴影刷：最适合用较短一端的刷头来突出像眉骨等高亮部位或柔滑边缘。
 E75 斜角眉刷：最适合用于涂抹散粉或啫喱，简单地用眉刷做勾勒动作即可拥有向发丝一般细腻的效果。 它采用斜角设计，密实的边缘可让您实现轻松涂抹。
E80 眉毛&睫毛刷：这款锥心形美妆工具适用于修饰睫毛和眉毛。 在涂抹眉妆产品之前或之后梳顺眉毛，以使眉毛根根分明，拥有极致的定型效果。

 套裝包含以下產品：

 Eylure Nourishing Oil（Eylure眉毛滋養油） 能令眉毛健康生長。晚間使用迷迭香油加倍滋養，有助於放鬆身心，並能使眉毛變得更濃密，更纖長。這款產品能滋養調理眉毛，當您睡覺時能為眉毛提供滋養呵護。 -SA

name: Collections B03 Baby Buffer Brush
product_description:
Achieve flawless coverage with the Spectrum Collections B03 Baby Buffer Brush; an ultra-soft makeup brush that combines a vibrant colour palette with expert hand-crafted design.
The miniature ‘Under Cover’ buffer boasts super soft synthetic bristles and a flat top brush head, making it the most effective brush for applying and blending cream concealer into skin. The small brush is the perfect size for targeting and covering dark circles and blemishes with concealer.
The baby buffer is an essential addition to any brush collection, simply buff until a flawless finish is achieved.

product_description: This Creamy Polished Base SPF10 by  RMK is a specially designed to    moisturise the skin whilst giving a  semi-matte finish. Formulated with a    blend of three powder particles,  it works to cover uneven patches on    the skin and give you a smooth,  supple complexion. K.D.

product_description:
Accentuate your pout with PUPA's I'm Pure Colour Absolute Shine Lipstick; a creamy, non-drying formula infused with a perfect balance of oils and waxes.
Developed with an innovative Gellified System, the high-pigmented lipstick glides on effortlessly to deliver intense, vibrant colour with a long-wearing finish. Expect smooth, luscious and comfortable lips with mirror-like shine.

采用柔软的人造刷毛，小巧的刷头旨在轻松而专业地沾取和涂抹产品；其锥形形状非常适合涂抹难以涂抹的面部轮廓，如内眼角和眉骨。
这款高光刷可让您打造精致的光亮妆效，它能突出面部的凸出部位，使其拥有自然光泽，如眉骨、颧骨、鼻子和丘比特唇的中部。

product_description: 令睫毛更加濃密細長。該濃密睫毛精緻、迷人且靈活，適合每天佩戴或者用於在特殊場合增添情趣。

product_description:
Have your makeup your way with the Elizabeth Arden Little Black Compact; a sleek, customisable palette for endless combinations of the Eye Shadow Trio's.
The palette can hold two interchangeable eye shadow trios from a selection of complimentary colours, with the design ensuring each shade stays locked into place. With a huge variety of shades and finishes, from subtle neutrals to brilliant hues and both matte and metallic sheens, you can create the perfect palette to take you from neutral to bold, day to night - in a flash. Complete with mirror and double-tip applicator for on-the-go applications.

product_description:
这款 Eylure 高歌女孩假睫毛是由 Kimberley Walsh 专为 Eylure 而设计，纤长且质感分明。 Kimberley 喜欢有质感的纤长睫毛，这款产品是完美睫毛的必备品！
Eylure 高歌女孩假睫毛（Kimberley款）适合所有眼形，佩戴隐形眼镜的人群也可使用。 易于粘贴，安全卫生，Eylure 假睫毛可以提升双眼的自然美感，无需使用麻烦的睫毛膏！ 内附假睫毛胶和使用说明。

colour: Creative, Fantasy, Feisty, Lust, Media, Severity, Spell, Woo

product_description:
Line and define your lips with the Illamasqua Colouring Lip Pencil, a long-wearing lip liner that delivers a shock of rich colour to enhance the natural shape of your lips.
Highly pigmented, the creamy pencil glides effortlessly across the lips, perfectly outlining and defining your natural lip shape to help prevent lipsticks from bleeding. It can also be applied to the entire lip; it blends seamlessly and will create a bold colour finish.

colour: Baby Bare, Magnific Mauve, Radiant Rose, Rosy Red

product_description:
Pixi旗下这款迷人的唇膏可以护理和滋润嘴唇。 此款Tinted Brilliance Balm是亲唇型凝胶唇膏，可以瞬间让您展现上妆的效果。
