product_description:
Enhance your pout with the Shiseido Rouge Rouge Lipstick; a rich, creamy lipstick that saturates lips with long-wearing, luscious colour.
Harnessing the powers of a Hyaluronic Acid Complex, its ultra-moisturising formula hydrates and softens, whilst Fit and Bond Powder adheres to lips to prevent colour fading.
Available in a spectrum of red hues, the high-pigmented lipstick features innovative Vibrant Red Color Technology to deliver intense, seductive colour with subtle sheen.

colour: Bang, Binary, Btch, Charge, Cosmic, Eclipse, Energy, Hadron, Isotope, Lyra, Mars, Midnight, Nebula, Physical, Quartz, Solar, Spectra, Vibrate
name: Anti Matter Lipstick
product_description: Enhance your pout with the Illamasqua Anti Matter Lipstick; a semi-matte lipstick that adds long-wearing, non-drying colour to your lips. Its smooth, creamy texture glides on effortlessly to soften and condition lips, whilst delivering high-pigmented, luscious colour in one effortless stroke. Housed in the brand's signature black case.

name: Geller Liquid Gelato Pillow Top Illuminator (Various Shades)
product_description:
Highlight your best features with Laura Geller Liquid Gelato Pillow Top Illuminator, a radiance-boosting, liquid highlighter with pillow soft applicator for fool-proof results.
Enriched with Mica and light reflecting particles, the sheer illuminating formula blends effortlessly into skin, lending brightness and luminosity to the high points of you face, such as cheekbones, brow bone, down the centre of your nose and inner corners of the eye. Its pillow delivery tip ensures precise and flawless application, and is perfect for on-the-go touch-ups. Can be used on targeted features or applied sparingly all-over the face for a subtle glow.
Ballerina: A candlelit, rose gold shade.
Gilded Honey: An effervescent, caramel honey shade.

name: Teint Idole Ultra Cushion Foundation (Various Shades)
product_description:
Achieve a flawless, perfected makeup look with Lancôme's Teint Idole Ultra Cushion Foundation, a full coverage liquid foundation housed in a refillable compact with innovative, cushion release technology.
Delivering long-wearing, full coverage with a luminous velvet finish, the foundation blends effortlessly onto skin to camouflage imperfections and promote a more even, radiant skin tone. The cushion technology ensures mess-free, easy application; simply touch to activate, then apply to skin with a patting motion to create a true, full coverage effect. Lightweight and refreshing despite its high coverage, the makeup feels comfortable on skin and inspires a bright, natural-looking glow. Equipped with a puff applicator for easy application.
Portable and refillable, its the perfect every day makeup.

colour: Buff, Cherub, Glissade, Kitsch, Minx, Naked, Rosepout, Starkers, Tease, Vampette, Virgin

product_description:

含有豐富的保濕的維他命E, 一款持久的唇膏使你的嘴唇能夠毫不費力的達到柔軟和順滑的狀態，同時輕輕擦一下您的嘴唇就能展現出華麗的色澤。 德國製造

product_description:
Expertly frame your face with the Must Have Tinted Brow Mascara from Lord & Berry. Filling in gaps in thin, sparse brows, the buildable, long-wearing formula tints and tames for a professional finish.
Fortified with Hydroviton® PLUS and thickening Nylon fibres, the innovative, ultra-hydrating gel brushes on effortlessly to enhance natural shape and definition, allowing you to achieve well-groomed, enviable arches with hair-like colour. Features a specially designed spoolie brush applicator.

colour: Antique Pink, Cayenne, Confess, Dangerous Red, Fancy Pink, Flush, Modern Pink, Orchid, Peony, Pinkish Orange, Red Hot Chili Pepper, Velvet Rose
name: & Berry 20100 Shining Crayon Lipstick
product_description:
Add nourishing, vibrant colour to your pout with Lord & Berry's 20100 Shining Crayon Lipstick; a jumbo lip pencil that glides on effortlessly for a high-shine finish.
Long-wearing and ultra-comfortable, the pencil delivers highly pigmented colour, whilst soothing and softening lips for a trendsetting smile. Easy to hold and perfect for use on-the-go.

name: Color Correcting Crayon (Various Shades)
product_description:
Achieve a flawless complexion with the Japonesque Color Correcting Crayon; each colour targets a certain problem area to help perfect your makeup look.
Ideal for applying under foundation to create the perfect base, the colour correcting crayons blend effortlessly into skin without drying, or streaking, and expertly neutralise dark shadows, redness and hyperpigmentation. Skin looks naturally flawless and more even in tone.
Shade 1: Brightens dark shadows.
Shade 2: Corrects redness.
Shade 3: Corrects hyperpigmentation.

colour: Belle Epoque, Chic, Divine, Dynamic Red, Insolent, Magnifique
name: & Berry Matte Crayon Lipstick 3.5g (Various Shades)
product_description:
Add sumptuous colour to your pout with Lord & Berry's Matte Crayon Lipstick; a high-pigmented lip pencil that glides on effortlessly for a long-lasting matte finish.
With a super smooth texture and ultra-hydrating formula, the lipstick delivers intense, non-drying colour whilst soothing and softening lips for a trend-setting smile. Ideal for use on-the-go.

colour: Eternal White, Golden Eye, Iconic Silver, Keep on Khaki
name: Paris Infallible Eye Paint (Various Shades)
product_description: Accentuate your eyes with the LOréal Paris Infallible Eye Paint; a long-wearing eyeshadow that delivers high-pigmented colour with superior stayability. Featuring a cushioned wand tip for easy, one-stroke application, the unique, liquid-to-powder formula blends effortlessly onto the lids for intense colour and professional results.

name: W Eyebrow (Powder) 02
product_description:
RMK W Eyebrow (Powder) 02 in mocha brown brings you an ingenious design to help you create perfect eyebrows.
Boasting a retractable pencil at one end and at the other a felt head for adding powder, the pencil also features a screw brush for grooming and smudging the eyebrow at the centre of the pencil.
The oval-shaped pencil gives you great control for eyebrows with an exquisite shape and great natural look. -SA

colour: Brown, Dark Brown, Soft Charcoal, Taupe
name: Geller 劳拉·盖勒幻彩眉笔
product_description:
Laura Geller 劳拉·盖勒幻彩眉笔帮您塑造和定型眉毛，它是一款配备有创新型三角状笔尖的眉笔，可提供持久的妆效。
既可单独使用，也可用在您喜欢的眉粉的下层，以实现持久定妆，它是一款使用方便的快干型眉笔，可缔造自然妆效，能改善和突出您的眉毛。 柔软的笔尖可专业地添补眉毛稀疏的区域，达到更丰盈的效果，还能勾勒和定型眉毛，使眉形看起来更自然，让您拥有专业级品质的光泽效果。 其配方中含有定妆肌肤和毛发的成分，可让您一整天都拥有整洁完美的眉毛，以专业地修饰您的脸形。
可使用香皂和水轻松卸妆。

name: Color Performance Eye Shadow - 01
product_description: Add depth and definition to your eyes with the RMK Color Performance Eye Shadow. Housed in a compact, the three shades of crease-resistant powder glide onto the eye lid to deliver high-pigmented, long-wearing colour, whilst the two application brushes allow you to experiment by shading, highlighting and blending to enhance and luminate the eyes. Wear the shades alone or together to create customised colour and a look as dramatic or natural as desired. E.N.

name: Color Performance Cheek Blusher - 02
product_description: The RMK Color Performance Cheek Blusher features three shades of high-pigmented colour to give your complexion a healthy glow. Housed in a silver compact, the lightweight powder melts effortlessly onto the cheeks for superior colour longevity, whilst the soft brush allows you to experiment by shading, highlighting and blending. Wear the shades alone or together to create customised colour and a look as dramatic or natural as desired. E.N.

name: Nature Colour Me Natural Lipstick Set - 3 Natural Shades (Worth £60.00)
product_description:
Achieve an on-trend nude lip with the Living Nature Colour Me Natural Lipstick Set; a trio of complementary nude hues, which add a natural and subtle effect to makeup. Each lipstick is hand crafted in New Zealand and flamed to a perfect finish. Certified natural, the nude lip colours are formulated to nourish the lip, whilst delivering long-wearing colour. The trio of lipsticks arrive housed in a vibrant gift box, perfect for treatment a loved one or even yourself.
Made in New Zealand.
Warm Wood
Warm Wood is a warm, medium brown shade with terracotta undertones.
Sandstone
Sandstone is a medium, pink-brown hue with a subtle glossy finish.
Precious
Precious is a classic nude pink that is able to complement any makeup look.

name: 便携伸缩唇刷
product_description:
Japonesque便攜伸縮唇刷 
本品可確保塗抹均勻，沒有失誤。 
本細刷用於為唇部上色，修復細紋和小裂縫，使雙唇飽滿。

name: London Bamboo Bronzer - South Beach
product_description:
Capture sun-kissed skin with the Ciaté London Bamboo Bronzer; a virtually weightless face powder that creates a natural looking bronzed hue with soft matte finish.
Infused with nourishing botanicals, the finely-milled formula contains Bamboo extract to combat shine and regulate oil production, with intense colour pigments allowing for buildable, custom coverage. Dapple across cheekbones, décolletage and limbs for that just-stepped-off-the-plane tan. Presented in new Ciaté packaging with compact mirror for on-the-go application.

name: Pressed Powder - N(P)01
product_description: A setting powder that delivers the fine textured translucent layer  that fits for the flawless finish. By blending the 4 different textures  with the powder brush, they work to eliminate the shine on T-zone and  correct the tone for a natural bright complexion. Comes in a compact  with a sliding compartment to keep the brush in place.

name: Balmshelter Tinted Moisturiser Spf18 - Light
product_description:
我们知道每天让肌肤保持完美无瑕有多么困难，但我们的这种愿望最终还是实现了！ theBalm BalmShelter Tinted Moisturiser SPF18 in Light 不仅提供防晒功效，还会让您获得完美肌肤。 太棒了，不是吗？
theBalm BalmShelter Tinted Moisturiser SPF18 in Light 是一种具备广谱防晒功效的超保湿配方，含有尿囊素、月桂酸己酯和......好吧，我们把这些科学的成分留给研究人员去探究吧？ 我们只谈这款保湿霜的惊人功效：可愈合和舒缓肌肤，有助于保持柔软的肌肤，可用作细胞增殖治疗产品！ 妙极了，您真的需要入手一款！

name: Beyond Powder 7g - Dynasty
product_description:
Deliver healthy warmth to skin with the Illamasqua Beyond Powder in Dynasty; a majestic, golden hue that captures the heat of the sun’s rays.
The silky powder glides effortlessly over skin, and can be used to create an all-over illuminated finish or applied with more precision to perform like a highlighter. Perfect for illuminating the high points of the face and reflecting light, the powder is effective when worn on the top of the cheek bones, brow bones and even the collar bones.
Apply dry for a sheer, natural bronzed shimmer or apply the powder with a wet brush for a more dramatic, metallic finish. Expect Dynasty to become your new summer essential.

name: Gel Colour - Charm 8g
product_description:
Achieve glowing perfection with the Illamasqua Gel Colour; a gel-based, sheer cheek tint that adds a pop of colour to your complexion.
With a smooth, high-pigmented formula, the blusher stick glides on effortlessly to deliver blendable, buildable colour with an even, streak-free finish. Expect a radiant, healthy sheen and excellent colour payoff. Can also be used as a lip stain.

name: Touch Premium Implements Gift Set
product_description:
Achieve salon-worthy results with the Premium Implements Gift Set from Elegant Touch. Combining four manicure must-haves and a handy carry case, the kit allows you to shape, buff and file your nails to perfection.
Nail Clippers
Crafted from high quality stainless steel with perfectly aligned, sharp blades for precision cutting.
Cuticle Pusher and Cleaner
A dual-ended tool to preen and perfect cuticles. Allows secure, comfortable grip for controlled tidying.
Glass Nail File
Gently shapes natural and artificial nails, whilst protecting from splitting and peeling.
Nail Buffer
A super-fine grit buffer to smoothen ridges and imperfections for a neater polish application.
Carry Case
Ideal for use on-the-go, the convenient case keeps all your manicure essentials in one place.

name: Complexion Trio Set
product_description: 本套装包括三支高质量化妆刷，为您打造无暇肌肤。 这些化妆刷设计精美，由顶级材料制成，是化妆达人的至臻之选。 - L.M.

name: PK1, Lychee 7g
product_description: 資生堂臉部三色粉使肌膚散發出自然的光澤。附帶一個小刷子，三合一的產品含有修容，高光和腮紅。只用簡單的親親一抹您的臉頰就會散發出自然健康的光澤。這款產品的設計仔細考慮了產品顏色和質感，使妝容看起來更立體。可以單獨使用一個顏色或者三種顏色混在一起使用呈現出來的妝容都很好看

name: Endless Silky Eye Pen - Matte Khaki
product_description:
Line and define your peepers with the Pixi Endless Silky Eye Pen in Matte Khaki. Gliding onto the eye like silk, the liner creates a flawless line in a single sweep.
The eye pencil boasts an ultra-longwearing, waterproof formula that guarantees to stay in place all day and all night; without the need for a touch-up. Gentle yet effective, the eyeliner delivers an intense colour pay off. Matte Khaki offers a matte khaki green hue.

name: Definition Powder Brush
product_description: Simple yet effective, the Make Up by HD Brows Powder Brush is specifically designed for use with pressed powders. The large dome shaped head ensures all over, full coverage with the ability to easily blend. A must have makeup tool, this super soft brush with natural bristles is suitable for use with powder bronzers and blushers. K.D.

name: 化妆刷高级套装
product_description:
Sigma推出的这款化妆刷高级套装包含15支高品质的化妆刷，采用柔软细致的独家刷毛，能有效抓取粉状、液体和霜状化妆品，打造完美妆效。 专为用于脸部、眼部和唇部而设计，这款终极化妆刷套装将让您轻松精准地打造自然或夸张的妆效。 - K.N.
E10 - 小号眼线笔：精确地涂画眼线。 配合眼线胶或眼线液使用。
E15 - 平头眼线刷： 清晰、精确地涂抹。 沿着上下睫毛线描画，塑造简单的细眼线。 涂抹凝胶、液体或粉状产品。
E20 - 短毛眼影刷：集中上色。 将眼影涂到眼部的小片区域，如外眼睑。 还可用于晕染下眼线。
E25 - 眼影晕染刷：小范围晕染。 将颜色混合在一起涂于眼睑上并增强控制。 抹去粗糙皱纹获得良好混合效果。
E35 - 细头眼影晕染刷：小范围涂抹眼窝眼影。 使用化妆刷头蘸取色粉，直接扫在眼窝处。 带有晕染效果，但仍可以看出轮廓。
E45 - 小头细毛眼影晕染刷：将眼影精确涂抹至眼窝处。 用刷头蘸取色粉，将较多的眼影涂抹至眼窝处，让眼睛看起来更深邃。
E50 - 大号眼影刷：小范围高光。 将高光粉涂抹在眉骨或上颧骨。 打造柔和晕染的妆效。
F10 - 蜜粉刷/腮红刷：精确涂抹腮红。 用于涂抹粉末化妆品。
F15 - 混毛蜜粉刷/腮红刷：柔和地涂抹腮红。 打造略微晕染的自然腮红。 配合矿物粉质化妆品使用效果最佳，打造自然细致的妆效。
F20 - 大号蜜粉刷：小范围涂抹色粉。 在颧骨和太阳穴部位涂抹色粉。 使用扁平一侧进行定型和精准涂抹。
F25 - 细头面部粉刷：将化妆品准确涂于脸颊上。 将蜜粉、腮红或修容粉涂抹在脸颊和太阳穴位置。 细头刷头可准确涂抹产品。
F35 - 细头高光刷：打造自然细致的高光。 将高光粉调涂到面部的上方。 略微晕染的妆效让肌肤散发自然光泽。
F65 - 大号遮瑕刷：遮掩面部或身体的较大区域。 涂抹液体或霜状产品效果很好。
F75 - 遮瑕刷：精确涂抹化妆品。 涂抹亮色唇彩时用于唇部周围以便遮掩并修饰唇形。
L05 - 唇刷：将口红精确涂抹至嘴唇。 使用牢固的边缘明确和塑造嘴唇轮廓。

name: B. Retractable Foundation Brush #1
product_description: Create a flawless base with the Lilah B. Retractable Foundation Brush #1, a compact and chic brush that’s the perfect addition to any beauty buffs’ makeup collection. Simply twist the top to reveal the super soft bristles that allow you to blend powdered foundation with precision and control for an even and buildable coverage. Hypo-allergenic and super hygienic, the tool is ideal for on-the-go applications.

name: Collections B02 Domed Buffer Brush
product_description:
Enjoy seamless makeup application with the Spectrum Collections B02 Domed Buffer Brush; an ultra-soft makeup brush that combines a vibrant colour palette with expert hand-crafted design.
Boasting a dense brush head with rounded bristles, the brush is the perfect companion for buffing cream products evenly into skin. The domed brush is ideal for the hollows of the face such as the temples and cheekbones, as it lends a subtle contoured finish. Also packing on powder products, the dense, unicorn-inspired brush can be used to apply bronzer or blush.

name: Bees Carolina Coast Lip Crayon
product_description: 这款化妆品是引领潮流的必备品。 使用 Burt's Bees 100% 纯天然唇线笔快速获得丰满的双唇，实现持久的亚光色。该产品富含牛油果油、肯迪油和荷荷巴油。 其柔软、乳状质地使得产品可顺畅地滑动；笔尖令涂抹很方便，不会造成锐化混乱。 提供顺滑和保护作用，实现完美双唇。 E.N.

name: Vintage Cosmetics Company Lavender Infused Cosy Socks - Violet
product_description:
Keep your feet snug and smelling sweet with The Vintage Cosmetics Company Lavender Infused Cosy Socks.
Infused with a relaxing Lavender scent, the slipper socks will keep your feet warm and cosy whilst imparting a subtle fragrance to help calm the senses.

name: Vintage Cosmetics Company Blemish Wand - Rose Gold
product_description:
Promote a clearer complexion with The Vintage Cosmetics Company Blemish Wand in Rose Gold, a useful beauty tool that enables you to safely and easily extract blemishes and blackheads without marking or scarring the skin.
Helping to unblock pores, the wand is made from high quality stainless steel and features a small loop to one end for removing white heads, and a flat side to the other for gently drawing out blackheads. Durable and easy to use, it will leave your skin looking spotless and clarified.

name: Collections C06 Tulip Eye Contour Brush
product_description:
Enhance the eyes with the Spectrum Collections C06 Tulip Eye Contour Brush; an ultra-soft makeup brush that combines a vibrant colour palette with expert hand-crafted design.
A contouring pro, the ‘Pretty as a Petal’ brush boasts a fluffy, tulip shaped brush head that is ideal for contouring around the eye area. The super soft brush is able to reach into the eye socket and create enviable depth and definition. Seamlessly blending eye makeup, the eye contour brush is an essential addition to any makeup bag.

name: Natural Brow Duo - Natural Blonde
product_description:
Achieve enviable arches with the Pixi Natural Brow Duo in 'Natural Blonde'. The dual-ended tool features a waterproof, precision pencil that helps to fill in any gaps in your eyebrows and a soft-hold, tinted gel to keep even the most unruly brows in place.
Infused with strengthening Panthenol and antioxidant Vitamin E, the brow pencil nourishes and protects, whilst delivering natural, hair-like  colour to enhance brow shape and add dimension to your face. Expect denser, fuller-looking brows with a perfectly groomed finish.

name: & Berry 唇部护理油
product_description:
Lord & Berry 唇部护理油 ，还您水嫩双唇。配方非常先进 ，富含活性成分和植物油提取物，可护理滋养唇部。

内含强大的活性成分及基本植物油等，可缓解干燥裂口的唇部，保护滋润双唇、舒缓唇部、提升唇部肤质、重塑唇形、使双唇饱满丰盈。 使双唇触感柔软、得到滋养、有效抵御其他的外界因素损害。 - K.N

name: LONDON Plush Rush Lip Gloss - Double Dare
product_description:
Enhance the look of your pout with butter LONDON Plush Rush Lip Gloss, a plumping lip formula that works to add a slick of colour to your lips whilst creating a fuller appearance.
Delivering high shine colour, the lip gloss glides effortlessly across lips with a cushion like feel, and expertly stimulates hyaluronic synthesis to enhance your natural lip shape. Lips appear fuller, smoother and plumper. Leaving lips with a lasting tingling sensation, the lip gloss will boost lips, your mood and your confidence.

name: Sandler 丹尼尔桑德勒遮瑕刷
product_description:
適用於塗抹遮瑕粉時使用，能準確遮住瑕疵部位，採用手指狀造型，配合遮瑕粉一同使用，能輕柔地遮住黑眼圈。 
本品超級有效，採用新型合成材料（革命性的合成尼龍）製成，光滑的梳毛可輕鬆上粉，能充分集中地遮瑕，並能融入肌膚，十分自然。

name: London Tan Time Brush
product_description: 使用 Lottie London's Tan Time Brush  获得古铜色肤色，大号带角度刷子，刷毛超柔软。 刷子Perfect适合涂抹日晒粉，能够适量沾取，令肌肤均匀有光泽。 使用超柔软的刷子轻扫面部和身体，打造无暇闪亮妆效。 - K.N

name: Strobe and Sculpt Palette - Highlight and Contour
product_description:
Achieve a professional makeup finish with Pixi's Strobe and Sculpt Highlight and Contour Palette, a mix of contour and highlighting shades to define and illuminate your features.
Designed in collaboration with beauty blogger, Maryam Maquillage, the face kit combines three contour shades with three highlighters, allowing you to define the natural hollows of your face, chisel your jawline and accentuate your cheekbones, whilst adding dimension and a light-reflecting finish to your makeup. Blending seamlessly onto skin, the deep contouring colours are perfect for sculpting your cheeks, forehead and nose, and the highlighters are best applied to high points on the face (areas that naturally catch the light) such as cheekbones, corner of the eyes and down the centre of the nose.
The sheer, buildable powders are fade-resistant to leave you with flawless, long-lasting makeup.

name: Master Kajal Eyeliner - Pitch Black
product_description:
利用 Maybelline的 'Pitch Black' " Master Kajal "  Eyeliner 让双眼尽显最佳妆容，这款乳霜粘性眼线笔只需简单一描即可瞬间定型双眼魅力。  
该易涂抹、霜质眼线笔加入东方精油，具有高浓度颜色，以获得强效、戏剧性的效果，并且可以很容易混合，以塑造一种性感、烟熏效果。 - K.N.

name: Vegas Nay 假睫毛胶水 8.5ml
product_description: Eylure Vegas Nay 假睫毛胶水 ，可完美粘贴假睫毛。采用快干配方，干了后透明无痕，持久长效。 安全有效，方便涂抹，使双眼精致漂亮。 防水设计。

name: LONDON Plush Rush Lip Gloss - Late Night
product_description:
Enhance the look of your pout with butter LONDON Plush Rush Lip Gloss, a plumping lip formula that works to add a slick of colour to your lips whilst creating a fuller appearance.
Delivering high shine colour, the lip gloss glides effortlessly across lips with a cushion like feel, and expertly stimulates hyaluronic synthesis to enhance your natural lip shape. Lips appear fuller, smoother and plumper. Leaving lips with a lasting tingling sensation, the lip gloss will boost lips, your mood and your confidence.

name: Mineral Mascara Black
product_description: INIKA黑色睫毛膏为打造深邃双眼而设计，天然矿物质和独特的双Z刷头，能够覆盖每一根睫毛。 令睫毛更厚、更长、更丰满。 不含有毒物质、不刺激、素食认证，这款睫毛膏妆容持久，值得拥有。 K.D.

name: Sandler 丹尼尔桑德勒微泡口红 - 钛微红
product_description:
誘人櫻桃紅，打造夢幻雙唇，專為有品位的女性準備。外有奢華鈦制盒包裝，不僅僅是口紅，還是一種時尚。 
 “微泡”能持續釋放護唇因子，讓雙唇柔軟，數小時保持色彩鮮豔。本品顏色濃郁，滑膩，具有保護雙唇功效，讓雙唇呈現充滿活力的經典紅色。走秀，就是這一支；

name: LONDON Plush Rush Lipstick - Lucky
product_description:
Treat your lips to the moisturising and plumping properties of butter LONDON Plush Rush Lipstick, a long-wearing, creamy lipstick that delivers a shock of colour whilst dousing lips in essential moisture.
Accentuating the natural curves of your pout, the luscious formula is enriched with a Phyto-Endorphin Complex to boost your mood, and a Plumping Complex to help increase the appearance of fullness; lips look smoother, firmer and more defined. Standing the test of time, the lipstick withstands feathering and bleeding, so your pout looks irresistably kissable, for longer.

name: Cat Eye 眼线液（深黑色）
product_description: PIXI Cat Eye 眼线液（深黑色）  ，巧妙重塑双眼。本款眼线液，配有倾斜的端头，可轻松涂抹、自如的掌控。 防水配方，内含高色素，色彩持久，不起皱，不掉色、不开裂，每次使用都让您尽享专业级妆效。 E.N.

name: La La 古铜美黑摩斯 - 浅色
product_description:
Madame La La 古铜美黑摩斯 （200ml）是一款专为肌肤增添洛杉矶极致古铜光泽的 DIY 美黑摩斯。 专为肤色较浅的肌肤配制，这款洛杉矶古铜美黑霜可以为肌肤增添阳光小麦色，只需3个小时便能收获完美无瑕的肌肤。  这款轻质的有色摩斯采用天然护肤配方，还特别添加了椰子汁，Madame La La 最先发现了它的护肤功效。 来源于墨西哥下加利福尼亚州的椰子水提取物能够为肌肤提供水分，让肌肤变得更紧实，更富有弹性。
这款快干美黑霜采用创新的颜色调和技术，可以根据您的自然肤色进行调整，确保美黑效果自然。 混合了椰子水提取物、维生素A＆E、芦荟提取物和绿茶提取物，让快干的美黑霜立即调整肌肤颜色，类似于在身上用的CC霜，减少橘皮组织、硬块并均匀肤色。
这款洛杉矶美黑霜效果可持续9天，褪色自然，因此不用美黑褪色不均后留下的难看的斑斑点点。 -SA

name: Hologram Pearl Pact Pressed Powder 16g
product_description:
Achieve a flawless and radiant complexion with the Hologram Pearl Pact Pressed Powder from Korean skincare brand, Skin79, a pressed face powder infused with fine pearl particles to leave skin perfected and naturally glowing.
Ideal for setting foundations and BB creams in place, the finishing powder delivers a soft focus effect, covering up imperfections without caking, and controlling shine for a balanced and flawless base. Its dose of Gold, Caviar extract and Coenzyme Q10 expertly hydrate skin, and its light-scattering properties promote a more contoured, glowing appearance. Housed in a convenient mirrored compact with application puff.

name: Ombre Hypnôse Mono Eye Shadow - P205 Lagon Secret
product_description:
Create natural or smokey eye makeup looks with Lancôme Ombre Hypnôse Mono Eye Shadow in 'P205 Lagon Secret', a rich teal colour with iridescent finish.
Sweeping effortlessly onto lids, the smooth, easy-to-blend eyeshadow delivers buildable colour that can be applied subtly to create a sheer wash, or built upon for an intensified, dramatic look. Highly pigmented, the crease-resistant eyeshadow imparts smooth, even coverage every time for a flawless, show-stopping effect.
Housed in a mini compact with dual-ended applicator sponge.

name: Tinted Brilliance Balm - Nearly Naked（3g）
product_description:
Pixi Tinted Brilliance Balm - Nearly Naked（3g）的配方经过专家调配，具有多种滋养成分，让您的嘴唇十分柔软，同时呈现出美丽低调的色彩。 此款唇膏会让您的嘴唇展现凝胶的光泽，在被皮肤吸收之后，根据嘴唇的ph值，会呈现出不同的色调。
此款旋转型唇膏富含具有保湿作用的荷荷巴油、牛油果油和玫瑰提取物，具有丰盈效果的肽类物质，具有保护作用的维生素E和具有抗氧化作用的维生素A，从而时刻让您的嘴唇处于最佳状态，并呈现出雅致的色彩。 - L.M.

使用说明：

name: Sandler Liner/Blemish Brush
product_description:
Daniel Sandler Liner/Blemish Brush 能完美遮住面部瑕疵或描出夸张的眼部轮廓。 特殊设计令完美肤色轻松呈现。
Daniel Sandler Liner/Blemish Brush 由合成毛发制成，即使手抖也可轻松描出眼影。 使用这款广受赞誉的化妆刷，将瑕疵抛到九霄云外。

name: Hauschka彩色日霜
product_description:
Dr. Hauschka彩色日霜，深度滋润肌肤，长效保湿，使肌肤色泽自然、明亮动人。适用于中性皮肤、干性皮肤、成熟性Pfizer及敏感性皮肤使用。
内含滋补性鳄梨油和杏仁油、蜂蜡和木瓜籽，能被肌肤快速吸收，重新平衡肌肤，防止肌肤干燥；圣约翰草，可提高肌肤弹性。 使肌肤柔软细嫩、富有光泽。 E.N.

name: Coverst Stick Foundation SPF30 PA++
product_description:
Perfect and protect your complexion with the Coverst Stick Foundation SPF30 PA++ from Korean skincare brand, Skin79. The 2-in-1 concealer and foundation formula helps to camouflage imperfections whilst safeguarding against harmful UV rays.
Infused with extracts of Rosemary Leaf and Calendula Flower, the cover stick glides effortlessly over skin, delivering a lightweight veil that feels comfortable, and expertly conceals flaws and blemishes. Its lightweight, silky texture blends seamlessly and smoothens the look of skin, whilst silicone gel helps to minimise the appearance of pores and wrinkles. Can be used on the whole face as a foundation, or as a concealer for targeted areas.

name: Eyebrow Brush
product_description: Accentuate and define your brows with RMK's Eyebrow Brush; a professional tool that allows you to tame, shape and shade your brows with precision and control. Crafted from water badger hair, its angled tip enhances natural brow shape and offers ultimate control when applying colour.

name: minerals 葛罗氏精准眼线笔 - 黑色
product_description:
使用葛羅氏精準眼線筆（黑色）打造亮眼眼形。乳狀眼線筆精確輕鬆滑過眼線，讓眼線變粗。 
此眼線筆具有一個精準筆尖，在眼線上畫出精緻線條，適合打造流行貓眼。 -SA 
 使用說明：

name: Sourcils Styler Brow Mascara - 02
product_description:
Achieve full brows with help from the Lancôme Sourcils Styler Brow Mascara; an innovative brow product co-created with renowned celebrity makeup artist, Lisa Eldridge.
Arriving with an innovative, hairbrush-inspired applicator, the brow mascara effortlessly sweeps through eyebrows. Begin by pushing the brush against the hairs to coat them in product and achieve a thick and full effect, then smooth in the direction of hair growth to create enviable definition.
The smudge-resistant gel formula dries quickly, holding brows flawlessly in place for up to 14 hours without the need for a touch up.

name: Coconut Lip Balm 4.3g
product_description:
Discover a best-selling balm with the Hurraw! Coconut Lip Balm; an ultra-hydrating formula that cares for skin using premium organic, vegan and raw ingredients.
Evoking thoughts of a tropical paradise, the creamy chap-stick envelops lips in a toasty coconut scent, without being overly beachy.  The rich formula is infused with Jojoba Seed Oil, Cocoa Seed Butter and Coconut Oil, which work harmoniously to treat lips to a veil of nourishing and long-lasting moisture.
Both rich and raw, the coconut lip balm is the perfect size for ensuring lips stay comfortable whilst on-the-go.

name: Lip Brush
product_description: Expertly line, define and shape with the RMK Lip Brush; a must-have tool for mistake-free, controlled application of lip products. Featuring a tapered tip with ultra-soft bristles, the lightweight, portable brush effortlessly applies lipstick and colour for a perfect pout.

name: Collections SC021 Wonder Sponge - Lilac
product_description:
Achieve an airbrushed complexion with the Spectrum Collections SC021 Wonder Sponge in Lilac. The textured sponge is an essential tool for creating a flawless base with a seamless finish.
The rounded sides of the ‘Unicorn Tears’ sponge effortlessly applies and blends makeup on the large areas of the face, whilst the precision tip perfectly conceals blemishes and targets smaller areas of the face such as the contours of the nose and eyes. Simply moisten the sponge and use to apply cream, mineral or liquid makeup products.

name: Sculpting Face Powder Duo - Helio/Lumos
product_description: 采用 Sculpting Face Powder Duo from Illamasqua，熟练地实现想要的眼影。 可混合和调制的粉剂结合了清晰的中性无光浅色和闪耀的香槟色调，突出您最喜欢的特点，可被干法用于本色面或湿法用于更鲜艳的颜色。 盛装于镜面粉盒内，便于忙碌时涂抹。 适合于所有肤色。

name: Beyond Powder - Epic
product_description:
Illuminate the complexion with the Illamasqua Beyond Powder in Epic; a shimmering bronze hue that instantly warms skin.
The silky powder glides effortlessly over skin, and can be used for an all-over illuminated finish or applied with more precision to perform like a highlighter. Perfect for illuminating the high points of the face and reflecting light, the powder is effective when worn on the top of the cheek bones, brow bones and even the collar bones.
Apply dry for a sheer, natural shimmer or apply the powder with a wet brush for a more dramatic, metallic finish, with long-lasting effect.

name: LONDON Plush Rush Lip Liner - Sweet Something
product_description:
Line and define your lips with butter LONDON Plush Rush Lip Liner, a water resistant lip formula that works to define and plump the appearance of your pout.
Infused with filling spheres that help to add volume to lips and reduce the appearance of wrinkles, the lip liner applies effortlessly, and blends seamlessly with its built-in brush. Delivering true colour that never bleeds or feathers, the lip liner can be worn alone, or layered beneath your favourite lipstick for maximum colour and staying power.

name: Vintage Cosmetics Company Dusting & Powder Brush
product_description:
Achieve a professional makeup look with The Vintage Cosmetics Company Dusting & Powder Brush, a super-sized, fluffy brush that effortlessly applies bronzer and loose powder onto skin.
Fitted with soft, synthetic bristles and rust-proof aluminium ferrules, the brush distributes powder products evenly across skin and allows you to set makeup in place or add a warm, bronzed glow to your face, décolleté and neck. Complete with a cream wooden handle.

name: LONDON Double Decker Mascara - Stacked Black
product_description:
Enhance your eyes with the butter LONDON Double Decker Mascara; an amplifying black mascara to thicken, lengthen and volumise lashes without clumping or flaking.
Powered by Extreme Curl technology and an innovative Emulsifying System, the creamy mascara delivers ultimate impact and definition, whilst its interlocking nylon fibre brush captures individual lashes for bigger, bolder results.

name: 组合眼线笔 - 超级烟熏色（2.21g）
product_description:
Pixi 组合眼线笔（超级烟熏色）采用双头设计，颜色长效持久不脱妆，可用于内眼线。 这款眼线笔拥有完美搭配的丰富色彩，创造柔和的迷人眼妆，质感超顺滑，而且持久防水，让您的双眸明亮动人，打造最佳烟熏效果。
眼线笔特别添加了咖啡因和洋甘菊成分，具有舒缓镇定、提亮光泽并增添活力的功效。 -SA

name: LONDON Sheer Wisdom Serum Eye Shadow 4ml - Mauve Mist
product_description:
Create a neutral eye makeup look with the butter LONDON Sheer Wisdom Serum Eye Shadow in 'Mauve Mist', a natural-looking eyeshadow that combines the benefits of makeup with anti-ageing skincare.
Delivering a neutral hue with satin-matt finish, the eyeshadow contains a blend of anti-ageing peptides to help improve the appearance of wrinkles, and Spherical Polymers for a smoothing effect. Gliding effortlessly onto lids, the uniquely textured eyeshadow transforms from a fluid serum to a light powder, imparting high performance pigments with a subtle wash of colour that resists creasing for a flawless, natural makeup look. It blends easily and adheres seamlessly to the lids. Perfect worn alone or as a primer for other eyeshadows.

name: 娜迪奥 Clever Stick Spf15 - 浅色 (15G)
product_description:
集粉底、遮瑕膏和粉餅多重功用於一身，其防曬係數為SPF 15，絲滑質地，呈現無暇、無痕絲滑美肌。 
配方獨特，以最簡便迅速的方式打造如緞面般光滑的肌膚，是奔忙一族打造漂亮妝容的完美之選。 
使用說明：
平头PUR Minerals塑形刷 使用PUR Minerals4合1压制矿物质化妆粉底，腮红和其他散粉涂抹。 对于想要达到超级平整遮盖和完美分布的效果，这款专业化妆刷会是你所需要之选。 按照该品牌最简单，最有效的的3D方法使用：将粉刷侵入你的散粉中，在盖子上划圈，然后以向下划的方式轻铺，达到无暇定妆效果。 -MB

name: Cosmetics Make Up Bag - Eat, Sleep, Contour, Repeat
product_description: Stash your favourite makeup products in this Contour Cosmetics Make Up Bag. Crafted with a high-quality metallic finish, the chic wash bag features a top zip fastening and is perfectly sized to fit in your handbag for on-the-go applications. Complete with the playful slogan to the front – ‘Eat, Sleep, Contour, Repeat’ – it’s the perfect storage solution.

name: 颜色纠正底霜-减少红斑，绿色
product_description: 使用PUR Minerals颜色纠正底霜-减少发红，绿色，可控制红肿和发炎的症状。 富含矿物质的配方是由天然的护肤成分和颜色护理技术构成，帮助减少斑点的出现，同时使肌肤具有明亮，健康的光泽。 PUR  Minerals自然彩妆，为你的肌肤做好完美的准备，可迎接其余的化妆过程，适合所有肤色。

name: Color Drama Lip Contour Palette 4g - Crimson Vixen
product_description:
Create a fuller-looking pout with Maybelline's Color Drama Lip Contour Palette in 'Crimson Vixen', an all-in-one lip colour kit that allows you to prime, line, colour and highlight your lips.
Equipped with a dual-ended applicator brush, the palette combines a carefully curated range of vampy red hues that are perfect for priming, defining and brightening your lips; use the brush to prime, line, fill and highlight for luscious, contoured lips.

name: Browwow Darker 4.5g
product_description:
Browwow from DuWop lets you Shape, groom, and highlight your brows  with , a three-part compact that allows you to create perfect arches  every time. Browwow includes a lightly colored brow powder, tinted  pomade, and champagne shimmer highlighter, all fitted into a copper  bronze palette with a large mirror and professional double-ended brush.
Use the powder over the brows, filling in any areas where more  hair/color is needed. This will subtly add definition and volume. The  non-greasy pomade, used after the powder, tames the brows, holds them in  place, and adds a soft tinted shine that enriches their color and  shape. Finish with the champagne highlighter, by applying it on the brow  bone, to highlight the brows and eyes.
You no longer have to use many different products to achieve  perfectly polished brows - Browwow has all three brow essentials in one  convenient compact.

name: "The Balm" (10毫升)
product_description:
用Zelens的"The Balm"复原嘴唇，它是起滋养和舒解作用的润唇膏。 其特殊配方有十三种活性成分特别配制，深入调理，使嘴唇感觉光滑饱满。 其天鹅绒般的质地可修复皲裂、开裂和干燥的嘴唇，愈合保护屏障，强化和再生嘴唇组织。 透明质酸可减少细纹，乳木果油增加柔软度，绿色紫苏叶具有抗氧化保护作用，可防止自由基的侵害和环境刺激。 这款小巧的唇膏盒非常适合在路上使用。 E.N. 
使用方法： 根据需要涂在嘴唇上，或者搽在干燥的皮肤上，以减轻不适。

name: London 盈彩唇膏 Rita Ora 款 - 紫色万岁
product_description:
英国最受欢迎的彩妆品牌 Rimmel 联手流行音乐天后 Rita Ora，共同推出了今年最激动人心的色彩系列。
这款红紫色盈彩唇膏采用流行的旋转式唇膏棒设计，带有浆果般的紫红色调，色泽迷人，为唇部提供舒适的呵护。 这款唇膏带有恰到好处的淡淡香草香，非常适合打造像 Rita 一样的魅力妆容，为面部增添一抹性感的亮色。 - E.D

name: Longo Water Canvas Base Primer
product_description:
Prep your skin for flawless makeup application with the Vincent Longo Water Canvas Base Primer, a transparent, oil-free makeup primer that refines and smoothens the appearance of skin whilst prolonging makeup wear.
Created with a patented process of seaweed-infused 81% Microwater, the gel primer delivers a breathable veil onto skin, nourishing and evening out texture whilst minimising the look of pores with Bistorta and Liquorice Root for a seamless makeup finish. Rich in antioxidants, it hydrates and protects skin whilst promoting a smooth and even base. Doubles as a perfect eyeshadow base.

name: Kiss Pot Rose Lip Balm
product_description:
ModelCo have collaborated with American model, Hailey Baldwin, to create the Kiss Pot Rose Lip Balm; a sheer, rose-scented formula to enhance your pout.
Infused with a nourishing blend of Shea Butter, Pomegranate Seed Oil and antioxidant Vitamin E, the luxurious balm glides on effortlessly to moisturise and soften, whilst its Hyaluronic Filling Spheres lend lips a fuller, plumped appearance. Expect smooth, luscious lips with comfortable colour.

name: Collections A08 Medium Fluffy Shader Brush
product_description:
Discover a versatile eyeshadow brush with the Spectrum Collections A08 Medium Fluffy Shader Brush; an ultra-soft makeup brush that combines a vibrant colour palette with expert hand-crafted design.
The ‘Happy Medium’ blender boasts a medium-sized brush head with fluffy synthetic bristles, which are ideal for sweeping powders, pigments or cream makeup products to the entire eye lid, as well as building colour in the corners for a more defined look.
Ideal for a subtle everyday look or for building colours to create intense drama, the unicorn-inspired eyeshadow brush is an essential additional to any brush collection.

name: 逆龄粉底液 30ml
product_description:
DuWop 逆龄粉底液是一款质地轻盈的独特抗衰老粉底液，能够瞬间明显改善肤质。  它可有效淡化细纹，让肌肤恢复应有的丰盈紧致，消除环境污染、压力和衰老对肌肤的影响。 这款逆龄粉底液蕴含有基肽 3000 和海洋生物润肤剂的混合物，能够保湿和紧致肌肤。
轻轻挤压管体，直至内置的涂抹刷溢出湿润的粉底液。 将粉底液轻扫到整个面部肌肤，然后使用粉底刷均匀地进行晕染。
这款逆龄粉底液不含对羟基苯甲酸酯和油脂，采用从日本金银花提取的纯天然防腐剂，可供严格的素食主义者使用。

name: T 泡沫 T 蛋白杏仁唇膏——柠檬香草&绿茶
product_description: Bubble T 泡沫 T 蛋白杏仁唇膏能够有效护理您的双唇；其极致保湿的甜美配方使其能够轻松涂抹在唇部，使双唇更加光滑柔软。 散发着柠檬和绿茶那令人兴奋的芳香。

name: Powder Brush
product_description:
使用 Illamasqua Powder Brush使您获得一个舒适、完美无瑕的肤色，它是一款大号的有豪华柔软合成刷毛的化妆刷。
非常适用于在面部和全身涂抹化妆粉，这款精心设计的工具有长短不一的刷毛；较短的刷毛可用于精心上彩妆，而较长的刷毛则可用于混合阴影。 这款面颜妆刷轻松地略过皮肤，涂上数量恰到好处的化妆品，让您拥有一个完美无瑕的专业化妆容。 也可用于涂抹面霜和液体粉底。

name: Ready 14.0 Palette - The Bare Naturals
product_description:
The Bare Naturals 14.0 Palette from bareMinerals contains a coveted selection of 14 eyeshadows that have been inspired by the rich hues of the rugged Californian landscape.
Offering the award-winning SeaNutritive Mineral Complex base with up to 12 hours wear and a host of nourishing actives for a sumptuously smooth texture, the extensive edit contains an array of shades, from neutral nudes to sensual earthy tones, in both matte and metallic finishes for the perfect day-to-night combination.
The slimline palette is accompanied with a compact mirror, step-by-step guide and a dual-ended, domed blending brush for truly professional looking results.  
Shades Included: 
Celebrate (yellow cream)
Oyster (birch gray)
Quartz (shining stone)
Head Over Heels (warm slate)
Pale Silk (misty rose)
Unearthed (chocolate raisin)
Mahogany (deep sable)
Creme (buttermilk)
Mixologist (champagne sheen)
Bewilder (sparkling sand)
Hot Commodity (metallic medium copper)
Couture (glimmering clove)
Twilight (galaxy blue)
Blackout (black smoke)

Chantecaille 高清完美古铜粉   ，打造完美底妆。这款哑光古铜粉专门配制，您涂上后，就可以美美哒出现在高清摄像头或相机面前啦。 
本款哑光粉配方轻盈、属非干性粉，可轻松上妆，就像液体一样与肌肤完美融合，可巧妙遮盖毛孔与肌肤瑕疵，展示光滑无瑕的肌肤。内含提亮剂，打造闪亮的哑光肌肤。 采用微细轻型完美粉末，让肤色完美自然，带您美美哒出现在高清镜头前。本品也会使肤色均匀、完美无瑕、可以美美地拍照啦。
对较浅色肌肤来说，本品可用作一款古铜粉；对肤色较深者，本品可用作中性粉。

name: Face Brush
product_description:
使用 Illamasqua Face Brush 完成一个无瑕疵的粉底妆容，它是一个由人造刷毛制成的柔软的粉底刷。
这款精心设计的工具有长短不一的刷毛，Perfect 涂抹面霜或粉底液；较短的刷毛可用于精心上彩妆，而较长的刷毛则可用于混合阴影。 这款面颜妆刷轻松地略过皮肤，提供了完美的覆盖，让您拥有一个完美无瑕的专业化妆容。

name: 爱潞儿眉粉盒 - 金色
product_description:
愛潞兒金色系眉粉有染色蠟和兩塊眉粉，令你的眉毛看起來更為立體。 
眉粉盒可打造三種不同的陰影效果，微深色蠟，提亮蠟和棕色蠟。這三種顏色能令眉毛立體精緻。 -SA

name: Concealer Brush
product_description:
使用 Illamasqua Concealer Brush可使您的肤色完美，它是一款由无伤害性的合成刷毛制成的化妆工具
Perfect用于修复肌肤上有瑕疵的区域，这款遮瑕刷的平头以特定的强度完成覆盖并遮盖瑕疵。 使用奶油遮暇膏遮盖黑眼圈，逐渐增加用量并混合均匀以掩饰疲劳迹象。 是用于隐瞒瑕疵、不规则和不均匀部位的佳品。

使用 Undercover Crayon from Pixi，实现更顺滑的肤色。这是一个打造亲肤产品的品牌，可轻松快捷地实现完美的妆效。 其防水配方富含可滋养肌肤的野玫瑰，以及可减少瑕疵和黑斑的甘草。 其旋升式遮瑕笔可提供全覆盖哑光表面；所含的肽可促进胶原蛋白的生成，实现更青春、水嫩的肤色。 E.N. 
使用说明：轻轻地涂画于肌肤上需要遮盖瑕疵的部位，然后用指尖轻轻抹匀。

name: Endless Silky Eye Intensify Duo - Blue Eye Intensify
product_description:
Pixi的这款Endless Silky Eye Intensify Duo能使双眸更加明艳动人。该品牌的产品亲附肌肤，让您不必大费周折即可打造出无瑕妆效。 这款防水的双头眼线笔能提供持久妆效，使用时不会产生晕染。 它丝滑配方让笔尖能轻松游走于眼皮之上，呈现自然色调，增强眼部效果。 E.N. 
使用说明：用双头笔的深色笔尖描画眼线，然后用浅色笔尖提亮内外眼角。

name: Stockholm Luxe Lash Mascara 10克
product_description:
利用 FACE Stockholm的Luxe Lash Mascara in Black 体验前所未有的美丽睫毛，这是一种具有丰盈效果的睫毛膏，配有创新V形刷，可轻巧涂抹每根睫毛。
利用聚合物技术和泛醇的调理能力以及Cashmir的粘着力，睫毛膏可轻松涂抹至睫毛，提供卓越的显色，同时令睫毛翘起和卷曲；睫毛瞬间变得丰盈和修长。 富含反光颜料，该配方可强化颜色和光泽，保持完美妆效而无结块或污迹。 - K.N.

name: LONDON Wink Eye Pencil Inky Six 1.2g
product_description:
Line and define your peepers with the butter LONDON Wink Eye Pencil; an ultra-smooth eyeliner that glides effortlessly across the lid, without pulling on the delicate skin. The eye pencil arrives with a sharp point that can be used to produce clean and precise lines to enhance the eyes. The smooth formula can also be smudged and blended out for a smokey and sultry-looking finish.
Once applied, the long-wearing eyeliner sets firmly into place to ensure eyes remain flawlessly defined all day, however busy your lifestyle is.

name: 苹果唇膏腮红彩妆盘
product_description:
theBalm 苹果唇膏腮红彩妆盘包含6种颜色，适合每一种情绪、搭配或场合，各种颜色可以混合使用，也可单独使用，多种搭配，打造无限妆容，而且颜色持久保真不脱妆。
质地柔滑，可以轻松融化，贴合唇部与双颊，使妆效均匀自然，每一个款都可以为肌肤增添一抹颜色。 各个颜色可以混合叠加，将带给您长效不脱妆的迷人妆容。 E.N.

name: Contour Blending Brush
product_description:
PÜR Contour Blending Brush is a multi-tasking face brush with flat top and dense, synthetic bristles.
Specially designed to work with powder, cream and liquid products, the makeup brush effortlessly buffs and blends foundation into skin, and is perfect for contouring and highlighting for a defined, sculpted and radiant complexion. Its carefully designed shape hugs the contours of the face for professional, high definition results.

name: Lipstick - Amande 4g
product_description:
Add a pop of colour to your makeup look with Mavala Lipstick in 'Amande'.
Gliding effortlessly across lips in a uniform layer, the lightweight lipstick delivers a rich, creamy hue that won't settle into fine lines. Its long-lasting coverage ensures lips feel comfortable all day, even if prone to dryness. Ideal for dry or sensitive lips, the lip colour helps protect against dryness for a healthy, supple-looking pout.

name: Best Seller Kit - Tan
product_description:
PÜR's Best Seller Kit in 'Tan' is a carefully curated makeup set that combines everything you need to achieve a flawless, sunkissed complexion. Combining a primer with a powder foundation, bronzer and mascara, the kit will allow you to experience long-lasting, perfected makeup. Complete with a makeup brush for effortless application.
Prep & Perfect Correcting Primer
A skin-perfecting primer infused with clinically proven ingredients to smooth and prep skin for flawless, long-lasting foundation. Utilising a Ceretin Complex which contains age-defying Retinol, the hydrating formula expertly reduces the appearance of lines and wrinkles whilst instantly minimising the look of pores and promoting a more uniform, even toned complexion. Neutral in colour, the antioxidant-rich primer is suitable for all skin tones, and feels lightweight on skin. Its brightening and firming properties lend your makeup a radiant, youthful finish, and its cocktail of Salicylic Acid, Shea Butter and Aloe Vera work in synergy to decongest pores, moisturise and soothe the complexion. Makeup looks flawless and silky smooth with extended wear.
4-in-1 Pressed Mineral Powder Foundation SPF 15 in 'Tan'
A lightweight, pressed powder foundation with award-winning formula that utilises innovative skincare ingredients. Delivering minimal coverage for a natural, flawless complexion, the all-in-one foundation works as a foundation, concealer, powder and SPF simultaneously to improve the appearance of skin; it's clinically proven to camouflage and prevent imperfections. Encapsulated Mineral Water intensely hydrates, whilst botanical extracts promote a brighter, more even toned complexion. Skin looks flawless and is protected against harmful UV rays. Mess-free application. Suitable for contact lens wearers. 
Mineral Glow Powder in 'Bronze'
A micronized mineral bronzer that adds all-over warmth to the complexion. Perfect for sweeping over the whole face, or for contouring to sculpt and define, the powder delivers rich, golden undertones to create a sunkissed finish. Infused with moisturising Shea Butter and a Ceretin Complex that utilises Retinol, it helps to improve elasticity whilst reducing the appearance of lines and wrinkles. Skin looks beautifully radiant, smooth and healthy. Suitable for contact lens wearers. 
Big Look Mascara
A volumising mascara with clump-resistant application wand. Coating lashes in a rich, nourishing formula, the buildable mascara lifts and lengthens even the smallest of eyelashes to create a maximised, dramatised eye makeup look. Infused with Argan Oil, Coconut Oil and antioxidant Vitamin E, the black mascara adds a dewy sheen to lashes whilst intensifying, nourishing and preserving moisture. Lashes are protected and expertly volumised. 
Chisel Brush
A professional makeup brush that has been specially designed to flawlessly apply the 4-in-1 Pressed Mineral Powder Foundation. Working well with all powder products, the brush offers soft, synthetic bristles that pick up and deliver the perfect amount of product for flawless, well-blended results.

name: Vamp! Compact Eyeshadow Duo - Magnetic Blue
product_description:
Create subdued or smokey makeup looks with the PUPA Vamp! Compact Eyeshadow Duo in 'Magnetic Blue', a carefully curated eyeshadow duo that combines two complementary shades.
Creamy and easy-to-blend, each highly pigmented colour delivers a rich finish with long-lasting wear. Use each colour individually or blend together to create a unique eye makeup look. Feels comfortable on the lid. Complete with dual-ended sponge tip applicator.

name: 高光修容盘
product_description:
Achieve a professional makeup finish with theBalm's Highlite 'N Con Tour Face Palette, a mix of eight contour and highlighter shades to define and illuminate your features.
Designed to sculpt and accentuate your natural bone structure, the face kit combines three contour shades, one blusher and four highlighters, allowing you to define the natural hollows of your face, chisel your jawline and emphasise your cheekbones, whilst adding dimension and a light-reflecting finish to your makeup. Blending seamlessly onto skin, the matt contouring colours are perfect for sculpting your cheeks, forehead and nose, and the highlighters are best applied to high points on the face (areas that naturally catch the light) such as cheekbones, corner of the eyes and down the centre of the nose.
The buildable powders will ensure you achieve a flawless, long-lasting makeup look. Housed in a mirrored palette.

name: Geller 劳拉·盖勒四色遮瑕提亮定妆蜜粉
product_description:
Laura Geller 劳拉·盖勒四色遮瑕提亮定妆蜜粉让您拥有光感肤色。 这款纯色的丝滑蜜粉利用肤色矫正颜料的功能，与三种遮瑕粉相结合，能有效均匀肤色，遮盖瑕疵，使肤色看起来健康而有光泽。 这款蜜粉能够实现无缝晕染，可产生完美的柔光效果，平衡肤色，持久定妆，让您尽享光滑细致的妆效。
 "中和剂"： 减少红血丝，让肌肤看起来更有亮泽。
 '香槟酒'： 营造柔魅而浪漫的色泽。
 ‘醚油'：矫正蓝色或灰黄的肤色，使肌肤拥有自然光泽。

name: Gel Liner - Quixotic
product_description:
Line and define eyes with unique precision with Illamasqua’s Precision Gel Liner in Quixotic. Housed in a glass pot, the gel liner boasts the fluidity of a liquid liner but with the ease of a gel.
Quixotic creates a smooth, rich emerald green line with just one application. The formula is long lasting and dries to a water-resistant finish, guaranteed to look as fabulous at the end of the day as it did in the morning.

name: Cosmetics Corrector - Fair Light 0.22oz
product_description:
The Amazing Cosmetics Corrector utilises a colour correction system to minimise the appearance of dark circles, discolouration, spots and uneven skin tone. Ideal for pale and fair skin tones.
Enriched with Vitamin E and Cucumber extract, the dual-sided corrector combines two specific shades to help neutralise pale blue tones found in the under eye area and redness that occurs with blemishes and scars. Creamy and easily blended, the lightweight formula contains Sodium Hyaluronate to help maintain moisture levels, while Ceramide NP boosts skin repair, leaving you with a perfected and healthier-looking complexion.

name: - 郁金香
product_description: Natio 的这款机械长效唇线笔采用防水和防污配方制作而成，不管什么天气，都确保您一整天常保美丽。 这种唇线被设计成易于使用的机械铅笔，柔润光滑，精准无瑕疵，无需使用羽毛刷。

name: 魅力矿物眼影盒 - 亮彩梅红
product_description: 亮彩梅紅Pixi 魅力礦物眼影盒內含六種美妙的顏色，是一款理想的多色眼影組合。採用持久乳狀配方製作而成的寶石色調易於塗​​抹，適合混色，您可以隨心所欲打造屬於自己的煙熏妝。提供雙面上妝海綿。 KD

name: HD Oval Brushes Starter Set
product_description:
Introduce yourself to the coveted, oval face brush with the brushworks HD Oval Brushes Starter Set; a high-performance trio that apply and blend both liquid and powder products. Arriving in a variety of shapes and sizes, the brushes perform multiple tasks, from a smooth and seamless foundation application to an expertly carved contour.
Large Oval 10 Brush (A)
Achieve an airbrushed finish with the Large Oval Brush. Adapting to the shape of your face, the large brush allows for flexible movement and flawless application. The brush features a dense brush head with ultra-soft bristles, ideal for sweeping foundations, powders and bronzers across large areas of the visage.
Oval 3 Brush (E)
Expertly define the face with the Oval Brush; a smaller brush head that assists in creating a professional looking contour and highlight. Its dense brush head and ultra-soft bristles glide comfortably against skin, delivering cream, liquid or powder contour product in order to sculpt enviable cheekbones. Also perfect for applying highlight to the high points of the face.
Domed Round Brush (J)
Mask problem areas using the Domed Round Brush; a small concealer brush with an ultra-dense brush head. The dense bristles allow for maximum coverage, whist its small size offers precision application. Use the Domed Round Brush to cover and conceal dark circles, blemishes and other imperfections.
